value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被添加【印記】，3回合內成為優先攻擊目標。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is unable to use any skills for 2 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}不能使用技能，持續2回合

name: {MASTER_NAME} became invisible and receives only AoE DMG in 2 rounds
value: {MASTER_NAME}進入隱身狀態，2回合內只受範圍技能傷害

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Blinded] and ACC chance is decreased by 70% for 3 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【致盲】，命中率降低70%，持續3回合。

name: {MASTER_NAME} used {SKILL_NAME} on {TARGET_NAME}, caused {DAMAGE} DMG. {MASTER_NAME} restored {DAMAGE} HP.
value: {MASTER_NAME}對{TARGET_NAME}使用了{SKILL_NAME}，造成了{DAMAGE}傷害。{MASTER_NAME}回復了{DAMAGE}生命。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME}'s ATK is decreased by 70%, lasts 2 rounds.
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}攻擊力降低70%，持續2回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Frozen] and is unable to perform any actions, lasts 1 round
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【冰凍】，無法行動，持續1回合。

name: {MASTER_NAME} used {SKILL_NAME} on {TARGET_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME}'s DEF is increased by 20%
{MASTER_NAME} used {SKILL_NAME} on {TARGET_NAME}, in the next 2 rounds,use 1 MP to absorb 5 DMG.
value: {MASTER_NAME}對{TARGET_NAME}使用了{SKILL_NAME}，之後2回合用1點魔法值抵消5點傷害。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, deals an extra {DAMAGE} True DMG
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，額外造成了{DAMAGE}真實傷害。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is Stunned for 2 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}進入了暈眩狀態，持續2回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, all debuffs on {TARGET_NAME} have been dispelled.
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，驅散了{TARGET_NAME}身上所有不利buff。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME}'s ATK is decreased by 30%, lasts 1round
{MASTER_NAME} entered a [Frenzied] state, gain immunity to all debuffs in 2 rounds and all attacks become critical hits.
value: {MASTER_NAME}進入【狂亂】狀態，2回合內免疫一切不利buff，攻擊必暴擊。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Poisoned] and loses 3% HP in each rounds, lasts 4 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}【中毒】，每回合損失3%生命，持續4回合。

name: {MASTER_NAME} used {SKILL_NAME} on {TARGET_NAME}, caused {DAMAGE} DMG, target with [Poison] effect is stunned for 1 round
value: {MASTER_NAME}對{TARGET_NAME}使用了{SKILL_NAME}，造成了{DAMAGE}傷害，處於【中毒】狀態的目標眩暈1回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Burned] and loses 4% HP in each rounds, lasts 2 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【火傷】，每回合損失4%生命，持續2回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Stunned] and is unable to perform actions for 1 round
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}進入【暈眩】狀態，無法行動持續1回合。

name: {MASTER_NAME} used {SKILL_NAME} on {TARGET_NAME}, caused {DAMAGE} DMG. {MASTER_NAME} restored {DAMAGE} HP.
value: {MASTER_NAME}對{TARGET_NAME}使用了{SKILL_NAME}，造成了{DAMAGE}傷害，{MASTER_NAME}恢復{DAMAGE}生命值。

name: {MASTER_NAME} used {SKILL_NAME} and entered a [Taunt] state. All non-AoE skills only target self for 2 rounds.
value: {MASTER_NAME}釋放{SKILL_NAME}，進入【挑釁】狀態，2回合內非範圍技能只能攻擊自己。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} takes 65% less DMG for 2 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{MASTER_NAME}2回合內所受傷害減少65%。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Ignited] and receives {DAMAGE} DMG in each round, lasts 2 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【燃燒】，每回合收到{DAMAGE}傷害，持續2回合。

name: {MASTER_NAME} used {SKILL_NAME} on {TARGET_NAME}, caused {DAMAGE} DMG, causes double DMG to target with [Ignite] effect
value: {MASTER_NAME}對{TARGET_NAME}使用了{SKILL_NAME}，造成了{DAMAGE}傷害，已處於【燃燒】狀態的目標傷害加倍。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Weakened] and ATK is decreased by 50% for 2 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【虛弱】，2回合內攻擊力降低50%。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Blinded] and ACC chance is decreased by 80% for 3 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【致盲】，3回合內命中率降低80%。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, in 3 rounds, {TARGET_NAME}'s DEF is increased by 60% and ATK is increased by 18%.
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，3回合內{TARGET_NAME}的防禦力提高60%，攻擊力提高18%

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} enters [Afterimage] state, increasing EVA Chance by 30% for 3 rounds.
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{MASTER_NAME}進入【殘影】狀態，3回合內閃避概率提高30%。

name: {MASTER_NAME} used {SKILL_NAME} on {TARGET_NAME}, caused {DAMAGE} DMG, and restored 10% of the DMG dealt.
value: {MASTER_NAME}對{TARGET_NAME}使用了{SKILL_NAME}，造成了{DAMAGE}傷害，並將傷害的10%回復給自身。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Sealed] and is unable to use any skills for 2 rounds.
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【封印】，2回合內不能釋放技能。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} [Bleed] and cannot receive any healing for 1 round.
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，造成{TARGET_NAME}【流血】，1回合內無法回復生命值。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Stunned] and is unable to perform actions for 2 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}進入【暈眩】狀態，無法行動，持續2回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} enters [Provoked] state, increasing DEF by 150%, ATK by 25%, lasts 3 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{MASTER_NAME}進入【奮起】狀態，防禦力提高150%，攻擊力提高25%，持續3回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Pierced] and DEF is decreased by 60%, lasts 2 rounds

value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【凍結】，無法行動，持續1回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} enters [Bolstered] state. In 2 rounds, reduce DMG taken by 55% and increase DMG Reflection by 60%
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{MASTER_NAME}進入【援護】狀態，2回合內受到傷害降低55%，反傷增加60%。

value: {TARGET_NAME}被【燃燒】，每回合受到{MASTER_NAME}攻擊力100%的傷害，持續2回合。

name: Countless monsters poured from the mist, howling. We are surrounded by blood, fire, scream and prayer in despair... We must fight our way out!
value: 無數的怪物嘶嚎著從迷霧的陰影中湧出，鮮血，火焰，尖叫與絕望的祈禱···我們必須殺出一條血路！

name: The fate of a hero is to save a collapsing world. Use the flame of light to purify those who became slaves to the darkness!
value: 挽狂瀾於既倒，扶大廈之將傾，英雄的使命就是如此，用光明之焰淨化那些墮入黑暗中的人吧！

name: An obscure figure is lurking in the mist, following us like a beast following its prey. It's horrifying...
value: 迷霧中不時浮現出朦朧的未知陰影，像潛伏的野獸一樣跟著我們，令人恐懼···

name: An obscure figure is lurking in the mist
value: 迷霧中不時浮現出朦朧的未知陰影

name: Some people are worse than monsters... In chaotic times, some people are blinded by greed and turn themselves into bandits, taking advantage of the crisis. They must be punished!
value: 比怪物更可怕的是人心···亂起時，一些被財貨和私欲支配的人們居然化作強盜趁火打劫，他們必須受到懲罰！

name: The monsters bared their teeth, with vile saliva coming out of their mouth. They've cornered a bunch of defenseless women and children. We must fight for those who can't!
value: 怪物們呲著獠牙，流著酸臭的口水將一群手無寸鐵的婦孺逼到了角落，我們必須為了那些不能作戰的人而戰！

name: The monsters surged in. Seoul is burning and the people in it is screaming and crying... Where is Angel's protection? Have we been abandoned by the Angel?
value: 怪物蜂擁而至，首爾在哀嚎與哭泣中絕望的燃燒著···神女的庇護去哪了？我們被神女拋棄了嗎？

name: The monsters are attacking the residence of Angel. The ward of protection is on the brink of destruction and the Angel is in imminent danger... No harm shall come to the Angel!
value: 怪物們在圍攻神女棲所，守護結界一觸即碎，神女危在旦夕···絕不能讓神女受到傷害！

name: An even bigger threat is here. The shadow in the mist finally revealed itself... We must defeat it!
value: 更大的威脅降臨了，隱藏在迷霧中的魔影終於現身了···必須戰勝它！

name: Haunted by shadows and howling beasts, the land of the rising sun is plunged into a long night... Where is Angel Amaterasu?
value: 魔影重重，獸嚎聲聲，日出之國陷入了漫長的黑夜中···天照女神在哪？

name: When stepping into the abandoned shrine, a cry for help in the distance startled the raven on the eave. Who was calling for help? What happened?
value: 踏進荒廢已久的神社，遠處傳來的呼救聲驚起角簷上的渡鴉，是誰在呼救？發生了什麼？

name: The monsters' sharp claws is going to hurt the Witch in the Shrine. How could we let her die here?
value: 怪物的利爪刺向了神社巫女，怎能讓她的生命之花隕落在這種地方呢？

name: We don't know where the gloomy hallways leads to. To make matters worse, we got lost in the darkness...
value: 幽暗的長廊不知通往何方，更不幸的是我們在黑暗中迷失了方向···

name: The Dark Servants have joined the legion alongside bloodthirsty beasts. Only blood can purify their souls!
value: 黑暗僕從們驅趕著嗜血的野獸加入了戰團，他們的靈魂必須用鮮血來淨化！

name: Climb the 8000 steps to the shrine of Tsukuyomi and rescue Angel Amaterasu!
value: 月讀的神社前有八千臺階，踏上去，將天照女神解救出來！

name: The Shrine of Tsukuyomi has become a lair for the Darkspawns. It is shrouded in suffocating darkness. For the Angel and for the people suffering, we must go there.
value: 月讀神社已成為了黑暗爪牙的巢穴，濃重的黑暗氣息令人窒息，為了神女，也為了受苦的人們，我們必須前往。

name: Back then, Tsukiyomi would stroll under the moonlight, dance before the flowers and countless weave sweet dreams for tired people in the quiet night. Now, everything has has changed...
value: 那時的月讀喜歡在月下漫步，那時的月讀喜歡在花前起舞，那時的月讀會在靜謐的夜裡為勞作了一天的人們送去一個又一個美好而甜蜜的夢，而現在，一切都變了···

name: The once majestic temple is left with a few broken walls. The ruined statue seems to be telling passersby about the past glories. But now, the ruins are filled with Darkspawns.
value: 雄偉的神殿只剩下了幾塊殘垣斷壁，殘破的雕像似乎在向過客訴說著當年的輝煌與美麗，而今，廢墟間只剩下黑暗的爪牙橫行。

name: The darkness has engulfed everything. There is a dim light at the end of the crisis-ridden hallway which we have to go through.
value: 黑暗，淹沒一切的黑暗，盡頭有一盞殘喘的燈，我們必須穿過這條危機四伏長廊。

name: The ghosts are staring at us with their crimson eyes, roaring. One mistake and they could take our souls. Please be careful.
value: 鬼影們睜著猩紅的眸子咆哮著，稍有不慎便會攝去我們的靈魂，請務必小心。

name: The light at the end of the hallway never goes out, just as the light has never been consumed by the darkness. Soldier on, warriors!
value: 長廊盡頭那盞燈從不曾熄滅，正如光明從來不曾被黑暗吞噬，加油，我們的勇士！

name: The serpent coils itself above the temple gate, poking its crimson tongue about. What is waiting for us behind this gate?
value: 毒蛇吐著猩紅的鬚子盤旋在神殿大門之上，這扇門後會有什麼在等著我們？

name: The corpses of gods scattered across the temple. Hades died in agony with his mouth open. Poseidon died holding his broken trident. Athena and Apollo were no exception... The death of gods has shocked the world.
value: 眾神的遺骸遍佈神殿，哈迪斯痛苦的張著嘴巴，波塞冬拄著斷戟死去，雅典娜，阿波羅···眾神隕落，天地失色。

name: The Box! Pandora has opened the Box of Devil... We must stop her!
value: 魔盒，潘朵拉打開了魔盒···必須阻止她！

name: We must return the light to the mortal world, even if the gods are in our way!
value: 我們一定要讓光明重現人間，那怕阻止我們的是神！

name: The vast plain is desolate and uninhabited. Wailing wind, dim sunlight, and the occasional stray beasts are the only things here. On cloudy days, one can often hear ghosts cry.
value: 浩浩乎，平沙無垠，渺不見人，風悲日曛，獸鋌亡群，往往鬼哭，天陰則聞。

name: Strangely, it began to snow, and the scorched desert became as cold as the land of the ghosts...
value: 天空詭異的飄起了飛雪，曾經的驕陽大漠變得如同鬼域般寒冷···

name: The Grand Pyramid sits on the edge of the Dune Sea, whispering the words about the past. -This is the Tomb of Gods.
value: 大金字塔聳立在沙海之濱，喃喃的向世人耳語著滄桑與過往——這裡是神之墓地。

name: The gate to the main chamber requires an offering to open. The offering is the life of Darkspawn!
value: 需要祭品才能打開通往主墓室的大門，而祭品就是黑暗爪牙的生命！

name: Death shall befall those who disturb our rest! -The curse written on the tomb gate
value: “打擾吾等安息之人，死神將張開翅膀降臨到他頭上！”——墓室大門上鐫刻的詛咒

name: Screaming souls erupted from the tomb gate when it is opened. They are the last guardians and they are trying to grab our throats!
value: 墓室大門打開後，尖嘯的魂靈們噴湧而出，他們是最後的守護者，他們想扼住我們的喉嚨！

name: Hall of Stories-A place of sacrifice that records the life of the tomb owner. What kind of story will unfold here today?
value: 故事大廳——記載墓室之人生平的祭祀之所，如今，在這大廳中又要上演怎樣的故事呢？

name: Lies and betrayal have stripped down the Fallen God's disguise. The sun will eventually rise and we shall light the fire of dawn.
value: 謊言與背叛撕裂了墮落之神的偽裝，太陽終將升起，而黎明的篝火將由我們點燃。

name: I shall summon my fallen comrades and form an army to take down the enemy!
value: 此去泉台招舊部，旌旗十萬斬閻羅！

name: This forest is alive. It calls you and seduces you. When you enter the forest, it will devour you!
value: 這片森林是活的，它呼喚著你，引誘著你，等你踏進時再將你吞噬！

name: The tons of bones are like a field of snow, the will-o'-the-wisp is like the dancing ghosts and the howling wind is like ghost crying
value: 白骨累累似深冬雪原，鬼火粼粼若鬼蜮起舞，陰風陣陣如冤魂嚎哭。

name: Everyone admires the beauty of Medusa but no one dares to look Medusa in her eyes and no one has ever walked out of this hill alive.
value: 沒人不思慕美杜莎的美豔，沒人敢直視美杜莎的眼睛，沒人能活著從這片丘陵中走出。

name: The mist has always covered this marsh. The song of Muse could get you out of here, but it could also make you drown.
value: 迷霧從未在這片沼澤上消散，只有繆斯的歌聲能引導你走出去，或沉下去。

name: Read the next life written on the Stone of Life, count the regrets on Naihe Bridge and cross the bridge to reach the other side.
value: 三生石上看來世，奈何橋頭歎奈何，越過這座橋，才能到達開滿鮮花的彼岸。

name: The Darklords are hiding in the Blood Castle within the Crimson Tides. Find them and kill them.
value: 矗立於血色潮汐中的血腥城堡，黑暗之神們正藏身於此，找到他們，殺死他們。

name: Take pride in being a human. Even if you are up against a God!
value: 永遠不要忘記生而為人的驕傲，那怕對手是神！

name: The Bifrost that connects Asgard and the world has been destroyed by the Darkspawns...
value: 連通阿斯嘉德與世界各地的彩虹橋，而如今，黑暗爪牙們摧毀了它···

name: This palace is made out of gold. It was once the residence of Godking Odin. Countless warriors have feasted here... Do net let the darkness corrupt this place!
value: 神王奧丁的居所，由黃金鑄造的宮殿，無數勇士曾在這裡豪飲至天亮···不要染黑暗玷污這裡！

name: He who wield this spear shall rule the world. -Inscription on the Spear of Eternity
value: “持有此矛者，將統治世界。”——永恆之槍上的銘文

name: The Valkyrie once rode a white horse across the battlefield, seeking the martyrs and bless them with a kiss. But she is now blinded by darkness...
value: 女武神曾騎著白馬行走於戰場上，賜予無畏的戰死者一吻，可是如今，黑暗蒙蔽了她的眼睛···

name: Legend has it that the soul of a true hero will reach Odin's Valhalla when he dies. He shall fight in the day and feast in the night. But now...
value: 傳說真正的英雄在死後，靈魂會來到奧丁的英靈殿，白天戰鬥，晚上豪飲，而如今···

name: The world tree that supports the nine realms collapsed and the fire of despair has torn Asgard apart. People are praying. Go help them!
value: 支撐九界的世界樹崩塌了，絕望的火焰撕碎了阿斯嘉德，人們在祈禱，去吧，去幫助他們！

name: The ground is shaking and the ocean is boiling. The demons are riding on giant ships made of dead men's nails! This is the final hour! For the End of Eternity!
value: 大地在震顫，海洋在沸騰，惡魔們坐著死人指甲做成的巨船洶湧而來！決戰的時候到了！為了永恆的終焉！

name: Resistance is futile before absolute darkness and power...
value: 在絕對的黑暗與力量面前，任何的反抗都是徒勞且無力的···

name: Legend has it that billions of years ago, the sky was torn apart and creatures on earth were devastated. Nuwa patched up the sky with a stone and save the people. But now, the Darkspawns are trying to harm Nuwa!
value: 相傳億萬年前，天幕崩裂、生靈塗炭，女媧大神以石補天，救萬民於水火。而如今，黑暗爪牙竟想對女媧大神不利！

name: The entrance to 33 planes of existence. An immortal once rode a crane through here. A powerful man once cut into the mountain here. But Darkspawns have occupied this place now...
value: 三十三重天的入口，曾有仙人騎鶴，曾有力士開山，而如今，黑暗爪牙佔據了這裡···

name: This place was once a land of marvel, but is now a monster-infested deadly mountain pass...
value: 曾經的造化鐘神地，而今卻成了怪物橫行的死亡山口···

name: Shennong has tasted a hundred different herbs and taught people about farming and herbal medicine. Banish the monsters!
value: 始祖神農曾嘗遍百草，教授黎庶農耕草藥。將怪物驅逐出去！

name: Ying and Yang, Four Symbols and Eight Diagrams creates millions of artifacts! Back off, evils!
value: 兩儀、四象、八卦，我中華之瑰寶何止萬千！邪魔退散！

name: This is the world of fire. The fire of red lotus will incinerate everything!
value: 這裡是火焰的世界，焚盡一切的紅蓮業火！

name: The Heaven Lake on Mt. Kunlun has given birth to snow apes, blue birds, swan geese, Bai Ze and countless life forms... Let the light shine over this place again!
value: 昆侖天池孕育了無數的生命，雪猿、青鳥、鴻雁、白澤···將讓光明重新照耀這裡！

name: The Kingdom of God above the Temple of Heaven, please grant me the power of the gods to kill the demons!
value: 懸浮於天宮之上的神之國度，請借諸天神佛之力助我誅魔！

name: Who could've thought that this place was once a land of prosperity... The Demonlord hid herself here. Find her!
value: 誰能想到此處曾是豐饒的天國沃土···魔主藏身於此，把她找出來！

name: The demon blood has corrupted this land
The fallen angels have abandoned their beliefs and responsibilities!
value: 墮落的天使們背棄了自己的信仰與責任！

name: The demon blood has corrupted this land and the fallen angels have abandoned their beliefs and responsibilities!
value: 魔血腐蝕了這片土地，墮落的天使們背棄了自己的信仰與責任！

name: I can still remember this creek, sheperd boy are resting here with his flock of sheep, farm woman is washing her clothes while singing and the mill uptream is grinding nonstop... Darkness has destroyed it all!
value: 我記得這條小河，牧童趕著羊群在此休憩，農婦唱著歌兒漂淨衣服，上游的磨坊吱悠吱悠的轉來轉去···而黑暗使一切不再！

name: The fallen angel dances naked on a floor of feather. Her crimson lips are as inviting as a glass of wine... Don't kiss her!
value: 墮落天使赤裸著身體，踏著一地的羽毛婀娜起舞，猩紅的嘴唇如美酒般攝人心魄···不要吻下去！

name: What's the difference between angels and demons? What's the difference between good and evil? Have you ever doubted your beliefs and resolution?
value: 天使與惡魔有什麼區別？善與惡又有什麼區別？你是否懷疑過自己的信仰與堅持？

name: Nothing is true, everything is permitted. Eternal life is only granted to those who follow my cause! -Unholy Bible Volume XI
value: “萬物皆虛，萬事皆允，唯信吾之道者得永生！”——死亡聖經卷十一

name: Angels love to make judgments. It doesn't matter if the angel has fallen or not. Perhaps they are using judgments to strengthen their teetering faith.
value: 天使總喜歡審判，無論是墮落前還是墮落後，或許他們只是借助審判來鞏固自己搖搖欲墜的信仰吧。

name: Some are willing to feed themselves to the tiger, some are willing to cut their flesh off to feed the eagle, some are willing to sacrifice themselves for the greater good and some are willing to travel deep into the abyss without hesitation!
value: 以身飼虎者有，割肉喂鷹者有，捨身取義者有，敢入深淵一往無前者，亦有！

name: The Sea of Darkness, the Toxic Swamp, the Desolate Land and the Burning Ridge... This is not going to be an ordinary journey...
value: 黑暗之海，劇毒沼澤，破敗之地，燃燒山脈···這是一條註定不平凡的旅程···

name: The four-hundred-eighty temples of the Southern Dynasty in the mist and rain their many towers can be seen
value: 南朝四百八十寺，多少樓臺煙雨中。

name: The once majestic temple is left with a few broken walls. The ruined statue seems to be telling passersby about the past glories.
value: 雄偉的神殿只剩下了幾塊殘垣斷壁，殘破的雕像似乎在向過客訴說著當年的輝煌與美麗。

name: But now, the ruins are filled with Darkspawns.
value: 而今，廢墟間只剩下黑暗的爪牙橫行。

name: The darkness has engulfed everything.
value: 黑暗，淹沒一切的黑暗，盡頭有一盞殘喘的燈。

name: There is a dim light at the end of the crisis-ridden hallway which we have to go through.
value: 我們必須穿過這條危機四伏長廊

name: The ghosts are staring at us with their crimson eyes, roaring.
value: 鬼影們睜著猩紅的眸子咆哮著…

name: One mistake and they could take our souls. Please be careful.
value: 稍有不慎便會攝去我們的靈魂，請務必小心。

name: The light at the end of the hallway never goes out, just as the light has never been consumed by the darkness.
value: 長廊盡頭那盞燈從不曾熄滅，正如光明從來不曾被黑暗吞噬！

name: The serpent coils itself above the temple gate, poking its crimson tongue about.
value: 毒蛇吐著猩紅的鬚子盤旋在神殿大門之上。

name: What is waiting for us behind this gate?
value: 這扇門後會有什麼在等著我們？

name: The corpses of gods scattered across the temple. Hades died in agony with his mouth open. Poseidon died holding his broken trident. Athena and Apollo were no exception... the world.
value: 眾神的遺骸遍佈神殿，哈迪斯痛苦的張著嘴巴，波塞冬拄著斷戟死去，雅典娜，阿波羅···

name: The death of gods has shocked
The Box! Pandora has opened the Box of Devil... We must stop her!
We must return the light to the mortal world.
value: 我們一定要讓光明重現人間！

The vast plain is desolate and uninhabited.
value: 浩浩乎，平沙無垠，渺不見人。

value: “打擾吾等安息之人，死神將張開翅膀降臨到他頭上！”

This forest is alive. It calls you and seduces you.
value: 這片森林是活的，它呼喚著你

name: When you enter the forest, it will devour you!
value: 引誘著你，等你踏進時再將你吞噬！

value: The tons of bones are like a field of snow, the will-o'-the-wisp is like the dancing ghosts.

value: 沒人不思慕美杜莎的美豔，沒人敢直視美杜莎的眼睛

name: But no one dares to look Medusa in her eyes and no one has ever walked out of this hill alive.

value: 人們在祈禱，去吧，去幫助他們！

But now, a monster-infested deadly mountain pass...

value: 猩紅的嘴唇如美酒般攝人心魄···不要吻下去！

name: What's the difference between angels and demons? What's the difference between good and evil?
value: 天使與惡魔有什麼區別？善與惡又有什麼區別？

name: Have you ever doubted your beliefs and resolution?
value: 你是否懷疑過自己的信仰與堅持？

name: Nothing is true, everything is permitted. Eternal life is only granted to those who follow my cause!
value: “萬物皆虛，萬事皆允，唯信吾之道者得永生！”

name: Angels love to make judgments. It doesn't matter if the angel has fallen or not.
value: 天使總喜歡審判，無論是墮落前還是墮落後

name: Perhaps they are using judgments to strengthen their teetering faith.
value: 或許他們只是借助審判來鞏固自己搖搖欲墜的信仰吧。

name: Some are willing to feed themselves to the tiger, some are willing to cut their flesh off to feed the eagle, some are willing to sacrifice themselves for the greater good。
value: 以身飼虎者有，割肉喂鷹者有，捨身取義者有。

name: Travel deep into the abyss without hesitation, they are real warriors!
value: 敢入深淵一往無前者，亦有！

name: The Sea of Darkness, the Toxic Swamp, the Desolate Land and the Burning Ridge...
value: 黑暗之海，劇毒沼澤，破敗之地，燃燒山脈···

name: This is not going to be an ordinary journey...
value: 這是一條註定不平凡的旅程···

name: The fate of a hero is to save a collapsing world.
value: 挽狂瀾於既倒，扶大廈之將傾，英雄的使命就是如此

name: Use the flame of light to purify those who became slaves to the darkness!
value: 用光明之焰淨化那些墮入黑暗中的人吧！

name: An obscure figure is lurking in the mist, following us like a beast following its prey. It's horrifying...
value: 像潛伏的野獸一樣跟著我們，令人恐懼···

name: Some people are worse than monsters... In chaotic times, some people are blinded by greed and turn themselves into bandits, taking advantage of the crisis. They must be punished!
value: 亂起時，一些被財貨和私欲支配的人們居然化作強盜趁火打劫，他們必須受到懲罰！

name: The monsters bared their teeth, with vile saliva coming out of their mouth. They've cornered a bunch of defenseless women and children.
value: 怪物們呲著獠牙，流著酸臭的口水將一群手無寸鐵的婦孺逼到了角落

name: We must fight for them!
value: 我們必須為了那些不能作戰的人而戰！

name: The monsters surged in. Seoul is burning and the people in it is screaming and crying...
value: 怪物蜂擁而至，首爾在哀嚎與哭泣中絕望的燃燒著···

name: Where is Angel's protection? Have we been abandoned by the Angel?
value: 神女的庇護去哪了？我們被神女拋棄了嗎？

name: The monsters are attacking the residence of Angel. The ward of protection is on the brink of destruction and the Angel is in imminent danger...
value: 怪物們在圍攻神女棲所，守護結界一觸即碎，神女危在旦夕···

name: No harm shall come to the Angel!
value: 絕不能讓神女受到傷害！

name: An even bigger threat is here. The shadow in the mist finally revealed itself...
value: 更大的威脅降臨了，隱藏在迷霧中的魔影終於現身了···

name: A gargantuan barrier stands in the way...
May the prophet light our paths？
There is still a glimmer of hope…
Ugh... I can’t... walk anymore...
value: 不行了……實在是……走不動了……

name: Is this the hope I’ve been looking for?
Good luck will be with you!
We can’t hold much longer here!
No monsters can get through here!
Move out. Let’s fight for a better future!
We must protect the world we love!
value: 熱愛這個世界，絕對要保護它

name: The heroes’ souls are beckoning me！
Is there reinforcements?
value: 有人幫我們開闢出一條道路

name: The banner of freedom and light！
Man’s nature at birth is evil...
Monsters won’t disappear unless humanity is wiped out
The great hero Romulus watches over Rome.
value: 英雄羅穆盧斯守護著羅馬

name: This is the power of heroes!
Men and women—everyone is just an ordinary person…
Astral Deity of the Maned Head
value: Astral Deity of the Maned Head

name: Tap to switch to Angel Screen
Tap on Angel avatar to adjust
value: 點擊女神頭像，開始對女神的操作

name: Tap the gear which you want to enhance
Tap here to set the Angel to <color=#6DCFF6FF>[Fighting]</color>
value: 點擊這裡，將女神設置為<color=#6DCFF6FF>「出戰」</color>狀態

name: Tap here to enter the Battleground
Tap <color=#FA931AFF>[Select]</color> button to equip…
value: 點擊<color=#FA931AFF>「選擇」</color>按鈕，即可換上裝備

name: Reach over <color=#FA931AFF>80%</color> Win Rate to <color=#FA931AFF>challenge the Boss</color>
Defeat the Boss to unlock the next dungeon
value: 戰勝BOSS，才能進入下一副本

name: Tap here repeatedly to send gifts to the Angel to increase Affinity Level
value: 瘋狂點擊這裡，給女神送禮，提升好感度星級

name: Reach required Star-Lv. to awake the Angel
value: 星級達到要求，可以覺醒女神

name: Perform <color=#FA931AFF>Quick Combat</color> to get 2 hour earnings instantly (for free this time)
value: 進行<color=#FA931AFF>快速掛機</color>，可立即獲得2小時收益（本次免費）

name: Perform <color=#FA931AFF>Quick Combat</color> to get 2 hours’ yield instantly, which speeds up your leveling and helps you in boss fight!
value: 進行<color=#FA931AFF>快速掛機</color>，可立即獲得2小時收益！加快升級，有助於戰勝BOSS！

name: Select the gear you just equipped
Enhance your gear to further improve your Power!
value: 強化裝備，可以進一步提高戰鬥力！

name: Tap <color=#FA931AFF>[Enhance]</color> Button to enhance
value: 點擊<color=#FA931AFF>【強化】</color>按鈕，進行強化

name: Tap <color=#FA931AFF>[Enhance]</color> button again to continue enhancing gears
value: 再次點擊<color=#FA931AFF>【強化】按鈕</color>，繼續強化裝備

name: Perform one last <color=#FA931AFF>[Enhancement]</color>
value: 最後再進行一次<color=#FA931AFF>【強化】</color>操作

name: Force tapping the close gear button
value: 強制端點擊關閉裝備按鈕

name: The next dungeon is unlocked after defeating the Boss. Tap here to switch map
value: 戰勝BOSS後，已開啟下一關卡，點擊這裡<color=#FA931AFF>切換地圖</color>

name: Tap to enter the new unlocked dungeon
Force the player to tap [Begin Idling Button]
value: 強制引導玩家點擊【進入掛機按鈕】

name: Bag is full. Gear <color=#FA931AFF>smelting</color> recommended.
value: 裝備滿，推薦進行<color=#FA931AFF>裝備熔煉</color>

name: There are some unnecessary gear. It is recommended to carry out gear <color=#FA931AFF>smelting</color>.
value: 不需要的裝備，推薦進行<color=#FA931AFF>裝備熔煉</color>

name: Tap here to set the skills
value: 點擊這裡進入技能設置

name: Tap here to set the skills for the dungeon
value: 點擊這裡進入副本技能設置

name: Tap to select skill sequence slot
value: 點擊選擇技能順序欄位元

name: Complete <color=#FA931AFF>Training</color> will greatly improve your Angel Power
value: <color=#FA931AFF>培養</color>女神，可大幅提高戰鬥力

name: Tap for {0} <color=#FA931AFF>standard Training</color> (For free this time)
value: 點擊進行1次<color=#FA931AFF>普通培養</color>（本次免費）

name: Tap here to craft <color=#FA931AFF>Artifact</color>
value: 點擊這裡，開始打造<color=#FA931AFF>神器</color>

name: Enter the store to buy various items
value: 進入商店，可以購買各類物品

name: An Angel can be Synthesized, tap the bag to enter Shard Synthesis Screen
value: 有可以合成的女神，點擊背包，進入碎片合成介面

name: Select the Angel Shards
value: 選擇要合成的女神碎片

name: All shards have been collected, tap to <color=#FA931AFF>Compose Angel</color>
value: 碎片已集齊，點擊可以<color=#FA931AFF>合成女神</color>

name: Tap here to <color=#FA931AFF>craft</color> gear
value: 點擊這裡，開始<color=#FA931AFF>打造</color>裝備

name: Tap here to refresh the gear you want to <color=#FA931AFF>craft</color>.
value: 點擊這裡，刷新<color=#FA931AFF>打造</color>的裝備

name: New angel slot unlocked
value: 第4個女神<color=#FA931AFF>上陣</color>槽位已解鎖

name: <color=#FA931AFF>Enhance</color> your gear to further improve your Power!
value: 對裝備進行<color=#FA931AFF>強化</color>，可以快速提升自己的實力！

name: Angels battles in rotation in battle, and defeated Angels will not be able to join the battle again. Please arrange your line-up wisely!
value: 戰鬥採用車輪戰模式，被擊敗的女神無法再次參加戰鬥，請<color=#6DCFF6FF>合理安排陣容</color>

name: Come on! I shall send you monsters to hell before I die!
value: 來吧來吧！在死之前我會把你們這些怪物送進地獄！

name: Princess Bari? ! Why are you here? !
value: 巴里公主？！你們怎麼會在這裡？！

name: It’s too late to explain that! Deal with them first!
value: 來不及解釋了！先解決掉它們！

name: Thank you, Bari…Who’s she?!
value: 公主，謝謝你···誰！誰在你身邊！？

name: She’s the descendant of Ungnyeo. We have come here to eliminate dark forces in Japan!
value: 這是大韓熊女的後裔，我們為了消除日本的黑暗而來！

name: We heard that Tsukuyomi had imprisoned Amaterasu.
value: 我們聽說夜神月讀囚禁了天照大神。

name: Tsukuyomi…?! Yes… That's why the monsters rioted! That bastard! She betrayed us!
value: 月讀···所以怪物們才會暴動！這個混蛋！她背叛了我們！

name: Siren, come with us to defeat Tsukuyomi and save Amaterasu!
value: 和我們一起去打敗月讀吧，把天照大神救出來！

name: Thank you for your help! I need to clean my wounds first.
value: 謝謝你們的幫助！我需要先清理一下傷口。

name: There's not enough time! Bari, we can do it ourselves!
value: 沒時間了！我覺得我們自己就可以搞定！

name: Alright. Siren, take a rest here and we’ll deal with the rest. Where is Tsukuyomi?
value: 好吧···妖，你好好休養，現在月讀在哪裡？

name: I’ll send you to her shrine.
value: 我會把你們傳送到她的神社。

name: Then the Angel and Princess Bari are sent to Tsukuyomi’s shrine.
value: 女神和巴里公主被傳送到了月讀神社。

name: Haven't seen you for a long time, Tsukuyomi.
Bari? How dare you come here? I’ll kill you!
value: 巴里？居然敢踏進我的神社，你在找死不成？

name: Shut up! A traitor like you has no right to say anything! Where is Amaterasu?
value: 住口！叛逆之人安敢在此饒舌！天照大神在哪裡！

name: Haha! Swallow them up, my servants!
value: 哈哈哈！我的僕人們，把他們吞下去！

name: I never…never thought that I would be defeated by human beings!
value: 呵呵···我，居然，敗在了人類手裡···

name: She’s not an ordinary person! She’s the descendant of Ungnyeo, and the power of the goddess runs in her blood!
value: 他可不是普通的人類，他是神裔，血脈中傳承著神的力量！

name: I defeated a powerful angel?! Unbelievable!
value: 我居然打敗了神？！不敢相信！

name: Amaterasu fell into a deep sleep…（cough）She will never wake up… Never!
value: 天照沉睡了。。。咳咳，她不會醒來的。。。永遠！

name: What did you do to Amaterasu?!
value: 你對天照大神做了什麼！？

name: Finally the world will be plunged into eternal darkness!
value: 世界終將陷入永恆的黑暗！

name: If Amaterasu cannot be awakened, Korea and Japan will be doomed!
value: 如果天照大神就這樣沉睡下去，韓國和日本就完了！

name: After all we've been through… Is this the end?
value: 經歷了這麼多···一切都要結束了嗎？

name: …What should I do? What should I do!?
Bari, if there are angels in Korea and Japan, there must be angels in Greece! There are so many angels in Greek mythology!
value: 公主！如果韓國和日本都有神的話，那麼希臘也一定有神存在！希臘神話中有那麼多的神！

name: Yes! The nightmare angel Nyx! If we get her help, we can awake Amaterasu!
value: 對！夢囈女神倪克斯！！如果得到她的幫助，或許我們可以喚醒天照大神！

name: The Greek Temple had always been under the protection of the gods. Nyx, the guardian of Athens, defeated the attacking Giant Soulreaver, stripped it of its core, put it into a box, and sent it to Pandora for safekeeping. When Iris handed the box to Pandora as instructed, the curious Pandora couldn't resist the temptation and opened the box...
value: 希臘的神社在眾神的守衛下得以保存，雅典的守衛者倪克斯擊敗了前來侵襲的巨型噬魂怪，並將它的核心剖出來，放到盒子裡交給潘朵拉保管。當伊利斯奉命將盒子交給潘朵拉後，無法壓制住自己好奇心的潘朵拉，打開了盒子???

name: We should go to Nyx's temple as soon as possible!
value: ...我們要儘快到達倪克斯的神殿！

name: Phew, this place is a mess too…
New enemies? They're different from monsters we have met before.
value: 新的敵人嗎？這些跟之前遇到的怪物不同

name: There's a lamp over there. Let's head that way.
value: 那裡有一盞燈，咱們往那走吧。

name: There's no end to these monsters!
Wait! It seems that someone is there!
Wait a minute, we'll take forever if we keep fighting like this. We need to enhance our power. Well, drastic times call for drastic measures!
value: 等一下，我們這樣打下去太慢了，需要快速提高實力才行，特殊的時期只能採用特殊的辦法了！

name: Are you OK? It seems that you are badly hurt!
value: 你沒事吧？好像傷得很重！

name: Fighting power has risen a lot! Remember, every piece of gear will bring you a qualitative leap!
value: 戰鬥力上漲了好多！記住，每件裝備都會給你帶來質的飛躍喲！

name: I am Iris, messenger of Gods.
value: 我叫伊利斯，眾神的信使。

name: Where is this? We're looking for Nyx's temple…
value: 這是哪？我們再找倪克斯的神殿…

name: Nyx defeated the attacking Giant Soulreaver, stripped its core, put it into a box and sent it to Pandora for safekeeping. Nyx told Pandora that she cannot open it…
value: 倪克斯擊敗了進攻雅典的巨大噬魂怪，將它的核心封印在盒子裡將給潘朵拉保管，並拜託潘朵拉絕對不能打開…

name: Yes…Pandora was consumed by the darkness. I tried to stop it but failed…
value: 是的...潘朵拉被黑暗所侵蝕，我試圖阻止它的墮落，可失敗了…

name: We're almost there! That's where Pandora is!
value: 快到了，潘朵拉就在那裡！

name: Thank you, brave Angels! I couldn't have stopped Pandora's rampage without you!
value: 謝謝，勇敢的女神，多虧你們我才能阻止潘朵拉的暴走！

name: I told you before not to give the box to Pandora! She's way too curious for her own good!
value: 不能把盒子交給潘朵拉！它好奇心太重了！我提醒過你！

name: Sigh… I've entrusted it to the wrong person, and now it's too late for regrets…
value: Sigh… I've entrusted it to the wrong person, and now it's too late for regrets…

name: Nyx, please awaken Amaterasu from her sleep! Only she can save our country and Japan!
value: 倪克斯，請您讓天照大神從沉睡中醒來！只有她能拯救我們的國家和日本！

name: Iris had informed me. Don't worry, I will help you. Once you get back, Amaterasu will have awakened!
value: 伊利斯跟我說過了，我會幫你的，等你回去時天照估計就會醒來了！

name: We finally made it… Thank you!
What's going on?! Why is the dark power becoming stronger in Greece?!
value: 怎麼回事？！為什麼在希臘，黑暗力量越來越強了？！

name: This is because the power of the Sun is weakened! I didn't think it'll come to this!
value: ...這是太陽之力被削弱的原因！沒想到會是這樣！

name: Nyx, what's the meaning of this?
You need to find Geb right away. She is asking for your help!
value: 現在馬上去找蓋布，他在請求你們的幫助！

name: Geb? The God of Earth of Egypt??
I will send you to help her to put the sun back on track!
value: 我會送你們過去的，幫他把太陽撥回正軌！

name: Geb and Nuit had actually betrayed the Light. Nephthys and the other Gods sealed the Mother Goddess, Nuit, in the Great Pyramid, but Geb escaped… However, the group of Angels who had no idea of this arrived in Egypt at Geb's invitation…
value: 蓋布與努特背叛了光明，奈芙蒂斯和其他神一起將神母努特封印在了大金字塔中，而蓋布卻逃脫了…而對這一切毫不知情的女神一行人，應蓋布的‘邀請’，來到了埃及…

name: WOW! Is this the famous pyramid?! It's so spectacular!
value: 哇！這就是有名的金字塔嗎？！好壯觀！

name: …So strange. The power of sun is so weak here… What happened?
value: ...好奇怪，這裡的太陽之力太弱了...到底發生了什麼事？

name: Egypt…Isn't it supposed to be hot here? It's noon now, so why is it so cold?
value: 埃及...不是應該很熱嗎？現在是正午怎麼會這麼冷？？

name: Are you Geb? Nyx said that you need our help.
value: 請問你是蓋布嗎？倪克斯說你需要我們的説明。

name: Yes, I am. Thank you for coming.
Nephthys betrayed the Light… She sealed Nuit, which prevents sunlight from shining upon the land… You will help me, right?
value: 奈芙蒂斯背叛了光明...他封印了努特，使陽光不能落到地面...你們會幫助我，對嗎？

name: This is all part of Nephthys' scheme. If you can defeat Nephthys and save Nuit, the sun will rise above the horizon again! Let me take you to the pyramid where Nephthys is in.
value: 這一切都是奈芙蒂斯的陰謀，如果你們能打敗奈芙蒂斯並救出努特，太陽就會重新普照人間！我帶你們去奈芙蒂斯的金字塔。

name: Is this Nephthys' hiding spot?
value: 這就是奈芙蒂斯的藏身處嗎？

name: Yes… I'm afraid I can only accompany you up to this point.
value: 是的...我恐怕只能送你們到這裡了…

name: There are things in this pyramid which reduces my power… I cannot go any further…
value: 這個金字塔中有使我力量衰退的東西...我不能再往前走了…

name: May you restore the brilliant sun again, and may warm sands guide your path.
value: 願你能重現太陽的光輝，願你的前方是溫暖的沙地…

name: Be careful of the Shadow Servant!
None shall pass! Not even you, who wields the power of the Sun God!
value: 此處禁止通行！即使你擁有太陽神的力量！

name: The answer to the mysteries of fate… is Death!
value: 命運的謎團...答案就是死亡！

name: Are you pursuing immortality? Give me your heart!
value: 欲求長生？獻出你的心臟！

name: I shall turn you into grains of the desert sand.
Nephthys! Take off those dirty bandages! Release Nuit!
value: 奈芙蒂斯！拿掉這些骯髒的繃帶！放了努特！

name: Who are you? Geb! Come out! Let's end it all! Don't get the innocents involved!
value: 你們是誰？蓋布！你出來！做個了斷吧！不要牽扯無辜的人進來！

name: You want me to release Nuit? Never!
value: You want me to release Nuit? Never!

name: Nephthys, stop it! Release Nuit! The world needs sunlight!
value: 奈芙蒂斯，收手吧！放了努特，這世界需要太陽！

name: (Cough)… I see… You idiots…
value: 咳咳...原來如此...你們這些白癡…

name: You've been deceived… I am stopping Nuit from degenerating…
value: 你們被利用了...我在阻止努特的墮落…

name: (Cough)… Nuit was consumed by the darkness, so I tried my best to seal her…
value: 咳咳...努特被黑暗腐蝕了，我拼盡全力才將她封印…

name: Hahaha! These cursed bandages are finally broken! My poor and foolish girls, did you really believe that you can stop me with these?
value: 哈哈哈！這該死的繃帶終於被破壞了！我可憐又愚蠢的孩子，你以為這樣就可以阻止我嗎！

name: Good Job, idiots! Well done for working so hard to break Nuit's seal! Now, offer up your meager lives and feel the power of Darkness!
value: 幹的很好，白癡們！多虧你們打開了努特的封印！現在，用你們卑微生命感受黑暗的降臨吧！

name: Damn it! You lied to us!!
Ignorant ants! I am God! Lowly humans cannot understand God's intention!
value: 無知的螻蟻！我是神！低賤的人類怎麼可能理解神的意圖！

name: You don't deserve being a God! You're a devil!
value: 你不配稱為神！你是惡魔！

name: Repair my sword and fight to the ninth heaven! Sprinkle my blood and press forward with indomitable will!
value: 修我戰劍，殺上九天！撒我熱血，一往無前！！

name: Well, ants. Prepare to face the power of God!
value: 好，好，螻蟻們，感受神的力量吧！

name: How could this be possible… How could I lose… I am God!
value: 怎麼會...我怎麼會輸...我可是神！

name: Oh, no! Nuit's seal is completely broken! She is going to go on a rampage!
value: Oh, no! Nuit's seal is completely broken! She is going to go on a rampage!

name: Isn't there anything we can do?!
Nuit! My lover! Show them the power of darkness!
value: 努特！我的愛人！展現黑暗真正的力量吧！

name: Phew… Thank goodness we managed to stop Nuit's rampage. Are you ok?
value: 呼...還好阻止了努特的暴走，你還好吧？

name: Have we really stopped her? But I feel a little strange… my body… Ahhhh! My body is burning!
value: 我們...真的阻止了嗎？可是...有點奇怪...我的身體...啊！我的身體在燃燒！

name: No! The power of the sun is too strong! No!!

Though they managed to stop Nuit's rampage, the Angel was directly exposed to the power of the sun, resulting in her descend to Hell. In order for the Angel to return to the Mortal Realm, she has to obtain permission from the Queen of Hell, Lucifer. Thus, she embark on a long journey to find Lucifer...
value: 雖然阻止了努特的暴走，但直接暴露在太陽之力下的女神卻掉進了地獄。。。從地獄醒來的女神要重回人間，必須得到地獄之王路西法的允許。於是女神踏上了尋找路西法的漫漫長路。

name: Bari, where is this? Why can't I see anything…?
value: 巴里，這是哪？怎麼什麼都看不見…

name: Fortunately, we still possess our Angelic powers. Can you hear me clearly?
value: 真是萬幸，神女的力量還在。你能聽清楚我說的話嗎？

name: I can hear you... Where am I now?
Calm down! I am looking for a way to resurrect you right now!
value: 冷靜！我正在找讓你複生的方法！

name: I am the Guardian Deity of Hell - Minotaur!!
value: 我是地獄的守護神——米若陶洛斯！！

name: Please stop the ruckus… I'm really tired. Just let me rest already…
value: 不要鬧了...我很累的...不要打擾我休息…

name: Did you really just say that? You've got guts! You'll make a fine dinner!
value: 好大的膽子！居然說這種話！我要把你做成晚餐！

name: Damned God-killer! Cower in terror against Hells' dominion over you!
value: 弑神者！感受被地獄支配的恐懼吧！

name: As long as we keep exploring, monsters will continue to appear, and our Angels will fight to destroy them automatically!
value: 只要我們不停探索，怪物就會不斷出現，我們的女神們會自動戰鬥消滅他們！

name: Strengthen the gear that has just been replaced, and further strengthen the fight power!
value: 強化剛剛換上的裝備，可進一步提升戰鬥力！

name: New Angel has been deployed to fight beside you. Try it in <color=#FA931AFF>Battleground</color>
value: 已派上新的女神和您一同戰鬥，快進入<color=#FA931AFF>戰場</color>試一試

name: This is the key to improve your strength.
value: 提升自己實力的訣竅就在這裡！

name: When you see <color=#FA931AFF>red dot</color>, you should equip new gear to get stronger!
value: 消滅怪物會隨機掉落裝備，看到<color=#FA931AFF>小紅點</color>的提示，就要及時<color=#FA931AFF>換上新裝備</color>，這樣就可以變得更強！

name: Your Combat Rating increased dramatically after you equipping and enhancing your gears. Try them out on the Battleground
value: 換上並強化裝備後，戰鬥力已大幅提升，趕快到戰場試一試

name: After defeating the boss, you can enter the next battlefield.
value: 戰勝BOSS，才能進入下一關卡

name: You are very powerful. Focus and direct your power!
value: 你的戰鬥力非常強大，會在專注中爆發！

name: There are too many monsters, we need help from the Angel! They are looking forward to being summoned by you!
value: 怪物太多了，我們需要女神的説明！她們也在期待著你的召喚！

name: The next chapter of the dungeon is unlocked. Tap to switch map
value: 已開啟副本下一章節，點擊切換地圖

name: What do you care more about? Trouble or death?
value: 你到底是怕麻煩還是怕死更多一些？

name: Your power soared! Do not underestimate your gear, cause every piece of gear brings you a quantum leap!
value: 戰鬥力上漲了好多！不要小看裝備的提升，每件都可能帶來質的飛躍喲！

name: Gabriel, you’re amazing! Please always stay by my side!
value: 加百列你真的好厲害！以後請你不要離開我身邊一米！

name: The ancient divine power? But I feel like I tried my best today.
value: 古神之力麼，可我有種今日額度已用光的感覺啊。

name: Use your heart, feel your connection with Gabriel, and nurture her with your ancient divine power.
value: 請你用心神感受與加百列的聯繫，用古神之力澆灌她。

name: Pay attention to the small red dot prompt, and replace it with new gear in time!
value: 消滅怪物會隨機掉落裝備，留意小紅點提示，及時<color=#6DCFF6FF>換上新裝備</color>，就可以變得更強！

name: Swipe left to the next page
value: 向左滑動，切換到下一頁面

name: The Greek shrine was preserved under the guards of the gods. The guardian of Athens, Nyx, defeated the giant soul eater who came to attack and cut its core and put it in the box and handed it to Pandora. When Iris was ordered to hand over the box to Pandora, Pandora, who could not suppress his curiosity, opened the box...
value: 希臘的神社在眾神的守衛下得以保存，雅典的守衛者倪克斯擊敗了前來侵襲的巨型噬魂怪，並將它的核心剖出來，放到盒子裡交給潘朵拉保管。當伊利斯奉命將盒子交給潘朵拉後，無法壓制住自己好奇心的潘朵拉，打開了盒子。。。

name: Why go to all the trouble?
USER_IS_NOT_NEWBIE
value: 你已經是個成熟的玩家了

name: BOSS_OPEN_TIPS
value: 公會BOSS已開啟，是否前往戰鬥？

name: Use it in Angel Awaken Tab to increase Affinity by 100
value: 女神覺醒介面使用，增加400點好感度

name: Ranking rewards are awarded at 21:00 each day
Reach over 80% Win Rate to challenge the Boss,and go to next Dungeon
value: 勝率已達80%，戰勝BOSS，即可進入下一副本

name: Used to craft gears and artifacts
value: 可用於打造裝備和神器

name: Used to make gems level up
Used to convert rare items in point store
value: 可在積分商店兌換稀有物品

name: FAST_FIGHT_FREE
value: 進行快速掛機2小時，本次免費，確定繼續嗎？(您是VIP{0}，今天還可以購買{1}次)

name: Different types of <color=#FA931AFF>Summon</color> can be made here, try it now ~
value: 在這裡可以進行不同類型的<color=#FA931AFF>召喚</color>，現在就試試吧~

name: Here you can make different types of <color=#FA931AFF>Summon</color> and get various rewards. Try it now ~
value: 在這裡可以進行不同類型的<color=#FA931AFF>召喚</color>，獲得各類獎勵。現在就試試吧~

name: Awake can improve Angel attributes and has the chance to get Skill.Try now~
value: 覺醒會提升女神屬性，並有機會讓女神獲得技能，趕快試試吧~~

name: <color=#FA931AFF>Quest rewards</color> include massive diamonds and rare items. Claim now~
value: <color=#FA931AFF>任務</color>獎勵包含大量鑽石以及各類稀有道具，現在把它們全部領取吧~

name: Sweep the current highest level Boss that can be swept.
value: 使用後直接掃蕩當前可以掃蕩的最高級副本Boss

name: Tap here to change map and sweep the Boss
value: 在切換地圖的介面下，進行掃蕩BOSS

name: Sweeping Boss in the pre`vious dungeon is more likely to get better gear!
value: 掃蕩前一副本的BOSS，獲得更好裝備的可能性更大！

name: Increases self Max HP by 12% and increases ATK by 20%
value: 自身的血量上限增加12%，攻擊力增加20%

name: Increases self ATK by 22% and increases CRIT by 26%
value: 自身的攻擊力增加22%，暴擊值增加26%

name: SUMMON_HERO_HAVE
value: 已擁有該女神，自動轉換為{0}個碎片\n碎片可用來覺醒女神，獲得技能

name: HERO_ARRAY_ADVENTURE_LIMIT
value: 冒險中的女神不能上陣。

name: Please hurry up, my Lady! Or we can't catch the monsters anymore!
value: 我的大小姐，快一點吧，再晚了就抓不到妖怪了！

name: Monsters won't come to such crowded place like this! The crowd is suffocating me. Bari, I want to go home now.
value: 妖怪才不會來這種人多的地方呢！擠死我了，小巴，咱們早點回家去吧。

name: Stop complaining, my Lady! Please remember you are chosed by God. Why don't you have any fighting spirit? !
value: 別抱怨啦，你可是神選之人，怎麼一點吃苦耐勞的精神都沒有？！

name: What? I am chosen because of my pretty face, not my fighting spirit.
value: 神選中我主要是因為顏值，又不是因為我能吃苦。

name: Look! There are some monsters beside the stage. Let's sneak up on them and wipe them out!
value: 快看！舞臺邊上有幾隻妖怪，咱們悄悄過去消滅它們！

name: Luckily, we didn't come in vain. Let's catch those monsters quickly and go home.
value: 總算沒白來，趕緊抓完妖怪收工回家咯。

name: Look how easy it is! You're up next.
value: 你看！就這麼簡單。下一個該你了

name: Well, looks like the chosen one is itching for a fight, heh heh!
value: 好吧。神選之人終於要出手了，嘻嘻！

name: I told you that you cannnot summon three Angels at the same time! You will get into trouble!
value: 早說過讓你不要同時召喚三個妹子！後果很嚴重的！！

name: Oh! Don't be so excited. I'll pick only one of them now...
value: 別！別這麼激動，我選一個還不行嗎...

name: I will go with her! Girls with sword are the sexiest! Haha.
value: 就是她了！用劍的小姐姐最性感！哈哈~

name: I will go with her! Girls with arrows are the sexiest! Haha.
value: 就是她了！會射箭的小姐姐最性感！哈哈~

name: I will go with her! Girls with magic wand are the sexiest! Haha.
value: I will go with her! Girls with magic wand are the sexiest! Haha.

name: Great! Congratulations my Lady! Today's lesson is over.
value: 這才乖嘛。恭喜你，今天的教學到此結束！

name: It is already over?! I haven't really adapted to it…
value: 這麼快就結束了？！真讓人有點不適應啊...

name: Princess Bari is in a good mood. She decides to take a good sleep.
value: 本公主心情大好，決定好好睡一覺。

name: It turns out Princess Bari is quite hard to understand…
value: 巴里公主原來也這麼難以琢磨...

name: Please let me go… I really miss my mom…
value: 求求你，放我走吧，我想媽媽了...

name: Auf keinen Fall! Du bist Gottes Auserwählte und es ist deine Pflicht, seine Aufgaben zu erfüllen.
value: Auf keinen Fall! Du bist Gottes Auserwählte und es ist deine Pflicht, seine Aufgaben zu erfüllen.

name: But I'm just a student traveling to Korea and I have already booked my round-trip ticket for tomorrow.
value: 可是我只是個來韓國旅遊的學生，明天的返程機票早就訂好了。

name: Don't bother with those details. Today I'll teach you an important skill: Summon Angels!
value: 不要在意這些細節，今天有重要的技能教給你：召喚天使！

name: WOW! How pretty she is! And she has a pair of REAL WINGS!
value: 哇~~~這個小姐姐好酷，居然長著翅膀。

name: I told you that will be fun. She is Gabriel, an angel. And she will follow you in the future.
value: 我早就說過這個很好玩。她叫加百列，是一位天使，未來她將永遠跟隨著你。

name: Yes. She will help you to destroy the monsters!
value: 對，她會陪著你戰鬥，消滅妖怪。

name: You are always talking about monsters …
value: 果然三句話不離打妖怪...

name: It's the task God had delegated you. Now let's go and fight alongside Gabriel!
value: 這是神給你的使命，趕快讓加百列和你一起並肩作戰吧。

name: Reach over 80% Win Rate to challenge the Boss, beat the Boss, we can go to next Dungeon
value: 當勝率超過80％，我們就可以去挑戰BOSS，只有打敗BOSS，我們才能進入下一個關卡。

name: Gabriel is indeed powerful! It seems effortless for her to destroy all the monsters.
value: 加百列果然厲害！很輕鬆就幹掉了妖怪。

name: Yes! And since you are the master of Gabriel, you are more powerful.
value: 是的，而你是加百列的主人，所以你才更厲害！

name: You will encounter more monsters as you venture down this road. You must vanquish them all!
value: 接下來，沿著這條路一直探索，還會遇到更多的妖怪，請消滅它們！

name: Haha! It's so wonderful to have an Angel as a bodyguard!
value: Haha! It's so wonderful to have an Angel as a bodyguard!

name: Not a bodyguard… Angels are sent by God to help you, just like me.
value: 不是打手...天使是神派來幫助你的，和我一樣。

name: Yeah I know, Princess Bari, a famous Angel in Korea, has been sent by God to help me, then my travel plan is gone…
value: 我知道啦，巴里公主是韓國著名的天使，神指引你來幫助我，所以我的旅遊全泡湯了...

name: Why do you still remember such a little thing as traveling? You are the one chosen by God!
value: 你這傢伙，怎麼還記掛著旅遊這種小事，你可是神選之人！

name: OK OK, please continue your presentation…
value: 好吧，好吧。請繼續你的表演。

name: Bari, look what I just found. It looks very powerful.
value: 小巴，我剛剛撿到了這個…看起來很厲害的樣子。

name: It's the gear dropped from killed monster. Equip it now!
value: 這是擊殺怪物掉落的武器，趕緊裝備起來！

name: Here's the key to improving your power! Replace new gears in time when you see a red dot!
value: 提升自己實力的訣竅就在這裡！消滅怪物會隨機掉落裝備，我們看到小紅點提示就要及時換上新的裝備。

name: Sure enough, I feel stronger now.
value: 果然感覺到力量更強大了。

name: Yes. Always remember to change to the newest gear. That's the secret of becoming stronger.
value: 是的，一定要記得經常更換最新的裝備，這是你變強的訣竅。

name: How easy it is to fight these monsters now!
value: 現在打這些妖怪好輕鬆啊！

name: Watch out! They’re merely a bunch of minions. I sense an immense dark power up ahead!
value: 當心！他們只是小嘍囉，我感覺前方有巨大的黑暗力量！

name: Yes, there are many rewards for killing the Boss. God won't let you work for nothing.
value: 是的，幹掉這些小BOSS，會得到很多獎勵。神不會讓你白幹活的。

name: Okay, I see. Is it time to change the gear again?
value: 好的，我明白了，是不是又該更換裝備了？

name: Clever! You're definitely the chosen one.
value: 真聰明呢！不愧是神選之人。

name: With the new gear, I feel I am now stronger than ever!
value: 換上新的裝備後，力量真的很強大了！

name: When you see a red dot, you should equip the new gear to become stronger!
value: 及時換上新裝備，就可以變得更強！

name: Area is cleared! Can we go home and take a rest?
value: 打完妖怪，現在是不是可以回去休息了！

name: It was just a slip of the tongue. I was saying that let's have an early rest today, because we have to go to Japan tomorrow.
value: 口誤口誤，我是說咱們今天早點休息吧，明天還要去日本呢。

name: What?! Japan? Why do we suddenly have to go to Japan???! I haven't had a good time in Korea yet.
value: 什麼？！怎麼突然就要去日本了？韓國我還沒好好玩過呢。

name: Korea's monsters has been almost eliminated by us. Now, Japan needs you more.
value: 韓國的妖早就被我們消滅的差不多了，日本才是真正需要你去除妖的地方。

name: Gosh, we need to go to Japan to fight the monsters there?!
value: 天哪！還要去日本打妖怪？！

name: Yes, I've bought us the tickets. Take an early break. Ha ha…
value: 對啊，機票我都買好了。早點休息吧，嘻嘻...

name: It seems that monsters here are much more powerful. I need more help!
value: 這裡的妖怪要厲害很多，看來還得再加點幫手。

name: Well, now we need more advanced angels!!
value: 嗯呢~這次需要更高級的天使才行！!

name: What? There are advanced summons? Why don't you say it earlier?
value: 啊?還有高級召喚？怎麼不早說？

name: Advanced Summon comes with higher chances to get high-level angels. Let me show you how to do it~
value: 咳咳，高級召喚，有機會獲得高級天使。至於怎麼做。。。還是我來教你吧~

name: It is dangerous, but at last we killed that bastard!
value: 好險啊，不過終於幹掉BOSS了！

name: This area is safe for the moment. Let's go to other areas to help others.
value: 這片地區暫時安全了，我們趕緊去其他地區繼續進行支援吧！

name: The monster is getting more powerful. If it goes on like this, we will all die here!
value: 怪物越來越厲害了，再這樣下去我們都會死在這裡的！

name: It seems that we need stronger divine power!
value: 看來我們需要更加強大的神力！

name: Have you forgotten these angels? There is enormous divine power hidden in their bodies, which will be released by awakening!
value: 你忘了還有天使嗎，她們體內隱藏著巨大的神力，只要覺醒就能釋放！

name: You should say it earlier. Let's awake them!
value: 你不早說，快讓她們覺醒吧！

name: How can it be so easy? We need to find the Angel Shards first. Come with me!
value: 哪有那麼容易？我們需要先去尋找天使覺醒需要的碎片，跟我來！

name: Huh? It seems I’ve obtained a few Belldandy Shards again. What am I gonna do with it?
value: 咦？我好像又召喚到一些命運女神的碎片，怎麼使用呢？

name: Collect enough shards to awaken the Angels you’ve already owned. Quick, use these shards to awaken your angel!
value: 已獲得的天使，再次得到足夠的碎片可以使她們覺醒，快拿這些碎片去覺醒天使吧！

name: Well, I'll try it right away!
You have enough Angel Shards and now you can <color=#FA931AFF>awake</color> the Angel
value: 獲取了足夠的女神碎片，現在可以<color=#FA931AFF>覺醒</color>女神了

name: Select the Angel you want to <color=#FA931AFF>Awake</color>
You have enough Angel Shards and click <color=#FA931AFF>[awaken]</color> to awaken the Angel
value: 碎片數量足夠，點擊<color=#FA931AFF>【覺醒】</color>按鈕進行覺醒

name: God of Present! Take control of everything!
Great! Is that the power of awakening?
value: 好厲害，這就是覺醒的力量嗎？

name: Go! Let's go on cleaning up the monsters in Japan!
value: 走！我們繼續清理日本的妖怪！

name: Sure. I can feel the power surging in her body!
value: 沒錯！我能感覺到她體內湧動的力量！

name: Master, Angels can be advanced with the tears of Angel!!!
value: 主人，有了這些女神之淚，就可以讓天使們進階了！！！

name: Use your heart to feel your connection with Angels, and nurture her with your divine power.
value: 請你用心神感受與天使的聯繫，用神之力澆灌她。

name: Free <color=#FA931AFF>Summon</color> times remaining,<color=#FA931AFF>Summon</color> has the chance to get angels.
value: 當前有免費<color=#FA931AFF>召喚</color>次數，<color=#FA931AFF>召喚</color>有幾率直接獲得女神~

name: Daily <color=#FA931AFF>adventure</color> will refresh every day. Higher adventure stars means better reward.
value: 在這裡，每日都會刷新出不同星級的<color=#FA931AFF>冒險</color>，星級越高獎勵越好

name: Select the highest star <color=#FA931AFF>adventure</color> to get the best reward.
value: 選擇星級最高的<color=#FA931AFF>冒險</color>關卡，可獲得最好的獎勵

name: Select idle Angels to <color=#FA931AFF>adventure</color>.
value: 選擇空閒的女神進行<color=#FA931AFF>冒險</color>

name: <color=#FA931AFF>Adventure</color> has begun, tap to see details.
value: <color=#FA931AFF>冒險</color>已經開始，點擊查看詳細資訊

name: <color=#FA931AFF>Adventure</color> needs some time to finish, you can use <color=#6DCFF6FF>accelerate</color> to finish it right now!
value: 每次<color=#FA931AFF>冒險</color>都會持續一段時間，但可以通過<color=#6DCFF6FF>加速</color>功能立即獲得獎勵（本次<color=#6DCFF6FF>加速</color>免費）

name: <color=#FA931AFF>Adventure</color> finished, tap here to get the rewards.
value: <color=#FA931AFF>冒險</color>已經完成，點擊此處領取獎勵（本次冒險不計入每日次數限制）

name: Tap here to <color=#FA931AFF>promote</color> your angels
value: 進入女神介面，用<color=#FA931AFF>冒險</color>得到的<color=#6DCFF6FF>女神之淚</color>，給女神<color=#FA931AFF>送禮</color>，使女神<color=#FA931AFF>進階</color>

name: Select the angel you want to <color=#FA931AFF>promote</color>
Tap here to <color=#FA931AFF>send gift</color> to Angels to increase <color=#6DCFF6FF>Angel affinity</color>, Angels will be <color=#FA931AFF>promoted</color> when affinity reaches certain point.
value: 點擊<color=#6DCFF6FF>女神之淚</color>，給女神<color=#FA931AFF>送禮</color>，提高女神<color=#6DCFF6FF>好感度</color>，<color=#6DCFF6FF>好感度</color>達到一定程度可以使女神<color=#FA931AFF>進階</color>

name: Encounter adventure available~
value: 有“奇遇”冒險可參與！趕快參與，過時不候！

name: Can't beat the monsters? Try to <color=#FA931AFF>change gears</color> to get stronger!
value: 先去<color=#FA931AFF>更換裝備</color>，提高戰鬥力，然後再回來試試吧！

name: You can <color=#FA931AFF>Sweep Boss</color> every day to get powerful gears!
value: 每天都可以進行<color=#FA931AFF>BOSS掃蕩</color>，可獲得大量稀有裝備！

name: <color=#FA931AFF>Sweep</color> the last Boss before current dungeon to get the best reward!
value: <color=#FA931AFF>掃蕩</color>前一副本的BOSS，獲得更好裝備的可能性更大！

name: Challenge the new Boss! Fight now!
value: 有新的BOSS可以挑戰了！快去戰鬥吧！

name: Better gears available!
value: 女神有更好的裝備，趕快換上吧！

name: MONTH_VIP_REFREASH_SHOP_TIPS
value: 您是月卡用戶，擁有一次額外的刷新免費機會

name: MONTH_VIP_FAST_FIGHT_TIPS
value: 您是月卡用戶，本次快速掛機免費，且不計算每日快速掛機購買次數

name: VIP_MAX_FAST_FIGHT_MAX
value: 今日快速掛機次數已到上限

name: MONTH_VIP_DESC
value:
掛機經驗+10％
免費快速掛機次數+1
免費商店刷新次數+1
世界BOSS戰鬥次數+1
背包額外增加裝備上限30格

name: MONTH_VIP_DESC_ADV
value:
掛機經驗+10%
免費快速掛機次數+1
掛機神核+10%
掛機強化精華+20%

name: QUICK_BATTLE_RESULT_BAG_FULL
value: 主人，您的裝備背包已經滿了，會拿不到裝備的哦！

name: QUICK_BATTLE_RESULT_FINISH
value: 快速掛機完成，獲得以下獎勵！

name: SKY_STONE_DESC
value: 天空匙是用於天空塔掃蕩的道具

name: No longer show this reminder, automatically inherit. (You can rusume reminder in settings)
value: 以後不再提醒，自動繼承（可以在設置中恢復本提醒）

name:
Battle experience +10%
Battle experience +10%
Battle experience +10%
Battle experience +10%
value: 掛機經驗+10%\n掛機經驗+10%\n掛機經驗+10%

name: Claim rewards daily for 7 days after purchase
value: 購買7天內每日可領取獎勵

name: VIP LV.1 can claim rewards daily
Get 60 diamonds \nGet 588 diamonds package
value: 立即獲得60鑽石\n以及價值588鑽石的超值禮包

name: Get 80 diamonds \nGet 988 diamonds package
value: 立即獲得80鑽石\n以及價值988鑽石的超值禮包

name: Get 120 diamonds \nGet 1588 diamonds package
value: 立即獲得120鑽石\n以及價值1588鑽石的超值禮包

name: Get 10 diamonds \nGet 188 diamonds pack
value: 立即獲得10鑽石\n以及價值188鑽石的超值禮包

name: You can sweep the story after first clearance
Be careful of the high magic damage!
value: 給予敵人魔法屬性的爆發傷害

name: Shadow archers always appear in darkness.
Be careful of the high magic damage!
value: 請注意敵人的魔法攻擊

name: Shadow archers always appear in darkness.
value: Shadow archers always appear in darkness.

name: Be careful of the high magic damage!
value: 擅長使用法術對敵人造成傷害

name: Shadow archers always appear in darkness.
Death warriors are unbeatable!
value: 請注意敵人的武器攻擊

name: Venomancers own ultra high DEF PEN
value: 從劇毒腐爛的泥土中鑽出，他就是劇毒的化身。沒有什麼能抵擋住劇毒的入侵。請注意，劇毒術士的防禦穿透極高。

name: Man-faced Spiders have higher DEF than normal monsters.
value: 具有豐富的狩獵經驗，你會成為被狩獵的獵物嗎？人面蛛魔有著超高的防禦。

name: Incredible crit, much higher ACC and EVA. Ladies of Snow are dangers!
value: 冰天雪地創造出的生命，跟隨著暴風雪一同降臨。冰魄雪女有著極致的命中和閃避，還有超幸運的暴擊！

name: Hair Ghosts' HP are beyond your imagination!
value: 以發為身，殺死無數少女；終身不老，浴血永駐青春。發鬼的血量超乎你的想像。

name: Raccoon Spirits will make a very high level damage!
value: 她是嫉妒的集合體，她敵視世上一切美好的實物。嫉妒之靈有著難以抵抗的攻擊力。

name: Nine-heads snakes have endless hp, pretty high EVA and extremely high M.DMG!
value: 蛇身九首，碩大無朋，所到之處均陷為沮澤！九頭巨蟒擁有無盡的血量，超高的閃避，和極強的法術傷害。

name: Ordinary magic won't post any threat to Necromancers!
value: 無視世俗眼光，探究禁忌的亡者魔法，沒有什麼可以阻止她得瘋狂。死靈術士通曉禁忌魔法，一般的魔法可無法對她造成傷害。

name: Reborn Mummy has high level crit and FOR
value: 帶著對世界無盡的恨意從地獄中蘇醒，破壞目之所及之物。返生木乃伊有著超高的暴擊率和韌性。

name: Snake Guards' P.RES is very troublesome!
value: 蛇組最強的守衛:“此處禁止通行！”蛇衛有著難以擊穿的物理防禦。

name: Tomb Priests will hit fritening damage!
value: 古墓儀式中最殘忍的祭祀，她手上的人命不計其數。古墓祭祀有著令人害怕的傷害。

name: Can you resist the spread of zombies? Frenzy Zombies has extremely high crit, and very high P.DMG and M.DMG!
value: 你能阻止僵屍的蔓延嗎？狂暴的僵屍暴擊率會大幅提升，並擁有很高的魔抗和物抗！

name: They are guilty of the blood of crime! Frenzy Zombies has suberb P.PEN!
value: 她們的身體裡流淌著犯罪的血液，滿腦子只想著破壞，所以才被流放到極北之地。霜巨魔有著超高的物理防禦穿透。

name: Angel Awakening available! <color=#FA931AFF>Awaken</color> an Angel to get a new skill!
value: 有可以覺醒的女神，<color=#FA931AFF>覺醒</color>可獲得技能，快來試試吧~

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_1
value: 超強收割技能  超高基礎屬性  團隊生命回復

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_2
value: 超強魔法群攻  群體控制技能  移除對方增益

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_3
value: 超強魔法群攻  團隊生命回復  移除不良狀態

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_4
value: 物理群攻  後排殺手  成倍傷害

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_5
value: 物理群攻  傷害翻倍  持續燃燒

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_6
value: 夢幻群攻  持續燃燒  群體眩暈

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_7
value: 超強終結技能  免疫不良狀態  超高防禦加成

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_8
value: 傷害吸收  強大綜合防禦力  極致反傷加成

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_9
value: 群體攻擊  真實傷害  眩暈技能

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_10
value: 極致收割  群體暴擊  驅逐有益狀態

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_11
value: 必殺技8連擊  群體持續消耗  極高技能傷害

name: God-killer! You actually defeated Nemesis? It seems that the rumor is true!
value: 弑神者！你打敗了涅墨西斯？看來傳言是真的！

name: You're just a bug… I'll kill you!
No… I'm no match for you…
value: 不敢了不敢了...我不配做您的對手…

name: Finally got it, huh! Let me ask you, do you know any way to return to the Mortal Realm?
value: 知道就好！我問你，你知道有什麼辦法能重回人間嗎？

name: Escape from hell… Maybe Muse knows the answer, but she's mad now… hah-hah…
value: 逃出地獄啊...也許繆斯知道答案，雖然現在她瘋掉了...呵呵呵呵…

name: Well, I can tell you. But first, you have to defeat these monsters!
value: 可以，不過你要先打倒這些怪物！

name: This Canyon is Medusa's territory! It's quite dangerous!
value: 這片峽谷是美杜莎的領地，非常危險！

name: A monster who has human's head and snake's body. Those who looked into hers eyes would turn to stone!
value: 人首蛇身的惡魔，永遠不要看她的眼睛，會被石化的！

name: If you don't believe it, you can have a try. Anyway, I will not enter the canyon. If you can live after passing through the canyon, you can see a forest shrouded in mist at the end of canyon, where you can hear songs.
value: 不信你就去試試吧???反正我是不會進入峽谷的???如果你能活著的話，峽谷盡頭有一片籠罩著迷霧的森林，飄蕩著歌聲的森林。

name: Follow the song and you'll find Muse. Good luck! I'll be taking my leave now!
value: 循著歌聲走，你就會找到繆斯的。祝你好運，我先溜了！

name: The song… It should be here…
value: 歌聲啊...應該就是這裡了吧…

name: Who is it? How dare you interrupt me! Who?!!
Human~~~~ human here~~~~？Are you~~~ the daughter of fate in legend~~~~？
value: 人類~~~~，在這裡的人類~~~~？你是~~~傳說中的命運之子~~~~？

name: … What is the daughter of fate?
A prophecy… a long-standing prophecy…~~~‘The daughter of fate with God's blood will defeat Dark Forces’?
value: 一個預言...流傳已久的預言…~~~‘流淌著神之血脈的命運之子會戰勝黑暗’?

name: Do you know how to escape from hell?
value: 你知道如何逃離地獄嗎？

name: ~~~ Only the master of hell—— Lucifer~~~,~~~ knows the way?
value: ~~~只有地獄的掌控者——路西法~~~，~~~才有辦法?

name: Lucifer? Where can I find her?
When's that going to happen? I want to see her now!
value: 那要等到什麼時候！我現在就要見他！

name: ~~~ The fate just like a compass…believe in the fate…
value: ~~~命運如同指南針...要相信命運…

name: What is more terrible than hell~~~, is my songs~~~（The Angel starts singing like a pig）
value: 比地獄更可怕的~~~，是我的歌聲~~~（女神一展歌喉，唱出豬叫一樣的歌聲）

name: Lalala~~~, please tell me~~~, where can we find Lucifer~~~
value: 啦啦啦~~~，請告訴我~~~，去哪裡找路西法~~~（女神在這一刻有如波瀾哥附體）

name: Oh~~~~ Great leader~~~~ Lucifer~~~~~ Lucifer~~~~~~！
value: 哦~~~~我們偉大的領袖~~~~路西法~~~~~路西法~~~~~~！

name: Let me sing for you about the story of goddesses' degradation~~~~！
value: 就由我來為你唱，那神靈墮落的故事~~~~！

name: The fallen Dark Goddesses~~~stole Lucifer's artifact [Black Bow], and they intended to use [Black Bow] to destroy the earth~~~!
value: 墮落的黑暗之神們~~~，偷了路西法的神器“黑弓”，他們準備用黑弓毀掉地球星核~~~！

name: Lucifer was so angry~~~ If you can take the Black Bow back, I think she will be glad to see you~~~
value: 路西法非常生氣~~~····如果你能帶回被盜走黑弓的話，我想路西法會很高興見你的~~~。

name: Dark Goddesses? Where are these evil goddesses?
value: 黑暗之神？這些邪惡的神在哪裡？

name: Blood Castle~~~… they are hiding in there~~~…
value: 血城堡~~~...他們躲藏在那裡~~~…

name: After that, the Angel came to Blood Castle and met with Nemesis and Lilith…
value: 隨後女神來到了血城堡，遇上了涅墨西斯和莉莉絲…

name: Once the bowstring is pulled, the new world of darkness will come!
value: 只要拉動弓弦，屬於黑暗的新世界就來臨了！

name: Oh? A human? Here?
value: 哦？這裡竟然有一個人類？

name: Aren't you the bug that always gets in the way? Welcome to Hell!
value: 這不是那只礙手礙腳的蟲子嗎？！歡迎來到地獄！

name: I will never allow you to do this with Black Bow!
value: 我絕不允許你們用黑弓做這種事！

name: Haha! You, and your world! Sink into hell forever!
value: 哈！你，和你的世界，永遠的在地獄中沉淪吧！！

name: Oh, so this is where you all are.
I never dreamt that I'd see you all fighting at the edge of Hell.
value: 在地獄盡頭都能看到你們在打架。

name: Lilith and Nemesis, do you want to use my bow to destroy the earth?
value: 莉莉絲，涅墨西斯，你們是想用我的弓封印地球星核嗎？

name: (Cough)…The destruction of earth has begun… Lucifer, you can't stop it!
value: 咳咳...地球的毀滅已經開始了...路西法，你無法阻止！

name: She's so annoying! To think she's still saying such things even when shes' dying!
value: 討厭的傢伙！死到臨頭還嘴硬...

name: It's all over… Lucifer, please send me back to the earth!
value: 都結束了...路西法，請把我送回人間！

name: It's not over yet… Even though Lilith and Nemesis are dead, there must be something big concealed behind them… Also, the power of sun is still weak. It's not the time for you to rest now.
value: 還沒結束呢...雖然這兩個傢伙死了，但他們背後一定藏著某個龐然大物...而且，太陽之力依然很弱。革命尚未成功，少年們還需努力啊。

name: Close your eyes. We're about to set out!

After undergoing many difficulties, the Angel finally arrived at Asgard… In order to obtain the Eternity Spear's approval, the Angel had to pass the Fate Trials…Just when the power of sun was about to awaken the Eternity Spear, the fallen Goddess who betrayed Odin appeared. Odin couldn't kill her because of family affection, and as a result, she struck down Odin...
value: 經過千辛萬苦，女神終於來到了阿斯嘉德...為了得到永恆之槍的認可，女神通過了命運試煉?????就在太陽之力即將喚醒永恆之槍時，背叛奧丁的墮落之神出現了，念及親族血脈而不忍心下殺手的奧丁被叛徒反弑而隕落??????

name: I'm so happy to see you again!
Oh! It's great to come back to the earth!
value: 哦！重回人間的感覺真好！

name: In any case, I'm very happy.
Where is this? Why is everything in ruins?
value: 這是哪裡？怎麼是一片廢墟？

name: Oh, you've come! I am Odin! Your Angelic deeds have been widely circulated! To obtain your help, I've asked Lucifer to send you here.
value: 你來了！我是奧丁！你的女神事蹟已經廣為流傳！為了尋求你的幫助，我讓路西法把你們傳送到了這裡！

name: The fallen Dark Goddesses Nemesis and Lilith want to destroy the world!
value: 墮落的黑暗之神涅墨西斯和莉莉絲想毀滅世界！

name: Obviously they have already started. You were attacked in hell, after all.
value: 顯然他們已經開始了，你在地獄的時候這裡遭受了攻擊。

name: You were once bathed in sun's divine light. It was that light that made you burn and fall into hell.I need you to pour the sun's divine light into the Eternity Spear to awaken the spear spirit!
value: 你曾沐浴在太陽神光中，就是使你燃燒墜入地獄的那種光。我需要你將太陽神光注入永恆之槍來喚醒槍靈！

name: How do I do that? Do I just hold the spear?
value: 如何將光注入？握著它嗎？

name: No! Only those who have passed the Fate Trials can touch the Eternity Spear!
value: 不不不！只用通過命運試煉的人才能觸碰永恆之槍！

name: You have passed the Fate Trials and the Eternity Spear has reawakened! Congratulations, Odin!
value: 你已經通過了命運的試煉，永恆之槍已經蘇醒，恭喜你，奧丁！

name: Haha! Give me Eternity Spear!
value: 哈哈！快把永恆之槍給我！

name: Sif?! Daughter of Odin, what are you doing?!
value: 啊！希芙！奧丁的女兒，你在幹什麼？

name: This day has finally come! The Eternity Spear is mine!
value: 我終於等到這一天了！永恆之槍是屬於我的！

name: Sif…My daughter, are you going to betray me, too?
value: 希芙...我的女兒，你也要背叛我嗎？

name: Betray you? I've never been loyal to you!
value: 背叛？呵呵...我從未忠於過你啊！

name: Idun! Now Asgard also belongs to us, right?
value: 伊頓！現在阿斯嘉德也是我們的了，對嗎？

name: Haha! That's right! We can use this spear to conquer the world!
value: 哈哈！沒錯！我們可以用這把槍來征服整個世界！

name: Who seduced you to fall into degeneration? Tell me and I'll let you two live!
value: 誰引誘你們墮落的？說出來，我可以饒你們不死！

name: Haha… Is it stupidity that covers your only remaining eye, Odin?
value: 呵呵呵...愚蠢遮住了你僅存的那只眼睛嗎，奧丁？

name: Let me answer for them… Odin…
We are Goddesses! We're not babysitters to those foolish and evil humans! You should have given them up! You are the one who betrayed us!
value: 我們是神！不是愚蠢而又邪惡的人類的保姆！你早該放棄他們了！是你背叛了我們！

name: I will never let you all get away with this!
Valkyrie, I will not forgive you, never!
value: 瓦爾基裡，我不會原諒你的…

name: Haha! Where is the powerful queen of Asgard, Odin? Why are you so weak now?
value: 呵呵！當年縱橫九界的神王奧丁去哪了？怎麼弱到了這個地步？

name: Valkyrie! How can you do this… Odin trusted you so much…
value: 瓦爾基裡！你怎能這樣...奧丁這麼相信你…

name: Yes, she trusted me. So what? Now Asgard is mine! I will rule the world! Time for you to join Odin in Hell!
value: 是啊，他相信我，所以呢？現在阿斯嘉德是我的了！這個世界也會屬於我！去地獄和奧丁作伴吧！

name: Hell is not a place I'd recommend to meet in…
For Odin! Valkyrie, I swear that I will kill you one day!
value: 為了奧丁！瓦爾基裡，我發誓會親手殺死你！

name: Then do try your very best. I'll be waiting for you while sitting on the throne of Asgard! Now, I have other urgent matters to attend to, so I won't be wasting more time entertaining you. Haha!
value: 那你要加油喲，我在阿斯嘉德的王座上等著你！現在我有要緊事去做，沒空陪你們玩了，哈哈！

name: I need your help! Please, protect Asgard!
value: 我需要兩位元的説明！請一定要保護好阿斯嘉德！

name: (Cough)…You think that everything will be fine once you beat me? My lord, please show the power of despair and darkness to these humble ants!
value: 咳咳...以為打敗我就可以了嗎？我的主人???請向這些卑微的螻蟻展現真正的絕望與黑暗的力量！！

name: Watch your step! Asgard is collapsing! Be careful!
value: 小心腳下！阿斯嘉德在崩塌！小心！

name: Human being… an existence of ignorance…
I am lord of darkness… goddess of chaos… queen of Nether world…
value: 黑暗之主...混亂之神...太古幽冥大君…

name: Asgard was collapsing. In the critical moments, the Creation Goddess Nuwa saved Angel. From Nuwa, she knew that only Xuanyuan Sacred Sword could completely eradicate Erebus. For this reason, Angels walked into the vast Kunlun Mountains and embarked on a sword-seeking journey.
value: 阿斯嘉德的崩碎了，危急關頭，創世之神女媧伸出援手，救下了女神。從女媧口中得知，唯有聖劍軒轅才能徹底消滅厄瑞玻斯，為此，女神走進了茫茫的昆侖山，踏上了尋劍之旅

name: …Am I in dream? Who are you? And where is this?
value: ...我是在做夢嗎？你是誰？這是哪裡？

name: I am Nuwa and here is my shrine. I saw you fall from Throat of World and then saved you.
value: 我叫女媧，這裡是我的神宮。我看到你從世界之喉跌下，就把你救了下來。

name: Throat of World… You mean Asgard?
value: 世界之喉...你是說阿斯嘉德嗎？

name: Nuwa, could you please repeat what you said to me?
value: 女媧大人，可以再說一遍您跟我說過的話嗎？

name: At the beginning of the creation, the Goddesses were divided into two polarities: one was the Light, and the other was Darkness. With both Light and Darkness in balance, all in existence flourishes. Until one day, humans began to question the authority of the Goddesses...
value: 創世之初，神分兩極，陽者曰明，陰者曰暗，陰陽相合，萬物生長，直到人類開始質疑神的權威…

name: …So this is why the world is like this…
Now only you can stop Erebus, daughter of fate!
value: 現在，能阻止厄瑞玻斯的只有你了，命運之子！

name: There is a way. That is to find Xuanyuan Sacred Sword which sealed Erebus in the past!
value: 有一個辦法...找到曾經封印厄瑞玻斯的聖劍軒轅！

name: In Xiwangmu's shrine, Kunlun Mountain…Sadly, Xiwangmu was influenced by Erebus' power and has degenerated… Anyway, I trust you. I'm sure that you can find Xuanyuan Sword!
value: 在西王母的洞府昆侖山...不過西王母被厄瑞玻斯的力量腐蝕墮落了...但是我相信你，你一定能尋回軒轅劍的！

name: But I don't know whether I can do it or not…
value: But I don't know whether I can do it or not…

name: Don't worry… I see strength and hope in your eyes… After going through the Gates guarded by Shennong, Fuxi and Zhurong, you will arrive at Kunlun Mountain. Remember to come back soon once you find the Xuanyuan Sword.
value: 別擔心...我從你眼中看到了力量與希望...經過神農、伏羲、祝融把守的關卡，你就能到達昆侖山。要記住，找到聖劍後要馬上回來。

name: After separating from Nuwa, the Angel met with Shennong in Kunlun Mountain….
value: 與女媧分開後，在昆侖天宮，遇見了神農…

name: I will kill those who has invaded my territory, no matter how far they go!
But I just want to pass by… Guess I've got no choice…
Taiji generates two complementary forces, and two complementary forces generate four aggregates. Then the four aggregates generate eight trigrams!
value: 太極生兩儀，兩儀生四象，四象生八卦！

name: Are you ready to enter the Realm of Fire?
value: 準備好進入火焰世界了嗎？

name: …I've come to take the Xuanyuan Sword!
Nuwa, I've found the Xuanyuan Sword!
value: 女媧大人！我找到軒轅劍了！

name: Well done! Now listen, you don't have enough power to control the sword at your present state. From what I can see, you can only use it once, so you must seize a good opportunity to strike a deadly blow to Erebus!
value: 幹得好！聽好，現在你的力量還不足以控制軒轅劍，從目前的狀態來看，你只能使用一次，你必須把握好機會，給予厄瑞玻斯致命一擊！

name: Quick! Use the Xuanyuan Sword now!
The Xuanyuan Sword missed! Erebus escaped!
value: 軒轅劍打歪了！厄瑞玻斯逃走了！

name: Although the attack missed the target, Erebus was still seriously injured. Protected by fallen Angels, she hid herself in Canyon of Fallen Goddesses to heal her wounds. The Angel gave pursuit…
value: 雖未擊中命門，厄瑞玻斯還是受到了重創。在墮落天使的保護下，厄瑞玻斯遁入隕神峽谷，藏身其間修復創傷。女神緊隨其後追至…

name: Erebus escaped! Let's chase after her!
value: 厄瑞玻斯逃走了！我們去追他吧！

name: Are you ok? Have you been injured?
value: 你沒事吧？是不是受傷了？

name: Take a rest here. I'll follow Erebus!
value: 你先休息，我去跟蹤厄瑞玻斯！

name: Protected by fallen Angel guards, Erebus entered the Canyon of Fallen Goddesses!
value: 厄瑞玻斯被墮落的天使護衛著躲進了神之峽谷！

name: I'm fine… It's a rare opportunity… I can't miss it!
value: 我沒事...現在是千載難逢的好機會...不能錯過！

name: (My power fluctuates strangely ... as if mixed with other things...)
value: （我的能量波動好奇怪...好像混合著其他氣息...）

name: (It is…Erebus' dark power!)
value: （這種氣息是...厄瑞玻斯的黑暗能量！）

name: Dirty human being! I will purify your soul!
value: 骯髒的人類！我將淨化你的靈魂！

name: Human, accept the judgment of fate!
value: 人類，接收命運的審判吧！

name: Listen to the horn of death! Give up the unnecessary struggle!
value: 聆聽死亡的號角吧！放棄無謂的掙扎！

name: You are not worthy to be called Goddesses!
Archangel Michael!! Let's put an end to this! Where is Erebus?
value: 大天使米迦勒！！到此為止吧！厄瑞玻斯在哪裡？

name: Despicable human beings cannot enter the realm of Goddess! Go away!
value: 神域怎允許卑鄙的人類涉足！離開！

name: Goddesses? You call yourselves goddesses?! You are fallen devils!
value: 神？你們還自稱為神？！你們是墮落的魔鬼！

name: How dare humans talk about degeneration?! All this is because of you! You are foolish, greedy, shameless and evil! Only darkness can completely purify the world! Only then can we create a new kingdom of goddesses! No humans in it!
value: 人類竟然也敢冠冕堂皇的說墮落？！這一切都是因為你們！你們這些愚昧，貪婪，無恥，邪惡的蛀蟲！只有黑暗才能徹底的淨化世界！才能創造一個新的神國！沒有人類！

name: But humans are created by you! Humans are your people!
value: 可人類是你們創造的啊！人類是你們的子民！

name: This is our only stain! Only by eradicating humans can the world be innocent again!
value: 這是我們唯一的污點！只有將你們抹去才能還世界清白！

name: To heal her wounds caused by Xuanyuan Sword, Erebus found Gaia, the mother of gods, who was dormant in the core of the earth. After killing her, Erebus absorbed Gaia's energy and was reborn…
value: 為了治癒軒轅劍帶來的創傷，厄瑞玻斯找到了在地球核心休眠的萬神之母蓋亞，在殺死神母后，厄瑞玻斯吸收了蓋亞的能量重生了……

name: Erebus has returned to her mother's side. You cannot stop her!
value: 厄瑞玻斯回到母親身邊了，你是不可能阻止他的！

name: Yes… She wants to steal Gaia's power to heal her body, which was hurt by Xuanyuan Sword.
value: 沒錯...他想要竊取母神之力來修復自己被軒轅劍打爛的身體。

name: In the depths of the earth… It will be a long journey…
value: 地球的深處...這將是一段漫長的旅途...

name: Stop! Erebus, she is your mother!
value: 住手！厄瑞玻斯！她可是你的母親！

name: Only humans care about the so-called family affection, and that's why you can not become eternal Gods!
value: 只有你們人類才在乎所謂的親情，被情感羈絆的你們是不可能成為永恆的神的！

name: Watch out!! Erebus has absorbed all Gaia's energy!
value: 小心！！厄瑞玻斯吸收了蓋亞全部的能量！

name: Let's put an end to this!
No…Why is this happening?! Why…Mother!!
value: 不...為什麼會是這樣！為什麼...母親！！

name: Finally… we did it! Look, it's light! The Light is coming back! The desperate souls disappeared!
value: 終於...我們成功了！看，有光！光明正在回歸！絕望的靈魂消失了！

name: Mm… Great… Everything… Is over…
value: 嗯...太棒了...一切...都結束了...

name: No! What's happening?! Pull yourself together! No!
value: 不！發生了什麼事！振作一點！不！

name: Erebus released a dark energy, eroding the Angel's soul, and the dark demoness Lilith was reborn in the Angel's spiritual world. Meanwhile, the seven deadly sins in her consciousness, 'Pride', 'Envy', 'Wrath', 'Sloth', 'Greed', 'Gluttony', and 'Lust' are infinitely magnified. Can the Angel defeat herself?
value: 厄瑞玻斯釋放了黑暗能量侵蝕了女神的神魂，黑暗妖女莉莉絲在女神精神世界中重生，女神意識中的七宗罪——傲慢’、‘嫉妒’、‘憤怒’、‘懶惰’、‘貪婪’、‘暴食’、‘淫欲’被無限放大。我們的女神，能戰勝自己嗎？

name: Where is this...Isn't it all over? Bari, Bari…Where are you?
value: 這是哪...不是都已經結束了嗎？巴里，巴里...你在哪？

name: Haha! Thank you for remembering me!
Dead? Death is just a concept of human world. Goddesses will not die! We are eternal beings! Death? We just temporarily hide our traces from the physical world.
value: 死了對嗎？呵呵呵，死亡只是人類世界才有的概念，神是不會死的！我們是永恆的存在！死亡？我們只不過是在物質世界暫時隱藏了痕跡而已。

name: Lilith… everything is over… Erebus has vanished. Just stop.
value: 莉莉絲...一切都結束了...厄瑞玻斯已經煙消雲散了，收手吧！

name: Everything is over? Says who? Haha, look at yourself! Stop hiding and be true to yourself!
value: 結束了？誰說的？呵呵呵，看看你現在的樣子！不要再隱藏了，直面最真實的自己吧！

name: Nuwa patching sky event special Summon Scroll
value: 女媧補天活動介面使用，女媧召喚必須道具

name: Venus twinkling event special Summon Scroll
value: 明亮之星活動介面使用，明亮召喚必須道具

name: Poseidon's anger event special Summon Scroll
value: 海神憤怒活動介面使用，海神憤怒召喚必須道具

name: Sky Angel event special Summon Scroll
value: 天空女神活動介面使用，努特召喚必須道具

name: Fork Princess event special Summon Scroll
value: 凡間公主活動介面使用，巴里公主召喚必須道具

name: Phantom Dancer event special Summon Scroll
value: 幻影如夢活動介面使用，方塔蘇斯召喚必須道具

name: Bright and Eternal event special Summon Scroll
value: 光明永恆活動介面使用，天照大神召喚必須道具

name: Heavenly Revelation event special Summon Scroll
value: 天之啟示活動介面使用，聖女貞德召喚必須道具

name: Human Ancestor event special Summon Scroll
value: 人文始祖活動介面使用，伏羲召喚必須道具

name: Snake Banshee event special Summon Scroll
value: 蛇發女妖活動介面使用，美杜莎召喚必須道具

name: Goddess of Revenge event special Summon Scroll
value: 復仇女神活動介面使用，涅墨西斯召喚必須道具

name: Limited Summon event special Summon Scroll
value: 限定召喚活動介面使用

name: Add 10 artifact EXP in artifact Level-up
value: 神器升星時使用，增加10點神器經驗值

name: Random get one of the following rewards: 1~5 Odin Shard(s), 1 Adv. Summon scroll, 3 Standard Summon Scrolls, 100 diamonds
value: 隨機獲得以下獎勵中的一種：\n奧丁碎片1~5個、高級召喚券1個、\n普通召喚券3個、鑽石100

name: Claim VIP rewards once a day
Summon once more to get Nuwa Shard
value: 再召喚一次必得女媧碎片

name: When the following condition is met, cancel this time's training
value: 當以下公式滿足時，自動放棄本次培養結果

name: Main attribute change * weight + additional attribute change
value: 主屬性變化值*權重+其他屬性變化值<0

name: Check filter to smelt all eqpt in target class
value: 勾選篩選條件後，將會熔煉目標品質的所有裝備

name: Use accelerate to finish adventure immediately
value: 通過加速可以快速完成冒險

name: Rampage Killing Skill & High Attributes & Group Recovery
value: 超強收割技能 / 超高基礎屬性 / 團隊生命恢復

name: Scroll used to redeem common Angel Fashion. 10 Fashion Scrolls Ⅰ can synthesize 1 Fashion Scroll Ⅱ.
value: 可以用來兌換普通外觀的神奇卷軸，\n10張普通外觀卷可合成1張高級外觀卷

name: Scroll used to redeem advance Angel Fashion. 10 Fashion Scrolls Ⅱ can synthesize 1 Fashion Scroll Ⅲ.
value: 可以用來兌換高級外觀的神奇卷軸，\n10張高級外觀卷可合成1張白金外觀卷

name: Scroll used to redeem platinum Angel Fashion
value: 可以用來兌換白金外觀的神奇卷軸

name: Cancel training when following formula matched\nMain attribute change * <color=#ff0>weight</color> + additional attribute change < 0
value: 當以下公式滿足時，自動放棄本次培養結果\n主屬性變化值 * <color=#ff0>權重</color> + 其他屬性變化值 < 0

name: TRIAL_STAGE_CLEAR
value: 本難度已通關，點擊底部【重置】按鈕，可以重新選擇難度進行挑戰！

name: TRIAL_REFRESH_COUNT_MAX_VIP_0_5
value: 重置次數已用完，VIP6每天有一次額外重置

name: TRIAL_DIFFICULTY_SELECT_CONFIRM
value: 確認選擇{0}難度進行挑戰？選擇後本次試煉不能更換難度。

name: TRAIN_SETTING_DESC
value: 當以下公式滿足時，自動放棄本次培養結果\n主屬性變化值 * <color=#ff0>權重</color> + 其他屬性變化值 < 0

value: 神賜祝福！ <color=#25c1e9>{0}</color> 抽到了 <color=#FA931AFF>{1}</color> ！跟上這節奏~

value: 幸運的法則已經確定！ <color=#25c1e9>{0}</color> 合成了 <color=#FF3838FF>{1}</color> ！

name: NOTICE_10004001
value: 神賜祝福！ <color=#25c1e9>{0}</color> 合成了 <color=#FA931AFF>{1}</color> ！跟上這節奏~

name: NOTICE_10005001
value: 恭喜 <color=#25c1e9>{0}</color> 合成出 {1}級寶石！

name: NOTICE_10006001
value: 恭喜 <color=#25c1e9>{0}</color> 鍛造成功雙屬性神器！

name: NOTICE_10009001
value: {0}對{1}的愛溢出螢幕，將她培養到了{2}階！

name: NOTICE_10010002
value: 幸運的法則已經確定！ <color=#25c1e9>{0}</color> 合成了 <color=#FF3838FF>UR-{1}</color> ！

name: NOTICE_10103001
value: 公會戰8強已經結束，各位公會成員可以前往公會介面查看結果了。

name: NOTICE_10104001
value: 公會戰4強賽結束了，讓我們祝賀這4個公會： <color=#49ff31>{0}</color> 、<color=#49ff31>{1}</color> 、<color=#49ff31>{2}</color> 、<color=#49ff31>{3}</color>

name: NOTICE_10105001
value: 讓我們恭喜 <color=#49ff31>{0}</color> 成為本屆公會戰的亞軍！

name: NOTICE_10106001
value: 慶祝吧！新王的誕生！ <color=#49ff31>{0}</color> 經過激烈的鏖戰成為本屆公會戰冠軍，君臨天下！

name: NOTICE_10201001
value: 公會BOSS戰已經開啟，成員們加油！

name: NOTICE_10301001
value: 他說，可以上了！ <color=#25c1e9>{0}</color> 對世界BOSS做出了最後一擊，完成了對世界BOSS的調教

name: NOTICE_10302001
value: 世界BOSS已經結束，輸出冠軍、亞軍、季軍分別是{0}、{1}、{2}

name: NOTICE_10401001
value: 成王敗寇！ <color=#25c1e9>{0}</color> 一腳踹下了 <color=#25c1e9>{1}</color> ，坐上首座。

name: NOTICE_10401002
value: 冠軍易主！ <color=#25c1e9>{0}</color> 輕易擊敗了 <color=#25c1e9>{1}</color> ，成為了新的君王。

name: NOTICE_10402001
value: <color=#25c1e9>{0}</color> 跨越重重障礙，擠開層層屍體，最終爬到了最頂端，摘下了勝利的果實

name: NOTICE_10403001
value: 距離競技場結算時間已經不多了，究竟誰才能笑到最後？

name: NOTICE_10501001
value: <color=#25c1e9>{0}</color> 長風破浪，成為天空塔第一個通過{1}的勇者

name: NOTICE_10601001
value: 榮耀競技場{0}進{1}比賽開始啦！

name: NOTICE_20001001
value: 世界BOSS戰即將打響，還請做好準備！

name: NOTICE_20002001
value: 世界BOSS戰開啟了，玩家們，衝衝沖！

name: NOTICE_20101001
value: 公會戰預選賽已經開啟，各位玩家們，加油！

name: NOTICE_20102001
value: 公會戰預選賽已經結束，各位公會成員可以前往公會介面查看結果了。

name: NOTICE_30001001
value: 快速掛機後注意及時更新裝備

name: NOTICE_30001002

value: 沉迷魔法的法師，只要魔法有提升，願意獻祭千萬人

value: 弓和箭就是他的生命，箭無虛發

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} CRIT increases by 35% in 3 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{MASTER_NAME}3回合內自身暴擊值提高35%。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} Crit DMG increase 40% in 2 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{MASTER_NAME}2回合內暴擊傷害提高40%。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}. {MASTER_NAME} entered a [Frenzied] state, gain immunity to all debuffs in 2 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}的效果，{MASTER_NAME}進入【狂亂】狀態，不受異常狀態影響。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, target already in [Ignited] state will be [Stun] for 1 round
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，已經處於【燃燒】狀態的，會被【眩暈】1回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} enters [Provoked] state, increasing DEF by 50%, ATK by 30%, lasts 3 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}的效果，{TARGET_NAME}進入【奮起】狀態，攻擊力增加30%，防禦力提高50%，持續3回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} enters [Bolstered] state. In 2 rounds, reduce DMG taken by 50% and increase DMG Reflection by 50%
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}的效果，{MASTER_NAME}進入【援護】狀態，受到的傷害降低50%，傷害反彈增加50%，持續2回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} enters [Bolstered] state. In 2 rounds, reduce DMG taken by 50% and increase DMG Reflection by 50%
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}的效果，{TARGET_NAME}進入【援護】狀態，受到的傷害降低50%，傷害反彈增加50%，持續2回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Pierced] and DEF is decreased by 60, lasts 3 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【擊破】，防禦力降低60%，持續3回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, all positive buffs on {TARGET_NAME} have been dispelled
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}的效果，驅散了{TARGET_NAME}所有有益狀態。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} [Bleed] and cannot receive healing for 3 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}【流血】，3回合內無法回復生命。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Pierced] so P.RES and M.RES is decreased by 80%, lasts 3 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}的效果，{TARGET_NAME}進入【擊破2】狀態，魔抗和物抗降低80%，持續3回合。

name: Due to previous skill is a crit, {MASTER_NAME} used {SKILL_NAME} once again on {TARGET_NAME} caused {DAMAGE} DMG
value: 因上一段技能暴擊，{MASTER_NAME}對{TARGET_NAME}使用了{SKILL_NAME}，造成了{DAMAGE}傷害。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Pierced] so P.RES and M.RES is decreased by 50%, lasts 2 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}的效果，{TARGET_NAME}進入【擊破】狀態，魔抗和物抗降低50%，持續2回合。

name: Change username will cost 300 diamonds
value: 修改昵稱需要花費300鑽石

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Poisoned] and loses 3% HP in each rounds, lasts 4 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}【中毒】，每回合損失3%生命，持續3回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME} target which in debuffs will [Stun] for 1 round
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，處於不良狀態的目標眩暈1回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} get [Seal] so can't launch skills for 2 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【封印】，無法使用技能，持續1回合

value: 掃蕩所有通關的天空塔關卡

value: Increases self Max HP by 26% and increases ACC by 24%

value: 對3名敵人造成150%的物理傷害

value: 感恩節活動期間戰場掛機掉落，可以在活動介面兌換道具。
