value: 因{SKILL_NAME}的效果，{TARGET_NAME}進入【奮起】狀態，防禦力增加赫拉防禦力的100%，攻擊力增加赫拉攻擊力的60%，持續3回合。

name: Just a basic attack that looks normal and is indeed normal
value: 看起來普通確實普通的普通攻擊

name: Deals 240% P.DMG to 1 enemy
value: 對1名敵人造成240%的物理傷害

name: Deals 280% P.DMG to 1 enemy and has 50% chance to stun the enemy for 1 round.
value: 對1名敵人造成280%的物理傷害，並有50%的概率使其暈眩1回合

name: Heals 1 angel of our team with the lowest HP by 100%
value: 對我方血量最低的1名女神進行100%治療

name: Deals 200% P.DMG to 3 enemies in front row
value: 對前排3名敵人造成200%的物理傷害

name: In 2 rounds, reduce DMG taken by 60% taunts the enemy and become it's priority target
value: 2回合內使受到的傷害降低60%，並且挑釁敵人，成為優先攻擊目標

name: Enter a frenzied state, turn all basic attack to crit hits and gain immunity to debuffs, lasts 3 rounds
value: 使自己進入狂亂狀態，普通攻擊必定暴擊，且免疫異常狀態，持續3回合

name: Increases self DMG taken by 50%, and increase DMG dealt by 50% for 5 rounds
value: 以自身受到的傷害增加50%為代價使自身造成的傷害增加50%，持續5回合

name: Increases DMG by 30% and DEF by 50% for 3 team members for 3 rounds
value: 增加我方隨機3人30%的傷害，50%的防禦力，持續3回合

name: Deals 100% P.DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP Percentage and prevents the enemy from healing for 2 rounds
value: 對當前血量最少的敵人造成100%的物理傷害，使其在2回合內無法回復生命

name: 220% P.DMG to 1 enemy with the lowest HP Percent. 1% enemy HP loss equals 1% DMG rise.
value: 對當前血量百分比最低的1名敵人照成220%的物理傷害，對方每損失1%的血量傷害提高1%

name: Increase DMG by 30% and DEF for 50% for 3 team members for 3 rounds.
value: 增加我方3人30%的傷害，50%的防禦力，持續3回合

name: Deals 160% P.DMG to 1 enemy and has 50% chance to Poison the enemy for 2 rounds, causing the enemy to lose HP in each round
value: 對1名敵人造成160%物理傷害，50%概率使其中毒2回合，每回合減少生命值

name: Attacks 2 times randomly, each dealing 150% DMG. It can attack the same enemy multiple times
value: 隨機進行攻擊2次，每次造成150%的傷害，可作用於同一個敵人

value: 對攻擊最高的1名敵人造成450%的物理傷害，並對目標施加【印記】，成為優先攻擊目標，持續2回合

name: Deals 80% M.DMG to 1 enemy. If the enemy is not killed, Ra will release this skill again (up to 8 times). If enemy is killed within the first three hits, Ra enters [Frenzy] state for 2 rounds. \n\n[Frenzy - Star Gaze]: Ra will not be affected by any debuff and her basic attack is guaranteed to crit.
value: 對1名敵人造成80%的法術傷害，如目標沒有死亡，會再次發動攻擊（最多8次）。3次攻擊內擊殺該目標，拉神進入2回合【狂亂】狀態，不受異常狀態影響

name: Deals 200% M.DMG to 6 enemies and has 50% chance to [Ignite] them, causing the enemy to lose 4% of current HP for 3 rounds. Enemies who already in [Ignite] state will be stunned for 1 round.
value: 對6名敵人造成200%的法術傷害，並有50%的幾率使敵人進入3回合的【燃燒】狀態。如敵人已經處於【燃燒】狀態，則眩暈1回合

name: Deals 250% P.DMG to 3 enemies in front row and has 75% chance to inflict [Pierce] effect, which decreases enemy’s DEF by 60%  for 3 rounds.
value: 對前排3名敵人發動攻擊，75%的幾率使其進入【擊破】狀態，減少60%的防禦力，持續3回合，並對其造成250%的物理傷害

name: All teammates enter [Excite] state, increase 50% self DEF, 40% self ATK for 3 rounds. It also has 75% chance to dispel all debuffs and recover HP by 40% of Izu's ATK
value: 使我方全體進入【奮發】狀態，攻擊力增加40%，防禦力提高50%，持續3回合，並且有75%的幾率驅散所有不良狀態，之後回復舞女攻擊力40%的血量

name: Make all teammates increase DEF by 100% of Hera’s DEF and increase ATK by 60% of Hera’s ATK. Then dispel all debuffs on 2 highest ATK teammates.
value: 使我方全體防禦力增加赫拉防禦力的100%，攻擊力增加赫拉攻擊力的60%，持續3回合；並且驅散我方攻擊力最高2名女神的所有不良狀態。

name: Deals 150% M.DMG to 6 enemies. If the enemy’s ATK is lower than Hera, DMG will be doubled. Then recover the teammate with lowest HP by 50% of Hera’s ATK and dispel all debuffs.
value: 對敵方6名造成150%的法術傷害，如果敵方最大攻擊力低於赫拉，則傷害翻倍，並對我方血量最低的女神回復赫拉攻擊力50%的血量，同時驅散我方所有不良狀態

name: Deals 240% M.DMG to 3 enemies in back row and dispel one random buffs, then inflict [Ignite] effect, which causes the enemy to lose 4% of current HP for 2 rounds.
value: 攻擊後排3名敵人去除其1個有益狀態，並對其造成240%的法術傷害，使其進入【燃燒】狀態，每回合損失敵人當前生命值4%的血量，持續2回合。

name: Deals 60% True DMG to 6 enemies. The attack is guaranteed to Crit if the enemy is in [Ignite] effect.
value: 對6名敵人造成60%的真實傷害，無視防禦和魔抗，若敵人處於【燃燒】狀態，則必定暴擊。

name: Deals 250% P.DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK. Hephaetus and highest ATK teammate enter [Bolstered] state, which reduces DMG taken by 50% and gives 20% DMG reflection for 2 rounds.
value: 使自己和攻擊力最高的隊友進入【援護】狀態，受到的傷害降低50%，傷害反彈增加20%，持續2回合，並且給予攻擊力最高的1名敵人250%的物理傷害。

name: Deals 300% P.DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK, dispel all positive buffs, and inflict [Bleed] effect, which prevents all healing for 3 rounds.
value: 解除敵方攻擊力最高女神的所有有益狀態，對其造成300%的物理傷害，並使其進入流血狀態，不能回復血量，持續3回合。

name: Deals 160% P.DMG to 6 enemies then inflict [Weaken] effect which decreases enemies’ ATK by 30% and guaranteed to crit against enemies who already in [Freeze] state.
value: 對敵方6名造成160%的物理傷害，並使其進入【虛弱】狀態，降低30%的攻擊力，持續2回合；如果目標處於【冰凍】狀態，則必定暴擊。

name: Deals 320% P.DMG to 2 enemies and has 80% chance to [Freeze] enemies which in debuffs,and the enemy will not be able to move
value: 對隨機2名敵人造成320%的物理傷害，如果目標處於不良狀態，則80%的概率【冰凍】目標1回合，敵人將無法行動。

name: Deals 280% P.DMG to highest HP enemy and inflict [Pierce] effect, which decreases enemy’s P.RES and M.RES by 80%  for 3 rounds. Attack again if it crits, up to 3 times.
value: 使敵方血量最高的女神進入擊破狀態，魔抗和物抗降低80%，持續3回合，並對其造成280%的物理傷害，若發生暴擊則追加攻擊（最多再發動2次）。

name: Deals 220% P.DMG to 3 enemies in back row and inflict [Bleed] effect, which prevents all healing for 3 rounds. The attack is guaranteed to crit if the enemy is in [Poison] state.
value: 對後排3名敵人造成220%的物理傷害，若目標處於中毒狀態，則必定暴擊；並且目標進入流血狀態，不能回復生命，持續3回合。

name: Heals all team members by 90% of the Cupid's ATK and all team members reduces DMG taken by 30% and Debuff RES increase by 30% for 2 rounds
value: 使我方全體恢復丘比特攻擊力90%的血量，並且受到的傷害降低30%，異常抵抗增加30%，持續2回合

name: Deals 550% P.DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK then inflict [Weaken] effect which decreases ememies' ATK by 60% for 2 rounds.
value: 對敵方攻擊力最高的1名敵人造成550%的物理傷害，並進入【虛弱】狀態，攻擊力降低60%，持續2回合

name: Deals 500% P.DMG to 1 enemy. If the enemy is killed, Hades releases this skill again, up to 3 times; If the enemy is not killed, inflicts [Bleed] effect, prevents all healing effects for 2 rounds.
value: 對1名敵人造成500%的物理傷害，如果目標陣亡，則再次發動技能（最多3次）；如果目標未陣亡則進入【流血】狀態，不能回復血量，持續2回合

name: Dispels all 6 enemies’ buffs and deals 150% P.DMG.  If targets are effected by [Bleed], then the attack must be critical.
value: 驅散6名敵人身上所有增益狀態，並造成150%的物理傷害；如果目標處於【流血】狀態，則必暴擊。

name: Satan's sword, the arrogant Satan wanted to be equal to the Lord, so he called a third of the angels to Fall.
value: 魔神撒旦的佩劍，傲慢的撒旦想要和耶和華同等，召集了三分之一的天使走向墮落之路。

name: The skull of Leviathan, the all-consuming sea monster, is forged into a helmet imbued with a deep-sea reluctance and jealousy of everything on earth.
value: 吞噬一切的海怪利維坦的頭骨鍛造而成的頭盔，飽含了幽居深海的不甘和對地上一切事物的嫉妒惡念。

name: Samael's armor is tempered by his wrath. Mortals will burn themselves to ashes when they get close to it.
value: 地獄魔王薩麥爾的戰甲，甲胄完全被他的怒火所淬煉，凡人即使是伸手觸碰也會怒火焚身，灰飛煙滅。

name: The mysterious books of Belphegor, the Early Assyrian demon god, record the ways of spreading discord and seducing laziness to bring one down to evil.
value: 原亞述的魔神貝爾芬格手中的神秘書籍，記載著散播不和以及誘人怠惰使人墜入邪惡的法門。

name: The ring of Mammon, the god of treasure and greed, and the person who is illuminated by the ring will turn into a walking dead, addicted to unquenchable desire for material things and begin a frenzy of endless demands.
value: 財寶和貪婪的錯誤之神瑪門的戒指，被戒指反光照到的人會化為行屍走肉，沉溺於難以抑制的物欲而開始瘋狂無休止的索求。

name: The eyes of Asmodeus, Those who look straight into the eyes of Asmodeus may gain true knowledge, or they may be blinded by lust and fall into the second hell forever.
value: 色欲魔神阿斯莫德的眼睛，直視眼睛的人可能會獲得真知，也可能被色欲蒙蔽，永墮第二層地獄。

name: Open the treasure box and get the battle rewards
value: 領取寶箱，收穫戰鬥收益

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, all targets whose Max HP is lower than Chaos will be [Stun] for 1 round
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，最大生命低於卡俄斯的目標眩暈1回合。

name: Deals 200% P.DMG to 6 enemies, if target's HP is higher than 50%, then causes double DMG to target; After attack if targets'HP is lower than 50%,then it will be affected by [Ignite] for 2 rounds
value: 對敵方6名造成200%的物理傷害，如果目標生命高於50%，則傷害加倍；攻擊後如果目標生命值低於50%，則使其進入燃燒狀態，持續兩回合

name: Deals 200% P.DMG to 6 enemies, if target's HP is lower than 50%, then causes double DMG to target; After attack if targets'HP is still higher than 50%,then it will be affected by [Pierced], so P.RES and M.RES will be decreased by 50% for 2 rounds
value: 對敵方6名造成200%的物理傷害，如果目標生命值低於50%，則傷害翻倍；如果攻擊後目標生命值高於50%，則使其進入破碎狀態，魔抗物抗降低50%，持續兩回合

name: SERVER_CAN_NOT_LOGIN
value: 用戶端版本號過低，無法進入該服

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_1
value: 末世審判的號角已經吹響，唯一正式的熾天使加百列將破壞人間一切污穢的事物。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_2
value: 人類只不過是莉莉絲的餌食，你成長得有多好，莉莉絲在捕食時就有多興奮。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_3
value: 有時生有雙翅，有時幻化成鳶、獵鷹、隼等鳥類，能救人於危難，也能將人引向死亡。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_4
value: 天光、白日、夢、死亡、睡眠、命運、痛苦、衰老、辛勞、年齡、腐敗等具有意義的神。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_5
value: 為眾神和生靈間傳遞消息，飛過之地會留下一道彩虹，同樣引導那些女人的靈魂走向安息。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_6
value: 人們不該擁有過多的好運，涅墨西斯將會給那些有福的人帶去詛咒，讓人陷入無盡的苦難。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_7
value: 無人能直視她的眼睛，這是一種能力但也是一種悲劇，也造就了如今強大且恐怖的美杜莎。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_8
value: 危險總是潛藏在美麗的臉龐和歌聲中，這片充滿致命誘惑的海域，早已白骨成堆。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_9
value: 三皇之首、百王之先，不僅僅擁有神的力量，也是大智的思考者和發明創造者。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_10
value: 水克火是常識，但北水神王與祝融戰鬥，被祝融以真火取勝，祝融的能力也變得更加深不可測。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_11
value: 巫女的始祖，喜鵲、金龜都曾與巴里公主相伴，通天地之靈，受萬物庇護。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_12
value: 與其在天堂裡做奴隸，倒不如在地獄裡稱王。堅定的意志、熱切的復仇心、不滅的憎恨。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_13
value: 閃電長矛、三叉戟、雙股叉、太陽馬車。不論是暴力還是藝術，都能完美駕馭的鐵匠之神。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_14
value: 大地與冥土之間隔著無盡的黑暗，當你望向如此的深淵的時候，厄瑞玻斯也在凝視著你。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_15
value: “媧，古之神聖女，化萬物者也”，擁有創世神、始母神的獨立神格，供億萬人敬仰。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_16
value: 喜愛黑暗的陰間，總是手握兩股叉，腳邊臥著三頭狗刻耳柏洛斯，等待著一位死者的到來。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_17
value: 眾神之王，這一個標籤足以震懾大部分臭魚爛蝦。手握著神器永恆之槍，讓人看不到獲勝的希望。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_18
value: 作為彩虹橋的守護者，海姆達爾擁有超人的力量、體力、敏捷和耐力，和讓人無所遁形的超感。

name: GUILD_OPEN_DUNGEON_POWER_NEED_TIPS
value: 需要會長或副會長開啟

name: You can skip the battle after 3 rounds or once defeated the Boss
value: 戰勝BOSS或3回合後才能跳過戰鬥

name: It is the first time that someone can compete with me who possesses the power of God. I have encountered such a well-matched opponent. Now I want to release the greater power in my body.
value: 竟然能和擁有神之力量的我較量至此，還是第一次遇到如此勢均力敵的對手，我現在要釋放我體內更加巨大的力量。

name: It's not over yet, the ability and energy of my body is fully liberated. My power is exploded with the ability to exceed the limit of God.
value: 不過還沒結束呢，能力全解放，將體內的能量全部釋放，以超越神的極限的能力，爆發力量。

name: You are worth to defeat, let's do our best in this battle to complete our missions.
value: 沒錯人類，這樣才值得我去打敗你，讓我們都拼盡自己的所有來讓這場戰鬥完成它的使命。

name: Will I lose? Gods can not predict everything. Until the last moment, I will still fight with you.
value: 我要輸了嗎？神的判斷有時也會沒那麼准，但是我仍然會認真的和你戰鬥至最後一刻。

name: You need to purchase previous one first.
value: 購買完上一個才能買這一個

name: RELIC_ADD_CAPACITY
value: 是否花費100鑽增加聖物容量？

name: The doomsday represents the end of the old era. What new era will usher in? The horn of doomsday does not give its answer.
value: 末日代表著舊時代的結束，而將會迎來怎樣的新時代，末日號角並未給出它的答案。

name: Daedalus built an unusually complex and chaotic maze. But no matter how complicated it is, it cannot be a cover for Milos.
value: 代達羅斯建造的異常複雜混亂的迷宮，但即使再複雜的迷宮，也無法成為米洛斯的遮羞布。

name: This is a story about art and joy, and the harp silently recounts this memory in its own way.
value: 這是一個關於藝術與歡樂的故事，豎琴在以它自己的方式默默細述著這段回憶。

name: The censer is full of magical power. It can ward off evil spirits, attract blessings, and gives peculiar power to the Ungnyeo.
value: 充滿神器力量的香爐，能辟邪、招百福，也給熊女帶來奇特的力量。

name: Shennongqin has five strings on it: Yue, Gong, Jiao, Zheng, Yu. \nThe sound of it can express the virtue of heaven and earth and bring happiness to people.
value: 長三尺六分六寸，上有五弦：曰、宮、角、徵、羽。\n琴聲能道天地之德，能表神農之和，也能給人們帶來歡樂。

name: Raphael owns the title of Wisdom Angel. This is representative of powerful strength. \nIn the night of winter, it is the existence that can warm and heal people's hearts.
value: 拉斐爾帶著智天使的頭銜，是強大實力的代表。\n在寒冬的夜晚，更是能夠溫暖和治癒人心的存在。

name: When he came back to his senses, the hand was tingled. \nThe scar is healed by time, but the heart was sad by rose. \nThe heart has been stolen, willing to turn into a drop in this pool of blood.
value: 當回過神來，手已被刺痛。\n傷疤被時間治癒，心卻依舊為了玫瑰而疼痛。\n心早已被偷走，甘願化為這血池中的一滴。

name: The wrapper is sacred and pure. Geb used them to wrap the sinful souls. \nBuried under the earth, there is no way to escape forever.
value: 裹靈布是神聖的、純潔的。但是正是如此，蓋布將它們用來包裹那一個個罪惡的靈魂。\n埋葬于大地之下，永世無法逃出。

name: It is dazzling, like golden wheat in the ground. \nEven if the gold thread is now woven into such an eternal laurel, there is no chance to return to that summer.
value: 耀眼奪目，猶如金黃的麥穗或是地裡的黃金。\n即使如今金絲編制而成如此永恆桂冠，卻也怎樣都無法回到那年夏天。

name: Memories are blurred by suffering and joy is taken away by death. \nFor the souls who came to the underworld, it is still the other side of the heart.
value: 記憶被苦難模糊，僅存的歡樂被死亡漂白。\n對於來到冥界的靈魂，這仍然是心馳神往的彼岸。

name: No one knows their fate on Book of Destiny. \nYou will know nothing about your life until you open the fate box.
value: 命運之書到底是正在被書寫，還是早已成冊，沒有人知道。\n正如薛定諤的貓，在打開盒子之前，你終究無法確定你自己的命運。

name: Light can scribble through the night sky, and light can shine straight into people's hearts. \nBut light will be absorbed by black hole and it also follows Nyx's Moon Night Law.
value: 光可以散漫的劃破一片片夜空，光可以直直的照進人的內心。\n但光會被黑洞吸收，光也得遵循倪克斯的月夜法則。

name: The flowers and the fruits are small. Myth Peach were riped for three thousand years, when people ate them, they will become immortals and their body will be be light; \n Myth Peach were riped for six thousand years, when people ate them will be soaring and living forever; \n Myth Peach were riped in nine thousand years, when people ate them, their lives will be as long as the world living.
value: 花微果小，三千年一熟，人吃了成仙了道，體健身輕；\n層花甘實，六千年一熟，人吃了霞舉飛升，長生不老；\n紫紋緗核，九千年一熟，人吃了天地同壽，日月同庚。——《西遊記》

name: Iris as the meaning of the throne provided the throne to pharaoh who is Iris' child. Iris can use her throne to protect young children and dead people,  also she can also use her throne to resurrect the dead.
value: 伊利斯作為含義為王座，法老是伊利斯的孩子，坐在她提供的御座上。伊利斯能用她的王座保護著幼童和亡靈，也能用她的王座復活死者。

name: Ordinary weapons: tearing the land, crushing rocks, and collapsing the earth. \nPoseidon's Trident: It can do what Ordinary weapons can do. Also it can tear the universe and expose the underworld.
value: 普通的武器：在撕裂大地、在擊碎岩石、甚至在使天地崩塌。\n海神三叉戟：普通的武器可以的，它都可以，它還可以撕裂宇宙，使冥界暴露。

name: Phantasos knew every skill and she can transform into the appearance of everything in the world. No one has ever seen the original appearance of Phantasos, maybe she has forgotten what she was originally.
value: 方塔蘇斯什麼技能都會，她能幻化成世上萬物的模樣，但是從來沒有人見過方塔蘇斯本來的模樣，或許她也忘記了自己原本是什麼樣

name: Don't approach the good night in the night and fall asleep in such a comfortable song to avoid falling into their mouths.
value: 不要溫順的走近那個良夜，不要在如此讓人心安的歌聲中沉睡，才能免於墜入她們的血盆大口。

name: Through the beautiful eyes, I saw you and Medusa are in the journey. \nIt is beautiful and pure. It likes an unattainable dream, but it makes you willing to pursue it until your body and soul slowly petrify.
value: 透過美麗的瞳，看到了你和美杜莎一起走過的旅途。\n美麗、純潔、好似一段遙不可及的夢，但又讓你願意不斷去追尋，直到身體和靈魂慢慢石化。

name: Embarked on a journey to find the only one in my heart. \n The road is torturous and complicated in journey, but as long as your firm direction , the angel of victory will eventually wear a laurel crown on your head.
value: 為了尋找心中的唯一踏上了旅程。\n走走停停，曲曲折折，但是只要方向堅定，勝利女神終會將桂冠戴在你頭上。

name: Sins turn into silk threads and gradually wrap around you. You cannot breathe. Your body and soul will die unless the silks are cut through by Nemesis.\nEven in her merciless justice, death is inevitable as she cuts through the silks, down into your very soul.
value: 罪孽會化為絲線，逐漸纏繞包裹著你讓你喘不過氣，直到被涅墨西斯用她無情的正義斬開，連帶著你的軀體和靈魂。

name: The sun, moon and stars all perish and regenerate under her dome. Hundreds of millions of lives on the earth are sheltering the reincarnation of the next generation.
value: 日月星辰都在她的穹頂之下消亡又再生、大地上的億萬生命在她的庇護下一代一代的輪回。

name: Jeanne d'Arc met an angel under the big tree behind the village and received 'God's revelation'. She raised the rebellious war flag and led her generals to win the war. This flag followed her in the battle on the front lines of the war but was never broken. The oracles from flag often helped Jeanne d'Arc.
value: 貞德在村後的大樹下遇見天使，得到了“上帝的啟示”，她舉起了反抗的軍棋，率領她的將兵打贏了戰爭。這面旗子跟著她戰鬥在戰爭的第一線卻從來沒有被折斷，時常能降下神諭，給予貞德幫助。

name: When the bird of youth is not there and it was captured by the autumn wind. \nOnly youth apples can bring vigor and hope to people.
value: 當青春之鳥不在，當青春被秋風擄去。\n唯有青春蘋果能帶給人們那繁茂的春之元氣。

name: The baby in the swaddle was abandoned and life shouldn't have been so damaged. \nThe magpie was flying to guard and the golden tortoise swam into the sea with the baby on its back. Buddha rescued her and handed it to Huazi for adoption. \nWhen this baby growed up, she will bring more healing to the creatures.
value: 還是繈褓中的嬰兒被遺棄，生命本該如此折損。\n但喜鵲飛來守護，金龜背著游進大海，佛祖搭救並交給花子收養。\n當有一天長大成人，其成長將會帶給生靈治癒更多。

name: Anciently, when Bao-xi had come to the rule of all under heaven, looking up, he contemplated the brilliant forms exhibited in the sky, and looking down he surveyed the patterns shown on the earth. On this he devised the eight trigrams, to show fully the attributes of the spirit-like and intelligent (operations working secretly), and to classify the qualities of the myriads of things.
value: “古者包犧氏之王天下也，仰則觀象雨天，俯則觀法於地；觀鳥獸之文與地之宜；近則諸身，遠取諸物，於是始做八卦，以通神明之德，以類萬物之情。”——《周易·繫辭下》

name: We can't detect her guilt through her beautiful face from a fallen angel. \nUntil she spread her Pride Wings.
value: 天使，墮落的天使。我們無法透過她美麗的臉龐察覺到她有何罪過。\n直到她展開她傲慢的、不羈的翅膀。

name: Even though humans know what dangers lie ahead, they still can't restrain their desires, hence a lot of suffering in the wake of opening Pandora's Boxes. \nHumans are still opening Pandora's Boxes one after another. But never forget the last hope hidden in Pandora's Boxes.
value: 人面對已知的危險也會克制不住自己的欲望，使潘朵拉魔盒帶來了許多苦難。\n但是人類仍在不斷的打開一個個潘朵拉魔盒，不過永遠也別忘了那潘朵拉魔盒裡最後潛藏的希望。

name: Under the uncanny work of nature, this Starfire Stone has continued the Chinese civilization.\nLie down in the jungle and mountains when calm, and burst into starlight sparks when fierce. \nIt is both a continuation of civilization and a dangerous terminator.
value: 大自然的鬼斧神工下，誕生了這顆延續了代代華夏文明的星石。\n平靜時躺匿于叢林山野，激烈時迸發出星光火花。\n它既文明的延續者，也是危險的終結者。

name: Simple and powerful-the truth of the world is also summed up by this sentence. \nMake your oath to Gangnir, never regret it and the oath will be fulfilled. You can use them to enemies when you are in fight.. \nWhen you are using it, it is like a meteor piercing the sky. It will penetrate everything even the Holy Sword Gram cannot escape this disaster.
value: 單純且強大——世界的真理也被這句話所概括。\n對岡格尼爾許下你的誓言，永不能反悔且畢將實現，對敵人時百發百中。\n投射時宛若流星劃破天際，必將擊穿一切，哪怕是聖劍格拉姆也難逃此劫。

name: The nether god Erebus is the embodiment of eternal darkness, and she uses her Nether Shawl to block the world and the underworld. \nNo trace of light can pass through the Nether Shawl  to reach the territory of Erebus, she is staying in darkness forever.
value: 幽冥神厄瑞玻斯是永久黑暗的化身，她用她的披風阻隔了人間與冥界。\n沒有一絲絲的光能穿過幽冥披風到達厄瑞玻斯的地盤，永遠的處於黑暗之中。

name: Standing on the solid ground and surrouned by the hustle and bustle of the city, everyone is busy living their own life and worries about trivial things. \nBut the vastness of the universe humbles us. We all live under the eye of Gaia and we exist in this chaotic universe only because of Gaia's love for us.
value: 腳下踩著堅實的大地，耳邊縈繞著城市的喧囂，大家都生活在自己的忙忙碌碌中、計較著一件件雞毛蒜皮的事。\n但宇宙的浩瀚也告訴我們謙卑，我們都生活在蓋亞的俯視下，只不過在這個混沌的宇宙中我們是被蓋亞偏愛的存在。

name: The four pillars fell and the land of earth was destroyed. Fire spread everywhere and floods crushed houses.\nHumans have lost the hope for their lives. Nuwa who mended the sky with the five-color stone. \nJust like her mother, she used all kinds of five-color stones to prop up the sky of our growth.
value: 四根天柱傾倒，九州大地毀裂，大火蔓延不熄，洪水氾濫不止。\n平凡的人類已經失去了生活的希望，是女媧用煉出的五色石補好了天空。\n正如我們的母親一樣，用著各式的五色石撐起了我們成長的天空。

name: Although it is difficult for Izanami to have a relationship with the Amaterasu, she had an incomparable desire of it. \nThis feeling is watered on the Amaterasu's doll, floating among the plants and trees of the world.
value: 伊邪那美雖與天照大神難有緣分，但卻也產生了無比的思戀。\n這份感情，澆灌在天照玩偶上，飄蕩于高天原的一草一木之中。

name: The dying warriors accepted Valkyrie's death kiss and were led to Valhalla. \nOnly the brave death warriors can arrive to Valhalla in their dreams. Death warriors enjoying the most satisfying life of fighting during the day and resurrecting at night. \nThere are heroic spirits in the Valhalla that can contend with the gods. When the door of the Valhalla is open, be prepared to accept your challenge.
value: 垂死的勇士們接受了瓦爾基裡的死亡之吻，被領向了英靈殿瓦爾哈拉。\n唯有勇敢的戰死者能夠到達夢想中的英靈殿，享受著白天戰鬥至死，夜晚複生宴飲的最美滿的生活。\n英靈殿中都是能與諸神抗衡的英靈，當英靈殿的大門打開時，就準備接受你的挑戰吧。

name: Yasakani no Magatama can protect people from disasters and allow people to obtain divine blessings. \nCoordinates the growth of all things, represents the sun and the moon and is bestowed by Izanami.
value: 八尺瓊勾玉能庇佑人們遠離災禍，讓人們獲得神力保佑。\n協調了萬物生長，代表了日月光芒，為伊邪那岐所賜。

name: Anubis's scale of truth fell into Ra's hands and the dead people will have a wonderful journey of their soul weighing.
value: 阿努比斯的真理之秤落入了調皮的把手中，而等待著亡者們的是一場奇妙的靈魂稱量之旅。

name: When you stare into the Abyss, the Abyss also stares back at you
value: 當你凝視深淵時，深淵也在凝視你

name: Refresh levels and rewards at 0 o'clock every day
value: 每天0點刷新關卡和獎勵

name: ABYSS_BRANCH_SHOP_DIALOG_INFOMATION
value: 只能購買1種商品，購買後商人會離開。

name: Use the angel's power to heal 30% of the HP of all Angels
value: 使用天使的力量可以恢復所有女神30%的血量

name: The Angel's HP has been restored, we are going to enter the next level
value: 女神血量已恢復，同時進入下一關

name: A breath of death is approaching...
value: 有股死亡的氣息正在靠近……

name: Use the recovery potion can heal 50% of HP of an angel. Please select the angel you want to heal:
value: 使用恢復藥水可以恢復一個女神50%的血量，請選擇需要使用的女神：

name: Use the resurrection potion to revive an angel with full HP. Please select the angel you want to revive:
value: 使用復活藥水可以滿血復活一個女神，請選擇需要使用的女神：

name: Go to the Star Trial and pass the trial to obtain the gem essence
value: 前往星辰試煉並通過試煉來獲得寶石精華

name: Thank you for your contribution in Proofreading!
value: 謝謝你在校對活動中的貢獻

name: Complete all dungeons in Mississippi
value: 通關密西西比全部關卡

name: Complete all dungeons in Alabama
value: 通關亞拉巴馬全部關卡

name: RELIC_STRENGTHEN_SELECT
value: 請選擇需要進階的聖物

name: RELIC_CONFIRM_HAVE_SR
value: 進階材料中有稀有聖物，是否繼續？

name: RELIC_CONFIRM_HAVE_DRESSED
value: 進階材料中有裝備中的聖物，是否繼續？

name: In the Secret Abyss, you can use it to restore an angel's HP to 50%.
value: 深淵秘境中，可用來恢復一個女神50%的血量

name: In the Secret Abyss, you can use it to restore an angel's HP to 100%.
value: 深淵秘境中，可用來滿血復活一個女神

name: Advancement requires 2 same N relics
value: 進階需要2個品質為N的同樣聖物

name: Advancement requires 2 same R relics
value: 進階需要2個品質為R的同樣聖物

name: Advancement requires any 2 R+ relics
value: 進階需要2個品質為R+任意的聖物

name: Advancement requires 1 same SR relic
value: 進階需要1個品質為SR的同樣聖物

name: Advancement requires any 2 SR+ relics
value: 進階需要2個品質為SR+的任意聖物

name: Advancement requires 1 same SR+ relic
value: 進階需要1個品質為SR+的同樣聖物

name: Advancement requires any 1 SSR+ relic
value: 進階需要1個品質為SSR+的任意聖物

name: Advancement requires 2 same SR+ relics
value: 進階需要2個品質為SR+的同樣聖物

name: Go to the Star Trial and get Gem Essence
value: 前往星辰試煉並通過試煉獲取寶石精華

name: Go to adventure and get Core Essence
value: 前往日常冒險並通過完成冒險獲取神核精華

name: 20 pieces can be used to synthesize a blue Relic.
value: 20個碎片可以隨機合成一個藍色聖物

name: 30 pieces can be used to synthesize a purple Relic.
value: 30個碎片可以隨機合成一個紫色聖物

name: 40 pieces can be used to synthesize an orange Relic.

name: Enmusubi will give teammates blessings. Each blessing has a 50% basic probability to 6 teammates. 5 blessings: speed +50, crit value +50%, Crit DMG +50%, RES +20%, DMG reduction +20% for 2 rounds; The whole team will restore HP by 20% of Enmusubi's Max ATK if the angel in the last position of your team receives a buff effect from Enmusubi.
value: 緣結神迫不及待的想讓隊友找到屬於自己的幸福，給隊友加上美好的祝福，每種祝福有50%基礎概率給到6名隊友，5種祝福：速度+50、暴擊值+50%、暴擊傷害+50%、異常抵抗+20%、傷害減免+20%。持續2回合；陣法中最後一名隊友每有一個祝福生效，全隊回復緣結神最大攻擊力20%的血量。

name: Enmusubi makes the enemy [Dizzy] by releasing the confusion caused by love. There is a 60% basic probability of inflicting all 6 enemies with up to 5 types of confusion: [Break], [Poisoned], [Ignite] ], [Bleed], [Weaken] for 2 rounds. If the enemy has the same debuff, it will suffer 75% P.DMG.
value: 緣結神也會對討厭的敵方釋放屬於愛情中的困惑，讓敵人暈頭轉向，每種困惑有50%的基礎概率給到6名敵人，5種困惑：【擊破】、【中毒】、【燃燒】、【流血】、【虛弱】，持續2回合，如果敵人已有此類DEBUFF，則會受到75%的法術傷害。

name: [Soul-Sucking] ATK increased by 30% and Leech effect increased by 10% for 2 rounds
value: 2回合【吸魂】，攻擊力提高30%，吸血效果提高10%

name: Deals 200% M.DMG to 6 enemies and has 50% chance to [Freeze] enemies which will render enemies unable to move for 1 round; Frost Dragon will cause additional 10% of her HP's True Damage to enemies are affected by [Freeze].
value: 對6名敵人早成200%的法術傷害，並有50%的幾率使其進入【冰凍】狀態，不能行動，持續1回合；如果冰凍成功或處於冰凍狀態，則對其造成冰霜龍女當前生命值10%的真實傷害。

name: Apply ice armor to all of us for 2 rounds, which increases the physical resistance by 100% and the damage reflection by 30%. In addition, it has a 50% chance to freeze the attacker for 2 rounds when under normal attack.
value: 給我方全體施加2回合冰甲狀態，使其物抗增加100%，傷害反彈增加30%，並且受到普通攻擊時有50%的幾率凍結攻擊者2回合。

name: Deals 350% P.DMG to 3 random enemies and inflicts [Ignite] state on the targets, which causes 6% loss of their current HP in each round, for 4 rounds
value: 對隨機3名敵人造成350%的物理傷害，並使其進入【燃燒】狀態，每回合損失6%的當前生命值，持續4回合。

name: Deals 6 random attacks, each attack causing 50% P.DMG. If the target in [Ignite] state, the damage will be converted into True Damage, ignoring defense and resistance.
value: 隨機進行6此攻擊，每次造成50%的物理傷害，如果目標處於【燃燒】狀態，則傷害轉化為真實傷害，無視任何防禦和抗性。

name: Deals 600% P.DMG to enemy with the lowest HP, and make enemy into [Pierce] state which causes reducing defense by 80% for 4 rounds; If the target is killed, deal additional 100% P.DMG to all the enemies, and make them into [Sunder Armor] state.
value: 對生命值最低的1名敵人造成600%物理傷害，並使其進入【擊破】狀態，防禦力降低80%，持續4回合；如果目標陣亡，則額外對敵方全體造成100%的物理傷害，並且進入【擊破】狀態。

name: [Ignite] state for 4 rounds, enemy’s current HP lose 6% in each round
value: 4回合【燃燒】狀態，每回合損失敵人當前生命值6%的血量

name: [Pierce] state for 4 rounds, enemy's DEF is reduced by 80%
Increases ATK by 500%, and enters a frantic state, ignoring any abnormal effects, normal attack must be Crit for 2 rounds. (Cannot be dispelled)
value: 2回合內普通攻擊必暴擊且免疫一切不良效果，攻擊力提高500% (無法被驅散)

name: Beautiful golden apples can redeem extremely valuable items in the golden apple store.

name: Princess Bari, where is this place? It is so pretty!
value: 巴里，這裡哪啊？好漂亮啊

name: It seems to be the place where Hera and Zeus used to live. I heard there are golden apples here.
value: 好像是赫拉和宙斯以前住的地方，聽說這裡有金蘋果啊。

name: OMG! Gaia, I want those golden apples.
value: 嚇我一跳！蓋亞，我也要金蘋果，給我一個。

name: No, golden apples can only be given to the angels with the highest charm.
value: 不可以哦，金蘋果只能送給魅力值最高的女神。

name: In recently Hera and Zeus are going to hold a charm competition, you can join it and get the golden apples.
value: 正好最近宙斯和赫拉要舉辦一場魅力值比拼的比賽，可以去參加拿一個屬於你的金蘋果。

name: Got you, I am ready to participate immediately~~ Bari, do you think I can be the most attractive angel?
value: 好，我收拾收回立刻準備參加~~巴里，以後我就是最有魅力的女神兼美少女了！

value: 首次戰鬥可獲贈一批戰術道具輔助戰鬥，道具功能可在包裹查看

name: Wait for the event to start
Select an angel to join the battle
Bless the Angel and increase the charm value of Angel by 30%. Only in the Apple of Discord.
value: 祝福女神，使得女神的魅力值提高30%。僅限金蘋果之戰中起效。

name: The Angel released herself, making her charm value increase 500%, but she can only fight once in battle. Only in the Apple of Discord.
value: 女神奉獻自己，使得魅力值變為500%，但只能戰鬥一次即退場。僅限金蘋果之戰中起效。

name: Increase angel victory times to 10 times in battle. Only in the battle of Apple of Discord.
value: 女神連勝退場的次數變為10次。僅限金蘋果之戰中起效。

name: Copy a clone with 20% charm of angel in fight. Angel will join the fight after the clone dies. Only in the battle of Apple of Discord.
value: 複製一個自身20%實力的克隆體代替自己出戰，克隆死亡後自己才會出場。僅限金蘋果之戰中起效。

name: Not in the strategy time, you can not doing this change
value: 非策略時間，不可進行操作

name: PlEASE_RESTART_GAME
value: 網絡已斷開，需要重新啟動遊戲

name: Do you want to have supreme rights? \nDo you want to be respected by Zeus? \nHera will destroy you without batting an eye if your answer is yes.
value: 是否想擁有至高無上的權利？\n是否想得到宙斯的尊敬？\n即使是短暫的猶豫，赫拉也不會允許。直到灰飛煙滅才甘休。

name: On this romantic night, send the blessings of love to your dear\nCupid is using arrows to weave a loving line that belongs only to this couple.
value: 在這浪漫的夜晚，將愛情的祝福送給親愛的你們\n丘比特正在用箭矢編織的一張只屬於這對情侶的情網

name: As the twilight of the gods approached, the sound of Heimdall's Gjallarhorn gathered the Norse gods together for the final battle, Ragnarok.\nThere was no escape, so they fought to the very end. Heimdall fought Loki and was the last of the gods to fall.
value: 在諸神的黃昏中，奧拉爾號角發出了最後的警告。\n既然沒人能够逃掉，不如血戰至最後一刻。\n海姆達爾最終與洛基展開了對決，也成為了最後倒下的神。

name: Chaos is the description of the beginning of the world.\nThe world was born in chaos, gradually formed order, and finally returned to chaos.\nNo one can escape the laws of the universe, just like no one can escape the control of Chaos.
value: 混沌對於世界開端的描述真是再合適不過了。\n世界誕生於混沌，逐漸形成秩序，最終又歸於混沌。\n沒有人能够逃脫宇宙的法則，就像沒有人能够逃脫卡俄斯的掌控。

name: Under the blue sky, a girl practices her swordsmanship; her mind shifting like the wind between focus and distraction.\nEach swing of her blade is an attempt to slice through her doubts. But with so many troubles on her mind, the task seems endless.
value: 青空下有一比特少女在練習著劍法，時而心不在焉，時而心無旁騖。\n向著天空揮舞幾刀，劈開心中的困惑，但少女的困惑又何止這一兩點。

name: The destiny wheel can never stop spinning.\nDestiny is more fascinating because of its ups and downs. Because of the uncertainty, it is worth the challenge.\nIt finally realized that the process of chasing destiny is far more interesting than the result.
value: 命運的輪盤永遠無法停止轉動。\n命運因她的起伏不定，才顯得更加迷人。正因為她的無法掌控，才值得去挑戰。\n最終才明白，追逐自己命運的過程遠比結果更加有趣

name: Away from the boredom of the sky, away from the noise on the ground. \nThe frost dragon is lying quietly in the deeping ice cave. \nThis silence makes the mind deeper and gives the ice spear the power of fantasy.
value: 遠離了天空煩悶，遠離了地表的喧鬧。\n冰龍靜靜的臥在深邃的冰窟中。\n這寂靜，讓思想變得更加深沉，賦予了冰槍幻想的力量。

name: It's raining heavily, and you are worried about whether or not an umbrella will be enough to keep her from getting wet.\nEnmusubi disagrees, a fate umbrella is enough. This is the rain of love. Rain is hugging her to bring each other closer.
value: 雨下大了，你在擔心一把傘是否不够，怕她淋濕。\n緣結神可不建議，一把緣結傘足够。\n這是屬於愛情的雨。摟住她，讓彼此靠得更近。

name: The Xmas Angel ask about what the surprise is? \nThe Xmas Angel stared at the wreath in her hand and thought, she seemed to be excited when she discovered a new world of flowers and plants. \nShe is still thinking, looking for an answer forever.
value: 聖誕女神發出了疑問，到底什麼是驚喜。\n聖誕女神盯著手中的花環思索著，貌似發現了一個全新的花草世界一般興奮了起來。\n她仍在思索著，去找尋一個沒有答案的答案。

name: Hades has many veils, one of those veils is really special. \nIs it because of the veil itself? No,the person who gave me the veil gave it a unique meaning.
value: 雖然哈迪斯有很多面紗，但這件在其中也屬於比較特殊的。\n難道是因為面紗本身？不不不，而是送給我面紗的人賦予了此面紗獨特的意義。

name: No one can escape her judgment, even if you are the king of hell. \nAfter forty-nine years, even the time is longer than this, Michael will not give up the trial of darkness.
value: 沒有人能逃避他的審判，即使你是地獄之王也不行。\n四十九年，即使時間比這更長，米迦勒也不會放棄對黑暗的審判。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}. {TARGET_NAME} is [Ignite], losing 6% of life per round for 4 rounds.
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【燃燒】，每回合損失6%生命，持續4回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}. {TARGET_NAME} is [Pierce] and DEF is decreased by 60%, lasts 2 rounds
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【擊破】，防禦力降低80%，持續4回合。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}. {TARGET_NAME} entered a [Frenzied] state, increasing its attack power by 300%, ignoring any abnormal effects, the normal attack must be a critical strike for 2 rounds.
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}的效果，{TARGET_NAME}進入【狂亂】狀態，新增300%攻擊力，無視任何异常效果，普通攻擊必定暴擊，持續2回合。

name: Open the treasure chest and choose one of the SSR angel exclusive limited Relics
value: 打開寶箱選擇其中一件SSR女神專屬聖物

name: Open the treasure chest and choose one of the SSR+ angel exclusive limited Relics
value: 打開寶箱選擇其中一件SSR+女神專屬聖物

value: 您由於非法操作，被禁言至：{0}（UTC+0）

name: The Storm dragon completely releases the power of the Thunder Dragon bloodline and enters a frantic state for 3 rounds, ignoring all abnormal effects. Also it increases her ATK by 300% and her normal attack must be Crit for 2 rounds.(Cannot be dispelled)
value: 龍女徹底釋放雷龍血脈的力量，進入狂亂狀態，無視任何异常效果，持續3回合。並使自身攻擊力提高300%，普通攻擊必定暴擊，持續2回合。（無法被驅散）

value: 2回合內普通攻擊必暴擊且免疫一切不良效果，攻擊力提高300%

name: Welcome back to Idle Angels, this is the gift we prepared for you.
value: 歡迎回來，為了您的回歸，我們準備了一份禮物

value: 點擊重新開始，在新服創角可獲得以下獎勵

name: GUILD_APPLE_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT_0
value: 很遺憾，您的【{0}】公會在金蘋果之戰未進入淘汰賽。這是參與獎勵，請查收。

value: 完成任務獲得活躍度，領取大獎

name: GUILD_APPLE_SHOP_BUY_LIMIT_TIPS
value: 該道具必須在上一屆金蘋果戰獲得{0}資格

name: It is said that the Ember Dragon is a girl who loves cleanliness. \nIt is true, she always easier to deal with the dust left by the enemy. \nIt's just that she is going to trouble the Storm Dragon again to clean the dust.
value: 據說，灰燼龍女也是一位愛乾淨的女孩子。\n的確如此，處理敵人剩下的灰塵往往是更加簡單的事情。\n只是又要麻煩風暴龍女了，怪不好意思的。

name: The Storm Dragon sometimes likes to send a resurgent warm breeze to Spring and send rainstorms to the thirsty land in time. \nBut if you are daring to blaspheme nature, the Storm Dragon will make you feel the most primitive horror.
value: 風暴龍女時而也喜歡為春天送來一陣復蘇的暖風，為乾渴的大地送去及時的暴雨。\n但是你要是敢褻瀆自然，龍女會讓你感受最原始的恐怖。

name: Collect Zodiac Ox Shards to summon Zodiac Ox
value: 集齊50個醜牛碎片可以召喚醜牛

name: Due to the effect of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} was [Sunder Armor] and her DEF was reduced by 50% for 2 rounds.
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【破甲】，防禦力降低50%，持續2回合。

name: Due to the effect of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} increases her STR by 25% for 2 rounds.
Due to the effect of {SKILL_NAME}, a random debuff on {TARGET_NAME} was dispelled.
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，驅散了{TARGET_NAME}身上隨機1個不利buff。

name: Due to the effect of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} increases her DEF, M.RES and P.RES by 30% for 3 rounds.
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}增加30%防禦力，30%物抗和30%魔抗，持續3回合。

name: [Sunder Armor] the enemy's DEF is reduced by 50% for 2 rounds
Increases DEF, M.RES and P.RES by 30% for 3 rounds.

The Zodiac Ox has inspiring power, launching a charge against 3 opponentss in the front row causing 250% physical damage, and putting it into the [Sunder Armor] state, reducing their DEF by 50%. All allies will also enter the state of [Excite], incease STR +25%. [Sunder Armor] and [Excite] last for 2 rounds.
value: 牛牛擁有鼓舞人心的力量，對敵方前排3人發起一次衝鋒，造成250%的物理傷害，並使其進入【破甲】狀態，防禦力降低50%。全體友軍也將進入【奮發】狀態，力量+25%。【破甲】和【奮發】持續2回合。

name: Clear a random debuff was dispelled, recover HP by 80% of Zodiac Ox's ATK . And all angels increase 30% DEF, 30% P.RES and 30% M.RES for 3 rounds.
value: 全體友軍獲得牛牛贈送的一杯新鮮牛奶，喝下後清除身上隨機一個減益效果。回復牛攻擊力80%的血量。且女神獲得防禦力30%，物抗30%，魔抗30%的提升，持續3回合。

name: Use it in Fashion to exchange Cupid's fashion.
value: 皮膚介面使用，可以兌換丘比特的皮膚。

name: During the Spring Festival event, the battlefield will drop off items and you can exchange items in the event fucntion.
value: 春節活動期間戰場掛機掉落，可以在活動介面兌換道具。

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_27
value: 全隊強力增益 全隊血量回復

name: Deals 250% P.DMG to 3 front enemies, and putting it into [Sunder Armor] state, reducing DEF by 50%. All allies will also enter the state of [Excite], ATK+25%. States last for 2 rounds.
value: 牛牛擁有鼓舞人心的力量，對敵方前排3人發起一次衝鋒，造成250%的物理傷害，並使其進入【破甲】狀態，防禦力降低50%。全體友軍也將進入【奮發】狀態，攻擊力+25%。【破甲】和【奮發】持續2回合。

name: Due to the effect of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} increases her ATK by 25% for 2 rounds.
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}增加25%攻擊力，持續2回合。

name: Total bonus percentage for all angels
value: 全體女神總加成百分比

name: Total bonus fixed value for all angels
value: 全體女神總加成固定值

name: Medusa, also called Gorgo, was one of the three monstrous Gorgons, generally described as winged human females with living venomous snakes in place of hair. Those who gazed into her eyes would turn to stone.
value: 居住在繞地環河彼岸的蛇發女妖，百怪之父福耳庫斯與刻托的女兒。戈耳工三姊妹中的小妹，名字涵義為皇后。\n美杜莎有著絕美的樣貌，但任何直望美杜莎雙眼的人都會變成石像，因此留下了赫赫凶名。

name: One of the twelve main Goddesses of Olympus, she is the Goddess in charge of the seas. Possessing infinite divine power, she can easily trigger storms and tsunamis, and often launch terrible wars when angered. \nShe is a Goddess that is full of ambition. She, together with Zeus and Hades, ruled the Sea, the Sky, and the Underworld respectively.
value: 奧林匹斯十二主神之一，掌管海洋的偉大神明。擁有無窮神力，能輕易引發風暴和海嘯，憤怒之下時常發動可怕的戰爭。\n同時她也是一位野心勃勃的主神，與宙斯、哈迪斯分別統治海洋、天空、冥界。

name: Joan of Arc was originally only human, but her legendary experiences and faith qualified her for godhood. \n Legend has it that when she was 13 years old, she met the angels Saint Michael, Saint Margaret and Saint Catherine under a large tree behind her village, and thus received a revelation from God. After suffering  unjust judgment, \n she was posthumously canonized as a Saint.
value: 貞德原本只是人類，但傳奇的經歷和信仰使她具備了神格。\n傳說她13歲時，在村後的大樹下遇見天使聖彌額爾、聖瑪加利大和聖加大肋納，從而得到天主的啟示。\n遭受非正義的審判後，被追封為聖女。

name: Siren was the daughter of the river god Ekrous, a beautiful fairy born from his blood. Due to her defeat by Muse in a music contest, her wings were removed by Muse, rendering her unable to fly.\nAfter losing her wings, she often transforms into a mermaid and lures nearby sailors to disaster with her enchanting music and singing voice.
value: 塞壬是河神埃克羅厄斯的女兒，是從他血液中誕生的美麗妖精。因與繆斯比賽音樂落敗而被繆斯拔去雙翅，從此無法飛翔。\n失去翅膀後常幻化為美人魚。用自己的音樂吸引過往的水手，使之遭受滅頂之災。

name: One of the nine pillar Goddesses of Heliopolis in ancient Egyptian mythology, and possesses  powerful divine powers. She was the daughter of Geb and Nuit and is the guardian deity of Lodgings & Death.\nShe often helped her sister, Isis, the Egyptian Goddess of Life, to raise her offspring, Horus, and saved Horus from danger many times.
value: 古埃及神話中赫裡奧波里斯的九柱神之一，神能強大，死者與房屋的守護神，同時她也是蓋布與努特的女兒。\n時常幫助其姐姐——埃及的生命女神伊西斯撫養其後代荷魯斯，曾數次救荷魯斯於危難之中。

name: One of the Three Great Goddesses in Japanese mythology. She symbolizes the deification of the moon, the Goddess in charge of the night, and the ruler of the lunar eclipse.\nShe was a compatriot of the Great Goddess Amaterasu, having  assisted her in knowing everything there is in the world. Later, due to an incident, she broke up with Amaterasu, and the Sun and the Moon have been separated ever since.
value: 日本神話中的三尊神之一，又名月讀，象徵月的神格化，掌管黑夜的神明，夜之食原的統治者。 \n與天照大神是同胞，神能上相對次之，曾輔佐其知曉世間萬事。後因事端與天照大神決裂，從此日月分離。

name: An important being in ancient Korean mythology, she was favored by the sun god Hwanung and took on a human form. As she had no husband, she prayed to Hwanung again under the sacred sandalwood tree, hoping to be blessed with a child. Impressed by her devotion, Hwanung took her as his wife, and she became the mother of Dangun, the founder of the Korean nation.
value: 朝鮮古代神話中的重要存在，受太陽神桓雄所眷顧而化身為人。因沒有丈夫，便於神檀樹下再次向桓雄祈禱，希望能傳遞子嗣。桓雄被其虔誠打動，後娶其為妻，成為朝鮮民族始祖檀君之母。

name: Shennong was China's Goddess in charge of medicine and agriculture, and was revered as one of the three ancient emperors.\nShe tasted all the herbs, taught mankind the art of healing poisons, and helped them overcome diseases; she even invented farming tools, diverted water, planted grains, and helped mankind overcome famine. She was a powerful divinity that symbolizes peace, harvest and wisdom.
value: 神農乃華夏掌管醫藥及農業之神，被尊為上古三皇之一。\n她嘗盡百草，教人類醫毒之術，助他們戰勝疾病；她更是發明了農具，引水種穀，助人類戰勝饑荒，其神能強大，象徵平和、豐收與智慧。

name: In ancient Egyptian mythology, Geb was the God of the Earth and one of the nine pillar Goddesses of Heliopolis.\nBecause she was inseparable from her sister Nuit, there was not enough space in the world for living. Thus, her father was ordered by the sun god to separate them.\nGeb was a powerful divinity, and is responsible for imprisoning evil souls to prevent sinners from entering heaven.
value: 古埃及神話中，赫裡奧波里斯九柱神之一的大地之神。\n因與妹妹努特形影不離而導致世間生物沒有生存的空間，其父親受太陽神的命令，將二人分開。\n神能強大，負責關押邪惡之人的靈魂，使罪人無法進入天堂。

name: It is rumored that Lilith was a woman created by God with clay, and Adam's first wife. She was the first woman in the world, and later, she left the Garden of Eden because of a conflict with Adam.\nAfter the famous War of Angels in the Garden of Eden, Lucifer was defeated, and Lilith followed Lucifer as they fell into hell together.
value: 傳聞莉莉絲是上帝用泥土創造的女人，亞當的第一個妻子，世界上第一個女人，後來她因為與亞當的矛盾而離開伊甸園。\n著名的伊甸園天使之戰結束後，路西法戰敗，莉莉斯繼而跟隨其一並落入了地獄。

name: Nuit was the Goddess of the Sky, the mother of the stars, the incarnation of the sky, and one of the nine pillar Goddesses of Heliopolis in ancient Egypt.\nNuit was also the God of Death, who provides air, water and food to the undead for their survival in the underworld. Therefore, Nuit was hailed as the Master of Everything.
value: 努特是古埃及的天空女神、眾星辰之母，是天空的化身，亦是赫裡奧波里斯九柱神之一。\n努特也是死亡女神，可以向亡靈提供空氣、水和食物，供其冥府生存之用。因此，努特又被譽為“萬物之主宰”。

name: The Goddeess of Earth in ancient Greek mythology, and the most prominent of all Gods.\nHer divinity was powerful and she occupies a very prominent position in the pantheon. She was the mother of the gods in ancient Greek mythology, and the one who created the primitive gods and the universe. She was the ancestor of all gods and humans.
value: 古希臘神話的大地女神，所有神靈中的顯赫之主。\n她神能強大，並且擁有非常顯德高望重的地位。是古希臘神話中的眾神之母，創造了原始神祇和宇宙萬有，某種程度上來說，時所有神靈和人類的始祖。

name: Pandora was a special being made of clay by the Fire God Hephaestus, and was given to humans as punishment for Prometheus' crime of stealing fire. She has a beautiful appearance and extraordinary charm.\nIn addition, she possesses a magic box gifted by Zeus, which will bring endless disasters to mankind if this box was to be opened.
value: 潘朵拉是火神赫菲斯托斯用粘土做成的特殊存在，送給人類作為對普羅米修士盜火的懲罰。她擁有著絕美的外表、非凡的魅力。\n此外，她有一個宙斯贈予的魔盒，在開啟之後，就會給人類帶來無盡的災難。

name: Nike was the Goddess of Victory in Greek mythology. She assisted Zeus to defeat the Titans and brought victory to the people.\nShe sometimes had wings and amazing speed, but otherwise possesses no other special powers. She was not only a symbol of victory in war, but also a messenger of good fortune.
value: 尼凱是希臘神話中的勝利女神，她曾協助宙斯戰勝提旦巨人，給人們帶來了勝利。她有時會帶有翅膀，擁有驚人的速度，但是除此之外並不具有其它特殊力量。她並不僅僅象徵戰爭的勝利，也同時是好運的代言人。

name: Idun is the goddess of youth in Nordic mythology and  the embodiment of youth and spring with a mysterious origin. She was responsible for the Golden Apple that keeps the gods youthful.\nIdun was once snatched away by a Giant, which made it impossible for the gods to obtain the apple of youth. When the gods began to age, it caused a huge panic in the gods' world.
value: 伊敦是北歐神話中的青春女神，負責掌管能讓諸神保持青春的黃金蘋果。她是青春與春天的化身，出身頗為神秘。\n伊登曾被巨人搶走，讓諸神沒法取得青春蘋果，當諸神開始老化時曾引起神界巨大的恐慌。

name: The female warriors in Norse mythology who are responsible for the tasks given by Odin. As the guides of heroes who died on the battlefield, they bring the dead into Valhalla, the Hall of Valor.\nThe most famous of them is Brunhild, the daughter of Odin, and her lover is the famous Nordic hero, Ziegrud.
value: 北歐神話中擔負奧丁所賦予任務的女戰士們。作為那些在戰場上陣亡英雄的指引人員，將戰死者帶入英靈殿瓦爾哈拉。\n她們之中最有名的是布倫希爾德——奧丁的女兒，她的愛人是北歐的著名英雄齊格魯德。

name: Raphael, the famous archangel, was a Dominion of the Second Sphere, the monarch of the Angels of Virtues, the guardian of the Life Tree in the Garden of Eden, and one of the seven angels before the throne of God.\nShe exercised all miracles of healing. In addition to curing people's sufferings, she also taught the knowledge and skills of building the ark to Noah's family.
value: 拉斐爾是著名的天使長，第二天的支配天使、力天使的君主，伊甸園生命之樹的守護者，神的御座前七天使之一。\n她行使一切治癒的神跡，除了治癒人的疾苦，還傳授蒙恩的諾亞一家建造方舟的知識與技巧。

name: Minotaur was a character in ancient Greek mythology. Because of the curse from the sea god Poseidon, she became the first-born monster with two horns.\nShe was powerful and guards the underground maze built by Daedalus. Everyone who walks into the maze will be attacked mercilessly.
value: 彌諾陶洛斯是古希臘神話中的人物，由於遭受了海神波塞冬的詛咒，而成為頭生雙角的魔物。\n她力量強大，守護代達羅斯建造的地下迷宮，據說每個走進迷宮中的人，都將會遭到無情地攻擊。

name: Nemesis was the cold and ruthless Goddess of Vengeance in Greek mythology, also known as the goddess of Ramnos.\nShe represents ruthless justice and will condemn those who are arrogant in front of the gods. Those who are cursed by her will fall into endless misfortune.
value: 涅墨西斯是希臘神話中冷酷無情的復仇女神，亦被稱為拉姆諾斯的女神。\n她代表無情的正義，會對在神祇座前妄自尊大的人施以天譴。被她所詛咒的人，都會陷入永無止境的厄運之中。

name: The Muses were the Goddesses of Poetry, Music and Art in Greek mythology. They often appear in gatherings of gods or heroes.\nMuses were usually divided into two generations. The elder Muse was the daughter of Uranus and Gaia, and the younger Muse was the daughter of Zeus and Monemosa.
value: 繆斯是希臘神話中的詩歌、音樂女神，是藝術的化身。她們常常出現在眾神或英雄們的聚會上。\n繆斯通常被分為長幼兩輩，長輩的繆斯為烏拉諾斯和蓋亞之女，後輩繆斯女神為宙斯和謨涅摩敘涅之女。

name: Iris was the incarnation of rainbow in the Greek mythology, and ancient people believed that she could connect heaven and earth. After the formation of the Olympian Pantheon, Iris was regarded as the liaison between gods and people. She conveys the will and commands of the gods to people.\nShe was Hera's envoy, but she merely executes Zeus' and Hera's orders, and her personal opinions play no part in her duties.
value: 彩虹的化身，古代人認為她能夠連結天和地。因此，奧林匹斯神系形成之後，伊裡斯被認為是神和人之間的連絡人，向人傳達眾神的旨意、命令和意志。\n她也是赫拉的使女，但她只執行宙斯和赫拉的命令，不參與個人意見。

name: She was the first god at the beginning of the universe and controlled the fate of all gods, including the twelve gods of Titan and the twelve main gods of Olympus. At the same time she also controlled the future of every mortal.\nHer divine power is extremely powerful, but adhering to her principle of not arbitrarily interfering with fate, she never shows her true power.
value: 她是宇宙混沌之初最早的神明，掌控著包含泰坦十二天神及奧林匹斯十二主神在內所有神的命運，同時也支配著每個凡人的未來。\n她的神能極其強大，但出於不隨意干涉命運的原則，不以真正實力示人。

name: Sif is the god of land and harvest in Norse mythology and the personification of harvest grains. She has beautiful blonde hair, which hangs from her head to her toes. People describe her blonde hair as a symbol of golden wheat or the gold buried in the ground.\nBecause of her outstanding beauty, she is considered one of most beautiful among the Norse gods, second only to Freya.
value: 希芙是北歐神話中的土地和收穫女神，是豐收五穀的人格化。她有著一頭漂亮的金髮，從頂垂到腳，人們形容她的金髮，象徵金黃的麥穗或是地裡的黃金。\n因為出色的美貌，她被譽為北歐女神中，繼芙蕾雅後最美的女神。

name: Lucifer was originally an angel in the Garden of Eden. Because she refused to submit to Adam, she led one-third of the angels in the heavens to rebel. But she was defeated in the battle of rebellion and became a demon.\nLater, she re-established a new order in hell and became the demon king in hell.
value: 路西法原本是伊甸園的一名天使，因為拒絕臣服于聖子亞當，因此率領天界三分之一的天使叛變。但在反叛之戰中戰敗，墮落為惡魔。\n後來，她在地獄重新建立了新的秩序，成為地獄裡的惡魔之王。

name: Nuwa was one of the originators of the Chinese civilization, and the Goddess of Blessings. She sculpted humans from clay, created human society, and established the marriage system.\nLater, when the sky collapsed and the earth sank, Nuwa melted the five-color stones to mend the sky. Thereafter, she was known as the Mother of Earth, and was a Goddess that was worshipped widely by mankind for millennia.
value: 女媧乃華夏民族人文先始，是福佑社稷之正神。其摶土造人，創造人類社會並建立婚姻制度。\n後因天塌地陷，女媧便熔彩石以補蒼天。因此，她被眾人稱為大地之母，是被人類廣泛而又長久崇拜的神。

name: Fuxi was the beginning of the humanities of the Chinese nation and she was one of the three ancient emperors with extremely powerful.\nShe created divination and Eight Trigrams based on the changes of heaven and earth. Also she created words to end the history of knotting the rope. After that, she taught the method of fishing and hunting to human, so she was highly respected by mankind.
value: 伏羲乃華夏民族人文先始，上古三皇之一，神能極其強大。\n她根據天地萬物之變，創造了占卜八卦，並創造文字結束了“結繩記事”之史。而後更是傳授人類漁獵之法，故而很受人類尊崇。

name: Xiwangmu was the supreme god of Taoism with powerful divine powers, living in Kunlun Mountain.\nXiwangmu harmonizes Yin and Yang, commands all spirits, and would bestow blessings and longevity to good men and women who live in the world. She was highly respected and deeply worshipped by all mankind. Every year on the birthday of the Xiwangmu, all gods gather in Yaochi to celebrate her birthday, which is called the Peach Feast.
value: 道教至高無上的女神，神能強大，居於昆侖。\n西王母調和陰陽，致召萬靈，常賜福賜壽於人間的善男信女，很受世人尊崇與信奉。每年至西王母誕辰，諸神集於瑤池，為其慶壽，乃世人所稱的蟠桃會。

name: A princess in ancient Korean mythology,  she was abandoned at birth and became immortal under the guidance of Sakyamuni.\nWhen she learned that her biological parents fell ill, she went to the immortal in Wu Mountain in order to ask for medicine which could bring them back to life. Later, she united with the immortal  who gave her the medicine and became the originator of the Korean Mudang, in charge of controlling life and death.
value: 古代朝鮮神話中的公主，出生時遭到遺棄，受釋迦牟尼指引而成聖。\n後來她得知親生父母生病，便去找巫山仙官求藥，讓父母起死回生。後來，她與仙官結合，成為了朝鮮族巫女的始祖，掌管生命與死亡。

name: Apep was the god of ancient Egypt, the incarnation of destruction, chaos, and darkness. She was the creator of eternal darkness.\nShe was the most powerful opponent of the Sun god Ra, and the war between these two was never stopped. Therefore, she was also named The Enemy of Ra and The King of Chaos.
value: 阿佩普是古埃及的神祇，破壞、混沌、黑暗的化身，世間陷入永久黑暗的締造者。\n她是太陽神拉最強大的對手，兩人之間的戰爭從未停止。因此她也被封為“拉之勁敵”和“混沌之王”。

name: Gabriel is a distinguished and noble Archangel responsible for sending messages to God. At the same time, she was also regarded as the Angel of Death and the Angel of Fire and Thunder. Her rank within the Angelic Host was the highest rank - Seraph.\nLegend has it that it was she who sounded the trumpet of the Last Judgment. She was considered a symbol of wisdom.
value: 加百列身份顯赫而高貴，她是負責為神傳訊息的天使長，同時，她也被視為死亡天使、火與雷的天使。其階位乃是最高階的熾天使。\n傳說末日審判的號角就是由她吹響的。她被認為“智慧”的象徵。

name: As a god in Greek mythology, Erebus is the guardian of the underworld, and the incarnation of darkness.\nTo be a gatekeeper means that she has to live in the darkness and witness those devastating souls descend from above. And every soul needs to pass through her territory before reaching the underworld.
value: 希臘神話中的一位神祇，冥土的守護者與黑暗的化身。\n她是大地與冥土之間的神，她所居住的地方，是冥土最黑暗之處，每個死者的靈魂在到達冥土之前，都需要先經過她的領地。

name: Amaterasu is the head of the three great gods in Japanese mythology, the ruler of Takamagahara, and the deification of the Sun.\nShe was born from the eye of Izanagi and is regarded as the most supreme god of Shintoism. She gave the food and silk products to Ame-no-Kumahito to manage, so that the world gained sericulture and arable grains.
value: 天照是日本神話裡的三尊神之首、高天原的統治者與太陽的神格化。\n她誕生于伊邪納岐的眼睛中，被奉為神道教最高神，日本最核心的神。她曾將食物與絲品交給天邑君管理，讓天下有了養蠶與可耕種的穀物。

name: Nyx is the god of night in Greek mythology, and one of the original creator gods. Her body is incarnation of night. She is the daughter of the god of chaos - aptly named Chaos, and the sister of the God of Earth, Gaia.\nShe resides in the shadowy palace at the entrance of the underworld, and every day, she leaves the underworld through the west gate, bringing night to the whole world.
value: 希臘神話中的黑夜女神，為原始創世神之一，夜的本體與化身。她是混沌之神—卡俄斯的女兒，大地之神蓋亞的姐妹。\n她居住在冥界入口處的陰暗宮殿中，她每天都要通過西門離開冥界，將夜幕降臨到整個世界。

name: Anubis is the God of Death in ancient Egypt and the guardian of the dead on their journey to the afterlife.\nShe is powerful, and having assisted Isis in the creation of mummies, she is also known as the God of Embalming. In the Weighing of Heart trial in the world of the dead, Anubis was responsible for measuring the weight of the hearts.
value: 古埃及的死神，是亡者在前往死後世界的旅途上的守護者。\n她神能強大，曾協助伊西斯製作出了木乃伊，又被稱為防腐之神。在亡者世界的“心臟重量”的審判中，阿努比斯擔任使用天平秤量的角色。

name: Odin was the king of the Aesir gods in Norse mythology. She was in charge of prophecy, kingship, wisdom, healing, magic, poetry, war and death.\nShe was the most powerful existence in Asgard's realm and possesses supreme power and strength, and wields a multitude of weapons, one of which is the Eternal Spear, Gungnir.
value: 北歐神話中阿薩神族的眾神之王，司掌預言、王權、智慧、治癒、魔法、詩歌、戰爭和死亡。她是阿斯加德神域最強大的存在，擁有無上的權力和力量，更擁有百發百中的神器——永恆之槍岡格尼爾。

name: Phantasos is one of the gods in Greek mythology. She possesses powerful divine powers, and is in charge of dreams. \nHer mother is Nyx, the God of Night. It is rumored that she is also one of the 3,000 offspring of the God of Sleep, Hypnos.
value: 希臘神話中的一位神祇，掌管夢境的神，具有強大的神能。\n她的母親是夜神倪克斯。據傳聞她也是睡神許普諾斯的三千位夢神子嗣之中的一位。

name: Ra was the Sun God in ancient Egyptian mythology and the head of the nine pillar gods of Heliopolis. She was the most important god in ancient Egypt.\nShe created all the lives of ancient Egypt by reciting each real name. Her divine powers were extremely powerful and she is one of Apep's opponents.
value: 古埃及神話中的太陽神，被視為正午的太陽，也是赫裡奧波里斯-九柱神之首，是古埃及最重要的神祇。\n她通過念出每個真名而創造了古埃及所有的生命，神能極其強大，阿佩普的對手之一。

name: She was considered to be the originator of Japanese Kagura dance and possesses powerful divine power.\nAfter the Great God Amaterasu hid in Amano-Iwato, the earth lost its light forever. The gods had no choice but to let Izu perform the Kagura dance in front of the door of Amano-Iwato. Eventually, Amaterasu heard the sound of the dancing and came out, thereby bringing light back into the world.
value: 她被認為是日本神樂舞蹈的發源者，具有強大的神能。\n當年天照大神躲進天岩戶後，大地永遠失去了光明。眾神不得已只能讓巫女在天岩戶的門前表演神樂，最終天照大神聞音而出，光明也再次降臨。

name: Hera was the third queen of Olympus in ancient Greek mythology and one of the wives of Zeus. She was Goddess of Marriage and Fertility, and one of the twelve gods of Olympus.\nShe was the incarnation of natural forces and possesses supreme divine power and authority in Olympus. Whenever she travels, she is accompanied by extremely powerful thunder and lightning.
value: 古希臘神話中的第三代天后，宙斯的妻子之一，婚姻與生育之神、奧林匹斯十二主神之一。\n她是自然力量的化身，在奧林匹斯擁有無上的權力和尊榮。每當她出行時都伴有雷霆閃電，神能極其強大。

name: Zhu Rong was the ancient god of fire with powerful divine powers. She reveals the light of heaven and earth and produces the five types of crops and wood. She passed the gift of fire to humans, so that everyone no longer needs to eat cold things, bringing great benefits to the people.\nZhu Rong wass also good at rhythm, and the music she composed is melodious and touching, so she was highly respected among the Chinese people.
value: 上古火神，神能強大，能昭顯天地之光明，生柔五穀材木。她將火種傳給人類，使眾人不再食生冷之物，可謂為民造福。\n祝融也擅音律，所譜之曲悠揚動聽，感人肺腑，在華夏民族間備受尊崇。

name: Hephaestus was God of Fire and Forging in ancient Greek mythology and one of the twelve gods of Olympus.\nHephaestus was known as the ancestor of craftsmen and was good at making various artifacts. It is said that her forging is what causes the earth to rumble, and volcanoes to erupt.\nDivine artifacts such as Zeus's Aegis and Eros's gold and silver arrows were all made by her.
value: 古希臘神話中的火神、鍛造之神，奧林匹斯十二主神之一。\n赫菲斯托斯被譽為工匠始祖，善於製造各種神器。據說當大地轟隆震響、火山噴發時，就是她在打鐵。\n宙斯的神盾，厄洛斯的金銀箭等神器都出自她手。

name: Xmas Angel was the heir of Santa Claus and succeeds Santa as the messenger of Christmas. She will quietly descend in front of your bed on Christmas Eve and leave behind gifts in Christmas stockings; She will also fight side by side with you against the freezing winter.
value: 聖誕女神是聖誕老人的繼承者，接替聖誕老人成為聖誕的使者。她不僅會在平安夜悄然降臨在你的床前，留下聖誕襪，還會和你並肩作戰，一起對抗天寒地凍的嚴冬。

name: Izanami was mother of all in Japanese mythology, with extremely powerful divine powers. Both Izanami and Izanagi can be called the creator gods in Japan. Also they were known as the Yomotsuōkami and the Chishikinoōkami.\nIn ancient times, she and Izanagi created the Great Eight Islands and the ancient gods. In a later time, she separated from Izanagi due to an incident in Yomi.
value: 日本神話中的萬象之母，神能極其強大，與伊邪那岐皆為日本的創世神之一，也被稱作黃泉津大神、道敷大神。\n上古時期，她與伊邪納岐一起創造大八島國以及上古諸神，後因黃泉事件與伊邪那岐決裂。

name: Cupid was god of love and eroticism, and the embodiment of love and hobbies. She was rumored to be the descendant of Venus and there are also rumors that she is actually Eros of Greek mythology.\nShe had two arrows: gold arrow shot into the heart will produce love; lead arrow shot into the heart will produce hatred.
value: 神話中的愛與情欲之神，愛情和愛好的化身，據傳聞丘比特是維納斯的後代。也有傳聞其實際上是希臘神話的厄洛斯。\n她擁有兩支箭，金制的箭矢射入人心會產生愛情，鉛制箭矢射入人心會則產生憎惡。

name: The king of the underworld in ancient Greek mythology had a divine power comparable to that of Zeus in Olympus.\nShe had strict discipline and manages the affairs of the underworld in an orderly manner. In ancient times, she, together with Zeus and Poseidon, overthrew the rule of the god King Cronus. Hades made great contributions to the birth of the Olympus Pantheon.
value: 古希臘神話中的冥王，在奧林匹斯中擁有著媲美宙斯的神能。\n她紀律嚴明，將冥界的交易處理的井井有條。遠古時代，曾與宙斯、波塞冬一起，推翻了神王克洛諾斯的統治，對奧林匹斯神系的誕生有著巨大貢獻。

name: In Greek mythology, Icarus is the descendant of Daedalus. When she and Daedalus used wax wings to escape from Crete Island, they flew too high and their wings were melted by the Sun, resulting in their fall into the water.\nThat legendary event deifies her, giving her divine abilities that mortals do not possess.
value: 希臘神話中代達羅斯的後代，與代達羅斯使用蠟造的翼逃離克里特島時，因飛得太高，雙翼遭太陽溶化從而跌落水中。\n其傳奇景裡使之神格化，具有了凡人不具備的神能。

name: Chaos was a primordial god of Greek mythology with powerful divine powers. She was also the embodiment of the original rules, time and space, and the beginning and creator of the world.\nIn addition, she was the first of the Greek Gods, carrier of boundlessness, and filled to the brim with both darkness and light.
value: 希臘神話中的原始神，神能非常強大。他也是原初秩序、時間和空間及載體本身，世界的開端及開始。\n此外，她還是無邊無際、充滿黑暗和光亮的載體，是希臘神域中的第一位神。

name: Heimdall was the watchman for the Norse gods. She needed little sleep and had keen senses, allowing her to see great distances and hear grass growing in the meadows.\nShe guarded the Rainbow Bridge at the entrance to the Nine Realms, which she swore to defend against invasion.
value: 北歐神話中彩虹橋的守護神，破曉之神。她有著敏銳深遠的眼光，能眼觀六路，無論白天黑夜都能看三百里遠，亦能耳聽八方。\n她日夜守護著天界入口的要道——彩虹橋，防禦冰霜巨人的侵襲，守護天界的安寧。

name: Michael is the chief warrior of the Garden of Eden, the brightest, highest and famous commander of the angel army. She was brave, resolute and full of compassion. She is the embodiment of absolute justice, without a trace of darkness.
value: 米迦勒是伊甸園的首席戰士、天使軍最高統帥，是最耀眼 、最著名的天使長。她性情勇猛果敢，雖然好戰，但是充滿慈悲心，對於罪惡的事抱持著絕對的否定與無情的殲滅。她是絕對正義的化身，毫無一絲黑暗。

name: Himiko is the queen of Yamatai during the Yayoi period of Japan and one of the famous shamaness.\n\nShe had mysterious powers and was the originator of the magecraft called Kidou in ancient Japan.The details of her life vary from source to source, and there is no mention of her life in primary historical records.
value: 卑彌呼是日本彌生時代邪馬台國的女王，也是著名巫女之一。\n她善用鬼道方術，神能強大，是日本古代宗教鬼道教的發源者。其身世多變，在各大歷史記載中也沒有明確的說法。

name: Enmusubi was one of the gods of Takamagahara. According to rumors, she was the younger sister of the Amaterasu God and it meant that she was a young Goddess of Sun among the Yamato gods.\nThere was no clear statement about her life experience and there were even rumors that she was the one who hid in Amano-Iwato, and not the Amaterasu.
value: 緣結神是高天原的神明之一，又名稚日霎命，據傳聞是天照大神的胞妹，大和神系年輕的太陽女神。\n其身世沒有明確的說法，甚至有傳聞當年躲入天岩戶的其實是她，而非正統神史所言的天照大神。

name: Frost Dragon is the embodiment of frost and winter. Nothing is known of her origins. Although she is not a god, her powers rival theirs.\nInhabiting the 10,000-year-old snow-capped mountains, there are times when occasionally lost climbers could see her, and they tell of her legend to this day.
value: 她的出身與背景不為人知，是冰霜與寒冬的化身，其本身並非神明，但擁有著足以和神明匹敵的力量。\n棲息于冰雪封堵的萬年雪山之中，偶爾有迷路的登山者得見，並講述她的傳奇。

name: Ember Dragon is the embodiment of anger and flame. Nothing is known of her origins. Although she is not a god, her powers rival theirs.\nShe inhabits a volcanic crater that is still active since ancient times. Due to its inaccessibility, few people have seen it with their own eyes.
value: 她的出身與背景不為人知，是憤怒與烈焰的化身，其本身並非神明，但擁有著足以和神明匹敵的力量。\n棲息於遠古時期至今還活躍的火山口，由於人跡罕至，極少被人類發現。

name: Storm Dragon is the embodiment of powerful thunderstorms. Nothing is known of her origins. Although she is not a god, her powers rival theirs.\nShe inhabits a remote region of the sea, an area clouded in dense thunderstorms year-round. Many voyagers claim that praying to Storm Dragon grants her protection from the ravages of stormy seas
value: 她的出身與背景不為人知，是暴雨與雷電的化身，其本身並非神明，但擁有著足以和神明匹敵的力量。\n棲息于常年被雷雨覆蓋的大海盡頭，在航海者中有不少人認為對她的信仰可以保護自身不受風暴的影響。

name: Originally from the second Ox in the Twelve Earthly Branches of the Chinese God. She was not a god but for some reason she possessed an extremely terrifying power.\nThere are rumors that her powerful abilities were caused by the chaos in time and space. But this claim had no actual basis, and her life experience has always been a mystery.
value: 原出自于華夏神系“十二地支”中第二位的“牛”，其本身並非神明，但不知什麼原因具備了異常恐怖的神能。\n有傳聞說她的強大能力是時空出現了錯亂而導致的，但此說法並沒有實際依據，其身世一直是個謎。

name: Used to activate a 7-day trial of the Main Character's Honor Limited skin
value: 使用後啟動主角榮耀限定皮膚7天試用

name: Randomly obtain 1 angel's limited relic
value: 隨機獲得1件女神專屬聖物

name: Master and assist have additional bonuses in rewards
value: 會長和副會長獎勵有額外加成

name: During the Cherry Blossom Festival, the battlefield will drop off items and you can exchange items on the event.
value: 櫻花節活動期間戰場掛機掉落，可以在活動介面兌換道具。

name: HONOR_ARENA_NOT_OPEN
value: 榮耀競技場下週一開放

name: SUMMON_PLACE_REWARD_TIPS
value: 必出時每個結果概率=該結果概率/該必出結果類型總概率

name: Advancement requires the same Relic with SR+ quality
value: 進階需要同1個品質為SR+的同樣聖物

name: HONOR_ARENA_WORSHIP_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 您在榮耀競技場膜拜了冠軍，獲得了一些獎勵

name: HERO_GOD_AWAKE_MAX
value: 女神神性覺醒已達最大

name: HERO_GOD_AWAKE_TIPS
value: 需要普通覺醒達到<color=red>{0}</color>星才可神性覺醒，現在星數<color=green>{1}</color>

name: This shard can be used to upgrade the quality of angels in divine awakening
value: 此碎片可在神性覺醒中用於提升女神品質

name: Make all teammates into [Encourage], increase DEF by 100% of Hera’s DEF and increase ATK by 70% of Hera’s ATK, increase P.RES and M.RES by 30% for 3 rounds. Then dispel all debuffs on 2 highest ATK on team.
value: 使我方全體進入鼓舞狀態，防禦力增加赫拉防禦力的100%，攻擊力增加赫拉攻擊力的70%，物抗和魔抗增加赫拉的物抗和魔抗的30%，持續3回合；並且驅散我方攻擊力最高2名女神的所有不良狀態。

name: Deals 160% M.DMG to 6 enemies. If the enemy's ATK is lower than Hera, DMG will be doubled. All teammates will be [Illuminated] by the Supreme Glory, increase 20% of HP healing for 1 round. Then healing 2 angels with lowest HP by 65% of Hera’s ATK and dispel all debuffs on team.
value: 對敵方6名造成160%的法術傷害，如果敵方最大攻擊力低於赫拉，則傷害翻倍，且友方全體受到至高榮光的照耀，治療量增加20%，持續1回合。隨後對我方血量比例值最低的2名女神回復赫拉攻擊力65%的血量，同時驅散我方所有不良狀態。

name: ATK+10%\nDEF+15%
value: 攻擊力增加10%，防禦力增加15%

name: Debuff RES +50%\nP.RES&M.RES +10%
value: 異常抗性增加50%，物抗增加10%，魔抗增加10%

name: ATK+35%\nDEF+35%
value: 攻擊力增加35%，防禦力增加35%

name: [Encourage], increase DEF by 100% of Hera’s DEF and increase ATK by 70% of Hera’s ATK, increase P.RES and M.RES by 30% for 3 rounds.
value: 3回合內【鼓舞】，防禦力增加赫拉防禦力的100%，攻擊力增加赫拉攻擊力的70%，物抗和魔抗增加赫拉物抗魔抗的30%

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_28

name: She was a very ordinary monster originally, but for some reason she possessed a powerful godhead. Although the power is amazing,  her character is surprisingly naive. \nNekomata are mostly born by resentment. But according to her saying that the owner before she was promoted to a god was a gentle and upright human shows her power comes more from love and kindness.
value: 她原本是極為普通的妖怪，不知為何擁有了強大的神格。雖然力量驚人，但性格卻意外地天真。\n貓又大多生於怨恨，但據她所言自己升格為神明前的主人是一位溫柔正直的人類，所以她的力量更多源於愛與善念。

name: In Norse mythology, she is a goddess associated with love, war, magic and fertility. \nShe is gentle and kind, and her beauty is second to none among the Nordic gods. Often, as the leader of war goddesses, she chooses brave warriors for Valhalla in various Nordic war battlefields.
value: 她是北歐神話中愛情、戰爭與魔法之神，同時也是生育與豐饒之神。\n她性情溫和而仁慈，美貌更是在眾多北歐神明中首屈一指。但她也經常作為女武神的統率者，奔走於北歐各大戰場，為英靈殿挑選英勇的戰士。

name: The bell on the bow are making a jingle sound gracefully, and gradually it's getting closer and closer. \n deliberately trying to avoid this gentle trap. Your eyes start to drift away. But these are all illusions.
value: 蝴蝶結上的鈴鐺正在優雅的發出叮叮噹當的聲音，漸漸的聲音越來越近。\n刻意的想回避這溫柔陷阱，你眼神開始變得游離，卻都是假像。

name: Deals 400% P.DMG to 1 enemy and has 70% chance to [Freeze] the enemy for 1 round. If freeze successfully, the enemy enters [Frostbite] and [Bleed] state, which decrease speed by 30 and prevent all healing effects for 2 rounds

name: Originally, She was not a traditional god in Yamato mythology. But derived from the belief and worship of mankind to her, she has a strong godhead and power. \nHer birth and past have always been a mystery, but she has always coordinated the relationship between humans, natural gods and monsters with her own power.
value: 她原本並非大和神話中的傳統神明，但源自於人類對她的信仰和崇拜，使得她具有了強大的神格與力量。\n她的誕生與過往一直是個迷，但她始終以自己的力量協調著人類與自然神明、妖怪之間的關係。

name: It is said that she came from the moon and was demoted to the mortal world for unknown reasons. From the godhead she possesses, she does possess a powerful divine power beyond the reach of mortals. \nAlthough she looks mild, she has a bright mind and a shy personality, which adds a touch of mystery to her.
value: 傳聞她自月亮而來，因不明原因被貶入凡間，從所具備的神格看，她確實擁有凡人所不能及的強大神力。\n雖然外表看上去性情溫和，但由於擁有聰慧的頭腦和不愛見外人的羞怯性格，反而為她增加了一絲神秘感。

name: SHOW_TWO_OK_DIALOG_TEXT
value: 當前女神已滿星，是否繼續召喚？

name: Deals 220% P.DMG to 6 enemies. If enemy's HP is higher than 50%, then double DMG is inflicted; After attack if enemy's HP is lower than 50%, then it will be affected by [Ignite] for 2 rounds. If an enemy is killed, Icarus enters the state of [Original God], which increases her ATK by 50% and Crit DMG by 50% for 2 rounds (can not be dispelled).
value: 對敵方6名造成220%的物理傷害，如果目標生命值高於50%，則傷害加倍；攻擊後如果目標生命值低於50%，則使其進入燃燒狀態，持續2回合。此技能殺死敵人，伊卡璐斯進入【初神】狀態，攻擊力增加50%，暴擊傷害增加50%，持續2回合。（不可驅散）

name: Deals 220% P.DMG to 6 enemies, if enemy's HP is lower than 50%, then double DMG is inflicted; If the enemy's HP is still higher than 50% after the attack, then it will be affected by [Pierce], lowering P.RES and M.RES by 50% for 2 rounds. If no enemies are killed, Icarus enters the state of [God's Fury], which deals an additional 300% P.DMG to the 1 enemy with the lowest HP.
value: 對敵方6名造成220%的物理傷害，如果目標生命值低於50%，則傷害翻倍；如果攻擊後目標生命值高於50%，則使其進入破碎狀態，魔抗物抗降低50%，持續2回合。此技能未殺死敵人，伊卡璐斯觸發【神怒】，對敵方生命值最低1名敵人額外造成300%物理傷害。

value: 棲息于常年被雷雨覆蓋的大海盡頭，擁有操縱風暴的神秘力量，是速度與威力的象徵。

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_38
value: 超高護盾 高強虛弱 持續增益

name: All teammates (except Sim Cheong) receive a non-dispellable shield equal to 50% of Sim Cheong's current HP that lasts for 1 round. Inflicts [Weaken] effect on the enemy with the highest ATK (cannot be dispelled), decreasing their ATK by 50% of Sim Cheong'
value: 給自己以外的全體友軍施加沈青兒當前生命值50%的不可驅散護盾，護盾持續1回合。對敵方最高攻擊力的1名敵人施加【虛弱】，降低沈青兒攻擊力50%的攻擊力，持續2回合。

name: Give [blessing] to 2 teammates with highest ATK (except Sim Cheong), which increases these 2 teammates' ATK by 20%, Crit DMG by 15% and DEF by 10%, and the effects lasts until the battle ends. These effects can be superimposed (up to 5 times)
value: 給我方除自己以外的最高攻擊力的2名女神給予【祝福】，攻擊力提升20%，暴擊傷害提升15%，防禦力提升10%，持續到戰鬥結束，此效果可疊加（最多5層）。

name: All teammates add a non-dispellable shield of Sim Cheong's 60% current HP for 1 round. If the speed of Sim Cheong is higher than the enemy with the highest ATK, Cheong will apply [strongly weaken] to this enemy, which decrease the enemy's ATK by 30% for 1 round (cannot be dispelled); and apply [weaken] to 2 enemies with highest ATK, which decrease 2 enemies' ATK by Sim Cheong's 50% ATK for 2 rounds. ([strongly weaken] [weaken] can be superimposed)
value: 給自己以外的全體友軍施加沈青兒當前生命值60%的不可驅散護盾，護盾持續1回合。當沈青兒速度大於敵方攻擊力最高的敵人，為其施加【強虛弱】，攻擊力降低30%，持續1回合，無法被驅散；對敵方最高攻擊力的2名敵人施加【虛弱】，降低沈青兒攻擊力50%的攻擊力，持續2回合。（【強虛弱】【虛弱】可疊加）

name: Give [blessing] to all teammates (except Sim Cheong), which increases all teammates' ATK by 25%, Crit DMG by 20% and DEF by 15%, and the effects lasts until the battle ends. These effects can be superimposed (up to 5 times)
value: 給我方除自己以外的全部女神給予【祝福】，攻擊力提升25%，暴擊傷害提升20%，防禦力提升15%，持續到戰鬥結束，此效果可疊加（最多5層）。

name: ATK+25%, Crit DMG+20% and DEF+15%, which lasts until the battle ends.

value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}獲得了25%攻擊力，20%暴擊傷害，15%防禦力提升。

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} enter [weaken] state, which decrease ATK by Sim Cheong's 60% ATK for 1 rounds.
value: 因{SKILL_NAME}效果，{TARGET_NAME}被【虛弱】，1回合內降低沈青兒攻擊力60%的攻擊力。

name: Whether the future holds misery or joy, the change it brings adds color to our lives.\nRegardless of what comes our way, the power of my red lotus will protect my friends for as long as they live.
value: 對未來已不會恐懼，不論是悲慘的還是歡樂的，都將為平靜的人生添加彩色。\n意外和驚喜不論哪個先來，紅蓮力量都會為我的朋友們保駕護航，直到我們都漸漸老去。

name: According to Korean legends, creatures can be sacrificed to water monsters in exchange for peace. For this reason, Sim Cheong sacrificed herself in this way to save her father.\nThe gods were moved by this, so they used the lotus flower as a medium to reshape her body. They also transformed her noble belief into a divine power.
value: 大韓的傳說中，有將生靈獻祭水怪從而換得平安的說法。沈青兒為了救父親，甘願犧牲自己獻祭水怪的壯舉感動了神明。\n神明以蓮花為媒介，重塑了她的身體，並將其崇高信念升格為足以和眾神相抗衡的強大神力。

name: All teammates (except Sim Cheong) add a non-dispellable shield of Sim Cheong's 50% current HP for 1 round. Inflict [weaken] effect to the enemy with the highest ATK (can not be dispelled), which decrease the enemy's ATK by Sim Cheong's 50% ATK for 1 round.
value: 給自己以外的全體友軍施加沈青兒當前生命值50%的不可驅散護盾，護盾持續1回合。對敵方最高攻擊力的1名敵人施加不可驅散的【虛弱】，降低敵方攻擊力，降低值為沈青兒攻擊力的50%，持續1回合。

name: All teammates (except Sim Cheong) add a non-dispellable shield of Sim Cheong's 60% current HP for 2 round. Inflict [weaken] effect to 2 enemies with the highest ATK (can not be dispelled), which decrease the enemies' ATK by Sim Cheong's 60% ATK for 1 round.
value: 給自己以外的全體友軍施加沈青兒當前生命值60%的不可驅散護盾，護盾持續2回合。對敵方最高攻擊力的2名敵人施加不可驅散的【虛弱】，降低敵方攻擊力，降低值為沈青兒攻擊力的60%，持續1回合。

name: Deals 220% M.DMG to 6 enemies and has 55% chance to [freeze] enemies which will render enemies unable to move for 1 round; Frost Dragon will cause additional 12% real damage of her current HP to enemies who are affected by [Freeze], and make them enter [frostbite] state, which will decrease speed by 100 and lose 5% of self max HP every round, lasts for 3 rounds.
value: 對6名敵人造成220%的法術傷害，並有55%的幾率使其進入【冰凍】狀態，不能行動，持續1回合；如果冰凍成功或處於冰凍狀態，則對其造成冰霜龍母當前生命值12%的真實傷害，且進入【凍傷】狀態，降低100點速度，每回合損失5%的最大生命值，持續3回合。

name: Apply ice armor to all teammates for 2 rounds, which increases P.RES by 100% and the damage rebound by 40% and it has 55% chance to freeze the attacker for 2 rounds when receive basic attack. Under this state, Frost Dragon reduces DMG taken by 90% and heals 20% of max HP every round, lasts for 2 rounds. ([Hibernation] can not be dispelled)
value: 給我方全體施加2回合冰甲狀態，使其物抗增加100%，傷害反彈增加40%，並且受到普通攻擊時有55%的幾率凍結攻擊者2回合。技能釋放後，冰霜龍母進入【冬眠】狀態，【凍結】自己並無法行動，同時受到的所有傷害降低90%，每回合回復20%的最大生命值，持續2回合。（冬眠不可驅散）

value: 3回合【凍傷】，每回合損失自身5%的最大生命值。

value: 2回合，每回合回復20%自身最大生命值。

name: ACTIVE_WISH_BUTTON_TIPS_ARTIFACT
value: 打造和吞噬神器可獲得積分

name: SSR+ angel optional, special for return
Hey sister, your face looks like you deserve to get your teeth kicked in. I guess you come for fighting, is it?
value: 姐姐，你的表情很欠揍啊，我猜你是來找我們打架的吧？

name: I thought you would put in your place after waking up in this world, but it seems I'm wrong.
value: 我以為你在這個世界蘇醒後能安分些，不過看來我想多了。

name: Er? Wait... It looks like... Sister, you have awakened a new power?
value: 嗯？等等……看上去……姐姐你覺醒了全新的力量？

name: It is true, but I still don't know how powerful this power is.
value: 的確如此，但我還不清楚這力量究竟有多強大。

name: You'll know when you are beaten up by your two little sisters! !
value: 等你被兩個妹妹痛揍一頓後就知道啦！！

name: Ouch...I know I was wrong, can you release me from the ice...?
value: 哎喲……我知道錯了，能不能把我們從冰裡面放出來……？

name: It's amazing. I must study the source of this power when I have time...
value: 真是驚人，我有時間一定要好好研究這力量的來源……

name: I can feel that this is not the limit of this power...
value: 我可以感受到，這並非此力量的極限……

name: I think so too, sister. You need to find other gods to try.
value: 我也這麼認為，姐姐你需要找其他神明試試。

name: I thought of a few right guys...
value: 我想到幾個合適的傢伙了……

name: Oh, my dear, I thought you couldn't wake up in the ice sea.
value: 啊啦……親愛的，我以為你凍在冰海裡醒不過來了。

name: Your lame jokes have already made me boring. I am not here to hear these.
value: 你的冷笑話已經塊讓我犯困了，我可不是來聽你說這些的。

name: What's up? I guess you have someone you like and want me to shoot an arrow for you?
value: 有什麼事嗎？難不成是有喜歡的人，想讓我幫你射一箭？

name: Or you came to learn ways to live forever?
value: 還是說，是來找我尋求永生之法的？

name: No, I just want to try my new awakening power .
value: 不，我只不過想試一下自己覺醒的新力量而已。

name: Mm...Although we ended in a draw in the past, for now, we indeed can not win.
value: 呵……即使曾經不分勝負，但現在我們確實不是你的對手。

name: Ahchoo! This power seems to be able to turn the hot desert of Egypt into an ice field...
value: 阿嚏！這力量仿佛能把埃及熾熱的沙漠，變成冰原一般……

name: So our icy beauty, what bad things are you going to do, by this powerful divine power?
value: 於是我們的冰山美人，準備用這強大的神力做什麼壞事呢？

name: I don’t know. For the first time, I felt a sense of emptiness more indifferent than Frost...
value: 我也不知道，我頭一次感受到比寒冰還冷漠的空虛感……

name: From the fate of love, perhaps you should ask the human who helped you awaken.
value: 從愛情的命運來看，你或許該去問問幫你覺醒的那個人類。

name: [Ice armor] state for 2 rounds, which increases P.RES by 100% and the damage rebound by 40% and it has 55% chance to freeze the attacker for 2 rounds when receive basic attack.
value: 2回合內冰甲狀態，物抗增加100%，傷害反彈增加40%，受到普通攻擊時55%幾率凍結攻擊者2回合

name: Item which is needed in leveling up general talent
value: 主天賦升級所需要的材料

name: Item which is needed in leveling up warrior talent
value: 戰士天賦升級所需要的材料

name: Item which is needed in leveling up mage talent
value: 法師天賦升級所需要的材料

name: Item which is needed in leveling up archer talent
value: 射手天賦升級所需要的材料

name: Defeat the gatekeeper and surpass yourself through challenges
value: 擊敗守關BOSS，在一層又一層的挑戰中突破自己

name: Open the chest and choose one of SSR+ angels (Chaos/Ra/Hera/Cupid)
value: 打開寶箱選擇【卡俄斯、拉、赫拉、丘比特】其中一個SSR+女神

name: The enemy looks ordinary
value: 看起來普普通通的敵人

name: The enemy seems to be afraid of pain and will continue to heal himself
value: 敵人貌似很怕痛，將會不斷釋放治癒自己

name: The enemy has highly individual damage. But it doesn't seem to be that simple
value: 高單體傷害的敵人，但貌似也沒那麼簡單

name: The enemy will deal a deadly strike to our teammates in back row, please pay attention to protect
value: 敵人對我方後排友軍將會造成致命打擊，請注意防護

name: Please protect all our teammates. Don't let the enemy smell blood
value: 請保護我方所有的友軍，不要讓敵人聞到鮮血的味道

name: Welcome to the paradise of fire and be ready for the flame strike.
value: 歡迎來到火之樂園，準備迎接烈焰風暴的洗禮

name: Toxic paradise, please quickly kill or effectively resist the enemy toxins. Do not go on fighting.
value: 強毒樂園，請快速擊殺或有效抵禦敵方毒素，不要戀戰

name: The enemy has a skill of highly individual damage, and will be even more tough by the time. Pay attention to kill it quickly
value: 敵人擁有單體高傷害技能，且會越戰越勇，注意快速擊殺

name: High area effect damage, but the enemy's actions are more likely to be restricted.
value: 範圍型高傷害，但敵人的行動更容易被限制。

name: Your enemies also know well that To kill a snake, you must cut off its head first. Watch for their targeted tactic.
value: 擒賊先擒王，敵人也深知，攻擊將會針對我方攻擊力最高女神。

name: The enemy's defense is unassailable, restrict the enemy as much as possible
value: 敵人的防禦堅不可破，盡可能限制敵人

name: The tower of career trials is opened. A lot of essence can be obtained from career trials, which can be used to upgrade career talents. Come and have a look!
value: 職業試煉之塔開啟了，職業挑戰獲得大量精華，可以用來升級職業天賦，快來看看把！

name: The new talent system is open. Use the essence to strengthen the angels' career talents, and make your angels more powerful!
value: 全新的天賦系統開啟，使用精華強化英雄的職業天賦，讓自己的英雄變得更加強大吧！

name: Glaive/Arrow/Magic Tower
value: 巨刃之塔/秘術之塔/箭雨之塔

name: Apply ice armor to all teammates for 2 rounds, which increases P.RES by 100% and the damage reflection by 40% and it has a 55% chance to freeze the attacker for 2 rounds when receiving basic attack. When the skill is released, Frost Dragon enters [hibernation] state which she can not release skills. Under this state, Frost Dragon reduces DMG taken by 90% and heals HP equals to her 100% ATK every round, lasts for 2 rounds. ([Hibernation] can not be dispelled)
value: 給我方全體施加2回合冰甲狀態，使其物抗增加100%，傷害反彈增加40%，並且受到普通攻擊時有55%的幾率凍結攻擊者2回合。技能釋放後，冰霜龍母進入【冬眠】狀態，【凍結】自己並無法行動，同時受到的所有傷害降低90%，每回合治療自己攻擊力100%的生命值，持續2回合。（冬眠不可驅散）

name: Humans suffer so much frustration and betrayal in romance. I wonder if they still believe in love.
value: 人類經歷了這麼多的挫折和背叛，我不知道他們是否還相信愛情。

name: Do you have a crush on a special someone? Would you like for me to use one of my arrows to make her fall in love with you?
value: 即使身份有別，凡人與神明也應當擁有相愛的權力！

name: Do you have a crush on a special someone? Would you like for me to use one of my arrows to make her fall in love with you?
value: 嘻嘻……你有喜歡的女孩子嗎？要不要給她一箭，讓她也喜歡上你？

name: Humans always think that power and money can buy them anything. But that's not the case with love.
value: 人類好像總以為靠權力或金錢就能得到一切，遺憾的是愛情並非如此。

name: Being a god of love is also quite boring. I also want to have an unforgettable date!
value: 作為愛神也挺無聊的，我也想來一場令人難忘的約會啊！

name: I like lilies very much. It can symbolize purity and loyalty more than ever in the world.
value: 我很喜歡百合這種花，世間再無比它更能象徵純潔和忠貞的存在了。

name: According to prophecy, I will marry a very powerful person who lusts after women.
value: 我聽預言說，將來我會嫁給一個非常強大但也非常花心的傢伙？

name: Want to visit my private garden? Even if the end of the world comes, I have a quiet place of my own.
value: 想參觀我的後花園麼？就算世界末日降臨，我也有一片自己的安靜之地呢。

name: The flames of war give my flowers an especially attractive glow.
value: 呵呵……花朵在戰火燃燒的映襯下……才顯得格外地有魅力呐。

name: Since I lost my divine power and memory, it seems that the whole world doesn't care about me anymore.
value: 自從我失去神力和記憶後，仿佛全世界都不在意我了一般。

name: Mortals are pitifully weak. Yet history has proven their resilience time and time again.
value: 我以為凡人的力量不過是渺小的存在，但事實證明，要戰勝他們並非易事。

name: I still have a fear of flying. Maybe I should give up using these wings?
value: 我依舊對飛翔有所恐懼，或許我應當放棄使用這雙翅膀？

name: According to some, ignorant people are often fearless. Do you agree that bravery is rooted in ignorance?
value: 人們常說無知者無畏，你覺得因為無知產生的勇敢有意義嗎？

name: Truth is deceptively alluring. Though we know we will never understand it, we still pursue it with voracious curiosity.
value: 真理是一種奇特的存在……你知道自己永遠無法理解，卻還會堅定地追求它。

name: Wonderful art is like an clever invention. Both are products of great imagination and creativity. Don't you agree?
value: 美妙的藝術總是伴隨著偉大的想像和創造，你不這麼覺得嗎？

name: Sculpture is a passion of mine. No matter my mood, it always calms me down.
value: 雕塑創作是我最感興趣的事，不管你心情如何，它總能讓你平靜下來。

name: I still can't figure out what distinguishes gods from the rest of creation...
value: 我始終想不通，人類與神明到底有什麼不同……

name: I used to spend a long time in my lair, and no one can understand that feeling of loneliness...
value: 我曾經在自己的巢穴裡度過了漫長歲月，沒人能體會那種孤獨感……

name: I don't agree with war, because war will always bring endless disasters to this world...
value: 我不認同戰爭，因為戰爭總會給這個世界帶來無休止的災難……

name: Want to know my sisters of the same race? They seem to have awakened in this disaster.
value: 想瞭解我同族的姐妹嗎？她們似乎也隨著這場災難蘇醒了呢……

name: Humans are eager for eternal life like gods. This is actually not difficult to do. Do you want to try it?
value: 人類都渴求如同神明一樣永恆的生命，這其實並不難做到，想試試嗎？

name: Most humans think that I am just a cold and merciless god. Do you think so too?
value: 大多數人類，都認為我只是個冰冷而無情的存在，你也這麼想嗎？

name: You seem to be available. Would you like to spend a long night with this lonely lady?
value: 喲……你挺閑的嘛，有沒有興趣陪寂寞的女士度過漫漫長夜？

name: Is it really that important for someone to tell the truth?
value: 一個人說的話是謊言還是真實，真的那麼重要嗎？

name: Do you prefer day or night?
value: 你更喜歡白天還是黑夜？

name: In my opinion, humans worry too much about good and evil when deciding how to act. What really matters their intention and conviction.
value: 人類糾結所行之事的善惡，在我看來其實意義並不大，你覺得呢？

name: When faced with a difficult decision, do you rely more on intuition or rational analysis?
value: 你在處理各種麻煩的時候，更依賴直覺的判斷，還是更相信理智的分析？

name: Movies are one of the most wonderful inventions of human civilization. Do you love watching movies? Which do you prefer, comedy or tragedy?
value: 電影真是人類文明的偉大產物，你愛看電影嗎？更偏愛喜劇還是悲劇？

name: The moonlight is pretty tonight, isn't it?
value: 今晚月色挺美的，不是嗎？

name: I am not afraid of this war, I hope to end it with you.
value: 我並不會畏懼這場戰爭，我希望和你一起親手結束它。

name: I like gentle animals like rabbits very much, how about you?
value: 我很喜歡兔子這種溫順的動物，你呢？

name: If one day, I have to go back to the moon, would you like to go with me?
value: 如果有一天……我必須要回到月亮上去，你願意與我同行麼？

name: I actually don't want to be a god, because eternal life is too heavy for me...
value: 我其實並不想成為神明般的存在，永恆的生命對於我而言太沉重了……

name: It's a boring and deserted night. When I was lonely in the past, I would always sing a nursery rhyme to relieve boredom.
value: 無聊而冷清的夜晚呢，過去我感到孤獨時，總會唱一曲童謠解解悶。

name: What do the battlefield horns inspire?
value: 從戰場的號角聲中，你能聽到什麼？

name: As long as I can fight, the enemy will never set foot inside the city gate.
value: 只要我沒倒下，敵人就永遠無法踏入城門。
