name: There is always someone we want to protect. This is true for everyone.
value: 不管是誰，都會有自己想守護的人存在。

name: You almost died in the previous battle! How can you be so reckless!
value: 之前的戰鬥你差點沒命！怎麼可以這麼莽撞！

name: I'm afraid it will be difficult to recover the divine power I lost...
value: 我丟失的神力恐怕難以恢復了……

name: You are too young to be a ruler! If I were you, I'd be desperate to gain experience and mature as quickly as possible.
value: 作為統治者你太年輕了！你需要不顧一切讓自己積累經驗，並儘快成熟起來！

name: I see little distinction between gods and mortals. Gods are just more powerful versions of humans.
value: 我從來不認為神與人有什麼差別，神明不過是強大的人類罷了！

name: War is glorious in its own way. I am not afraid of war at all, nor do I deny its importance.
value: 戰爭是一種榮耀，我絲毫不畏懼戰爭，也不否認戰爭的重要性！

name: Do you think it is weird for a miko, or shrine maiden, to wear a samurai costume?
value: 嗯……你會覺得一名巫女穿上武士的裝束很奇怪嗎？

name: Ever since I was reincarnated in this world, I have spent each day thinking about eventually restoring the country of Yamatai.
value: 自從轉生在這個世界後，我無時不刻都在想著有朝一日能重新光復邪馬台……

name: Do you think I am too serious for a woman? Does it make me less feminine?
value: 你……會覺得我太嚴肅而不像一個女孩子麼……

name: The more powerful the force, the more dangerous it is, and so is the storm...
value: 越是強大的力量，就越是危險，風暴也是如此……

name: Only wisdom can control powerful forces, not anger. How do you think of it?
value: 只有智慧能夠掌控強大的力量，而非憤怒，你認為呢？

name: The war is simply boring. With the time for fighting and killing, it is better to study others.
value: 戰爭簡直無聊透頂，有這些打打殺殺的時間，不如拿來好好做研究。

name: Two sisters of my family seem to have awakened with this disaster...Although it was also in my expectation...
value: 我同族的兩個姐妹似乎也隨著這場災難蘇醒了呢……雖然也在我的意料之中……

name: Why do humans and gods like to entangle their identities so much... Gods and humans are indistinguishable from me.
value: 人類和神明為什麼都這麼喜歡糾結自己的身份……神和人在我看來毫無區別。

name: Although I regard you as a competitor, I have to admit that I have a good impression of you...
value: 雖然我把你當作競爭對手，但不得不承認，我對你還挺有好感……

name: Ah...it's so boring! ! I really want to find a strong one to fight! !
value: 啊……真是無聊！！真想找一個強者打一架！！

name: Are you asking about what I would do when I met an enemy? Of course, first persuade him to surrender! Roast him without surrendering!
value: 你問我遇到敵人會怎麼做？當然是先勸他投降！不投降就把他烤了！

name: War is no different from a game. It's just who gets out first, what do you think?
value: 戰爭和一場遊戲沒什麼差別，無非是誰先出局而已，你覺得呢？

name: Hmm... I noticed that the two sisters, just like me, have also awakened in this world...
value: 嗯……我察覺到兩位姐妹和我一樣，也蘇醒在這個世界了呐……

name: The reason why God owns the place not because he is powerful, but he has extraordinary courage and determination to die on the battlefield!
value: 神之所以為神，並非力量強大，而是在戰場上有過人的勇氣和赴死的決心！

name: Human cooking is really interesting. I have begun to understand the meaning of the phrase civilization begins with flames.
value: 人類的料理真是有意思，我開始理解“文明始於火焰”這句話的含義了。

name: It seems that even if I spared no effort, it is still difficult to make the sun of this world shine again...
value: 看來即使我傾盡全力，也難以讓這個世界的太陽重新煥發光輝……

name: I often recalled the days when I was in Takamagahara. Although there were constant troubles, they enriched my life.
value: 我時常回憶起過去在高天原的日子，雖然麻煩不斷，但卻充實無比。

name: Why do people have to use war to solve problems and contradictions? Doesn't this make the matter worse?
value: 為什麼人們必須用戰爭的方式來解決問題和矛盾，這難道不會讓事情更糟嗎？

name: After going through this disaster, I must revive the former glory of Yamato god pedigree and bring peace to the gods!
value: 度過這場災難之後，我一定要重振大和神明曾經的輝煌，為神系間帶來和平！

name: Your clothes were damaged badly in the battle... Do you want me to make you a new one?
value: 你的衣服在戰鬥中損壞得好厲害啊……需要我幫你做一件新的嗎？

name: Mortal people always fear death. In my opinion, death means tranquility free from emotion and eternal beauty...
value: 凡人們始終畏懼死亡，在我看來死亡意味著脫離情感的寧靜與永恆之美……

name: Whoever it is, it is god or mortal, everyone needs to face the fate of destruction and vanishing...
value: 神又如何，人又如何，不都要面對毀滅與消逝的命運麼……

name: Why do people always call my strategy a conspiracy? Is there any difference between good and evil in fighting strategies?
value: 為何人們總把我的戰略蔑稱為“陰謀”，戰鬥的計謀難道還有善惡之分嗎？

name: I never deny that I am a careerist. This messy world is so in need of order and unity!
value: 我從來不否認自己是個野心家，這個亂糟糟的世界太需要秩序和統一了！

name: Is glory such an important thing to a soldier?
value: 榮耀這種東西，對於一名戰士而言真的這麼重要麼？

name: Death is not horrible. What's terrible is that you have regrets for your life when you die.
value: 死亡並不可怕，可怕的是在你死去的時候，對自己的一生抱有遺憾。

name: Monsters are rampant in the underworld recently, which is very bad. Do you have time to solve the trouble with me together?
value: 冥界最近魔物橫行，非常糟糕，有時間陪我去解決一下麻煩嗎？

name: Are you interested in judging the dead with me?
value: 有興趣和我一起審判亡者麼？

name: War is meaningless. Destiny will not be changed just by a war...
value: 戰爭沒什麼意義，任何事物的命運豈是一場戰爭就可以改變的……

name: As a mortal, what do you think of me as a god of death?
value: 作為一個凡人，你怎麼看待作為死神的我？

name: War is an act of harming nature, and I will prevent it at any time.
value: 戰爭是傷害自然的行為，不管何時我都會阻止。

name: It often takes several years to repair the cracks in the heavens, which needs to be patient...
value: 修補天界的裂縫往往要花費好幾年，是非常需要耐性的事情呢……

name: Conforming to nature is the most reasonable behavior. Everything and every rule in the world are originated from nature.
value: 順應大自然是最合理的行為，世間萬物、一切規則都源于自然的創造。

name: Although I have lost part of my divine power, I don't regret it. It's just that nature needs me to return the power to it.
value: 雖然失去了部分神力，但我並不遺憾，這只是自然需要我把力量還給它而已。

name: Do you ask me about my hobbies? I think I like raising cute animals and growing flowers.
value: 你問我的興趣愛好？大概是養養小動物，擺弄擺弄花草吧。

name: Even if I am the only one left in the world, I will fight for justice to the last second!
value: 即使全世界只剩下我一人，我也將為正義戰鬥到最後一刻！

name: Do you want to know heaven? It seems to be nothing special for me, but at least there won't be any evil.
value: 你問我天堂怎麼樣？在我看來沒什麼特別的，但至少那裡不會有任何邪惡。

name: War is the fastest way to destroy evil, but not the best way...
value: 戰爭是消滅邪惡最快的方式，但並非最好的方式……

name: Lucifer... I am looking forward to what you will do with this evil and crafty guy after we catch her.
value: 路西法……我很期待這個邪惡而狡猾的傢伙被我們抓住後，你會怎麼處置她。

name: As the leader of the gods, you are still too young. In many cases, you lack the rationality to handle things like I do.
value: 你作為眾神的領導者還太年輕了，很多時候你缺乏像我這樣處亂不驚的理性。

name: I was born for war and the eternal glory found only through victory on the battlefield!
value: 我天生為戰爭而存在，戰場上獲得的勝利是我永恆的榮耀！

name: You want to know what weapons I fight best with? I'm good with all weapons!
value: 你問我擅長什麼樣的武器？我什麼武器都非常擅長！

name: I am never alone, for my body harbors the souls of all the Valkyries that came before me.
value: 我其實並非一個人，這個身體內聚集了歷代所有女武神們的靈魂。

name: Ah, sorry, I was a bit distracted just now. In fact, I was thinking about your battle tactics.
value: 啊，抱歉，剛剛有點走神，其實我在思考您戰鬥中的策略……

name: Since being summoned to this world, my sisters and I have grown to miss our time in Valhalla.
value: 自從被召喚到這個世界後，我和姐妹們就一直挺懷念過去英靈殿的時光……

name: Are you interested in letting me build an artifact for you, that is unparalleled in the world?
value: 有興趣讓我幫你打造一件天下無雙的神器嗎？

name: To be honest, sometimes I always feel that the weapons I built have caused some unnecessary wars.
value: 說實話，有時候我一直覺得是自己打造的武器，導致了戰爭無謂的蔓延。

name: When you battle with enemies, which strategy do you prefer? Melee assault or long-range containment?
value: 在和敵人的作戰策略中，你更習慣于近戰的突擊還是遠端的牽制？

name: Every piece of equipment needs to be polished day after day, at least I will not tolerate any mistakes.
value: 每件裝備都需要日復一日地打磨，至少我不會容許出現任何的差錯。

name: Doomsday has always been the favorite stage of careerists and revolutionaries. Don't you think so?
value: 末日一直是野心家和革命者們最愛的舞臺，你不這麼認為麼？

name: No one has ever understood the real reason...why I must be the ruler of the world.
value: 從來沒有人能理解……我一定要成為世界統治者的真正原因。

name: I can see that you are restless due to a hidden desire to me in the heart... isn't it?
value: 我可以看得出來，你對我潛藏在心底的那份欲望正在躁動不安……不是嗎？

name: The devil is just an identity. Whether it is an angel or devil, the one will always become a companion just as it should be.
value: 惡魔只是個身份，天使也好惡魔也罷，該成為同伴的還是會成為同伴。

name: Do you know? Dancing on the battlefield is not only an art, but also a good way to improve soldier morale!
value: 你知道麼？在戰場上跳舞不僅僅是一種藝術，也是鼓舞士氣的好手段！

name: There are still a few hours until the next battle. It's so boring. How about tossing a coin?
value: 離下一次戰鬥還有幾個小時呐，實在太無聊了，不如來玩猜硬幣怎麼樣？

name: As the goddess of victory, I am not the most powerful warrior, but the warriors can become powerful because of me.
value: 作為勝利女神，我並非最強大的戰士，但戰士們卻能夠因我而變得強大。

name: Anyone who dares to break the law will inevitably face eternal punishment, all in the name of justice!
value: 公正的神罰和永恆的復仇，必然會降臨在每一個膽敢冒犯正義律法的人身上！

name: Many people complain about their bad luck. It suggests that fate is inevitable.
value: 很多人都抱怨自己的運氣不佳，其實這無非是命運難違的證據罷了……

name: Even though I am the goddess of vengeance, I hope that one day there will be no more sinners in the world.
value: 即使我身為復仇女神，也希望有一天，世界上不再有任何觸犯正義的罪人。

name: If there is a chance, do you want to have the ability to turn the opponent into a stone at a glance?
value: 如果有機會，你想擁有看一眼就把對方變成石頭的能力嗎？

name: I like to read romance novels between different races. Will human beings mind the romance between different races?
value: 我很喜歡讀異種族之間的戀愛小說，人類會對介意異種族間的戀情麼？

name: What is popular among humans recently? If I also start to follow the trend, will humans accept me more?
value: 最近人類之間流行什麼？如果我也開始追隨潮流，人類會更接受我嗎？

name: Compared to daytime, I prefer to come out to relax and feel the tranquility of the world after night falls...
value: 相比于白晝，我更中意在夜幕降臨後出來散散心，感受世界的寧靜……

name: I used to feel helpless for losing my mighty divine power, but this is also the unpredictable nature of darkness.
value: 我曾為失去強大神力而感到無奈，但這也是黑暗多變而無法預測的本質吧。

name: As the messenger of the gods and the incarnation of the rainbow, lightning speed is my most proud advantage.
value: 作為眾神的信使與彩虹的化身，如閃電般的過人速度是我最自豪的優點。

name: I am working on magic that can turn painting into reality! What do you think?
value: 我正在研究一種能夠將繪畫變為現實的魔法！你覺得怎麼樣？

name: The Chinese lute is an elegant oriental musical instrument. It always makes people feel peaceful...
value: 琵琶是一種優雅的東方樂器，它總能讓人們得到心神上的安寧……

name: War brings suffering, and even if the gods have eternal life, there will only be emptiness in the end.
value: 戰爭帶來痛苦，即使神明擁有永恆的生命，在末日中也只剩下空虛而已。

name: Hi! Are you interested in signing a new contract with the cute and charming succubus idol?
value: 啊啦……有興趣和可愛又迷人的魅魔偶像簽個新契約嗎？

name: Do you like my bear? What do you think of animals like bears?
value: 喜歡我的熊嗎？你怎麼看待熊這種動物？

name: Will I be a hero who will save the world in the future?
value: 我將來能成為一個拯救世界的英雄嗎？

name: Alas... Does the war between the gods for thousands of years make sense?
value: 唉……神明之間打了幾千年的戰爭，究竟有意義嗎？

name: Well... if I'm the same as Bari... and wear a witch costume... how do you think of it?
value: 那個……如果我和巴里一樣……穿巫女服……你覺得會是什麼感覺？

name: Do you like playing baseball? Are you interested in competing with me?
value: 你喜歡打棒球麼？有沒有興趣和我較量較量？

name: In the face of powerful monsters, sometimes I have to use bows and arrows to fight... How can I shoot more accurately?
value: 面對強大的魔物有時候也不得不使用弓箭去作戰呐……怎樣才能射得更准呢？

name: I miss the days when I played a game of beach volleyball happily in the hot summer.
value: 我很懷念在太陽熾熱的夏天，痛快地打一場沙灘排球的日子。

name: Death is not an end, but a new beginning... What do you think?
value: 死亡並不是謝幕，只是一次新的開始……你覺得呢？

name: If you can choose, what do you want, eternal life or a happy life?
value: 如果可以選擇，你是想要永恆的生命，還是快樂的人生？

name: What do you think of the heavy fate carried by the heroes?
value: 你怎麼看待英雄們背負的沉重命運？

name: Hum... Guess what your luck is today?
value: 哼哼……猜猜看你今天的運氣如何？

name: Is there a girl you like? Would you like me, a genius prophet, to help you predict your relationship with her?
value: 有喜歡的女孩子麼？要不要本天才預言家幫你占卜一下和她的關係？

name: Well... I'm used to the fate of being treated with cold eyes because of constantly predicting disasters.
value: 嘛……我已習慣因為不斷預言災厄，而被冷眼相看的命運了。

name: Awww... The weather is nice today. Are you interested in basking with me?
value: 啊啦……今天天氣不錯呢，有興趣和我一塊曬曬太陽嗎？

name: Eh...? I feel a hot gaze on me...
value: 嗯……？我好像感受到了一陣熾熱的目光在我身上游走呢……

name: The dry desert occasionally has a downpour, which is really refreshing!
value: 乾涸的沙漠偶爾下一場傾盆大雨，真是讓人感到舒暢！

name: The beauty of art lies in who appreciates it. Don't you think so?
value: （寧靜）藝術之美，在於欣賞它的人是誰，你不這麼認為嗎？

name: This world is the most beautiful artwork. May it not be destroyed by war...
value: （寧靜）這個世界是最美的藝術品，願它不要因戰爭而毀滅……

name: The universe is unconscious; it regards everyone as insignificant. Do you agree with ​​this sentence?
value: （寧靜）天地不仁，以萬物為芻狗，你認同這句話的理念嗎？

name: What do you think of my music... and my character?
value: （寧靜）你怎麼看待我的音樂……以及我的性格？

name: Your age is really mysterious! I just saw someone talking in a box in a street shop!
value: 你們這個時代真是夠神秘的！我剛剛看見街邊店鋪的一個盒子裡有人在說話！

name: Are you free tonight? Are you interested in watching a fireworks display with me together?
value: 你晚上有空嗎？有沒有興趣陪我去看一場煙火大會？

name: Come on! I found something fun! Just press this button, it can record the scenery in front of you!
value: 快來看！我撿到了好玩的東西！只要按這個按鈕，就能記錄下眼前的風景呢！

name: Everyone is eager to predict their own destiny, but do they have the courage to face the cruelty of fate?
value: 每個人都渴望預知自己的命運，然而他們有勇氣去面對命運的殘酷嗎？

name: As the goddess of fate, I cannot remember my past, nor can I know who I am...
value: 身為命運女神，我卻無法記起自己的過去，也無法知曉自己的身份……

name: Do you like drinking tea? I miss the peaceful afternoon tea time every day before the end of the world...
value: 你喜歡喝茶麼？我很懷念世界末日沒有到來前，每天平靜的下午茶時刻……

name: Even though I was once one of the strongest gods of Yamato god pedigree, I would lose my divine power, which is really pitiful...
value: 即使我曾是大和神系的最強神明之一，也會失去神力，這實在令人遺憾……

name: What are mortals and what are gods? Does it really make sense to discuss these boring titles?
value: 人是什麼，神又是什麼，討論這些無聊的稱謂真的有意義嗎？

name: In fact, country, throne, and theocracy are all worthless to me nowadays...
value: 其實，國家、王位、神權，這些在如今的我看來，早已一文不值了……

name: What do you think...is the most valuable thing in this world?
value: 你覺得……這個世界上最有價值的東西是什麼？

name: What kind of girls do you like?
value: 你喜歡什麼類型的女孩子？

name: Why are you always distracted when chatting with me recently? Is there anything on your mind?
value: 你為什麼最近和我聊天的時候總是走神？有什麼心事嗎？

name: Do you like small animals? Which kind do you prefer, puppies or kittens?
value: 你喜歡小動物嗎？小狗和小貓你更喜歡哪類？

name: As a god in charge of love and marriage, who do you think is better, Cupid or me?
value: 同樣作為掌管愛情、姻緣的神明，你覺得我和丘比特誰更優秀？

name: War is also fate. Two opponents whose fate is not staggered will not stand on the same battlefield.
value: 戰爭也是緣分呢，命運沒有交錯的兩個對手，是不會站在同一個戰場上的。

name: Even if I want to repair the damage caused by the war as much as possible, it is difficult for me to do it after losing my divine power.
value: 即使想盡可能修復戰爭給大地帶來的破壞，但失去神力的我終究難以做到。

name: Sunny days are the best! I love basking in the sun under a cloudless sky.
value: 果然還是晴天最棒了！在萬里無雲的晴空下曬太陽實在是很舒暢的事情。

name: Cats are kept in many temples in Egypt, not only because they are cute, but also as a sacred symbol.
value: 埃及很多寺廟裡面都養貓，不僅是因為貓可愛，同時也是一種神聖的象徵。

name: Those who uphold justice will always emerge victorious!
value: 不管什麼時代，追隨光明與正義的人，都會是最終的勝利者！

name: Who do you think is more attractive, me or the goddess of the sky, Nuit?
value: 你覺得我和天空之神努特誰更有魅力？

name: Just as the sun falls behind the horizon, even a god must eventually fade away.
value: 即便是太陽，也有落下地平線的時刻，即便是神明，也有離開世界的那一天。

name: Do you like Egyptian style clothing?
value: 你喜歡埃及風格的服飾嗎？

name: Justice or evil is just an excuse. It is the strength of the power that determines the world.
value: 正義或邪惡只是一種說辭而已，決定世界的始終是力量的強弱罷了。

name: No matter what kind of disaster the world has encountered, one should never give up his belief in pursuing justice and light!
value: 無論世界遭遇了什麼樣的災難，都不應放棄自己追求正義與光明的信念！

name: I never advocate solving problems by means of war, but I also never fear to end disputes by war!
value: 我從不主張以戰爭的方式解決問題，但我也從不畏懼以戰爭的方式結束爭端！

name: I have been wondering whether it is right to cooperate with demons in order to defeat stronger enemies.
value: 我一直在想，為了戰勝更強大的敵人，與惡魔合作究竟是否是正確的行為。

name: It's been a while since I met you. As your mentor, it's a relief to witness your growth.
value: 和你相遇也有一段時間了，作為你的導師，見證你的成長也算是一種欣慰吧。

name: You ask me why I always carry a lantern during the day? It seems that you don't understand my duty as a witch...
value: 你問我為什麼白天也一直提著燈籠？看來你不大瞭解我身為巫女的職責……

name: No matter what road you finally choose, I hope you will not hesitate to make your choice.
value: 不管你的命運最終走上了怎樣的道路，我都希望你不會猶豫自己的選擇。

name: In fact, sometimes I wondered, what kind of identity should I use to face you...
value: 其實我有時候也會想，我應該以什麼樣的身份來面對你……

name: The earth is the source of life. Even if I lose most of my divine power, the earth will give me strength again.
value: 大地是生命的源泉，即使我失去了大部分神力，大地也會重新賜予我力量。

name: I don't approve of Nuit fighting along side of us, even if doomsday is upon us.
value: 其實，我當初並不贊成天空之神努特參與這場末日之戰……

name: The king is always lonely. This is the only real feeling after I ruled the Nordic gods for so long.
value: 王者始終是孤獨的，這是我統治北歐眾神這麼長時間後，唯一真正的感受。

name: It is the bounden duty of the rulers of Norse to protect the world tree, but this is not an easy task.
value: 保護好世界樹是北歐統治者義不容辭的責任，然而這並不是一件容易的事情。

name: I was defeated in the doomsday of Ragnarok. I hope that this kind of thing will never happen again.
value: 我曾經在諸神的黃昏那場末日中戰敗，但我希望這種事不會再次發生。

name: Wisdom is the guarantee of victory. We need not only unmatched brave men in the war, but also clever military counsellors.
value: 智慧是勝利的保障，戰爭需要無人能敵的勇者，也需要聰明過人的軍師。

name: To be honest, in the eyes of other gods, I was just an unromantic and indifferent ruler...
value: 說實話，我在其他神明的眼中，曾經只是個不懂風情而冷漠的統治者罷了……

name: Is the charm of the songs I sing really powerful enough to make people throw themselves into the sea...
value: 我所唱歌曲的魅力，真的強大到讓人投海自盡嗎……

name: I really want to see the scenery on the land. I heard that there are beautiful grasslands and majestic mountains on the land...
value: 我很想去看看陸地上的景色，聽說陸地上有美麗的草原，雄偉的山峰……

name: I heard that Lord Poseidon lost most of her divine power when she woke up in this world. Is this true?
value: 聽說波塞冬大人蘇醒在這個世界時，丟失了大部分的神力，這是真的嗎？

name: I will not feel sad about the disasters that the earth has suffered in the war, this is just a necessary test.
value: 我並不會對大地在戰爭中所受的災難感到悲傷，這只是一場必要的考驗而已。

name: During the time I got along with you, I felt more like your elders than companions.
value: 和你相處的這段時間裡，相對于同伴的關係，我感覺自己更像是你的長輩。

name: As a mortal, you have to carry the heavy responsibility of solving this disaster. Fate is too harsh on you...
value: 作為一個凡人，你卻要背負解決這場災難的重任，命運對你未免太苛刻了……

name: Which do you like better, flowers or trees? After each battle, I always plant various plants on the battlefield.
value: 你喜歡花草還是樹木？每次作戰結束後，我總會在戰場上種下各種植物。

name: When I was summoned into this world, I lost most of my divine power, which I have to say is a pity...
value: 在被召喚到這個世界時，我丟失了絕大部分神力，這不得不說是一種遺憾……

name: Minotaur's labyrinth... is it really so easy to get out of it?
value: 彌諾陶洛斯的迷宮……真的這麼容易走出來嗎？

name: In order to pursue your own ideas, one chooses to sacrifice. Do you think it is worthy?
value: 為了貫徹自己的理念而選擇壯烈犧牲，你認為這值得嗎？

name: Hi, what do you think of the idea of combining the real world and dreams into one?
value: 喂，你認為把現實世界和夢境合二為一的想法如何？

name: Do you think... I can become a strong person that my companions can rely on?
value: 你覺得……我能成為同伴們可以依賴的強者麼？

name: Do you think it is worth doing whatever it takes, in order to become stronger?
value: 如果為了變強而不擇手段，你認為是值得的嗎？

name: If you have the ability to read people's mind, would you want to secretly read the thoughts of the person you like?
value: 如果你有了讀心的能力，會想去偷偷閱讀中意之人的思緒嗎？

name: I'm bored! How about sparring with me? It will be good practice!
value: 真是有夠無聊的！來打一架練練手吧！

name: Flames... they are both beautiful and dangerous. What do you think of them?
value: 火焰……你怎麼看待這種美麗而危險的東西？

name: I prefer to solve things by fighting. I hate it when humans try to reason with me instead.
value: 和人類講道理真是麻煩！難道有什麼事情不能打一架能解決嗎？

name: Hi, what do you think of this mummy-style costume?
value: 呐，你覺得這身木乃伊風格的裝束如何？

name: Are you looking forward to having eternal youth, like the gods?
value: 你會像眾神一樣，期待擁有永恆的青春嗎？

name: Do you think the precious golden apple... will really trigger a war between the gods?
value: 你覺得金蘋果這件寶物……真的會引發神明間的戰爭嗎？

name: If I were a mortal, my beauty would fade away by the passing time, can I still be in love?
value: 如果我是凡人，容顏終將隨時光一併流逝，還能夠擁有愛情麼？

name: Abundant music and beautiful poetry, which art do you prefer?
value: 多彩的音樂和美妙的詩詞，你更喜歡哪種藝術呢？

name: Humph... I smell something I like! You brought fish, right? !
value: 哼哼……咱聞到了喜歡的東西呢！你帶了小魚幹對吧？！

name: Are human beings afraid of whatever monsters they see...?
value: 人類不管見到什麼妖怪……都會害怕嗎？

name: Hey! Do humans like to call themselves the master of cats? What does the word master mean?
value: 喂喂！人類都喜歡稱自己是喵咪的主人嗎？主人這個詞是什麼意思？

name: Ears and tails are rare treasures! Do you want to touch it?
value: 耳朵和尾巴可是難得一見的寶貝呐！想摸摸看嗎？

name: Ah... Whether it's a god or a human, everyone seems to have a selfish side.
value: 呐……不管是神還是人，看上去都有自私的一面喵。

name: As a demon cat, do you think my power is strong?
value: 作為妖怪喵，你覺得我的力量強大嗎？

name: I have never expected that I, once one of the strongest gods, would lose power like a mortal...
value: 沒想到，曾經作為最強神明之一的我，也會如凡人般失去力量……

name: When will this war between the gods end...
value: 這場神明間的戰爭究竟什麼時候才會結束呢……

name: Of all the flowers, my favorite is the lotus. What's yours?
value: 在所有的花卉中，我格外喜歡荷花，你呢？

name: What do you think about the bond between blood relatives? Do you think such relationships are more important than others?
value: 你怎麼看待親人之間的血緣關係，你認為血緣真的那麼重要嗎？

name: I will take on the mission of the entire Korean Divine. Just like Princess Bari, I will do my best to protect the people of Korea.
value: 不僅僅是我自己，我也會背負整個大韓神系的使命，就和巫女巴里一樣。

name: How many families have been destroyed by this catastrophe and how many parents and children have been separated...
value: 這場浩劫毀滅了多少家庭，又讓多少父母與孩子失散異地……

name: What kind of relationship do you want with me? I've wanted to know for a long time.
value: 我其實想了很久，我和你究竟應該是怎樣的關係……

name: Do you believe that the gods can really answer people's prayers and save them from trouble?
value: 你相信神明真的能夠回應人們的祈禱，幫助人們脫離困境嗎？

name: Hmm... It seems that among all my companions, only I have been successfully summoned into this world...
value: 嗯……似乎在所有的同伴中，只有我成功被召喚到這個世界了……

name: You ask me how I see the disaster brought by this end of the world? Actually, I don't care much about this...
value: 你問我怎麼看這場世界末日帶來的災難？其實我不太關心這些啦……

name: Ah... Your name is really hard to remember... It takes a long time to remember it every time!
value: 啊……你的名字可真難記……每次都要想很久才能記起來！

name: Do you know Minotaur? Do you think who has the stronger strength if I compete with her?
value: 你知道米諾陶洛斯麼？你覺得我和她較量的話，誰的力氣比較大？

name: You ask where my divine power comes from? As far as I know, it seems to be derived from people's beliefs?
value: 你問我的神力從何而來？據我所知道的來看，似乎源於人們的信仰？

name: How do you know when you've found true love?
Who do you want to date?
I wish you good luck and prosperity.
You need to face your fears.
value: You need to face your fears.

name: Giving up is not a bad thing.
There may be some truth to that.
If so, such bravery seems reckless.
Wisdom can only be found in truth.
It's not bad to be naive.
value: It's not bad to be naive.

name: I want to see your works!
value: I want to see your works!

name: There is always a reason for war.
I want to give it a try!
Uh, I'm afraid I have other things to do.
I don't like to be lied to.
I think kindness is most important.
I want to hear you sing.
Do you want me to sing it to you?
Who do you want to protect?
The brave always have good luck.
But gods are immortal, and humans are not.
Do not tangle in the past.
I will stay away from the storm.
Are you in the next battle?
What you think is too simple.
There is no need to blame yourself.
People need to face the future.
That sounds like a heavy burden.
I think there is no difference.
I think there is a difference.
At least I think it is.
I have no regrets at all!
I bet it's a mission with no return.
Do you want to regain your divine power?
I will be always at your side.
Hope you can grant me courage.
Hope to go there and have a look.
I'll persuade her to work for me.
What do you think I should do?
Wish you good luck in the war.
Are they aligned with our goals?
Such a peaceful place must be blissful.
value: Such a peaceful place must be blissful.

name: I would like to hear you talk about it.
You are quite suitable to be an idol.
There are imperfections in the law.
value: There are imperfections in the law.

name: I doubt that will ever happen.
I will try my best to help you.
It's very effective against the enemy!
You already have a strong personality!
I'm still used to the daytime.
Indeed, speed is precious in war..
I feel like you will hit something.
Can you teach me to play?
Do you want to play it?
Didn't you just sign it yesterday?
I feel that there is a conspiracy...
Wear a good pair of glasses?
Holding an umbrella is a bit troublesome...
I don't know much about art.
At least I have the courage.
I don't like it very much...
I think it should be love?
I presume you are the one.
I will do my best to help you.
You seem to be in a good mood.
Were you just talking to yourself?
It's rare to see you so depressed…
Can't you tell by how I look at you?
value: Can't you tell by how I look at you?

name: This is not easy to do.
Do you want to regain the divine power?
I don't care about being lonely.
I will try my best to help you.
It's hard to be a wise man...
At least the legend said it is...
Actually I want to hear it!
I thought you could come ashore.
Do you want to play a prank?
At least in dreams you can.
It seems someone is calling me!
value: It seems someone is calling me!

name: Fire is the symbol of civilization.
Sometimes a fight does solve the problem.
At least in Greece it will.
At least I can give you love.
Your have such a sensitive nose...
How do you feel about yourself?
Do you want to regain power?
I am very good at surfing!
Eh, I will be drowning in water.
value: Eh, I will be drowning in water.

name: I will end it as soon as possible!
Feeling sorry for them can't change anything.
This disaster must have an end.
I see you as a companion.
value: I see you as a companion.

name: Thoughts of family come to mind when I think of you.
value: Thoughts of family come to mind when I think of you.

name: No, the gods don't care about us.
But you responded to the summon.
Do all bulls have such a good memory...
Uh, I don't want to answer...
value: Uh, I don't want to answer...

name: Good answer! Doesn't love appear precious because of many hardships?
value: 令人振奮的回答呢！愛情不正是因為重重磨難而顯得珍貴嗎？

name: Your tone makes you sound bitter and jaded. There's no need for that. With me at your side, your luck with love will be much better.
value: 沒必要用那麼沉重的語氣回答我！有我在的話，至少你不會在愛情的問題上倒楣。

name: Right? After all, if gods are so different from humans that they can't share a deep love with them, I would rather not be a god!
value: 就是說嘛 ！如果神與人的身份會阻止偉大的愛情，我寧願不當神明了！

name: ... After all, humans have short lifespans. And, sadly, their love dies with them.
value: 唉……或許你是正確的吧，畢竟這樣的愛情終將隨著人類短暫的生命而消逝。

name: If you don't tell me who it is, then I'll write your name on an arrow and shoot it out blindly! Do you really want to leave it up to chance?
value: 啊啦……你要是不告訴我，我就把你的名字寫在箭上，閉著眼睛射出去啦！

name: So which lucky girl will my arrow of love strike? Wait... This arrow seems to be targeting me?!
value: 那麼你想給哪個幸運的女孩子來一箭呢？等等？！你為什麼要把箭對著我？！

name: I make it my mission to ruin love rooted in greed. Will you stay at my side and help?
value: 所以你永遠會和我一起，去擊碎那些虛偽的愛情，對吧？！

name: You know its true love when you're willing to give up everything for it, including the power to rule the world.
value: 當你遇到連統治世界這樣的權力，也肯為她而放棄的女孩子後，你就明白了。

name: Really? That's great! I'm a bit tired of being the god of love and need a break. I'm looking for someone to take my place for a while
value: 真的？！那太好了！我最近當愛神有些倦怠了，正想找個人替我一陣子呢！

name: Do you want me to give you private lessons? Just grab my hand and draw back the bowstring. ...Oh, why is your other hand touching me there?
value: 要我親自來教你嗎？抓住我的手慢慢拉開弓……哎呀，你在碰哪兒呢！

name: I wasn't expecting you to ask me so suddenly! I don't know what to say...
value: 哎呀……你……你怎麼這麼突然……我一點心理準備都沒做好……

name: Anyone would be fine... Although, a date with you would be nice.
value: 誰……誰都行……我的意思是 ……和你約會也是可以的哦……

name: That's just the way it is! No matter how pleasant your words are, I won't be happy with the praise from mortals!
value: 本……本來就是這樣！就算你話說得再好聽，我也不會對凡人的讚美感到欣喜的！

name: You are different from those who love flowers with beautiful colors, which surprised me a lot..
value: 和那些喜愛擁有驚豔花色的人不同……你倒是挺讓我感到意外的。

name: It seems that you are a person who does not believe in fate. It has been a long time since no mortal dared to fight against fate.
value: 看來你是個不相信命運的人呢，很久沒有凡人敢於對抗命運了……

name: For your sake, you better hope that person isn't you. Whoever I marry will suffer horribly.
value: 那個人最好別是你，不然你可就有苦頭要吃了……呵呵……

name: There's no one else here. Just relax and enjoy this time alone together.
value: 這裡又沒有其他人，沒必要這麼拘謹地回應我啦……

name: Although there are only two of us! But this is just a personal invitation, don't think too much!
value: 雖然只有我們兩人！但這只是個私人的邀請罷了！不要多想！

name: I'm never soft on the battlefield. But if you want me to treat the enemy with kindness, I won't object.
value: 哼，戰場上我從不手軟，但你若希望我仁慈對待敵人，我……我也並不反對就是……

name: Haha... Many people have already said this to me and followed me onto the battlefield. Would you like to know their stories?
value: 呵呵……已經有很多人和我說過這句話，並跟隨我上戰場了，想知道他們的故事嗎？

name: What are you talking about! I don't... don't care if a mortal admires me!
value: 你說……說什麼呢！我……我可不在乎一個凡人對我的仰慕！

name: Haha...Yes, what this world prizes power. Would you help me regain some of my power by serving as my sword and shield?
value: 呵呵……是啊，這個世界看重的是力量，在此之前，你願意成為我的劍與盾嗎？

name: You are different from everyone else! You are the only one I have ever admired. That is why I have chosen you and only you.
value: 你……你和其他人不同！你可是我親自挑選的，親自認可的人！

name: The gods are always fighting amongst themselves. Yet, I'm astounded that you have managed to unite even opposing gods under one banner.
value: 神明向來各自為戰，但你卻能讓敵對的神明團結起來，這也是我感到驚訝的。

name: You're right. I will continue trying to overcome my fear.
value: 你說的沒錯，我會重新讓自己擺脫恐懼的，嚮往自由的心比什麼都最重要。

name: Whether or not I can fly doesn't matter. Seeing you gives me courage.
value: 雖然有些不甘心，但每次見到你的時候，能否飛翔仿佛也變得不再重要了……

name: I think so, too. When heroes know they might fall in battle, it can fill them with fear.
value: 我也這麼覺得，戰場上的英雄如果知道他可能失敗，那麼他是無法衝鋒陷陣的。

name: Yes, sometimes that is true. But such recklessness comes at a heavy cost.
value: 有些時候的確如此，而且這種魯莽所帶來的代價也是沉重的……

name: Unfortunately, my bravery precludes such wisdom, for I rarely think things through. I am often blinded by my confidence.
value: 我一直認為自己是個勇敢的人，但謹慎地思考問題好像不是我的長處……

name: Some things grow more confusing the more you think about them. Regardless, it is still good to ponder such things.
value: 有些事情，想的越多反而越讓人感到迷茫，簡單地思考其實也不錯。

name: Therefore, a good artist should also be a good inventor. I always dream to be such a person!
value: 所以優秀的藝術家也應該是優秀的發明家，成為這樣的人一直是我的理想呢！

name: My artificial wings are a spectacularly beautiful invention! Aren't they the perfect example of artistic invention?
value: 我這雙人造的翅膀就是一件奇特的發明！它難道不是藝術與創造的完美結合嗎？

name: My sculptures are a private affair since they are all body art based on myself. But for you, I'll make an exception.
value: 我的作品都是以自己為原型的人體藝術……但是給你看的話……我倒也不介意……

name: Sculpture is best learned on your own, though I would be happy to be your model!
value: 雕塑只能自己感悟啦，不過如果你有興趣的話，我很樂意當你的模特！

name: Not necessarily. I have seen many human heroes in Greece. They are fully strong enough to compete with gods on the battlefield!
value: 未必，我在希臘見過很多人類英雄，他們完全有能力在戰場上和神明一較高下！

name: There are many monsters and demons whose lifespans are nearly eternal, but they don't seem to be gods either.
value: 有很多妖怪或是魔物也具有接近永恆的生命……可它們好像也不算是神……

name: I'm pleased that you enjoy that season. The cold often brings an icy calm to the land.
value: 寒冷往往能帶給智者們冷靜和理性的心，我很欣慰你能喜歡這個季節。

name: People often associate cold with death. However, snow and ice are part of the world, and they are eternal.
value: 雖然人們往往把寒冷和死亡想到一起，但冰雪在世界萬物中，卻是永恆的象徵……

name: Many great human heroes have faced like this. They are surrounded by countless glory, but they are never understood by others.
value: 很多偉大的人類英雄都是如此，他們簇擁無數的榮耀 ，但卻從不被他人理解。

name: I never thought I would be interested in a human being, but the days with you seem to be quite interesting.
value: 我從沒想過自己會對一個人類感興趣，不過和你相處的日子好像也挺有意思……

name: Fortunately you think so. What the world needs is rationality and order, not chaos and destruction.
value: 很慶倖你也這麼想，這個世界需要的是理性和秩序，而非混亂和破壞。

name: But most of the reasons are unreasonable. I hope you can calmly think about the meaning of every battle like me.
value: 但大多數的原因都很無理，我希望你能和我一樣，冷靜思考每一次戰鬥的意義。

name: She is the worst-tempered of our three sisters. She is very anxious but enthusiastic and refreshing, and she has a good relationship with humans.
value: 她是我們三姐妹中脾氣最糟的，性子很急但處事熱情爽快，但和人類的關係還不錯。

name: She has the brightest mind of our three sisters. There have been many bounty hunters to fight against her, but none of them have come back...
value: 他是我們三姐妹中頭腦最好的，曾有很多賞金獵人去討伐她，但一個都沒回來過……

name: The method is very simple. Freeze yourself, then you can have eternal youth like me. Isn't this wonderful?
value: 方法很簡單，把你冰凍起來，你就能和我一樣擁有永恆的青春了，這不是很美妙麼？

name: Wise decision. Mankind may be able to obtain eternal life, but it may pay a greater price for it...
value: 明智的決定，人類或許能獲得永恆的生命，但卻可能為此付出更大的代價……

name: Strange guy... Maybe this is why I am willing to open my heart in front of you...
value: 奇怪的傢伙呐……或許這也是為什麼我願意在你面前敞開心扉的原因吧……

name: I don't know...but so far, no one will accompany me like you all the time...
value: 我不知道……但至今為止，沒有人會像你這樣無時不刻地陪伴我……

name: Oh! So direct! ...But yes, it would be a date. I hope to share a lovely evening with you. We could make many pleasant memories.
value: 啊啦！真是個坦率的傢伙呢！希望今晚我們能有個愉快的回憶。

name: Hmm... let me guess... You already have plans with another girl?
value: 喔？讓我猜猜……難道是要去見其他的女孩子？

name: Since I created the world, I haven't seen many humans tell the truth. It's a pity.
value: 可惜的是我自創世之初到現在為止，並沒有見過多少人類願意說真話……

name: Oh really? So... I love you. But is that the truth or a lie? Take a guess.
value: 呵呵……是嗎？那麼猜猜看，我現在說的這句“我愛你”是真的還是假的？

name: I envy humans for the time they spend in the afternoon sun, whether it be shopping, sunbathing, or strolling through the park with a lover.
value: 作為神明，我挺羡慕人類能享受在午後的太陽下，和戀人逛街約會的時光。

name: The night is full of mystery. It is the perfect time for two lovers to be alone... Anyway... Are you free tonight?
value: 黑夜總是充滿神秘和曖昧的氣氛，很適合二人獨處呢……話說回來，你今晚有空嗎？

name: Oh, really? Then we'll see if your kindness can save us from the disaster that's engulfed the world.
value: 有意思，那麼就讓我看看你的善良是否真的能拯救這場災難吧。

name: That's pleasing to hear. I prefer strong individuals.
value: 我很欣慰你認識到了這一點，不管如何，我只喜歡強者……

name: If you follow your instincts, what sort of trouble will the two of us get into tonight when we're alone in our room?
value: 啊啦！那麼用你的直覺猜猜看，今晚你和我在房間裡會發生點啥“麻煩”呢？

name: You may be calm and rational now, but we'll see how long that lasts in the presence of my seductive charm.
value: 呵呵……是個冷靜的傢伙，不過在我的魅力下，你的冷靜又能堅持多久呢……

name: Not surprising. The world is already full of tragedy. ...And speaking of tragedies, I hope you can stop the disaster that's engulfing the world today.
value: 意料之內的答案呢，現實中的悲劇已經夠多了，希望你能為這場災難帶來轉機……

name: I'm shocked! Just don't watch too many of them. I don't want them to make you pessimistic.
value: 真是出乎我的意料，我可不希望你變成一個性格悲觀灰暗的傢伙！

name: From now on I will miss the moon that we saw today, and I hope you will not forget today's promise...
value: 從今往後我都會懷念今天和你一起看過的月亮，希望你也不要忘卻今日的約定……

name: You don't need to answer me so quickly. I will wait until you complete your mission.
value: 你沒有必要這麼快給我答覆……我會一直等，直到你完成自己的使命後……

name: Thank you for your trust in me all the time, and I will protect your back on the deadly battlefield.
value: 感謝你一直以來對我的信任，我會在最激烈的戰場上保護好你的身後。

name: Then at least allow me to pray to the moon for your safety every night before the war is over.
value: 那麼請至少允許我在戰爭結束前，每晚向月亮祈求你的平安。

name: They like to get close to humans very much. They are so lovable guys...
value: 它們非常喜歡和人類親近，是一群很討人喜愛的傢伙呢……

name: Hmm... With your personality, you might prefer some fierce and wild guys, right?
value: 嗯……以你的性格，或許會更喜歡一些兇猛而野性的傢伙，我猜的沒錯吧？

name: After this war is over, let's go back to my hometown together, where there will never be apocalypse and disaster.
value: 等這場戰爭結束後，我們便一起回我的故鄉吧，那裡永遠沒有末日和災難。

name: I understand that you are in this world, maybe there are things you can never give up...
value: 我明白……你在這個世界上，或許有永遠也不能捨棄的事物吧……

name: I should be grateful for meeting you. Maybe this is the greatest comfort that fate has given a lonely person.
value: 我應該感謝能夠與你相遇，這或許是命運給我這個孤獨的人最大的安慰了。

name: Mortal people sigh for the short life. How can they understand the eternal loneliness...
value: 凡人們歎息短暫的生命，但他們又怎麼會明白永恆的寂寞……

name: Then lie down on my lap, close your eyes and listen quietly. Wish you a good night...
value: 那麼在我的膝上躺下，閉上你的眼睛靜靜地聽吧，祝你一夜好夢……

name: Well, if it were you, I would be happy to listen.
value: 嗯，如果是你的話，我很樂意……

name: Well, next time show me your bravery on the battlefield.
value: 呵……下次讓我看看你在戰場上的勇猛吧。

name: Only those who have had their homeland invaded would understand.
value: 當你的家園被入侵時，你會明白這種感受的。

name: You are very reassuring.
value: 哼……你確實也是個能讓人安心的傢伙……

name: So far, I have never let my Nordic companions down.
value: 至今為止，我從未讓北歐的同伴們失望過。

name: I refuse to answer, but... you will know in the future…
value: 我拒絕回答，但……但以後你會知道的……

name: Then, what about you? Who do you want to protect?
value: 那……那你呢？你希望守護的人是誰？

name: I swear... Never let this happen again in this world.
value: 我發誓……絕不會讓這種事再次發生在這個世界。

name: Well, that's ok, you don't want to know how tragic the disaster was...
value: 也好，你不會想知道那場災難有多慘烈……

name: I wasn't worried. I was just... pointing it out.
value: 我……我才沒擔心！我只是……只是隨便說說罷了！

name: If you don't have my protection next time, then don't take risks like that again!
value: 下次如果沒有我的保護，不要再這樣冒險了！

name: What do you mean... Are you willing to regain my strength with me?
value: 你的意思是……你願意和我一起找回我的力量嗎？

name: You remind me of my youth. It was nice to reminisce on ages past.
value: 不錯的意志！你讓我看到了我年輕時的影子……

name: I'm glad you're not short-tempered like me. Maybe you're a more suitable commander than I am.
value: 看來你不像我一樣是個急性子的傢伙，或許你比我更適合當一個統帥。

name: Therefore, as long as human beings continuously hone themselves, one day they will be able to reach the mighty state of gods!
value: 所以人類只要不斷地磨練自己，終有一天能夠達到神明的強大境界！

name: When it comes to eternal life, humans can achieve it either through prayer or magic. Just look at me! I'm the perfect example.
value: 即使是永恆的生命，人類也能夠通過魔法與神祈做到，我自己就是一個成功的例子！

name: It is worth dying on the battlefield for your own ideas and values. After all, isn't the greatest joy in life to think and act as one pleases?
value: 我寧願在戰場上為自己的理念而犧牲，人活著的意義不就是為了貫徹自己的理念嗎？

name: I hope you can also find the meaning and value of your life on the battlefield, and fight for your own ideas!
value: 希望你也能夠在戰場上找到自己活著的意義和價值，並為自己的理念而戰！

name: It's not weird to me either. It's the meaning behind it that's important. A miko must not only be wise and reverent, but she must also have the will of a samurai!
value: 我也這麼想，什麼樣的裝束不是重點，關鍵是你是否具備巫女的智慧與武士的意志！

name: You won't think it strange when I prove to you on the battlefield that I am also a qualified warrior with an indomitable will!
value: 哼！很快我就會在戰場上向你證明，我也是一名擁有不屈意志的合格武者！

name: I knew I could trust you! I look forward to seeing your talent and courage as a ruler!
value: 我就知道我可以信任你！我很期待你作為統治者的才能和勇氣！

name: If anyone else said this, I would never agree. I don't know why, but I always think you're right.
value: 如果是別人這樣對我說，我絕不會認同，但不知為什麼，我總覺得你說的沒錯……

name: Good, because even the most feminine woman can have a strong and commanding side to her personality!
value: 和我想的一樣呢！就算女孩子也有堅強和威嚴的一面嘛！

name: When I'm with you, I worry about it more than I should admit.
value: 在你的面前，我多多少少還是會在意一點的了……

name: Unlike most humans, you are more rational than I thought, and maybe it is a correct decision to cooperate with you.
value: 和大部分人類不同，你比我想像中更為理性，或許和你合作是一個正確的決定。

name: Really? You are the 147th human to say this. Guess the fate of the last 146 guys?
value: 是麼？你是第147位說出這句話的人類，猜猜看前146個傢伙的命運如何？

name: I am very pleased to hear that you agree with my point of view, maybe you really have the ability to become the leader of the gods.
value: 很欣慰聽到你認同我的觀點，或許你真的有能力成為眾神的領導者。

name: Anger will only make your head hot, but if you can control your own anger, you may also have powerful power.
value: 憤怒只會讓人頭腦發熱罷了，但如果能駕馭自己的憤怒，或許也能擁有強大的力量。

name: In a way, you are right. After defeating the group of idiots who came to crusade against me, my strength has indeed improved a lot.
value: 某種角度上你沒說錯，在擊敗來討伐我的那群笨蛋後，我的力量確實提升了不少。

name: So how long will it take you to end this world war between the gods?
value: 所以你還需要多長時間，才能結束這場神明間的世界大戰？

name: It's not a good thing for this grumpy guy to wake up. Surprisingly, she gets along well with humans...
value: 這個脾氣暴躁的傢伙醒過來可不是什麼好事，意外的是她和人類相處得還不錯……

name: If you're fine, don't mess with her. If she is in a bad mood, you may be frozen in ice for the rest of your life...
value: 你沒事最好別去惹她，她要是心情不好，你可能就要被凍在冰塊裡度過餘生了……

name: God also has birth and destruction, and he also needs to follow the rules of the world. God is not the truth, but just a strong existence.
value: 神也有誕生和毀滅，也需要遵循世間的規則，神並非真理，只是很強的存在罷了。

name: In my opinion, only those who want to become gods would say this. It seems that you are also an ambitious guy...
value: 在我觀念中，只有想成為神的人才會這麼說，看來你也是個有野心的傢伙呢……

name: In addition to competitors. I am looking forward to the relationship with you in the future, that... a deeper relationship can also be...
value: 除了競爭對手外。我很期待和你之後的關係，那個……更深入一點的關係也可以……

name: You are too slow! We have been working together for so long, haven't you noticed it...
value: 你太遲鈍了！我們合作了這麼久，你都沒有察覺出來嗎……

name: no problem! This time I won't be like the last time, because I lost to you carelessly!
value: 沒問題！這次我可不會像上回那樣，因為大意輸給你了！

name: Is it finally my turn to play? ! Wait to see me burn the enemy into a barbecue! Hahaha!
value: 終於輪到我出場了嗎？！等著看我把敵人燒成烤肉吧！哈哈哈！

name: Do I look like a merciful person? ! Nothing excites me more than defeating an enemy!
value: 我看上去像是會手下留情的人嗎？！沒有比擊敗敵人更讓我興奮的了！

name: Even if it is a monster, it must be given a chance to solve the problem peacefully, although it is useless most of the time.
value: 就算是魔物，也要給一個和平解決問題的機會嘛，雖然大部分時候都沒用就是了。

name: As your companion, I am very happy to hear you, the commander-in-chief, agree with me, hum...
value: 作為你的同伴，我挺高興聽到你這個統帥認同我的看法，哼哼……

name: It's no surprise that when I stepped onto the battlefield of this world, I had no longer any nostalgia for life.
value: 沒什麼奇怪的，踏上這個世界的戰場時，我早就沒有任何對生命的留戀了。

name: She is a wise and strategic guy, but if you really want to fight, she will definitely not be able to beat me!
value: 她是個滿口智慧、戰略的傢伙，不過要真論打架的話，她肯定打不過我！

name: That cold guy is so boring, I can't stay by her side for a second!
value: 那個冷冰冰的傢伙太無趣了，在她身邊我可一秒鐘都呆不下去！

name: Therefore, as the commander of the gods, you must have courage stronger than them!
value: 所以，你作為眾神的統帥，必須要具備比他們還強大的勇氣！

name: Thinking too complicated is meaningless. Without courage, how do you face the difficulties and fears on the way to becoming a god?
value: 想得太複雜反而沒意義，沒有勇氣，你如何在成神的途中直面困難和恐懼？

name: Didn't expect it? ! My craftsmanship is not inferior to your top human chefs!
value: 沒想到吧？！我的手藝可一點也不遜於你們人類的頂級廚師！

name: Hmm... let me think... I like most of the dishes, but of course, the roast meats are my favorite! !
value: 嗯……我想想……大多數的料理我都喜歡，不過最喜歡的當然還是烤肉！！

name: Indeed. Self-blame has no significance. As a symbol of light and hope, I need to cheer up again!
value: 確實，自責沒有任何意義，作為光明與希望的象徵，我需要重新振作起來！

name: You are right...Even if you were once the ruler of the sun, you still need to face the end of the world with your companions.
value: 你說的沒錯……即使曾經身為太陽的主宰，現在也需要與同伴一起面對這世界末日。

name: Sorry, I seem to be over-indulged in the passing time. I hope it didn't bother you.
value: 抱歉，我似乎有些過度沉湎于以前的時光了，希望沒有給你帶來困擾。

name: As you said, people expect to find a peaceful life like in the past, so we must end this disaster!
value: 如你所言，人們都期望找回過去的和平，我們必須終結這場災難！

name: Anyway, I always believe that differences in ideas can be unified in a more peaceful way, not war.
value: 不管如何，我始終相信理念的差異可以通過和平，而非戰爭的方式得到統一。

name: I can understand the dilemma that needs to be resolved immediately in a crisis, but I still hope that you treat every war with caution.
value: 我能理解危急關頭需要立刻解決的困境，但我依舊希望你慎重對待任何一場戰爭。

name: At that time, the Yamato gods will take the responsibility of maintaining peace, so the re will be no disputes anymore.
value: 到那時，大和神明將承擔起維護眾神間和平的職責，世界將永遠不再有矛盾和爭執。

name: But I will definitely complete this mission. Do you feel it? That's why destiny made me come to this world.
value: 但我一定會完成這個使命，你沒感受到嗎，命運讓我降臨在這個世界就是為此。

name: Although I live in a different era from you, I am very confident in my skills in spinning and designing clothes!
value: 雖然我和你所處的時代不同，但我對自己紡織和設計服裝的技巧可是很有自信的！

name: Although when I measure your height and measurements, you need to be frank with me, I think our relationship should be fine for that...
value: 雖然在幫您量身高和三圍時……要麻煩您“坦誠相見”，但我們的關係應該無礙……

name: Haha, when a person feels no fear of death, he will no longer have any weaknesses. You will soon understand...
value: 呵呵，當一個人連死亡也不再畏懼時，他將不再有任何弱點，你很快就會明白的……

name: You are the most rational mortal I have ever met. Our future cooperation may become more interesting...
value: 你是我見到的最理性的凡人了，我們今後的合作或許會比較有趣……

name: Therefore, no matter it is mortal or gods, they should follow fate while they are alive and prepare for death...
value: 所以無論人類或神明，都應在活著時遵循既定的命運，為自己的死亡做好準備……

name: Oh, really? I would like to see if you, as the spokesperson of death, can escape from me...
value: 喔？是嗎？我很樂意看看作為死亡的代言人，你能不能逃得出我的手掌心……

name: A wise answer. A strategy is just a strategy, to differ them as good or evil is just a kind of rhetoric and excuse.
value: 明智的回答，計謀就是計謀，善良與邪惡不過都是一種說辭和藉口罷了。

name: It seems that you are different from me. You are more willing to use your fists and strength to resolve conflicts... Should I praise your sense of glory?
value: 看來和我不同，你更願意用拳頭和力量來解決矛盾……我該讚揚你的榮耀感麼？

name: You are right, but unfortunately, this sentence is only valid when the strong man is alive...
value: 你沒說錯，但遺憾的是，這句話只在這個強者活著的時候有效……

name: Oh, it's hard to believe that I would hear this from mortals. That's right, you will find that death is the fairest rule in the world.
value: 啊，難以相信我會從凡人嘴裡聽到這話，沒錯，其實你會發現死亡是最公平的規則。

name: Yes...see how many heroes lost their lives for glory. Death in this way is also an art...
value: 是啊……多少英雄們為榮耀而獻出生命，這樣迎來死亡倒也是一種藝術……

name: Death will erase everything. Whatever how great the glory was made by the hero, it will fade away with the passing of admirers...
value: 死亡會抹去一切，再偉大的英雄所創造的榮耀，也會隨崇拜者的逝去而消散吧……

name: Look at your reaction...do you think that the biggest regret in life is the lack of a girl's company?
value: 從你的表情看來……是不是覺得人生中最大的遺憾是少了女孩子的陪伴？

name: Well, look at the girls around you, see how they admire you. You really have no regrets in your life.
value: 嘖嘖……看看你身邊那些對你崇拜到家的女孩子們，你的人生確實沒什麼遺憾的了。

name: With your strong power, you will return from any dangerous place. Of course, it is another matter of which way you come back, whether it is standing or lying down...
value: 以你強大的戰鬥力，再危險的地方也能回來，當然，站著還是躺著另當別論……

name: Hmm... you'd better put on the thickest armor before you leave, otherwise I don't guarantee that you will come back completely...
value: 嗯……出發之前你最好穿上最厚的盔甲，不然我不保證你能“完整”地回來……

name: You made a sensible choice! When you go on my trial after you die, I promise you will know more...
value: 明智之舉！當你死後接受我的審判時，我保證你會長個心眼……

name: Don't worry, it's much more fun than you think...especially when you kick the nasty guy down the abyss...
value: 放心，比你想像中好玩得多……尤其是你親自把討厭的傢伙踹下深淵的時候……

name: I don't feel repulsion for war. The dead people caused by war can make my lonely palace bustling for months...
value: 我倒不反感戰爭，一場戰爭帶來的亡者，能讓我冷清的宮殿熱鬧好幾個月……

name: Well, let's make a bet and see if this doomsday can end with the war you lead.
value: 喔？我們打個賭吧，看看這場世界末日能不能結束於你所引導的戰爭。

name: Uh-hum, are you free tonight? Are you interested in experiencing the charming side of the god of death in my room?
value: 啊啦，那今晚你有空麼？有無興趣來我的房間體驗一下死神“有魅力”的一面……？

name: It really disappoints me. It seems that I need to punish you tonight who doesn't understand the romance...
value: 真是讓我失望，看來今天晚上我有必要懲罰一下你這個不懂情調的傢伙了……

name: Nature does sometimes bring disasters, but this is a destiny directed by heaven, not a man-made disaster.
value: 大自然有時候確實會帶來災難，但這是上天指示的命運，並非人為的災禍。

name: Although you often fight on the battlefield, I know that everything you do is to end the war as soon as possible.
value: 雖然你時常在戰場上拼殺，但我很清楚，你所做的一切也是為了儘快終結戰爭。

name: I hope you don't get too impatient when you get along with girls. Girls get angry even more terrible than the heaven cracks...
value: 希望你和女孩子相處的時候別太急躁，女孩子生氣起來可比天漏了還可怕……

name: Oh, is it? Then you must be very good at chasing girls. It takes a lot of patience to get along with girls...
value: 喔，是嗎？那麼你一定很擅長追女孩子了，和女孩子相處可需要不少耐心……

name: I am very pleased that you can agree. Everything has a destiny, and nature controls them all the time.
value: 我很欣慰你能認同，萬事萬物都有既定的命運，而自然無時不刻掌控著它們。

name: I certainly don't think other people can succeed, but if it is you... maybe there is a small possibility.
value: 其他人我一定不覺得能成功，不過如果是你的話……或許有小小的可能性吧。

name: I appreciate your kindness, but there is no need to do so, because this is the destiny that nature wants me to face.
value: 你的好意我心領了，然而沒有必要這樣做，因為這是大自然要我面對的命運。

name: Haha... No mortal has ever said something like this to me...Do you know what it means?
value: 嘻嘻……還從沒有凡人對我說過這樣的話……你知道這意味著什麼嗎？

name: Believe me, after experiencing countless adventures and excitement, you will feel that dull life is a kind of enjoyment.
value: 相信我，在經歷了無數的冒險和刺激過後，你會覺得平淡的日子是一種享受的。

name: Do you think so too?! Would you be interested in coming to my garden tonight to see the potted plants I plant?
value: 你也這麼認為嗎？！今晚有沒有興趣來我的花園看看我親手種植的盆栽？

name: Humph... Hope you can really have this consciousness. After all, justice requires extraordinary courage.
value: 哼……希望你確實能有這個覺悟，畢竟正義之舉需要超凡的勇氣。

name: Courage comes from your consciousness. When your consciousness is unassailable, nothing can stop you on the battlefield.
value: 勇氣源自於你的理念，當你的理念堅不可摧時，戰場上將沒有敵人能夠阻擋你。

name: I can send you to heaven right now, but there is no return. Do you want to have a try?
value: 我現在就可以送你去天堂，不過有去無回，想試試麼？

name: I don't know, but judging from the screams from the sulfur fiery pits of hell every day, it should be a very exciting place.
value: 這我可不清楚，但從地獄硫磺火坑每天傳出的慘叫聲來看，應該是個挺刺激的地方。

name: Do you think it is really the devil who destroys this world? Or it is the evil thoughts hidden in the hearts of people or gods?
value: 你覺得毀滅這個世界的真的是惡魔嗎？還是潛藏在人或神心中的邪念呢？

name: I don't know either, but I'd rather say that I hope you can solve this problem one day.
value: 我也不知道，倒不如說我希望看到有一天你能解決這個問題。

name: Are you kidding me? ! If it is true, I must give you a few punches to confirm that you are not dreaming!
value: 你在開玩笑麼？！如果是真的話，我一定要給你幾拳確認你不是在做夢！

name: I would be happy to find a choir to sing hymns to her every day for hundreds of years, until she can't stand then pleads guilty and repents.
value: 我很樂意找個唱詩班每天對她唱聖歌，唱上個幾百年，直到她受不了認罪悔過為止。

name: As a commander of the gods, courage and rationality are all needed, but rationality is the prerequisite for all correct judgments!
value: 作為眾神的統帥，果敢與理性缺一不可，但理性是一切正確判斷的前提！

name: What... what are you going to do? ! The people around us.. They are watching us! I'm going to be angry if you don't let go!
value: 你……你要做什麼？！周圍的人……都在看著我們呐！再……再不放手我要生氣了！

name: So, when is the next battle? I am looking forward to fighting against powerful enemies.
value: 所以，下一場戰鬥是什麼時候？我很期待與強敵在戰場上拼殺的時刻。

name: We will achieve glory in the name of Valhalla! I hope that we can be invincible under your command!
value: 一切榮耀歸於英靈殿，希望在您的指揮下我們能夠戰無不勝！

name: Because my body harbors the souls of many Valkyries, I can use all of their combat techniques.
value: 其實由於我體內集合了眾多女武神們的靈魂，所以我能運用她們每個人的作戰技巧。

name: No problem! With your aptitude and perception, you can easily master all of these skills!
value: 沒問題！以指揮官您的資質和悟性，學會這些技巧並不是什麼難事！

name: I don't know, but I felt all of my sisters resonating when I arrived in response to your summons.
value: 我也不清楚原因，但在順應您的召喚而降臨時，似乎所有的姐妹們都產生了共鳴。

name: Of course we do. But when we disagree, I stop to meditate. Then, within my mind, we battle each other. When it is over, all of us listen to the winner.
value: 當然會，但遇到爭執的時候，我們會在冥想中打一架，誰贏了就聽誰的。

name: Valkyries are excellent warriors, but unfortunately we are poor military advisors.
value: 我們女武神是優秀的戰士，但很可惜，我們並不是優秀的軍師。

name: Based on our previous victories, your battle tactics have proven to be sound.
value: 毋庸置疑，從我們之前勝利中，已經證明了您策略的合理性。

name: Yes! It is a spectacular palace that is also the sanctuary of all the Nordic Valkyries.
value: 是的！那是一座擁有無比魅力的壯觀建築，也是北歐所有女武神所在的聖殿。

name: Yep! If you want to experience blissful peace, you can visit my room tonight. I'm sure you'll enjoy your stay...
value: 是啊！如果想體驗的話，可以今晚來我的房間……我保證您會喜歡上這段時光的……

name: Well, it may take a long time to craft, maybe for two or three hundred years...
value: 喔對了，打造的時間會有些漫長，你可能得耐著性子等上兩三百年……

name: If you are unlucky, the artifact may bring curses. But don't worry, it won't kill you. At most, you will have nightmares for a few days...
value: 如果運氣不好，神器會帶有詛咒，不過放心，死不了人的，頂多讓你做幾天噩夢……

name: But if there are no weapons, how can a kind person resist the invasion of evil?
value: 但如果沒有武器，善良之人又如何抵禦邪惡的入侵呢？

name: Perhaps you are right. Weapons should be used to defend our homeland, not to invade and pillage the weak.
value: 或許你是對的，武器應當用於保衛家園，而非入侵和掠奪弱者。

name: It is very similar to your brave and skillful character. Speed is precious in war. There is no more effective tactic than to quickly assault the enemies' weaknesses.
value: 和你勇猛善戰的性格很像，兵貴神速，沒有比快速突擊敵方弱點更有效的戰術了。

name: It surprised me. I never realized that your archery level is so high!
value: 挺讓我驚訝的，我一直沒發現你射箭的水準有如此之高！

name: I can boast to say that there have never been any problems with the weapons I have made so far!
value: 我可以自誇地說，至今為止我所製作的武器，可從來沒有出過任何問題！

name: Yes, a craftsman often needs to have the experience of building hundreds of equipment before he can become a master of a generation.
value: 是的，一名工匠往往要擁有打造成百上千件裝備的經驗後，才能成為一代名師。

name: I know you never let me down. There is no better opportunity to create a new order in doomsday.
value: 我就知道你從來都不會讓我失望，沒有比世界末日更容易創造一個新秩序的機會了。

name: Well, You can't shield it from me. You already have ambitions to command all the gods, right?
value: 啊啦……你瞞不住我，你早就有將各大神系神明收入麾下的野心了，對吧？

name: Really? Are you comforting me? But even if you just simply comfort me, I'm pretty happy...
value: 真的麼？你不是在安慰我吧？不過就算你只是安慰我，我也挺高興的就是了……

name: Ah, after rule the world, even if I am a devil, I can stay with you justifiably every day, can't I?
value: 啊啦，統治世界之後，就算我是惡魔，不也可以名正言順地和你每天呆在一塊了麼？

name: Really, my little one? So why is it me that is talking to you intimately here, not other girls?
value: 是麼，小可愛？那麼為什麼現在和你在這裡親密交談的是我，而不是別的女孩子呢？

name: Ah...what an honest guy, are you interested in coming to my room tonight and spending a long night with me?
value: 啊啦……真是個誠實的傢伙呢，今晚有興趣來我的房間，陪我度過漫漫長夜麼？

name: Yes, I'm very interested in making friends with them, such as the guy named Michael...
value: 是啊，我很有興趣和她們好好親熱親熱，比如她們中那個叫米迦勒的傢伙……

name: It surprised me! I never thought you could really accept such extreme but wise advice!
value: 真讓我驚訝！我可從沒想過你真的能接受這麼極端但明智的建議呢！

name: Hmm...your figure is also suitable for dancing! Are you interested in learning from me?
value: 嗯……你的身材也很適合跳舞呢！有興趣讓我教教你嗎？

name: Hum...Dance is not only performance. If it is combined with the use of weapons, it can become a very deadly offensive method!
value: 哼哼……舞蹈可不僅是表演，如果搭配上武器的運用，可是非常致命的進攻手段！

name: You are lucky! Give this special coin to you as a souvenir! Don't despise it, you will have good luck with it!
value: 你運氣不錯呢！這枚特殊的硬幣送給你作為紀念吧！別小瞧它，帶著可會有好運喔！

name: Unfortunately, it came down heads. It seems that as the goddess of victory, even if tossing a coin, I will never lose!
value: 太遺憾了是正面，看來作為勝利女神，哪怕是猜硬幣，我也從來不會輸給任何人呢！

name: I will be proud of this. I look forward to supporting my companions as best as I can in future battles.
value: 我會以此為榮的，我很期待能夠在未來的戰鬥中，繼續盡力地支持同伴們。

name: I... I actually had this idea a long time ago... I just...just too shy to tell others...
value: 我……我其實很早就有這樣的想法了……只是……只是不好意思和大家說……

name: You're not wrong. But without law, the world would lose all sense of fairness and principle.
value: 我並不反對你這樣說，但如果沒有律法，世間的萬事萬物都將失去原則和公平。

name: That pleases me. As the commander of the gods, you must understand the importance of law. An army needs order.
value: 我很欣慰您作為眾神的指揮官，能夠明白律法對於軍團的重要性。

name: The wicked will always stand trial for their evil acts. They can never escape the goddess of vengeance.
value: 審判永遠跟隨著為惡者的命運，他們永遠無法逃脫復仇女神的腳步。

name: Humans are the most unbridled and conceited race I have ever seen. Perhaps this is what allows humans to change their fate.
value: 人類是我見過的最狂妄的種族，但或許正是這樣，才讓人類擁有了改變命運的機會。

name: Justice has been difficult to reach since ancient times, but I will not shy away from trying. And because crime is an endless problem, my vengeance will also be endless.
value: 自古正義難成，但我絕不會因此而退縮，罪惡不盡，復仇不止。

name: I don't want to see you share my fate. Revenge and justice are heavy burdens. I would rather see you smile.
value: 我並不希望你背負和我的命運，復仇和正義都太沉重了，我更願意看到你的微笑。

name: I want to get rid of this ability, because instead of improving combat power, I care more about not being able to face the person I like...
value: 我倒想去掉這能力，因為相對於提升戰鬥力，我更在意不能與中意的人四目相對……

name: It seems that you already have a girl you like. If you have such skill, you can't look at her well.
value: 看來你已經有喜歡的女孩子了啊，如果擁有這樣的力量，就不能好好欣賞她了。

name: Hmm...well...then the next question is, do you mind the love between humans and the Gorgon...
value: 嗯……這樣啊……那麼下一個問題是，你會介意人類與蛇發女妖之間的戀情麼……

name: Ah... but this seems to make me even more yearning for this forbidden love...
value: 啊……但這樣好像反而讓我對這種禁斷之戀更憧憬了呢……

name: Are they? ! Then I want to know, what kind of fashion do young human girls like to wear at this time?
value: 是麼？！那麼我想知道，這個時代年輕的人類女孩子喜歡穿什麼樣的時裝？

name: Ah... I'm embarrassed to hear that! It seems that inner and personality is the greatest charm...
value: 啊……你這麼說我還挺不好意思的！看來內在和性格才是最大的魅力嗎……

name: Are you interested in chatting with me tonight? Perhaps the wines from Crete can make us enjoy a wonderful evening.
value: 今晚有興趣陪我聊聊麼？或許克里特島的葡萄酒可以讓我們享受一個美妙的夜晚。

name: Human beings were born in the dark, but yearn for the light. This is really an interesting thing...
value: 人類於黑暗中誕生，卻嚮往光明，這實在是一件有趣的事情……

name: Yes, maybe destiny also hopes that I will not interfere too much in the disputes in this world...
value: 是啊，或許命運也希望我不要過多干涉這個世界的紛爭……

name: Ahh.. no human beings have said this to me yet, but if you want, I am looking forward to spending time with you.
value: 啊啦……至今還沒有人類對我說過這句話，但若你願意，我很期待和你共度的時光。

name: Yes, you are right! Although my combat power is not the strongest, the most important thing in war is reconnaissance and communication!
value: 就是說嘛！雖然我的戰鬥力並非最強，但戰爭最重要的可是偵察和通信呐！

name: It will never happen! If you don't believe me, I can fly with you and let you see it with your own eyes!
value: 不會發生這種事的！如果不信的話我可以抱著你一塊飛，讓你親眼見識一下！

name: Next time I will draw a sketch of you! In this way, our combat power can be doubled!
value: 下次我來畫一張你的寫生！這樣我們的戰鬥力就可以增加一倍啦！

name: Are you interested in learning? I can teach you! But I have to make sure that your drawing skills are not too bad...
value: 有興趣學嗎？！我也可以教你喲！不過我得先確認你的繪畫技巧不會太糟……

name: After this disaster is over, I will be happy to study the Chinese lute and music theory with you for the rest of the time.
value: 等這場災難結束後，我很樂意在餘下的時光中和你研究琵琶與樂理。

name: The performance of musical instruments requires a tranquil heart and an elegant atmosphere. If you want to listen, come to my room at night...
value: 樂器的演奏需要寧靜的心與優雅的氛圍，如果你想聽的話，晚上來我的房間好了……

name: If it is you to lead the gods and quell the war, this day might come as soon as possible...
value: 如果是由你來統領眾神，平息戰爭的話，這一天或許能儘早到來……

name: You are right. Depression will only bury hope and determination. Instead of sighing, it is better to fight this doomsday destiny.
value: 你說得對，消沉只會埋沒希望和決心，與其歎息，不如向這末日的命運抗爭。

name: Well... As hell's number one idol and Lucifer's leading pioneer, Lilith's recent performance is not enough!
value: 啊……作為地獄的頭號偶像和路西法的首席先鋒，莉莉絲最近的業績又不夠啦！

name: Stop being suspicious! If you are willing to sign, Lilith is happy to give you a solo show!
value: 別多疑啦！如果你願意簽的話，莉莉絲很樂意給你開一場單獨的演出喔！

name: The power of nature is always worthy of trust and reliance. She can fight better than me on the battlefield!
value: 大自然的力量總是值得信任和依靠的，在戰場上她可比我更能打呢！

name: Well, on the battlefield, many enemies said the same before being stunned by her!
value: 啊啦……在戰場上，不少敵人在被她拍暈前也是這麼說的呢！

name: Hum...Look at this awakening power. Sooner or later I will become the leader recognized by my companions!
value: 哼哼……看看這逐漸覺醒的力量，我遲早會成為同伴們認可的領袖！

name: Why I feel that you have no confidence in me. Do you want me to give you a punch to prove it? !
value: 怎麼感覺你對我沒什麼信心，要我給你一拳證明一下嗎？！

name: It seems that there is no difference between gods and humans. Heroes will also fight to implement the correct ideas.
value: 看來神與人確實沒什麼差別，英雄也會為貫徹正確的理念而戰鬥的。

name: I think so too. Instead of wasting time fighting every day, I'd rather sit down and have a cup of black tea and play poker games.
value: 我也這麼想，有時間天天打架，不如坐下來喝杯紅茶，玩一局撲克。

name: What are you talking about! Wait, where are you looking at? ! I'm going to be angry! !
value: 你在說什麼呢！等……等等！你在看哪裡？！我要生氣了！！

name: I think so too! The witch costume is a symbol of justice and elegance!
value: 我也這麼覺得！巫女服可是正義與高雅的象徵呐！

name: Humph! After solving the monster's troubles at the moment, I am looking forward to competing with you on the court!
value: 哼！等解決眼下魔物的麻煩後，我很期待和你在球場上過幾招！

name: At least you are definitely not as strong as me in hitting. The broken windows in the classroom are all my masterpieces of home runs!
value: 至少擊打方面你肯定沒我強，教室碎掉的窗戶可都是我本壘打的傑作呐！

name: You... why are you staring at my breasts? ! That does not affect my bow!
value: 你……你為什麼盯著我的胸部看？！這可沒影響我拉弓！

name: Humph! My eyes are not bad at all. It is not a problem to throw an apple with a knife within ten meters!
value: 哼！我眼神可一點也不差，至少十米內用小刀丟中蘋果不成問題！

name: Haha! Youth are valuable on the field and on the beach!
value: 嗯！青春可是得在賽場和沙灘上揮霍才有價值呢！

name: What you said is really direct... Well, though I am confident about my figure...
value: 你這話真是直接……嘛，雖然我對自己的身材很有自信就是了……

name: There is no need to doubt that everyone who has left the world will always meet again in another way.
value: 沒必要懷疑，每個從世上離去的人，總會以另一種方式再次相遇的。

name: Haha...When you leave this world, maybe you will understand...
value: 呵呵……等你離開這個世界的時候，或許你會理解吧……

name: This was also my choice, but after witnessing countless farewells, all I have left is loneliness...
value: 這也是我曾經的選擇，但在見證無數離別後，我剩下的卻只有孤獨……

name: That is quite an interesting answer. As human beings, life is like fireworks-short but brilliant.
value: 有趣的回答呢，作為人類，如煙花一般的生命，短暫而燦爛。

name: Oh, it feels like you and I are so similar. Maybe you also have a little string in my fate?
value: 喲，感覺你我有那麼點相似呢，難道你在我命運中也有一絲羈絆？

name: Huh... It's fun to watch human beings struggle helplessly in front of an unchangeable destiny...
value: 哼……觀賞人類在不可改變的命運前無奈掙扎，倒也是種樂趣呢……

name: Heehee... Staying with me, a girl in charge of bad luck, can at least protect you from bad luck.
value: 嘻嘻……和我這個掌管厄運的少女呆在一塊，至少能保護你不倒楣吧。

name: Heehee...If you don't throw away the banana skin after eating the banana, you should be able to dodge a bullet...
value: 嘻嘻……如果你吃完香蕉不亂丟香蕉皮的話，應該能躲掉一劫……

name: Let me see who you like...Wow! You are such a bold person!
value: 讓我來看看你喜歡的人是誰……什……什麼呀！你真是個大膽的人呢！

name: Ah, destiny tells me that you will like a cute girl with cat ears and she likes sleeping late...
value: 啊，命運告訴我，你會喜歡上長著貓耳，愛睡懶覺的可愛女孩子呢……

name: I am not so feeble! But... But if you want to comfort me, I'll make a change to let you hug me!
value: 我可沒這麼軟弱！但……但你想安慰我的話，就破例讓你抱一下好了！

name: Wow... it's rare that you can say such artistic words, it surprised me...
value: 喲……難得你能說出這麼有藝術感的話呢，真是讓我驚訝……

name: I know a good place to bask in the sun! But I have to ask first, are you... scared of heights?
value: 我知道一個曬太陽的好地方！不過我得先問問，你……有恐高症嗎？

name: Get used to it a few more times! Don't you want to have healthy tan skin?
value: 多曬幾次就習慣啦！不想擁有一身小麥色的健康肌膚嗎？

name: Come on, don't be so shy... Appreciating the beautiful figure of Egyptian girls is a kind of enjoyment!
value: 啊啦，別這麼害羞嘛……欣賞埃及女孩子的美妙身姿可是一種享受呢！

name: Really? ! Nuit thinks so too! In return, give you a kiss! Chu!
value: 真的？！努特自己也這麼認為！作為回報給你一個kiss吧！Chu！

name: My desert also longs for a gentle rain tonight...so...are you free tonight?
value: 我的“沙漠”今晚也渴求一場溫柔的雨滋潤呢……所以……今晚你有空嗎？

name: Umbrellas are too boring! Don't you think that a girl soaked in the rain is a kind of beauty?
value: 打傘可太沒情調了！你不覺得雨中渾身濕透的女孩子是一種美嗎？

name: It's easy to get thousands of money but hard to find a truly friend. Maybe my art exists for you...
value: 千金易得，知己難求，或許我的藝術就是為你而存在的也說不定……

name: If you are willing to stay with me forever, you will understand sooner or later...
value: 若你願一直陪伴我的話，你遲早會懂的……

name: Perhaps it is, the good and bad are ever-changing. Without the cruelty of war, how can the peace come...
value: 或許是吧，陰陽萬變，沒有戰爭的殘酷，何來和平的美好呢……

name: After this disaster is over, I will go around the world with you to restore this artwork.
value: 等這場災難結束後，我會和你一起去世界各地，好好修復這件藝術品。

name: Sometimes I sigh for the mercilessness of heaven and earth, but this is also the rule of nature and it is hard to break...
value: 有時我感歎天地的無情，但這也是大自然的規則，難以違抗……

name: Although I don't want to say that, kindness without power may just be weakness.
value: 雖然我並不想這麼說，但沒有力量的善良，或許只是軟弱而已。

name: It seems that we are heart to heart. I always hope that I can be as gentle as the earth.
value: 看來我們確實心有靈犀，我一直希望自己能夠如大地般溫柔。

name: It seems that you can see the enthusiasm for art in my heart. Few people understand me like this.
value: 看來你能看到我內心中對藝術的那份熱忱，很少有人會這樣理解我。

name: Are you? As the best archery of the Yamato god pedigree, it becomes more worthy to compete with you!
value: 是嗎？那作為整個大和神系最強射手的我，就更有和你一較高下的價值了！

name: After mastering the skills, it is very simple. If you are interested, I can teach you personally!
value: 掌握技巧之後還是很簡單的，如果你有興趣的話，我可以親自教你哦！

name: Is that thing called TV? What kind of magic can lock people in boxes...
value: 那玩意叫“電視”麼？到底是什麼魔法可以做到把人關進盒子裡的……

name: I thought it was a monster, so I shot it with one arrow... Why did you look at me and laugh! Did I do something stupid?
value: 我以為是魔物，就一箭把它射爆了……你為什麼看著我笑！我是不是做了什麼蠢事？

name: That's really exciting! See you tonight! By the way, do you want me to prepare a yukata for you? !
value: 那真是太讓人期待了！晚上見！對了，要我幫你準備浴衣嗎？！

name: Humph... Are you going to date other girls? Your face is very red...
value: 哼哼……是要去和別的女孩子約會麼？你的臉很紅呢……

name: Ah! So this thing is called a camera... In terms of painting and recording, this thing is much useful than the magic!
value: 原來這東西叫照相機啊……在繪畫和記錄方面，這東西可比魔法好用多啦！

name: Why are you suddenly facing me... It's too sudden! Wait wait wait! I need to change into a more beautiful kimono!
value: 你怎麼忽然對著我……這太突然了！等……等等！我需要換一件漂亮些的和服！

name: Really? But it's a pity that you are not an ordinary mortal or an ordinary god, even I can't predict your future.
value: 真的嗎？但可惜的是你並非凡人或是普通的神明，即使是我也預測不出你的將來。

name: In fact, whether you are a mortal or a god, knowing your own destiny is not necessarily a good thing.
value: 其實不管是凡人還是神明，知道自己的命運未必是一件好事。

name: Are you referring to the three sisters of Nornir in Norse? Possibly, I feel that there are fragments of their souls in my body...
value: 你指的是北歐的諾倫三姐妹嗎？有可能，我感到身體裡有她們的靈魂碎片存在……

name: The three sisters of Moirai in Greece? Maybe...I feel that sometimes they appear in dreams...
value: 希臘的摩伊拉三姐妹？或許吧……我感到有時在夢境裡她們會出現……

name: After this disaster is over, I really hope to have the opportunity to enjoy the afternoon tea and snacks with you...
value: 這場災難結束之後，我很希望能有機會，和你一起享受茶和點心的午後……

name: It seems that you might be more suitable for this adventurous age when there are wars than a peaceful period...
value: 看來相比于安寧的和平時期，你或許更適合這個戰爭四起的冒險年代……

name: From ancient times to the present, most mortals would only ask me for help, and I never thought that there would be a day when I need help from a mortal...
value: 從古至今，凡人大多只會向我尋求幫助，我也從未想過會有需要凡人説明的一天……

name: Ah...Really? Then your fate is responsible for retrieving my lost divine power with me.
value: 啊啦……是嗎？那麼你的命運就是負責和我一起找回我失去的神力。

name: Really? I feel that these so-called titles and identities have no effect other than triggering a war between the gods...
value: 真的？我倒覺得這些所謂的稱呼和身份，除了引發神系戰爭外，沒起到什麼作用……

name: Yes. It is better to do something meaningful when you have time to discuss these things, such as... have a date with someone you like?
value: 就是，有討論這些的時間不如做一些有意義的事，例如……和中意之人來一場約會？

name: Because eventually these worldly things will usher in death, and the netherworld is the only eternal destination.
value: 因為最終這些世俗的東西都將迎來死亡，黃泉之國是唯一永恆的歸宿。

name: Oh? So if one day, I hope you give up everything that is mundane for me, what choice would you make?
value: 喔？那麼如果有一天，我希望你為了我放棄凡塵的一切，你會作何選擇呢？

name: Maybe you are right. I like the strong, especially those who are stronger than me and make me feel safe...
value: 你或許沒說錯，我很中意強者，尤其是比我更強、讓我能有安全感的傢伙……

name: Love is a romantic lie that most people talk casually, but you make me feel a warmth that I have never had before.
value: 愛是大多數人隨口說說的浪漫謊言罷了，但你卻讓我感受到了一種不曾有過的溫暖。

name: Hey...does it take so long to think about it? Or... I am not attractive enough in your eyes?
value: 喔喲……需要考慮這麼久嗎？還是說……我在你的眼中還不夠有魅力？

name: Oh dear... are you talking about me? Although I like straightforward people, being too straightforward is not romantic enough!
value: 哎呀呀呀……你是在說我嗎？雖然我喜歡直白的人，但太直白就不夠浪漫了呢！

name: Really? Let me guess, um... you have a virus called love, and there is no cure for it!
value: 是嗎？讓我來猜猜看吧，嗯……你得了一種名為“愛情”的病，已經無藥可救啦！

name: Emmm...is...is it a girl you like?
value: 那……那個……難不成你在想喜歡的女孩子？

name: I thought you were more interested in dogs! I also like cats very much, but I am weak to their changeable personality...
value: 我原以為你對狗狗更感興趣呢！我也很喜歡貓，只是拿它們多變的性格有些沒轍……

name: Really? ! I especially like Shiba Inu! They are gentle, smart, and lively, you will always be in a great mood with them!
value: 是嗎？！我尤其喜歡柴犬呢！溫馴、聰明、活潑，和它在一起你心情總會變得很棒！

name: Aha! I think so too! Cupid is too casual in her treatment of people and their fate! Love can't be a joke!
value: 哼哼！我想也是！丘比特在對待人和人的緣分上太隨性啦！戀情可不能開玩笑！

name: Awwwwww... I didn't expect that you are so gentle. Even if you think Cupid is better, I won't be angry!
value: 哎呀呀呀……沒想到你挺溫柔的嘛，即使你認為丘比特更優秀，我也不會生氣的喔！

name: No,I don't hate. I have seen a lot of duels on the battlefield, and have also seen romances born after these duels...
value: 並不，我見過很多在戰場上的對決，也見過這些對決過後誕生的戀情……

name: Hmph, I see the thread that binds you to the girls... It's so complicated that it's almost forming a net..oh my gosh...
value: 哼哼，我看見你與女孩子們羈絆的絲線……複雜得都快成一張網了……哎呀呀呀……

name: This is a long journey, but I would love to have your company.
value: 這可是趟不短的旅程，不過我很樂意有你的陪伴。

name: You are right. As far as the earth is concerned, no matter how many injuries it is, it will slowly heal over time.
value: 你說得沒錯，對於大地而言，無論多重的傷，都會隨著時間的流轉慢慢癒合。

name: Yes, especially after enjoying the afternoon sun with someone like you. How could it get any better?
value: 是啊，和自己中意的人一塊享受午後的陽光，還有比這更讓人更期待的嗎？

name: Mmm... Are you suggesting that I wear even less clothing when basking in order to cool off?
value: 啊啦……你的意思難道是……希望我在曬太陽時穿得更“涼爽”些？

name: Let's open a cat-themed café together after this war is over!
value: 哼哼，等這次戰爭結束後，我們一起去開一家貓主題咖啡廳怎麼樣？

name: Yes, in some Egyptian legends, cats are messengers of gods, and some can also become cute girls!
value: 是啊，在埃及的一些傳說中，貓是神明的使者，不少還能變成可愛的女孩子呢！

name: Oops! Where did you come from? I... I was just practicing some lines from a drama!
value: 啊！你什麼時候在那兒的！我……我只是在練習演話劇要背的臺詞而已！

name: Ah... I like that! It's the perfect line to shout after defeating a powerful enemy!
value: 啊啦……這臺詞真是太帥啦！很適合在擊敗魔物首領之後作為勝利者大聲喊出來呢！

name: Hmph! Indeed, Nuit possesses a lot power and charm among ...
value: 哼哼，努特在埃及眾神中無論是神能還是魅力確實都很優秀，但我還是略勝一籌呢！

name: It's rare to see you hesitate. Why don't you visit my room tonight and let me reveal the correct answer.
value: 啊啦……難得看到你這麼猶豫呢！要不要今天晚上來我房間，讓我告訴你正確答案？

name: As the main god of Egypt, I should not show any weakness in front of my companions. It was a only a private lament that I shared with you.
value: 作為埃及的主神不應在同伴面前表現出任何軟弱，我也只能和你感歎命運的殘酷了。

name: I would like that! Hugging you as the sun sets is the best comfort imaginable.
value: 嗯……偶爾在日落時分和你靜靜地擁抱一會，也是一種難得的安慰……

name: Really? Indeed, compared to other clothing, this style is the best at revealing a girl's skin and figure.
value: 是嗎？的確，這種風格相對於其他服裝，更容易展現出女孩子的肌膚和身材呢……

name: Normally, I'm not good at guessing, but the fire in your eyes tells me all I need to know...
value: 啊啦……我可猜不出來，不過每次從你身邊經過時，你火熱的眼神可不會說謊喔……

name: Actually... I quite agree with you as my commander, at least you are a strong enough commander!
value: 其實……我還挺認同你當我的指揮官，至少你是一個足夠強的統帥！

name: If others answer this way, I will definitely beat him up, but at least you have proved your insistence on justice with your actions.
value: 其他人這麼回答的話，我肯定會把他揍飛，但至少你用行動證明了你對正義的堅持。

name: This is the excellent quality needed as a commander of the gods! As your companion, I am proud of you.
value: 這正是作為眾神統帥所需要的優秀素質！作為你的同伴，我以你為榮。

name: There is no need to doubt yourself, even if you really fall into the abyss, I will always be with you.
value: 沒有必要質疑自己，即使你真的墜入深淵，我也始終與你同在。

name: Well, it isn't. Justice without power cannot fight against darkness, and tolerance does not mean indulging without principles.
value: 並非如此，沒有力量的正義是無法對抗黑暗的，寬容也不意味著沒有原則的縱容。

name: As a mortal, I am quite surprised that you can realize this truth, and your wisdom is worthy of appreciation.
value: 作為一個凡人，你能意識到這個道理我還是挺意外的，你的智慧值得欣賞。

name: I had met with Lucifer on the battlefield once. Although her behavior was not justified, she was unexpectedly principled.
value: 我在戰場上曾和路西法有過接觸，她的行為雖然沒有正義可言，但意外地挺講原則。

name: You are right, at least Michael, Raphael, and Gabriel will not agree to this easily.
value: 你說得沒錯，至少米迦勒、拉斐爾和加百列不會那麼輕易地同意這件事。

name: Haha... At least the time we were together was much more interesting than when I was alone.
value: 呵呵……至少我們在一起的這段時間，比我過去獨自一人時有趣得多。

name: Of course, I don't want to see you on the battlefield like a rookie, being beaten by the enemy then fly away tens of meters...
value: 那當然，我可不希望在戰場上看見你像個菜鳥一樣，被敵人打飛幾十米……

name: As a witch who is in charge of life and death, I not only guide the living creatures, but also need to illuminate the path for the dead.
value: 掌管生與死的巫女除了引導生靈之外，也需要照亮亡者們的道路喔。

name: This lantern illuminates the road to the underworld. Thanks to it, we can avoid a lot of monsters and troubles.
value: 這盞燈籠照亮的是冥界之路，我們能避掉很多魔物，少惹很多麻煩可都是拜它所賜。

name: Oh? Regardless of whether you can do or not, at least your current momentum is quite strong, I bet you can at least hold on for... a month?
value: 喔？不管是否能做到，至少你現在的氣勢還挺足，我打賭你至少能堅持……一個月？

name: If you hesitate, you will lose. This is from a legendary Japanese swordsman. Well... I guess you might have heard it...
value: 猶豫就會敗北，這話出自一名傳說中的日本劍客，嘛……我猜你說不定也聽過……

name: Ah...It really made me feel a little bit disappointed. I thought you would give me a bolder answer...
value: 啊啦……真是讓我有一點點小失落呢，我原以為你會給我個更大膽些的答案……

name: Ahhhhh...it would be too unromantic to tell you directly. How about coming to my room tonight?
value: 啊啦……如果直接告訴你就太沒情調和氣氛了，今晚來我的房間再告訴你怎麼樣？

name: Time is the best medicine to cure the earth. I only hope that this war can end as soon as possible.
value: 時間是治癒大地最好的良藥，我只希望這場戰爭能夠儘快結束。

name: It doesn't matter. The earth will always take something from me and give it to a more suitable person.
value: 其實無所謂，大地總會將從我這裡取走的東西，饋贈給更適合的人。

name: I fear she won't take our struggle seriously. She has also caused more trouble in Egypt than she has ever solved.
value: 她的性格大多數時候過於隨性，在埃及她惹的麻煩比她解決的還多……

name: She is indeed good at strength, but as the commander, you will soon realize that she doesn't quite understand what a command is...
value: 她實力確實不錯，但作為統帥，你很快就會認識到，她不大理解什麼叫做命令……

name: You are still too young. Only when you become the ruler recognized by the gods can you truly understand the meaning of loneliness.
value: 你還是太年輕了，當成為眾神都認同的主宰者時，你才真正算理解孤獨的意義。

name: Interesting. I have seen countless kings, and no one has ever said that. You are indeed a unique commander.
value: 有趣，我見過無數的王者，還從沒有人這樣說過，你確實是一名獨特的統帥。

name: It is the pillar of this Nordic country. As a former king, I miss the feeling of standing on the top of a tree and looking down on everything...
value: 它是這個北歐的支柱，作為曾經的王者，我很懷念站在樹頂俯視一切的感覺……

name: Few humans will give me such a firm answer, maybe you can really become the leader of the gods.
value: 很少有人類會給我這麼堅定的回答，或許你真的能成為眾神的領袖。

name: Hmph...If other people say this, I will only think that he is a fool, but I agree with your ability and wisdom.
value: 哼……其他人說出這樣的話，我只會認為他是個愚者，但我認同你的能力和智慧。

name: This is a bet that risking life, but I believe that with you, there is no enemy that can make us fear.
value: 這是一場要拼上性命的賭局，但我相信有你在的話，沒有什麼敵人能讓我們畏懼。

name: I was willing to pay the price of one eye in order to gain wisdom, but I understand that the wise man will always be invincible.
value: 我曾為了獲得智慧而甘願付出一隻眼睛的代價，但我明白智者將永遠立於不敗之地。

name: I used to be the ruler of the gods, but you are the future of the gods. I hope you can hold this glory for me.
value: 我曾經是眾神的統治者，但你才是眾神的將來，我希望你能替我執掌這份榮耀。

name: It seems that the times have changed. Now, as a companion of the gods, it is indeed easier for me to get close to others than as the commander of the gods.
value: 看來時代變了，如今我作為眾神的同伴，確實比作為眾神的統帥更容易親近他人。

name: Really? It seems that someone deserves to spend a night on me and entertain him with a good bottle of mead.
value: 真的？看來有人值得讓我花上一晚的時間，和一瓶上等的蜂蜜酒好好招待了。

name: This is really distressing! My ideal is to be an idol!
value: 這可真讓人苦惱呢！我的理想可是當一名偶像啊！

name: Oh, really? ! To prevent accidents, should I find a rope to trap you on the mast?
value: 真的嗎？！為了防止意外，要不要我先找根繩子把你困在桅杆上？

name: Yes, doomsday is not over yet, I don't want to see erupting volcanoes and dusty ruins.
value: 是啊，末日還沒結束，我可不想去看噴發的火山和滿是塵埃的廢墟。

name: Of course I can go ashore, the premise is that you can hold me, haha...
value: 我當然能夠上岸，前提是你抱得動我的話，嘻嘻……

name: So that's true! This is so exciting...ah no no no.. so regrettable...
value: 原來真的是這樣啊！這實在是令人興奮……啊不不不！令人遺憾的事情呢……

name: Haha! How could I? I just want to see the face of the god of the sea who is majestic in the past...
value: 噗哧！怎麼會呢？我只是想看看，曾經威嚴無比的海皇大人如今的尊容而已……

name: Everything follows the rules of nature. There is no need to avoid fate. The tribulation will make the earth more solid.
value: 萬事萬物都遵循自然的規則，命運沒有必要回避，磨難會讓大地變得更堅實。

name: No, I won't. Everything is endless and cyclical. Even if it is silent for a while, it will eventually be reborn on the earth.
value: 並不會，萬物生生不息、循環往復，即便一時沉寂，也終會在大地的懷抱中重生。

name: So no matter what trouble you encounter, please tell me. At least I should face it with you.
value: 所以不管遇到任何麻煩，請一定要告訴我，至少我應當和你共同面對。

name: Hmm... It seems that in your eyes, I am much younger than I thought...
value: 嗯……看來在你的眼裡，我比想像中要年輕很多呢……

name: You have the same strong will and soul like mine. I hope that the gods can survive this calamity under your command...
value: 你有著和我一樣堅強的意志和靈魂，希望眾神能在你的統率下度過這場浩劫……

name: Indeed. No matter how strong a person is, he may not have enough reliable companions.
value: 的確，即使一個人擁有再強的力量，也未必有眾多可以信賴的同伴可靠。

name: Even the simplest flower can use its unique fragrance to dispel the dark clouds of war.
value: 即使是最樸素的花朵也能用它獨特的芬芳，驅散戰爭的陰雲。

name: Trees are a sign of recovery. Even they are not beautiful as flowers, they can slowly heal the scars of the earth.
