value: 3回合速度減少100，每回合損失5%的最大生命值

name: Heals team by 25% of Enmusubi's Max ATK. Bless each teammate with 60% chance of each for 2 rounds: Speed +50, CRIT +50%, Crit DMG +50%, RES +20%, and/or DMG Reduction +20%. If the angel in last position receives a buff in this way, Enmusubi gains a shield equal to 15% of her ATK for 1 round.
value: 緣結神迫不及待的想讓隊友找到屬於自己的幸福，給隊友加上美好的【祝福】，每種祝福有60%基礎概率給到6名隊友，5種祝福：速度+50、暴擊值+50%、暴擊傷害+50%、異常抵抗+20%、額外傷害減免+20%。持續3回合；陣法中最後一名隊友每有一個祝福生效，全隊回復緣結神最大攻擊力25%的血量，並給到自己15%最大攻擊力的1回合護盾。

name: Enmusubi will also release the confusion that belongs to love to the hated enemy, making the enemy [Dizzy]. Each type of confusion has a 60% basic probability to 6 enemies, and 5 types of confusion: [Break], [Poisoned], [Ignite] ], [Bleed], [Weaken] for 2 rounds, if the enemy has same debuff, it will suffer 85% M.DMG. This skill will be cast twice with the same effect.
value: 緣結神也會對討厭的敵方釋放屬於愛情中的【困惑】，讓敵人暈頭轉向，每種困惑有60%的基礎概率給到6名敵人，5種困惑：【擊破】、【中毒】、【燃燒】、【流血】、【虛弱】，持續2回合，如果敵人已有此類DEBUFF，則會受到85%的法術傷害。此技能會以同樣的效果施放兩次。

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_49
value: 回味過往的一段段緣分，繾綣意難終

name: Obtain non-dispellable shield of 15% Max ATK for 1 round
value: 1回合增加最大攻擊15%的不可驅散護盾

name: Damage +20% when against a weaker class
value: 攻方職業克制目標時傷害+20%

name: Damage -10% when against a stronger class
value: 攻方職業被目標克制時傷害-10%

name: Deals 100% M.DMG to all enemies. If the enemy is in [Sunder Armor] [Smash] state, DMG will be doubled. If the enemy is killed, 100% chance to releases this skill again. (This effect reduces the chance of triggering by 20% each time triggered)
value: 對敵方全體造成100%的法術傷害，如果目標處於【破甲】【粉碎】狀態，則傷害翻倍；技能釋放後如果有目標陣亡，則有100%幾率發動技能。（該效果每次觸發後觸發幾率降低20%）

name: Deals 120% M.DMG to all enemies. If the enemy is in [Sunder Armor] [Smash] state, DMG will be doubled. If the enemy is killed,  releases this skill again, up to 6 times. In addition, Freya's Divine retribution will penetrate the shields, causing damage that ignores shields.
value: 對敵方全體造成120%的法術傷害，如目標處於【破甲】【粉碎】狀態，則傷害翻倍；技能釋放後如果有目標陣亡，則會再次發動技能，總段數最多為6段，且芙蕾雅的天光神罰將會貫穿護盾的防禦，造成無視護盾的傷害。

name: Critical DMG increased by 50% for 3 rounds
Debuff RES increased by 20% for 3 rounds
DMG Reduction increased by 20% for 3 rounds
Enmusubi? Is it my illusion? Your godhead is much more powerful than before? !
value: 緣結神？我錯覺了嗎？你的神格強大了好幾倍？！

name: Indeed, it is better to say that I am here to ask you why.
value: 的確如此，倒不如說我正是為此來找你們詢問原因的。

name: It's not so much a powerful godhead... it's the power of faith...
value: 與其說是強大的神格……不如說是強大的信仰之力……

name: So, this is the power that is born from people's believes in destiny?
value: 難道是人們對緣分的信念凝聚在一起後，所誕生的力量？

name: There is no conclusion by just guessing. Perhaps a battle can explain many problems.
value: 光猜是沒有結論的，或許一場戰鬥能夠解釋很多問題。

name: It seems that this power can give a strong encouragement to the friendly and mess up hostile's minds.
value: 看來這力量能給與同伴強大的鼓舞，並讓對手心境混亂。

name: Your new godhead is not derived from popular belief...but a unique person.
value: 你的新神格並非來源於大眾的信仰……而是某個獨特的人。

name: Someone unique? what do you mean……
value: 某個獨特的人？您的意思是……

name: As the god who controls fate, she has had her own fate?
value: 身為掌控羈絆的神明，竟也會誕生屬於自己的羈絆？

name: I think Hera, who is also in control of fate, may be able to give you a perfect explanation……
value: 我想，同為掌控因緣的赫拉或許能給你一個完美的解釋……

name: So... why is the god of fate of Yamato interested in visiting Greece?
value: 於是……大和的羈絆之神怎麼有興趣來希臘閒逛了？

name: Under the guidance of Amaterasu, I came to Hera for an explanation of a problem.
value: 我應天照大神引導，來找赫拉閣下尋求一個問題的解釋。

name: No, a party without proper preparation would not amuse Lord Hera
value: 不行，沒有事先準備的聚會可沒法讓赫拉大人開心得起來。

name: Don't be so serious, Icarus, I know why she is here.
value: 別那麼認真，伊卡璐斯，我知道她來這裡的原因。

name: But before revealing the answer, I want to see how powerful her awakening power is.
value: 但在告訴她答案前，我想先看看她覺醒的力量有多強大。

name: So confused...Your abilities seem to be stronger now…
value: 你的能力似乎現在變得更加強大了……真是難以理解……

name: Amaterasu said that my ability was awakened by some kind of strong longing, is it so?
value: 天照大神說我的能力覺醒於某種強烈的思念，真的如此嗎？

name: Humph, it’s a statement that makes me jealous. To put it bluntly, someone fall in love with you.
value: 哼，真是讓我嫉妒的說法，直白講，就是某人喜歡上你了。

name: Ah? ! I never thought that someone would...
value: 哎？！我從來沒有想過有人會對我……

name: Go find the guy who is tempted by you, his head is full of you now.
value: 去尋找那個對你動心的傢伙吧，他現在正滿腦子想著你呐。

name: For 2 rounds, cannot act, gain 90% DMG Reduction and restore 20% of Max HP per round
value: 2回合無法行動，每回合回復20%自身最大生命值，獲得90%傷害减免

name: 1 round of Mark with fire, each fire mark will increase ATK by 50% of Penetrating Bomb(Neutral Status)
value: 1回合火焰標記，每層怒焰標記會增加透體灼彈50%的傷害（絕對狀態）

name: For 4 rounds, lose 8% of current HP per round
value: 4回合每回合損失8%的當前生命值

name: For 2 rounds increases M.RES by 100%, and when receiving DMG, apply [Scorch] to the enemy
value: 2回合魔抗新增100%，受到傷害反彈給敵人【灼燒】效果

name: ATK increased by 350%, turn all basic attack to crit hits and gain immunity to debuffs, lasts 2 rounds
value: 2回合攻擊力新增350%，普通攻擊必定暴擊，免疫不良狀態

name: Infinite rounds, [Moonlight] Mark caused by Lone moon(Neutral Status)
value: 無限回合，廣寒孤月所提供的【月光】標記（絕對狀態）

name: Infinite rounds, [Moonlight] Mark caused by moonlight sigil(Neutral Status)
value: 無限回合，明月共賞所提供的【月光】標記（絕對狀態）

name: Infinite rounds, ATK, CRIT increased by 5%
value: 無限回合，攻擊力、暴擊值新增5%

name: 1 round, receive 10% of Asura’s attributes bonus (CRIT, Crit DMG, FOR, P.RES, M.RES)
value: 1回合，獲得阿修羅10%的内容增益（暴擊值、暴擊傷害、韌性、物抗、法抗）

name: 1 round, receive 10% of Asura's attributes reduction (CRIT, Crit DMG, FOR, P.RES, M.RES)
value: 1回合，獲得阿修羅10%的内容减益（暴擊值、暴擊傷害、韌性、物抗、法抗）

name: 2 rounds, receive 12% of Asura’s attributes bonus (CRIT, Crit DMG, FOR, P.RES, M.RES)
value: 2回合，獲得阿修羅12%的内容增益（暴擊值、暴擊傷害、韌性、物抗、法抗）

name: 2 rounds, receive 12% of Asura's attributes reduction (CRIT, Crit DMG, FOR, P.RES, M.RES)
value: 2回合，獲得阿修羅12%的内容减益（暴擊值、暴擊傷害、韌性、物抗、法抗）

name: For 1 round, ATK decreased by 100% of Gemini's ATK
value: 1回合，降低雙子座攻擊力100%的攻擊力

name: Collect 55 Gemini Shards to summon Gemini
value: 集齊55個雙子座碎片可以召喚雙子座

name: Seeing countless different futures, joy, anger, sorrow, and joy alternate in various parallel worlds. \nGemini is always observing silently, constantly searching for the mystery of the universe and the ultimate answer hidden among us.
value: 見過無數各不相同的未來，喜怒哀樂在各個平行世界中交替。\n雙子座總是在默默的觀測，不斷尋找著宇宙的奧秘，那個潛藏在你我中的終極答案。

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_50
value: 超高傷害 強力的自保技能

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_51
value: 突破次元的壁壘，發生難以想像的融合

name: Gemini is a special goddess transformed from one of the zodiac constellations. Originally lacking divine power, she was granted deification for her valor in endless wars. Both black and white sides of Gemini possess powerful and contrasting skills. The white embodies order, while the black unleashes chaos. Both personalities are extreme and changeable.
value: 黃道十二星座之一幻化而來的特殊神明，原本不具備神力，但眾神無休止的戰爭讓其神格化。\n由象徵秩序的“白”與象徵混亂的“黑”組成，同時擁有正反兩種力量的她們非常強大，但性格也非常極端、多變。

name: Rather than looking at the cruel reality, I am more willing to spend my daily time with myself in the mirror…
value: 相比于看著殘酷的現實，我更願意與鏡中的自己度過每日的時光……

name: There is another diametrically opposite self in everyone's heart. Can you feel it?
value: 每個人的心中，都有另一個截然相反的自己，你能感覺到嗎？

name: What do you see in my mirror?
value: 你在我的這面鏡子中，看到了什麼？

name: Do you like me in black, or white?
value: 你喜歡穿黑色衣服的我，還是白色的？

name: I am also distressed from time to time. If the me in the mirror is the real me?
value: 我時常也會苦惱，我和鏡子裡的自己，到底哪一個才是真實的我？

name: What you said is right... During the time we were together with you, we did experience a warmth we never had before…
value: 你說的也對……我們和你在一起的這段時間，確實體驗到了不曾有過的溫暖……

name: Is that so? Maybe another self in your heart hasn't been awakened yet?
value: 這樣嗎？或許只是你內心的另一個自己還未覺醒而已吧？

name: Few people can see another figure in my mirror... It seems to be the proof of the intertwined fate of you and me...
value: 很少人能看見我鏡中的另一個身影……看來這也是你我命運交織的證明……

name: Ara...Black represents mystery and sexy, so you like mature and attractive girls...
value: 啊啦……黑色代表著神秘與性感，原來你喜歡成熟而有魅力的女孩子呢……

name: I think so, but sometimes we share the same feelings, and sometimes we have different thoughts...
value: 我也這麼想，但有時候我們心意相通，有時候卻同床異夢呢……

name: Heehee...You mean you feel lonely alone? So... do you want us to accompany you tonight?
value: 嘻嘻……你的意思是自己一個人感到寂寞了？那麼……今晚要我們陪你嗎？

name: What kind of person is she? Will she be your confidant? Or... will she be your enemy?
value: 她是什麼樣的人呢？會是你的知己嗎？還是說……會是你的敵人呢？

name: Oh? Yeah? Compared to your lies, your expression is very honest... hee hee…
value: 喔？是嗎？相對於你的謊言，你的表情可是很誠實呢……嘻嘻……

name: Hmm...White represents purity and tenderness. It seems that you like pure and cute girls!
value: 嗯……白色代表著純潔和溫柔，看來你喜歡清純可愛的女孩子呀！

name: Maybe it really doesn't make much sense. After all, we are all real, so why separate each other?
value: 或許確實沒什麼意義，畢竟我們都是真實存在的，何必分出彼此呢？

name: The Package has been sold out
Well well, ever since we were exiled to the Eastern Continent, we have never remembered the past.
value: 話說，自從流落到東方大陸後，我們一直記不起過去的事。

name: Ara? Are the two children most beloved by the Eastern goddesses also in the rebellious period?
value: 啊啦？東方眾神最寵愛的兩個孩子，也到叛逆期了嗎？

name: We just want to know where exactly we were from...
value: 我們只是很想知道，自己究竟是何處的神明而已……

name: I remember Amaterasu, you... seem to know their origins?
value: 我記得天照大神你……似乎知道她們的來歷？

name: Yes, but I want to see if you already have the qualifications to face the memories.
value: 是的，但我希望看看，你們是否已經擁有面對回憶的資格。

name: It really surprised me, I thought you would attack indiscriminately and uncooperatively as before.
value: 真令我意外，我以為你們會像以前那樣毫無配合胡亂進攻。

name: Unexpectedly, now, the degree of your tacit understanding has been impressive.
value: 沒想到如今，你們的默契程度已經令人刮目相看了。

name: We were also surprised, as if the two souls were merged into one.
value: 我們自己也很吃驚，仿佛兩個靈魂合二為一了似的。

name: Being able to take into account both offense and defense, combining each other's strengths with tactics, impressive!
value: 能夠兼顧攻守，將彼此的優勢與戰術結合，很了不起呢！

name: It seems that it’s time for you to touch your own memories. Go to Northern Europe and ask Freyja.
value: 看來你們到觸碰自己記憶的時刻了，去北歐問問芙蕾雅吧。

name: I foresee your arrival, but I cannot let you pass.
value: 我預見了你們的到來，但我並不能讓你們通過。

name: We are just here to find our own past memories. Do you know anything about it?
value: 我們只是來尋找自己過去的記憶而已，您對此有所知曉嗎？

name: The Frost Queen, who has no emotions, is the source of fate that you are looking for...
value: 沒有感情的冰霜女王，是你們要尋找的命運之源……

name: She is the one who sealed your memory and banished you to the east.
value: 她是封印你們記憶，以及將你們放逐到東方之人。

name: Frost Dragon? Well, we must see her no matter what, please step aside!
value: 冰霜龍母？好吧，不管如何我們必須見到她，請讓開吧！

name: Humph... two interesting girls...
value: 哼哼……兩個有趣的少女呢……

name: Unexpectedly, the former enemies have now become tacit companions...
value: 沒想到曾經的仇人，現在成了默契無比的同伴……

name: You did not use all your strength to stop us...
value: 您並沒有拿出全部的力量阻止我們……

name: Even if I fight with all my strength, I may not be able to overcome the fetters between you now.
value: 我即使全力應戰，或許也無法勝過現在你們之間的羈絆。

name: Go meet your creator, she will tell you everything...
value: 去見你們的創造者吧，她會告訴你們過去的一切……

name: Are you... the twins who transformed from the eternal ice of Northern Europe?
value: 你們是……當年北歐的永恆之冰所幻化的那面雙子之鏡？

name: We don't know who we are, it's better to say that's what we are here for.
value: 我們並不知道自己是誰，倒不如說我們正是為此而來。

name: Your existence will bring disaster to the world...I can't let you leave again...
value: 你們的存在會給世界帶來災難……我不能讓你們再次離開……

name: But now your destiny seems to have changed, if you beat me...
value: 但如今你們的命運似乎產生了變化，如果你們勝得過我……

name: I will tell you all the truth, and your past...
value: 我就告訴你們一切的真相，和你們的過往吧……

name: Tell us, what kind of past we have...
value: 告訴我們吧，我們究竟有著怎樣的過去……

name: The twins in the mirror fell in love with the same person who looked into the mirror, and their jealousy turned them into enemies.
value: 鏡中雙子，愛上了同一個照鏡者，嫉妒讓二人反目成仇。

name: The curse is condensed in the mirror, and the memory disappears in their minds...
value: 詛咒在鏡中凝聚，記憶在她們的腦海中消散無蹤……

name: Now, the person outside the mirror is no longer there, and the sisters have recovered the fetters they once had...
value: 而如今，鏡外之人早已不在，姐妹們找回了曾經的羈絆……

name: Fate has always been obscure, think about it by yourself, you will understand it one day.
value: 命運向來晦澀，自己理解吧，總有一天你們會明白的。

name: If Gemini's HP is higher than 50%, release [Outward], and cause 200% M.DMG that ignores all M.RES and shield to all enemies. If Gemini's HP is below 50%, release [Inward], causing 150% of M.DMG to all enemies, and 100% of damage caused will be converted into HP.
value: 雙子座生命值高於50%，釋放技能【表】，對敵方全體造成200%法術傷害，此傷害將無視敵方全部法術抗性和護盾。雙子座生命值低於50%，轉為釋放【裡】，對敵方全體造成150%的法術傷害，造成的全部傷害的100%轉化為生命值。

name: Gemini attacks enemy with the highest ATK, causing 500% M.DMG. When Gemini's ATK is higher than enemy's, [Yang] is triggered, causing 500% additional M.DMG that ignores the shield. When Gemini's ATK is lower than enemy's, [Yin] is triggered, and applies [Weaken] to enemy for 1 round, enemy's ATK will be reduced by the same ATK of Gemini. If fail to apply [Weaken], 250% M.DMG would be added . (Won't trigger additional dmg if enemy dead)
value: “雙子座對敵方攻擊力最高敵人造成500%的法術傷害，攻擊力高於敵方時觸發【陽】，對敵方造成500%無視護盾的法術傷害。攻擊力低於敵方時觸發【陰】，對敵方施加1回合【虛弱】，攻擊力减少雙子座同等的攻擊力，虛弱未成功追加250%的法術傷害。 （敵方已被擊敗將無法觸發追加傷害）“

name: [Outward] [Inward] release at the same time, causing 220% M.DMG that ignores M.RES and shield to all enemies, and convert 100% of all damage caused into HP.
value: 【表】【裡】同時釋放，對敵方全體造成220%的法術傷害，此傷害將無視敵人全部法術抗性和護盾，並將造成的全部傷害的100%轉化為生命值。

name: [Yin] [Yang] released at the same time, causing 600% M.DMG to the enemy with highest ATK, and causing 1 round of [Weaken], reducing the ATK by the same ATK of Gemini, causing 600% additional M.DMG that ignores shield. (The enemy will not be able to trigger additional damage after being defeated)
value: 【陰】【陽】同時釋放，對敵方最高攻擊力敵人造成600%法術傷害，並造成1回合【虛弱】，攻擊力减少雙子座同等的攻擊力，對敵方造成600%的追加法術傷害，追加傷害將無視敵方護盾。（敵方已被擊敗將無法觸發追加傷害）

name: The trio of beach, sunshine and pinion
value: 沙灘、陽光和羽翼的三重奏！！！

name: Thanksgiving feast tableware, which can be obtained through events and daily idling, go and share the food.
value: 感恩節盛宴餐具，可通過活動和日常掛機獲取，快去分享美食吧。

name: Use tableware to share food to get diamonds and points
value: 使用刀叉餐具分享美食，可獲得鑽石和積分

name: Black Friday Discount
value: 黑五折扣 現時促銷

name: unlock the backgroud of hall page: Romantic Beach
Get Angelcoin(AC) that could be used for payment through recharge
value: 通過充值獲取代金幣(AC)，用於支付項購買

name: Signed up for PVP, unable to register again
Signed up for PVE, unable to register again
Signed up for PVP, please wait for event to start
Signed up for PVE, please wait for event to start
Whenever I've thought of making a vow to you, the other me could sense those private thoughts. I blush when I think she knows how I feel about you.
value: 啊啦……每每想到簽定誓約時，另一個我都能聽到只會對你說的……那些臉紅心跳的話……真是令人感到害羞呢……

name: Deals 200% P.DMG to 6 enemies and inflicts [Weaken] for 2 rounds. If the target is afflicted with a debuff, crit is guaranteed.\n\n[Weaken]: Decrease ATK by 50%
value: 對敵方6名造成200%的物理傷害，並使其進入【虛弱】狀態，降低50%的攻擊力，持續2回合；如果目標處於不良狀態，則必定暴擊。

name: Deals 350% P.DMG to 3 random enemies. If the target is afflicted with a debuff, inflicts [Frozen] for 1 round.\n\n[Frozen]: Unable to act.
value: 對隨機3名敵人造成350%的物理傷害，如果目標處於不良狀態，則會【冰凍】目標1回合，敵人將無法行動。

value: 幸運禮盒積分排行榜獎勵

name: Christmas Candy Cane, which can be obtained through events and daily idling, go and enjoy Christmas carnival.
value: 耶誕節拐杖糖，可通過活動和日常掛機獲取，快去享受聖誕狂歡吧。

name: Use lucky scroll to open gift box and obtain rewards
value: 使用此抽獎券可用用來開啟禮盒獲取獎勵

name: What do you think of war?
value: 你怎麼看待戰爭的意義？

name: Which of these Greek gods do you prefer: Zeus or Hera?
value: 希臘的主神，宙斯與赫拉二人，你更欣賞哪一位呢？

name: In war, which is more important: an army's strength or an ingenious strategy?
value: 面對即將到來的戰鬥，你認為軍隊的實力和精妙的策略哪個更重要？

name: Do you suspect an evil force is behind the catastrophe that we now face?
value: 你覺得這場神明之間的戰爭浩劫，會是某個幕後黑手所為嗎？

name: Even though I'm not the goddess of fate, countless people still come here eager to learn their futures.
value: 我並非命運女神，但依舊有很多人類渴望來我這裡傾聽自己的未來。

name: If the pursuit of the perfect lover would cost you your wisdom, would you still continue the chase?
value: 如果為了追尋一段完美的愛情，你願意付出失去智慧的代價嗎？

name: A strong army can overcome anything.
I would like to know my future as well.
An ingenious strategy can turn the tide of any battle.
value: An ingenious strategy can turn the tide of any battle.

name: Hmm... It seems you're overthinking things.
I don't think it would be worth it.
Yes. Although I'm in charge of war, I want peace more than anyone.
value: 是的，不管你是否相信，雖然我司掌戰爭，但卻是最期待和平降臨的神明。

name: She might be more attractive if she could temper her jealousy, show some humility, and act more intelligently.
value: 如果她能夠收斂幾分嫉妒，增添幾分謙遜與智慧的話，或許會更有魅力。

name: That is my favorite tactic, too! A direct, full-frontal attack by a strong army can trample any enemy into the earth.
value: 嗯，看來你也認為利用強大的戰鬥力正面進攻，反而是最合適的策略……

name: If so, our troubles are just beginning.
value: 如果確實如此，那這場世界末日恐怕會比我們想像中麻煩很多。

name: Sorry, but I would get into big trouble if I told you your future.
value: 喔，是嗎？但我並不能告訴你有關你的將來，不然命運女神該找我麻煩了。

name: Oh, really! So... tell me about this perfect woman for whom you would abandon all wisdom. Who might she be?
value: 是麼……？那麼，你認為什麼樣的女性……才算完美呢？

name: Indeed, but such glory comes at a high cost. Many lives are lost for such vanity, and I find that unacceptable.
value: 確實如此，但這種榮耀卻建立在殺戮與死亡之上，有些讓我難以接受……

name: Ha! You and Lord Zeus do have quite a few interests in common.
value: 呵呵……從某些興趣與愛好上來說，你和宙斯大人的確有很多相似之處呢……

name: I could tell that you are a mastermind of strategy.
value: 看來和我所想的一樣，你也是一位擅長以頭腦制勝的指揮者。

name: Still, I plan to investigate. There are just too many coincidences to be ignored. I must know the truth!
value: 我會繼續調查這件事的真相，畢竟還有太多讓人想不通的疑點和巧合。

name: And wisdom determines vision, doesn't it? With me by your side, you can control your own destiny.
value: 而智慧決定眼界，不是嗎？有我在你身邊的話，你一定能夠掌控自己的命運。

name: I'm glad to know that you value wisdom above all else, even if body instinctively continues its flirtatious pursuit.
value: 我挺欣慰的，看來至少在你的心目中，智慧依舊是最寶貴的東西……

name: Our vow unites us. Allow my wisdom and strength to help you find the courage to face your enemies and defeat them in battle.
value: 這份誓約象徵著你我意志的結合，願我的智慧能夠帶給你面對敵人的勇氣，願我的力量能夠引導你通向勝利的路途。

name: In Greek mythology, Athena is the goddess of war, wisdom, and art. She was born from the head of Zeus, the king of the gods, after he swallowed her mother Metis, the titaness of cunning.\nShe is a fierce and graceful warrior, a brilliant and creative thinker, and a patron of many crafts and skills. She excels at tactics and strategy, always finding a way to overcome any challenge or enemy.\nShe is the embodiment of courage, beauty and wisdom, with a divine power that inspires awe and respect.
value: 希臘掌控戰爭、智慧與藝術的著名女神，宙斯和第一代智慧女神墨提斯的女兒。\n她是兼勇敢、美貌、智慧於一身的神明，神能極為強大，是戰術與戰略上的大師。哪怕在絕境中，她也能找到一絲通向勝利的曙光。

name: Collect 55 Athena Shards to summon Athena
value: 集齊55個雅典娜碎片可以召喚雅典娜

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_53
value: 強勢驅散 高傷害單體技能

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_54
value: 戰神歸來，攜萬夫莫開之勢

name: This isn’t Olympus. It seems like I have been sent to a wrong place...
value: 這裡並非奧林匹斯山，難道我傳送的地點產生了偏差……

name: Um? From what we’ve seen...you must be...the angel of wisdom in Greece.
value: 嗯？據我們所觀察……你好像是希臘的……智慧女神？

name: I can feel that your godhead is very powerful, but you’re not the orthodox gods.
value: 我感到你們的神格非常強大，但你們不是正統的神明吧？

name: It’s not important whether we are orthodox or not, but we are the border guards of this sanctuary.
value: 是不是正統神明不重要，但我們是這片神域邊境的守衛。

name: So as the guards, it's our duty to see you off safely from here...
value: 而作為守護者，恐怕我們得把你“安全”地送出邊境……

name: But actually, your methods are not safe enough, are you?
value: 看來你們的手段不夠“安全”，不是麼？

name: Indeed, your combat power and tactics on the battle is extremely impressive.
value: 你在戰場上的戰鬥力和戰術安排，確實令人驚歎。

name: It's always best to break the core of your opponent's team, and I know that clearly as a commander.
value: 擊潰對手的團隊核心總是最有效的，身為指揮者我很清楚。

name: By the way, I guess that you’re looking for the Greek companions. I would like to apologize for my impoliteness...
value: 對了，你似乎在找希臘的同伴？作為剛才失禮的歉意……

name: Just let us do you a favor. Do you think opening a portal could help you?
value: 我們就幫你個忙好了，例如開個傳送門之類的怎麼樣？

name: Athena...?! Gosh, Lord Zeus, am I just dreaming?!
value: 雅典娜……？！天哪，宙斯在上，我是不是在做夢？！

name: I’m so disappointed that you’re not stuck in the divine realm forever.
value: 真令我失望，你這個討厭的傢伙竟然沒被永遠困在神界。

name: Time is cruel. Obviously, my wisdom has fallen out of the favor with the gods.
value: 時間真是太殘酷了，看來我的智慧已經不再被眾神所青睞。

name: No, please. Perhaps we can know you again on the battle, dear.
value: 別這麼說，或許戰場的較量能讓我們重新認識你，親愛的。

name: Come on, as the Greek lord god, I cannot wait to see how powerful you are now.
value: 來吧，作為希臘主神，我也想看看你如今的實力究竟如何。

name: Reverse the adverse situation brought by the opponent, and then fiercely lash back at the enemy.
value: 扭轉對手給自己帶來的不利局面，再加以更猛烈的反擊……

name: Don't you feel familiar? It was my most effective tactical strategy on the battle.
value: 不覺得熟悉麼？這正是我在戰場上最有效的戰術策略。

name: Hundreds of years ago, the little girl was debonair, but nowadays, she is quite violent...
value: 幾百年前那個溫文爾雅的小姑娘，現在可真夠暴力的……

name: Fortunately, she is the companion of Greek gods, not the enemy.
value: 值得慶倖的是，她是希臘眾神的同伴，而不是敵人。

name: Welcome back, dear. You might be more suited to active on the battle than you thought.
value: 歡迎回來，親愛的，你或許比想像中更適合活躍在戰場上。

name: God of War EX-Pure Sacred Body
Gain immunity to debuffs for 2 rounds
<size=29>Discount for Love with Time Limit</size>
value: 浪漫折扣 限時促銷

name: Consume 1 lucky scroll to gain 1 point
value: 每消耗1兌換券獲得1點積分

name: Opening all lucky gift boxes of this round to get all rewards.
value: 打開本輪所有幸運禮盒必得所有獎勵

name: Complete 2-19 dungeon can unlock double speed play
value: 通關副本2-19後可開啟2倍加速

name: Romantic snowy night, waiting for your surprise!
value: 浪漫雪夜，等待著你開啟禮物時的驚喜！

name:
Athena enters [God of War] for 2 rounds then deals 600% P.DMG to an enemy. If the enemy's HP is over 50%, it must crit. If the target is still alive, then Athena enters [God of War EX] until the battle ends (can stack, cannot be dispelled).

[God of War]: Purify herself from debuffs (including those cannot be dispelled) and immune to any debuff.
[God of War EX]: Increase DMG by 20%.
value: 雅典娜進入【戰神】狀態，淨化自身所有不良狀態（包含不可驅散類型），並且免疫任何異常狀態，持續2回合且不可被驅散；並且對敵方單體造成600%的物理傷害，敵人血量大於50%則必定暴擊，如果目標未陣亡，則雅典娜進入【戰神EX】狀態，使自身造成的傷害提高20%，持續到戰鬥結束（該效果可以疊加，且不可驅散）。

name: Athena deals 600% P.DMG to one enemy. At the same time, she gathers the energy of her allies. For each alive ally, except herself, adds an extra 50% P.DMG to her attack (up to 250%) (This damage will ignore the P.RES of the target).
value: 對1名敵人造成600%的物理傷害，雅典娜彙集隊友的能量，除自己外友方每一位存活的在場的女神，將會增加一段50%的物理傷害（此追擊傷害無視敵人物理抗性，最多250%）。

name:
Athena enters [God of War] for 2 rounds then deals 840% P.DMG to an enemy. If the enemy's HP is over 50%, it must crit. If the target is still alive, then Athena enters [God of War EX] until the battle ends (can stack, cannot be dispelled). If the target is killed, 10% of the exceeding damage is dealt as true damage to all enemies.

[God of War]: Purify herself from debuffs (including those cannot be dispelled) and immune to any debuff.
[God of War EX]: Increase DMG by 20%.
value: 雅典娜進入【戰神】狀態，淨化自身所有不良狀態（包含不可驅散類型），並且免疫任何異常狀態，持續2回合且不可被驅散；並且對敵方單體造成840%的物理傷害，敵人血量大於50%則必定暴擊，如果目標未陣亡，則雅典娜進入【戰神EX】狀態，使自身造成的傷害提高20%，持續到戰鬥結束（該效果可以疊加，且不可驅散）；如果目標被擊殺，則將溢出傷害的10%以真實傷害傳導到給全體敵方。

name: Athena deals 720% P.DMG to one enemy. At the same time, she gathers the energy of her allies. For each alive ally, except herself, adds an extra 50% true damage to her attack (up to 250%).
value: 對1名敵人造成720%的物理傷害，雅典娜彙集隊友的能量，除自己外友方每一位存活的在場的女神，將會增加一段50%的真實傷害（最多250%）。

name: The lance pierces the darkness like a ray of light, like a spring breeze that melts the frost. It gives me strength and hope in the face of despair.\nWar is always cruel. Though I have no desire join the fray, do not dare to provoke me.
value: 就像光芒射穿黑暗，像春風融化積雪，聖槍帶來了力量，帶來了希望。\n戰爭總是殘酷的，我不願參與戰爭，但是也最好別試圖激怒我。

name: Change greater than 500
value: 由於您的充值金額較高，請聯繫客戶進行人工登出

name: It seems like an ordinary chest, but the treasure hidden in it is gleaming.
value: 外觀看起來普普通通的寶箱，但隱約透露著寶物的光芒

name: The glittering advanced chest must be very valuable.
value: 金光閃閃的高級寶箱，看起來非常的值錢

name: Let's figure out what priceless treasure is hidden in the rare supreme chest.
value: 世間罕見的至尊寶箱，裡面究竟藏著什麼好東西

name: ACTIVITY_HOLIDAY_DROP_SUMMON_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 恭喜您在中秋排行榜活動中獲得第{0}名，以下為您的獎勵：

name: Use lucky bag to bless to get diamonds and points
value: 使用福袋進行祈福，可獲得鑽石和積分

name: What blessing will you whisper to me in the spring breeze?
value: 春風漸暖，你會在我耳邊說出怎樣的祝福呢？

name: Spring Festival blessing lantern, you can obtain it through the event, idle rewards and quick combat, go to enjoy your happy Spring Festival
value: 新春祈福燈，可通過活動和日常掛機獲取，快去享受新春快樂吧

name: Deal 250% P.DMG to 3 enemies in front row, inflict [Sunder Armor] effect which decrease DEF by 50% for 2 rounds, 50% chance to inflict [Stun] effect on enemies for 1 round
value: 對前排3名敵人造成250%的物理傷害，使其進入【破甲】狀態，防禦力降低50%，持續2回合，並有50%概率【眩暈】敵方1回合。

name: All teammates enter [Excite] state, increase ATK by 25%, Critical Value by 25%, Crit DMG by 25% for 3 rounds
value: 使我方全體進入【奮發】狀態，攻擊力增加25%，暴擊值增加25%，暴擊傷害增加25%，持續3回合。

name: Increase ATK, Crit, Crit DMG by 25% for 3 rounds
value: 3回合攻擊力、暴擊、暴擊傷害增加25%

name: Well, listen up, do you think who is stronger, Zodiac Ox or me?
value: 呐，我說，只談力氣的話，你覺得我和醜牛誰更大些？

name: What do you think of the wars among gods?
value: 你對神明之間的戰爭怎麼看？

name: Which one do you think is more powerful, courage or wisdom?
value: 勇氣與智慧你覺得哪個更強大？

name: Anyway, are you curious about how Zodiac Ox and I were summoned into this world?
value: 話說回來，你知道我和醜牛是怎樣被召喚到這個世界來的麼？

name: Hey! Is there any girl you like? How about me?
value: 喂！你有中意的女孩子麼？覺得我怎麼樣？

name: I do get a crush on someone.
Humph! I know the answer because I've never lost in terms of strength.
value: 哼哼！我就知道你會這麼說，拼力氣我還從來沒輸過誰。

name: I think so. Before I came to this world, I just thought those wars were as childish as kids' games.
value: 我也這麼認為，在來到這個世界之前，我覺得你們打仗簡直像小孩子過家家一般。

name: Yeah, brave persons will tend to be wise after experiencing the trials, but the wisdom without courage seems like a petty trick.
value: 嗯，勇敢的人往往能在磨練中變得睿智，但缺乏勇氣的智慧在我看來只是小聰明罷了。

name: Although sometimes I still want to go back, this world is more interesting than the original land...
value: 雖然我還有想回去的念頭，但我覺得這個世界更有意思……

name: Aha! Right? I'm not averse to competing with others for romance.
value: 哼哼！是嗎？我對有競爭對手的戀愛可是一點也不討厭呢！

name: Humph! It seems that you have no confidence in me! My punch will make you clear.
value: 哼！看來你對我很沒有信心啊！要我給你一拳，讓你體驗一下嗎？！

name: Humph! Just you wait, the climax of the wars among gods is coming sooner!
value: 哼哼！等著瞧吧，這場眾神大戰真正勁爆的時刻，現在才剛剛開始！

name: Right? Well, I cannot wait to punch you on the head to test that which one is powerful, courage or wisdom...
value: 是麼？哼哼，我很有興趣用拳頭在你的腦袋上測試一下勇氣和智慧哪個更強……

name: I prefer knowing the answer with my punch to guessing something. Watch this!
value: 我覺得相對於猜，我更偏好用拳頭得到答案呢，看招啦！！

name: I knew you were gonna say that! I'm really confident of my charming!
value: 我就知道你會這麼說！我對自己的魅力還是很有自信的！

name: Uh... What a hassle! It's better to fight against rivals rather than make vows!
value: 啊……誓約真是一個很麻煩的儀式呢！有時間說這些誓詞，不如早點回到戰場上去把敵人打飛吧！

name: Collect 50 Zodiac Tiger Shards to summon Zodiac Tiger
value: 集齊50個寅虎碎片可以召喚寅虎

name: Originally from the third Tiger in the Twelve Earthly Branches of the Chinese God. She was not a god but for some reason, she possessed an extremely terrifying power.\nJust like Zodiac Ox, she has experienced countless trials in the wars among gods so that she qualified to fight against the main gods.
value: 原出自于華夏神系“十二地支”中第三位的“虎”，其本身並非神明，但不知什麼原因具備了異常恐怖的神能。\n與醜牛一樣，在眾神戰爭中經歷了無數的磨練，使其力量足以和各大神系的主神級人物一較高下。

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_57
value: 針對前排 團隊增益

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_61
value: 超強團隊增益 獨特持續治療

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_62
value: 打不倒我的，都將使我們更加強大

name: The whole team enters [Ablaze] state, increasing DMG, healing effect, P.RES, M.RES by 30% for 3 rounds; Meanwhile, Capricornus enters [Selfless] state (cannot be dispelled) for 2 round, healing the whole team except herself after receiving damage, and recovering their HP by 10% of Capricornus’s ATK
value: 使我方全體進入【激昂】狀態，增加30%的傷害、治療效果、物抗、魔抗，持續3回合；同時摩羯座進入【奉獻】狀態（不可驅散），持續2回合。受到傷害後將治療除自己外所有友軍，使其恢復摩羯座攻擊力10%的生命值。

name: Restores HP to all team angels equal to 80% of Capricornus’s ATK, if Capricornus’s HP is lower than 50%, healing will be doubled; Meanwhile, all team enter [Heal] state, recover HP by 20% of Capricornus’s ATK in each round for 2 rounds.
value: 使我方全體恢復摩羯座攻擊力80%的生命值，如果摩羯座生命值低於50%，則治療翻倍；同時使我方全體進入【癒合】狀態，每回合恢復摩羯座攻擊力20%的血量，持續2回合。

name: The whole team enters [Ablaze] state, increasing DMG, healing effect, P.RES, M.RES by 40% for 3 rounds; Meanwhile, Capricornus enters [Selfless] state (cannot be dispelled) for 3 rounds, increasing FOR by 100%, healing the whole team except herself after receiving damage, and recovering their HP by 20% ATK
value: 使我方全體進入【激昂】狀態，增加40%的傷害、治療效果、物抗、魔抗，持續3回合；同時摩羯座進入【奉獻】狀態（不可驅散），自身韌性提高100%，持續3回合。受到傷害後將治療除自己外所有友軍，使其恢復摩羯座攻擊力20%的生命值。

name: Restores HP to all team angels equal to 100% of Capricornus's ATK, if Capricornus's HP is lower than 50%, healing will be doubled; Meanwhile, all team enter [Heal] state, recover HP by 30% of Capricornus's ATK for 3 rounds; And dispel 2 buffs on each enemy
value: 使我方全體恢復摩羯座攻擊力100%的生命值，如果摩羯座生命值低於50%，則治療翻倍；同時使我方全體進入【癒合】狀態，每回合恢復摩羯座攻擊力30%的血量，持續3回合；並且驅散敵方每名女神2個增益狀態。

name: Increase DMG, healing effect, P.RES, M.RES by 30% for 3 rounds
value: 3回合傷害、治療效果、物抗、魔抗增加30%

name: Heals all teammates except for herself after receiving damage
value: 受到傷害後治療除自己外所有友軍

name: Recovers some HP in each round
Increase DMG, healing effect, P.RES, M.RES by 40% for 3 rounds
value: 3回合傷害、治療效果、物抗、魔抗增加40%

name: Where is it... Why am I here?!
value: 這是什麼地方……我為什麼會被傳送到這裡來？！

name: Who are you?! This battle will not be related to any stranger.
value: 你是誰？！這場戰鬥不應該有陌生人插手才對……

name: You’re out of luck, dear, you happened to appear on the gods' battle land.
value: 看來你運氣不好，親愛的，偏偏此時出現在眾神交戰之地。

name: Anything wrong with summon spell, why is this happening all the time...
value: 是召喚咒文出錯的結果麼，最近怎麼總發生這種事……

name: Hum, the new guy? Alright, I just think that this battle is not fierce enough.
value: 呵，新來的傢伙麼？正好，我正覺得這場混戰不夠激烈呐！

name: Eh...? It’s over, right? It didn’t take me any strength to defeat you...
value: 哎……？打完了？我感覺自己還沒出手你們就倒下了……

name: You didn’t attack us, but your fellows came at us like crazy...
value: 你確實沒怎麼出手，但你的同伴在瘋狂地向我們進攻……

name: Sacrifice your own life to improve your team’s combat power...
value: 犧牲自己的生命從而提高團隊的作戰能力嗎……

name: Humph, it’s really hard for me to defeat a united team...
value: 哼，僅憑我自己的力量終究難以和形如一體的團隊對抗……

name: Ah, an interesting guy, I will remember you, dear.
value: 啊啦，看上去是個有趣的傢伙呢，我記住你了，親愛的。

name: According to rumor, she was originally known at the faun, Pan. She became Capricornus when her lower half permanently transformed into a fish's tail after she jumped into a river to escape a menacing foe.\nFor her dedication and valor in war, she was granted divine power and a place in the zodiac. She is known for her mercy and strong aversion to war. Her divine power can comfort and aid companions.
value: 黃道十二星座之一幻化而來的特殊神明，原本不具備神力，但眾神無休止的戰爭讓其神格化。\n她是所有星座中心地最仁慈的一個，對眾神之間的戰爭非常反感，但其強大的信念和神力卻讓同伴安心。

name: This world is more dangerous than I thought. Are humans and gods fond of wars?
value: 這個世界似乎比我想像中更危險，人類和眾神就這麼喜歡戰爭嗎？

name: It's said that my neighboring constellations were called away to help fight the gods' war.
value: 據說除了我以外，好像還有別的星座因為這次眾神戰爭而被召喚而來？

name: I'm sick of war, but as a cruel twist of fate, I possess a great power than that turn the tide of battle.
value: 對戰爭感到厭倦的我，偏偏獲得了如此強大的力量，這也是命運的玩笑嗎？

name: Well... Is there a girl you fancy?
value: 那個……你有喜歡的女孩子麼？

name: Divination is my specialty! Would you like for me to predict your future?
value: 占卜是我最擅長的了，需要我幫你預測一下未來嗎？

name: If one day you must choose between losing the war or sacrificing me, what will you decide?
value: 如果有一天，你必須要在輸掉一場戰爭和犧牲我之間做出選擇，你會怎麼做？

name: But the trials of war are also a way to develop yourself.
The power also can end the wars.
I wanna predict the battle progress.
I'm not gonna let that happen.
Well, I would like to work with you to put an end to these meaningless wars. Would you like that?
value: 那麼我就更有必要和你一起去阻止這些無意義的爭鬥了，你覺得呢？

name: I always prefer peace, though I admit that I love bonding with you during the harrowing fights on the battlefront.
value: 我始終期待著和平，雖然我承認在戰場上和你經歷生死一線的感覺挺不錯的。

name: I will be very lonely without them. I would love it if you would stay and keep me company.
value: 看來我有很長時間會挺孤獨的，如果可以的話，希望您能多陪伴我一會兒……

name: That's wonderful! It's important to stick with your friends through the darkest times.
value: 嗯……我覺得不管如何，多幾個同伴總是好事。

name: Maybe you're right. This war has brought us together. You are always on my mind, and no one could ever replace you.
value: 或許是這樣吧，至少命運讓我遇見了你，在我心中沒有比這更重要的事情了。

name: You're right! Used properly, my power can bring salvation to the whole world.
value: 你說的沒錯，我會好好使用命運所賜給我的力量，帶給這個世界救贖的。

name: Why are you always staring at me? Hmm... Are your eyes hinting at something?
value: 你為什麼一直盯著我看……你……你是在暗示什麼嗎……

name: Really? So tell me please, what kind of girl do you fancy?
value: 真的？那麼告訴我……你喜歡什麼樣的女孩子呢？

name: Ah, here’s the result! You’ll fall in love with someone who has horns and a fish's tail... Wait...wait a moment! That’s wrong! That’s not true.
value: 嗯，有結果啦！你會愛上長著羊角和魚尾的……等……等下！我算錯了！不是這樣的！

name: The results say, You are your own worst enemy. ...What's that mean? Did I read it wrong?
value: 嗯……結果顯示……“自己才是自己最大的敵人”？這是什麼意思？我的占卜出錯了嗎？

name: When that moment comes, you won't need to make that choice. Instead, I will choose for you.
value: 你不需要做出選擇，因為到那時，我會替你做出選擇的……

name: I believe in you, for you have always shown a knack for disentangling the knots of fate.
value: 是啊……我相信你，如果是你的話，一定有能力避免這種糾結的命運！

name: A vow is a kind of sacrifice, which means that from now on, we will live by one faith. I hope that our powers combine so that we can create a world worth fighting for.
value: 你知道麼？誓約是一種犧牲，一種為彼此信念的犧牲。願我的力量能與你結合，開創出我們所期待的世界。

name: Collect 55 Capricornus Shards to summon Capricornus
value: 集齊55個摩羯座碎片可以召喚摩羯座

name: Mercy doesn’t mean weakness. The individual sacrifice is for the daunting strength of the team to defeat the opponent. When the sacrificial ceremony with self sacrifice is completed, the enemy on the battlefield will be plunged into purgatory.
value: 仁慈不代表軟弱，犧牲的代價換來的往往是令對手膽寒的力量，在以自我為祭品的獻祭儀式完成之時，也是戰場上的敵人陷入修羅煉獄之刻。

name: Let the Cupid's arrow guide your romance！
value: 讓愛神的箭矢，為你指引戀情的方向吧！

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_25
value: 由象徵秩序的“白”與象徵混亂的“黑”組成，擁有正反兩種力量的她們非常強大，但性格也非常極端、多變。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_24
value: 她是兼勇敢、美貌、智慧於一身的神明，是戰術與戰略上的大師。絕境中，她也能找到一絲通向勝利的曙光。

name: Angel coins can be used to purchase the in-game paying items.
value: 天使幣可以用來購買遊戲內付費商品

name: ANGEL_COIN_COST
value: 您確定要花費{0}AC用於購買此項目嗎？\n當前剩餘{1}AC

name: Zhu Rong limited fashion credit
value: 火神祝融限定時裝信物

name: Can redeem Cupid Limited Fashion in Angel Fashion interface.
value: 皮膚介面使用，可以兌換丘比特限定時裝。

name: Can redeem Zhu Rong Limited Fashion in Angel Fashion interface.
value: 皮膚介面使用，可以兌換火神祝融限定時裝。

name: I may not be stay by your side all the time, but I swear by the angel that our vow will shine forever, anywhere and anytime.
value: 雖然我不一定能永遠駐留於你所在的時空，但我以天使之名發誓，無論在何時何地，我與你的約定都會散發出永不消逝的光芒。

name: What's Michael of this world doing? Is she still working on the dispute with Lucifer and monsters?
value: 這個世界的米迦勒在做什麼？她還在致力於解決與路西法以及魔物的爭端嗎？

name: I cannot still figure out if I should give up the hostile relationship between Lucifer and me. I'd better focus on maitaining the stability of the parallel universe.
value: 我始終不確定是否該解除與路西法的敵對關係，專注于維護平行時空的穩定。

name: I'm so glad to be one of the spokespersons belonging to the seventh domain to solve disasters in every parallel universe.
value: 我很慶倖能夠成為第七神域的代言人之一，去解決各個平行時空的災難。

name: Well, as I know, you have not figured out the concept of the seventh domain.
value: 嗯……據我所知，你應該還沒有瞭解過“第七神域”這個概念吧？

name: Do you believe that the doomsday judgement representing justice will come at some point.
value: 你相信象徵正義的末日審判……終將在某個時刻到來麼？

name: When other parallel universes get into the catastrophe, would you allow me to leave here and solve the crisis?
value: 當其他平行世界遭受滅頂之災時，你能允許我離開你，去那裡解決危機嗎？

name: I suppose it should be like that.
So would you like to tell me more about it?
Yep, it's a kind of glory.
What's the spokesperson of the seventh domain?
value: 什麼是第七神域代言人？

name: Nope, I have heard it from you.
I don't want that to happen. It seems horrible.
value: I don't want that to happen. It seems horrible.

name: Maybe I cannot bear to part with you.
Hmm...It's usual. After all, she and Lucifer are enemies like water and fire at least in this world.
value: 嗯……也挺正常的，畢竟她和路西法可是水火不容的關係——至少在這個世界如此。

name: You are right. We will face the more powerful enemy who can destroy the whole space time together.
value: 你說的沒錯，畢竟我和她都即將要面對一個能夠毀滅所有時空的、更強大的敵人……

name: Hmm...Maybe you cannot image that there is another you in the similar world asking me the same question.
value: 嗯……你能想像一個和這裡差不多的世界麼？那個世界也有一個你，也在問我這個問題。

name: In a simple word, it is the junction where all parallel universes join together and it's also the place trying to arrange heroes to solve the catastrophe.
value: 簡單說，那裡是所有平行世界的連接點，以及致力解決平行世界災變的英雄所在之處。

name: It seems that you have gotten ready to resist the fate and the disaster. May the light of the angels be with you.
value: 看來你已經做好了誓死對抗命運與災厄的覺悟了呢，願眾天使的光芒與你同在。

name: At least, I promise that I will never forget all the time staying with you wherever I am.
value: 至少我向你承諾，不管我去哪個世界，都不會忘記和你在一起的這段時光。

name: What a surprise! I thought that she was gonna stick to her principle of throwing Lucifer into the hell, like she always did before.
value: 真讓人意外！我還以為她會像當初那樣，貫徹不把路西法親手丟回地獄不甘休的理念。

name: Maybe you are right. An alliance between angels and demons is less likely than the sun rising from the west.
value: 或許你是正確的吧，天使與惡魔結成同盟的可能性，恐怕比太陽從西邊出來還小。

name: Maintaining the stability of all the parallel universes and eliminating all risk factors that will cause the space time chaos, which are the responsibility of the spokesperson.
value: 維護所有平行世界的穩定，消滅可能引發時空混亂的危險因素，這就是代言人的職責。

name: Eh? So weird. Did I confuse you with an identical being in another parallel universe?
value: 嗯？奇怪，難道我把你和另一個平行世界的相同存在弄混了？

name: When the doomsday judgement comes, all you'll hear a loud bang that sounds like BOOM! And then all the monsters will vanish forever.
value: 審判來臨時，你只會聽見“BOOM！”的一聲巨響，然後魔物就從這個世界上全部消失啦。

name: If one day we are separated into two parallel universes, I will do answer your call when you come back again.
value: 如果終有一天我們分隔在兩個時空，而你希望我回到身邊時，我一定會回應你的呼喚。

name: Causes 6 enemies to lose 10% of the current HP, which is True DMG less than double SP Gabriel's ATK, deals 220% P.DMG
value: 使6名敵人損失10%當前生命值，該傷害為真實傷害且不超過SP加百列攻擊力的2倍，並造成220%的物理傷害。

name: Attacks 1 enemy multiple times and each time causing the enemy to lose 10% of current HP, which is True DMG less than double SP Gabriel's ATK, and deals extra 560% P.DMG.  The P.DMG critical hit causes a 100% chance of an extra attack, and each extra attack reduces the chance by 35%
value: 對一名敵人進行多次攻擊，每次攻擊使該敵人損失10%當前生命值，該傷害為真實傷害且不會超過SP加百列攻擊力的2倍，並額外造成560%的物理傷害。物理傷害暴擊時有100%的概率追加一次攻擊，每追加一次攻擊，該概率降低35%。

name: Can redeem items in Eudemons hunting event
value: 可以在幻獸狩獵活動中兌換物品。

name: Defeat monsters to gain powerful eudemons
value: 擊敗怪物，換取強力幻獸

name: Use arrows to defeat monsters and gain hunting points
value: 使用箭矢射擊怪物，獲取狩獵積分獎勵

name: Used in Eudemons hunting event and attack monsters
value: 在幻獸狩獵活動中使用，用來對怪物造成傷害

name: Used to synthesize the elementals series in elder scrolls
value: 在上古卷軸中使用，用於元素精靈系列幻獸的合成。

name: Unconsumed hunting point is auto-saved and can be used at the next event
value: 未消耗的狩獵積分自動保存，可在下次活動使用

name: Spar Mine Master: When stationed at spar spring, increasing the productivity of spar
value: 晶礦大師：當進駐晶石之泉時，提升晶石的產量。

name: Origin of Life: Increase HP of all line-up angels
value: 生命之源：提升所有上陣女神的生命值。

name: As one of the four major natural elementals, she represents tranquil water. Anyone who passes holy spring has the chance to witness her birth.She is the most intelligent and calmest one of her kindred, and no matter how big the trouble is, it is only a small case for her.Because of owning the power of water elemental, she is familiar with the spar development process. In addition, she can provide strong HP magic support for the angels on the battle.
value: 她是自然界四大元素中象徵“寧靜之水”的精靈，在經過祝禱的神聖泉水中，往往會見到她的誕生。她擁有著同族中最高的智慧和最冷靜的性格，再大的麻煩對於她來說也不過是能夠輕鬆解決的小事罷了。水元素的力量讓她非常熟悉晶石的開發過程。此外，她還能為戰場上的女神同伴提供強大的生命魔法支援。

name: Nice to meet you. I'm water elemental, Undine, following the call of fate. May tranquil water bring you the gods' benevolent affections and grace.
value: 幸會，吾乃水之精靈溫蒂妮，遵從命運而被召喚而來。希望寧靜之水能夠給你帶來眾神的慈愛與恩惠。

name: Do you need me to pray for you? We cannot face enemies together, but the life power I brough to you will always be with you.
value: 需要為你做個禱告嗎？雖然不能一同面對敵人，但作為水之精靈，我所帶來的生命之力將始終與你同在。

name: Do you favor nature as well? I presumed human beings only care about their own fellows.
value: 你也會對大自然萌生喜愛之心麼？我以為人類只會對自己同類抱持這樣的情感呢……

name: Water seems delicate, but in fact, it's really hard to conquer. If you don't believe it, just try to pound the water with your fist.
value: 水雖然顯得柔弱，但其實是非常難以征服的存在，不信的話，你可以試試用拳頭重擊水面是什麼感覺。

name: Flame Affinity: When stationed at the Lava Lake, increasing the productivity of Enhance Essence
value: 火焰親和：當進駐熔岩池時，提升強化精華的產量。

name: Essence of Anger: Increase ATK of all line-up angels
value: 憤怒之源：提升所有上陣女神的攻擊力。

name: As one of the four major natural elementals, she represents blazing fire. Not only does she come from the volcano and lava, but also she may come from the fireplace. Instead of thinking calmly about how to solve the problems, she prefers to take the direct and simple measures—violence. She's good at extracting enhance essence from lava lake. Meanwhile, she does well in converting her flaming anger into energy provided for angels on the battle.
value: 她是自然界四大元素中象徵“熾烈之火”的精靈，火山、熔岩池是她最常誕生的地方，但據說她也會從壁爐中出現。相對於冷靜地思考解決問題的方法，她更傾向于用直白、單純的手段——如果暴力能解決問題的話。她擅長從熔岩池中提煉出強化精華。同時她也擅長於將自身源於火焰的憤怒轉化為能量，提供給戰場上的眾神。

name: Aha? I still cannot believe that as the fire elemental, I will be summoned by the human being one day. How dare you!
value: 啊啦？沒想到區區人類……竟然敢召喚我這位象徵大自然憤怒的火元素精靈，挺有膽量的嘛……

name: Can you feel the energy from the flame?  Unfortunately, I cannot leave the enchantment, or I just move my fingers then the enemies will be incinerated.
value: 能感受到烈焰帶來的能量嗎？可惜我沒辦法離開結界，不然我只要動動手指，就能替你把敵人燒成灰。

name: Compared with damp and cool forest, the broiling lava is a better place for me. what do you think?
value: 相對於潮濕而涼爽的森林，或許還是熾熱的熔岩地帶更適合我，你覺得呢？

name: The fire elemental is a born craftsman. Give me a volcanic crater, I will return you the priceless flame essence.
value: 火元素精靈都是天生的工匠，給我一個火山口，我就能幫你提煉出價值連城的火焰精華。

name: Gem Alchemy: When stationed at gem lab, increasing the productivity of gem
value: 寶石煉金術：當進駐寶石研究室時，提升寶石的產量。

name: Unswerving Core: Increase DEF of all line-up angels
value: 堅毅之源：提升所有上陣女神的防禦力。

name: As one of the four major natural elementals, she represents eternal earth and may be born in any mountain, soil and forest.She is not only calm, mature and charming, but also always friendly and gentle with other races, which doesn't mean that she knows nothing about the combat skills.Because of her affinity with the earth, it's quite easy for her to find the gem mine and protect fellows with her excellent protection spells.
value: 她是自然界四大元素中象徵“永恆之土”的精靈，一切山脈、土壤以及森林中都可能誕生她。她性格穩重、成熟而有魅力，平時會很友善且平和地對待其他種族，但這並不意味著她們對戰鬥的技巧一無所知。由於對土壤的瞭解和親和度非常高，她能夠輕易找到寶石礦脈的所在，也能夠為同伴們提供優秀的防護魔法。

name: Hey...traveller, glad to see you. Thank the gods for guiding our fates together. May the spirit of earth grant you victory and glory.
value: 喲……幸會，旅行者，感謝眾神指引我們命運的交匯，願大地之靈賜予您勝利與榮耀。

name: Why do you always stare at me? You're looking forward a full and satisfied hug from me, aren't you? Haha...
value: 您為什麼一直盯著我看？難道是……希望我給您一個充實而滿足的擁抱麼？呵呵……

name: The power of earth represents firmness and eternity. Even facing the strongest attack, it will offer a unassailable protection to you.
value: 大地的力量代表著堅固而永恆，哪怕面對最強力的進攻，也將賜予你滴水不漏的保護！

name: As the earth elemental, Gnome is also the symbol of rich and fertile resource. Hey...do you want to come to my bedroom tonight? I guess you'll be interested in exploring my body.
value: 作為土元素的精靈，諾姆也是大地豐饒的象徵。喂……今晚有興趣來我的房間，好好“開墾”一下我的身體嗎？

name: Holy Core Prayer: When placed in the Holy Core Shrine, increasing the production of Holy Core
value: 神核禱文：當進駐神核祭壇時，提升神核的產量。

name: Ehereal Origin: Incease DEF.PEN level of all line-up angels
value: 靈動之源：提升所有上陣女神的破防等級。

name: As one of the four major natural elementals, she represents ethereal wind. She appears in all flowers and meadows where the monsoon blows.She is lively, egotistical and curious about anything that she has never met in the civilized society. But for this reason, she's always involved in troubles.She is close to the sky. It's said that the water elemental is the messager of sending orcales between human beings and gods.
value: 她是自然界四大元素中象徵“飄渺之風”的精靈，一切花叢、草原等季風時常吹拂的地方，都會有她的身影。她性格活潑而自我，對文明社會中沒有接觸過的人和事都懷有非常重的好奇心，但也常常因此而惹出事端。她與天空的連接非常緊密，很多傳聞中風精靈是神明與人類之間傳遞神諭的使者。

name: Aha! Human, it seems that you're fortunate enough! What's the matter? Why did you summon the great winter elemental Sylva?
value: 哼哼！人類，看來你的運氣不錯呢！召喚偉大的風之精靈希爾弗有什麼事嗎？

name: Among the four major elementals in nature, only the great Stlva is qualifed to talk with gods! It's terrific, isn't it?
value: 在自然界的四大精靈中，只有偉大的希爾弗能夠和神明直接對話呢！是不是很了不起啊？

name: I...I'm not shy that you keep staring at me! Anyway, you're just interested in the Gnome's figure. Humph!
value: 我……我才沒有因為你一直盯著我看而不好意思呢！反正你也只會對土元素諾姆那樣的身材感興趣吧，哼！

name: No one can chase up the great Sylva... Wait! Why are you smiling inexpressibly?! Are you imaging the scene of escape?
value: 偉大的風之精靈希爾弗的速度可沒人能追得上……等等！你壞笑什麼呐？！你是不是在想我逃跑時候的樣子？！

name: ACTIVITY_HUNTING_SCORE_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 恭喜你獲得幻獸狩獵排行第{0}名，已為您發放相應的獎勵。

name: Pisces hypnotizes all enemies and inflicts [Slumber] effect on each enemy with a 50% chance for 2 rounds. Enemies in the state of [Slumber] cannot attack. After receiving damage, the enemy can remove the state of [Slumber]. Then deals 150% M.DMG to the enemy who is not in the state of [Slumber].
value: 雙魚座催眠敵方全體，每名敵人有50%幾率進入【睡眠】狀態，持續2回合。睡眠狀態無法行動，受到傷害後將會解除睡眠狀態。隨後對未進入睡眠狀態的敵人造成150%的法術傷害。

name: Deals 100% M.DMG to 1 enemy 6 times, which will not remove the state of [Slumber] from the enemy.
value: 對1名敵人造成6次100%的法術傷害，該攻擊不會解除敵方的睡眠狀態。

name: Pisces hypnotizes all enemies and inflicts [Slumber] effect on each enemy with a 100% chance for 2 rounds. Enemies in the state of [Slumber] cannot attack. After receiving damage, the enemy can remove the state of [Slumber]. Then deals 200% M.DMG to the enemy who is not in the state of [Slumber].
value: 雙魚座催眠敵方全體，每名敵人有100%幾率進入【睡眠】狀態，持續2回合。睡眠狀態無法行動，受到傷害後將會解除睡眠狀態。隨後對未進入睡眠狀態的敵人造成200%的法術傷害。

name: Deals 130% M.DMG to 1 enemy 6 times and inflicts [Slumber] effect on each enemy with a 100% chance for 1 round. After the target is killed, Pisces will continue to attack other enemies until 6 attacks end. The attack cannot remove the state of [Slumber] from the enemy. Deals additional 5% True DMG to the enemy who is under the state of [Slumber].
value: 對1名敵人造成6次130%的法術傷害，每次攻擊有100%概率使敵人進入【睡眠】狀態1回合，擊殺目標後，追擊其他敵人，直至6次攻擊結束。該攻擊不會解除敵方的睡眠狀態，且攻擊【睡眠】狀態的敵人會額外造成5%的真實傷害。

name: Cannot attack. After being attacked, the enemy can remove the state of [Slumber].
value: 無法行動，受到傷害後將會解除

name: Please look into my eyes carefully...Um...Do you feel sleepy right now?
value: 請仔細地看著我的眼睛……嗯……現在有沒有一種想睡覺的感覺？

name: What do you think of my magic, the power of controlling dreams?
value: 在你眼中，我掌控夢境的幻術究竟是怎樣一種存在呢？

name: Eh, it seems that besides me, another constellation embodiment also comes to this world.
value: 哎，好像除了我之外，還有其他的星座化身也降臨到了這個世界？

name: Are you good at swimming? When the disaster is over, would you like to swim together?
value: 你游泳的技巧如何？等這場災難結束後，一起去海邊游泳怎麼樣？

name: What's your opinion about the apocalyptic conflict among gods?
value: 你怎麼看待這場神界之間衝突而導致的末日戰爭？

name: Are you fond of pets? Do you like keeping a lovely pet fish?
value: 你喜歡養寵物嗎？有沒有興趣養一條可愛的寵物魚？

name: Be the weapon to knock down the enemy!
I must put an end to it!
The magic will bring us happiness.
I'm looking forward to competing with you!
It needs patience and skills.
value: 感覺很需要耐心和技巧。

name: Eh? Did the hypnosis work?! Great! Well...tell me honestly who your favorite person is.
value: 哎？難道催眠術成功了？！太好了！那個……老實告訴我，你最喜歡的人是誰……

name: All right...the scene that your enemy is trapped in the nightmare and cannot move indeed impresses you a lot.
value: 好吧……看來對手陷入噩夢、動彈不得的場面確實挺讓你印象深刻的……

name: Really?! I cannot wait to see them again!
value: 真的？！我已經迫不及待想要去見見她們了呢！

name: What...what the hell are you saying! So you’re more interested in my swimsuit than swimming.
value: 你……你在說什麼啊，真是的！原來相對於游泳，你更關注我的泳裝嗎？！

name: Eh? I prefer to sink into the sea to fall asleep. after hundreds of years, I will awake and witness what the world is going.
value: 哎？我寧願選擇沉入海底好好睡一覺，幾百年後再浮上來看看世界毀滅了沒。

name: I knew you were gonna say that...Eh?! Wait! Have you always treated me as a pet?!
value: 我就知道你會這麼說……哎？！等等！你一直把我當作寵物看待的麼？！

name: So weird. Is my hypnosis ineffective? No way...Wait a minute! Where are you staring at?
value: 奇怪，難道我的催眠術失敗了？不對……等一下！你剛才在盯著哪兒看呐？！

name: It’s literally a romantic answer! So...would you like to come to my room tonight? It gonna be a sweet dream.
value: 真是個浪漫的回答呢！那個……要不要今晚來我的房間，讓你做個美夢？

name: Uh? Are you cheating? Tell me the truth or I’ll hypnotize you.
value: 嗯？沒有騙我嗎？如果不好好回答我就要用催眠術讓你說真話啦！

name: Hump! Why are you so confident? If you are failed, you need to date me on the beach all day.
value: 哼哼！這麼有自信的嗎？如果你輸了的話，就得陪我在海灘約會一整天哦！

name: Right? But I think that only hypnotizing all troublemakers will the disaster end.
value: 是麼？但我覺得只要催眠全世界所有麻煩的傢伙，這場災難就結束啦！

name: Don’t worry! It’s just a piece of cake to breed cute dolphins and handsome sharks with my help.
value: 別擔心！有我幫忙的話，無論飼養可愛的海豚還是帥氣的鯊魚，都是易如反掌的事呢！

name: Eh?! This contract can prove our relationships. Let me see what’s on it...Uh...what a hassle! It’s difficult to understand the ancient script.
value: 哎？！這份契約原來是我們羈絆的證明嗎？讓我看看寫了些什麼……啊……真是麻煩！古代神明的文字太難懂啦！

name: Both blessings and countless dangers are hiding in the ocean. No one knows what is under the abyss, dazzling treasures or the hunters waiting for the innocent little fish.
value: 大海給與恩澤，也暗藏危險，沒有人知道深淵中閃耀的誘人光輝是價值連城的寶藏，還是等待無知小魚上鉤的狩獵者目光。

name: Collect 55 Pisces Shards to summon Pisces
value: 集齊55個雙魚座碎片可以召喚雙魚座

name: Pisces is a special goddess transformed from one of the zodiac constellations. Originally lacking divine power, she was granted deification for her valor in endless wars.\nPisces is dreamy and innocent. Using her abyssal sea magic, she can defeat enemies rapidly and graciously.
value: 黃道十二星座之一幻化而來的特殊神明，原本不具備神力，但眾神無休止的戰爭讓其神格化。\n她是個愛幻想也非常天真的存在，擅長使用源於深海的幻術力量，迅捷而優雅地擊破眼前的敵人。

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_63
value: 獨特兩回合控制 將敵人逐個擊破

name: Eh? Did I lose my way? This is should be the holy domain of Athens.
value: 哎？難道我走錯了？這裏應該是雅典的聖域才對……

name: Aha, another lost kiddy? It is no place for an outsider.
value: 啊啦，又是個迷路的小可愛麼？這可不是外人能來的地方。

name: Hold on, I remember you... You are Storm Dragon, one of the sacred dragons in Northern Europe.
value: 等等，我記得你是……北歐三聖龍之一的風暴之龍？！

name: Sorry to interrupt, I was just passing by!
value: 抱歉！打攪了！我只是路過的而已！

name: Halt! Asgard is not the place where you can come and leave as your wish! Watch this!
value: 站住！阿斯加德不是想來就來，想走就走的！看招啦！

name: Sorry, I’m the winner. You guys just have a rest and wish you a good night.
value: 抱歉啦！看來是我贏了呢，請二位好好睡一覺吧，晚安！

name: How vast Asgard is! It seems like the right route...
value: 阿斯加德竟然這麼大？我應該沒走錯才對……

name: Constellation apostle of Greece? Jesus...the three dragons are sleeping again...
value: 希臘的星座使徒？我的天……守門的那三只龍又在睡覺麼……

name: Um...They are indeed sleeping because I hypnotized them. But I swear I’m didn’t mean to!
value: 呃……他們確實中催眠術睡著了，但我發誓我不是故意的！

name: It seems that a new guest will come here...
value: 看來有新的客人要招待了呢......

name: Wait...wait a moment! She was just lost like me! Stop!
value: 等等……等一下！她只是和我一樣迷路至此的！快停手！

name: Why are you so impulsive... We will get into trouble...
value: 你怎麼這麼衝動……這下事情麻煩了……

name: Eh? Is it serious? I just hypnotize them for a few days...
value: 哎？有這麼嚴重嗎？我只是用催眠術讓她們睡幾天而已……

name: A few days? We’d better get ready for Odin’s wrath.
value: 睡幾天而已？幾天後我們就準備面對奧丁的怒火吧。

name: Calm down. Don’t be nervous. I will prepare a fond dream for Odin!
value: 安心，別太緊張，到時候我再讓奧丁做個美夢就行啦！

name: At least 1 angel in the line-up
Please make the vow and then send gifts.
value: 已達到誓約條件，需完成誓約後才能繼續送禮物

name: The trial angel cannot be off the line-up
Accumulate the number of praying to get blessing crystal
value: 積累許願次數，獲取祝福水晶

name: The number of praying will be rest after the event is over
value: 許願次數會在活動結束後重置

name: Use in wishing well event to redeem magic stone
value: 在許願池活動中使用，用於幻石兌換

name: Put the low-level magic stone to synthesize the advanced magic stone
value: 放入低級幻石，合成高級幻石

name: Place a Magic Stone here, and it will be randomly transformed into a Magic Stone of other slots
value: 放入高級幻石，隨機置換成其他部位的同級別幻石

name: Full-Moon Limited Special Discount
value: 中秋折扣 限時促銷

name: hcnw_switch_consume_mode
value: 確定切換{0}倍體力消耗方式嗎？

name: Please do not force quit the game on this interface, otherwise the current progress may not be saved.
value: 在此介面強制關閉遊戲，可能會導致進度回退

name: Restore 50 points of energy in bakery event
value: 恢復烘焙屋活動中50點體力

name: Can perform a sorting operation in bakery event
value: 可以在烘焙屋活動中進行一次排序操作

name: Eliminate a food in Bakery Event
value: 可以在烘焙屋活動中消除任意一個食物

name: <size=16>Venus enchants all the enemy and inflicts [Enchant] on each enemy with a 50% chance (The state cannot be dispelled and persists during the action round). When Venus receives the damage, the damage will be divided equally based on the lost HP of Venus among the enemies who is under the state of [Enchant], up to 35% per target (ignoring [Link] effect) and their recovering HP effect will be reduced by 30% for 2 rounds</size>
value: 維納斯魅惑敵方全體，每名敵人有50%概率進入【魅惑】狀態（不可驅散，狀態持續到行動後消失），維納斯受到傷害時，處於【魅惑】狀態下的敵人根據維納斯損失血量分攤傷害量，每名敵人分攤傷害量上限為35%（無視【鏈接】效果），且回復生命效果降低30%，持續2回合。

name: Deals 600% P.DMG to 1 enemy and dispels all debuffs on our angel who owns the highest ATK
value: 對一名敵方女神造成600%的物理傷害，並驅散我方攻擊力最高的女神所有負面狀態。

name: <size=16>Venus enchants all the enemy and inflicts [Enchant] on each enemy with a 60% chance (The state cannot be dispelled and persists during the action round). When Venus receives the damage, the damage will be divided equally based on the lost HP of Venus among the enemies who is under the state of [Enchant], up to 35% per target (ignoring [Link] effect) and their recovering HP effect will be reduced by 75% for 2 rounds</size>
value: 維納斯魅惑敵方全體，每名敵人有60%概率進入【魅惑】狀態（不可驅散，狀態持續到行動後消失），維納斯受到傷害時，處於【魅惑】狀態下的敵人根據維納斯損失血量分攤傷害量，每名敵人分攤傷害量上限為35%（無視【鏈接】效果），且回復生命效果降低75%，持續2回合。

name: Deals 700% P.DMG to 1 enemy. Dispels all debuffs on teammate with the highest ATK and bestows [Mercy] for 1 round.\n\n[Mercy]: Immune to Debuff or DMG once (up to 1000% of Venus' Max ATK).
value: 對一名敵方女神造成700%的物理傷害，並驅散我方攻擊力最高的女神所有負面狀態，然後使其獲得【神眷】狀態，持續1回合。該狀態下免疫異常效果，並免疫傷害一次（不超過維納斯最大攻擊力的10倍）。

name: Damage divided equally, reduce recovering HP effect
value: 分攤傷害，回復生命效果降低

name: What do you think of people who sacrifice everything for love?
value: 那些為追求愛情而犧牲一切的人，你會怎麼看待他們呢？

name: From the human standpoint, love is something that they can put a price on, isn't it?
value: 在人類看來，愛情終究是一種可以用金錢來衡量的存在嗎？

name: In love or war, it's wise to strike first. Don't you think so?
value: 無論是戀愛還是戰爭，先發制人都是明智之舉，你覺得呢？

name: At this time, it's still difficult for the world to accept the fact that god and humans would fall in love, just because the identity of god is different from that of humans.
value: 這個時代神與人之間的愛，因為身份有別，好像依舊難以被世人所接受……

name: Was the kid, Cupid, faithful to her obligation before I came to this world?
value: 在我沒有降臨世界前，丘比特那個孩子有好好忠於自己的神職嗎？

name: Are you fond of artwork? How do you like sculptures?
value: 喜歡藝術品麼？覺得雕塑這門藝術怎麼樣？

name: She really did a great job.
I know nothing about the sculpture...
value: I know nothing about the sculpture...

name: At least, I don't think so.
Actually, I get used to taking a wait-and-see approach.
I don't care about identity differences.
value: 我並不在意身份的差別。

name: She doesn't seem to do well.
As you say, if he were only mortal, I would bestow the gifts of love and strength upon him for his courage
value: 如你所言，即便他只是凡人，我也會為他的勇氣，而毫不吝嗇地降下愛與力量的恩賜。

name: Well, it seems that another trouble needs to handle. Let me reshape people's view of love.
value: 好吧，看來我要解決的麻煩又多了一個——讓人們重新認識愛情的價值。

name: Really? Would you like to come to my bedroom tonight? It's a great opportunity to show your initiative.
value: 哦？那麼要不要今晚來我的房間，讓我感受一下你有多“主動”？

name: Anyway, I still look forward to one day when we all throw off our identity and pursue our true love.
value: 不管如何，我都會期待所有人拋棄身份枷鎖，追求自己所愛之人的那一天到來。

name: I'm so surprised! I thought that she would screw up affection affairs in this world with her personality.
value: 真是挺讓我意外呢！我原以為她的性格只會把這個世界的戀情弄得一團糟……

name: I've heard that countless artists made sculptures of me, but your artwork is the one that I'm most looking forward to.
value: 我聽說無數人類的藝術家都曾為我立過雕像，但我最希望看到的……還是你的作品。

name: Really? It will be interesting to see how naive you will be when you meet the right person someday.
value: 是嗎？我很有興趣看看，將來有一天你遇到中意的人時，會天真到什麼程度呢……

name: Well, I presume...that's why I choose to be with you in the end.
value: 嗯，我想……這也是為什麼我最終會選擇降臨在你身邊的原因吧。

name: Let me guess...Are you eager to hear my self-revealing words, dear?
value: 讓我猜猜……你是希望從我這裏聽到令人期待的告白嗎，親愛的？

name: You are more optimistic than I thought...May you be able to change this old world and reshape the relationship between humans and God.
value: 你比我想像中要樂觀呢……願你能夠改變這個陳舊的世界，重新塑造人與神的關係。

name: Aha...It's met my expectations. If she was qualified enough, I won't be summoned to this world.
value: 啊……這並不奇怪，如果她是個稱職的愛神，我也就不會被這個世界召喚到此了。

name: So would you like to make a piece about me? Tell me, what kind of pose do you like?
value: 那麼你有興趣以我為題材創作一件作品嗎？呵呵……告訴我，你喜歡怎樣的姿勢呢？

name: When we made this vow, our minds mingled, and I could read your thoughts. Have you always had such wild and daring desires for me, my dear?
value: 這份誓約簽下之時，我們的思想也彼此交融了呢！讓我看看你在想什麼……啊啦，原來你一直對我有這麼刺激而大膽的欲望嗎……親愛的？

name: The golden crown made by the unknown artist contains the infinite fantasy of beauty and the infatuation with the goddess of love, which is infused with the inimitable magic from the sublimation of emotion.
value: 無名藝術家所創造的金色冠冕，蘊含著對美的無限遐想，以及對愛神如癡似醉的迷戀，其中灌注著由感情昇華而來的、無與倫比的魔力。

name: Collect 55 Venus Shards to summon Venus
value: 集齊55個維納斯碎片可以召喚維納斯

name: Venus is the mythological goddess of love and lust and Cupid is said to be her offspring. The two goddesses jointly rule the marriage of the world.\nShe is respected in almost all the civilizations, which grants her unimaginable divine power. Although she opposes the war caused by power conflicts, she praises the sacrifices made for love.
value: 神話中的愛與情欲之神，傳聞丘比特是她的後代，兩位神明共同主宰世間的姻緣。\n她幾乎在所有文明中都受到尊敬，這也給她帶來了不可想像的神能。她雖然反感因權力而起的戰亂，卻讚揚為愛而做出的犧牲。

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_65
value: 反彈傷害 降低回血 守護友軍

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_66
value: 讚揚為愛而做出的犧牲

name: Here you are, finally. I cannot imagine how the world will be going without you.
value: 你總算來了，再遲幾天這個世界會發生什麼我可真不敢想。

name: So touching. Have you missed me so much that we were just apart for a few centuries?
value: 真令人感動，才幾個世紀不見，你就已經這麼想念我了？

name: Actually, we met the trouble. So we had summoned you to do us a favor.
value: 其實是我們遇到麻煩了，不得已才召喚前輩您來幫忙。

name: Why don't we warm up first and catch up later?
value: 詳細的事之後再說，眼下或許要先幫愛神姐姐“熱熱身”？

name: I've just been here for a few seconds. Are we about to do something thrilling, my dear?
value: 我剛降臨這個世界，就要做這麼刺激的事情嗎，親愛的？

name: Most of the time, the person pays the penalty for their violence against the embodiment of love...
value: 對愛的化身暴力相向，大多數結果都會變成自討苦吃……

name: Your strength is not weakened, so it seems there is a way out of this trouble.
value: 你的力量沒有絲毫削弱，看來這次的麻煩還有辦法解決。

name: Let me guess...Did Cupid make some trouble?
value: 讓我猜猜……難道是丘比特這孩子惹出什麼事了？

name: You're right. She accidentally provoked the war of gods between Northern Europe and Greece.
value: 前輩猜對啦，她好像不小心挑起了北歐與希臘的眾神戰爭。

name: Well, that's not surprising...She is still as same as what she was centuries ago.
value: 好吧……一點也不意外，畢竟她幾個世紀前就是這性格……

name: Gosh...Why were you here, your highness?
value: 等……等一下，您為什麼會被召喚到這個世界來……

name: You're having fun, aren't you? Surprised to see me again, honey?
value: 你玩的挺開心嘛，見到我是不是很驚訝，親愛的？

name: It's said that you messed up the relationships among the gods from Northern Europe and Greece and almost got them into the fight.
value: 聽說北歐和希臘的神明關係被你弄砸了，差點大打出手？

name: Absolutely not! I just play a joke on them.
value: 不是這樣的！其實我只是和眾神開了個小玩笑而已！

name: A joke Right? I'm gonna teach you a lesson, little rascal.
value: “開了個小玩笑”是嗎？看來壞孩子需要教訓一下呢。

name: It seems that you gonna cry. Well, I will stop, if you tell me about the prank honestly.
value: 不打啦，再打下去你都快哭了，老實交代你的惡作劇如何？

name: Oww...I just wanna see whether my arrows can influence the most powerful goddess or not.
value: 嗚……我只想試試，自己的箭能否影響最強大的神明而已。

name: Oh? So Lord Hera was unfortunate to be your guinea pig, wasn't she?
value: 喔？所以赫拉大人就榮幸地成為了你的實驗品，是嗎？

name: I swear it was an accident. I never meant for it to go this way.
value: 我發誓這只是個意外，我從沒想讓事情發展成這樣。

name: It won't happen again, because from now on I will keep my eyes on you.
value: 這種意外不會再有了，因為從今往後我會好好盯著你的……

name: OUTLAND_PRACTICE_SLOT_OPEN_REQUEST
value: 确定花费试炼水晶：{0}，解锁一个试炼位吗？当前拥有：{1}

name: Fulfill Battlepass tasks to increase Activity
value: 完成戰令任務獲取戰令活躍度

name: Items to unlock slots in Trial Palace
value: 試煉殿開啟試煉位所消耗的道具

name: Are you sure you want to replace the Angel?
Please unlock the last Configuration slot.
value: 請先解鎖上一個配置位元

name: HIGH_LEVEL_MAX
value: 等階尚未開放，敬請期待

name: Get {0} Activity to unlock the next stage
value: 升級下一階段需要戰令活躍度：{0}

name: HIGH_LEVEL_GIFT_LIMIT_1
value: 以上禮包僅一階可購買

name: HIGH_LEVEL_GIFT_LIMIT_2
value: 以上禮包僅二階可購買

name: HIGH_LEVEL_GIFT_LIMIT_3
value: 以上禮包僅三階可購買

name: Dispatching angels gives attribute bonuses to main lineup
value: 放置女神協助試煉，可加成全體女神

name: Higher angel's levels, training and quality will grants you greater bonus
value: 女神等級、培養、品質越高，加成越高

name: Unbelievable! You have been growing so fast! After upgrading your ranks, you will enter ther Realm of Godness.
value: 太讓人驚訝了！沒想到你的成長如此之快，完成升階你便將踏入神的領域。

name: Unlock this battlepass to get the following rewards
value: 解鎖當前戰令總計可以獲得以下獎勵

name: GIFT_NOT_BUY
value: 當前存在未購買的等階禮包，升階後禮包將會刷新，是否要升階？

name: Use Trial crystals to unlock Trial slots
value: 消耗試煉水晶解鎖試煉位

name: Configurate Trial Angels
value: 點擊進行試煉女神配置

name: <size=24>Choose Assist Trial Angels (Higher Angels' levels, training, and quality grant a greater bonus)</size>
value: 選擇協助試煉的女神（女神等級、培養、品質越高，加成越高）

name: Purchase Apotheosis package
value: 購買任意付費封神禮包

name: Full-Moon Luxury Diamond Sale
value: 鑽石豪禮 中秋回饋

name: Ocean Limited Time Discount
value: 海洋折扣 限時促銷

name: Slay demons with blade, summon ghosts by dancing
Deals 100% M.DMG to 6 enemies, and grants [Zeus' Rule]（non-dispellable） for 3 rounds. Under the state of  [Zeus' Rule], deals 100% M.DMG to 6 enemies in Zeus' action round
value: 對6名敵人造成100%的法術傷害，並使自身獲得3回合【神王】（不可驅散）。【神王】狀態下，每次輪到宙斯回合時，對6名敵人造成100%的法術傷害。

name: Zeus deals 160% M.DMG to all enemies at the cost of 30% of her current HP. For every 1% HP lost, the M.DMG increases by 2%.
value: 宙斯以消耗自身當前30%生命值為代價，對敵方全體造成160%的法術傷害，自身每損失1%的血量，傷害結果提高2%。

name: Deals 120% M.DMG to 6 enemies, and grants [Zeus' Rule](non-dispellable) for 3 rounds and [Thunder Shield](non-dispellable) for 4 rounds. Under the state of  [Zeus' Rule], deals 120% M.DMG to 6 enemies in Zeus' action round. Under the state of [Thunder Shield], the enemy who attacks Zeus takes 30% M.DMG, which will not trigger DMG reflection and Retaliate effect.
value: 對6名敵人造成120%的法術傷害，並使自身獲得3回合【神王】和4回合【雷盾】（不可驅散）。【神王】狀態下，每次輪到宙斯回合時，對6名敵人造成120%的法術傷害。【雷盾】狀態下，宙斯每次受到傷害都會反擊敵人，對目標造成30%的法術傷害，該傷害不會觸發敵人的反擊效果和傷害反彈。

name: Zeus deals 180% M.DMG to all enemies at the cost of 30% of her current HP. For every 1% HP lost, the M.DMG increases by 3%. If the targeted enemy is killed, Zeus will restore HP by 20% of the target's Max HP.
value: 宙斯以消耗自身當前30%生命值為代價，對敵方全體造成180%的法術傷害，自身每損失1%的血量，傷害結果提高3%，擊殺敵人後宙斯回復該敵人最大生命值20%的血量。

name: Auto attack all enemies in each round
value: 每回合自動攻擊全體敵人

name: retaliate against enemy when taking DMG
I heard that Odin has been summoned to this world for a long time
value: 我聽說奧丁已經被召喚到這個世界很長時間了？

name: By the way, how's Hera, I don't think she will kill her time in this world…
value: 話說回來，赫拉最近怎麼樣？我猜這個世界應該不會讓她感到無聊……

name: I thought the Greek Gods will be in a state of disunity, but I didn't expect your excellent command ability.
value: 原以為沒有我的希臘眾神只會是一盤散沙，沒想到你的指揮能力遠在我之上。

name: Do you think there is an insurmountable distance between God and man after all?
value: 你覺得神與人之間，終究隔著難以逾越的距離嗎？

name: From where I stand, warfare is a recreational activity between the strong, do you think so?
value: 戰爭在我看來，只不過是強者之間的消遣罷了，你怎麼看？

name: How important it is to become the Supreme Deity
value: 眾神之王這個頭銜，在你的眼裏有多重的分量呢？

name: War is a disaster for all of us.
I guess it's time to visit her. Without me as an opponent, life would bore her to death.
value: 我想是時候去“拜訪”一下了，少了我這個對手，她應該已經快無聊到爆炸了。

name: Is that so? It seems that she is as jealous as she used to be. It's literally a miracle that she has not exploded the world.
value: 是嗎？看來她的嫉妒心一點沒減，這個世界沒被她炸了可真是個奇跡……

name: I'm impressed by the man with such wisdom and charisma, which is beyond my cognition.
value: 我從沒想過一個凡人出身的存在能有這麼高的智慧和個人魅力，真是讓我驚訝。

name: Maybe it is what it is. If there's any difference between human and God, it won't be bad for me to abandon the God identity and become a human like you.
value: 或許是吧，如果真的人神有別，我大不了放棄神格，當個和你一樣的凡人也挺不錯的。

name: Your answer reminds me of the wartime before I became the Supreme Deity in Greek. Challenging yet interesting.
value: 你的回答讓我想起了成為希臘主神之前的那段戰爭時期，很有挑戰，但也挺有趣。

name: I'm glad that you regard this glory as something important, which embodies my responsibility and dignity as a goddess.
value: 我很高興你能如此看重這份榮耀，它凝聚了我作為神明的尊嚴與責任。

name: emm? Lies are showing up. My insight can guide me to where she is even she's turned into ashes. Haha…
value: 嗯？我好像聞到了謊言的味道，以我的洞察力而言，她化成灰我也找得到在哪，呵呵……

name: Haha, you seem to be better at going along with her than me, is that so?
value: 哈哈……看起來你比我更懂如何和她相處，不是麼？

name: Right, otherwise I won't acknowledge you as the chief ruler of all Gods in Greek.
value: 倒也沒錯，不然我也不會認同你作為希臘眾神的最高統帥。

name: oh? What do you think about coming over my room tonight and seeing how intimate we really are?
value: 喔？呵呵……那麼今晚有沒有興趣到我的房間……看看我和你的距離能近到什麼程度？

name: Then what's your plan for ending the disaster, my hero?
value: 那麼你打算怎樣結束這場災難呢，我的英雄？

name: You must have found something more cherishable then the title? Could you tell me what it is?
value: 那麼你一定找到了比這個頭銜更珍貴的事物吧？能告訴我是什麼嗎？

name: You are the first person in ages to be worthy of making a vow with me.
value: 從神話時代起就沒有任何人有資格與我簽訂這個誓約，但不管怎麼說，幸運的傢伙，你是我唯一的例外。

name: Crafted by the Cyclops, even the most powerful gods will be amazed by its power. Lightning is a symbol of Greek royalty, and this scepter has helped Zeus win countless victories that symbolize glory and dignity.
value: 由獨眼巨人打造，即便是再強悍的神明也會為其力量所驚歎，閃電是希臘王權的象徵，這柄權杖曾幫助宙斯獲得了無數場象徵榮耀與尊嚴的勝利。

name: Collect 55 Zeus Shards to summon Zeus
value: 集齊55個宙斯碎片可以召喚宙斯

name: Zeus, known as the Ruler of Olympus, is the goddess of the sky and thunder, and her power is almost at the peak of the major gods. \nIt is said that she was summoned to this world to compete with Odin for the position of ruler of the gods, but no one knows her real purpose and intentions.
value: 宙斯被稱為“奧林匹斯之王”，同時也是天空與雷電之神，強大程度幾乎位於各大神系的頂峰。\n據說是為了與奧丁爭奪眾神之王的位置而被召喚到這個世界的，但沒人知道她真正的目的和意圖。

name: Ok? I don't think I've ever be welcomed like this in the age of mythology…
value: 嗯？神話時代我好像都沒有見過這麼大的歡迎場面……

name: Now, dear, what makes you feel that you are welcomed?
value: 呐，親愛的，你為什麼會覺得我們的陣勢是在歡迎你呢？

name: Some old grudges from the past, I think you may have to settle with you…
value: 有些過去的舊賬，我覺得可能要和宙斯閣下您算算……

name: For example, re-determining who's the ruler of the gods, and the ownership of the sea, the earth, and the underworld.
value: 比如重新決定眾神之王的位置，以及海、地、冥界的歸屬。

name: I just happened to be a little bored, maybe it's time to test the power of the new awakening.
value: 我也正好有些無趣，或許是時候測試一下新覺醒的力量了。

name: It's such a shame that all of you are defeated in 10 rounds...
value: 真是太令人遺憾了，竟然沒有一個人能和我打上十回合……

name: It seems that the power of thunder I have awakened is enough to rule the Greek gods for centuries.
value: 看來我覺醒的雷霆之力還夠統治希臘眾神幾個世紀。

name: It's insane that your power has not weakened in the slightest...
value: 真是難以理解，這麼長時間，您的力量也絲毫沒有減弱……

name: Soon, I guess there would be new changes in the landscape and destiny of this world...
value: 很快，我猜這個世界的格局和命運應該會有新的變化……

name: You are right, answer me: where is Odin?
value: 你猜對啦，那麼接下來回答我一個問題吧：奧丁在哪？

name: Zeus? ! This is impossible, I did not observe the fate of your coming to this world!
value: 宙斯？！這不可能，我沒有觀測到你降臨這個世界的命運！

name: It seems your eyesight are worse than before, Odin.
value: 看來你的眼神比以前糟糕了啊，奧丁。

name: Haven't seen you for so long, don't you think your title of Ruler of the Gods is a little less challenging?
value: 這麼久沒見，不覺得你眾神之王的稱號少了些挑戰嗎？

name: This title kinda bores me, you want it back? Come and defeat me.
value: 這名頭確實讓我有些膩了，不過得看你有沒有本事取回去。

name: There will be an answer soon, and I'm sure you'll miss the deafening sound of thunder.
value: 很快就會有答案了，我相信你會懷念震耳欲聾的雷電聲的。

name: Shocking, Your awakening power is stronger than it was thousands of years ago...
value: 你覺醒的力量比幾千年前更強大了，真讓我驚訝……

name: I was surprised too, but I guess it's my fate to own the power.
value: 我也挺意外，不過獲得這份力量大概也是命運的安排吧。

name: It seems that Pandora's prediction is right, the world is in trouble.
value: 看來潘多拉那個傢伙預言得沒錯，這個世界有麻煩了。

name: Yeah? I hope it's better not me who's causing trouble for the world.
value: 是嗎？我希望給世界帶來麻煩的人最好別是我。

name: Who knows, you follow the call and come, maybe it is the savior of the world...
value: 誰知道，你順應召喚而降臨，或許是救世主也說不定……

name: hehe…the ruler of all angels, welcome to the Fear Abyss
value: 呵呵……眾神的引導者，歡迎挑戰深淵

name: The end of the abyss awaits you once again, challenger.
value: 深淵的盡頭等著你再次前行，勇士

name: The power is incredible, you are indeed the Chosen One
value: 這力量讓人難以置信，你確實是天選之人

name: Go forth, the abyss awaits you
value: 前進吧，深淵正在等待著你

name: How far will you go? I'm looking forward to it.
value: 你能突破到怎樣的境界呢？我很期待

name: I look forward to seeing when you push your limits again.
value: 我期待看到你再次突破自己的極限之時

name: I wonder how much you'll pay, huh?
value: 我很好奇你肯付出多少代價呢，呵呵

name: Give up on your soul, and you will become even more powerful.
value: 交出你的靈魂吧，你會變得更強大的

name: Guts, the Lord of the Abyss has brought you a new gift
value: 勇者，深淵主宰給你帶來了新的恩賜

name: The forbidden power of the Abyss is thirsty for your soul
value: 深淵的禁忌之力在渴求你的靈魂

name: Immune from individual skills, increase EVA probability
value: 不會被單體技能選中，閃避率增加

name: I don't want to spend that long dark night alone, so you'll be by my side, right?
value: 我不想獨自度過那漆黑的長夜，所以，你會陪著我的，是嗎？

name: Danger is always accompanied by charm! Don't you think so?
value: 越危險的，越迷人！你也這麼認為嗎？

name: Am I different from other deities?
value: 我是不是和其他的神明不太一樣？

name: There's no need to be too serious. As a deity, the most important thing is to seize the day! What do you think?
value: 為人處世不必太嚴肅，身為神明，最重要的就是及時行樂！你覺得呢？

name: As the sister of Supreme Deity, Odin is a real trouble. She wants to control everything!
value: 作為眾神之主的妹妹可真是麻煩，奧丁的掌控欲太強了！

name: The battle is a game to me, and in the end, I'll be the one who wins anyway!
value: 戰鬥對我而言就是一場遊戲，反正到最後勝利的一方，都會是我！

name: I don't like the feeling of being controlled either.
value: 我也不喜歡被管控的感覺。

name: This ...... I have other things to do.
value: 這……我還有其他事情要做。

name: We do not see eye to eye.
I think it's better to be serious about everything!
value: 我覺得凡事還是較真點好！

name: It's good to have a sister.
The battle still requires prudence.
value: 戰鬥還是需要認真一點。

name: I know that you would be there for me.Then you'll be granted a wonderful night!
value: 我就知道，你一定會陪著我的。那我也，還你一個美妙的夜晚吧！

name: Oh! What scares you?Is it the fear of being allured by my beauty?
value: 哦！你在害怕什麼呢？是擔心會淪陷於我的美色之中嗎？

name: Being unique is my motto! You must like me, right?
value: 與眾不同才是我的原則！你一定也喜歡這樣的我吧？

name: Finally, I find someone who just has the same thoughts as me! I think we'll get along very well.
value: 總算有一個和我想法相同的人了！我想我們之間會相處得很愉快的。

name: I guess we're the same kind of people, we both enjoy freedom.
value: 看來我們是同一種人，都喜歡自由自在的生活。

name: That's right! I'm as confident in my strength as I am in my beauty!
value: 沒錯！我對於自己的實力，就像對自己的美貌一樣自信！

name: How dare you refuse my invitation, no one has ever turned down my invitation! I'm interested in you even more.
value: 居然拒絕了我的邀約，你果然跟其他人不一樣，我對你更加感興趣了！

name: Then don't hesitate, come and hug me!
value: 那就不要猶豫了，快過來大膽地擁抱我吧！

name: Don't you think that I'm uncomparable in appearance?
value: 難道你不覺得，我比其他女神更美嗎？

name: So you're a serious person, huh? Then I hope that you can be a little more relaxed when you're with me.
value: 原來你是個嚴肅的人啊？那我希望，你在和我相處的時候，可以輕鬆愉快一點。

name: In that case, how about I becoming your sister?
value: 那既然這樣的話，我來做你最親愛的姐姐怎麼樣？

name: Oh! Are you worried about me? Don't worry, I can't bear to let you down.
value: 哦！你是在擔心我嗎？放心，我可不忍心讓你為我傷心的。

name: I enjoy making everyone fall under my charm, but I never imagined that I would fall under yours. You are full of surprises!
value: 我總是想讓所有人都為我的魅力所折服，卻沒想到，自己有一天會折服在你的魅力之下。你可真是我最大的意外啊！

name: The forbidden artifact of the Asa Divine Realm, which is said to be powerful enough to change the fate of deities. Whether it is survival, or destruction, everything is hidden in this divine dice.
value: 阿薩神域的禁忌神器，據說其中蘊含著改變神族命運的力量。是生存，還是毀滅，一切都隱藏在這枚神骰之中。

name: Collect 55 Loki Shards to summon Loki!
value: 集齊55個洛基碎片可以召喚洛基

name: The deity of mischief and trickery in Norse mythology, as well as  the deity of fire. Originally a giant, she joined Asa because of her friendship with Odin.\nBy her cunning nature, she wanted to play tricks on other deities, while being excluded by other deities. She was one of the important figures who triggered the twilight of the deities.
value: 北歐神話中的惡作劇與詭計之神，亦是火神。原本是巨人族出身，因與奧丁交好而加入阿薩神族。\n她生性狡詐，要捉弄其他神祇，因此與眾神交惡，是引發諸神黃昏的重要人物之一。

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_69
value: 閃避攻擊 驅散增益 不穩定輸出

name: Oops! Are there so many people welcoming me?
value: 哎呀呀！居然有這麼多人在歡迎我的到來嗎？

name: Why was this guy summoned here? I hate him!
value: 為什麼連這傢伙也被召喚過來了，見到他我就感到非常的生氣！

name: Finally, a guy who has been given a bad name by the world, just like me, has appeared?
value: 總算有一個和我一樣，被世人冠以惡名的傢伙出現了嗎？

name: My dear sister! This world is not friendly, and you won't be welcomed without supreme power!
value: 我親愛的姐妹！這個世界並不友好，沒有足夠的力量是無法被認可的！

name: You guys, you are so ungrateful! Then I'll upturn your prejudice and use my strength to make me myself acknowledged!
value: 你們這些傢伙，可真是不念舊情啊！那我就展示一下我全新的力量，用實力讓你們來認可我吧！

name: A new member in the camp of the Nordic Deities? Let me see your power and see how much you can boost the Nordic Gods' power!
value: 北歐神族的陣營又加入了新的成員嗎？讓我來見識一下你的力量，看看你能為北歐神族提升多少戰力！

name: Even the Supreme Greek Deity has come to welcome me personally, I've got a lot of face!
value: 連希臘神族的主神都親自來歡迎我了，我的面子還真大啊！

name: The world calls us evil deities, we'll see who's more powerful!
value: 世人都將我們稱之為“邪惡的神”，那就看看我們兩個之間，誰的力量更加強大吧！

name: You can take the title of the number one evil god! I will win the battle!
value: 第一邪神的名頭你拿去好了！不過這場戰鬥我一定要贏！

name: Loki, I didn't expect that even you were summoned here, and it's time to end our old grudge.
value: 洛基，沒想到連你被召喚過來了，那正好可以了結我們往日的恩怨了。

name: You're a vengeful guy, you still remember the grudge from a thousand years ago so clearly! Then I will fight with you to settle the old grudge!
value: 你可真是個記仇的傢伙，千年前的恩怨還記得這麼清楚！那我就陪你痛快地打一架，了結往日的恩怨吧！

name: My stupid sister! World's been dangerous! If you still want to slack off your life, you'd better return to the Asa domain!
value: 我愚蠢的妹妹啊！這個世界有著太多的危險存在！如果你還是抱著遊戲人生的態度，我勸你還是趕緊返回阿薩神域去吧！

name: You are still so old-fashioned! My sister, you  aren exactly who you've been a thousand years ago, but I've become as powerful as you!
value: 你還是這麼古板啊！我的姐姐，跟千年前相比，你一點都沒變，可是我卻已經變得跟你一樣強大了！

name: Then let me see how much you've changed in the past thousand years!
value: 那就讓我好好見識一下，你這一千年來的改變吧！

name: Deals 500% P.DMG to 1 enemy with the highest attack and inflicts [Blind] for 2 rounds, reducing the enemy's ACC value by 50% of Loki's ACC value. Loki gains [Invisibility](non-dispellable) for 2 rounds. If Loki is under the state of [Invisibility] and there's another teammate alive, she is immune from individual skills
value: 對攻擊力最高的1名敵人造成500%的物理傷害，並【致盲】2回合，命中值降低50%洛基的命中值。然後洛基獲得【隱身】（不可驅散）狀態2回合，【隱身】狀態下，隊友存在時，洛基不會被單體技能選中。

name: Loki rolls a dice to decide the fate of the enemy. Deals dice points*75% P.DMG to all enemies and dispel all bonus effects of 1 random enemy.
value: 洛基擲出一個骰子決定敵人的命運。對敵方全體造成骰子點數*75%的物理傷害，並隨機驅散1名敵人的全部有益狀態。

name: Deals 650% P.DMG to 1 enemy with the highest attack and inflicts [Blind](non-dispellable) for 2 rounds, reducing the enemy's ACC value by 100% of Loki's ACC value. Loki gains [Invisibility](non-dispellable) for 2 rounds, increase EVA probability by 20% . If Loki is under the state of [Invisibility] and there's another teammate alive, she is immune from individual skills
value: 對攻擊力最高的1名敵人造成650%的物理傷害，並【致盲】（不可驅散）2回合，命中值降低100%洛基的命中值。然後洛基獲得【隱身】（不可驅散）狀態2回合，【隱身】狀態下，閃避率增加20%，隊友存在時，洛基不會被單體技能選中。

name: Loki rolls a dice to decide the fate of the enemy. Deals dice points*100% P.DMG to all enemies and dispel all buffs on a number of randomly chosen enemies equal to the value on the dice roll.
value: 洛基擲出一個骰子決定敵人的命運。對敵方全體造成骰子點數*100%的物理傷害，並隨機驅散骰子點數*1名敵人的全部有益狀態。

name: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 50%, additionally increase hit probability of [Blind] by 30%
value: 物理傷害係數增加50%，【致盲】命中概率額外提升30%

name: Increase the probability of rolling big numbers of the dice
value: 提升擲出大點數的概率

name: Pay attention to your line-up as enemies have high Debuff RES and deal great DMG to the back row!
value: 敵人擁有極高的異常抵抗，且會對後排造成極高的傷害，注意合理佈陣！

WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_26
value: 她性情勇猛果敢，雖然好戰，但是充滿慈悲心，對於罪惡的事抱持著絕對的否定與無情的殲滅。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_27
value: 她是奧林匹斯之王，是天空與雷電之神，強大程度幾乎位於各大神系的頂峰
