name: Deals 300% P.DMG to enemy on the same column. If the speed of Thor is higher than that of enemy, the DMG will double.
value: 攻擊一列敵人，造成300%的物理傷害，如果索爾的速度大於敵人的速度，則傷害翻倍。

name: Deals 200% P.DMG to 6 enemies.If the speed of Thor is higher than that of enemy, deals an extra 200% P.DMG to that enemy.
value: 釋放雷電攻擊六名敵人，造成200%的物理傷害，如果索爾的速度大於敵人的速度，則對敵人再次釋放雷電，造成200%的物理傷害。

name: Deals 380% P.DMG to enemy on the same column. If the speed of Thor is higher than that of enemy, the DMG will double. If the enemy is killed, Thor will enter the state of [Mighty Power](non-dispellable) for 6 rounds. [Mighty Power] state increases the ATK by 30%, debuff RES by 50% and DEF PEN by 300 points.
value: 攻擊一列敵人，造成380%的物理傷害，如果索爾的速度大於敵人的速度，則傷害翻倍。如果擊殺敵人，索爾獲得【神力】（不可驅散）效果，持續6回合。【神力】效果增加30%攻擊力，50%異常抵抗，300點防禦穿透。

name: Deals 220% P.DMG and an extra True DMG of 0.01% Thor's speed to 6 enemies. If the speed of Thor is higher than that of enemy, deals an extra 220% P.DMG to that enemy.
value: 釋放雷電攻擊六名敵人，造成220%的物理傷害，如果索爾的速度大於敵人的速度，則對敵人再次釋放雷電，造成220%的物理傷害。然後額外對六名敵人造成索爾速度*0.01%的真實傷害。

name: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 60%

Every thunder-related attack will apply [Charged] state for 2 rounds (cannot stack). Enemies who are under the state of [Charged] increases DMG taken by 50% and their recovering HP effect will be reduced by 50%
value: 每次雷電攻擊使敵人獲得【感電】效果（不可疊加），持續2回合。【感電】狀態下，受到傷害增加50%，回復生命效果降低50%

name: Increase the ATK by 30%, Debuff RES by 50% and DEF PEN by 300 points
value: 增加30%攻擊力，50%異常抵抗，300點防禦穿透

name: Increases DMG taken by 50% and reduces recovering HP effect by 50%
value: 受到傷害增加50%，回復生命效果降低50%

name: Sometimes the responsibilities feel heavy on me.
value: 肩負重任的感覺，有時也會很沉重！

name: I will never stop pursuing the greatest power.
value: 在追求最強力量的道路上，我永遠不會停歇。

name: Never will an evil giant set foot in Asgard as long as I am alive.
value: 只要有我在，邪惡的巨人就永遠別想踏入阿斯加德神域一步！

name: My Mjolnir brought mighty power to me, but I also fear its powerfulness sometimes.
value: 雷神之錘給我帶來了強大的力量，但這種力量有時就連我自己也感到害怕。

name: It is not only because I killed so many that made me the number one warrior of Nordic Deities.
value: 我北歐神族第一戰士的威名，難道只是用敵人的鮮血來鑄造的嗎？

name: I am always wondering what the key to winning a battle is? Strong body or great mind?
value: 我一直在想，贏得戰鬥的關鍵，是在於強大的力量，還是高超的智慧？

name: But it is an exceptional glory.
value: 但那是一份無與倫比的榮耀。

name: You are already the strongest warrior!
value: 你已經是最強的戰士了！

name: Let the giants tremble under my mighty power!
You are the only one who can control this power.
value: 這股力量只有你能掌控。

name: That's the best recognition you can get from your enemies.
Power is the most important thing to have.
I want to share your burden.
You must keep the balance between work and rest.
That will be wonderful if we can have a peaceful settlement.
value: 如果可以和平解決那更好了。

name: No! It is, in fact, the reflection of your mighty power.
value: 不！那是你強大神力的體現。

name: The key is to have a great mind.
You are right. For me, nothing is more important than glory.
value: 你說的沒錯，對於我而言，沒有什麼比榮耀更重要。

name: To be recognized by you is the greatest glory of all.
value: 能夠獲得你的認可，對於我而言，是最大的榮耀。

name: Some day, I will eliminate them altogether!
value: 總有一天，我會將它們全部驅逐乾淨！

name: I hope I will not lose control of my power one day.
value: 但願這種力量，不會有失控的一天。

name: I am so glad with your recognition. However, I don't want to be seen as a bloodthirsty goddess.
value: 對於這種認可我很欣慰，不過我不希望在別人的眼裏，我是一個嗜殺的人。

name: I am confident in the strength I possess.
value: 我對於自己現在的力量，很有自信！

name: I appreciate your presence. Being with you really takes my edge off.
value: 謝謝你！跟你在一起，我覺得一下子輕鬆了很多。

name: Maybe you are right. Taking a break every now and then is a must to reach further away.
value: 或許你說的沒錯，偶爾的休息，是為了到達更遠的地方。

name: It couldn't be better if we could settle it peacefully. However, it is impossible to negotiate with those evil and irrational giants.
value: 如果可以和平解決，那自然是再好不過！只是想跟那群邪惡的巨人談判，這根本做不到。

name: Since I was born, I was granted missions of gods.
value: 所以我從出生以來，也肩負著來自上天的使命。

name: You are right. I would much like to build my prestige on my own power.
value: 你說的對！我更希望，我的威名是建立在我自身的力量之上。

name: That's a good point! I have to be strong in both mind and body!
value: 你說的有道理！不管是在力量方面，還是在智慧方面，我都要做到最強！

name: In the presence of others, I demonstrate only my mighty power. But only before you will I show my gentleness. I hope we can join hands and bring peace to this world!
value: 在其他人面前，我展現的都是無比強大的力量，但只有在你面前，我才會展現自己溫柔的一面。希望我們能攜手並肩，一起為這個世界帶來安寧與和平！

name: Mjolnir is the strongest weapon of all weapons in Aesir. Its hammerhead is forged with the hardest steel in Asgard, and its handle is made of the body of Yggdrasil. It can smash anything with one strike. No matter how far it flies, it would always find its way back to the holder's hand.
value: 雷神之錘是阿薩神族威力最為強大的武器。它的錘頭是由阿斯加德神域最堅硬的鋼鐵所打造，握柄部分則是以世界之樹的木材作成。它可以砸碎任何東西，將其扔出去，擊中目標之後還會自動飛回持有者的手中。

name: Collect 55 Thor Shards to summon Thor
value: 集齊55個索爾碎片可以召喚索爾

name: The goddess of thunder and power in the Norse mythology and also in control of storms, war, and agriculture.\nShe is the greatest warrior in Aesir with the primary responsibility of protecting Asgard from giants' invasion.\nAlso, She is associated with the protection of mankind, as she often appears as the protector of the mortals.
value: 北歐神話中的雷電與力量之神，同時還司掌風暴、戰爭、農業。\n她是阿薩神族最強的戰士，其主要職責是保護阿斯加德的安全，使巨人無法入侵。\n同時，她還守護著人界的安全，常作為凡人的保護神現身。

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_71
value: 高速輸出 打擊一列 範圍傷害

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_72
value: 迅若驚雷 無堅不摧

name: Great! Now that Thor is summoned here, we could fight alongside and learn from one another to improve our power.
value: 太好了，連索爾也被召喚過來了！以後我們可以繼續並肩作戰，也可以相互切磋，磨礪自己的實力了。

name: My dear sister, I give you my warmest welcome. The power of Nordic Deities will definitely reach another level.
value: 我的姐妹，歡迎你的到來！我們北歐神族的實力又得到了巨大的提升。

name: Geez! I didn't expect her to be here. I guess my days of fun have officially ended.
value: 哎！沒想到這傢伙也跟著來了，以後的日子怕是沒那麼瀟灑了！

name: This new power is a little hard to control. Thor, are you ready to take this quest?
value: 全新的力量並沒有那麼容易掌控！索爾，你準備好接受我們的曆練了嗎？

name: I knew if you want to master a new kind of power, you must go through a trial. I am ready. Let's get started! Don't go easy on me.
value: 接受曆練是掌控全新力量的必要流程，我早已做好準備，開始吧！你們不用手下留情！

name: I am curious, as the number one warrior of the Nordic Deities, what kind of new power you have awakened.
value: 我很好奇，做為北歐神族的第一戰士，你究竟覺醒了何種全新的力量！

name: Then let me show you how strong this mighty power is.
value: 那就讓你見識一下，這無與倫比的神力吧！

name: It has been long since our last fight. I will take your title if you lose!
value: 我們已經好久沒有切磋過了！如果戰勝不了我的話，你北歐神族第一戰士的名頭可要歸我了！

name: Humph, you want to take my title? Bring it!
value: 嘿！想奪走我第一戰士的名號，可沒那麼容易！

name: You used to spoil my plan all the time. I am surprised to meet you again here. You better not bother me this time!
value: 你以前就經常壞我好事，沒想到我們在這個世界又相遇了！這一次，你可別再跟我過不去了！

name: Loki! Stop your pranking things, and then we can be friends. Or you will taste the fruit of standing against me in the future.
value: 洛基！收起你的惡作劇，我們還可以做朋友。不然的話，以後我照樣會阻止你。

name: What a dull guy! It seems we have to rematch once. If you lose, pack your things and get back to Asgard.
value: 真是個無趣的傢伙！看來我們只能再較量一場了，要是你輸了的話，那就趕緊返回阿斯加德神域去吧！

name: Thor! As the most powerful Nordic Deities, I have high hopes for you. So, as the test assigned by me, this will be an unprecedented challenge.
value: 索爾！做為北歐神族最強的戰力，我對你寄予著最高的期望。所以，我對你的考驗，也會是前所未有的嚴厲！

name: Come on! What I am expecting will always be the toughest trial!
value: 來吧！我所期待的，正是最嚴厲的考驗！

name: USER_BACK_NEW_ENTRY_GIFT_MAIL_CONTENT_LOW_LEVEL
value: 親愛的玩家，歡迎回到放置女神！為了讓您有更好的遊戲體驗，我們在新服為您準備了以下回歸禮，您也可以通過切換伺服器回到原區服繼續征程，祝您遊戲愉快！

name: ACTIVITY_HOLIDAY_COPY_WEEK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 這是今日的新春紀念卡獎勵，感謝支持！

name: Drop in the Wedding Ceremony event. It can be used to redeem items in the event interface.
value: 花嫁典禮活動期間戰場掛機掉落，可以在活動介面兌換道具。

name: It can be used to move forward and get rewards in the Lucky Board of the Daily Gift event.
value: 用於在每日福利活動的幸運棋盤中投擲骰子前進，獲得獎勵

name: No dispatch by the Attack side, so the Defense side wins.
value: 攻擊方無派遣，防守方勝

name: DAILY_GIFT_TODAY_TISHI
value: 今日已領取全部每日禮包，剩餘{0}天可一鍵領取

name: NOTICE_10010004
value: 幸運的法則已經確定！ <color=#25c1e9>{0}</color> 合成了 <color=#FF3838FF>UR+-{1}</color> ！

name: Trial Emissary: When stationed in the Trial Ground, increasing the production of Trial Crystal
value: 試煉使者：當進駐試煉場時，提升試煉水晶的產量。

name: NEED_ADVANCE_FIRST
value: 需要女神神性覺醒後才可神力覺醒

name: THIS_HERO_SUPER_AWAKE_NOT_OPEN
value: 此女神UR召喚暫時未開放

name: HERO_SUPER_AWAKE_NEED_GOD_AWAKE_LEVEL_CONTENT
value: UR+提升星級需要UR達到相應星級

name: Collect {0} UR+ Shards to waken
value: 集齊{0}個UR+碎片後可以覺醒

name: Collect {0} UR+ Shards to waken Wonder to {1}-star
value: 集齊{0}個UR+碎片可以神力覺醒到{1}星

name: ACTIVITY_UR_PLUS_HERO_NOT_GET_REWARD_CONTENT
value: 活動已結束，您未領取的獎勵已通過郵件發送！

name: ACTIVITY_UR_PLUS_HERO_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_TITLE
value: 神力試煉挑戰BOSS排行獎勵

name: ACTIVITY_UR_PLUS_HERO_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 你在神力試煉挑戰BOSS排行第{0}名，獲得以下獎勵！

name: Smashing Crawl: Increase the RES PEN of all Line-up angels
value: 破滅之爪：提升所有上陣女神的抗性穿透能力。

name: Hati and Sköll are the twin daughters of the leader of the Giant Wolf clan. From the day they were born, they were sent to the most formidable trial—chasing the sun and the moon to absorb their energy so as to strengthen their power.\nHati, and Sköll had lived up to the expectations. They are not only gifted but also grow more and more potent in the trial years after years. Finally, they have become the strongest of their clan.
value: 哈提和斯庫爾是巨狼族首領的兩個女兒，也是一對雙生子。她們從出生之時起，就在進行著最殘酷的試煉——追逐太陽和月亮，吸收日之力和月之力，強化自身力量，從而成為族群裡最巔峰的強者。\n而哈提和斯庫爾也不負眾望，她們天賦異稟，在年復一年的試煉當中，實力飛速成長，已然成為種族中的佼佼者。

name: Hati: I have been chasing the moon for so long. But today, I have met my true master.\nSköll: From now on, you are my master, the true sun of my mind.
value: 哈提：我追逐了那麼多年的月亮，但直到今天，哈提才追逐到了自己真正的主人。\n斯庫爾：以後，你就是我的主人，我心目中真正的太陽！

name: I can't pull myself together in the raining day. I would enjoy the feeling of running under sunshine much more.
value: 每到下雨天，我就感覺做什麼事都不起勁，我還是喜歡在燦爛的陽光下，放肆奔跑的感覺。

name: The full moon looks so beautiful, while the crescent moon looks so cute. Why I must make a choice!?
value: 圓圓的滿月看起來真美麗，可是彎彎的弦月也特別可愛！哎，好難選擇啊！

name: Hati: I love spend time with Fenrir. I feel I can really relate to her.\nSköll: I love playing with Xiyu. She seems so nice and also... tasteful... (slobbering)
value: 哈提：我喜歡跟芬妮爾姐姐在一起，她給我一種很親切的感覺。\n斯庫爾：我就喜歡和熙玉妹妹一起玩耍，她也看著很親切，而且看著還很美味（流口水）。\n哈提：……

name: Flame Affinity: When stationed at the Lava Lake, increasing the productivity of Enhance Essence
value: 火焰親和：當進駐熔岩池時，提升強化精華的產量。

name: Magi-repressed Scale: Increase the M.RES of all Line-up angels
value: 抑魔之鱗：提升所有上陣女神的魔抗。

name: Nidhogg is the queen of Black Dragon. They have lived under the World Tree since ancient times and feed on the root and branches of the World Tree. However, with the World Tree's nutrition consistently consumed, this giant tree is at the edge of withering and falling. \nTo save the World Tree and protect the only home they have, Nidhogg risked going to the otherworld and coming here, the Forest of Eudemons. It is said that the magic cure of the World Tree lay in the depth of the forest.
value: 尼德霍格是黑龍一族的女王，她們一族從古至今生活在世界樹的樹下，以世界樹的根部和枝葉為食。但隨著世界樹的養分被不斷吸食，這顆大樹也面臨著枯萎和倒塌的危險。\n為了救治世界樹，保護族人賴以生存的依靠，尼德霍格穿越異世界，來到了幻獸之森。據說在這裡，可以找到治好世界樹的神藥。

name: As the queen of Black Dragon, I have always trusted by my people! However, from now on, I have a master that I can trust.
value: 做為黑龍一族的女王，我一直是族人們的依靠！但從今以後，我也有了自己可以依靠的主人。

name: I don't like Odin. She is so stubborn and always believes that World Tree is her's.
value: 我不喜歡奧丁那個傢伙，她總是固執地將世界樹認定為是她的東西。

name: People always thought Black Dragon is an evil creature, but it is just their prejudice.
value: 人們總是認為黑龍一族是邪惡的種族，但那只是世人的偏見而已。

name: I must find the magic cure for the World Tree. It is the promise I made to our people.
value: 我一定會找到救治世界樹的神藥，這是我向族人們所做出的承諾。

name: Firm Scale: Increase P.RES of all line-up angels
value: 剛毅之鱗：提升所有上陣女神的物抗。

name: It is said that the Midgard Serpent in the bottomless sea lives in the darkness and never leaves. However, it is not the case for Jormungand. Compared to darkness, her heart wants more of the bright side.\nAfter growing up, she is determined to live a much different life. So, she leaves the deep sea and travels all over Midgard, making friends with other races.
value: 相傳，生活在無底深海中的塵世巨蟒一族，都是寄生於黑暗中的存在。但耶夢加得卻不同，相比於黑暗，她卻更嚮往光明。\n因此，在她成年之後，她便離開了深海，決心遊歷塵世，結交各族朋友，度過一個不一樣的人生。

name: Leaving the deep sea and coming to the Midgard lands is the best choice I have ever made! Because of that, I met you here—my master, the most important person to me.
value: 離開深海，來到塵世是我所做出的最正確的決心。因為，我在塵世間遇到了你——我最重要的主人！

name: My people always think I am a deviant. But how much fun they have lost just because of that conformity.
value: 族人們總覺得我是個異類，但正因為我的特殊，我才能獲得如此多的快樂。

name: We are actually a very gentle race! Don't believe me? Ask my master.
value: 蛇其實是一種很溫柔的動物！不信的話，你們可以問問我的主人。

name: I have found the melody of my life ever since I met my master.
value: 遇到我的主人之後，我才知道，人生原來可以這麼的快樂。

name: Used in elder scrolls and synthesize the Ragnarok series
value: 在上古卷軸中使用，用於諸神黃昏系列幻獸的合成。

name: COMPENSATE_BOUNTY_SOCIETY_REWARD_DESC
value: 親愛的玩家:\n感謝您的支持，以下是您的試煉所獎勵補償

name: Used in Elder Scrolls and synthesize the Elementals Series, Ragnarok series, Firmament Series, and Sacred Beasts Series Eudemons.
value: 在上古卷軸中使用，用於元素精靈，諸神黃昏，蒼穹之星系列幻獸的合成

name: PREHEAT_LOGIN_GET_NEXT_REWARD
value: 將于{0}後解鎖下一個碎片

name: Reach Lv. {0} to unlock the Relic
Collect 55 Chaos Shards to summon Chaos
value: 集齊55個卡俄斯碎片可以召喚卡俄斯

name: Am I dreaming? Where am I...
My Lord Hera, this abyss is known as the dreamland.
value: 這裡是夢境的深淵、欲望的迷宮，赫拉大人。

name: Pandora? What is going on?
value: 潘朵拉？等等，這一切到底是怎麼回事？！

name: It seems that in pursuit of a long-cherished wish, you opened my Box and unleashed this maze of desire.
value: 看來您朝思暮想的某個願望，指引您打開了我的魔盒呢，嘻嘻……

name: Argh... Why I can't remember anything...
value: 啊……我好像感到所有的記憶都消失了一般。

name: Indeed, the Box will steal your precious memories. But it will also give you new powers.
value: 沒錯，魔盒在打開之時會取走您最珍貴的回憶，但也會賦予您新的力量。

name: You harbor potential. But to grow, you must fight.
value: 力量的種子已經埋在了您的心裡，激發您的戰意，讓它成長起來。

name: The only way out of the dreamland is through battle.
value: 因為在魔盒賦予的夢境裡，戰鬥是引導您命運的唯一方式……

name: You are right, Pandora. It feels as if something is growing inside me.
value: 你說的沒錯，潘朵拉，我仿佛能感受到一種奇特力量的萌芽。

name: It will transform you in ways you can't imagine, allowing you to transcend your original state of godhood.
value: 一種強大，卻很危險的力量……它會讓您的神格突破到難以想像的程度。

name: Be careful. The dream will also force you to face your true desire, and once you lose control of yourself...
value: 但夢境也會讓您直面自己真實的欲望，如果控制不住這種欲望的話……

name: Something terrible will happen?
value: 會發生什麼可怕的事情嗎？

name: Your uncontrollable desire will consume you. You will become lost in the dreamland, obsessed with power and unable to wake up.
value: 強大的力量和失控的欲望，會徹底讓您迷失在夢境中，永遠不會醒來。

name: I will not let that happen.
value: 我絕不會讓這種事發生。

name: You seem so confident, but underneath that you are extremely anxious. I can see that in you.
value: 您好像很有自信呢，但我從您的眼神中，也看到了一絲不安。

name: Just to be safe, I will accompany you and keep an eye on your progress. Don't let your guard down, and focus on yourself on finding a way out.
value: 我會作為同伴，跟隨您見證這夢境中的一切，盡可能地找到出口吧，嘻嘻……

name: Wise choice. With me by your side, you will not fall into the dark abyss.
value: 明智的決定……有我在的話，或許赫拉大人不會墜入黑暗的深淵吧，嘻嘻……

name: There is still a long way to go until you find the exit to this dreamland.
value: 夢境還很長，我期待您找到出口的那一刻……

name: Hera, what brings you into this dreamland? This is no place for the Queen of Olympus.
value: 赫拉，你為何會出現在夢境之地，這裡可不是作為天后該來的地方。

name: Nyx? Even though this is a land of dreams, I didn't expect to meet the goddess of night.
value: 夜之女神倪克斯？我可沒想到會在這種地方遇到你。

name: I'm not surprised. If your fates are tangled, you will meet in the dreamland.
value: 幻境中所遇到的人，都與你的命運交錯重疊，她們的出現並不奇怪。

name: It seems you are lost in your desire for power, just like me.
value: 看來你和我一樣，是對力量的渴望而迷失至此的。

name: I lost most of my power during Doomsday. I'm afraid I must fight you to get that strength back.
value: 為了挽回末日降臨以來失去的神力，我恐怕不能在這裡輸給你。

name: Pandora, why was Nyx so strong? I thought she had lost most of her power.
value: 倪克斯的神力已經丟失了大半，為什麼還會有如此驚人的戰鬥力……

name: In the dreamland, all gods are equal. You can only rely on your own skills learnt in battle.
value: 在夢境裡，大家初始的神格都是平等的，純粹的力量是唯一的武器。

name: Why am I here... Hera? What happened?
value: 我為什麼會在這裡……赫拉？發生了什麼事，我在做夢嗎？

name: It seems the goddess of night was overcome by her lust for power and has become a victim of the dreamland.
value: 夜之女神大人看來輸給了欲望，成了夢境迷宮的犧牲者之一呐，嘻嘻……

name: Humph, Pandora, that must be your doing!
value: 哼……潘朵拉，這想必這也是你的惡作劇所為吧？

name: Anyone who touches the Box and loses to their desire will end up like that.
value: 非常遺憾，並不是這樣，只有碰過魔盒但欲望失控之人，才會徘徊於此。

name: Nyx, you can regain your power. But if you lose your mind, it is gone forever.
value: 倪克斯女神，丟失的神力可以再度獲得，但深陷於欲望的深淵，將永遠迷失。

name: We need to put our past conflicts aside and work together to find a way out of here.
value: 我們即使在過去有過衝突和爭端，但眼下找到夢境出口才是最重要的，不是嗎？

name: ... You're right. I'll join you. Now let's get the hell out of here!
value: ……你說的沒錯，我們儘快離開這裡吧！

name: Stop! The hand of justice commands you to stop right where you stand.
value: 站住！正義與審判的代行者將阻止你們繼續前行！

name: I am a queen, Nemesis! What gives you the right to be so impudent.
value: 涅墨西斯？沒有合適的理由就冒犯天后的權威，是一種無禮的行為！

name: Since the beginning of time, all the gods have committed countless crimes pursuing their desires.
value: 自創世以來，諸神就一直因為各種私欲而犯下眾多罪行。

name: Even your path to the throne was lined with the bodies of innocents. Am I right?
value: 就連你成為天后的路上，也留下了無數無辜者的悲歎……不是麼？

name: I cannot deny it. But only power can bring order.
value: 我不否認指控，但只有力量能帶來秩序！

name: Fair enough. If you want to prove your point, we have no choice but to fight!
value: 很好，如果你希望用力量來證明這一點，那麼戰鬥將是唯一的選擇！

name: No one is innocent in the struggle for power!
value: 權力的爭鬥中，沒有人是無辜者！

name: Then, equity and justice will no longer stand by your side. Let the trial begin...
value: 那麼公平和正義也將不再寬恕你，讓審判開始吧……

name: Your power is so strong...
value: 好強大的力量……我可以感受到你內心的執著，你並非是一名純粹的暴君……

name: I never regret my decisions, and I am not afraid to take responsibility!
value: 我從不後悔當初自己所選擇的道路，而我也不準備逃避責任！

name: Humph, I guess you're doing it in the name of justice. I will no longer stand in your way.
value: 哼……或許你的所作所為也是為了某種意義上的公正吧，這次我便不為難你了。

name: But remember, if you ever betray your principles, I will find you and bring you to justice.
value: 但是請你記住，如果有一天你拋棄了自己的信念和原則，審判會再度降臨。

name: She just disappeared!? I thought no one could leave the dreamland of their own will. Is she...
value: 她消失了？進入夢境的人都不能自行離開才對，難道她……

name: She wasn't real, Hera. She was a creation of the dreamland.
value: 您沒發現嗎？她並不是真實存在的，而只是您夢境中的一個幻影而已。

name: You only met her here because, deep inside, you feel guilt for those who died in your struggle for power.
value: 之所以會夢到她，應該是您心中還存有對神權爭鬥中犧牲者的愧疚吧。

name: ...I understand. But after facing her, much of that guilt is now gone.
value: ……你說得沒錯，而這份愧疚如今已隨著剛才的戰鬥消散了。

name: The dreamland helps dispel your anxiety. Only in a clear mind can true power be born.
value: 夢境會幫助您消除心中的猶豫，新的力量也正是誕生於此。

name: I feel the power inside me has begun to grow.
value: 我感到身體裡的那份力量已經開始成長了。

name: However, I feel anxiety building within me as well. It feels like my desire is devouring my soul.
value: 但伴隨這份力量而來的，卻是一種不安，仿佛自己的欲望正在吞噬靈魂一般……

name: It has been a long time, Hera. I didn't expect to meet you here.
value: 很久沒見了，赫拉，沒想到會在這裡遇到你。

name: I vividly remember the moment you fell asleep ages ago.
value: 大地之母蓋亞嗎……我還清晰地記得您沉睡前的那一刻。

name: It's been so long! I'm ready to wake up. At last, you have come to wake me.
value: 我沉睡了如此之久，也算等來了喚醒我的人。

name: Do you know how to leave the dreamland?
value: 您知道如何離開這個夢境嗎？

name: The dreamland is created when someone with a strong desire or unfulfilled wish touches the Box. So...
value: 觸碰潘朵拉魔盒的人，必然有強烈的渴求，或者說……未達成的心願。

name: Once you have fulfilled your desire, you can find the exit of the dreamland.
value: 而這份心願達成之時，就能找到夢境的出口。

name: So what do we do? I'm not sure if I know what I want.
value: 那麼，我們應該要怎麼辦？

name: Let me test your heart. Maybe that will reveal your inner desire.
value: 讓我在戰鬥中窺探一下你內心深處的渴望吧，這或許會為你指明道路。

name: That was a good fight. Although it was spontaneous, that quick bout let me glimpse your innermost thoughts.
value: 一場不錯的戰鬥，雖然只在刹那間，但我窺見了你內心深處的世界。

name: As a queen, you desire the respect of everyone. However, you don't always get your way.
value: 作為天后，你渴望所有人的尊敬，但事情並不能如你所願。

name: Your position makes you crave even more power so that you can always have your way. Am I right?
value: 而你的身份卻讓你無法接受這個現實，最終開始渴望權力，尋求力量，沒錯吧？

name: I'm impressed that you confessed your selfishness and arrogance so easily. I wasn't expecting you to do so that quickly.
value: 你已經開始放下心中那個高傲的自己了，說實話，比我想像中要快。

name: I will reduce any burden if that stands in my way.
value: 如果高傲的心會阻礙我的前進，我並不介意拋棄這份負擔。

name: I have faith that you can get us out of here. Let us stand together to face what lies ahead.
value: 你終究沒有讓我失望，就讓我與你共同面對之後的麻煩吧。

name: No, I am not like that!
Hmm... You need to let go of your selfishness and arrogance in order to see your true self.
value: 嗯……真的嗎？平息你內心的高傲，才能看到真實的自己。

name: You're not mature enough to handle this alone. I will come along to watch over you.
value: 你還沒有我想像中那麼成熟，在這場夢境結束前，就讓我照顧好你的安全吧。

name: Hera, have you come to fight me? We never really resolved our conflict.
value: 赫拉，你也是來阻止我的嗎？看來我們兩個人的戰鬥還沒有結束！

name: Athena?! The Trojan War is over. There's nothing left to resolve!
value: 雅典娜？！等等！我和你之間的爭端已隨特洛伊戰爭的落幕而平息了。

name: How can that be true if we are both here in this dreamland? Don't both of us still wish to win the Golden Apple?
value: 很遺憾，在我看來事實並不是這樣，你會出現在這夢境中就是證明。

name: Too many lives have been lost over that silly Golden Apple. It was not worth sparking the Trojan War. No one should resort to violence over something so trivial.
value: 我們都曾為爭奪金蘋果而付出了太多犧牲，真的有必要這樣嗎？

name: Your words mean nothing to me. There can be only one winner between us!
value: 這些話沒有意義，我們之間必須決出最終的勝者！

name: ... It's over. Our conflicts only bring disasters and strife.
value: 夠了，雅典娜！一切都結束了，我們的分歧只會給希臘神系帶來更多災難！

name: It is not enough... as long as I am alive...
value: 還沒有……只要我還沒有倒下……

name: As the goddess of war,you should know that we are mismatched in power!
value: 身為戰爭女神，你應該明白你我力量的差距！

name: ...You are right. The outcome of a war is always determined by power. And you are indeed more powerful than me.
value: ……你說的沒錯，戰爭的勝負永遠以力量來決定，而你的力量確實在我之上。

name: As the winner of this battle, you deserve my respect, and I will follow your lead.
value: 你作為這場爭鬥最後的勝利者，理應得到我的尊敬和追隨。

name: It is my honor too. Believe me. I will make good use of your power.
value: 那將是我的榮幸，請相信我會善用你的力量。

name: As the goddess of wisdom, you should know that peace matters most.
value: 身為智慧女神，你應該明白和平才是終點。

name: ...You are right. The outcome of the war has to be peace and unity. If that is not the case, there will be no winner.
value: ……你說的沒錯，換不來和平與團結的戰爭，不會有真正的贏家。

name: We both want to leave this dreamland. ... Maybe allying with you will be a wise choice.
value: 你我最終的目的都是離開這裡，或許同盟會是更明智的選擇。

name: As you say, I will fight for you.
value: 如你所言，我的槍將為你迎敵。

name: ... I should have known that I would meet you here.
value: 別來無恙，親愛的，我早該料到會面對你這個讓我頭疼的傢伙。

name: Zeus? For you to be here, you must have unfulfilled wishes.
value: 宙斯？你會出現在這裡，意味著你也有心願未了吧？

name: You are right! But the same must be true for you. It seems like Lady Luck hasn't been on your side either since you are also trapped here.
value: 猜對了，不過幸運女神看來沒怎麼眷顧你，讓你在夢境中徘徊到現在還沒出去。

name: I am not surprised, my love. I know exactly what you want..
value: 我並不意外，親愛的，不用猜也知道你所渴求的是什麼。

name: You want to be respected by the other gods, especially me, the Ruler of the Greek Gods. Am I right?
value: 你希望得到其他神明的尊敬，尤其是作為眾神之王的我的尊敬，不是嗎？

name: I won't deny it. Only one can possess the strongest divine power. Let's settle this by testing your power against mine.
value: 我不會否認你的話，神權只有一個頂點，只有戰鬥能解決這個問題。

name: You are much stronger than before, my dear. I'm surprised that I lost to you.
value: 你比以前強了很多呢，親愛的，會輸給你真讓我意外。

name: The war of divine power has ended, and I am the winner.
value: 神權之爭落下帷幕了，看來我終究是最後的勝利者。

name: I wonder how you gonna use the divine power it brings.
value: 我更好奇的是你會如何運用神權帶來的強大力量。

name: To rebuild the order of the Greek Gods.
value: 重新樹立希臘眾神的秩序。

name: If these were the old days, I'd fear that you would cause trouble for everyone.
value: 如果是以前，我認為你這麼做只會給所有人帶來麻煩……

name: However, I'm not as worried about handing it over to you now. The Greek gods will benefit from the new order you create.
value: 但現在把神權交給你，或許也不是壞事，希臘眾神會期待你所創造的新秩序。

name: It sounds like you share my ambitions.
value: 呵呵……有趣的想法，我以為只有自己才會具備這樣的野心。

name: I will follow you until the end.
value: 我會一直跟隨你，並為你見證這一切的。

name: Hera, although Zeus has bestowed divine power upon you, Hades and I don't approve.
value: 赫拉，雖然宙斯已經將神權交付於你，但並不意味著我和哈迪斯也認可此行為。

name: Would you rather I prove myself in combat?
value: 我會用實力證明這是一個正確的決定。

name: The Greek gods need a new order, Poseidon. Don't you think this is an excellent opportunity?
value: 希臘眾神需要一個新秩序，波塞冬，不覺得這是一次機會嗎？

name: Honestly, I tired of this power struggle long ago. But maybe we should settle this with a fight.
value: 說實話，我早已厭倦了那些多餘的爭端，以這次戰鬥來做個了結，我也不反對。

name: You win! I just hope you're competent enough to lead us.
value: 不得不說，如今的你或許確實具備了統領希臘眾神的能力。

name: I won't allow myself to fail.
value: 統領眾神是一個漫長的過程，但我不會容許自己失敗。

name: I will hand over the ocean realm. I hope you utilize its power properly.
value: 我選擇交出掌管大海的神權，希望你能夠好好使用這份力量。

name: I'm tired of fighting. I'd rather spend time at the beach and surf with the mortals.
value: 至於選擇和你們爭來爭去打個沒完，我更有興趣選擇和這個世界的人類去衝浪。

name: Hades, I am creating a new order for the Greek gods. I need your help.
value: 哈迪斯，希臘神系需要面對新的命運，我需要你的力量來改變這一切。

name: I might be interested. But I would never lend my power to a weakling. Show me your strength, and then I will decide.
value: ……我倒是有點興趣，但我從來不會和弱者合作，讓我見識一下你的力量吧。

name: The new order is really in line with your principles, Hades.
value: 還真是符合你的原則，哈迪斯。

name: I will not object if the new order can bring significant benefits to the Underworld.
value: 如果新的神權秩序有助於冥界的勢力，我並沒有反對的必要。

name: Humph... If I must prove myself, then I'm ready!
value: 哼……你會見識到的，那麼讓我們開始吧。

name: Huh... It seems fate shines upon you this time.
value: 呵呵……看來命運確實站在了你這一邊呐。

name: Make good on your promise. And I assure you I won't let you down.
value: 兌現你的承諾吧，我向你保證，冥界在我的統治下，不會讓你失望的。

name: Welcome to the abyss, the cradle of desire and power.
value: 歡迎來到欲望和權力的深淵，赫拉。

name: Chaos? What is the Genesis God doing here? Are you also lost in the dreamland?
value: 創世神卡俄斯？看來連你也徹底迷失在夢境中了……

name: No, Hera. As the embodiment of order and chaos, I cannot be bound by desire or power. For I created them.
value: 你錯了，赫拉，作為秩序與混沌的雙重化身，欲望和權力都無法束縛住我。

name: Your situation, however, is much more interesting. For you already possess the power you need to defeat me.
value: 反倒是你的處境更有意思呢，現在你已經具備了足以與我抗衡的強大力量……

name: Now I understand why I met you here... I need the acknowledgement of the most powerful deity of all.
value: 我開始明白為什麼會在夢境中見到你了……我只是渴望獲得最強者的認同而已。

name: And I can't leave here until I defeat you.
value: 如果不擊敗你，我恐怕永遠無法離開這場夢。

name: Is that so? Then let's see what you can do. Show me your power!
value: 呵呵……有趣，那麼就讓我陪你們玩玩吧……

name: Incredible! Your primordial power is strong! But I won! Victory is mine!
value: 好強……這就是創世神的力量嗎？但勝負已定，最終的勝利依舊是屬於我的……

name: Hera, I'm not surprised that you can defeat me with your new power.
value: 赫拉，憑你現在的力量能勝過我，我並不感到意外。

name: What do you mean? You expected it?
value: 你這是什麼意思？你想說這一切都在預料之中？

name: According to the laws of creation, this divine power of yours was always meant to absorb mine.
value: 按照創世律法，你可以奪走我作為創世神的神權。

name: This divine power is mighty. Once acquired, none of the Greek gods can defeat you.
value: 這神權強大無比，一旦取得，整個希臘將沒有任何存在會是你的對手。

name: But this power isn't easy to control, even for you. If you're not careful, you will become its puppet.
value: 但這強大的力量是你神格無法掌控的，你遲早會失去靈魂，淪為它的傀儡。

name: Believe it or not, that is your choice. Be wise so you don't regret your decision, Queen Hera.
value: 信不信由你，做出不會讓你後悔的選擇吧，天后赫拉。

name: Of course. Unsurpassed power is always the end goal of all desire.
value: 呵呵……和我所想的一樣，強大無比的力量依舊是欲望的終點……

name: Don't worry, Chaos. I have the determination and faith to control this divine power.
value: 我有掌控這份力量的決心和信念，卡俄斯，請不用為我擔心。

name: I hope so. May your determination and faith guide your future destiny.
value: 希望如此吧，願決心和信念引導你將來的命運。

name: I will never become a puppet of this divine power!
value: 我絕不會為了力量拋棄靈魂！

name: At last, you have finally found your way out of the maze.
value: 這麼多次在夢境中輪回，你終於找到了迷宮的出口……

name: But before you wake up, you must overcome one last obstacle.
value: 但在你醒來之前，還需要越過最後的一個阻礙。

name: You will meet her soon.
value: 呵呵……你很快就會遇到她的，那個徘徊於此夢境迷宮中的噩夢之源……

name: We finally meet, my other half.
value: 終於見面了呢，另一個我……

name: I can't believe my eyes! Who on earth are you?!
value: 天哪……是我眼花了嗎？！你究竟是誰？！

name: I can feel the divine power of Chaos in her body. I have a bad feeling about this...
value: 在她的身上我感受到了卡俄斯的創世神力，我有不好的預感……

name: Even I, the goddess of wisdom, can not penetrate her mind.
value: 作為智慧女神的我竟然看不穿她的真名！

name: Is she your evil twin? Your doppelganger? ..... No, it seems to be an evil spirit of this dreamland.
value: 神明的複製體嗎……？不，它是徘徊於夢境的無魂夢魘。

name: Hera, if you are unwilling to accept power that can overwhelm everything, then eventually you will grow weak. Your crown will be a sham.
value: 呵呵……拒絕壓倒一切的力量與權力，你終究只會淪為徒有天后之名的弱者罷了。

name: The gods will continue to look down upon you. Zeus will eventually leave you. And all that will be left is disappointment and failure.
value: 眾神依舊會看不起你，宙斯也終將離你而去，迎接你的永遠是失落與悲哀。

name: Imposter, you're talking absolute nonsense. My dear, don't waste your time with her.
value: 身為冒牌貨，廢話可真是不少，親愛的，別和它浪費時間了。

name: In the name of Queen Hera, attack on my signal!
value: 以天后赫拉之名！全軍突擊！

name: Hera... You coward... This is not the end...
value: 赫……拉……你這個膽小鬼……不要以為這就是結束……

name: As long as you hide conceit... and jealousy... in your mind, I will take your place one day... Remember it...
value: 只要你心中……還有自負……嫉妒……我遲早會取代你的神格……給我記住……

name: Is it finally gone?
value: 終於消失了嗎，真是個難纏的傢伙。

name: Lord Hera, are you still dwelling on what she said?
value: 赫拉大人，您還因為剛才的戰鬥而感到畏懼嗎？

name: If I were as alone as I was when I start out, I would have given up before the fight began.
value: 如果我還是過去那個孤獨的自己，或許在戰鬥前我就會放棄抵抗吧。

name: But now I have formed strong bonds with each of you, and that has helped dispel the shadows of my conceit and jealousy.
value: 但如今我與你們牢固的羈絆，早已驅散了心中嫉妒和自負的陰影。

name: So, even though I'm not the most intrepid warrior, I will never become a soulless puppet to my power.
value: 所以，即使我不是最勇猛的戰士，但我絕無理由向這種沒有靈魂的傀儡低頭。

name: Dear, this dreamland experience has really helped you to grow up.
value: 親愛的，這場夢境讓你成長了不少，不是嗎？

name: As you said, I'll never forget it. Let's go. The exit is close.
value: 如你所言，我會永遠記住這場夢的，走吧，夢境的出口已經在眼前了。

name: Complete the journey in Angels' Dreamland and get their Shards for free.
value: 完成女神的夢境，獲取角色碎片

name: Rechallenge the stage to get some Memory Crystal
value: 重複挑戰關卡可獲得少量晶元

name: Open the box and choose Hera's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇赫拉任意品質的碎片

name: The bonus from Memoria Orb is shared with all angels
value: 記憶寶珠的加成所有女神共用

name: Memoria Attributes are only effective in this Angel's dream
value: 記憶屬性僅在當前女神的夢境中生效

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Hera's Dreamland
value: 用於提升赫拉的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Purchase Witness Pack to unlock rewards
value: 購買簽到禮包後解鎖獎勵

name: The Angel Dreamland Gameplay is opened
HERO_ALREADY_SUPER
value: 當前女神已經開放神力

name: HERO_SUPER_AWAKE_MAX
value: 女神神力覺醒星數已達最大

name: HERO_SUPER_AWAKE_TIPS
value: 需要神性覺醒達到<color=red>{0}</color>星才可神力覺醒，現在星數<color=green>{1}</color>

name: Please choose one Wonder Power to activate. You can switch it without any cost.
value: 請選擇啟動一種神力，啟動後生效，更換神力沒有任何消耗

name: When Hera is in action, dispel all buffs of 1 random enemy.
value: 赫拉每次行動時，隨機選擇一名敵方女神驅散其所有有益狀態。

name: When entering a battle, deals 20% ATK of True Damage to enemy with lowest HP
value: 進入戰鬥時，立即對血量最低的敵人造成20%攻擊力的真實傷害

name: When in battle, obtain a Shield equal to 20% of her Max HP for 1 round.
value: 進入戰鬥時，獲得自身最大生命值20%的護盾，持續1回合

name: When enter a battle, increases DMG by 20% for 1 round
value: 進入戰鬥時，自身傷害增加20%，持續1回合

name: Decreases the damage taken from Crit DMG Value by 20%
Before entering her action phase, all teammates' ATK increases by 5% for 1 round.
value: 輪到自身行動前，提升我方全體5%攻擊力，持續1回合

name: Before entering her action phase, 50% chance to dispel 1 debuff of herself.
value: 輪到自身行動前，有50%概率驅散自身一種不良狀態

name: Before entering her action phase, increase ATK by [alive teammate(s) number*5]% for 1 round
value: 輪到自身行動前，為自身增加存活隊友數量*5%的攻擊力，持續1回合

name: When under debuff(s), reduces DMG taken by 20%
value: 自身處於不良狀態時，受到傷害降低20%

name: Increases DMG taken by 30% and ATK by 20%
value: 自身受到傷害提升30%，傷害增加20%

name: When receive a fatal blow, protect herself with damage immunity for this blow (can be activated once per battle).
value: 受到致命傷害時，免疫本次傷害，該效果每場戰鬥只能觸發一次

name: When killed, stuns all enemies for 1 round
value: 死亡時對全體敵方造成暈眩1回合

name: When killed, deals True DMG equal to 10% of her Max HP to all enemies
value: 死亡時對全體敵方造成該女神最大生命值10%的真實傷害

name: When in her action, if her HP is higher than or equal to 30%, increases her Crit DMG by 50%; if not, increases her Leech effect by 30% for 1 round.
value: 輪到自身行動前，如果當前生命大於等於30%，提升自身50%暴擊傷害，如果當前生命小於30%，提升30%吸血，持續1回合

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_73
value: 天后歸位之時，眾神皆俯首相迎！

name: UR_PLUS_DUNGEON_COLLECT_TO_QUICK
value: 記憶積累中，請稍後再試

name: This shard can be used to upgrade the quality of angel in Wonder Waken
value: 此碎片可在神力覺醒中用於提升女神品質

name: First switch for today will not consume diamonds. Are you sure you want to switch?
value: 今日首次切換夢境不消耗鑽石，是否確認切換？

name: First-time choice will not cost any diamond. Confirm to choose?
value: 首次選擇副本不消耗鑽石，是否確認選擇？

name: Switching dreamland for this time will consume {0} diamonds. Are you sure you want to switch?
value: 本次切換夢境消耗{0}鑽石，是否確認切換？

name: Upgrade the Memoria Orb to challenge again
value: 提高記憶寶珠等級後再來挑戰試試吧

name: Available angels undeployed. Continue to challenge?
value: 還有女神未上陣，是否繼續挑戰？

name: Available only in this dreamland
value: 此角色僅在當前夢境可用

name: Dreamlands completed. All memories have been found.
value: 當前夢境全部完成，記憶已完整

name: LOST_LANDS_EXPLORE_FREQUENTLY
value: 夢境不穩定，請稍後再試

name: You are not friends. Please add friends first.
value: 你們還不是好友，請先添加好友後進行聊天

name: Function unavailable. Titles have changed. Please reenter the Gods Twilight.
value: 無法操作，當前職位已經發生變化，請重新進入國戰頁面。

name: After deployed, the battle will automatically begin at 20:00
value: 隊伍派遣後每日20點自動開始戰鬥

name: You can only assign one Conqueror
You can only assign one Commander
value: 只能任命一個作戰指揮官

name: COUNTRY_WAR_GUILD_SET_WAR_COMMANDER
value: {0}已被任命為作戰指揮官，[點擊前往操作]>>>

name: COUNTRY_WAR_GUILD_SET_GOD_OF_WAR
value: {0}已被任命為公會戰神，[點擊前往操作]>>>

name: COUNTRY_WAR_NOTIFY_DISPATCH
value: {0}提醒{1}及時進行七域爭輝隊伍派遣，[點擊前往操作]>>>

name: COUNTRY_WAR_BAST_GOD_OF_WAR
value: 大殺四方，共擊敗<color=#FF7C51>{0}</color>隊敵人

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_BUY_SALY_TOAST
value: 使用商店折扣會隨機為當前商品和禮包進行折扣，是否要使用？\n\n當前可享折扣商品：{0} 禮包：{1}

name: Remind this members to deploy?
value: 是否要通知該成員進行派遣？

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_DUIHUA1
value: 歡迎光臨喵老闆的飛艇商店，我敢說我有這片大陸最稀罕的玩意，喵~

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_DUIHUA2
value: 喵，我們又見面了，快來看看，這次我給你帶了不少寶貝。

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_DUIHUA3
value: 我敢說，這方圓之內要是有比我更價廉物美的商家，我就，我就三天不吃魚。

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_DUIHUA4
value: 我這裡，不怕貨比貨，就怕你不識貨，喵

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_BUYED_DUIHUA1
value: 您的眼光可太棒了，慧眼識珠，這可是上好的寶物。

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_BUYED_DUIHUA2
value: 既然客官這麼豪爽，我就告訴你一個秘密，聽說外域的某一處存在一個寶物秘境，裡面可有不少奇珍異寶。

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_BUYED_DUIHUA3
value: 再買一些，我會給你一個驚喜。

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_BUYED_DUIHUA4
value: 好久沒有遇到您這麼痛快的買家了，高興的我想和您來一杯。

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_FIRST_DUIHUA
value: 歡迎光臨，這裡是本喵我的飛艇商店，這裡會不定期更新出售來著世界各地的奇珍異寶，如果您買的多的話，我可以考慮給您一個大大的折扣。是不是很心動？快來看看。

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_SALE_DUIHUA
value: 我貓某人也不是吝嗇的喵，為了感謝你平日裡這麼照顧本喵的生意，今天全場打折！

name: Setting applied. Takes effect after a reboot.
value: 設置完成，重啟遊戲後生效

name: Deals 100% True DMG to 3 enemies and inflicts [Petrified] state, rendering them unable to move for 4 sec.
value: 對3名敵人造成100%的真實傷害，並使目標進入【石化】狀態，敵人將無法行動，持續4秒

name: Deals 120% M.DMG to 3 enemies and inflicts [Speed Impair] state, reducing their SPD by 50% for 3 sec.
value: 對3名敵人造成120%的法術傷害，並使目標進入【減速】狀態，移動速度降低50%，持續3秒

name: Deals 120% True DMG to 3 enemies; If the target is under [Ignite] state, ensure a critical hit.
value: 對3名敵人造成120%的真實傷害，若目標處於【燃燒】狀態，則必定暴擊。

name: Deals 120% M.DMG to 3 enemies and inflicts [Poisoned] state, reducing 4% of their current HP per sec for 3 sec.
value: 對3名敵人造成120%的法術傷害，並使目標進入【中毒】狀態，每秒損失敵人當前生命值4%的血量，持續3秒

name: Deals 80% M.DMG to 4 enemies and inflicts [Spellbreaker] state, reducing their M.RES by 60% for 3 sec.
value: 對4名敵人造成80%的法術傷害，並使目標進入【破魔】狀態，減少60%的魔抗，持續3秒

name: Deals 300% P.DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP; If that target's HP is less than 50%, ensure a critical hit.
value: 對血量最低的1名敵人造成300%的物理傷害，若敵人當前HP在50%以下則必定暴擊

name: Deals 120% P.DMG to 3 enemies and inflicts [Ignite] state, receiving M.DMG equals to 60% ATK per sec for 3 sec.
value: 對3名敵人造成120%的物理傷害，並使目標進入【燃燒】狀態，每秒受到60%攻擊力的魔法傷害，持續3秒

name: Inflicts [ATK Increase] state to 3 teammates, increasing their ATK by 150% for 5 sec.
value: 使我方3名女神進入【攻擊提升】狀態，增加150%的攻擊力，持續5秒

name: Inflicts [SPD Increase] state to 3 teammates, increasing their SPD by 150% for 5 sec.
value: 使我方3名女神進入【攻速提升】狀態，攻擊速度提升150%，持續5秒

name: Deals 140% M.DMG to 3 enemies and inflicts [Speed Impair]] state, reducing their SPD by 60% for 4 sec.
value: 對3名敵人造成140%的法術傷害，並使目標進入【減速】狀態，移動速度降低60%，持續4秒

name: Deals 400% P.DMG to 1 enemy and inflicts [Poisoned] state, reducing 3% of the target's current HP per sec for 4 sec.
value: 對1名敵人造成400%的物理傷害，並使目標進入【中毒】狀態，每秒損失當前生命值7%的血量，持續4秒

name: Deals 80% M.DMG to 4 enemies and inflicts [Stunned] state that last 4 sec
value: 對4名敵人造成80%的法術傷害，並使目標進入【眩暈】狀態，持續4秒

name: Deals 60% P.DMG to 6 enemies and inflicts [Ignite] state, dealing M.DMG equals to 60% ATK per sec for 4 sec.
value: 對6名敵人造成60%的物理傷害，並使目標進入【燃燒】狀態，每秒受到60%攻擊力的魔法傷害，持續4秒

name: Deals 120% P.DMG and inflicts [Sunder Armor] state to 3 enemies, reducing their P.RES by 60% for 4 sec.
value: 對3名敵人造成120%的物理傷害，並使目標進入【破甲】狀態，減少60%的物抗，持續4秒

name: Deals 60% True DMG to 6 enemies; If the target is under [Ignite] state, ensure a critical hit.
value: 對6名敵人造成60%的真實傷害，若目標處於【燃燒】狀態，則必定暴擊。

name: Deals 60% P.DMG to 6 enemies and inflicts [Poisoned] state, reducing 5% of the target's current HP per sec for 4 sec.
value: 對6名敵人造成60%的物理傷害，並使目標進入【中毒】狀態，每秒損失當前生命值5%的血量，持續4秒

name: Deals 300% P.DMG to the enemy with the highest HP and inflicts [Break] state, reducing the target's M.RES and P.RES by 60% for 5 sec.
value: 對血量最高的1名敵人造成300%的物理傷害，並使目標進入【擊破】狀態，魔抗和物抗降低60%，持續5秒

name: New map in Wonderland is open. Go and take a look!
value: 有新的秘境關卡開放啦，快去看看吧

name: Choose angels and enter the battle
value: 選擇本次需要的女神開始戰鬥

name: Purchase the same angel to level up her star
value: 購買相同女神後可以提升星級

name: Consume EXP to level up the angel
value: 消耗經驗值提升女神等級\n(等級跟隨欄位元保留)

name: Add 1 energy in the Gate of Seeking (immediately take effect after purchase)
value: 增加一點尋覓之門能量值（購買後即刻生效）

name: OUTLAND_AIRSHIP_SHANGREN_ALL_BUY
value: 哇哦，沒想到竟然全部賣空了，這感覺可真是太美妙了，那麼我就要起程去收購新玩意了，期待下次相遇！

name: Discount is full. Your next purchase will exceed the upper limit. Continue?
value: 折扣值已滿，再次購買會溢出，確認繼續購買？

name: The Airship has departed. Please come back another time.
value: 飛艇正在離開，請下次再來

name: The Airship has departed. Please come back another time.
value: 飛艇正在離開，請下次再來

name: The Airship arrived. Go and check it now
value: 天邊飛來一個飛艇，快去看看

name: Tap the Airship to check what's new
value: 點擊飛艇，快看看裡面有些什麼

name: The settings will take effect after a reboot
Alright. I will hide my light a little in front of you!
value: 好吧，我以後只在你面前，適當地收斂光芒！

name: It is okay. I can be your teacher and teach you how to sing.
value: 沒關係，我可以當你的老師，教你唱歌。

name: I might be glorious in front of others, but always gentle with you.
value: 我雖然璀璨奪目，但在你面前，一向都很溫柔。

name: My elegance is in my bone. There is no need to emphasize it.
value: 我的優雅早已刻入靈魂，不用像其他女人一樣，竭力去維持。

name: Really? You are the one for me?
value: 真的嗎？我的那個人，難道會是你？

name: I once hoped that my radiance could shine up everyone. But now that we have made this vow, my glowing light will belong to you alone.
value: 在與你簽訂契約之前，我曾希望我璀璨的光芒能照射進所有人的心裡，但從今以後，我的光芒只為你一個人而綻放！

name: A glorious golden wheel possessed by the god of the sun. One who was exposed to it will be burned by the firing sunlight.
value: 散發著璀璨光芒的金色輪盤，上面附著來自太陽之神的力量，被其光芒照射者，皆會被太陽之火燃燒成灰燼。

name: Collect 55 Apollo Shards to summon Apollo
value: 集齊55個阿波羅碎片可以召喚阿波羅

name: She is an Ancient Greek deity, the god of sunlight, oracles, music, and healing, and the protector of refugees and seafarers. Called the king of archery, she is welcomed by all goddesses because of her strong power, incomparable beauty, and talents.
value: 古希臘神話中光明、預言、音樂和醫藥之神，同時也是文明遷徙者和航海者的保護神。她被稱為弓箭之王、遠射神、金劍王，有著超強神力的同時，也有著無與倫比的美貌和才華，這讓她在諸神之中廣受歡迎。

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_74
value: 必中全體的真傷烈焰 獨特的結算收割

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_75
value: 光明普照之下，黑暗無所遁形！

name: Oh, is she the god of the sun in Greek? Too many suns in this world...
value: 希臘神話中的太陽神也被召喚過來了嗎？這個世界的太陽，未免有些過多了！

name: Welcome! Now the Greek side has two masters of archery.
value: 歡迎你的到來！以後，我們希臘神話陣營就有兩位弓箭之神了。

name: Apollo, your coming brings greater power to all gods. However, you must go through our trial first!
value: 阿波羅，你的到來會為諸神陣營提供更強大的戰力，但在此之前，你必須經過眾神的歷練！

name: I sense that mighty light power inside you. I bet once it is awakened, all darkness will be dispelled!
value: 我察覺到了，在你體內蘊含著強大的光之力量！這股力量一旦覺醒，必能照耀世間的一切黑暗！

name: My duty is to drive out all evils. No matter where I am, I will fulfill it with my whole heart.
value: 驅逐邪惡和黑暗是我的使命，不管是在原來的那個世界，還是現在的這個世界，我都義不容辭！

name: You must be the famous god of light! I have been waiting for you for so long. Let's see whose power is stronger, your light or my fire?
value: 傳說中的光明之神終於來了！我等你很久了，跟我來一場光與火的較量吧！

name: I have never seen such powerful strength of fire. I am looking forward to our battle.
value: 我也是第一次見到如此強大的火之力量，期待與你的戰鬥！

name: If you want to use your power at your own will, special training is what you need now. Let my arrow guides you to the new way out!
value: 想要在這個世界隨心所欲的使用神力，必須要經過特殊的訓練！就讓我的弓箭來指引你找到新的方向吧！

name: With your guidance, I believe a new power will be awakened soon!
value: 有你的指引，我相信自己很快就能覺醒新的力量。

name: Apollo, as the only god of light on the Greek side, I have high hopes for you! Hope your glows will reach every corner of the world.
value: 阿波羅，你作為希臘神話陣營中，唯一的光明之神，我對你抱有極高的期望！希望你的光芒照射到這個世界的每一個角落！

name: I will bring a brighter future to this world! And before that, I will accept your challenge.
value: 我會為這個世界，帶來更光明的未來的！在此之前，我將接受您的考驗。

name: I am Ra, the god of the sun in Egyptian. Let me represent the sun of this world and start this trial for you.
value: 我是拉，埃及神話中的太陽之神！就讓我代表這個世界的太陽，對你進行最終的考驗吧！

name: I have been waiting for this moment to come for so long. I am ready to get approval from all sun gods.
value: 為了這一刻，我早已準備多時，我一定會獲得所有太陽神的認可！

name: Deals a certain amount of DMG for 4 rounds
value: 每回合造成一定傷害，持續4回合

name: Deals a certain amount of DMG for 6 rounds
value: 每回合造成一定傷害，持續6回合

name: Deals a certain amount of DMG for 2 rounds, undispellable
value: 每回合造成一定傷害，不可驅散，持續2回合

name: Cupid and I are all famous archers. Who do you think is better?
value: 我與丘比特都是著名的弓箭手，你覺得誰的箭術更甚一籌呢？

name: Is my glows too blinding that no one dares to stare at me?
value: 我身上的光芒，會不會太過耀眼，而讓人不敢直視了？

name: I have the most beautiful voice in the world. Do you want to sing with me?
value: 我的歌聲是世界上最美妙的，你想與我一起，高歌一曲嗎？

name: Which one do you prefer? The glory of the sun or the tenderness of the moon.
value: 你更喜歡太陽的璀璨，還是月亮的溫柔？

name: I must stay elegant as I am the most beautiful goddess!
value: 做為最美的女神，我必須在任何時候都要保持優雅！

name: I wish my arrow could possess the magic of affection so that I can find love of my own.
value: 真希望我的弓箭也能擁有愛情的魔力，這樣就可以收穫屬於我的愛情了。

name: I think this kind of glow fits you well.
Sure! It will be my pleasure.
I prefer the glory of the sun.
There is no need to do that. You are already the most beautiful and elegant goddess!
value: 你原本就是最美、最優雅的女神！

name: Your arrow is much better than that.
value: Your arrow is much better than that.

name: It is a little bit blinding.
I am not a good singer.
I prefer the tenderness of the moon.
Don't be too hard on yourself.
Don't worry. The love you wish for must be on the way.
value: 你馬上就會遇到屬於你的愛情的。

name: Looks like I have more place in your heart!
value: 看來，在你心裡，還是我比較重要！

name: I appreciate your compliment. I am gonna be the one who shine till the end.
value: 多謝你的誇獎，我會一直綻放光芒的。

name: Come! Let's sing for our biggest craving.
value: 來吧，讓我們一起唱出心中最大的渴望！

name: Then, I will be your sun forever!
value: 那，我會一直做你的太陽！

name: I am glad to have your approval!
value: 有你的認可我很開心，我會一直保持下去的。

name: Thanks for reminding me of that. I will continue my mission to dispel all evils in the world!
value: 多謝你的提醒！我會牢記我的使命，用我的弓箭來驅散世間的邪惡！

name: I know. You must be eager to have a dramatic romance with someone.
value: 我知道了，你現在一定很希望談一場轟轟烈烈的戀愛啊。

name: Drops in the Full-Moon event. It can be used to redeem items in the event interface.
value: 中秋節活動期間戰場掛機掉落，可以在活動介面兌換道具。

name: Full-Moon Luxury Diamond Sale
value: 鑽石豪禮 中秋回饋

name: Full-Moon Limited Special Discount
value: 中秋折扣 限時促銷

name: Congratulations on ranking {0} in the Full-Moon Ranking event. You will get the following rewards:
value: 恭喜您在中秋排行榜活動中獲得第{0}名，以下為您的獎勵：

name: You have already redeemed this item.
value: 此物品已經兌換過，無需再次兌換

name: ACTIVITY_HOLIDAY_COPY_DROP_SUMMON_BY_DROP_TIPS
value: 消耗南瓜參與活動，可獲得鑽石和積分

name: Gods Twilight No. will be given out based on the guild's CR
value: 將會按照公會戰鬥力高低賦予公會國戰編號

name: Deals 200% P.DMG to all enemies and inflicts [Blaze] state for 4 rounds (ignore Debuff RES), dealing True DMG equal to 60% of Apollo's ATK each round (cannot be a critical strike).
value: 對敵方全體造成200%物理傷害，然後使敵方全體進入4回合【烈焰】狀態（無視異常抵抗），每回合造成阿波羅60%攻擊力的真實傷害（該傷害不能暴擊）。

name: Deals 600% P.DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP and immediately detonates all damage of [Blaze] and [Ignite] (their effect DMG will be dealt at once based on effect remaining rounds). If this enemy is killed, transfer the remaining effect DMG to the next enemy with the lowest HP (can only be triggered 2 times)
value: 對血量最低的敵人造成600%物理傷害，並立即結算【烈焰】【燃燒】（使debuff提前生效，生效次數為該debuff剩餘回合數），如果擊殺該敵人，繼續對血量最低的敵人攻擊，最多攻擊3次。

name: Deals 220% P.DMG to all enemies and inflicts [Blaze] state for 4 rounds (ignore Debuff RES), dealing True DMG equal to 80% of Apollo's ATK each round (cannot be a critical strike). Also, imposes a shield that equals 200% of her ATK to Apollo that lasts 1 round.
value: 對敵方全體造成220%物理傷害，然後使敵方全體進入4回合【烈焰】狀態（無視異常抵抗），每回合造成阿波羅80%攻擊力的真實傷害（該傷害不能暴擊）。阿波羅獲得自身200%攻擊力的護盾，持續1回合。

name: Deals 650% P.DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP and immediately detonates all damage of [Blaze] and [Ignite] (their effect DMG will be dealt at once based on effect remaining rounds). If this enemy is killed, transfer the remaining effect DMG to the next enemy with the lowest HP (can only be triggered 11 times)
value: 對血量最低的敵人造成650%物理傷害，並立即結算【烈焰】【燃燒】（使debuff提前生效，生效次數為該debuff剩餘回合數），如果擊殺該敵人，繼續對血量最低的敵人攻擊，最多攻擊12次。

name: [Blaze] state will last 2 more rounds
value: 【烈焰】狀態持續時間增加2回合

name: If the enemy is not killed, inflicts [Blaze] state for 2 rounds to that enemy (ignore Debuff RES, undispellable)
value: 未擊殺敵人則使該敵人獲得【烈焰】狀態2回合（無視異常抵抗，不可驅散）

name: Alas, is this the dreamland abyss? Looks like someone has been naughty.
value: 啊啦？這裡是夢境深淵嗎？看來又有淘氣的傢伙在惡作劇呐。

name: Come on, Pandora. This is your realm, right? Other gods may have believed your little trick, but not me.
value: 出來吧潘朵拉，這夢境是你造的吧？你可以瞞得過其他神，不過別想瞞得過我。

name: You truly have a great perception as a Creator, Lord Chaos. But unfortunately, you are only half right.
value: 不愧是創世神的洞察力，但遺憾的是您只猜對了一半。

name: So why don't you tell me what the other half is? My little kitty.
value: 那麼不妨告訴我沒猜對的另一半是什麼，小貓咪？

name: The other half is that I am not the one who lead you here. This dreamland will only open to those who have strong desires.
value: 另一半嘛，就是並非我引導您至此，而是當您有願望想實現時，夢境才會打開。

name: Interesting. But I don't sense any desire of mine.
value: 有意思，不過遺憾的是，我沒察覺到自己有什麼願望需要實現。

name: Hehe, obviously, the desire cannot reveal itself. Why don't you ask yourself what you want most in the world? My dear Creator.
value: 嘻嘻，欲求是不會寫在臉上的呢，不妨自己猜猜看呐，創世神大人。

name: Well... However, I do think there is one thing I would desire to do, hehe...
value: 嗯……這麼說來，眼下好像確實有件可以讓我找找樂子的事情呢，呵呵……

name: Geez, why do you stare at me like that? Wait... What're you doing!?
value: 哎？您為什麼一直盯著我，等等……等下！您要做什麼？！

name: Look, the door to other places has opened. It seems that to have fun with you is a good choice~
value: 你瞧，通往別處的門不是開了嗎？看來好好疼愛你一番是正確的選擇呢！

name: To be honest with me, little kitty, what is going on?
value: 老實交代吧，小貓咪，到底是怎麼回事？

name: Waah... If you do not come here by your own will, then maybe others have summoned you here.
value: 嗚……如果您不是主動進入夢境的話，就只可能是其他人召喚您了。

name: Well... Do you know who it is?
value: 嗯？那麼你知道這個人是誰嗎？

name: I don't know. However, the dreamland is connected by will. If the one who summoned you has a strong will, you will meet him or her sooner or later.
value: 我也不知道，但夢境是靠意念相連的，如果召喚您的人意志非常堅定，彼此遲早會相遇。

name: Alas... I don't know that I have such charm. Looks like we have to meet this guy together. Let's hit the road!
value: 啊啦……我的魅力有這麼大嗎？看來有必要抓你一塊去見見這個傢伙呢，我們走吧。

name: I don't care about all these. Just take me out of here.
value: 我對這些沒什麼興趣，帶我離開這裡就行。

name: What a surprise. Chaos, the embodiment of curiosity, doesn't care about it? Is that the sixth sense of the Creator has worked?
value: 真是意外，好奇心一向很重的卡俄斯竟然沒興趣，難道是創世神獨有的第六感……

name: No...Nothing! I said we'd better go as soon as possible!
value: 沒……沒什麼！我說我們最好儘快離開這裡！

name: Lord Chaos? Well, it seems you have been trapped here too.
value: 卡俄斯大人？好吧，看來您也被困在夢境裡了。

name: Hmm? You are Icarus, the saint of light. I don't think you are the one who summoned me.
value: 嗯……？光明聖徒伊卡璐斯？我感覺你不像是會召喚我這位秩序與混沌之神的傢伙。

name: Just as you said, it is not me. And I am also finding my way out.
value: 如您所言，我並沒有召喚您的到來，但我一直在尋求離開這個夢境的方法。

name: I see. Did you find anything?
value: 原來是這樣，你有什麼發現嗎？

name: It seems the only rule here is to battle. You are gonna battle with a serious rival or enemies that you once feared.
value: 戰鬥似乎是這裡唯一的法則，你總會遇到希望較量的對手，或是曾經恐懼的敵人。

name: To be honest, I have dreamed of the day competing with you. Come on, fight me.
value: 坦然地說，您確實是我想挑戰的人之一，來吧。

name: That is the power of the Creator... More unfathomable than I imagine...
value: 看來創世神的力量，比我想像中更加深不可測。

name: I don't think I have fully used my power since most of it seems lost when I enter here. However, I can sense its recovery after defeating the enemy.
value: 並非如此，進入夢境後我感到大部分力量都消失了，但每次擊敗對手，就會恢復一部分。

name: So, is that mean this whole dream is actually... a trial?
value: 也就是說，其實整個夢境……是一場試煉？

name: We don't know that for sure. Maybe the answer will reveal itself if we continue our journey.
value: 我目前沒有證據可以證明，不過繼續前進的話，應該會有答案。

name: I hope so. Let's go. The portal to the next level is open.
value: 但願如此，我們儘快前進吧，通往下一層夢境的傳送門已經打開了。

name: Hera? Wait... Something is wrong. I can sense the mighty but somehow twisted power within her body...
value: 赫拉？等等……好像有些不對勁！我可以感覺到她身上彌漫著強大但扭曲的力量。

name: Alas... It seems our queen has encountered some troubles here.
value: 啊啦……看來我們的天后大人在這個夢境裡遇到了些麻煩。

name: I guess the power of the abyss has something to do with that... Do you think we stand a chance if we throw caution to the wind?
value: 這是被夢境的深淵之力侵襲所造成的，唔……硬拼的話，我們有把握能取勝嗎？

name: I have no idea. But, at least we can try!
value: 這我可不知道，但最好的方式就是親自試試看！

name: Finally... I guess that's the power of a high-level god with the blessing of the abyss.
value: 總算是解決了，擁有深淵之力的上位神明真是難對付！

name: We'd better be careful. Looks like there are more of these phantoms influenced by the power of the abyss.
value: 看來有不少被這種力量侵蝕後產生的幻影，在夢境裡遊蕩，最好小心一些。

name: I will never agree to let you take the supreme divine power of greek.
value: 無論如何，我都不會認同由你們繼承希臘的最高神權。

name: It is not up to you. Only the survivor of the battle can decide. I don't mind having another war to see who is the strongest.
value: 然而希臘的統治權只歸於強者，就算再來一次神界戰爭，我也沒什麼可畏懼的。

name: Although I am not interested in the struggle for power, I don't mind having a contest with you, Zeus...
value: 雖然我對於權力這種東西已經沒什麼興趣了，但我很樂意重新和你較量較量，宙斯……

name: Thousands of years have passed. And you Greek gods are still the same, always fighting for power.
value: 看來希臘神系幾千年來沒什麼改變呐，我以為眾神的爭端遲早會結束的。

name: Chaos? Only the strongest can handle the supreme divine power. There is no room to change this ancient rule.
value: 卡俄斯？最高神權由強者所掌控，這是上古時期的法則，沒有修改和否認的餘地。

name: Ah... Don't get me wrong. I am the one who made this rule. I would not deny it.
value: 啊啦……別誤會，這項法則由我所定，我可沒有否認它的意思。

name: Then, I suppose you want to...
You are right. What took you so long to decide who is the strongest? I should give you all a lesson now, hehe...
value: 猜對了呢，這麼久都沒有決出一位真正的強者，看來我要親自給你們上一課了，呵呵……

name: That's the strength of the Creator... I guess even Zeus cannot compete with her...
value: 這就是創世神的力量嗎……這種程度即使是宙斯恐怕也無法對抗……

name: What a pity... It seems you are not as strong as I thought.
value: 真是遺憾……看來後輩們沒有我想像中那麼強。

name: Alas, maybe fate has not granted me to become the master of Greek gods...
value: 唉，或許命運還沒有允許我成為希臘神系的掌控者。

name: However, I enjoy the fight with you. Maybe that's what I have been waiting for...
value: 然而和你的戰鬥依舊讓我挺興奮，我好像明白一直以來自己期待的是什麼了……

name: Also, if you don't mind, what about joining my team? You can think about rechallenging Zeus after we get out.
value: 另外，如果你不介意的話，和我一起離開這個夢境，再考慮挑戰宙斯她們如何？

name: I think so. I don't have any better options, right?
value: 我也這麼想，畢竟很難找到更好的選擇了。

name: Chaos, the Creator of chaos and order... I am not surprised to see you here.
value: 卡俄斯，混沌與秩序的創造者，呵呵……我對於你出現在夢境深淵並不感到意外。

name: It is surprising to see you become more powerful in this dreamland. I think now you can stand a chance to fight with Zeus.
value: 令人驚訝，你的能力在夢境中變強了很多，去和宙斯爭奪最高神權，也並非沒有機會。

name: I have once dreamed of that, to compete for the supreme divine power. However, it now all feels like empty vanity to me.
value: 最高神權曾是我最渴望得到的東西，但現在只不過是無聊的虛榮而已。

name: Ah... I am surprised to hear that. I wonder what has changed your mind, the once power-lusting King of Death.
value: 啊啦……這話可真夠意外，我很好奇什麼玩意能讓嗜權如命的冥王如此著迷。

name: If you want to know, you need to beat me first, hehe.
value: 如果想知道這個秘密的話，就用實力讓我開口吧，呵呵。

name: Why... Your genesis power is already sealed by this place, but I still can't defeat you...
value: 看來即使夢境深淵封印了創世之力，在戰鬥經驗上我依舊不是你的對手……

name: So my darling, can you tell me your secret now?
value: 那麼親愛的，可以告訴我你的秘密了嗎？

name: This secret... is related to Pandora's box. I heard that someone summoned you here.
value: 這個秘密……和潘朵拉魔盒的夢境深淵有關，我聽說你是被召喚至此的？

name: Pandora has said it too. I thought I would receive a fancy invitation letter from him or her.
value: 據潘朵拉的話而言是這樣，我本來還挺期待能從召喚我的人手裡，收到一張漂亮的邀請函。

name: If you are interested, I heard that the summoner is... a human being.
value: 如果你感興趣的話告訴你也無妨，召喚者……聽說是個人類。

name: Oh, is that so? I don't remember you being so kind as to give me such important intel.
value: 喔，是嗎？但是我印象裡的哈迪斯，可不會這麼大方地給我如此重要的消息。

name: Because I am also interested in knowing why she summoned you and how this place works.
value: 因為我也很想知道她召喚你的原因，和某個夢境深淵的法則，呵呵……

name: If you want to know, why don't you join me and we can ask her together?
value: 如果想知道的話，不如和我一塊去問問她怎麼樣？

name: I was wondering why Poseidon and Hades didn't catch up with me. Now I see that they were all defeated and joined you.
value: 我還在想為什麼波塞冬和哈迪斯沒有追上來，原來她們已經被擊敗了。

name: Ah... My dear, does that make you anxious?
value: 啊啦……感到壓力了嗎，親愛的？

name: Are you kidding? I will not have any fear even facing you, the mighty Creator.
value: 你在開玩笑？即使是面對創世神，我也不會有任何畏懼，我必須要證明自己的實力。

name: I appreciate your courage. If you defeat me, I guess they will recognize your position as always.
value: 你的氣勢我挺中意的，如果能擊敗我，那麼獲得波塞冬和哈迪斯的認同，也並不是難事。

name: Then we have nothing more to say. Come on!
value: 那麼沒有必要多說什麼了，來吧！

name: Hehe, I, Chaos, the master of order and chaos, will test your ability myself.
value: 呵呵……我秩序與混沌的掌控者卡俄斯，將親自測試你的能力。

name: I guess... I have underestimated your power...
value: 看來我遠遠低估了創世神的力量。

name: What an exciting contest, isn't it? I feel that the stronger my opponent is, the quicker my strength will recover...
value: 一場讓人興奮的較量不是嗎，我感到越和強大的對手戰鬥，力量回歸得也越快……

name: In this dreamland, all original power will be lost. Only by challenging more and more powerful foes can those power be recovered.
value: 在夢境深淵內，所有人原本的力量都會失去，不斷挑戰強大的對手，這些力量才能回歸。

name: And that, it is said that this power can make your wish come true.
value: 而這份力量，據說最終將幫你實現內心中的願望。

name: Well... Unfortunately, I still don't know what I want.
value: 原來如此……但遺憾的是，我依舊還是沒察覺有什麼真正想要的東西。

name: It's too early to say that. Maybe you can find the answer through the door to the next dreamland.
value: 這可不好說，沒准穿過下一扇夢境之門時，你就會看到答案了。

name: Ah... Well, I hope the answer will be a luxury and comfortable bathtub...
value: 啊啦……好吧，在這一連串讓人疲倦的戰鬥之後，我希望答案是個豪華而舒適的浴缸……

name: Yo, isn't this the Creator, Chaos? Look at all those goddesses behind you. Are you preparing to destroy the world?
value: 喲，創世神卡俄斯……看看你身後眾神的陣勢可真夠嚇人的，這是打算毀滅世界？

name: Stop kidding, Erebus. It has been tens of thousands of years... I wasn't expecting to meet you here.
value: 別開玩笑了，距離上次見面已經過去了幾萬年，我可沒想到在夢境還有機會遇見你。

name: Seeing you here, I guess the summoning has succeeded...
value: 不過你的出現，也意味著召喚咒文成功了，哼……

name: Speaking of the summoning, it seems you know something about it. You know the price to summon the Creator, right?
value: 說到召喚咒文，你好像知道些內情嘛，親愛的，召喚創世神的代價可是很大的。

name: Indeed. But as an old friend, don't you think we should first warm up a little?
value: 的確是這樣，然而告訴你內情之前，不該和老朋友先打個招呼、敘敘舊嗎？呵呵……

name: Someone feels lonely when I am not around, huh? Then, let me give you some entertainment...
value: 啊啦……幾萬年沒親熱，覺得寂寞了？那就讓我好好疼愛疼愛你再說吧。

name: Ahh, is that too much for you? I am gonna bring something more exciting... hehe...
value: 哎？這就吃不消了？我還打算玩點更刺激的呐。

name: Stop, stop... You just won't get out of your fighting way, so violent!
value: 不打了……你的戰鬥方式和以前一樣那麼暴力……

name: So, let's get back to the point. Why was I summoned?
value: 那麼回到正題，我被召喚的原因究竟是什麼？

name: If you have an intense obsession, then you can enter this dreamland in Pandora's box, right?
value: 潘朵拉魔盒內的夢境，只要懷有強大執念就能夠進入這裡，這你已經知道了。

name: Not long ago, I heard a human being had entered here. And I am sure you know her well...
value: 不久前我聽說一個人類進入了夢境，而這個傢伙的身份，我相信你並不陌生。

name: A human being I knew... You mean...
value: 讓我印象深刻的人類只有一個，難道……

name: Hehe... Although she is not that powerful in the real world,
value: 呵呵……她在現實世界中，並不至於強大到讓我們神明感到壓力。

name: but in here, she is now more powerful than any gods... We are surprised to see that potential lives in a human being.
value: 但在這裡，她已經強到讓眾神無奈的地步了，我們都很驚訝人類竟然有如此恐怖的潛能。

name: What a problem... Where is she?
value: 還真是個麻煩的傢伙，她在哪？

name: Calm down. You will meet her in no time. Let's go.
value: 別急，再穿過兩扇夢境之門，你就會見到她了，我們出發吧。

name: Finally, you came, the Creator. We have been waiting for you for so long.
value: 您總算來了，創世神，我們等您很久了。

name: Nyx? Why are you here? What wish could you have?
value: 倪克絲？你為什麼會出現在夢境裡？你也有希望實現的願望嗎？

name: Erebus, Gaia, and I, the three origin gods, all have the same wish: to find our lost divine power.
value: 我、厄瑞玻斯和蓋亞三大原始神有著共同的願望，就是尋回原本失去的神力。

name: But we then get into troubles...
value: 然而糟糕的是，我們遇到了不小的麻煩，不得不暫時放棄。

name: Alas... the trouble, I guess, has something to do with that human being, right?
value: 啊啦……麻煩的原因，和那個人類有關吧？

name: Yes. That innocent but terrible being guards the final door of this dreamland so that no one can get out of here.
value: 是啊，那個天真但可怕的傢伙守在夢境深淵的最後一道門前，所有人都出不去了。

name: Interesting. I cannot wait to fight with her.
value: 有意思，我有興趣好好和她較量一番了。

name: The rule of the dreamland is all about the fight over power. My power will become part of your strength if you have defeated me. That might be helpful.
value: 夢境深淵的法則是力量的爭奪，戰勝我的話，我的力量也會融入您的靈魂，助您一臂之力。

name: Also, if you beat me, you would acquire my power. Am I right?
value: 相對地，如果我徹底認輸的話，你也將獲得我的力量，沒錯吧？

name: Hehe... But I haven't seen you yield to anyone, right?
value: 呵呵……從古至今，我可從沒見過您向誰認輸過，不是嗎？

name: How about this, Nyx? Even if I lost my genesis power, this kind of battle didn't let you down, right?
value: 如何，倪克絲？即使暫時失去創世之力，我的戰鬥也沒讓你失望吧？

name: I think you may stand a chance to beat that human being after getting my power.
value: 在獲得我的力量後，您應該能和那個人類一較高下了。

name: I owe you one. I will buy you a drink after all this if you don't mind.
value: 我欠你個人情，如果不介意的話，離開夢境後我會好好請你喝一杯。

name: Long time no see Chaos, the Lord of order and chaos.
value: 許久沒見了，秩序與混沌之主，卡俄斯。

name: Gaia, I am surprised a human defeated you since you and I all share comparable power as the origin god.
value: 蓋亞，你敗給那個人類我挺驚訝的，身為原始神，你的力量幾乎與我不相上下。

name: Our original strength means nothing here. The will and obsession in the battle is the primary source of the power.
value: 我們原本的力量在這個夢境裡沒有多少意義，戰鬥意志和執念才是最重要的力量來源。

name: Although you think you don't have any wish, I do sense your bliss for continuous battles.
value: 雖然您自認為沒有想實現的願望，但我感受到了您享受戰鬥的喜悅。

name: Alas... I guess you are right.
value: 啊啦……你猜的沒錯，我並不否認這一點。

name: As a Creator, you are more powerful than anyone in the real world. Maybe your biggest wish is to find one opponent that is stronger than you.
value: 身為創世神，在現實世界中無敵於天下的您，或許最大的願望就是挑戰更強的對手。

name: And that is why I find resonance with that summon spell cast by that human...
value: 而這也是我與那個人類產生的召喚咒文產生共鳴，來到這個夢境的原因吧？

name: Indeed. And her wish is precisely the opposite of yours: to challenge the most powerful god.
value: 您終於意識到了，而那個人類的願望，也正是“挑戰眾神中最強的存在”。

name: Heh... I guess it is meant to be like that. In that case, why don't we bring more fun to this party?
value: 呵……這也是一種宿命，不是嗎？既然如此，就讓這場派對更熱鬧些吧！

name: I think there is no need to continue our battle. I surrender. Your power is way stronger than mine.
value: 看來沒有再戰鬥下去的必要了，您的戰鬥力已經遠遠在我之上，我認輸。

name: After getting your strength, I sense that genesis power is returning to me. And... it is more powerful than any time.
value: 在獲得你的力量後，我感到創世之力已經回到了自己的靈魂中，而且……比以前還要強大。

name: That's right. Now, your power is so strong that you can even change the rule of this place, which means you can take us away right now.
value: 沒錯，以您現在的力量甚至足以改變夢境深淵的規則，直接帶領我們從這裡離開。

name: This is a quick fix, but what is the consequence?
value: 這確實是一個穩妥的方式，但這樣做會有什麼後果嗎？

name: Once the rule has changed, that human will be alone in this dreamland, wandering forever because her wish can not come true.
value: 一旦改變規則，那個人類將因為願望無法實現，而獨自一人在夢境中徘徊，直至永遠。

name: It seems so cruel to let her be trapped here.
value: 對於她來說，這未免太殘酷了……

name: But if you choose to fulfill her wish and accept the challenge, there is a chance you will lose everything, including your genesis power.
value: 但如果您選擇滿足她的願望，接受挑戰的話，一旦失敗，創世之力也將會被她奪走。

name: Lose everything... Gaia, based on our battle, what are the chances if I am against her?
value: 這意味著我將失去一切，是嗎……？以剛才和你的戰鬥來看，蓋亞，你認為我有幾分勝算？

name: She is strong, strong enough to frighten most of the gods. If I say it is fifty-fifty, what would you choose?
value: 她很強，強到讓眾神畏懼的程度，如果說我認為勝算僅有50%，您會作何選擇呢？

name: I will still enjoy this last battle.
value: 我依舊會享受這場最後的戰鬥。

name: Hmm, you are still the same, so competitive. All Greek gods will witness this battle together. Wish you good luck.
value: 您依舊和以前一樣從不服輸呢，希臘眾神將共同見證這場戰鬥，願您武運昌隆……

name: I will not take chances on the future of the Greek gods.
value: 為了希臘神系的未來，我不應冒這個險。

name: The future of the Greek gods is indeed important. But that poor thing...
value: 希臘神系的未來確實無比重要，但我也為那個人類感到惋惜。

name: This ultimate loneliness is the fate she needs to face, just like me in the chaos time before I create the world.
value: 這份永恆的孤獨，也是她需要面對的命運，就如同我創世前那漫長的混沌時代。

name: Wish that fate could lead her soul. The exit of the dreamland is open. Let's get out of this place.
value: 願命運引導她的靈魂，夢境出口已經打開，事不宜遲，我們離開這裡吧。

name: You finally came. I have been waiting for this moment for so long...
value: 你終於來了，我等待這一刻已經很久了……

name: Alas... I thought it would be you. I have to say you look more charming in that suit.
value: 啊啦……果然是你呢，不得不說，你現在的這身打扮，比學生裝要帥氣多了。

name: Hmmm... If you think the only thing that has changed is my appearance, maybe you gotta pay for that later.
value: 哼哼，如果你認為我有所改變的只是外貌，接下來恐怕就得吃苦頭了。

name: Is that so, my dear? I don't think I have a reason to lose to you... Wait! Is that...
value: 是嗎，親愛的？我一直不覺得自己有理由輸給你……等等！這難道是……！

name: You can feel it, right? The similar power in my soul...
value: 你能感受到吧？我靈魂中那與你極為相似的力量……

name: The genesis power!? It is impossible! You don't even have the blood of a god. Why can you have such power in your soul?
value: 創世之力？！不可能！沒有神明血統的你，怎麼可能繼承這種力量？！

name: Never underestimate a human being, the origin god of Greek, Chaos. Are you ready to face the prime of this party?
value: 不要小看人類的可能性，希臘的創世神卡俄斯，準備好迎接派對最後的高潮了嗎？

name: Come on. l assure you this will be fun.
value: 來吧，我保證這場遊戲不會讓你感到無趣的。

name: I lose... It seems I'm only flesh and blood after all...
value: 我終究是輸了嗎……看來我太天真了……

name: I am curious why you are obsessed with defeating me...
value: 我很好奇，你為什麼這麼執著于戰勝我……

name: Well... In the real world, although I am the commander of all gods...
value: 呵……現實中的我，雖然身為你們所有神明的指揮官……

name: I don't think these gods truly believe I am the one worth following. I doubt myself whether I can bring faith and honor to my followers.
value: 但同伴們真的認為我是值得追隨的人嗎？我真的能給她們帶來信念與榮耀嗎？

name: I thought by deleting you, I could prove that even though I am a human being, I can be a true leader.
value: 我原本想通過這場戰鬥的勝利，去證明自己是一名真正的領袖，哪怕我只是人類。

name: I did not expect this failure... Why do I lose to you even though I possess the genesis power same as you...
value: 但沒想到，即使擁有和你一樣的創世之力，我卻依舊以失敗告終……

name: In reality, you indeed don't have the best fighting skills.
value: 現實中的你，的確沒有眾神中最強的戰鬥技巧。

name: However, what you have is more precious: selflessness, unity value, wisdom, and bravery. Those are the gods' lack.
value: 然而你卻擁有著眾神難以具備的無私、團結、智慧、以及勇氣之心。

name: Even if you lose, you are still the leader of all gods till the end of the world.
value: 即使沒有取得勝利，但在我心中你依舊是眾神的領袖，從這場戰鬥起，至世界毀滅之時。

name: ... I see. Your words... means a lot to me... It relieves me from my doubt.
value: ……我明白了，有你這番話，或許能讓我斬斷心中的那分猶豫。

name: Humph, that's the person I know! Let's get the hell out of here. I can't wait to soak in the bathtub...
value: 哼，這才像我認識的勇者！走吧，如此激烈的戰鬥過後，我已經等不及要泡進浴缸了……

name: Purchase the Angel Blessings can add Quick Combat times, confirm to check?
value: 祈禱女神的祝福可以增加每日使用次數，是否前往祈禱？

name: ACTIVITY_NEW_PLAYER_WISH_SUMMON_NOT_GET_REWARD_CONTENT
value: 心願召喚活動已結束，您未領取的獎勵已通過郵件發送！

value: 每次快速掛機立即獲得2小時掛機收益，您是月卡用戶，本次快速掛機免費，且不計入每日快速掛機購買次數

value: 卡俄斯女神碎片自選箱

value: 打開寶箱選擇卡俄斯任意品質的碎片

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_76
value: 主宰混沌與秩序的創世之力！

name: Increases player's Lv. by idling
value: 玩家等級主要通過掛機提高

name: Increases  CR to complete more dungeons
value: 提高戰鬥力，通過更多副本關卡

name: Increases CR to clear more stories
value: 提高戰鬥力，到達天空塔更高層

name: Purchase to one-tap claim all rewards
Unlock to get the following rewards
value: 解鎖可立即獲得以下獎勵

name: Unlock the Advance Supply to get the following rewards
value: 解鎖高級戰令總共可以獲得以下獎勵

name: Purchase the Monthly Card to get extra free Quick Combat times
value: 開通月卡可額外獲得免費快速掛機次數

name: Please choose one Quick Combat Scroll
value: 請選擇一種快速戰鬥券

value: 該帳號已被綁定，授權失敗

Confirm to lock this angel's size and position?
value: 確定鎖定女神當前位置大小嗎？

value: 本周時空飛艇刷新已上限

name: AIR_SHIP_REFRESH_TIPS
value: 時空飛艇將在倒計時後刷新
