ABYSS_FAST_FIGHT_TIPS
value: 是否進行快速戰鬥\n 本日剩餘次數：{0}

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_29
value: 北歐神話中的雷電與力量之神，同時還司掌風暴、戰爭、農業。

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_28
value: 北歐神話中的惡作劇與詭計之神，亦是火神。原本是巨人族出身，因與奧丁交好而加入阿薩神族。

name: ABYSS_FAST_BATTLE_MAX
value: 深淵每日掃蕩達到上限

name: You can only quick-explore once per day
value: 深淵每日掃蕩達到上限

name: ABYSS_FAST_FIGHT_SHOP_TIPS
value: 本次掃蕩出現了{0}個商人

name: Congratulations, you have passed the highest level! Stay tuned for future updates~
value: 恭喜您已經通過最高副本，後續更新敬請期待

name: You can only buy 1 item and the Merchant will leave after the purchase.
value: 只能購買1種商品，購買後商人會離開。

name: Relic Quality Inherit only applies to the same Relic, Relic Awaken Inherit only applies to Angel's Limited Relic
value: 只有相同的聖物可以繼承品質，只有女神限定聖物可以繼承覺醒

name: Inherit the Relic's quality only and its attributes will not be changed.
value: 僅繼承品質，不改變聖物隨機屬性

name: Complete Mexico City
value: 通關墨西哥城全部關卡

name: When Chaos is in action, deals True Damage equal to 2% of Chaos' Max HP to all enemies.
value: 每次行動時，對敵方全體造成卡俄斯最大生命值2%的真實傷害

name: Relics have the same quality; please choose another relic
value: 品質相同，請重新選擇聖物

name: Relics have the same awaken level; please choose another relic
value: 覺醒等級相同，請重新選擇聖物

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Cupid's Dreamland
value: 用於提升丘比特夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Cupid Optional Chest
value: 丘比特女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the chest and choose Cupid's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇丘比特任意品質的碎片

name: ACTIVITY_TURN_BRAND_EXCHANGE_COIN_TITLE
value: 限時活動道具自動回收

name: ACTIVITY_TURN_BRAND_EXCHANGE_COIN_CONTENT
value: 本次驚魂之旅活動已結束，蝙蝠、南瓜頭已自動回收成鑽石！

name: Participated in the guild boss 1 times
ACTIVITY_TURN_BRAND_UNLOCK_GIFT_NEED
value: 需要消耗{0}南瓜頭可解鎖該檔禮包

name: When entering the battle, increases Cupid's Debuff RES by 100% for 1 round (cannot be dispelled). When in action, inflicits a [Staunch] to all allies (cannot be dispelled). Each stacks of [Staunch] will increase the Debuff RES by 5% for 2 rounds (This effect can stack but the duration will only be refreshed when activated again).
value: 進入戰鬥時，丘比特自身異常抵抗提升100%，持續1回合（不可驅散）。每回合行動時，使我方全體獲得【堅定】狀態（不可驅散），每層【堅定】提升5%異常抵抗，持續2回合（提升效果可疊加，回合數可刷新但不疊加）。

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_77
value: 墜落愛河的天使，在回應誰的期待？

name: Aah, my head... Am I dreaming... Pandora? Why are you here?
value: 頭好痛……我在做夢嗎？以及……潘朵拉？你為什麼會在這裡？

name: Hehe... Just as I expected. You had strayed into a dreamland abyss.
value: 嘻嘻……看來如我所料的一樣，你也誤入夢境深淵了呐。

name: Wait! What are you planning? I have a sense that you are pranking me now.
value: 等下！你是不是在耍什麼花招？你的表情讓我嗅到了惡作劇的氣息！

name: Why do you say that? My dear Love Lady. This is the place for those who hold strong wishes.
value: 別這麼說，愛神大小姐，只有抱持難以釋懷的願望之人，才會來到這裡。

name: If you say so... okay... Is it because I swear every night that I will become the most excellent Ambassador of love?
value: 啊！我想起來了！我每天晚上都發誓，要成為全世界最偉大的愛情使者！

name: ...Well. That's pretty much a big wish. Good luck with achieving that.
value: ……好吧，你的願望還真夠離譜的，那麼祝你好運。

name: Alas? I thought you were here to help me with that.
value: 哎？你不是來幫我達成願望的嗎？

name: Me? Of course NOT! I am only a guide. I don't have the time to take care of you.
value: 當然不是！我只是個引路人罷了，可沒興趣照顧你。

name: How irresponsible! I guess someone needs a lesson from me.
value: 真是不負責任！像你這樣的壞孩子要好好地教訓一下呢！

name: What? Wait... stop! What are you doing?!
I yield. I yield! Stop that.
Gee, I sense my power is not as strong as before... Tell me, is that your doing?!
value: 咦？我的力量好像下降了很多呢……老實交代，這是你惡作劇的結果嗎？！

name: Well... Definitely not me! Your power is scattered in this dreamland, and you need to find them by yourself.
value: 呃……很明顯不是這樣，你的力量遺失在夢境的各處，只有自己才能找回來。

name: You'd better add I will help you to find them at the end.
value: 哎呀，現在這話是不是應該改成“我會幫你一塊找回來”更合適呢？

name: It's late now. My dear, where will we be going?
value: 時間不早啦，親愛的，告訴我接下來要去哪兒？

name: How terrible. I found that I have forgotten what love really is...
value: 真糟糕，我發現自己的腦海裡已經忘了“愛情”是什麼了……

name: Huh? What does this have anything to do with our trip?
It sure does! The power of a love angel comes from the belief in love. If I already forget that...
value: 當然有關係啦！愛神的力量可是來自於對愛情的理念，如果連這個都忘了……

name: Hehe... Maybe that's a good thing. Your stupid rule of love really f**ked those human beings.
value: 呵呵……或許這是件好事，你以前對愛情那套死板的規則，可把人類整得夠慘。

name: Hello there... Alas?! Pandora and Cupid?
value: 請問這裡是……哎？！你們是……潘朵拉和丘比特？

name: You... Why are you here? For an unachieved wish?
value: 哎？！你為什麼會在夢境裡，難道你也有想實現的願望嗎？

name: Ugh... Yes? I forget my real name... I guess if I want to leave here, I need to recall my name.
value: 呃……確切說是的，我忘了自己真正的名字，好像只有回想起來後才能離開夢境。

name: Funny... What about a fight? If you win, I will tell you your name.
value: 這可真夠滑稽的……我們來打一場如何？如果你贏了的話，我就告訴你原本的名字。

name: If you lose, you gonna tell me what love means to you. How about that?
value: 如果你輸了，就要告訴我愛情在你心中的含義，如何？

name: That's a good idea. Come on!
Ah... You are tougher than I expected.
value: 啊……你比我想像中難對付得多……

name: Humph. So, tell me your opinion about love.
value: 哼哼，那麼遵守約定，告訴我你對愛情的看法吧。

name: Ugh... I really can't tell. But maybe, love is a hazy expectation.
value: 呃……我也說不上來，但或許愛情……是一種朦朧的期待？

name: Hazy expectation... Well, that is an interesting answer.
value: 朦朧地期待……嗎？一個有趣的答案，我會好好記下來的。

name: Wait! You really do not intend to tell me my real name? I want to get out!
value: 等下！你真的不打算說出我的真名嗎？我還指望著能離開這裡呢！

name: Don't worry, my love. I am not such a cruel angel. I will tell you... after I retrieve my power! See you later~
value: 別擔心，親愛的，我可不是這麼無情的傢伙，在取回力量之後，我會告訴你的，回頭見！

name: I sense that some part of my power is around here. We have come to the right place.
value: 我感覺到自己的一部分力量就在附近，看來沒走錯路呢。

name: Humph? Isn't this Cupid, the little love angel of Rome? Let me guess. You are here to get back your lost power.
value: 嗯？羅馬的小愛神丘比特？難不成你來這裡，是為了找回自己丟失的力量？

name: That's right! Don't tell me you laid your dirty hands into my power.
value: That's right! Don't tell me you laid your dirty hands into my power.

name: Indeed. And I am not going to hand it over to you.
value: 沒錯，而且我並不打算還給你喲。

name: Then, I guess you are about to suffer a bit!
value: 那恐怕就要讓你吃點苦頭啦！

name: Does anyone tell you that your cute face looks so inconsistent with your fighting style?
value: 你這張可愛的臉，和你打架時的暴力程度可真不相稱……

name: You tell me why you are so obsessed with the power of love first.
value: 哎，為什麼你會對愛神的力量這麼執著？

name: Mmm... You don't know what it feels like to live alone on the moon for thousands of years...
value: 喔唷……看來你很難理解，在月亮上一個人呆幾千年是什麼感覺。

name: So, you are going to use my power to summon someone to... be with you?
value: 你不會是想使用我的力量去……召喚某個人？

name: Yeah. She has good archery skills, just like you. My old friends... However, she didn't come here.
value: 是啊，她和你一樣精於弓箭，是我的故友……然而遺憾的是，她並沒有降臨這個世界。

name: I really wish to meet her here, even just in this dream.
value: 我挺想見見這個人的，哪怕只能在夢裡。

name: But you will always wake up in the end. The dream only brings out more frustration.
value: 在我看來沉醉於夢境，只會帶給人更多失望罷了，親愛的。

name: Maybe yes, maybe no. But at least I can feel love through these longing feelings.
value: 或許如你所言，但至少愛情對於我來說，意味著一種思念。

name: Longing? It sounds a little bit strong but somewhat sweet...
value: 思念麼？感覺挺沉重的，但又有那麼一絲溫馨……

name: You are about to continue to find your lost power, right? Let me help you then...
value: 你會繼續尋找自己遺失的力量吧？讓我也來幫幫你好了……

name: Cupid, come and fight with me! I am very curious about how the power of love can enhance my fire!
value: 丘比特，來打一場吧！我很期待愛神的力量能讓我的火焰變強多少！

name: Gosh... I should know that my power may end up in someone like her...
value: 天哪……我早該料到自己的力量，有可能會落到某些性格糟糕的傢伙手上……

name: Can we just sit down and talk? I can take you to the barbecue if you are willing to give my power back.
value: 我們不能坐下來好好談談嗎？比如說你把力量還給我，我請你吃烤肉？

name: Good idea! Let's take a before-meal exercise!
value: 想法不錯！讓我們開始餐前運動吧！

name: Wait! Do you even understand what I said before?!
value: 等一下！你是不是沒聽明白我說的話？！

name: I am this close to getting all my clothes burnt. Never and ever will I talk to anyone who can play with fire.
value: 真夠嗆，衣服差點被燒光，我這輩子再也不想和火龍打交道了……

name: It's a shame to lose to you after getting such great power.
value: 太可惜了，沒想到即使獲得了這麼強的力量，竟然還會輸給你。

name: You really underestimate my power. If you don't have deep insights into love, I don't think you can master it.
value: 我的力量可沒這麼容易駕馭，如果你對愛情沒什麼深刻的理念，是發揮不出來的。

name: Deep insights? To me, love is overwhelming hugs and hot kisses, burning yourself and the one you love with fire, right?
value: 深刻的理念？愛情不就是用如火焰般熾熱的擁抱和親吻，把你喜歡的傢伙淹沒麼？

name: If someone does not accept your courting, just knock her out and take her back to your crib. She will agree eventually.
value: 如果這個傢伙不答應和你交往，就把他打暈帶回巢穴裡，直到他同意為止。

name: What? Why do you look so surprised? That's what love means to me!
value: 你為什麼擺出這麼一副驚訝的表情？愛情在我看來就這麼簡單。

name: Before I go mad and knock you out, you'd better get out of my sight...
value: 在我發瘋之前，我還是快點去下一個夢境比較好……

name: Wait! Bring me with you! I give back your power, and you owe me one barbecue!
value: 喂！把我帶上！力量還給你了！你還欠我一頓烤肉！

name: It's freezing... Where is this place...
value: 凍死我了……這個夢境簡直比北極還寒冷……

name: I am not impressed since this dream is the product of that Frost Dragon.
value: 一點也不奇怪，這個夢境是冰霜龍母的意志所誕生的。

name: Frost Dragon? Do you mean that cold as hell b***h?
value: 千萬別告訴我是你那個沒有任何感情、冷得像塊萬年堅冰的北歐龍族姐妹。

name: Don't worry. She is outnumbered.
value: 別擔心，我們人多，等會要是打起來勝算肯定不會小。

name: You are Cupid, the angel of love. I know you come here to find your power.
value: 小愛神丘比特嗎？我知道你是來尋找自己丟失的力量。

name: Finally, understanding beings. Since you know why I am here, why don't you...
value: 還好您是個通情達理的人，既然您已經知道了我的來意，那麼……

name: I am sorry. I will not give it back.
value: 非常遺憾，然而我並不打算把這份力量還給你。

name: See, I know there is no need to talk with her. Let's just fight!
value: 你看，我就說沒必要廢話吧，想說服她把力量還給你基本等於做白日夢，開打啦！

name: This is tougher than I thought! You are really good with your ice skill.
value: 真是難對付！我這輩子也不會再想和冰龍打交道了！

name: I guess this power is just not mine...
value: 看來，這份力量終究不屬於我……

name: I thought you didn't care about love since you have seen so many of it.
value: 唉……我原以為像您這樣存在，已經不在意愛情這種東西了。

name: Hehe, on the contrary. God or human, they all put more emphasis on things they don't have or are difficult to get.
value: 呵呵，恰恰相反，無論是人或神，都看重自己沒有，或是難以得到的東西。

name: Though the time is short, your power gives me a sense of warmth. It's just like I am with someone.
value: 雖然時間很短，但你的力量讓我體驗到了一種不曾有過的溫暖，仿佛某個人的陪伴一樣。

name: Maybe that's what love feels like. Fleeting but precious.
value: 或許這就是所謂愛情的感覺吧，稍縱即逝，但讓人無比珍惜。

name: I feel comforted by hearing you say that.
value: 聽您這麼說，多少讓我多了一絲安慰。

name: So, as an apology for your trouble, I will help you to retrieve your lost power.
value: 那麼，作為給你帶來麻煩的歉意，我就幫你一同取回丟失的力量吧。

name: I am not surprised to meet you here after what I have experienced.
value: 在經歷前兩個夢境後，遇見你我一點也不感到意外。

name: And I am pretty sure I will see you here, standing right behind me.
value: 而我也很清楚你遲早會站在我的面前。

name: I guess you and I have to fight before I can take my power from you, right?
value: 所以我猜，在我把遺失在你這裡的力量取回來前，一場戰鬥是在所難免的，你說呢？

name: Hehe, that's why I like to talk with smart people.
value: 啊啦，我喜歡和說話直接而聰明的傢伙打交道。

name: Then, let's fight!
value: 那麼讓我們開始吧，哼哼！

name: You are much more powerful than before! And your mastery of my power... much better than my two previous opponents!
value: 你比以前強大了很多！相較於其他人，你很擅長運用從我這裡得到的力量！

name: Maybe it is because the thunder is just as random and free as love.
value: 雷電、風暴本身就和愛情一樣多變而隨性，你不覺得嗎？

name: Don't you think?
value: 正是如此，我才能將這份力量協調得這麼完美。

name: Humph, I found your disposition quite attractive...
value: 你這副性格我倒是一點也不討厭呢，哼哼……

name: What are you implying, my dear?
value: 喲，你這話是在暗示什麼嗎，親愛的？

name: Alas, you look pretty when you blush.
value: 啊啦，原來小愛神臉紅的樣子也很可愛呢。

name: Let me join your trip to gather your lost power. I would like to see how all these will end.
value: 讓我加入你尋找力量的旅程如何？我挺想看看這件事發展到最後會多有趣。

name: Ah... The last guy in the world I wanted to see is here...
value: 啊……我這輩子最不想見到的麻煩傢伙出現了……

name: Humph, you are just a little angel of love. How rude are you!
value: 哼，作為回應我召喚而來的愛情使者，這是什麼失禮的話！

name: Lady Hera, my dear queen. Love has its own path. Even I can't change it.
value: 希臘的天后赫拉閣下，您在愛情上有著自己的命運，即使是愛神也並不能扭轉。

name: I really need your help in getting the perfect love on my mind.
value: 為了得到我心目中完美的愛情，我實在太需要你的説明了。

name: Suppose you are not willing to help me. Then, I will take all your power and change the rule by myself!
value: 如果你不願幫我，那麼我只能依照夢境深淵的規則，奪取你全部的力量，獨自去改變一切！

name: I have tried my best, but I lost... Is love already abandoned me?
value: 唉，即使拼盡全力，我最終還是輸了，愛情已經徹底拋棄我了嗎……

name: I wonder what love means to you.
value: 我其實很想知道，您是怎麼看待愛情本身的。

name: Loyalty. It means everything to me. Even though I am the queen of all gods, love is something that only can be shared through two beings.
value: 還有什麼比忠誠於彼此更重要的呢？即使貴為天后，愛情依舊是兩個人的遊戲。

name: But my love has to face the suspect by all gods, wanting through all the difficulties... It is not fair!
value: 而我的愛情卻始終要面對眾神的猜疑，經歷各種磨難和考驗，這未免太不公平了。

name: On the contrary, there is no love without trials.
value: 和您所想的恰恰相反，風平浪靜的愛情是不存在的。

name: The troubles you meet when you are in love make love more precious. Just like diamonds, if you want it to shine, you must polish it first.
value: 愛情經歷的曲折讓它更有價值，如同鑽石也需要打磨之後，才能煥發光輝一樣。

name: Your loyalty to love is precious too. It will reward you eventually in someday.
value: 您對於愛情的忠誠，也始終是最珍貴的寶物，它最終是不會讓您失望的。

name: ...Well. Maybe I don't need your power to change everything if that's the case.
value: ……好吧，如果真的是這樣，我或許也並不需要愛神的力量，來改變這一切。

name: Good luck with finding your love, my lady.
Well, is that a cute kitty who smells love and breaks into my dream?
value: 嗯？看來有只調皮的小貓眯嗅到了愛情的氣味，闖入我的夢境了呢。

name: Freyja! Hands over my power, or I will shoot your head!
value: 北歐愛神芙蕾雅！把我遺失在你這裡的力量交出來！不然我的箭就要落到你的頭頂啦！

name: Alas, we are all goddesses of love. No need to act like that. Would it be boring if I just agreed to hand it over?
value: 哎呀呀，同為愛情女神，不覺得如果我立刻答應的話，就太無趣了嗎？

name: Fight me, then. That will be more interesting.
value: 那麼一場較量應該會讓你提起興趣吧，哼哼……

name: You are confident. But... you have forgotten something...
value: 挺有自信的嘛，然而，你似乎忘了我的另一個身份呢……

name: I am also the Commander of Norse Valkyrie, Lord of the War of Valhalla. Come on! Let's fight!
value: 北歐女武神統領者，英靈殿戰爭領主，在此向你挑戰，來吧！

name: That is a brilliant fight, isn't it?
value: 一場精彩的戰鬥，不是嗎？

name: I enjoy it very much. I used to think you were just an inexperienced child.
value: 哼，很讓我盡興呢，我以為你只是個不諳世事的孩子罷了。

name: You will suffer if you underestimate my power.
value: 小瞧我可是要吃大虧的呐。

name: By the way, is there any chance you can join our Valhalla and give up your Rome deity?
value: 你的實力很讓我青睞呢，要不要放棄羅馬神系的神格，到北歐的英靈殿來？

name: I assure you that, in our Nordic area, there will be a lot of opportunities for you.
value: 我向你保證，在北歐有更大的舞臺，能讓你好好發揮自己的實力。

name: Maybe. I will consider your offer if I get bored of all these and want to do something serious.
value: 如果有一天我玩膩了，想認真幹點大事的時候，我會考慮的，哼哼。

name: There seems only one part of my power is out there. Where is it...
value: 我感到只剩最後一塊力量碎片沒有找到了，會在哪兒呢……

name: Hmm... You do have good instincts.
value: 嗯……你的感覺沒錯呢，前輩。

name: Enmusubi, the love angel of Yamato? All right, that's the fate that plays tricks on me.
value: 大和的愛情使者，緣結神？好吧，這可真是命運的安排。

name: Your last lost power is in my hand. And I do not want to keep it to myself.
value: 您遺失的最後一份力量，現在在我手上，但我並不想占為己有。

name: Really?! That's unusual. I never thought this could be solved so easily.
value: 哎？！這是太陽從西邊出來了嗎？我可真沒想過事情會解決得如此簡單！

name: But I hope you promise one thing. Don't go easy on me when you can fight with me with your full power.
value: 但我希望您答應我一件事，就是在得到完整的力量後，能全力與我一戰。

name: I guess you have wished the same thing as I am, right?
value: 看來你和我一樣，對潘朵拉魔盒許下過相同的願望，對吧？

name: Your ideas about love and destiny are much different from mine thousands of years ago...
value: 前輩對於愛情、緣分的理念，從千年前就和我有著巨大的分歧……

name: But our power is all coming from that ideas. So, now is the perfect moment to prove who is right!
value: 而所有愛神的力量，都源於這些理念，現在不正是證明誰的理念更有價值的時刻嗎？

name: Interesting. Let's see who can win the title of the most powerful angel of love!
value: 有趣，那麼就讓我看看，我們彼此誰更能勝任“最強大的愛情使者”這一名號吧！

name: That's enough. I lost.
value: 到此為止吧，我認輸了，雖然已經拼上了所有的神力，但還是你略勝一籌。

name: Phew... I feel wonderful to have all my power back. Like I have been reborn.
value: 呼……找回力量的感覺真是讓我興奮，仿佛重生了一般。

name: So, are you still trust in your belief in love after all this?
value: 那麼，前輩在經歷這麼多麻煩後，依舊會堅持自己對愛情的理念才是正確的嗎？

name: Yes, I will insist on going on my path.
value: 是，我會堅持自己的道路！

name: Then, I will open a special gate for you. Let's see how far your persistence can hold you.
value: 那我就破例為您打開特別的夢境之門吧，讓我看看前輩的“堅持”能否戰勝更強大的對手。

name: Humph, I will not easily be cowed. The challenge only excites my nerve.
value: 哼，我可沒那麼容易退縮，倒不如說，我很期待面對更強的挑戰！

name: Hehe... I know you will not regret it. Come on. I am looking forward to it.
value: 呵呵……我相信前輩是不會後悔的，祝您武運昌隆。

name: No. Love cannot easily be defined. We all have an answer.
value: 不，對於愛情，每個人都有自己的答案。

name: It seems you have learned a lot on this trip.
value: 這個回答……呵呵，前輩似乎變得更成熟了呢。

name: You can't force everyone to have the same answer, but let them feel on their own. And that's what is fascinating about love.
value: 與其強求一個答案，不如讓人們自己慢慢體會，愛情的魅力不也正是如此嗎？

name: I will look forward to the day when people can send their own love arrow by themselves.
value: 我會期待人們親自向所愛之人，射出愛情箭矢的那一天到來……

name: You seem to enjoy yourself much when I am not around, my naughty girl.
value: 我不在的這段時間，你玩得挺開心嘛，小搗蛋？

name: Ma... Mother?! Why are you here?!
value: 母……母親大人？！您怎麼會在這兒？！

name: I heard your speech on love. And maybe, I owe you a lesson about it.
value: 我在聽完你激昂的勝利宣言後，決定親自進入夢境，試試你的力量。

name: Tell me, my love. What is love, really?
value: 告訴我，親愛的，什麼是愛情？

name: A bit of hazy expectation with longing; It burns like fire but sweet as honey; It feels random and selfish but will last forever.
value: 一點朦朧的期待，伴隨著長久的思念，熾熱如火但又溫馨如蜜，時而隨性但卻終將永恆。

name: Maybe that sounds a lit bit corny. But this is my idea of love now.
value: 雖然這說法並不讓人覺得驚天動地，但這就是我現在對愛情的理念。

name: Very well... You have changed a lot. Maybe it is time to give you the title of goddess of love.
value: 很好……你和以前有了不小的變化呢，現在你或許能夠擔當真正意義上愛神的名號了。

name: But... You have to beat me first!
value: 但前提是，先過我這一關！

name: I win, mother!
value: 哼，是我贏了呢，母親大人。

name: Hehe... That's what I have expected from you. You have grown fast, faster than I thought.
value: 呵呵……意料之中的結果嗎？你的成長比我想像中大得多。

name: At least I haven't let you down... I am always looking for your recognition.
value: 至少沒讓您失望就好……我一直期望著您的認同。

name: When you can stand on your own, I will grant you the peace of Rome's goddess of love.
value: 等你能夠獨當一面時，我會讓你繼承羅馬正統的愛神之位。

name: Hmm... Does that mean I have to manage all the love affairs of gods?
value: 呃……這是不是意味著眾神的愛情都會由我來引導？

name: Holy... I don't want to sit here all day worrying about their private life!
value: 天哪，我可不想整天面對一大堆眾神的麻煩事！

name: Alas, you will find out then...
value: 啊啦，到時候你就知道了……

name: Flip the card to get Pumpkin Head; Connect 3 flipped cards to get multiple rewards
value: 消耗蝙蝠翻牌獲得南瓜頭，完成連線可獲得額外大獎

name: Unlock the Halloween Emote
value: 可解鎖萬聖節系列表情包

name: Drops in the Spooky Night event. It can be used to redeem items in the event interface.
value: 幽靈之夜活動期間戰場掛機掉落，可以在活動介面兌換道具。

name: Unlock 8 emotes of  Hallo-Scream after redeem
value: 兌換後自動解鎖8個萬聖節限定表情

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Cupid's Dreamland
value: 用於提升丘比特的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Place it in the card to flip it in the Spooky Night event (Auto-recycled after the event ends)
value: 在驚魂之旅活動中使用，用於翻牌獲得南瓜道具獎勵。(活動結束後會被回收)

name: Used to redeem Store items in the Spooky Night event (Auto-recycled after the event ends)
value: 在驚魂之旅活動中使用，用於在商店中兌換物品。(活動結束後會被回收)

name: <size=16>Summon in special pool to get a spin chance</size>
value: 召喚抽獎僅限史詩\傳說\限定卡池

name: #HALLOWEEN_LOTTERY_DRAW_TITLE
value: 轉盤抽獎次數已自動回收

name: #HALLOWEEN_LOTTERY_DRAW_CONTENT
value: 萬聖節轉盤活動中未使用的抽獎次數已轉化為鑽石

name: Reaches the max spin limit
value: 轉盤抽獎次數已達上限

name: In 1 round, cannot perform actions and DEF decrease by 40%
Each stack increases Debuff RES by 5%(Neutral Status)
value: 每層提升5%異常抵抗（絕對狀態）

name: The ratings of each system are irrelevant to the CR, and for reference only.
value: 各項對比評分與總戰力無關，結果僅供參考

name: Total bonus percentage
value: 全體女神總加成百分比

name: Total bonus fixed value
value: 全體女神總加成固定值

name: Where am I? Is this a dream? I don't remember falling asleep. Did somebody draw me to this place?
value: 這是什麼地方？我不記得我有入睡，是誰把我拉入了夢境之中？

name: Hey there. I am Pandora, the goddess of secrets and curiosity. Since you asked, this is a dreamland. This realm is built by my power.
value: 我是潘朵拉，秘密與求知的女神，這個夢境，是我的神力所形成的領域。

name: Oh kitty, why did you bring me here?
value: 親愛的小貓咪，你將我拉入你的領域有何目的？

name: It wasn't me! You were lured here when I opened my box. Its magic is forcing you to confront your fate.
value: 不，您是自己自願且主動落入這個夢境的，它正是您即將面對的命運的具象化。

name: Fate? I haven't cared about that for a long time. And you think I will take your word for it? Pandora, your actions are bold and foolish.
value: 命運怎麼可能束縛我？潘朵拉，你的小把戲可真是膽大妄為呐……

name: Humph... Your weakness proves you can't control this place. Otherwise, this dreamland would have broken down when I defeated you.
value: 哼……看來這夢境的結界確實不是你所控制的，否則在我擊敗你之後，你不可能繼續維持夢境的魔法。

name: I told you so! Why does everyone always insult me for no reason?
value: 為什麼每次我都要被莫名其妙挨一頓揍……

name: This dreamland is connected to your fate and will. Defeating me won't change anything.
value: 這個夢境本身就和您的命運以及意志聯繫在一起，擊敗我也並不能使您擺脫它。

name: It's like a maze in your mind. Only you can find your way out.
value: 只有您親自進入這段夢境，化解這一切，才能離開這裡。

name: My fate and will? For now, I will assume you are telling the truth. You can lead the way, kitty.
value: 我的命運與意志？姑且相信你，帶路吧親愛的。

name: That's strange! Do you see the fire ahead?
value: That's strange! Do you see the fire ahead?

name: That is the Flame of Origin! Why is something so important here? Interesting...
value: 創世火種的余溫，這麼重要的東西怎麼會出現在這兒？有趣……

name: Icarus? Why do you hold this sacred flame?
value: 希臘神系的伊卡璐斯？你是從哪裡得到這一團創世火種的？

name: This is the last light of our world. I will protect it until I find someone who can take my responsibility. No one with darkness in their heart may approach.
value: 這是世界上最後一絲光明瞭，我要守護它直至找到傳承者為止，不能讓吞噬一切的黑暗染指它的光芒。

name: In that case, I'm the right person to hold that for you. You may hand that to me.
value: 那麼恭喜你找對人了，來吧，是時候把它交給我了。

name: No, I disagree. Though you are the Egyptian god of the sun, you are not the best person to protect it.
value: 然而非常遺憾，埃及的太陽神，在我的眼中你看上去並非是最佳人選。

name: Is that so? Then maybe I can convince you by proving myself in combat.
value: 啊啦，是嗎？那麼在接下來的戰鬥中，我會好好解除你的疑惑……

name: Hoo... I am surprised to see that the flame inside you is like the one I hold!
value: 呼……您身上竟然也有與創世火種相似的光芒……

name: My dear, I am the god of sun, the world's greatest flame.
value: 再怎麼說，我也是埃及的創世者之一，親愛的。

name: Fine. At least this flame will be safer in your hands.
value: 好吧，至少這團火焰在您手裡，會比在我這兒更安全些。

name: Icarus, I admire your courage in facing the blazing light alone. How about joining us?
value: 伊卡璐斯，我欣賞你直面烈日的勇氣，和我一起離開這個虛無之地怎麼樣？

name: I would be honored. Now let's get going.
value: 明智的決定，我們出發吧。

name: Ra, I have been expecting you. Since we are all embodiments of the sun, are you interested in seeing who shines brighter?
value: 埃及的太陽神拉，我早已預料到你會來到這裡，同為太陽的化身，我很有興趣看看誰的光芒更耀眼。

name: Apollo? The Guardian of Troy and the Lord of Light on Mount Olympus.
value: 特洛伊的守護者，奧林匹斯山上的光明之主，阿波羅嗎？

name: I am the fire that lit the universe and the light to drive away the darkness. And I believe that fate brings us together.
value: 我是點燃宇宙的火焰，驅趕黑暗的明燈，而你我的相遇也正是命運的安排。

name: If you want to win my approval, you must prove that your light shines brighter than mine.
value: 要想贏得我的認同，除非讓我相信你的光芒更勝一籌。

name: You're as proud as they say. Let's see your stuff. Bring it!
value: 和傳聞一樣，你有著藝術家般的氣質與高傲呢，那麼就讓我好好看看你的實力吧！

name: Your power... is much stronger than I thought...
value: 這就是你的力量嗎，看來比我想像中強得多……

name: Our match doesn't mean anything since we are all stuck here. More importantly, we need to find a way out.
value: 然而並沒有什麼意義，如今我們都身陷夢境，離開這裡才是最重要的。

name: This is not the place for a God of the Sun to stay. I think you have enough power to break the enchantment of this dreamland now.
value: 即使這裡不屬於太陽神領域，但以你的能力來說，突破夢境的結界不會是件麻煩事。

name: It will be easier if you join us. Don't you think so?
value: 有你和我同行或許會輕鬆點，你不這麼認為嗎？

name: Heh! I don't think there is enough room for two suns in one sky. Besides, I have some private matters to deal with.
value: 呵呵，一個天空可難以容納兩個太陽，而且我還有些私事沒解決，暫時還不能離開這裡。

name: That's a shame. See you then, and... good luck!
value: 那太遺憾了，回頭見，祝你好運。

name: I sense other familiar gods nearby... Pandora, among the gods I know, who else has been trapped in your dreamland?
value: 這裡有股熟悉的能量氣息，潘朵拉，在我認識的眾神中，還有誰掉入了你的夢境裡？

name: Hmm... I don't know exactly who else... But, their divine energy indicates that some of them are from Egypt.
value: 嗯……我很難分辨具體是誰，但他們的神格能量，好像都是埃及的神明。

name: Geb? Why are you here? Has fate drawn you here as well?
value: 蓋布，埃及的大地守護者……你為何會落入夢境，你也有希望實現的願望麼？

name: It's not like that. Nuit and I are here to protect you. We need to ensure that you can leave this place safely.
value: 並非如此，我和天空之神努特來到這裡，只是為了保證您能安全離開而已。

name: Despite your good intentions, it is a foolish idea. The only way to open the door to the next dreamland is for Ra to defeat you in battle.
value: 不錯的想法，糟糕的方法。因為在這個夢境中，除了戰鬥外，無法打開通往別處的門。

name: I see. So the only way forward is for you to fight against me?
value: 也就是說，戰鬥將是解決問題的唯一選擇……？

name: Yes. And for that reason, I will not be offended by your challenge
value: 你猜對了，雖然我不介意作為侍奉者的你們對我刀劍相向。

name: Then, forgive me, my lord... Let us do this!
You have grown much stronger.
value: 你的能力比現實中強大了很多……

name: But by defeating me in battle, you have taken some of my strength. It seems that you can only grow stronger by draining the power of the other gods.
value: 而您的神力好像丟失了不少，看來夢境內無論是誰，都需要通過戰鬥，重新獲得神力。

name: I see. It seems that this is a trial for all of us.
value: 如你所言，這也是一次考驗，無論對誰。

name: We'd better get going. Nuit is waiting for us, and she doesn't have much patience.
value: 我們出發吧，天空之神努特在前面的夢境中等著我們，她可沒什麼耐性。

name: Geb, why are you here? We are supposed to stay in our dreamland until our lord, Ra, arrives.
value: 蓋布你為什麼會出現在這裡？在沒有找到主神之前，我們不是應該呆在自己的夢境中嗎？

name: Open your eyes, honey. She is right here.
value: 睜大你的眼睛看看就知道了，事情比我們想像中要快。

name: Hello, Nuit. You look rather comfortable sitting here. Why didn't you seek me out?
value: 努特，在你看來，呆在夢境裡的感覺似乎挺不錯的？

name: Sorry! I was worried about you earlier... I see that Geb has found you. So, we can go now!
value: 呀！原來蓋布已經找到您了！害我白擔心……

name: My dear, things are not that simple. We have to fight against each other to open the gate of the next dreamland.
value: 事情沒這麼順利，親愛的，你我之間免不了一場戰鬥才能打開下一扇夢境之門。

name: What? A fight? That's simple enough for me. I will prove myself a worthy guardian to you!
value: 哎？！只要打一架就行了？！那太簡單了，我可是會全力以赴的！

name: Why did you do that? Was it necessary to attack with your full strength?
Strange. I sense my power has grown stronger than before.
value: 挺奇怪的，我的力量好像比平常更強了。

name: I think this place has released our hidden power. That's good! The stronger we get, the better chance we have to escape.
value: 沒必要感到驚訝，這份強大的力量也是離開夢境所必需的。

name: I see... Then, where to next?
value: 這樣呐……那麼我們接下來要去哪兒？

name: I sense another Egyptian god behind that door. Who else has come there besides you two?
value: 在夢境之門後，我感受到了第三個埃及神明的氣息，除了你們外還有人嗎？

name: It may be Anubis. She is not with us. She came at someone else's request.
value: 好像阿努比斯也進入了夢境，但她似乎是回應另一個召喚者而來。

name: Another god? I think that we've got a problem...
value: 另一個召喚者？呵呵……看來有麻煩了。

name: My lord, the God of the Sun, I have been waiting a long time for you.
value: 太陽神大人，我在此恭候多時了。

name: Anubis, you are supposed to guard the underworld. Why are you here?
value: 阿努比斯？你不看守冥界，來這裡做什麼？

name: Because the new order is coming, my lord. Now, I am serving another great being.
value: 因為新的秩序就要來臨了，太陽神大人，我將為更偉大的存在而收納世間的靈魂。

name: Another great being? No one can be greater than the Sun God, Ra.
value: “更偉大的存在”……這稱呼可讓我感覺不大妙。

name: We shall see about that. Have you ever thought about the weight of your own soul, my lord?
value: 太陽神大人，您可曾思考過自己靈魂的重量嗎？

name: My soul is powerful, and it can only be judged through battle.
value: 我覺得或許讓你親自體會一下我靈魂的重量會更合適，親愛的。

name: Well, it is time to speak the truth. Tell me, my dear, who summoned you to this place?
value: 好啦，審判的時刻到了，親愛的，告訴我是誰召喚你來到這個夢境？

name: Have you already forgotten her? Your former opponent, the God of Ambition, the symbol of eternal chaos.
value: 看來您忘了自己曾經的對手，那個象徵亙古混沌，原初黑暗的野心家。

name: ...Apep? That's impossible. I sealed her away thousands of years ago. How did she escape?
value: ……阿佩普？這沒可能，她可沒有那個神力能衝破我的封印，回到這個世界上。

name: When Pandora opened her box, its magic began luring gods into dreamlands like this one. Sensing Apep's desire to break free and defeat you, it drew her here for that purpose.
value: 她原本沒有，但在潘朵拉之盒所產生的夢境深淵裡，她有這樣的機會。

name: And she wants to destroy me and steal my power for herself?
value: 你指的是她如果徹底擊敗我，獲得了我的力量……

name: Well, I see. I now realize why this is so important.
value: 啊，看來您終於意識到了，不管怎麼說，我認同的是純粹的力量與秩序。

name: However, I don't care if she steals your seat of power or whether you crush her ambitions. I only will follow the the strongest leader.
value: 所以無論最後是她奪取了埃及神系的統治權，還是您粉碎了她的野心，我都會追隨強者。

name: I will respect your choice, Anubis. You shall see who wins soon enough.
value: 我尊重你的意願，阿努比斯，你很快就會看到答案的。

name: Be careful. We are nearing the final door.
value: 就快到達夢境的終點了，小心。

name: Nephthys? Gosh, I really wish Apep hadn't summoned you to be on her side.
value: 奈芙蒂斯？天哪，我可不希望聽到你也是應阿佩普的召喚，前來阻擋我的麻煩之一。

name: Hmm, I think her soul is lost in this dreamland.
value: 嗯哼，看來她已經失去了知覺，靈魂徹底迷失在夢境裡了。

name: Please, be careful, for she is still dangerous. The dreamland will compel her to attack anyone who approaches.
value: 但是請小心，即使靈魂已經迷失，但她依舊非常危險，夢境會引導她的戰鬥本能。

name: Then we will bring her to her senses by defeating and subduing her.
value: 看來只有通過戰鬥喚醒她的意志了……

name: Ah... My head. I was so close to losing myself entirely. I'm glad you came along and stopped this from happening.
value: 啊……頭好痛，我差一點就沒能控制住自己，幸好您的出現及時阻止了這一切。

name: What happened to you?
value: 在夢境中迷失靈魂並不常見，看來你遇到麻煩了？

name: The last thing I recall is a strong, dark power luring me to open Pandora's box.
value: 我在進入夢境前感到一陣強大的黑暗之力，這種力量在不停召喚我。

name: When I opened it, a dense dark fog clouded my mind, and I blacked out.
value: 當我打開眼前的潘朵拉魔盒時，一團黑色的霧氣瞬間就佔據了我的意志。

name: That sounds like one of Apep's spells. Yet another reason to find her and bring this to an end.
value: 阿佩普的魔咒嗎？呵……看來我要找她算的賬又多了一筆。

name: Ra? I am surprised to see you here.
value: 埃及的太陽神拉？閣下能來到這裡真是出乎我的意料。

name: Amaterasu? I have to say that I am not surprised to see the Japanese Sun God here.
value: 天照嗎？你的出現倒是沒讓我感到驚訝。

name: If my guess is correct, Apep is waiting just ahead. The place will be filled with her dark power.
value: 如果我沒猜錯的話，前面散發強大黑暗之力的地方，就是阿佩普所在的夢境吧？

name: You guessed correctly. Are you here to stop her from stealing your power?
value: 精准的判斷，我猜閣下是為了阻止阿佩普獲得全部力量而來的？

name: Yes. Why? Are you planning to stop us?
value: 既然你已經知道了我的來意，那麼為何還要阻擋我的去路？

name: You need to go back. Many gods have tried to stop her, but they all failed. I don't want you to die for nothing.
value: 折返吧，我不想讓你們進去送命，已經有不少試圖阻止她的神明被她吞噬，成為了她的食糧。

name: This is a personal matter between Apep and me. I need to end this with my own hands.
value: 這是我和阿佩普的私人恩怨，不管結果如何，還是需要我去了結。

name: Apep has grown too strong. I fear that if you lose, she will become too powerful. If you insist, let me test your strength first.
value: 如果你堅持要過去，那我必須測試你們的力量，即便作為主神的你，也要過我這一關。

name: You are strong, Amaterasu. I will give you that.
value: 你很強大，天照，我不得不承認同為太陽神，你擁有和我旗鼓相當的力量。

name: You seem very determined. Remember, you must be careful. You can't lose to her...
value: 看來你決心已定，那麼請務必謹慎行事，如果身為主神的你，力量被阿佩普所獲得……

name: If your power is absorbed by her... The world will face a fatal catastrophe, and all the gods will suffer too.
value: 那麼所有神系都可能會面臨滅頂之災。

name: Trust me. I will not let you down.
value: 我必然不會讓你失望的。

name: Hehe... My sister, I have dreamed of the day when I could get my revenge for when you robbed me of my power.
value: 呵呵……姐姐，自從我的神力丟失之後，還從來沒想過會有這樣的機會重新向你發起挑戰。

name: Long time no see, Apep. Your annoying voice hasn't changed, just like your unrealistic ambition.
value: 好久沒有聽到你這讓人不安的聲音了，阿佩普，看來你的野心一點也沒有消退。

name: Did you forget that I am born from the darkness and supposed to consume everything?
value: 你已經忘了嗎？我生於黑暗，本就是要為吞噬一切而存在的。

name: Light can create everything, but it leaves shadows behind. It's impossible to have a world without my darkness.
value: 光可以創造一切，卻也留下陰影，只有光明而沒有黑暗的世界是不存在的。

name: Of course I remember that. But this world has suffered enough from your darkness. You'd better step aside and stay silent now.
value: 我沒有忘記你的神權，但這個世界彌漫的黑暗已經夠糟了，或許你保持沉默是最好的選擇。

name: No! Pandora's Box has given me a chance I've been dreaming of for thousands of years. With all the power I've absorbed, you are no match for me!
value: 然而潘朵拉之盒的夢境給了我這個機會，現在的你根本不是我的對手。

name: So you think! I shall show you how little power you have.
value: 然而即使你現在已經非常強大，也要直面我這個最後的阻礙不是嗎？

name: Then, no more talking. Let's fight!
No! Why?! I possessed so much power... How did you still beat me?
value: 哼……沒想到即使擁有這樣的力量，你最終還是敗給了你……

name: Go, Apep. Go back to where you came from and stay there forever.
value: 回去吧，阿佩普，回到你應該待的地方。

name: One day, I will be back for you, and I will end you with my own strength!
value: 我會回來的，在那無光的未來，我會回來結束你的神權……

name: We did it! The light is returning to the sky! I think it's time for us to leave this place.
value: 危機已經解除了，光明重回了天空，或許我們也該離開了。

name: I still feel something is wrong... Although the darkness brought by Apep has been dispelled, something dangerous is hiding deeper in this dreamland.
value: 有些不對勁，我感到阿佩普所帶來的黑暗已經消散，但還有一絲黑暗似乎潛藏在夢境的更深處。

name: I have the same feeling too...
There might be a hidden door ahead. You must be careful.
value: 前面好像還有一扇隱藏的夢境之門，如果要去調查的話，閣下請務必小心。

name: I suspect that it's the lingering remnants of Apep's power.
value: 應該只是阿佩普殘留的力量而已。

name: Then maybe I'm wrong. Are you ready to leave this place?
value: 或許是我多心了吧，閣下準備離開夢境了嗎？

name: Yes, I want to leave here as soon as possible. After all of this, I need to be more alert in the future. I can't let this happen again.
value: 嗯，我想儘快回到現實，這件事之後，我應該好好提升一下自己的警戒心。

name: And as for this new power I gained here, I will use it to spread more light and restore people's faith in the sun.
value: 而這在夢境中獲得的新力量，希望也能讓太陽神的信念更加深入人心。

name: I'm surprised you found me. I should have known that darkness cannot hide from the light.
value: 能發現幕後的隱藏者，您可真出乎我的意料，看來黑暗無論如何隱藏，都躲不掉光明的探知。

name: Odin...? Wait! Your soul feels so evil... You can't be Odin!
value: 奧丁……？等等！不……你的靈魂中透出的是黑暗的氣息，你並不是奧丁！

name: Hehe... Then, who am I?
value: 呵呵……那麼，您猜猜看我是誰。

name: Don't waste my time. Let's fight and settle this.
value: 哼，我可沒心思猜，直接用實力讓你告訴我不是更合適嗎？！

name: I am tired of your little tricks, Odin. ... No, wait! Loki is known for her tricks. You're Loki in disguise!
value: 我受夠了你的小把戲，奧丁……不，洛基！

name: Was it you who lured Apep here?
value: 阿佩普是你引誘至此的？不，你沒這個能耐，即便奧丁本人也做不到。

name: Hehe... Keeping guessing, and you may find the truth~
value: 呵呵……您就繼續猜吧，從潘朵拉魔盒打開的那一刻，眾神的命運就已經開始變化了。

name: Fine! I will go to Asgard and learn the truth for myself.
value: 很好，很快我會親臨阿斯加德，然後親手把你揪出來問個明白。

name: But I'm not going to stick around and give you any hints. Goodbye for now.
value: 事情可沒你想的那麼簡單，太陽神大人，不過今天我已經沒心情和你們玩了，再見。

name: Wow! She's fast and slippery. It's a shame I couldn't stop her from escaping this dreamland.
value: 跑得可真快，不過在夢境裡我也沒有辦法阻攔她……

name: What's really going on with this place? Why do I feel there is more behind all these...
value: 潘朵拉魔盒的夢境究竟是怎麼回事，為什麼我感到一場陰謀正在醞釀……

name: Hoo... I hope I am overreacting. Let's return to the reality so that I can figure out my next step.
value: 呼……希望是我多想了，不管如何，先回到現實再說吧……

name: Use to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Ra's Dreamland
value: 用於提升拉的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Open the box and choose Ra's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇拉任意品質的碎片

name: Get {0} Thanksgiving Points and multiple items
value: 獲得{0}感恩積分和多種道具獎勵

name: The Thanksgiving Points will be reset after the event ends
value: 活動結束後清空感恩積分

name: Here are today's rewards for the Black Friday Souvenir Card. Enjoy your treat!
value: 這是今日的黑五紀念卡獎勵，感謝支持！

name: Bread, wine, singing... and some beauties!
value: 麵包，佳釀，祝福……還有美人！

value: 是否確認消耗<color=#00FF00>{0}</color>鑽石求助好友通過本關

name: The fog ahead will dissipate after {0}
After passing 20 instances (3 Stars not required), you can choose rewards among the Divine Treasure. You can change anytime before claiming.
value: 通過20關後（無需3星通關），可領取終極大獎中的獎勵。獎勵領取前可以隨時修改。

name: Who says only an older man with white bread would appear on Christmas Eve? Look at her. The passionate, beautiful, and everyone’s favorite Xmas Angel! On that peaceful night, she drives the Christmas Reindeer in the snowy sky, lending support to people in need. Remember to check your pockets when she leaves. You will be amazed to see how many gifts she managed to stuff with that little space.
value: 是誰說，主宰聖誕夜的必須是個白鬍子老頭？她可不一樣，她是熱情美麗，人見人愛的聖誕女神！在這個平靜的夜裡，她會披著鵝毛大雪，趕著叮叮噹當的鹿車，前來為你助陣！順便還會悄悄地，把滿滿一袋禮物，塞進你的口袋裡。

name: Clear the previous instance first
value: 挑戰本房間前需通過前一處房間

value: 恭喜您在地底迷城活動中獲得第{0}名，以下為您的獎勵：

name: ACTIVITY_DDMC_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 地底迷城活動已結束，您未領取的獎勵已通過郵件發送！

name: According titles will be displayed in the left as settings
value: 根據配置在左側的勳章顯示對應稱號

name: No one has assisted you
value: 暫未獲得過其他玩家的協助

name: Haven't received any request
value: 暫未有其他玩家請求協助

name: Refresh too often. Please try again later
You have to pass this instance first
value: 協助他人前需要自己先通過此關卡

name: DRIFTING_DUNGEON_ASSIST_ALREADY_EXIST
value: 請刷新活動頁面後重試

name: DRIFTING_DUNGEON_DUNGEON_BE_ASSISTED
value: 請刷新活動頁面後重試

name: What a wonderful surprise. I haven't seen anyone for a long time.
value: 真是稀客啊，我這裡，可是好久都沒開張了呢。

name: Who are you? What is this place?
value: 你是誰？我這是在什麼地方？

name: I am Pandora, the god of knowledge and mystery.
value: 我是潘朵拉，你可以叫我求知與秘密之神。

name: This is a place for people looking for an answer to the unsolved questions deep in their minds. Little girl, why did you come here?
value: 只有渴求未知或者尋求答案的人才會落入我的夢境，呵呵，小妹妹，你是為了什麼而來呢？

name: Hmm... an answer to the unsolved questions...
I think I am looking for a pair of wings that could carry me over the storms and the flames!
value: 我在尋找一對不畏風暴，不懼烈焰的光芒之翼！

name: I am surprised that you have come to the answer so quickly. But this is not easy, especially for a half-god like you.
value: 哦呵呵呵，哎呀，這可不是件容易的事呢，尤其對於你這樣神格不全的人來說。

name: However, I happen to know a few residents here who can help you.
value: 不過嘛，我有幾位客人，或許能夠幫你找到答案，但她們非常傲慢。

name: I can introduce you to them, but first, I want to know whether you are worthy of my help.
value: 我想，我得先測試測試你有沒有資格去見她們。

name: Stop! Stop!!! You hit me, and it hurts, you stupid girl!
value: 停手，停手！你把我打痛了，笨丫頭！

name: So am I worthy of your help?
I admit that I underestimated you. You have my respect for now.
value: 我承認之前確實小看了你，但真想讓我給你認輸可沒這麼簡單，這一次就算你贏了吧。

name: Then, lead the way.
value: 那麼，勞煩你給我帶路了，潘朵拉。

name: I will do this for you. But remember, as soon as you have what you want and leave the dreamland, please encourage others to come here as well.
value: 我可以幫你，不過你要記住了。

name: Tell them that I welcome everyone to this dreamland, and this is an excellent place to make your dream come true. Will you?
value: 等你找到你想要的，別忘了出去後多幫我攬攬生意，宣傳宣傳求知與秘密女神的名號。

name: Look, the one singing in front is Siren. She knows everything about your dream wings. Go and ask her.
value: 呐，前面唱歌的就是海妖。她知道關於你要的光明之翼的消息，你要不先上去問問？

name: ♫My love, please look around. In the endless sea, find me by my sound...♫
value: 我的愛人啊，低頭看一看，在這無盡海洋上，我就是那汪甘泉……

name: Hey sister, what song are you singing? It sounds lovely.
value: 這位姐姐，你唱的是什麼歌，真好聽。

name: Oh, thank you. What a beautiful girl you are. Come. Come closer. I can teach you how to sing.
value: 妹妹，你長得真美，過來，過來，讓姐姐，教你點好玩的東西。

name: Stop! She is trying to lure you. The singing voice of Siren is deadly to both men and women, humans and gods.
value: 可別怪我沒提醒你，小姑娘，這海妖歌聲的吸引力，無論男女，都是致命的。

name: I was so close to believing her words.
value: 呀，好險，我差一點就被她迷過去了。

name: She is Icarus, a phoenix who has lost her way. She is looking for to a pair of wings only a god can possess.
value: 她是伊卡璐斯，一隻迷途的小鳳凰，想要尋找一幅傳說中神才能擁有的翅膀。

name: Siren, I want these wings so I can fly across the storm and flames.
value: 海妖，我正在尋找一對不畏風暴和烈焰的光芒之翼，你知道在哪可以找到它嗎？

name: Haha, a human who desires the holy wings; I haven't seen something so crazy thing in ages.
value: 啊哈哈哈，你這樣的人類，也妄想獲得神明的翅膀嗎？

name: Even if I knew where the wings were hidden, I wouldn't share them with you. I'd keep them for myself.
value: 不說我不知道，就算我知道，我為什麼不自己獨吞，而非要等到現在告訴你呢？

name: Fine. If you are not willing to tell me, it is your choice. Pandora, let's keep moving.
value: 那好吧，你不願意告訴我，我也沒辦法。潘朵拉，麻煩你帶我去你的其他朋友那吧。

name: Wait! I don't think I can let you leave so easily.
value: 站住！你覺得不留下點什麼就能從我這離開嗎？

name: You smell good, a scent of a doomed ambition. Come, let me take a bite.
value: 你身上的氣息很好聞，是那種凡人追求神格的氣息，來吧，讓我吸一口。

name: I don't want to fight you. But if you insist on insulting me like that, I have no choice but to defend my honor.
value: 我不想和你打，但你非要這樣的話，我也不是好惹的！

name: Is that what you want? Have you surrendered?
value: 怎麼樣，現在知道我的厲害了嗎？

name: How did a human obtain such power?
value: 你一介凡人，為什麼會有這樣的力量？

name: If you believe in the light, nothing is impossible!
value: 只要堅信光明，就沒有什麼能夠難到我！

name: Alright, Siren, you lose. Are you going to continue crying like a baby, or do you want to come with us?
value: 好了，海妖，你還記得我們的賭局嗎？

name: Take me! I want to join you on your trip and watch these events unfold!
value: 願賭服輸，我會幫助你們渡過接下來的難關的。

name: We are entering the territory of Valkyrie. Be careful of the sky. She will attack you from above while you're not paying attention.
value: 這裡是瓦爾基裡的地盤，留意天空，她們一般會趁你不注意，從上方發起進攻。

name: I see her. Valkyrie is right there!
value: 我看到她了，是瓦爾基裡！

name: What are you doing here?
value: 你們幾個，在我的領空下面幹什麼？

name: Valkyrie, I am here to ask you to give me some guidance.
value: 瓦爾基裡，我來這裡只是想向你請教一個問題。

name: I am looking for a pair of wings to help me cross the storms and the flames. Have you ever heard of it?
value: 我在尋找一對不畏風暴，不懼烈焰的光芒之翼，你有看見過它嗎？

name: I have also craved such wings for a long time... It looks like we'll have to fight each other to decide who has the right to own it! The one who loses must help the winner to find it.
value: 那也正是我一直在追尋的翅膀，你和我打一場吧，你贏了，我就幫你去找它。

name: I don't enjoy fighting. But if I must, then I accept your challenge
value: 雖然我不喜歡戰鬥，但假如我不得不面對挑戰的話，我也會嚴陣以待的！

name: Enough! You have proven yourself... I am willing to follow you and help you find the wings.
value: 夠了！你證明了你自己，現在，我願意跟隨在你身邊，尋找那傳說中的雙翼。

name: Thank you, Valkyrie.
value: 那就拜託你了，瓦爾基裡。

name: I will now take us to the Land of the Angels. If you want to get those wings, you must win their approval first.
value: 我接下來要指引你去天使的領地，如果想獲得傳說之翼，就必須要得到她們的祝福。

name: Gosh, so many lovely girls here. Do you three plan to ask me about your destined love?
value: 天啦，來了好多好多漂亮的姐姐，你們是來找丘比特，詢問愛情的嗎？

name: No, Cupid. I am looking for a particular pair of wings.
value: 不，丘比特，我正在找一對光芒之翼。

name: Hmm... Do you mean the Wings of Light?
value: 哦……你是說，你要找祝福之翼？

name: It is said that the one who owns this pair of wings and is blessed by three angels can have the chance to become a goddess.
value: 據說，如果有凡人想要獲得神格，那麼她必須先得到天使的祝福。

name: So, Cupid, can you give me the blessing?
value: 那麼丘比特，你能給我祝福嗎？

name: No, I don't bestow my blessings freely. First you must... prove that you are faster than my arrow of love in combat. Fight me!
value: 不行。除非，你能接住我的愛情之箭！

name: Well, I will prove I am worth it.
value: 好的，我會接住你的箭證明給你看的！

name: Stop, Icarus. You have won.
value: 伊卡璐斯，你贏得了勝利。

name: Thank you, Cupid. This was a fair fight. I won only through luck.
value: 謝謝你，丘比特，你本來有機會擊敗我的。

name: That's fine. I can live with the occasional failure. But, tell me, Icarus. What would you do after I give you my blessing?
value: 嘻嘻，沒關係，告訴我，伊卡璐斯，得到祝福之後，你會怎樣去使用它呢？

name: Are you seeking love?
value: 你會談開始一場熱烈的愛情嗎？

name: Alright, stop teasing her. Bless her and take us to your sisters!
value: 好了，快別鬧了，給我們賜福，然後帶我們去你的姐姐們哪裡吧。

name: As you wish. I, Cupid, bless you, Icarus, in the name of love.
value: 如你們所願，我以愛情之名，賜予你祝福，伊卡璐斯！

name: Come on! Michael's holy church is just steps away. She is a lovely angel. I will talk to her about the blessing.
value: 快點，前面就是米迦勒的聖堂了，她人很好的，我和她說說，她應該就會把祝福給你們了。

name: Whose holy church are you talking about?
value: 你說誰的聖堂來著，小傢伙。

name: Lu... Lucifer? What are you doing here?
value: 路，路西法？你，你怎麼會在這裡？

name: Interesting. I don't remember inviting you here.
value: 有意思，我好像記得，我並沒有邀請你來我的夢境做客。

name: Indeed. I saw a bright ball of light in the distance..
value: 的確，不過你們這有團微小但刺眼的光，讓我十分在意。

name: So I came here to see what kind of light it was.
value: 我就想來看看，這團追逐天空的微光，究竟是個什麼樣的東西。

name: I guess you are looking for me, Lucifer.
value: 我現在就在你面前，路西法。

name: Right... Then, I claim the right to a challenge! If you win, I will give you a blessing on behalf of Michael.
value: 哦……不錯嘛。那我們開始吧，如果你能讓我滿意，我就代替米迦勒，降下天使的祝福。

name: King of Hell, I will not hold back. I will show you my strength and my faith!
value: 我不會退縮的，地獄之王，我會讓你見識一下我的勇氣，我的信念！

name: Yes, I yield. You are indeed worthy of the blessing.
value: 不錯不錯，你確實配得上勇氣天使的祝福。

name: I will fulfill my promise.
value: 我就代替米迦勒，為你送上勇氣的賜福！

name: I must say, Icarus. You look more determined and confident after the blessing.
value: 不得不說，伊卡璐斯，你看起來變得更堅定，也更自信了。

name: Really?
value: 真，真的嗎？我真的有變得堅定嗎？

name: Yeah. It seems that your pursuit of the wings has made you grow.
value: 每一段追求，都是使人成長的過程，要想擁有神一樣的雙翼，這是你的必經之路。

name: Icarus, welcome. The light of fate has foretold your arrival.
value: 聖光，已經預示了你的到來，伊卡璐斯。

name: Raphael, the angel of wisdom, are you willing to bestow your blessing on me?
value: 那麼，智慧天使，你願意給予我你的祝福嗎？

name: Sure. But I worry the wisdom in my blessing will be too much for you to handle. You must pass my trial first.
value: 我當然願意，但對於你來說，這智慧太過沉重，我必須考驗你，看你有沒有資格承擔它。

name: Come. I am more than ready now!
value: 來吧，智慧天使，我已經做好準備了！

name: Now, am I qualified for your blessing?
value: 現在，我有資格接受這份祝福了嗎？

name: I am surprised by your potential. I will now widen your mind with my blessing.
value: 你的智慧毋庸置疑，做好準備，我將開悟你的思維。

name: I think I am now qualified to get the Wings of Light with the blessing of three angels.
value: 有了三位天使的祝福，現在我應該有資格得到那對光芒之翼了。

name: Icarus, our blessings are just the ticket to the next destination. You have to face the dragons, the former champions of the sky.
value: 伊卡璐斯，獲得我們的祝福並不是終點，你還需要面對那曾經的天空主宰——巨龍的考驗。

name: I see. Raphael, please take us to them!
value: 我明白了，拉斐爾，請你送我到達她們身邊吧！

name: I sense someone trespassing on our territory.
value: 快看，姐妹，有人闖入了我們的天空！

name: Well, I have to say that I can't wait to set something on fire!
value: 很好，很好！我要讓她們嘗嘗，被火焰炙烤的滋味！

name: Don't rush, my sister. Let me discover their intentions first.
value: 不要急，讓我先去會會她們。

name: Stop there. Who are you? Why are you here?
value: 停下！你們來到我們的領空，意為何圖？

name: Frost Dragon, I am Icarus.
value: 冰霜龍母，我是伊卡璐斯。

name: Icarus? I have heard of you from the spirits of the sky and sea.
value: 伊卡璐斯？我聽說過你，天空和海洋，曾經提起過你的名字。

name: They say your ambition led you to fly towards the sun, and it burned your wings, sending you crashing into the sea.
value: 她們說，你為追求天空，最終被烈日燒盡了羽翼，墜入了大海。

name: But the spirits of the sea and sky helped me evade death. Now I want to use my new life to fly even higher. To achieve that, I must find the Wings of Light!
value: 上天給了我神格，給了我力量，讓我免受死亡。我要用這新的生命，飛得更高，更遠！

name: So, are you here to ask about the Trial of Dragons?
value: 所以，你想尋求龍族的考驗？

name: Yes, please light the way for me.
value: 是的，請你們為我指明道路。

name: Great. Then, I will see whether you can keep up with me!
value: 很好，那就看你的雙翼，能不能跟得上我的速度！

name: Since you have passed my trial, your wings have been strengthened by both frost and storm. Go. My sister is waiting for you.
value: 你通過了我的考驗，你的雙翼經受了冰霜與風暴，去吧，準備好迎接下一場挑戰。

name: I will let you feel the anger of fire!
value: 既然我的姐妹沒有讓你退縮，那就讓我來感受一下，巨龍的怒火！

name: Queen of Embers, I am ready to accept your trial!
value: 我已經準備好了接受你的試煉了，灰燼女王！

name: I have just defeated you, Ember Dragon!
value: 我已經擊敗你了，灰燼龍女！

name: No, it was only luck. I haven't lost yet!
value: 不，剛才只是個小小的失誤，我還沒有輸！再和我打一次！

name: That won't be necessary, my sister. By luck or not, she has passed your trial.
value: 沒這個必要，姐妹，她已經通過了考驗。

name: We will open a gate that goes all the way to the deepest depths of your soul. In there, you will find your final trial.
value: 我們將會為你打開一扇直接通向你靈魂深處的門，你將在那裡遇到你最大的考驗。

name: Only by defeating it can you leave here.
value: 只有擊敗它，你才能獲得真正的勝利。

name: It seems we have come to the end of our journey.
value: 看來，我們終於到了這場夢境的終末。

name: Icarus, you must be careful.
value: 向前走吧，伊卡璐斯，那道光，就是你苦苦尋求的東西。

name: Look who it is! An innocent girl who dreams of flying towards the sun!
value: 哦……瞧瞧這是誰來了，一個妄想飛越太陽的無知少女！

name: So you haven't learned your lesson?
value: 怎麼，還沒吸取教訓，還想嘗試一下雙翼被烤焦的痛苦嗎？

name: I am no longer the girl I was. I have the blessings of angels.
value: 我已經不是當初那個弱不禁風的我了，我的信念，我的勇氣，都得到了天使的祝福！

name: And I have passed the trial of dragons. I will defeat you!
value: 我，通過了巨龍的考驗，我，必將飛越太陽，飛越你！

name: Then come on and fight me!
I win! I finally made it!
value: 我贏了，我終於做到了！我超越了你，阿波羅！

name: She's gone. She was just a projection of your mind, a shadow of the real Apollo.
value: 她消失了。當然了，她只不過是你心中無法越過的陰影。

name: When you defeated her, you beat your inner demon.
value: 當你戰勝了她，就是戰勝了你自己的內心。

name: Those are the Wings of Light that you sought.
value: 好了，上前去吧，阿波羅的幻影消失時留下的那道光，就是你所追求的光芒之翼。

name: Icarus, I am the Wings of Light. Before you become my master, I have one question for you.
value: 伊卡璐斯，我就是你的光芒之翼。你現在擁有了我，但我還需要問你最後一個問題。

name: There are lots of disabled people in the world. Some are missing hands or legs, and some don't even have eyes.
value: 這世上有許許多多身體殘疾的人，他們沒有了手，或者沒有腿，甚至沒有了眼睛。

name: If you give me to them, then they will be healed. But if you take me all to yourself, you will have the chance to become a real goddess.
value: 假如我告訴你，你將我獻出去，便能給他們光明，給他們希望；

name: Which will you choose?
value: 而你將我佔據，你則擁有完整的神格，得到晉升為正式女神的資格，你會怎麼選呢？

name: I will give you to them.
value: 我會獻出你，因為我追求的光明，就是這個世界的光明！

name: I am satisfied with your answer. Your nobility has won you the chance of becoming a goddess.
value: 你的回答我很滿意，你的高尚讓你贏得了這次晉升。

name: Take this power, and you will become the new God of Light, bringing hope to the world!
value: 接受這份力量吧，你將成為新的光明女神，去為世界帶來希望！

name: I will not let you down.
I will take you all to myself.
value: 我會佔有你，我追求光芒之翼，就是為了成為真正的女神！

name: So you are chasing glory, not righteousness?
value: 你追求的，僅僅只是完整的神格嗎？

name: Then, by the rules, you must fight someone else who shares your ambition.
value: 那麼按照規則，你要面對另一位和你同時追求這次晉升機會的人一教高下！

name: Jeanne d'Arc, I summon thee!
value: 順應召喚而來吧，聖女貞德！

name: Icarus, let's have a fair fight!
value: 伊卡璐斯！讓我們公平決鬥吧！

name: Sure. Jeanne d'Arc, I will let you see what kind of power it takes to become a real goddess.
value: 我接受你的挑戰，貞德，我要讓你明白，什麼樣的人才真正有資格成為女神！

name: I... failed. Victory belongs to you...
Alright! Wings of Light, obey me and take me to the sky!
value: 好了，光芒的雙翼，臣服于我，成為我登天的力量吧！

name: Yes, my goddess. I will grant you the power you deserve.
value: 遵命，新晉女神，賜予你理應所得的力量與權威。

name: Hmmm… You forgot to mention that you will also boost her arrogance!
value: ……哼哼哼，當然還有不可或缺的……傲慢。

name: Nothing can be compare to the senery of cherry blossom rain… do you what cherry blossom symbolizes?
value: 沒有比翩翩起舞的櫻花雨更美的景色了……你懂櫻花的花語嗎？

name: Actually, I’ve been thinking. Would it be better to take a bigger fan while dancing?
value: 其實呢，我一直在想。跳舞的時候拿把更大的扇子會比較好嗎？

name: That… will you go with me tomorrow night to enjoy the flowers?
value: 那個……明天晚上你會跟我一起去賞花吧？

name: Maybe I will come. Maybe not.
The bigger one will be much prettier.
Well, as you said, spring symbolizes blooming flowers, the life that comes back... and love.
value: 嗯，就像你說的，春天，象徵著綻放的鮮花，蘇生的生命……還有愛情。

name: Sure! I am a great dancer, which part do you want to dance with me?
value: 好啊好啊！我可會跳舞了，你想和我跳哪一段呢？

name: Pink... that's the color of the sakura! What are you suggesting...
value: 粉色……那是櫻花的顏色！說不定有什麼深刻的意義呢

name: Yes, wherever they are, cherry blossoms always represent the longing thoughts of the wanderers.
value: 是的，無論身在何方，櫻花總代表著遊子心中最殷切的思念。

name: I think so too. Little fan is more flexible.
value: 我也是這麼想的。扇子小，輕巧靈活，太大了話，連展開都變得困難了。

name: Humph! If you don't come tomorrow night, I won't talk to you anymore.
value: 討厭，我才不猜！反正明晚你不來我就再也不跟你說話了

name: Walking in the street under an umbrella with your loved one... So romantic!
value: 和愛慕的對象打傘在街上散步……不覺得很浪漫嗎？

name: You seems quite confident. If I beat you, don't become a crybaby.
value: 好像相當有自信哦！那輸了可不要哭鼻子！

name: The warm and lively red? I think I have to try my best to became brighter from now on!
value: 喜歡熱烈活潑的紅色嗎？嗯！我也要努力變得更加鮮豔呢！

name: Oh, beautiful love in the story... where I can find one for myself?
value: 啊，美好的愛情，就像書上說的那樣……可我也沒體會過呢。

name: Yeah! And you can slap someone with that. So funny!
value: 是啊，大扇子還可以用來打人，想想那呼啦呼啦的樣子，就覺得好厲害呢。

name: Then we have a deal! I will wear my most beautiful kimono and wait for you there.
value: 說好了哦，到時候我會穿上最漂亮的和服等你。

name: Collect 55 Sakura Spirit Shards to summon Sakura Spirit
value: 集齊55個櫻花妖碎片可以召喚櫻花妖

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_79
value: 群體保護  群體回復  傷害增加

name: This day finally come. I am so happy! From now on, I will only bloom for you till the end of my life.
value: 我終於等到這一天的到來，小櫻真的太幸福了！從今往後，願我這朵櫻花，永遠只為你一個人而盛開……

name: Sakura Spirit is not a traditional god in Yamato mythology. Her divinity and power are born from the human admiration of cherry blossoms offered during a springtime custom known as hanami.\nHer past has always been a mystery. Yet people still believe in her power to bring happiness.
value: 她原本並非大和神話中的傳統神明，但源自於人類對她的信仰和崇拜，使得她具有了強大的神格與力量。\n她的誕生與過往一直是個迷，但她總是能給人們帶來美好的祝福，讓人沉醉。

name: Restores whole team’s HP by 20% of Sakura Spirit's ATK and adds a non-dispellable shield of 100% her Max ATK that lasts for 1 round. Also, it has 50% chance to dispel 1 buff from all enemies.
value: 我方全體恢復櫻花妖攻擊力20%的血量，附加櫻花妖最大攻擊力100%的不可驅散護盾，護盾持續1回合，並有50%概率驅散敵方全體1個增益效果。

name: Restores whole team’s HP by 50% of Sakura Spirit's ATK and adds a non-dispellable shield of 70% her Max ATK that lasts for 1 round. Also, increases the ATK of the teammate with the highest ATK by 50% of Sakura Spirit's ATK for 2 rounds.
value: 我方全體恢復櫻花妖攻擊力50%的血量，附加櫻花妖最大攻擊力70%的不可驅散護盾，護盾持續1回合，使友方攻擊力最高的隊友增加櫻花妖攻擊力50%的攻擊力，持續2回合。

name: When entering battle, Icarus receives a shield (non-dispellable) that is 100% of her Max HP for 2 rounds. When in action, increases her DMG by [20%*current number of rounds] (up to 200%) for 1 round.
value: 進入戰鬥時，伊卡璐斯獲得100%自身最大生命值的護盾（不可驅散），持續2回合。每次行動時，傷害增加20%*當前回合數，持續1回合，最多增加200%

name: [Charge] increases target's ATK by 50% of Sakura Spirit’s ATK for 2 rounds.
value: 2回合內【蓄力】，攻擊力增加櫻花妖攻擊力的50%

name: The happiest season of the year is spring! What comes to mind when you think of spring?
value: 一年中最讓人開心的季節是春天吧！說起春天你會想到什麼？

name: Since you are idle, why not do something fun!
value: 既然閑著，不如做點有趣的事情吧！

name: Speaking of which, what color clothes do you like?
value: 說起來，你喜歡什麼顏色的衣服呢？

name: Finette was born in the desolate tundra of Ireland. As a fawn, she sacrificed herself to protect her herd from human poaching. Xmas Angel witnessed the tragedy while passing through the tundra and marveled at Finette's courage. She rescued Finette and shared her godhood with the fawn. As a result, Finette can now take human form, though she often remains a reindeer to pull a sleigh for the maiden who saved her life.
value: 麋鹿誕生自愛爾蘭荒涼的苔原上，她最初只是一個流浪在荒原上的小鹿，因為保護同伴不被人類偷獵而犧牲。聖誕女神在經過苔原時，發現了她，感歎於她的犧牲和勇氣，於是將自己的神格分享給了這頭小鹿，令她復活，並得到了一幅少女的美貌，讓她為自己驅使雪橇。

name: What? How did you find this place? Is it Christmas already?
value: 哎？！你怎麼找到這來了？已經到耶誕節了嗎？

name: Ah, it's you. Did you see a box? Um, it's square, and it's wrapped with colorful ribbons.
value: 啊，原來是你啊。你有看到一個盒子嗎？嗯……方方的，上面纏著彩絲帶。

name: Aah!!!! Watch out down there! I'm falling!
value: 啊啊啊啊！下麵的人小心！我要掉下來啦！

name: Oh no, I lost my sledge again. Lady Xmas will punish me for that... What about you take the punishment for me?
value: 糟了，我把雪橇給弄丟了，這下子又要罰站了……要不你陪我一起站吧！

name: Master, my horns are itch again. Can you let me rub on your body?
value: 主人，人家的角又開始癢癢了，能讓人家在你身上蹭蹭嗎？

name: Master, what would you like for Christmas this year? Gingerbread? Chocolates? or... me?
value: 主人，主人，今年耶誕節你想要什麼禮物呢？薑餅，巧克力，還，是，我？

name: It's snowing heavily. What time will you go out tonight, master? The kids are gonna be so excited.
value: 雪下得好大……今晚什麼時候出門呢主人？孩子們一定都等不及了。

name: Hello again, from now on, you are my master. Hop in, and I'll take you around the world in my sleigh.
value: 又見面了，今後，你就是我的主人了。快坐上來，讓我用雪橇，載著你周遊世界吧。

name: Master, I think I still feel my bed is too small... My feet always stick out of the bed.
value: 主人，我……我還是感覺床……有點太小了，我的腳……老是會伸出床邊。

name: Master, please let me hide there. That annoying rabbit is clamoring for gifts again!
value: 主人，主人，快讓我躲躲，那只小兔子，又吵著要禮物了！

name: Ah, master, can I borrow your leg again and let me sleep there for a while? I really like this feeling. Sleeping beside you feels very safe.
value: 啊，主人，能再借你的腿我睡一會嗎？我真的很喜歡這種感覺，睡在你身邊的感覺……很安全。

name: The number of pulling for this event will be counted in the Summon Celebration
value: 本活動抽獎次數計入召喚慶典

name: Battle in Dungeon to get stockings
value: 活動期間副本戰鬥掉落蛋糕禮盒

name: CHRISTMAS_WAZI_TIPS
value: 開啟蛋糕禮盒獲得{0}個蛋糕

name: EGG_MACHINE_LAST_BAODI_CONFIG_TIPS
value: 後續輪次大獎保底{0}次必出

name: The number of Legend Summon Scrolls is insufficient
The bell is ringing, take your little cutie home!
value: 鈴聲輕響，牽著你的小可愛回家吧！

name: Lv.100 Trial Crystal Production Speed +25%
value: Lv.100 試煉晶石生產速度 +25%

name: Lv.100 Trial Crystal Production Speed <size=50>+25%</size>
value: Lv.100 試煉晶石生產速度 <size=50>+25%</size>

name: Here're today's rewards of the Christmas Souvenir Card. Thanks for your support!
value: 這是今日的聖誕紀念卡獎勵，感謝支持！

name: Obtain 100 VIP EXP during the event period
Consume 500 Diamonds during the event period
Gain 10 Daily Activity Pt. during the event period
value: 活動期間獲得10日常活躍度

name: Drops during the Christmas event. When opened, you will get random items and Christmas Snowflake.
value: 耶誕節活動期間限時掉落，開啟可獲得隨機道具和聖誕雪花獎勵

name: Drops in the Christmas events. Can be used to open the Christmas Chest.
value: 耶誕節活動期間參與相關活動獲得，可以用於活動期間開啟聖誕大寶箱

name: Can be used to purchase items in Christmas Store during the event.
value: 耶誕節活動貨幣，可以用於活動期間在商店內購買物品

name: Use it to unlock 8 Joyous Christmas emotes (2022 Limited)
value: 兌換後自動解鎖8個2022耶誕節限定表情

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Icarus's Dreamland
value: 用於提升伊卡璐斯的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Icarus's Shard Optional Box
value: 伊卡璐斯女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the box and choose Icarus's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇伊卡璐斯任意品質的碎片

name: Enemies will deal extremely high DMG. Deploy your team strategically.
value: 敵人擁有極高的傷害，注意合理佈陣！

name: Enemies have strong control skill and high Debuff RES. Angels with Debuff RES skill is recommended.
value: 敵人擁有極強的控制能力和異常抵抗，推薦使用增加異常抵抗的女神！

name: Enemies have strong leech skill. Angels with control skill is recommended.
value: 敵人的攻擊附帶高額吸血，推薦上陣擁有控制能力的女神！

name: Enemies have strong trageted killing skill and high Debuff RES. Angels with DMG reduction and healing skill is recommended.
value: 敵人擁有強大的收割能力和異常抵抗，推薦上陣擁有減傷、治療能力的女神！

name: SSR+ Angel with full stars will not be included
value: 已滿星的SSR+女神將不會重複獲得

name: Draws at this event will be counted on Halloween Summon
value: 本活動抽獎計入召喚萬聖召喚

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_80
value: 擊破黑暗與絕望的純白羽翼！

name: <size=20>Christmas Coins will be automatically recycled after the event ends</size>
value: 活動結束後自動回收聖誕幣

value: 蛋糕大寶箱限定道具回收

value: 本次蛋糕大寶箱活動已結束，蛋糕寶箱和紀念幣已自動回收成鑽石！

name: ACTIVITY_HOLIDAY_CHRISTMAS_COIN_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT

<size=16>When multiple guarantees are triggered at the same time, one of them will be randomly selected, and the other guarantees will be triggered in each subsequent summon.</size>
value: 同時觸發多項必出保底時，會隨機出其中一種，其他保底會依次在接下來的每次抽卡中觸發

name: Come and take your little cutie home!
value: 牽著你的小可愛回家吧！

value: 蛋糕大寶箱獎勵預覽\n(30次必出稀有獎勵)

name: A Christmas gift just for you, for your eyes only.
value: 這份只屬於你的聖誕禮物，是否觸動心弦？

name: Max number of pullings has been reached
Max number of pullings has been reached
Used to strengthen the attire, adding 30 EXP.
value: 用來強化內飾，增加30點內飾經驗

value: 是否確認分解以上{0}件內飾

value: 使用普通召喚券在單次十連中獲得3個R品質的女神

name: Use an Advance Summon Scroll to summon 3 SR Angels in a single 10-Summons
value: 使用高級召喚券在單次十連中獲得2個SR品質的女神

value: 每日福利擲骰連續擲出2個6

value: 每日福利擲骰連續擲出3個6

value: 每日福利擲骰連續擲出4個6

value: 每日福利擲骰連續擲出2個1

value: 每日福利擲骰連續擲出3個1

name: Roll 4 consecutive ones on the Daily Gift event
value: 每日福利擲骰連續擲出4個1

value: 累計熔煉1000件橙色以上品質的裝備

name: Smelt 10000 pieces of gear that is orange quality or above
value: 累計熔煉10000件橙色以上品質的裝備

value: 累計熔煉100000件橙色以上品質的裝備

name: Smelt to get 1000 pieces of gear that is orange quality or above
value: 累計熔煉獲得1000件橙色以上品質的裝備

value: 累計熔煉獲得10000件橙色以上品質的裝備

name: Smelt to get 100000 pieces of gear that is orange quality or above
value: 累計熔煉獲得100000件橙色以上品質的裝備

value: 主武裝備幻化至T4所需材料

value: 胸甲裝備幻化至T4所需材料

value: 頭盔裝備幻化至T4所需材料

value: 戒指裝備幻化至T4所需材料

value: 開啟後隨機獲取一顆隨機部位的T4幻化石

value: 打開寶箱選擇任意部位T4裝備幻化石

name: Put a T4 Magic Stone to randomly exchange for T4 Magic Stone of other slots
value: 放入T4幻石，隨機置換成其他部位T4幻石

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_30
value: 她有著超強神力的同時，也有著無與倫比的美貌和才華

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_31
value: 她通過念出每個真名而創造了古埃及所有的生命，神能極其強大

name: Drop from dungeons during the Spring Festival event. Can be used to redeem items in event interface.
value: 春節活動期間戰場掛機掉落，可以在春節活動介面內使用。

name: Here are today's rewards of the Spring Festival Souvenir Card. Enjoy your treat!
value: 這是今日的新春紀念卡獎勵，感謝支持！

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Himiko's Dreamland
value: 用於提升卑彌呼的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Himiko Shard Optional Chest
value: 卑彌呼女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the chest and choose Himiko's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇卑彌呼任意品質的碎片

name: Bestows [Bless] to two allied angels with the highest ATK, increasing their ATK and DMG by 40% for 3 rounds.
value: 使我方攻擊力最高的2名女神獲得【祈福】，攻擊力增加40%，傷害增加40%，持續3回合

name: Dispels all buffs of 1 enemy with the highest ATK and deals 550% M.DMG.
value: 驅散敵方攻擊力最高的1名女神的全部增益，並造成550%的法術傷害

name: When entering the battle, Himiko gains 2 layers of [Parry] (cannot be dispelled). Each time she receives DMG exceeding 40% of her Max HP, consume 1 layer of [Parry] to reduce the DMG to 40% of her Max HP. Himiko must have a critical hit and the DMG is increased according to her Crit. It lasts for 2 rounds.
value: 進入戰鬥時，卑彌呼獲得2層【招架】（無法驅散），每次受到超過自身最大生命值40%的傷害時，消耗1層【招架】，將傷害降低至自身最大生命值40%。卑彌呼必定暴擊，且根據暴擊值獲得傷害增加，持續2回合。

name: Reduce one hit with high DMG(Neutral Status)
value: 降低一次高額傷害（絕對狀態）

name: I haven't met any of my sisters of twelve earthly branches. I heard that some of them are quite aggressive. Will they bully me?
value: 我還沒有和十二地支的姐妹見過面呢，聽說有很兇悍的傢伙，不會欺負我吧？

name: Being a god of the Twelve Earthly Branches is not easy. If it is your year in the zodiac, you are on duty all year round.
value: 當一位地支神非常忙，要是碰到本命年，整年都得值班……

name: You seem to have me confused with that bunny on the moon.
value: 你好像把我和月宮的小兔子弄混了呢。

name: I want to be with you, just like this, until the end of the world.
value: 我想和你在一起，就這樣一直下去，直到世界末日降臨……

name: Who do you prefer, Zodiac Tiger or me?
Are you interested in running? Let's have a race!
value: 你對賽跑感興趣嗎？不如我們來比賽吧！

name: Well... I have to work every year too.
But this is the end of the world.
Racing with you? A rabbit? A big no!
I barely know any of them.
I think you can slack off from your work from time to time.
I sure can tell the difference!
Hmm... want to take a guess?
Sure. Want to take a bet?
What are you thinking? Your expression betrays your wicked thoughts.
value: 我怎麼感覺你滿臉壞笑的表情，你好像有非常糟糕的期待啊……

name: humph, why don't you do my job for a day and see how hard it is?
value: 哼，要不你來替我做一天事情看看？

name: Of course not! She doesn't have such good figure.
value: 當然不是！你好好看看，月兔的身材，有我這麼火辣嗎！

name: Then hold me a little longer...
value: 那就索性讓我再抱一會吧……

name: I think everyone prefers a tender girl like me.
value: 比起大大咧咧的傢伙，大家還是喜歡溫柔的女孩多一點哦。

name: Of course you wouldn't dare to race with me, since I am the fastest of the fast.
value: 論賽跑，我說第二，可沒人敢說第一！哼哼……

name: It's okay. I have grown a lot stronger. They stand no chance of bullying me!
value: 沒關係，我可是一直有鍛煉的喲，她們不一定打得過我呢！咻！咻咻！

name: Haha, I can't do that. If I stopped paying attention and I lost count of the days, I'd be doomed.
value: 那可不行，要是我算錯了時間，一定會被教訓的很慘的……

name: Yeah?  I thought you human think all the rabbits are the same.
value: 是嗎？我還以為你們人類，會把所有的兔子都看成一樣的呢。

name: (Rubbing) I like to stay with you.
value: (Rubbing) I like to stay with you.

name: I am sure it's me! I can see it in your eyes.
value: 哎呀……看來肯定是我了，你的表情已經透露了一切！

name: Well, if you lose, you gotta to take me to a date.
value: 好啊，如果你輸了，就得陪我出去約會一整天！

name: Are you the human who wish to vow to me? I will accompanied by your side from now on. Remember to come and see me if you got the time!
value: 你就是與我簽訂誓約的人類嗎？哼哼，從今天開始，就會由小兔陪伴在你左右了，還請多多關照呢！

name: Collect 50 Zodiac Rabbit Shards to summon Zodiac Rabbit
value: 集齊50個卯兔碎片可以召喚卯兔

name: Zodiac Rabbit is placed the fourth of the Twelve Earthly Branches.\nIn Chinese myth, she was originally a medicine girl in Heaven, but accidentally consumed God's golden elixir, which granted her great power. As punishment, she was sent down to Earth to use her divine power to save others by dispelling their diseases.
value: 原出自于華夏神系“十二地支”中第四位的“兔”。\n原本只是天上的藥童，無意中吃了上神的金丹，獲得了強大神力。為罰卯兔擅服金丹之罪，上神譴她下凡救世，用神力驅散凡間疫病。

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_82
value: 增益己方輸出 攻擊敵方輸出

name: A look that represents the new beginning of a year.
value: 這份只屬於你的春節賀禮，是否觸動心弦？

name: ... Who am I? Where am I?
value: 戰爭，鮮血……死亡，我子民的……掙扎。我是誰？我在哪？

name: Well, well, well, look who it is.
value: 鏘鏘！看看這是誰醒過來了！

name: Himiko, welcome to my territory. Is there anything I can do for you?
value: 歡迎來到潘朵拉的魔女占卜店，有什麼可以讓我效勞的嗎？

name: I... I can't remember who I am. When I close my eyes, horrible images fill my mind. Dead bodies, broken ships, and... blood.
value: 我……我想不起自己是誰了，一合上眼，就看到滿河的屍體，破損的戰船和……血。

name: It seems that by witnessing something terrible, you have lost half of your soul. And you won't be able to remember who you are with only a few memories.
value: 看來我們偉大的日出國女皇，丟失了一半靈魂呢。

name: I don't know how you got here. But since you are here, I can offer you a deal. I promise to help you restore your memories, but you must listen to me and do what I say. Do we have a deal?
value: 我不知道你是怎麼飄到我這裡來的，既然來了，不如就和我做個交易如何？我保證幫你找到失去的東西。

name: I... Okay... I have nothing to lose anyway.
value: 我……我答應你，反正現在的我，也沒有什麼可以失去的了。

name: But... I have to test your ability first. Come! I challenge you to a duel.
value: 看來你對你當前的處境，還是相當瞭解呢。不過我先要測試測試你的實力。

name: Hmm... It seems your body still retains both its power and at least some of its skill.
value: 唔……看來你還沒有忘記如何戰鬥。

name: I don't know how I did it. When I draw my blade out, my body just moves with it, like I have a natural fighting instinct.
value: 我也不知道，只是感覺拿上了刀，身體就自己動起來了，就像是本能反應一樣。

name: This is good. At least I don't have to worry about protecting you.
value: 我猜的不錯，戰鬥的記憶依舊保存在你殘缺的靈魂裡，這樣就好，至少我不用分心保護你了。

name: To find your lost soul, you must first find people you know, like the people you used to rule or the followers you once had.
value: 要找回你失去的另一半，首先得找到那些認識你的人，比如你曾經的子民，或者你的追隨者。

name: Anyway, let's head to your hometown and see who we can find.
value: 總之，讓我們先去你的家鄉看看吧。

name: Calm down, Nekomata. I am Pandora. Look at who I brought.
value: 冷靜，貓又，我是潘朵拉，我帶了個人來見你。

name: !!! Queen Himiko!?
value: ！！！女皇大人！您是卑彌呼女皇大人！

name: It's impossible. Queen Himiko died a long time ago. You must be an imposter!
value: 不可能的，卑彌呼大人早就辭世升天了，連本喵都只是在畫像上見過，你是個冒牌貨，吃我一爪！

name: I think we have no choice but to show her the power and strength of Queen Himiko.
That blade... Is that the famous blade of Murakumo? So you really are Queen Himiko!?
value: 那把刀……就是傳說中的天叢雲劍喵？您真的是卑彌呼大人？

name: Your queen has almost entirely forgotten her past. To restore those memories, former subjects such as you must remind her of her former glory.
value: 你的女皇大人失去了自己的過往，所以需要你們這些熟知她命運的人來告訴她，她究竟是個什麼樣的人。

name: So, I will now connect your minds together. Then she can see who she is in your memories.
value: 好了，我會把你們的記憶連接在一起，這樣她就能從你的記憶裡看到她原本的樣子了……

name: Queen Himiko is the greatest queen of our land, a wonderful queen that cares for her people!
value: 卑彌呼女皇大人是日出之地最偉大的女皇，是一位非常非常非常了不起的人喵！

name: Now, seeing how she perceives you, how do you feel?
value: 現在，你看到她認知中你的樣子了，感覺怎麼樣？

name: I... I don't know. I still can't believe that is me.
value: 我……我不知道，我還是不敢相信。

name: Give yourself some time. Let's head out to our next destination.
value: 沒關係，咱們先去看一樣東西。

name: Look where we are! This is the Atsuta Shrine.
value: 看看這陣風把咱們帶到了哪。咦，這不是熱田神宮嘛。

name: I... I think I know this place. I used to... be in charge here.
value: 我認得這裡，我曾經好像……是這裡的管理者。

name: Stop there! This is a sacred place, and thus a restricted area.
value: 站住！此乃禦神器供奉之所，閒雜人等，不得靠近！

name: Look at this woman standing before you. Don't you recognize her?
value: 哎呀哎呀，別急，小丫頭，你看看這是誰。

name: Queen Himi... No, it is impossible!
You dare to pose as our beloved queen! This is unforgivable!
value: 你們居然敢冒充女皇大人，不可原諒！

name: That blade technique... It's from the ancient Yamatai. Who are you?
value: 那段劍舞……是邪馬台的古代舞蹈，你，你究竟是誰？

name: Isn't it obvious? This is your regent, Queen Himiko.
value: 那還用說嗎？這位便是你們的女皇，卑彌呼大人。

name: How is this possible. She died thousands of years ago...
value: 這怎麼會，卑彌呼大人可是千年前的人，怎麼會出現在這裡。

name: Then how do you explain me? I, Pandora, a mythical being also stand before you.
value: 我作為傳說中的魔女潘朵拉，這不也活生生見到你面前了？

name: Your duty, first and foremost, is to serve your queen. Take us into the shrine. Your queen hopes that it might trigger more of her lost memories.
value: 好啦，不要再疑神疑鬼了，帶我們進入神宮吧，咱們的女皇還有一段記憶要恢復呢。

name: Follow me. I know exactly what you need to see—the Yata no Kagami.
value: 跟我來吧，我知道卑彌呼大人的八咫鏡保存在什麼地方。

name: Alright, let's see what this sacred mirror can do.
value: 好了，讓我們來看看，這面鏡子，和這小丫頭的腦袋裡，有些什麼關於你的記憶。

name: Queen Himiko is the one who opened our small, isolated island to the wider world. She helped us grow and make new connections with other tribes.
value: 卑彌呼大人，是改變日出之國的人，是讓我們走出島嶼，讓世界都知道我們存在的人。

name: I... I did all of this?
value: 我……我真的有做出這樣的功績嗎？

name: This mirror is your possession. It records your life.
value: 這面銅鏡，是您的遺物，它記錄了您生前的一切。

name: My dear queen, let's not waste time. We have another guest to see.
value: 尊貴的女皇陛下，請快一點，咱們該見下一位客人了。

name: Queen Himiko, someone has asked to see you.
value: 女皇大人，有個人聽說您歸來了，非要來見您，我就自作主張，把她帶來了。

name: Here we are again, Queen Himiko.
value: 我們又見面了，現世的女皇啊。

name: I am Tsukuyomi, the moon god.
value: 我是月夜見尊，月住之處的主神。

name: Say no more. I have already heard of your situation. I came because I want to give you my power to help you recover your memory. But...
value: 不必多說，我已經知曉了你等處境。我之所以在此，就是要將屬於你的那份力量，奉還於你。

name: But there is a price behind it?
value: 我猜，您的饋贈，應該不是平白無故的吧。

name: Yes, I need you, Queen Himiko. I need you to perform your duty as a queen to beat Izanami. If she breaks free of her seal, people will suffer.
value: 沒錯，我需要你，卑彌呼，邪馬台的女皇，繼續履行你舊日的職責——鎮壓黃泉女神！

name: I understand. I think my memory is gradually coming back...
value: 我明白，我已經隱約記起了我的職責所在。

name: Good, then, as part of the Yamatai tradition, I must give you a trial. Come when you are ready!
value: 很好，按照邪馬台的傳統，我會代替天照神給予你試煉，準備好了就來吧。

name: You did great. My power is now yours.
value: 你做的很好，這份力量歸還給你了。

name: In the eyes of your people, you are their great mother. You bring food, peace, and hope to the lands.
value: 在你的人民的心目中，你就是母親，你給他們帶來和平，帶來米糧，還有希望。

name: But... I failed them. I led them into war, and they all died because of me.
value: 我……我辜負了我的子民，我將他們帶上了戰場，在戰火中……燃燒殆盡。

name: This is the fate of our people. There is nothing you can do to change it. I will call Princess Kaguya here. She will give you more guidance.
value: 這是日出之國的命運。去吧，輝夜姬會給你最後的指引。

name: Princess Kaguya, bring that Magatama up here.
value: 輝夜姬，把那塊勾玉帶上來。

name: This precious jade artifact, the Yasakani no Magatama, stores part of your spirit. As you may recall, you must fight for it.
value: 這塊八尺瓊勾玉，上面殘留著你的信念，卑彌呼，你就憑你的實力贏取它吧。

name: I'd be honored to fight you!
value: 請務必傾盡實力，卑彌呼大人。

name: Our dear queen really lives up to her reputation. What power!
value: 卑彌呼大人的力量，果然名不虛傳，勾玉現在也算物歸原主了。

name: Your people call you the daughter of the sun because your faith is like fire. I now see why. It is inspiring.
value: 子民們稱你為太陽的女兒，天照神的化身，因你熾熱的信念，是指引他們戰鬥的信心。

name: My faith...I used to have that kind of faith? I vaguely remember...
value: 我的……信念。我想我知道以前的我，是個什麼樣的人了。

name: Good, let's keep moving. Your fate awaits.
value: 很好，繼續前進吧，去追尋你的宿命。

name: Bari? I don't remember planning this meeting
value: 巴里？抱歉，我們的行程裡好像沒有和你會面的計畫。

name: I strongly suggest you step aside and don't bother us.
value: 我建議你，哪涼快哪待著去！

name: Princess Bari, I have heard a lot about you. Why are you here?
value: 巴里，我聽說過你的事蹟，你擋在我的必經之路上，意為何事？

name: Someone asked me to defeat you. But I have a proposal for you.
value: 有人拉我入夥，想讓我幹掉你。但我有個新主意。

name: What is it?
value: 新主意？說實話我挺有興趣的。

name: Let's fight. If you win, then I will have to tell you the truth about who sent me.. But if you lose, you have to come with me.
value: 不如你們和我打一場，打贏了我，我就“被迫”向你們透露點資訊。如果輸了的話，您恐怕就得跟我走了。

name: That sounds fair. Let's do it!
What? That blade... the sacred mirror and the jade artifact... How did you manage to find these three artifacts?
value: 啊……你居然尋回了三神器？

name: Just admit it. You are no match for me.
value: 承認吧，你不是我的對手。

name: Fine, you win. But I will not stop challenging you in the future!
value: 呼……好吧，這次算你贏，我期待著再次和你決戰！

name: Now, darling, you promised. You must tell the truth. Who is behind this and why?
value: 好啦，親愛的，你答應過我們，要“被迫”透露一點資訊的，是時候兌現你的承諾了。

name: Izanami sent me. She is planning her return.
value: 黃泉女神，伊邪那美回歸了，她正在醞釀著降臨現世的計畫。

name: I knew it! Why can't she stop coming back?
value: 我擔心的事情，終於還是發生了……

name: Relax, I will defeat her and seal her away, just as I have done in the past.
value: 放心吧，我會封印她，就像過去一樣！

name: Oh my gosh! Why do I keep running into you?
value: 天呐，不是吧，真是哪裡有麻煩哪裡就有她。

name: The road you are on ends here. Leave, or die!
value: 你們的路到頭了，離開，或者死亡！

name: This blade I hold has killed many dragons. You stand no chance against me.
value: 巨龍，我手中的刀，斬殺過你無數的同類，在它的面前，你毫無勝算！

name: Then try. Let's see if that blade is as mighty as you say.
value: 那就試試吧，讓我看看這把傳說中的神劍，究竟是不是徒有虛名！

name: You are much tougher than I thought.
value: 看來你比我想像中難對付得多！

name: And your technique with that blade really impressed me.
value: 哼，彼此彼此，這場對決確實讓我熱血沸騰。

name: You have won my respect. If you don't mind, let's team up, and I will help you to get out of this place.
value: 你贏得了我的尊敬，不介意的話，我願指引你夢境中接下來的方向。

name: Ah, what have I found here? A delicious dinner.
value: Ah, what have I found here? A delicious dinner.

name: Apep? Why are you here? What evil plot are you a part of this time?
value: 阿佩普？作為埃及毀滅之神，為什麼會跑到這裡來？

name: Shush! Don't cut me off. I am here becasue Izanami promised to let me take charge of all souls in this land if I helped her.
value: 伊邪那美向我許諾，會將整個黃泉比良阪的靈魂都交予我掌控，只要我能幫助她降臨。

name: She will not succeed, and I am afraid you are no match for me either.
value: 她不會得逞的，而你恐怕也無法阻攔我。

name: I am willing to take the chance.
value: 我很樂意賭一把試試看。

name: Did she just disappear? It seems like she was just an illusion.
value: 她消失了？看來這不是她的本體，只是個分身而已。

name: I sense that Izanami is about to come. Let's hurry up. We have to stop her before it is too late.
value: 我已經感受到了伊邪那美的氣息，古老而深邃……走吧，我們要趕在她降臨之前阻止她。

name: I haven't seen you for a long time...
value: 很久都沒有見你了呢……那時你和天照剛誕生不久……

name: Don't try to trick me. You are no mother to me. My mother is dead.
value: 不要妄圖蠱惑我，你不是我母親，她已經死了，你只是有著她面容的可憎幻影！

name: As the creation of Amaterasu, you are just like her, so irrational.
value: 你不愧為天照親手創造的複製品，你的每一個動作，都和她一模一樣。

name: I have collected the three artifacts, and I will use them to seal your power!
value: 我已經取回了三神器，我會再次將你封印，一如既往！

name: I dare you to try! I spent all these years in darkness, and no one cared about how I felt. You shall feel my wrath!
value: 來吧，讓你們感受我這千萬年的怨恨，和……恐懼……

name: I will not disappear as long as there is hatred in the world!
value: 我不會消失，我將永遠存在，只要世上還有怨恨，我就會存在……

name: ……She is right. She will not be destroyed completely. One day she will return.
value: ……她說得沒錯，她不會被真正的消滅，只要人世還存在恩怨情仇，她就還會回來。

name: I think that's why I came back to life.
value: 這大概就是我被召回人世的原因。

name: My body.... feels different... What is happening?
value: 我的身體……似乎正在消失，我到底怎麼了？為什麼會這樣？

name: Something emerged from Izanami's body...
value: 伊邪娜美消失的地方，好像殘留著什麼！

name: Himiko, I am coming for you!
You... who are you?
value: 你……你渾身充滿惡念，你究竟是……

name: I am the other half of your soul, your darkest desires come to life. I am the one who leads our people to ruin.
value: 我是你丟失的那一半，我是你內心深處黑暗渴望，我就是你，帶領你的子民走向毀滅之人。

name: No! I don't believe it. You can't be me.
value: 不，我不信，你不可能是我，我不會有你身上那種邪惡。

name: Whether you believe me or not, I am the part of you that you so often cast aside. Only when you embrace me will you become whole.
value: 不管你信不信，我就是你，是你摒棄的那一半，只有擁抱我，你才能會變成完整的存在。

name: I will not accept this!
value: 我會終結這個輪回，與你共赴黃泉！

name: I will end this and perish with you.
This is our destiny, and there is no way to escape it.
I accept you...
value: 也許你是對的，沒人能摒棄自己的另一面活著。我接受你。

name: Come. I've been waiting a long time for this day.
value: 來吧，我等這一天已經很久了。

name: You can't do this! If you leave, there will be no one to protect our land!
value: 你不能這樣做！如果你離開了，將無人守護日出之國！

name: Tsukuyomi, no power will last forever. Someday, someone else will assume my responsibility.
value: 月讀閣下，沒有權力會有永恆，但始終會有人繼承我的信念……

name: No one can shed their dark side. They are bound together, just like the sun and moon.
value: 真是讓人費解，在我看來，如同日月一樣，人都有自己黑暗的另一面，沒有人可以捨棄。

name: No, she has just left this dreamland. I think she finally knows what needs to be done.
value: 不，她只是脫離了這場夢境的輪回，看來她最終尋找到了自己存在的價值。

name: And the only thing we can do is pray that she will continue to adhere to her faith back in the real world.
value: 而我們要做的，只是祈禱她經歷這場夢境後，能夠在現實世界堅持自己的信念而已。

name: Wish her luck.
value: 祝她好運吧，我們也應該離開了。

name: What is this place? I thought I was guarding the Rainbow Bridge leading to Asgard. Why am I here?
value: 這裡是什麼地方？我明明是在彩虹橋口，為什麼突然到這裡來了？

name: Your body is still there, but your mind has made its way to this place.
value: 你的身體依舊還守在彩虹橋上，只是你的意識被彩虹橋送到了這裡。

name: So, Heimdall, what draws you to my dreamland? Or should I ask, what is the guard of the Rainbow Bridge searching for?
value: 所以，你來此有何貴幹？換句話說，你在尋找什麼？海姆達爾，阿斯加德仙宮的守望者。

name: As I was drifting off to sleep, I was thinking about Ragnarok, and the death of all gods.
value: 我，我看到了諸神的黃昏……

name: It's foretold that our enemies will rush the Rainbow Bridge on that day. It's the scene of the final fight...
value: 在那一天，所有的神族的敵人都沖上了彩虹橋，和我們展開決戰，最後……

name: In the end, our home will be burnt to ashes by the sword of Surtr, the Fire Giant.
value: 我們的世界在火巨人蘇特爾的劍下，化為了灰燼。

name: So you are looking for a way to stop this from happening?
value: 所以你才想尋遍九界，尋找破解你們族人命運的方法。

name: Perhaps fate can't be changed?
value: 或許這是既定的命運呢？或許這是無法改變的未來呢？

name: There must be a way to save Asgard. I can't stand to see it destroyed.
value: 我相信一定有辦法可以挽救阿斯加德，即便那是命運，我也要將它打碎！

name: Well, then, you have come to the right place! I can help you with that. I am Pandora, the creator of this dreamland. But first, I must test you to see if you're strong enough to survive the journey.
value: 很好。我是潘朵拉，就我先試試你的力量，看你有沒有資格擔當這份重任。

name: Hmm, not bad. Your reputation as the guardian of Asgard is well merited.
value: 不錯，仙宮的守望者，果然名不虛傳。

name: Follow me. I may know someone here who has a solution to your problem.
value: 跟我走吧，我這前段日子剛好來了位客人，她也許能給你解答。

name: Where is my honey? I was promised lots of honey!
value: 蜂蜜蜂蜜，哪裡有蜂……找到你就吃頓飽，哼~哼~

name: Who are you??? I don't remember inviting you here. And where is my guest? I invited Belldandy to join us.
value: 啊……你是誰？我可沒記著邀請過你這號人物來我這做客，我的客人呢，在哪？

name: Eh? I thought this garden belongs to Loki. She invited me here, promising plenty of honey.
value: 啊這，這難道不是洛基的花園嗎？是她邀請我過來的，說藏著幾罐好蜜，送給我吃。

name: Loki? Is she here? It was a probably a trick. This is what Loki likes to do.
value: 洛基？她在這裡？這是她的作風。

name: No, she is my enemy... The greatest one!
value: 不，她是我的敵人……最大的敵人！
