name: I see. I see. It seems that Loki has kidnapped the person we're looking for. Let's go find her.
value: 看來，咱們要找的人一定是被她藏起來了，咱們只能先找到她。

name: Stop making so much noise, and give me the honey I was promised!
value: 喂，你們到底想怎麼樣啊，突然出現還吵吵鬧鬧的，讓我怎麼吃飯啊？

name: This is my garden. And I never promised you any honey.
value: 說了多少遍了這是我的地盤！該離開的是你才對。

name: You need to tell us where Loki is now.
value: 告訴我洛基她現在在哪？

name: Humph! You expect me to answer your questions when you won't give me any honey? Defeat me in combat, if you have the courage, and maybe I'll tell you where she is.
value: 哼哼！有本事就來打一架，只要你們打得贏我，我就告訴你們。

name: She... she crying. Did I go too far?
value: 她……她哭了，是我下手太重了嗎？

name: Don't worry. Her bearskin is thick and strong. Those wounds will be gone within a day or two.
value: 放心吧，她這身熊皮厚著呢，你剛才那幾下，也就給她造成了點皮外傷。

name: Stop your crying! *sigh* And you think we lack courage? Hmph! Now tell us, where is Loki?
value: 好了，別哭了，打之前你說什麼來著？

name: Alright, alright. I will take you to her!
value: 我知道了，我這就帶你們去找她，哼哼！

name: This is it. We are here.
See that shadow standing there? It's Loki.
value: 你們看，那個站在樓頂上的人，就是她。

name: Loki! Loki! It's me, Ungnyeo. There's someone here to see you.
value: 洛基！洛基！我在這！這裡有人在找你！

name: She is not Loki. The angel standing here is Valkyrie.
value: 那不是洛基，那是個女武神。

name: Who are you? And why is Heimdall here?
value: 你們是什麼人？咦，海姆達爾？

name: I have the same question for you, Valkyrie.
value: 瓦爾基裡，你在這裡幹什麼？

name: You must be an illusion created by Loki! Show me who you really are!
value: 不對，你們一定是她創造出的幻象。給我現出原型吧！

name: We are not illusions. Do you believe your eyes now?
value: 現在你清醒了？好好看看，我們究竟是不是幻象。

name: I thought Loki was trying to trick me again.
value: 你確實是真正的海姆達爾……我還以為你是洛基創造出來的幻象。

name: So tell me, why are you here?
value: 說說，你為什麼會在這裡？

name: Loki deceived me! She said I could find clues here about where my sisters had gone. Since I arrived, she's sent waves of monsters and illusions to attack me.
value: 洛基騙了我，讓我在這裡尋找我姐妹們的蹤跡，然後又派來一波波幻象怪物偷襲，想要除掉我。

name: Do you know where she was headed?
value: 你知道她朝哪個方向去了嗎？

name: Oh? Who are you? Why do you know my name?
value: 哦呀？我不認識你，你怎麼會知道我的名字？

name: I am Heimdall, and this is Valkyrie. Don't you remember us?
value: 我是海姆達爾，這是瓦爾基裡，你不認識我們了？

name: I don't know anyone by that name. But if you give back my hair, I will let you pass.
value: 我好像不認識什麼海姆達爾，把我的頭髮還給我吧，我就放你們走。

name: Hair? What are you talking about?
Wow, what happened to her hair? It looks like a lawn eaten by a flock of hungry sheep.
value: 哇哦，你看她的頭髮，好像被人剪了一大截，簡直就像小羊啃過的草坪。

name: That must be Loki's doing!
value: 一定又是洛基幹的好事！

name: Sif, can you tell us what happened?
value: 希芙，我們好好談談，可以嗎？你以前可是一位溫柔的人。

name: Cut your nonsense. If you don't give back my hair, then I will take yours instead.
value: 廢話少說！如果不交出我的頭髮，我就從你們頭上拔，直到我滿意為止。

name: My head... where has my beautiful hair gone?! Heimdall and Valkyrie? What are you doing here?
value: 我的頭……好痛，我這是在哪？海姆達爾？瓦爾基裡？你們怎麼在這裡？

name: It's a long story. Let's not talk about this now. Why are you here, Sif?
value: 這也是我想問的話，希芙，你是怎麼來到這個地方的？

name: Loki, that horrible piece of sh-. She took my hair and bewildered me with her magic!
value: 洛基，這個傢伙偷走了我的頭髮，還用魔法迷惑了我。

name: Sisters, I need to find her and get my hair back!
value: 姐妹們，幫我打敗洛基，搶回我的頭髮。

name: Good, we are also looking for her. Come, follow us.
value: 那正好，我們也在找她，就勞煩你帶路吧。

name: Wow! What a big garden. There must be lots of bees and honey...
value: 哇！好大的一片花園呀，這裡一定有不少蜜蜂！小蜜蜂啊小蜜蜂，哼哼……

name: This must be Freyja's Secret Garden. What is she doing here?
value: 哎呀，這是芙蕾雅的榭寄生花園，她怎麼也在這裡？

name: Who dares to enter my garden?
value: 你們是誰，竟敢闖入我的花園！

name: Freyja! It's your sister, Heimdall.
value: 芙蕾雅，我是海姆達爾……你忠實的姐妹。

name: Heimdall? You were the one who strangled my son, Baldr!
value: 你就是那個害死我的孩子巴德爾的人？

name: I am no killer... Wait. Are you also bewildered by Loki's magic?
value: 你也被魔法迷惑了嗎？可惡的洛基！

name: Wait... Who am I? Where am I...
value: 等等，我這是在哪？你們是誰？呀！！

name: I... What did I say...
value: 哎呀，我……我都說了些什麼呀，有沒有不小心說出有失禮節的話呢？

name: Freyja, don't worry. Everything is fine.
value: 芙蕾雅，你的舉止一直優雅絕倫，即便受到了洛基迷惑。究竟發生了什麼？

name: I was tracking her, and I was so close to catching her... I remember she turned around and smiled at me. And then... That's all I can remember.
value: 我在追蹤她的過程中了她的魔法，她突然轉身對我邪魅一笑，我迷迷糊糊就來到了這裡。

name: If you are looking for Loki, take me with you. I need to teach her a lesson!
value: 如果你們正在找洛基，請帶上我，我嘛，要好好教育教育……這個調皮的小壞蛋。

name: With your help, we will have a better chance of beating her.
value: 有了你的幫助，我們會更加強大，姐妹。

name: This looks like the realm of the Midgard Serpent.
No, that's also an illusion created by Loki.
value: 這不是耶夢加得之台，只不過是洛基那拙劣的幻象而已。

name: Who are you??? I am so confused. Is this my dreamland or Loki's?
value: 這都是些什麼阿貓阿狗……我真是越來越搞不明白了，這到底是我的夢境領域，還是洛基的……

name: I have seen you before. You are Medusa, one of the three Gorgon sisters.
value: 我在九界中看到過你的模樣，你是美杜莎，蛇發女妖，石之國的女王！

name: It looks like Loki was right about you. There is nothing you don't know...
value: 看來洛基說的沒錯，這個世界上，還真沒有你海姆達爾不知曉的事情呢。

name: Since you are so smart, why don't you guess what I'm doing here?
value: 你這麼聰明，不如你猜猜，我在這裡幹什麼。

name: Loki must have promised you the power of the Midgard Serpent, and with that power, you plan to beat Athena.
value: 洛基一定許諾將耶夢加得的力量賜予你，然後你就借著這個力量，回去找雅典娜復仇。

name: I'm impressed!
value: 哎呀呀，不得不說，你洞察人心的能力，還真是……嗯，別具一格。

name: You should know that Loki never honors her commitments. She lied to you.
value: 洛基從來都不會履行自己的承諾，你被她騙了。

name: Is that right? Or do you just want me to tell you where she is? Take this!
value: 那就讓我們拭目以待吧。

name: This is not your world. Leave now!
value: 這兒不屬於你，離開吧，回到你的世界去！

name: Loki, that audacious swindler... She managed to pull in helpers from another realm!
value: 洛基這傢伙，真是越來越膽大妄為了，居然聯合其他國度的神來對付我們。

name: Don't worry, Sif. We will catch her and lock her in the dungeon of Asgard.
value: 沒關係，希芙，我們會抓到她的，到時候再把她鎖起來，好好教育教育她阿斯加德的禮儀。

name: Why are we in the land of Frost Giants? Pandora, what happened? Are we still in your dreamland?
value: 約頓海姆？我們怎麼到了冰霜巨人的國度？潘朵拉，這是怎麼回事？我還在你的夢境裡嗎？

name: Yes, but I didn't create this place. Loki did.
value: 當然還在，這個世界顯然不是我製造出來的，是你們那位叫做洛基的朋友。

name: I think she's nearby...
value: 我能感受到她的氣息，洛基……

name: Don't you know that you are all trespassing? I don't remember inviting any of you here.
value: 難道你們不知道，未經許可造訪他人宅邸是一件失禮的事情嗎？我可不記得有給你們發邀請函。

name: An ice dragon? Do you take this as your home? This is my place.
value: 一頭冰龍？你該不會是想把這兒當巢穴了吧？真是的……這可是我大名鼎鼎的魔女潘朵拉的地盤！

name: Pandora? If it isn't the stupid angel that doesn't even know what's in her magical little box.
value: 潘朵拉？呵呵呵呵，就是那個連自己盒子裡裝的什麼都不知道的笨蛋？

name: How dare you call me stupid! Heimdall, let's kill that annoying little lizard.
value: 居然敢說我是笨蛋？海姆達爾，幹掉這只小蜥蜴，我就帶你去找洛基。

name: Damn! There are so many of you. That wasn't a fair fight! I will come after you when you are alone.
value: 可惡！這次算你們人多，下次我會在你落單的時候，來和你一戰。我記住了你們了！

name: Finally! She left. Look what a mess she made to my dreamland!
value: 可算是走了，我可不喜歡家裡來太多奇奇怪怪的客人，弄得一團糟。

name: Welcome to my theater! Now I will present the most magnificent masterpiece——Baldr's funeral!
value: 歡迎各位來到我的劇場，接下來我將為各位帶來阿斯加德最淒美，最壯烈的史詩巨作——巴德爾的葬禮！

name: Is that Odin? What's she doing here?
value: 是奧丁，她怎麼會在這兒？

name: Odin? No, you're Loki! I can even smell the vileness of this place! Only she would treat my son's death like a twisted joke.
value: 奧丁？不，這可不是奧丁，這是洛基。我隔這麼遠都能聞到她身上的那股邪魔外道的氣息。

name: Loki, you can not trick us!
I am Odin, the Queen of Asgard. You dare to question my authority?
value: 我乃獨眼之奧丁！我要好好教訓一下你們，讓你們明白你們該尊敬誰！

name: I told you she was Loki in disguise.
value: 哼，本來就是洛基的幻影。

name: Sisters, Loki is around. Be careful.
value: 姐妹們，洛基就在這不遠了，我能感受到她。

name: How dare you pretend to be me?
value: 可惡，居然變成我的樣子來愚弄我，真是不可饒恕！

name: Loki, what have you done to my guest?
value: 洛基，你把我的客人——命運女神，弄到哪去了？

name: Oh, do you mean Belldandy? Don't worry. I tricked her and led her somewhere else. She's safe there.
value: 別急，魔女，我只不過變成了你的樣子，暫時把她騙到一旁欣賞風景去了。

name: Don't be so rude, Heimdall.
value: 哎呀哎呀，我那野蠻粗暴的海姆達爾，你又要動不動就對我揮動武器了嗎？大可不必大可不必。

name: Don't you want to know how to avoid Ragnarok? Let's play a game, and then maybe I'll tell you how.
value: 你不是想要知道破解諸神黃昏的方法嗎？來吧，讓我開心一下，或許我就會告訴你。

name: Since you're so desperate for a fight, I'll give you one.
value: 既然你那麼想挨揍，那麼這一次也讓你如願。

name: Is it fun to fight yourself?
value: 怎麼樣，和鏡子裡的自己打架，是不是很好玩呢？

name: Change back to your true form, or I will beat you again.
value: 快變回你自己的樣子，否則我就再打你一頓！

name: I just fell in love with your look. At least let me use it for a while.
value: 不不不，我才剛喜歡上你的樣子呢……至少讓我再快樂一陣子。

name: Ugh... Whatever! Tell us where Belldandy is!
value: 隨便你，快把命運女神交出來。

name: Oh damn, I don't remember where I hid her. Was it the mountains in the North or the forest to the West...
value: 糟糕，我也不記得把她藏在哪了，是北邊那個洞呢，還是西邊那個……

name: Stop playing us! You filthy trickster!
value: 休想再愚弄我，狡猾的傢伙！

name: Okay, okay. Do you want to know how to avoid Ragnarok? I can tell you.
value: 停停停停！你就不想聽聽破解諸神黃昏的方法嗎？我可是知道的喲。

name: I don't trust a word coming from your mouth. Tell us where Belldandy is!
value: 你說的話我一個字也不信，把女神交出來，然後你就可以離開了。

name: Alright, alright. But remember, you asked to see the goddess of fate yourself. No one forced that on you.
value: 好好好，這可是你自己要見她的啊。哎呀呀，有人想和命運打交道呢，真是難以置信。

name: Well, there she is. I'm leaving now. Until next time.
value: 好了，命運女神來了，你自己和她玩吧，我就不在這裡掃興了。

name: Oh? How?
value: 那你告訴我，如何才能拯救阿斯加德？

name: Come closer, I will only tell this to you.
value: 你把耳朵靠過來，我只說給你一個人聽。

name: Sisters, let's go back to Asgard. I know how to save our world.
value: 姐妹們，返回阿斯加德吧，我知道如何拯救我們的國度了。

name: What did Loki tell you?
value: 不，不對勁，洛基和你說了些什麼？

name: The wheel of destiny turns round and round like a spindle. It reveals everything, including your arrival. You don't have to speak. I know why you are here.
value: 命運之輪，轉動不止，它揭示一切，以及你的到來。你不必開口，我以及知曉了你的疑問。

name: Then, please tell me how to save Asgard from Ragnarok.
value: 那麼請告訴我破解諸神黃昏，解救阿斯加德的方法。

name: Fate is absolute and immutable. That is why it is called fate.
value: 命運之所以是命運，是因為它本身就是註定會發生的，它本身就是在未來發生過的事實。

name: What if I have to change it?
value: 如果我偏要修改這段命運呢？

name: As the goddess of fate, I will stop you...
Stop! If you change fate, the consequences will be devasting. The world will be destroyed!
value: 住手！修改命運，會帶來無法預計的後果，有可能會為所有世界都帶來毀滅！

name: Why should I care about the rest of the world if I've lost my homeland?
value: 我的家園都沒了，我還需要諸界幹什麼？

name: I... I can see what happens if I change the world's fate... There will be no Ragnarok... Wait! What is that?
value: 如今我終於看到了命運修改後的世界……諸神黃昏危機解除了……等等！那是什麼？！

name: A giant shadow is covering the world... What is that? I can't see through it... Wait, it is ice... The world is frozen!
value: 一個巨大的黑影遮住的世界……那是什麼，我看不清，洪水……冰川，整個世界都陷入了冰凍。

name: Now you see what the world would be like if you changed your fate.
value: 你看到了嗎，這就是命運被改變後的世界。

name: Are there any other ways?
value: 難道真的……沒有辦法了嗎？

name: My girl, nothing can destroy your homeland, including Ragnarok. As long as your people survive, there is always a chance to rebuild.
value: 女孩，家園從來不是一個地方，只要你們還有血脈尚存，就會有未來。

name: So what happened? Is it over?
It is over. I will return to my station to face fate. I will try to pass down our knowledge and culture to my people so that Asgard will be reborn one day.
value: 結束了。接下來我會回到彩虹橋，去迎接諸神黃昏的到來，以及……將我們的知識與文明，傳承下去。

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Heimdall's Dreamland
value: 用於提升海姆達爾的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Heimdall's Shard Optional Box
value: 海姆達爾女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the box and choose Heimdall's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇海姆達爾任意品質的碎片

name: VALENTINES_LUXURY_TIPS
value: 獲得{0}積分、{1}好感度和隨機獎勵

name: VALENTINES_NORMAL_TIPS
value: 獲得{0}積分、{1}好感度和隨機獎勵

name: Bird of the Golden Cage - Heimdall

When entering battle, front row allies receive a P.RES boost equal to 2% of Heimdall's HP, while the back row's DEF and M.RES increase by 1% of her HP. Effect last 1 turn (cannot be dispelled).
When Heimdall is in action, bestows a [Link UR+] to one ally with the lowest percentage of HP for 1 round.

[Link UR+]: All DMG targeting this angel will be received by Heimdall. This effect cannot be dispelled.
value: 進入戰鬥時，使前排友方女神獲得海姆達爾生命值2%的物抗，後排友方女神獲得海姆達爾生命值1%的防禦力和魔抗，持續1回合（無法驅散）。海姆達爾每次行動時，選擇當前血量百分比最低的一名友軍進行【鏈接】，代替其承受全部攻擊，持續1回合（無法驅散）

name: Increases DEF by 1% of Heimdall’s HP
value: 增加海姆達爾生命值1%的防禦力

name: Increases P.RES by 2% of Heimdall’s HP
value: 增加海姆達爾生命值2%的物抗

name: Increases M.RES by 1% of Heimdall’s HP
value: 增加海姆達爾生命值1%的魔抗

name: Drops during the Valentine's Day event. You can use it to ask the angel out. (Auto-recycled after the event ends)
value: 情人節活動期間掛機掉落，用於進行女神邀約，活動結束後自動回收

name: Discount for Love with Time Limit
value: 浪漫折扣 限時促銷

name: Romantic Giving Event Ranking Rewards
value: 浪漫贈禮活動排行榜獎勵

name: Congratulations on ranking {0} in the Romantic Giving event. You will get the following rewards:
value: 恭喜您在浪漫贈禮活動排行榜活動中獲得第{0}名，以下為您的獎勵：

name: Please invite an angel for the date.
Used to redeem items in the Love Store
value: 用於甜蜜商店兌換商品

name: Romantic Giving Limited Item Recycle
value: 浪漫贈禮限定道具回收

name: The Romantic Giving event is ended. All event items are recycled into diamonds.
value: 本次浪漫贈禮活動已結束，活動道具已自動回收成鑽石！

name: Favorability Point of that angel reaches max limit
VALENTINES_HERO_FAVOR_MAX
value: 女神好感度已達上限，繼續贈送不增加好感度，是否繼續？

name: All Sweet Points will be reset after the event ends.
value: 活動結束後清空甜蜜積分

name: I have met many angels who accidentally came here, none of them fell from the sky like you.
value: 我接待過不少客人，但像你這樣從天上掉下來的，還真是罕見呢。

name: Who are you? What is this place?
value: 你是誰？這是什麼地方？我這是怎麼了？

name: Yeah, yeah. I am tired of answering the same question again and again.
value: 是的，巨龍，每個來我這的，都問過一模一樣的問題。

name: I'll only say this once, so listen carefully. I am Pandora, the goddess of mystery. This is my dreamland where you can get what you desire the most.
value: 我是潘朵拉，秘密與探究之神，這是我的夢境，在這裡，你盡情追求你想要的。

name: I... I want to recover my lost power and be able to fly again.
value: 我……我想找回我失去的力量，重新飛向那片天空。

name: I am not surprised. Plenty of angels came here for power. But before you continue your quest, I have a test for you.
value: 來我這試圖尋找力量的神可不少，你得先過我這關，讓我評估評估你有沒有這個資格。

name: Hmm, this is the power of the storm. It is strong and overpowering.
value: 這就是風暴巨龍的力量嗎？看來你還有點厲害，即便是在這樣虛弱的情況下。

name: Does this mean I passed your test?
value: 這樣是不是就代表我夠格了？

name: Ye...Yes... But remember, I went easy on you this time.
value: 唔，至少不會被一下子擊潰了。咳咳，我可是對你留手了哦。

name: The wind is telling me someone is nearby...
I am not just a cat, Meow! I am the Nekomata!
value: 喵！本喵才不是普通的貓！本喵可是大名鼎鼎的貓又！

name: I think you have the power of the wind that I am looking for. Hand that to me now if you know what's good for you.
value: 你身上有我正在尋找的風之力，請把它交給我。

name: Do you mean that Bead of the Wind? No, I will not give you that! That's my precious.
value: 喵？你要這顆珠子？這可是本喵好不容易得來的，哪有你說給你就給你的啊？

name: This bead contains power you can't control. Only the dragon of the storm can use it to its fullest potential.
value: 這是你無法掌控的力量，只有風暴龍族才能使用。

name: Humph, I don't believe you. If you want it, come and get it yourself.
value: 那就過來搶啊喵！你打得過我我就把它交給你喵！

name: Sto...stop (breathing heavily). I yield!
value: 呼……呼……別打了別打了，本喵認輸。

name: Take this Bead of the Wind.
value: 給，這是你要的風之寶珠，喵。

name: I think my power is partly restored...
value: 我感覺力量得到了恢復……雖然只有一部分。

name: This won't give you enough power to fly again. Let's find the rest of them.
value: 你太虛弱了，也許還需要繼續尋找更多力量，才能讓你獲得重回天空的機會。

name: Lead the way.
value: 那就請繼續帶路吧，潘朵拉。

name: Wait, are you going on an adventure? Please take me with you!
value: 等一下喵！你們要去冒險嗎？請帶上本喵！本喵會在路上給你們不少幫助的喵！

name: Just stop crawling all over me and get off me!
value: 看來也是個渴求力量的寶寶呢，那就跟上吧。

name: Meow! I think someone over there is eating something... Let's ambush her!
value: 喵！前面的那個傢伙好像在吃東西，不如我們趁她不注意……

name: I can feel the thunder power that I am looking for.
value: 我感受到了，她身上有我在尋找的雷霆之力。

name: What!? Where did you come from?
value: 哎？！你們，你們是從哪裡冒出來的？

name: You have one of my Beads of power. That's how I found you.
value: 你身上帶著雷霆之力感應到了我的存在。

name: Why are you always eating when I meet you? Do you know you have devoured all the honey in my dreamland?
value: 哼哼，在我的地方偷吃了這麼多，是該還一點回來了。

name: Are you here to take my honey from me?
value: 你們是來搶我的蜂蜜的嗎？

name: We are not... Never mind. Hand me that jar that's creating sparks in the air. Yes, that one with honey in it.
value: 我們……算了算了，你手裡那個帶電的罐子，對，就是裝蜂蜜的那個，拿來給我們。

name: I, I don't understand... Why do you want that jar?
value: 我，我不明白……你，你們幹嘛非要這個罐子不可。

name: This jar is used to store thunder, it is called Thunder Grail. I need its power.
value: 這個罐子，是過去用來儲存雷電的容器，叫做雷霆聖杯，我需要它上面殘留的雷霆之力。

name: That's what it is... No wonder why I sometimes felt like lightning was hitting me. Wait a second. Let me finish the rest of the honey, and I will give it back to you. Here.
value: 原來是這樣，我說怎麼老有股麻麻的觸電感覺，等我把裡面的蜂蜜吃完就給你。

name: I can feel the power of thunder rumbling through my body.
value: 我能感受到，雷電的力量正在湧入我的身體。

name: But this is not enough...
value: 但這還不夠，我還需要更多。

name: Are you going to find delicious food to eat?
value: 你們是要去找好吃的嗎？請帶上我一個！

name: Is there anything else you care about beside food?
value: 吃的？你腦子裡除了吃還有其他東西嗎？

name: It is said that rain is the purest water and that it makes the best tea.
value: 據說，雨水是天下最純淨的水，如果用它來煮茶，一定能煮出絕佳的風味……

name: That's why you took my power of rain as your own?
value: 所以這就是你佔有雨水之力的原因？

name: I didn't steal that. I took part of it from the Queen of Yamatai, Himiko.
value: 不對不對，我可沒“佔有”它，我只是找一個自稱“日出處女王”的傢伙那取來的。

name: Where is she? Please take me to her.
What? No, I will not betray her. She is an important ally. Unless... you prove your worth by defeating me.
value: 那可不行，她可是我重要的合作夥伴……除非你能打贏我，證明你有能力取代她的位置。

name: You lost. Now take us to her.
value: 你輸了，現在你可以帶我們去見她了。

name: Well, well, well... What's the rush?
value: 好吧好吧，我帶你去見她……真是不識雅性呢。

name: I don't remember inviting any of you here... What do you want from me?
value: 尊客，在下記得沒有邀請過諸位來到在下的領域……諸位來此是有何見教嗎？

name: I am sorry. We are just passing by...
You are strong...
value: 你身上，散發著強者的氣息呢。

name: Hmm? What? Are you interested in fighting me?
value: 哦？龍神大人，您似乎在追求著什麼。

name: Yes, you are a good opponent.
Wait! Why don't you all calm down?
value: 等等，你不會是想和她打吧？

name: Not if she insists..
value: 既然龍神大人有意，在下不介意與您比試比試。

name: I lost. You are indeed powerful...
value: 在下輸了，龍神大人，真的是武力充沛呢。

name: Why don't you follow me, and we can become more powerful together?
value: 與其認輸，不如跟著我，和我一同尋找力量吧。

name: What? It isn't polite to say that bluntly.
value: 這要求會不會顯得有些失禮？

name: There is no need to be subtle about that. I accept your offer.
value: 無妨，在下將輔佐龍神大人布武世間。

name: Finally... we are here!
value: 呼……找到了，這就是你要追尋的雨水之力所有者。

name: I am the Queen of Yamatai. Who are you? Goddess of the moon, why are you with them?
value: 吾乃日出之國的女皇，汝等是何人……月神大人，您怎麼……

name: I promised to help Storm Dragon take back her power.
value: 在下答應龍神大人要助她尋回昔日力量。

name: Himiko, you have the Plate of Rain. It contains the power of the rain.
value: 卑彌呼，你持有求雨之盤，那麼在下將不得不與你為敵了。

name: This plate means a lot to my people. I can't give that to you.
value: 這盤子，對吾，對吾之子民，有著大用，恕吾不能交與汝等。

name: It seems this power doesn't serve me after all...
value: 看來這份力量，始終不屬於吾。

name: Even if you own it, you can't make full use of it. But if you give it back to me, I will use it to bestow favorable weather to your land once my power is restored
value: 即便你得到了，也無法使用它，倒不如還給我，等我力量恢復，就為你的國家帶去風調雨順。

name: Then, I will help you to recover it.
value: 既然如此，吾便追隨在汝左右，親眼見證這一刻的到來。

name: So, we have the wind, the thunder, and the rain... What's next?
value: 你已經恢復了風、雷、雨的力量了，風暴之龍，下一步你準備要做什麼？

name: By tradition, we must undergo the Trial of Ascension? To start the trial, we must first pay a visit to Xiwangmu.
value: 按照我族的傳統，應該行飛升之禮了。要飛升，必須得到西王母的試煉……

name: Xiwangmu? I happen to know where she is. Let me take you to her.
value: 西王母？那可巧得很呢，我剛好知道她在哪，就讓我帶你去吧。

name: You seem lost...
value: 你們似乎迷路了呢，居然來到這彼岸之地……

name: I need to remind you. This is no place for fun and games. If you stay here for a long time, you will not be able to return to the world of living.
value: 別怪我沒提醒你們，在這裡待久了，可就回不去了哦。

name: Tsukuyomi? Long time no see. You look more beautiful than ever. What are you doing here?
value: 是月讀嗎？好一陣子沒見，你越長越美了呢。所以你們來這黃泉彼岸有什麼事情？

name: I am going to meet Xiwangmu and start the Trial of Ascending.
value: 我要覲見西王母，準備行飛升之禮。

name: Hmm, a grown-up dragon wanting to start the Trial...
value: 哦呵呵呵，原來是有一條小龍準備飛升啊……不對，你已經是一頭成熟巨龍了。

name: You must hope to regain your power by passing the trial. Am I right?
value: 我猜，你一定是失去力量了，想靠著飛升重獲過去的力量。

name: Do you want to stop me?
value: 怎麼，你想攔住我飛升的腳步嗎？

name: It's rare for a dragon to lose her power, yet come prepared for the Trial of Ascension so quickly.
value: 像你這種失去力量重新飛升的龍可不多見，史上僅有的幾例都在飛升時得到了晉階。

name: If I take your power before that trial, I would become more powerful than ever.
value: 如果在你飛升之前，奪取你的力量，一定會讓我變得更加強大，這可是難得的機會。

name: Well, try me.
value: 那就要看你有沒有這個能力了，哼！

name: It seems that I have underestimated your power.
If you want to start your trial, follow the river to the end. And you will find Xiwangmu there.
value: 好吧，既然你過了我這關，那就順著這條冥河而上吧，你會找到想見之人的。

name: Go, and say hello to Amaterasu for me if you meet her.
value: 去吧，呵呵，下次見到天照，記得讓她別那麼恨我了。

name: Storm Dragon, Xiwangmu told me to wait for you here.
value: 風暴之龍，王母命我在這裡等候你們。

name: I have heard of you, the goddess living in the moon palace. Are you here to test me?
value: 我聽說過你，嫦娥仙子，月宮的守望者，你就是我的第二場試煉嗎？

name: Yes, if you want to meet her, you must defeat me first.
value: 是的，只有通過我的考驗，你才能見到王母。

name: I can sense your determination through the moonlight.
value: 純淨的月光，照亮了你的內心，讓我看到了你的堅定。

name: It's my honor to fight with you.
value: 仙子，能和你打上一場，是我的榮幸。

name: Come. I will take you to Xiwangmu.
value: 呵呵，來吧，我這就帶你們去見王母。

name: Wangmu, Storm Dragon is here.
value: 王母，我已經按照您的吩咐，將風暴之龍帶來了。

name: You may rest now. I will take it from here.
value: 你可以去歇息了，嫦娥仙子，接下來的事就讓我來吧。

name: Wangmu, I am ready to take the trial.
value: 王母，我已經準備好開始飛升儀式了。

name: Very well, Storm Dragon. Come closer.
value: 很好，風暴之龍，那就上前來吧。

name: This door behind me is where a dragon begins its flight. If you defeat me, you can pass the trial and fly through the door.
value: 我身後這扇大門，便是巨龍飛升的地方，你如果能擊敗我，飛入門中，就能完成儀式。

name: I did it! I passed the trial.
value: 我做到了，我通過了你的考驗。

name: Yes, you have proven your power.
value: 沒錯，你越過了龍門，你可以開始你的飛升之路了。

name: But I have another opportunity for you to move further. Are you willing to take a risk?
value: 但我這裡還有一個晉階的機會，看你願不願意冒這個風險了。

name: I accept your challenge!
value: 追逐力量，擊敗強敵，是我畢生所求，我接受這個挑戰！

name: This opportunity is only available to a strong dragon. You will be competing against another of your kind.
value: 這個晉升機會只有一個，你需要與另外一位元前來尋求晉升的強者一同爭奪這個機會。

name: I think you know who she is...
value: 而這個強者，我想你應該挺熟的……

name: I'm not interested.
value: 能夠重回天空，我已經滿足了。

name: Hmm, then go. It is time for the dragon to return to the sky!
value: 既然如此，那你就繼續踏上飛升之路吧。

name: I will bring about your demise, my dear Storm Dragon.
value: 我帶來了你的毀滅，風暴族裔！

name: I haven't seen you for a long time. You still love to boast. To me, your wings look as weak as parchment.
value: 許久不見，你還是這麼愛吹噓。你引以為豪的雙翼，在我看來，就像羊皮紙一樣薄弱。

name: Did you forget who it was that defeated you, knocking you from the sky?
value: 哈！你是不是忘記了，是誰將你打落天空的。

name: You are just a coward who loves sneak attacks. I will show you who is the queen of the sky.
value: 你只是個喜歡偷襲的膽小鬼，這一次我一定會讓你明白，誰才是天空的王者！

name: Nice try, Ember Dragon.
value: 我已經給過你機會了，灰燼龍裔，但是你沒把握住。

name: I will defeat you one day! And on that day, I will take everything from you!
value: 哼！我是不會永遠輸給你的！等我回來，我會討回我所失去的一切！

name: I don't care what you say. Now I am the greatest dragon of all.
value: 我已經不在乎你了，灰燼龍裔，我只是為了成為了更高位的存在。

name: I fear nothing!
value: 我無所畏懼，也無可匹敵！

name: Destroying the surrounding crystals to weaken the boss
value: 破壞周圍的水晶能削弱BOSS實力

name: This Eudemons has reached its maximum awakening star
value: 當前幻獸已達到最大覺醒星級

name: Do you confirm to consume {0} {0} to awaken the Eudemons to {0}
value: 是否消耗{0}個{0}，將幻獸{0}覺醒為

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_84
value: 風起之日，便是吾降臨之時！

name: Open the box and choose Storm Dragon's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇風暴之龍任意品質的碎片

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Storm Dragon's Dreamland
value: 用於提升風暴之龍的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Storm Dragon’s Shard Optional Box
value: 風暴之龍女神碎片自選箱

name: HIGH_LEVEL_GIFT_LIMIT_4
value: 以上禮包僅四階可購買

name: HIGH_LEVEL_GIFT_LIMIT_5
value: 以上禮包僅五階可購買

name: HIGH_LEVEL_GIFT_LIMIT_6
value: 以上禮包僅六階可購買

name: HIGH_LEVEL_NOT_ENOUGH_LEVEL_UP
value: 當前封神經驗不足，無法破壞水晶

name: Increases ATK by 100% and immunes to all debuffs.(Neutral Status)
value: 1回合攻擊力增加100%，免疫不良狀態（絕對狀態）

name: Each normal attack can strike twice.

When entering the battle, the Storm Dragon enters the [Thunderstorm] state for 1 round (cannot be dispelled). When Storm Dragon is in action, bestows all allied angels with [Windfury] that lasts for 1 round (cannot be dispelled).

[Thunderstorm]: Increases ATK by 100% and is immune to debuffs. 
[Windfury]: Each normal attack can strike twice.
value: 進入戰鬥時，風暴之龍進入【雷暴】狀態，無視任何異常效果，並使自身攻擊力提高100%，持續1回合（不可驅散）。風暴之龍每次行動時，使所有友方女神獲得【風怒】狀態，每次普通攻擊會攻擊2次，持續1回合（不可驅散）。

name: HIGH_LEVEL_BOSS_ENTRANCE_EXP_TIPS
value: 是否確定消耗升級經驗開啟升階試煉？

name: Master, you will be promoted to Rank 4 after defeating the King of Devils.
value: 主人，只要打敗惡魔之王就可以晉升四階天使了

name: But he looks so powerful...
value: 可是這惡魔之王看起來好厲害啊

name: Don't worry, my master. The King of Devils is absorbing the energy of the surrounding crystal. If you can destroy the Empowering Crystal, he will be weaker. The more crystal you destroy, the weaker he will be.
value: 不用擔心，主人，惡魔之王正在吸取周圍水晶的能量，只要破壞水晶就能削弱BOSS的實力了，破壞的越多，惡魔之王也就越虛弱

name: Tap the Crystal to check the quest; Completing the quest  to destroy it.
value: 點擊水晶，完成對應任務，就能破壞水晶

name: ANIMAL_AWAKE_TIPS
value: 幻獸等級達到Lv.{0}（當前Lv.{1}）可以覺醒

name: ANIMAL_AWAKE_CONFIRM_TIPS_2
value: 是否消耗{0}個<color=green>【{1}】</color>和{2}個<color=green>【{3}】</color>，將幻獸<color=red>【{4}】</color>覺醒為

name: ANIMAL_AWAKE_STAR_IS_MAX
value: 當前幻獸已覺醒至滿級

name: ANIMAL_LEVEL_NOT_REACH
value: 幻獸未達到可覺醒等級

name: ANIMAL_UP_LEVEL_TIPS
value: 本次幻獸獲得經驗將會溢出{0}，是否繼續使用？

name: ANIMAL_REACH_CUR_STAR_MAX_LEVEL
value: 已滿級，覺醒幻獸可提升等級上限

name: Deals 90% M.DMG to an enemy. If there is no buff on the target, an additional 8% Real DMG will be added. If the enemy is not killed, Ra will attack again (up to 8 times). If the enemy is killed, Ra enters [Frenzy] state for 2 rounds. \n\n[Frenzy - Star Gaze]: Ra will not be affected by any debuff and her normal attack is guaranteed to crit.
value: 對1名敵人造成90%的法術傷害，如果目標身上無任何增益效果，則額外附帶8%的真實傷害，如目標沒有死亡，會再次發動攻擊（最多8次）。攻擊擊殺該目標，拉神進入2回合【狂亂】狀態，普通攻擊必定暴擊，且不受異常狀態影響。

name: Complete all dungeons in Algiers
value: 通關阿爾及爾全部關卡

name: Pandora, come out. The most famous Dragon is here.
value: 潘朵拉，出來吧，鼎鼎大名的灰燼龍女來了！

name: What?!? Not a dragon again!
value: 哎……我以為會是誰呢，原來又是一隻跌入夢境的龍。

name: Oh, give it a rest. We all know that you help everyone who comes here.
value: 少來這套！我知道你在凡間到處晃來晃去，和不少神做著一些不光彩的交易。

name: Fine! You don't have to be rude about it. So what do you want from me?
value: 呵呵，你這說的是什麼話，即使如此，你不還是來找我了嗎？

name: Hmm... I know many angels were here before me, seeking their heart's desire. Mine thirsts for power, and I want you to give that to me.
value: 哼……潘朵拉，我來是尋求力量的，我知道你能滿足我的需求。

name: Oh? Are you sure I will give that to you? Let's make a deal. You give me what I want, and then I will give you what you want.
value: 哦？你就這麼肯定？但交易是對等的，首先你得有我想要的東西。

name: But first, prove your worth by fighting me. If you win, then it's a deal.
value: 和我打一架再說吧，如果你贏了，就證明你有資格和我做交易。

name: All you got is brute strength, humph!
value: 哼，也就只有一身蠻力而已。

name: Okay, I will take you to find the power you desire. And you... you need to think about what you will give me in return for my favor.
value: 好吧，我帶你去尋找你想要的力量，至於你呢……也趕緊想想吧，準備用什麼代價來和我換。

name: Hey, why did you suddenly stop?
value: 喂，你怎麼停下了，你不是急著要尋找力量嗎？

name: It just occurred to me that fighting would be be a good way to gain strength...
value: 打架也是獲得力量的一種途徑……

name: Pandora? Who are you with? Why is she looking at me like I'm her prey?
value: 潘朵拉？你身邊的這個傢伙是誰？她為什麼用一種看食物的眼神盯著我？

name: I think... you may be in trouble now.
value: 我不知道，但我覺得你麻煩大了……

name: Wa... wait! What are you thinking? I don't want to fight you!
value: 等……等下！你們在想什麼呢？！我可沒準備和她比試！

name: It burns! Stop!!! I surrender.
value: 好燙好燙！快停手！我認輸了！

name: Interesting. Even a weak monster like you can be a source of such strong power in this dreamland.
value: 果然如我所想，即使是魔物，在夢境中也能有這麼巨大的力量……

name: Yeah, this place is like an amplifier. And if you take advantage of it, you can become more and more powerful.
value: 這倒確實如此，這場戰鬥後，你的氣息好像變強了。

name: I see. In that case, I will challenge many strong opponents.
value: 必然，只要不停挑戰強者，自己就會變強，這便是所謂的巨龍之道！

name: Such is the Way of the Dragon!
value: 而我要做的，無非是在這條道路上前進而已。

name: Who broke into my temple? A dragon? What are you doing here?
value: 是誰闖入了我的神殿？一頭龍？你來這裡幹什麼？

name: I think I have found my second opponent. I sense extraordinary power inside you.
value: 我看到第二個對手了，你的力量並不一般嘛……

name: Watch out! Don't meet her eyes. Her gaze turns living things to stone.
value: 當心，這傢伙能把人變成石頭，別盯著她的眼睛看。

name: I am not called a dragon just for show. Her petty tricks won't work on me.
value: 我這身龍鱗可不是白長的，石化術不會對我起效果。

name: You think so? Let's find out. A dragon statue would be a perfect addition to my garden of stone.
value: 是嗎？說起來我的石雕中還沒收藏過龍呢。

name: Big words for a lowly snake. Let me show you how mighty a dragon can be.
value: 哼，口氣倒是不小，好吧，我就讓你見識見識龍族的力量！

name: Why does my magic and poison not work on you?
value: 沒想到，我的魔法和劇毒對你確實不奏效。

name: Real dragons like me have resistance to magic.
value: 我可是貨真價實的巨龍，要知道，不少巨龍對魔法的抗性，遠超過你的想像。

name: I've never heard of anyone having resistance to magic...
value: 對於魔法的抗性……好吧，這也正是我一直在尋求的東西。

name: If you don't mind, I'd like to follow you so I can try to understand how this works.
value: 如果你不介意，我願意做為你的侍衛跟隨你，直至找到這種力量為止。

name: That's fine by me. I'm sure we'll have lots of fun together.
value: 嗯……我沒意見，至少接下來的戰鬥能多一些樂子。

name: A human? What do you want with me?
value: 嗯？人類女性，是你在喊我嗎？

name: I finally found you. Prepare to face my trial for the disasters and wars you caused!
value: 我終於找到你了，準備迎接被審判的命運吧，你這個災難與戰爭的根源！

name: Don't go dragging my reputation through the mud. I may love to fight, but I have never done what you are accusing me of.
value: 喂，你可別瞎冤枉好人！不錯，我確實是個打架狂，但我只對強者感興趣！

name: What about all the towns you burnt? Were those not disasters?!
value: 你不像是個能記起自己焚毀了多少城鎮的傢伙，對吧？

name: Hah! That is simply me living by the law of nature - survival of the fittest. But if you think you are a warrior of justice, then let us see if your 'justice' can beat me in a fight.
value: 哼，我只是在踐行大自然淘汰弱者的規則罷了，要戰便戰！

name: What a great power you have...
value: 真是強大的力量……看來我也依舊無法阻止你的暴行。

name: I have no interest in the weak, puny human. Challenge me again when you actually have the strength to stop me.
value: 人類，我對弱者可沒有什麼興趣，如果你想阻止我的話，強大的力量是不可或缺的。

name: You...!
value: 哼……這話可真不像是你這種傢伙 能說出的。

name: I can't just let you walk away!
value: 但我不能讓你就這麼離開，像你這麼危險的傢伙……

name: Haha! Then follow me if you wish. I don't care. You can be another witness to my great power... Perhaps you'll even learn something by watching me fight.
value: 哈哈哈……你想跟著就跟著吧，作為我不斷變強的見證人吧！

name: A dragon from Mount Doom? Why have you come here?
value: 末日火山的巨龍？你來得可真不是地方，這可沒有你想要的東西。

name: Don't you know, Idun? I've been eyeing your Golden Apples for a long time.
value: 別這麼說，北歐的青春女神，你的蘋果我想要很久了。

name: How surprising. When did you become a vegetarian?
value: 這可真讓人意外，你什麼時候改吃素了？

name: It is just a craving. After all, who could resist the temptation of eternal youth?
value: 我最近打算換換口味而已，畢竟永葆青春是強者必然想要追求的力量。

name: Let's see if you're skilled enough to take a bite out of my apple.
value: 那就得看你有沒有本事拿到了。

name: Stop! Stop!!! You can have a bite of the apple. You didn't need to burn my skirt, you stupid dragon.
value: 快停手，我給你一個蘋果就是了！你這頭笨龍，把我裙子都燒焦了……

name: Ah, how wonderful to feel the energy filling my body. But... This is not enough. I need to find a stronger opponent to fight.
value: 啊，這充滿活力的感覺真讓人心情愉悅……但還不夠，我還需要挑戰更強的對手！，

name: No other Nordic Goddesses can stand as your equal now.
value: 憑你的力量，或許已經足以橫掃北歐眾神。

name: You were an excellent opponent. Do you want to join me and watch as I become the strongest in the world?
value: 你也是個不錯的對手，有沒有興趣加入我，看看最後一層夢境藏著什麼？

name: Sounds interesting. Count me in.
value: 聽起來挺有意思，就算上我一個吧。

name: That light is blinding. Who is there?
value: 多麼熾熱的光，前面一定有一個強大的對手存在！

name: Are you seeking the power of light, dragon?
value: 巨龍，你是來這裡追求光明的嗎？

name: Light...? I am not sure.
value: 光明？呃……我不太明白，我只追求強大，絕對的強大！

name: But I can sense the strong power inside you. Come and fight with me!
value: 我能感受的到，你身上有著強大而熾熱的力量，來和我一戰吧！

name: As you wish.
value: 如果你確實想較量較量的話，那好吧……願偉大的光明賜予我力量！

name: Well... I don't know what you are seeking, but I am now certain it has nothing to do with the light. Your brutal way of fighting is nothing like the elegance of the light!
value: 好吧，我真沒看出來你追求光明是為了什麼，野蠻而粗魯的傢伙……

name: I am the embodiment of flame and destruction. I seek only power.
value: 別多想，親愛的，作為灰燼與毀滅的化身，我只是為純粹的強大而已。

name: I wish you would learn to use your power properly. Strength comes from self-control, not anger.
value: 即使如此，我也希望你能善用這份得倒的力量，強大源自於掌控，而非憤怒。

name: Meow! I smell something burning. ...Ahh! Why is my tail on fire?!?
value: 喵，怎麼有股燒焦的味道啊，哎？！我的尾巴好像燒著了！

name: Monster of Japan? Even a little monster like you can be in this dreamland.... I am intrigued.
value: 大和的妖怪？具備看守這層夢境的存在，你的力量我很感興趣……

name: You burnt my precious tail!!! It was my loveliest feature. Apologize to me. Now!
value: 然而你燒了我的尾巴！難道不道歉就想走嗎？

name: Oh yeah? And how are you going to make me do that, little cutie?
value: 哦？是嗎？小可愛，你想讓我怎樣道歉呢？

name: Hisssss!! I'm so furious! Feel the wrath of my claws!
value: 氣死我了！我非撓你不可！

name: Bad kitty! If you try to scratch me like that, then you're going to be in trouble.
value: 嗯哼，或許打一架解決這個問題是最合適的方法呢。

name: Oops... I made her cry. I swear I didn't mean it.
value: 哎……居然被打哭了，我發誓沒下這麼重的手。

name: You are a big bad dragon! I am going to tell the other goddesses of Japan. They will be coming for you!
value: 你這個大壞蛋！我要去向大和的眾神告狀！

name: Run, little kitten, run and go tell them. I look forward to another fight, haha.
value: 跑吧，小貓咪，我很期待遇上一個能打的強者，哈哈……

name: This moonlight is beautiful.
value: 這月光中，蘊含著強大的力量……我們似乎開始進入東方諸神所塑造的夢境了。

name: I don't have the time to admire this kind of thing.
value: 不過我可沒興趣欣賞這些。

name: So all you care about is fighting?
value: 你還真是不解風情呢，滿腦子只想著打架，可會錯過不少有意思的事。

name: Yes and no. What I care about is becoming stronger.
value: 風情是什麼？能帶給我力量嗎？

name: You! Are you the dragon who beat Nekomata?
value: 你……就是那只把貓又打到氣得撓牆的火龍嗎？

name: That didn't take long. She's not a good fighter, but she's certainly a fast runner.
value: 我很榮幸自己的名聲能傳得這麼快。

name: Humph! I don't care for rude people, but a strong dragon? You are totally my type.
value: 呵呵……雖然我不大喜歡粗魯的傢伙，但我可一點也不討厭強者。

name: If you can appreciate the beauty of strength, then I guess you are also worth fighting.
value: 所以對於我來說，打架或許是迎接客人最好的禮儀。

name: You are a strong opponent. I was fooled by your soft elegance.
value: 和文靜優雅的外貌不同，你是個強大的對手。

name: You know there is a saying that appearances can be deceiving, right?
value: 東方有句古語叫“人不可貌相”……

name: I will keep your words in mind.
value: 我會留意你這句告誡的，哼哼……

name: Hmm... You also have the power to control fire.
value: 東方也有操控火焰的強者麼，看來會是一場令人期待的戰鬥呢。

name: Ember Dragon? You have come a long way.
value: 火龍麼？能夠沖入最後由東方神明把守的三層夢境，你看起來並不簡單。

name: Yes, and I am coming for you!
value: 沒錯，我正為你的力量而來，華夏的火神。

name: Fire is a dangerous power that could devour all living beings. Are you sure you want to fight with me? This will not end well.
value: 火焰象徵著爭鬥與吞噬，我想你明白這意味著什麼。

name: Since we both understand the risk of fighting fire with fire, bring it on!
value: 我很樂意看到願意用拳頭說話的傢伙，來吧！

name: You can't be that powerful in the real world... It seems this place really boosts your power.
value: 呼……在現實中你不可能有現在這麼強，看來夢境確實能夠大幅提升能力。

name: But you still won.
value: 是你贏了，你還有一戰之力，而我的力量已經耗盡了。

name: Even though I defeated you, I don't feel like this victory has made me any more powerful, unlike my previous ones.
value: 奇怪，我……雖然擊敗了你，但似乎並沒有獲得新的力量。

name: Your power has already surpassed most of the goddesses. That's why you can't grow stronger.
value: 你的力量已經超過了大部分神明，神界已經暫時沒有能讓你挑戰的神了。

name: But I know I can be more powerful! Are there any other ways?
value: 不，我感到自己還有變強的潛力，有什麼辦法嗎？

name: There is one way. And only one goddess knows how to do it.
value: 有一個辦法，就是挑戰夢境的掌控著！但是風險太高了。

name: But if you fail, you will be trapped here forever.
value: 因為一旦失敗，你將很可能會被永遠困在夢境中。

name: My pursuit of power means nothing if I retreat.
value: 如果畏懼，那我的追求就毫無意義！

name: I will introduce you to one of the Main goddesses of the East, Fuxi. She will tell you the secret of surpassing your limit.
value: 我將讓你與東方的主神之一——伏羲相見，在她的引導下，你會明白什麼是力量。

name: The incarnation of flame and war, I have foreseen your arrival.
value: 火焰與戰意的化身，我已經預見了你的到來。

name: Oh? Then do you know why I am here?
value: 哦？我還什麼都沒說，你就猜到我的來意了？

name: The power you chased originated from anger and impulse. I am afraid you still have a lesson to learn.
value: 你所追求的力量源於憤怒和衝動，作為寧靜的化身，你無法從我這裡獲得力量。

name: But the trial I offer may provide some insight.
value: 但我可以給你一場試煉，這或許能夠讓你從中得到感悟。

name: Unbelievable. Even though I have defeated you many times, here you are, still standing unharmed.
value: 呼……這真讓人難以相信，我應該已經擊倒你好幾次了……

name: I feel I have reached my limit.
value: 我感到自己的力量已經接近極限，但你卻仿佛永遠不會疲倦似的。

name: This is the lesson you need to learn. An intense flame burns out fast.
value: 這便是你需要領悟的力量，爆發的火焰雖然強大，卻不持久。

name: I still stand because, unlike you, I save my power for regeneration. I am like the grass. Although fire destroys it, it will always shoot up again later.
value: 就如同我被擊倒幾百次，只要火種沒有熄滅，就能夠再次回復，最終贏得勝利。

name: …This seems reasonable. But I am still a little bit confused.
value: ……似乎有道理，但又沒有那麼容易弄明白……

name: You will understand it eventually. It takes time.
value: 你在之後的戰鬥中，會明白這個道理的，夢境已經給予了你足夠的啟發。

name: …I see.
value: ……我明白了，不管如何，我會盡力去理解的。

name: You are right. I shouldn't act on impulse.
value: 你說得沒錯，我不應過於衝動。

name: I believe you will become more powerful in the future.
value: 你的實力已經在整個龍族名列前茅了，相信未來的你還會變得更強。

name: Ember Dragon's Shard Optional Box
value: 灰燼龍女女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the box and choose Ember Dragon's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇灰燼龍女任意品質的碎片

name:
When entering the battle, inflict a [Nova Mark] to the enemy with the highest ATK for 3 turns. If the marked enemy's ATK is lower than Ember Dragon's ATK, decreases the target's ATK by 50% for 1 round. When she is in action, inflict [Justice Fire] on all enemies and decrease their Healing Effect by 50% for 1 round. 

[Nova Mark]: Enemies with the state will be attacked first. 
[Justice Fire]: Enemies with the state will lose 8% of their Max HP (not exceeding 10 times that of Ember Dragon's ATK) This effect will bypass any Debuff RES.
value: 進入戰鬥時，標記敵方攻擊力最高的女神，使目標優先被攻擊，持續3回合，若目標攻擊力低於灰燼龍女，則使目標攻擊力降低50%，持續1回合。每次行動時，灰燼龍女使敵方全體進入【業火】狀態（無視異常抵抗），每回合損失8%的最大生命值（不超過灰燼龍女攻擊力的10倍），受到治療效果降低50%，持續1回合。

name: Enemies with the state will be attacked first.
Enemies with the state will lose 8% of their Max HP. This effect will bypass any Debuff RES.
value: 每回合損失8%的最大生命值

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_85
value: 來吧，證明你有資格馴服我！

name:
When entering battle, front-row allies receive a P.RES boost equal to 2% of Heimdall's HP, while the back row's DEF and M.RES increase by 1% of her HP. The effect lasts 1 turn (cannot be dispelled). 
When Heimdall is in action, bestows a [Link UR+] to one ally with the lowest percentage of HP for 1 round.

[Link UR+]: All DMG targeting this angel will be received by Heimdall (not exceeding the current HP of Heimdall). This effect cannot be dispelled.
value: 進入戰鬥時，使前排友方女神獲得海姆達爾生命值2%的物抗，後排友方女神獲得海姆達爾生命值1%的防禦力和魔抗，持續1回合（無法驅散）。海姆達爾每次行動時，選擇當前血量百分比最低的一名友軍進行【連結】，代替其承受全部攻擊（不超過海姆達爾當前生命值），持續1回合（無法驅散）

name: I sense the power of rain in you.
value: 你身上有著雨水之力的氣息。

name: Do you want to challenge me? But if you lose, you gonna give me a taste of something else.
value: 你想挑戰我？可以，不過作為你冒犯龍威的代價，挑戰的籌碼得增加。

name: If you win, I will give you the power of the wind, and I will be your maid. But if you lose, you have to be my maid forever.
value: 如果你贏了，風之力歸你；如果你輸了，除了歸還風之力之外，你還必須要成為我的僕人。

name: Humph! No more words!
value: 哼喵！答應你又怎麼樣喵！

name: Let's go! My cat maid.
value: 看來要不了多久，你就能恢復到曾經的實力了。走吧，我們該去下一處了，對吧，喵女僕。

name: Fine! But you have to feed me! Did I ever tell you what my favorite foods are? Listen, they are dried fish, and fried fish and...
value: 唉喵！當僕人就當僕人吧，只要小魚幹管夠。

name: Do you mean this Fine Jade?
value: 你是指這塊可以招來雨水的玉盤？

name: Let's see who will have the last laugh!
value: 那就用武力來見分曉吧！

name: Ocean Souvenir Card
value: Tarjeta de recuerdo del Día de Acción de Gracias

name: <size=29>Diamond Gift for your Romantic Move</size>
value: 中秋折扣 限時促銷

name: Full-Moon Limited Special Discount
value: 中秋折扣 限時促銷

name: Here're today's rewards of the Romantic Souvenir Card. Thanks for your support, and we wish you a sweet Valentine's Day.
value: 這是今日的海洋紀念卡獎勵，感謝支持！

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Ember Dragon's Dreamland
value: 用於提升灰燼龍女的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_32
value: 天后歸位之時，眾神皆俯首相迎！

name: MAIN_HERO_SUPER_AWAKE_TIPS
value: 覺醒需要獲得<color=#00FF00FF>{0}</color>個UR+女神（當前{1}個）

name: COMBINE_ZONE_ACTIVITY_WEEK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 這是今日的合區紀念卡獎勵，感謝支持！

name: COMBINE_ZONE_ACTIVITY_GUILD_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_TITLE
value: 戰區BOSS挑戰公會排行獎勵

name: COMBINE_ZONE_ACTIVITY_GUILD_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 您的公會在昨日的戰區BOSS挑戰中排行第{0}名，獲得以下獎勵！

name: COMBINE_ZONE_ACTIVITY_BOSS_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 您在昨日未領取的BOSS傷害獎勵已通過郵件發送。

name: COMBINE_ZONE_ACTIVITY_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_TITLE
value: 戰區BOSS挑戰個人排行獎勵

name: COMBINE_ZONE_ACTIVITY_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 您在昨日的戰區BOSS挑戰中排行第{0}名，獲得以下獎勵！

name: Send {0} message(s) in the World Channel
OUTLAND_BOSS_DIFFICULT_1
value: 魔物展示出了強大的壓迫力，但顯然它還有所保留。

name: OUTLAND_BOSS_DIFFICULT_2
value: 魔物退縮了半步，它開始狂暴化，並使出全部的力量想要逃跑。

name: The rift has opened, my brothers! Burn everything and take the spoils!
value: 虛空裂縫打開了，我的兄弟們！燒光一切，奪取戰利品！

name: Stop, monsters! As long as I'm here, you can't take another step forward!
value: 站住，你這怪物！只要有我在，你就休想在往前一步！

name: Now that the rift has opened, nothing can stop us! Bow down and surrender. Haha!!!
value: 虛空的裂縫開啟，你們的世界岌岌可危，拜服吧，投降吧，哈哈哈哈！

name: Not a chance! I'll beat you and kick you back to your filthy world!
value: 別癡心妄想了，我會打敗你，然後把你踹回你的世界去！

name: The Void will eventually consume all of you, along with this pathetic world. It's pointless to resist.
value: 虛空降臨了，你們的抵抗毫無意義，這個可悲世界終將會陷入熊熊燃燒！

name: Maybe you are right, the void will eventually come. But I won't let it happen today...
value: 也許會有那麼一天，但絕不是今天！

name: The monster exhibits a powerful oppressive force, but clearly it is holding back a little.
value: 魔物展示出了強大的壓迫力，但顯然它還有所保留。

name: Who are you!?
value: 這傢伙是什麼人，居然這麼厲害？

name: It doesn't matter who I am. What matters is that you're going down!
value: 我是誰不重要，重要的是你馬上就要完蛋了！

name: You think you can stop me, huh? You talk big for a little girl.
value: 不過就是個說誇誇其談的小女孩而已，你以為你能攔得住我？

name: Who dares to stop me?
value: 你是什麼人，竟敢打斷我的計畫？

name: I'm the guardian of this world. You will not get what you want under my watch!
value: 我是這個世界的守護者，有我在，你是不會得逞的！

name: Arrogant little thing. I'll show you what real strength looks like.
value: 哈哈哈哈，狂妄的小東西，我會讓你見識見識我真正的力量！

name: No, the Void never fails. Who are you?
value: 不，虛空從不失敗，你究竟是誰？

name: I'm the bane of all monsters!
value: 我是你們這些魔物的剋星！看我怎麼讓你們打回虛空去！

name: The void will devour you, and everything else!
value: 虛空會吞噬你，吞噬一切！

name: The monster takes half a step back, begins to go berserk, and uses all its strength to try to escape.
value: 魔物退縮了半步，它開始狂暴化，並使出全部的力量想要逃跑。

name: I'll spare you this time. If I see you again, you will be doomed!
value: 這次就先放過你，再讓我碰見，你就完蛋了！

name: Don't get too arrogant, someone else will come and put you in your place.
value: 你不會囂張太久的，會有其他人來收拾你的。

name: Stop her! Don't let her catch up!
value: 給我攔住她！別讓她追上來！

name: You can't stop me, just like you can't stop the void.
value: 你阻止不了我，就像你阻止不了虛空。

name: The void has dissipated, but eventually it will gather again.
value: 虛空消散了，但總有一天，還會重新凝聚。

name: Every odd-numbered round, when the MC is in action, randomly attacks an enemy 3 times. Each attack deals True DMG equal to 100% MC’s ATK and dispels one buff on the target.
value: 當前回合為第1回合、第3回合等奇數回合，且輪到主角行動時，主角隨機對敵人發起3次攻擊，每次攻擊造成主角攻擊力100%的真實傷害，並驅散一個有益狀態

name: When entering battle, all allies recover HP equal to 100% of MC’s Current HP. 10% of the healing in excess of the target's maximum HP is instead converted to a shield.
value: 進入戰鬥時，立即使我方所有友軍恢復主角當前生命值100%的血量，溢出治療量的10%轉化為護盾，護盾持續2回合

name: When entering battle, MC gains [MC Halo] state (cannot be dispelled), increasing her ATK, DEF, P.RES, M.RES, and Debuff RES by 5% of [the sum of all allies' corresponding attributes (including substitutes)] until the end of the battle.
value: 進入戰鬥時，主角獲得【主角光環】狀態（無法驅散），持續到戰鬥結束。主角的攻擊力、防禦、物抗、魔抗、異常抵抗分別提升[友方全體女神（包含替補）對應屬性]的5%

name:
When entering the battle, Frost Dragon has a 50% chance to decrease each enemy’s SPD by 50 for 2 rounds (ignores Debuff RES, cannot be dispelled). When she is in action, bestows all allies with a [Glacial Shield] state that lasts for 2 rounds (cannot be dispelled). 

[Glacial Shield]: When receiving DMG, inflicts a [DMG Decrease] state on the attacker. 
[DMG Decrease]: Each layer of that state decreases the bearer's DMG Increase by 3% (Up to 10 layers) that lasts for 2 rounds.
value: 進入戰鬥時，冰霜龍母使每名敵人有50%的幾率速度降低50點，持續2回合（無視異常抵抗、無法驅散）。每次行動時，冰霜龍母使全體友軍獲得【寒冰守護】狀態2回合（無法驅散），擁有此狀態的女神每次受到傷害時，造成傷害的那名敵人傷害降低3%，每名敵人最多疊加10層【傷害降低】效果，【傷害降低】持續2回合。

name: Respectively increases ATK, DEF, P.RES, M.RES and Debuff RES.(Neutral Status)
value: 攻擊力、防禦、物抗、魔抗、異常抵抗提升（絕對狀態）

name: Deals DMG to 6 enemies equal to 60% of their Max HP and has 50% chance to [Stun] the enemies for 1 round.
value: 對6名敵人造成60%最大生命值的傷害，50%幾率使敵人【眩暈】，持續1回合

name: Deals DMG to 3 enemies in the front row equal to 50% of their Max HP and increases your DMG Reflection by 70% for 2 rounds.
value: 對前排3名敵人造成50%最大生命值的傷害，並使自身傷害反彈增加70%，持續2回合

name: Deals DMG to 6 enemies equal to 60% of their Max HP and inflicts [Ignite] state to them for 3 rounds. \n\n[Ignite]: Enemies with the state will lose 8% of their Max HP in each round.
value: 對6名敵人造成60%最大生命值的傷害，並使敵人進入3回合的【燃燒】狀態，每回合損失6%的最大生命值

name: Deals DMG to 6 enemies equal to 60% of their Max HP and become immune to all debuffs for 2 rounds.
value: 對6名敵人造成60%最大生命值的傷害，並使自身免疫所有負面狀態，持續2回合

name: Attacks an enemy 6 times. Each attack deals DMG equal to 30% of target’s Max HP.
value: 對1名敵人攻擊6次，每次造成30%最大生命值的傷害

name: Deals DMG to 6 enemies equal to 80% of their Max HP.
value: 對6名敵人造成80%最大生命值的傷害

name: Attacks the enemy with the highest ATK twice, dealing DMG equal to 40% of target’s Max HP for each hit.
value: 對攻擊力最高的敵人攻擊2次，每次造成40%最大生命值的傷害

name: Attacks 2 times, dealing DMG to 3 random enemies equal to 60% of target’s Max HP each hit.
value: 攻擊2次，每次對隨機3名敵人造成60%最大生命值的傷害

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Frost Dragon's Dreamland
value: 用於提升冰霜龍母的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Frost Dragon’s Shard Optional Box
value: 冰霜龍母女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the box and choose Frost Dragon's Shards of any quality.
value: 打開寶箱選擇冰霜龍母任意品質的碎片

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_86
value: 你溫暖的擁抱，能否融化我的心？

name: ... Where is she? She said she'd be here.
I'm sorry for being late. I was dealing with something else.
value: 非常抱歉，剛剛出了點……小小的岔子。

name: I hope it's taken care of because I need your help. You once promised to help find whatever I want. I'm here to cash in on that promise.
value: 無礙，只要你能按照約定，幫我找到想要的東西就行。

name: Lady Frost, perhaps you should tell me what it is you seek. I don't read minds.
value: 冰霜女士，或許您有必要告知我一下，您的願望是什麼？

name: I have a problem. A thief stole my throne, and I need to reclaim it.
value: 並非什麼麻煩事，我的王座被盜寶者偷了，需要找回來而已。

name: Hmm... Stealing your throne must not have been easy. Whoever did it must be very powerful.
value: 好吧……這願望實現的難度還不小，恐怕要與好幾個有頭有臉的大人物較量了。

name: Before we begin our search, I must test your strength. I need to be sure you can handle what lies ahead.
value: 在這之前，我最好試試您的實力，以確保……不會發生任何意外。

name: Try me. I'm sure you won't be disappointed.
value: 來吧，我相信不會讓你失望。

name: How was that, kitten? Are you satisfied?
value: 怎麼樣，親愛的小貓，你還滿意嗎？

name: Get me out of this ice! I can't feel my legs!
value: 快把我從冰裡放出來……我感覺整個腰以下都動不了了……

name: Finally, I can feel my legs again! All right... So, I know an angel who may know where to find your throne. Let's go see her.
value: 有一個人也許知道，在哪裡能找到你想要的東西，讓我帶你去見見她。

name: Nuit! Nuit! Do you have a moment?
value: 努特，埃及的天空之神，寶藏的守護者，在這裡遇到你一點也不意外。

name: Pandora? What do you want?
value: 潘朵拉？你找我所為何事？

name: My new client is looking for her lost throne. I was wondering whether you know something about it.
value: 我的新客戶……正在尋找她丟失的王座，

name: Frost Dragon? Hah! Does she even deserve a throne?
value: 她？我很抱歉，以她這樣的身份，恐怕只能去搶主神們的御座了。

name: I think she wants you to prove your strength first.
value: 呃……我想你應該可以這麼認為。

name: Hehe, I am sure one of the arrogant Ruling Gods took it. I am willing to help you to take it back. But I need to test your power first. I don't want to be on the losing side in this conflict.
value: 這事情我挺感興趣的，不過我想知道合作者的本事如何。

name: One more helper would be nice. Come on. Let me show you the true power of an ice queen.
value: 我沒意見，與其讓我告訴你，不如你親自體驗一下冰霜巨龍的戰鬥力比較好。

name: I am impressed. You have mastered the art of controlling ice.
value: 看來是一位強而有力的寒冰掌控者呢……

name: Now do you think I'm strong enough to challenge even the Ruling Gods?
value: 這份力量是否有能力和那些主神較量？

name: I think so. Don't you agree, Nuit?
Of course. But with my help, things would go even more smoothly.
value: 當然了，要是有這樣強大的盟友幫助，會比預期的更順利。

name: Are you the ones looking for the Dragon Throne?
value: 你們是在找龍族王座的下落？我預見了你們的到來。

name: Let me guess. You 'foresaw it?' I know you're the angel of prophecy, but do you have to show off your skill every time we meet?
value: 預言天使果然還是名不虛傳的呢，要我給你頒獎嗎？

name: Well, there is something else important that I saw foresaw. You won't find that throne without my help.
value: 我還預見到，你們的成功，離不開我的幫助。

name: That's funny. Why should we trust you?
value: 這說法可真有趣，但我們憑什麼相信你？

name: I trust my own power more than the words coming out of your mouth.
value: 然而實力比命運更能說明一切，你不覺得？

name: Are you challenging me? Then what are you waiting for?
value: 承蒙所願，一場戰鬥或許能改變你們的想法。

name: Your power is... incredible. It seems that I underestimated the strength of a Nordic Dragon.
value: 真是驚人，看來我低估了北歐巨龍的實力。

name: But I also foresaw this failure.
value: 但這次失敗，也在命運意料之中。

name: Just what we'd expect to hear from a loser.
value: 喂喂，失敗者可沒資格說這樣的話。

name: No, Nuit. If you had paid attention, she anticipated all of our tactics. If we had battled her one-on-one instead of as a team, then we would have lost.
value: 不，我們剛剛所有的戰術，其實都被提前預判到了，一對一的話，她並不見得會輸。

name: Hmm... What do you think, Frost Dragon?
value: 嗯哼？所以我們最重要的“客戶”對於這次勝負怎麼看？

name: ... It wouldn't hurt to bring her along to help.
value: 天使的能力並沒有讓人失望。

name: Yeah, I agree.
value: 嗯，多一個同伴始終不會是壞事。

name: Hail, sister! What are you doing here? You still owe me a fight. Do you remember?
value: 喲，這麼快就不行了，我還有好些手段沒使出來呢。

name: Ember? Are you stalking me? I told you to leave me alone!
value: 這是什麼蠢話……你沒發現風暴正在你身邊彙聚嗎？

name: Stop, both of you. I need your help. It's for the future of our kind.
value: ……你們倆還真是沒完沒了，停止這場沒有意義的爭鬥，我需要你們的説明。

name: Don't try to tell me what to do. You are not my mother.
value: 除非有新的參戰者，否則別想讓龍族之間的戰鬥停下來！

name: ... Ember, you know we are not supposed to talk about HER. We made promises to each other.
value: ……樂意奉陪，如果我勝了，你們就暫且停手，幫我去完成此行的目的怎麼樣？

name: So? Who put you in charge? I don't care what you think, and I don't give a shit about you. Come fight me if you dare.
Who's in charge now? Answer me within 3 seconds or I will freeze you solid.
value: 嗯？再不認輸，我可就要把你整個都凍成冰塊了。

name: Stop, stop! It's you. I yield!
value: 哼，你的冰雪和寒風還是這麼難纏。

name: Don't talk back to me again. If you do it again, I will not hesitate to put you in the ice hole for thousands of years.
value: 論戰鬥經驗，我比任何一個北歐的龍族都要豐富。

name: Stop. You have scared her, Frost. Don't forget that she's still your sister.
value: 話別說得這麼早，你還有一個對手沒有倒下。

name: Are you also questioning my authority?
value: 那麼，讓我來猜猜你能堅持幾秒種吧，呵呵。

name: Ember lost because she was still young. But you and I, we trained together.
value: 讓我見識一下吧，是你的冰霜厲害，還是我的風暴更強！

name: I know you've been here before and gained new power. But your tactical blunders when we sparred together make me question how much you could've improved.
value: 即使你在夢境中獲得了新的力量，但論戰術，你依舊不是我的對手。

name: I've changed because I learn from my mistakes. Besides, I hold my temper better than the two of you.
value: 是嗎？三姐妹之中，我的頭腦可從來沒有輸給過你們。

name: Don't bore me. Stop talking and let's get this battle started!
value: 你們倆廢話真多，到底還要不要打？我都不耐煩了！

name: Damn. I can't move...
value: 強大的寒氣，仿佛連風都能凍住一般……

name: Are you throwing in the towel?
I...... Well, I admit my defeat... for now.
Though I don't want to admit it, your performance isn't bad. You lasted a few minutes longer than me, haha.
value: 雖然不想承認，但你打的還不賴，至少比我多堅持了幾秒鐘，哈哈。

name: Hmph! It seems we have no choice but to stop challenging Frost and listen to her if we want to get the hell out of here.
value: 哼，沒時間開玩笑了，我們最好儘快離開這個夢境。

name: Stop, Pandora. I see you trying to sneak around my domain. What are you up to?
value: 我聞到了熟悉的氣息……潘朵拉，是你？你來我的地盤做什麼？

name: Your domain? This is my dreamland. I can go wherever I want.
value: 你的地盤？你也不想想現在待著的夢境，究竟歸誰管！

name: Did you forget you promised I could keep a part of it for myself?
value: 即便這你是這夢境的掌控者，在沒得到我允許之前，也不能進入吧？

name: ... Never mind. We just want to pass through quietly. You're happy with that, right?
value: 這麼說你是不想讓路了？在你做這個決定前，要不要先問問我身後的三位？

name: Uh oh. Someone's about to lose their temper.
value: Uh oh. Someone's about to lose their temper.

name: Shh! Do you want her to freeze you again?
value: Shh! Do you want her to freeze you again?

name: I see. Trying to avoid looking at me, huh? But maybe I'd like to keep you as stone statues to decorate my domain.
value: 是嗎，我很樂意在花園裡多放上三座石雕。

name: Not unless you can beat our combined might.
It seems that your petrification magic is still not as good as the dragon's frost.
value: 看來，你的石化魔法還是沒有巨龍的冰霜好用啊，你就在這兒好好呆一陣子吧。

name: Let's go. We don't have time to waste on this. Are we close to the realm of the Ruling Gods?
value: 也該到了處理正事的時間了，前面應該是主神的領域了吧？

name: Yes, Lady Frost. It's just a bit further.
value: 如您所想，冰霜女士，以我們的速度很快就能抵達。

name: Be careful. This is Poseidon's place. She has a bad temper. Even I don't dare to mess with her.
value: 小心點，這是波塞冬的夢境，她脾氣很差，連我都要忌憚她幾分。

name: But she may have the thing that you want...
value: 而她手上，可能有你想要的東西。

name: Pandora! Are you talking about me? You dare accuse me of having a bad temper?
value: 潘朵拉，你帶這些人來到我統治的海域，是什麼意思？

name: I... I... No! You must have heard wrong. The dragons and I are just here looking for something. That's why I've brought them to see you. The mighty god of the sea must know where we can find it.
value: 別生氣親愛的，我們只是到這裡來，向你尋求一件寶物的。

name: What are you looking for? Would it be the Dragon Throne? I haven't seen it. Wait... Are you thinking of stealing mine instead?
value: 遺憾的是，我這裡沒有什麼值得你們搶的。

name: Stealing? Haha... No, no... That's such a strong choice of words. 'Asking' is a better word. We're asking you to give it to us.
value: “搶”這個字我不喜歡，不如用“送”吧，你“送”給我們。

name: Over my dead body!
value: 很好，在把你們打到站不起來後，我會有興趣問問你們想要什麼。

name: You better watch your back from now on. You filthy dragons! I will return for payback!
value: 你們最好別太得意，總有一天，我會回來和你討回這筆賬的……

name: If one fails to get what one wants, one will immediately return to reality.
value: 看起來是這樣，當一個人的願望無法被滿足時，就會被夢境驅逐。

name: To be honest, she was stronger than I thought.
value: 說實話，她比我想像中要強。

name: But not stronger than us.
value: 不過她再強，也不是我們龍族三姐妹聯手的對手。

name: Look at her throne. It is not the one we lost.
value: 雖然波塞冬的王座足夠華麗，但這並非是我丟失的寶物。

name: Then let's go east. There might be another angel who may have a motive to take your throne.
value: 那不妨我們往東走看看，提到收集寶物，那個傢伙可能也會對你的王座感興趣……

name: Welcome to the dreamland version of the Land of the Dead, called Yomotsu Hirazaka.
value: 歡迎來到東方的亡者國度黃泉比良阪，當然，這裡只是夢境的幻象所化。

name: I can feel that someone powerful is around.
value: 我可以感受到強大的存在。

name: Yes, that is the legendary lord of the Yellow Springs, Izanami.
value: 傳說中的黃泉之主——伊邪那美。

name: Who is there?
value: 嗯？是何人在稱呼我的真名？

name: ... It is me, Frost Dragon, and my sisters. We are looking for the Dragon Throne.
value: ……北歐的冰霜巨龍，來此尋找丟失的寶物。

name: I have no interest in exotic treasures or status symbols.
value: 寶物？雖然我身為黃泉統治者，沒有搜尋異寶的興趣……

name: But after thousands of years in this dream, I'm dying of boredom. I'll tell you what... Play with me a little and I might consider offering some clues.
value: 但我在這夢境待了幾千年，都快無聊死了，要是能陪我玩玩，也許……

name: What do you mean by 'play a little'?
value: ……也許你會告訴我們寶物的下落？

name: ... Come, let me see if you know how to wield that spear you hold.
value: 好提議，但前提是你們能讓我盡興才行。

name: Hehe... That was fun!
value: 呵呵……真是沒讓我失望，好久沒有這樣的樂子了。

name: You can look around in my shrine. If you find anything you like, just take it.
value: 至於寶物，就在我的神社中隨便拿吧，我對那些放了幾千年的東西早就不感興趣了。

name: You look way too excited, Pandora. Unfortunately, the throne is not here.
value: 遺憾的是，這裡並沒有我丟失的王座。

name: Hey, you guys are from Scandinavia, right? Why don't you go ask the Norse god, Odin?
value: 你是北歐的神明，如果丟了東西，不是應該到奧丁那兒去問問嗎？

name: That's a great idea! Sisters, we'd better get going!
Here we are, the domain of the Nordic Angels, the Asgard dreamland.
value: 這裡是北歐眾神的神域，宏偉的阿斯加德王宮。

name: Odin sure enjoys a comfortable home.
value: 這夢境有幾分我熟悉的涼意，宮殿上雕刻著我族的花紋，還堆積著雪……

name: Look at all those beautiful palaces...
value: ……奧丁的日子看上去過得挺舒服。

name: The dragon family? What are you doing here?
value: 北歐的三大龍族？是什麼風把你們吹到我這來了。

name: I'm here to find my stolen throne.
value: 我的巢穴遇上了些麻煩，神王奧丁，我來這裡為了找一件寶物。

name: And what does it have to do with me?
You are the queen of Nordic Angels. I bet you know where my throne is.
value: 一場讓你滿意的戰鬥，應該能讓你認可北歐龍族的力量。

name: How dare you accuse me of stealing it! I'll teach you a lesson!
Your strength is beyond my imagination. I would be honored if your kind accepted a place within my palace.
value: 不錯，你的力量超乎我的想像，你的族裔在我的神殿中，能有一席之地的榮耀。

name: Back to the throne you are talking about, I know where it is.
value: 那麼問題來了，你所求的寶物是什麼？

name: Where is it?
value: 王座，真正屬於龍族的王座。

name: But I know of something far better than a throne. Do you want to know what it is? I'll give you a hint: It's far more valuable.
value: 有意思，所以你願意找回丟失的那尊王座，還是說……希望得到更珍貴的恩賜？

name: I am interested. What is it?
value: 如果你不介意的話，我更期待後者。

name: The courage of your kind has always impressed me. Now, enter the portal in front of you.
value: 你們龍族的勇氣一向讓我敬佩，進入面前的傳送門吧。

name: I am sure you will find something more valuable than your throne.
value: 傳送門後的夢境，應該能讓你得到比王座更珍貴的東西。

name: What is this place? I feel like I'm surrounded by chaos and darkness.
value: ……這是什麼地方，我感到混沌與黑暗的氣息彌漫在四周。

name: Odin, is that you? I'm going to make this darkness swallow both you and your ridiculous palace.
value: 奧丁，你又想逃跑嗎？這一次，我要把你和你那可笑的宮殿一起吞入黑暗！

name: Apep... I knew we couldn't trust that despicable Odin.
value: 阿佩普……天哪，這鬼地方應該是北歐神王的噩夢。

name: She and Apep have been fighting for thousands of years in my dreamland!
value: 奧丁與埃及的破壞神在幾千年前就一直爭鬥，這場惡夢也延續了幾千年。

name: ... How are we going to get out?
There is only one way to end this nightmare. We must defeat Apep.
value: 結束這場惡夢，除了擊敗阿佩普的夢魘，沒有別的辦法。

name: Sounds like we have a fight to win.
value: Sounds like we have a fight to win.

name: Get out of my way, Nordic Dragons. This is between Odin and me!
value: 讓開，北歐的龍族，這是我和奧丁的戰爭！

name: ... I have no choice.
value: ……抱歉了，按照我和奧丁剛簽的協議，她的戰爭就是我的戰爭。

name: Ahhh! Asgard... Sooner or later, my vengeful anger will be reborn...
value: 阿斯加德……我復仇的怒火遲早會重新燃起的……

name: I didn't realize that she could be such a difficult foe.
value: 即使現實中她並不強，但在夢境也能變成如此可怕的對手……

name: After fighting her, it seems my strength has greatly improved.
value: 在與她戰鬥之後，我仿佛也能感受到自己的力量，有了不可想像的提升。

name: Does your dull throne seem so wonderful now? Or is it power that you truly crave?
value: 呵……相對於那個無聊的王座，力量與權力才是你渴求的東西吧？

name: ... Is my ambitions that obvious?
value: ……不錯的問題，我會在離開夢境後好好尋找答案的。

name: I don't care. All I care is to take back my throne!
Fine. This is Asgard's Time Gate.
value: 阿斯加德的時光門，能夠尋回任何原本屬於你的東西。

name: Think of the last time you saw your throne and this gate will take you there.
value: 去取回你丟失的寶物吧，那尊王座就在裡面。

name: COMBINE_ZONE_CHALLENGE_BUY_REMAIN
value: 每日剩餘購買挑戰次數：{0}次

name: Look, a rift appeared out of nowhere. Let’s go and check out what happened.
value: 這裡突然出現了一道裂縫，快去看看怎麼回事！

name: You are not in a Guild.

In ancient Egyptian mythology, Horus is the guardian angel of pharaohs, a symbol of royal authority. She is also the goddess of revenge, presiding over law and order.\nShe defeated Set, the cruel ruler of Egypt, and avenged her father. She then became the new ruling god of Egypt. It is said she loved her people more than herself.
value: 古埃及神話中法老的守護神，王權的象徵，同時她也是復仇之神，掌管著法律和秩序！\n她曾為父報仇，擊敗埃及殘暴的統治者賽特，成為新一代的埃及統治神。

name: I used to believe that no one in this world could make my heart flutter, until I met you.
value: 我曾經很堅定的認為，這個世界上不會有人能讓我為之心動，直到你的出現，讓我曾經的堅定化作了泡影。

name: This supreme artifact from Egyptian mythology represents the divine protection and ultimate sovereignty of the gods. It is said no one can lie while under the gaze of The Eye of Horus.
value: 埃及神話中至高無上的神器，它代表著神明的庇佑與至高無上的君權，也代表著最為真實的目光。

name: Why does everybody think I am a dangerous woman?
value: 為什麼總有人覺得，我是一個危險的女人呢？

name: What is the most wonderful thing in the world? Power or Love?
value: 這世界上最美妙的東西，到底是權力還是愛情？

name: I have always believed that hatred makes one more powerful.
value: 我一直都認為，仇恨的力量會使人更加強大！

name: As the ruler of ancient Egypt, I always put my people first.
value: 做為古埃及的統治者，我一直都將自己的一切奉獻給我的子民，從不敢懈怠！

name: What is your first impression of the God of ancient Egypt?
value: 你覺得，古埃及的神明，給人的第一印象是什麼樣的？

name: Why do people always feel that charm cannot coexist with power?
value: 為什麼總有人覺得，魅力不能與力量共存呢？

name: Because you have great power.
value: 因為你擁有強大的力量！

name: Hatred can indeed stimulate power inside one's body.
But hatred can easily make people lose their rationality.
value: 仇恨容易讓人喪失理智。

name: You should think about yourself more.
You are an admirable queen!
value: 你是一個令人敬佩的女王！

name: Maybe it's because they fear the one who has it all.
value: 或許是人們畏懼強大的力量。

name: Because they haven't met you, the embodiment of both charm and power.
value: 你就是魅力與力量共存的女神。

name: It seems that everyone thinks the more charming a woman is, the more dangerous she is!
value: 看來大家都覺得，越迷人的女人越危險！

name: But I would prefer for people to feel admiration towards me, rather than fear.
value: 是這樣麼！但我更希望人們對我的感覺是崇拜和仰慕。

name: I had supreme power over the whole of Egypt a long time ago, but I never felt happy back then.
value: 我曾經擁有無上的權力，可為什麼我並不覺得開心呢？

name: Then I want a taste of love.
value: 是麼！那我也想品嘗一下，愛情的滋味。

name: Then I am more certain that avenging my father was the right choice!
value: 你也這麼認為嗎？那我更加堅定，我當初為父報仇是正確的選擇！

name: Thank you for reminding me of that. I will try not to let hatred consume me.
value: 謝謝你的提醒，我會時刻保持理智，不會讓仇恨吞噬自己的。

name: You are the first person to tell me that. Thank you.
value: 你是第一個叫我為自己著想的人，這種感覺，真奇妙。

name: Being recognized like that makes me happy.
value: 我很喜歡這種，被人認可的感覺。

name: Being mysterious will prevent the enemy from knowing your next moves! But I don't have to hide in front of you, right?
value: 保持神秘才會讓敵人猜不透你！不過在你面前，我倒是可以揭開神秘的面紗。

name: This is a very high compliment, and I like it.
value: 這是一個很高的評價，我很喜歡。

name: Is that so? Then they are being narrowminded. My power is used to protect my people.
value: 是這樣嗎？但我的力量，卻是用來保護我的人民的。

name: Is that so? Well I am confident in both my charm and my power.
value: 哈哈……是的！我對自己的魅力和力量，都很有自信。

name: Are you the goddess Pandora, who guards secrets and knowledge?
value: 你就是傳聞中的，守護秘密與知識的女神潘朵拉？

name: And what brings the guardian of the pyramid and the king's power, the mighty Horus, to my domain?
value: 沒錯，那麼金字塔王權的守護者，荷鲁斯，是什麼風把你給吹來了？

name: Ra has gone missing, and chaos has engulfed the Egyptian gods. The Devourer Apep is unrestrained, and darkness is imminent.
value: 拉神失蹤了，埃及眾神一片混亂，吞噬者阿佩普無人約束……黑暗即將降臨。

name: I need to find Ra's scepter and take up her responsibility of maintaining order in Egypt.
value: 我需要找到拉神的權杖，替代她執行維護埃及秩序的職責。

name: Oh? Your power is not enough to control the Egyptian pantheon. Is that why you need her scepter?
value: 哦？你現在的力量還不足以掌控埃及神系，所以才需要拉神的權杖，對嗎？

name: It is a powerful artifact that can harness the power of the sun and dispel all darkness.
value: 它是件強大的神器，能夠聚集太陽的力量，驅散一切黑暗。

name: Is that so? Since it is so valuable, why should I give it to you instead of keeping it for myself?
value: 是嗎？既然它這麼有價值，那麼我為何要把它交給你，而不是自己留下呢？

name: The reason is simple. Your power is insufficient to activate it, Pandora.
value: 理由很簡單，你的力量可無法驅動它，潘朵拉。

name: Ha, you're quite confident. Why don't we prove it with a show of strength?
value: 呵呵，口氣真大，不如用實力來證明一下吧。

name: So, do you believe me now?
value: 怎麼樣，這下你該相信我的話了？

name: Alright, I will accept it... for now.
value: 呼……好吧，我就不打它主意了……暫時的。

name: Hmph, then get started.
value: 嗯哼，那就請你開始這場交易吧。

name: Hold on, dear. Let's talk about the details first...
value: 別著急，親愛的，讓咱們先好好談談價格……

name: Although this place is a dreamland created by my Box, it is the best way to achieve what you wish for in reality.
value: 我這裡雖說是夢境，但有夢往往是通往現實目的的最佳途徑。

name: Of course, dreams can also be very, very dangerous.
value: 當然，夢境有時也是充滿危險的。

name: They can reflect your deepest fears. Be careful... One such nightmare is here now.
value: 它會倒影出你心中最深的恐懼，小心……你的夢魘來了。

name: Horus, I've been waiting for you for a long time.
value: 荷鲁斯，我已經等你多時了。

name: Heh...Anubis? She's hardly my nightmare... at most, she's a nuisance.
value: 呵……阿努比斯？她可談不上是我的夢魘……頂多淘氣的時候有點麻煩而已。

name: Ra has asked me to wait for you here. If you want to obtain her scepter, you must pass my test.
value: 拉神讓我在這裡等你，如果你想要取得她的權杖，必須經受我的考驗。

name: What is your test? Do you want to fight me?
value: 你的考驗是什麼？找我打一架嗎？

name: Yes, but that is just the beginning of my test.
Do you acknowledge my strength, Anubis?
value: 你認可我的力量嗎？阿努比斯。

name: Hmph, great power on its own is not enough.
value: 只有強大的力量是不夠的……

name: What, are you going to weigh my soul too?
value: 怎麼，你該不會還想稱一稱我靈魂的重量吧？

name: That's not necessary. Your nobility is beyond doubt.
value: 那倒不必，你的高尚無容置疑。

name: But I must follow you and witness you overcome each difficulty.
value: 但我必須跟在你身邊，見證你度過一個個難關。

name: Alright, it seems that even the Goddess of Death has a penchant for peeping into others' dreams.
value: 好吧，看來死神大人也有偷窺他人夢境的情調。

name: Don't be like that. It is not a bad thing to have powerful companions join you on this journey.
value: 別這麼說，旅途中有強大的夥伴加入並不是什麼壞事。

name: If she causes trouble, it will be a headache for us.
value: 你可千萬別這麼想！她要是搗起蛋來，還是很讓人頭疼的。

name: Nephthys, what are you doing here?
value: 奈芙蒂斯，你怎麼在這裡？

name: This is my realm, shouldn't I be asking you that?
value: 這兒可是我的領域，這句話不該我來問你嗎？

name: Well, looking at this situation... I guess you're not here to admire my mummification skills, are you?
value: 呃，從這陣勢來看……你們應該不是來欣賞我製作木乃伊的吧？

name: Actually, you've been invited to this dreamland to be a part of Horus' trial.
value: 你暫時被我邀請到了夢境裡，成為荷鲁斯試煉的一環。

name: Is that so? Perfect timing, I was just about to test if I can become stronger in a dream.
value: 是嗎？那正好，我剛想試試夢境裡自己是不是能變得更強。

name: Alright then, let's fight!
value: 那麼沒必要多說了，來吧！

name: Wait! Wait! Hold on. Even though we are in a dream, it still hurts to get hit...
value: 別打了別打了，雖然是夢境，但是挨揍還是一樣痛……

name: You've become much stronger in this dreamland. Interesting, does one grow faster here than in the real world?
value: 你比現實世界強得多，難道在夢境中的成長速度會更快？

name: I am suggesting that I join your team and fight alongside you.
value: 我的意思是加入你們的隊伍，看看到底怎麼回事。

name: It looks like some uninvited guests have arrived. You sure do have a lot of enemies.
value: 看起來有些我沒有邀請的傢伙也來這裡做客了呢，你的對頭還真不少啊。

name: It seems that they are still holding a grudge over the past. They will meddle any chance they get.
value: 看來天使們還在為當年的事情斤斤計較呢，只要有機會她們准會摻和進來。

name: Don't give us that look. We are not the same as back then.
value: 如果你還是在用過去的思維審視我等，那就太遺憾了。

name: The Scepter of Ra not only decides the fate of the Egyptian gods, but is also crucial for us angels.
value: 拉神的太陽權杖不僅決定埃及眾神的命運，對天使們來說也是至關重要。

name: We can't let it fall into the wrong hands!
value: 我們不能放任它落到邪惡的傢伙手中！

name: You were once known as the God of Vengeance. I can't be sure that you don't still have that terrible personality.
value: 你曾經以復仇之神著稱，我不敢保證你是否還留有那段糟糕的記憶和性格。

name: The Scepter of Ra is the business of us Egyptian gods. It is none of your concern.
value: 太陽權杖的歸屬是我們埃及神明的事情，這事不用你們擔心。

name: Besides, my vengeance was exacted with restraint and fairness, not madness.
value: 況且，我的復仇實際上意味著節制與公平，而非瘋狂。

name: If you insist on going after the Scepter, you must first pass my test.
value: 如果你堅持的話，那就必須通過我的考驗。

name: Try me.
value: 呵呵，我不介意接受你的考驗。

name: Your strength is not enough to stop me.
value: 你輸了，加百列，以你的力量，恐怕阻止不了我。

name: Horus, you've become much stronger than I expected.
value: 荷鲁斯，你變強了不少，確實讓我有些出乎意料。

name: I may not be able to stop you, but I can follow you to make sure you don't become what I fear you will.
value: 我雖然阻止不了你，但我會跟著你，確保你不會變成我想像中的那樣。

name: So you mean to keep an eye on me, huh? Well, if you can lend a hand when I'm in trouble, I don't mind.
value: 呼……監視我嗎？好吧，如果你能在危急時刻幫我一把，我倒也沒意見。

name: Nuit, what are you doing here?
My sister Geb was kidnapped by Ra. I came here to find her.
value: 我的姐妹，蓋布，被一個神秘的傢伙拉入了夢中，我是追尋她來到這裡的。

name: Nuit, what's the matter with you?
It seems she's being controlled by someone... Oh no, I should have thought of this. It must be her.
value: 她似乎被人操控了……糟糕，我怎麼沒想到呢，是那個傢伙。

name: Phantasos, a goddess who can manipulate dreams like me. But... she is also the creator of nightmares.
value: 方塔蘇斯，和我一樣可以操控夢境的女神。但這個傢伙是惡夢的締造者。

name: Indeed I am. And unfortunately for you, you're no longer in Pandora's dreamland... You're in my realm. The realm of Nightmares.
value: 沒錯，而且糟糕的是，你們現在已經脫離了潘朵拉的夢境，到了我的領域……

name: Pandora, I believe you and I have some unfinished business.
value: 潘朵拉，你我還有一筆賬沒算完呢。

name: I don't care about that... Just release Nuit first!
value: 我不管你們有什麼恩怨，先把努特放了。

name: Oh, do you mean this Goddess of the Sky? Nuit, show them your power!
value: 差點忘記你們的存在，去吧，天空之神努特，讓他們見識見識你的力量。

name: Horus? What happened?
value: 荷鲁斯？我，我這是怎麼了？

name: Phantasos had taken control of your mind. Geb is probably also under her control
value: 方塔蘇斯控制了你，蓋布應該也在她的控制之中。

name: That's right, I made both sisters into my puppets. But to think you could escape my control like this... I did not expect that.
value: 沒錯，我為你們姐妹倆都做了安排。不過你脫離控制這件事，在我的意料之外。

name: What have you done to Geb? Where is she?
If you want to know, follow me deeper into my realm, hehe.
value: 想知道的話，就到更深層的夢境中來吧，呵呵……

name: Here she is. But I don't think she will recognize any of you, hehe. Not even her own sister.
value: 你們想見的人就在這裡，只不過她還認不認識你們，就是另外一回事了。

name: Anyone who disrupts the master's plan will have to pay the price.
value: 任何打亂主人計畫的人，都要付出代價。

name: Phantasos, the gods of Egypt have not offended you, have they?
value: 方塔蘇斯，埃及的眾神似乎並沒有得罪過你吧？

name: It is true that I have no grievances with you, but for Ra's Sun Scepter... Well, you understand.
value: 我的確與你們無冤無仇，但為了太陽權杖……你們明白的。

name: With that scepter, I can finally break free from Hades' control and become the new master of the underworld.
value: 有了太陽權杖，我就能擺脫哈迪斯的掌控，成為冥界的新主人。

name: So you're doing this to get the Sun Scepter. Keep dreaming!
value: 所以說，你也是為了太陽權杖而來。

name: It is said that only an Egyptian god can activate the power of the Scepter. So I made one into my puppet to use it for me.
value: 只有埃及神能夠啟動太陽權杖的力量，我需要一個傀儡，成為我使用它的替身。

name: Now, enough talking.
value: 話說夠了，開始你們的戰鬥吧！

name: Geb, can you hear me? Geb?
Ow, my body hurts. What happened?
value: 我的身體好痛，發生什麼了？

name: We let Phantasos escaped. Damn it.
value: 方塔蘇斯那個傢伙居然逃跑了，見鬼。

name: Don't worry, I believe she will eventually come to us.
value: 別急，我相信她會主動找上我們的。

name: I was wondering why Phantasos is being so sneaky. It turns out she is hiding from you lot.
value: 方塔蘇斯鬼鬼祟祟的，原來就是躲著你們這幾個傢伙啊。

name: Apollo? Are you also here for the Scepter?
value: 阿波羅？怎麼，連你也想要來搶太陽權杖嗎？

name: Me? I have no interest in that thing. I am capable of using the power of the sun on my own.
value: 我？抱歉，我對這玩意沒有興趣，因為我本身就可以使用太陽的力量。

name: But I don't trust anyone other than myself and Ra to wield the power of the sun properly.
value: 但我對其他能夠動用太陽之力的人都不太放心，我可以信任拉，但無法信任她之外的人。

name: So you want to stop me from getting it?
value: So you want to stop me from getting it?

name: More like a test. Let me see if you're worthy of such power.
value: 或者說是考驗？看看你有沒有肩負太陽的氣量。

name: Your strength is beyond my imagination.
value: 你的力量超乎我的想像。

name: You're not bad either, Apollo. I almost lost. If not for my allies' help, I would have lost.
value: 你也不賴，阿波羅，我差一點點就輸了——如果沒有夥伴幫助的話。

name: Alright, I will acknowledge your capability for now. But be careful...
value: 好吧，我姑且認可你有資格掌握太陽之力，不過你要小心……

name: Because the moment I think you are no longer worthy of it, I will take the Scepter from you.
value: 因為當我認為你沒資格的時候，我還會回來取回太陽權杖的。

name: What a disappointment! I thought Apollo would hold out longer than that.
value: 真讓人失望，我還以為阿波羅能多堅持一會呢。

name: I am also disappointed to see you again so soon.
value: 真讓人失望，我知道你遲早會回來找我，但沒想到這麼快。

name: Don't get too cocky. You know you're still in my realm, right? I can summon anything here.
value: 別太得意了，你現在可是在我夢境領域之中。

name: Let's see how you deal with the Sun itself!
value: 在我的夢境中，我可以召喚出任何存在！讓我看看你們該如何對付太陽本身！

name: Who's calling me? Horus? What are you doing here?
value: 誰在呼喚我？荷鲁斯？你們怎麼會在這裡？

name: … Ra? No, this is only an illusion created by Phantasos.
value: ……拉神，不，這只是方塔蘇斯創造的幻影。

name: Indeed, but even so, she will be as powerful as you think she should be!
value: 的確，然而即使是這樣在，她也會發揮出在你心目中應有的力量！

name: We defeated Ra? This is unbelievable...
value: 我們擊敗拉神了？這簡直難以置信……

name: Fighting Ra made me feel... uncomfortable.
value: 和拉交戰讓我感覺……很不好受。

name: It's just an illusion. Don't dwell on it.
value: 畢竟只是創造出來的幻影，你不用太過意不去。

name: Phantasos, you will pay for this!
value: 方塔蘇斯，你會為此付出代價的！

name: It looks like I get to fight you again. How exhilarating.
value: 看來我不得不在這裡和你們開戰了，這可真讓人感到刺激。

name: Big words for a loser.
value: 你都到了走投無路的時候了，還這麼樂觀的嗎？

name: Watch your tongue, Pandora. This is my realm, and my power still reigns supreme.
value: 小心說話，潘朵拉，這裡可是我的夢境，我的力量依舊佔據上風。

name: Hmm? I'm curious to see what you can do.
value: 嗯哼？我倒是想要見識見識。

name: Ah, you... You! The scepter is mine! Sooner or later, I will have it.
value: 啊，你們這群……這群傢伙！我遲早會回來的……

name: Stop, Phantasos. This farce has gone on long enough.
value: 住手吧，方塔蘇斯，這場鬧劇該結束了。

name: Ra? Aren't you just an illusion that I created?
value: 拉？你……你不是我創造出來的幻影嗎？

name: My divine power is omnipresent, even in your realm. Thus I can manifest through this illusion you created.
value: 我的神威無處不在，即便是在你的領域，我也仍舊能借助這幻影現身。

name: What do you want from me?
Nothing. I have no interest in such a small and pitiful goddess. But your dreamland on the other hand...
value: 我對你這樣的小角色沒什麼興趣，但你的夢境挺有意思……

name: I sense your faith in the Egyptian gods. I want to see if you are capable of becoming their leader.
value: 我感受到了你對埃及眾神的信念，我也的確想要看看你是否能夠成為眾神的引導者。

name: And if you prove your worth through my test, I will allow you to wield my scepter.
value: 如你真的夠格，我便允許讓你指掌太陽權杖。

name: I have no desire for the divine power of the Sun. I just want there to be less conflict among the gods.
value: 我對太陽的神權並無覬覦之心，我只想讓眾神少一些爭端罷了。

name: So do you want to take my test?
value: 無論如何，你都將面對自己的噩夢，你願意接受挑戰嗎？

name: I am up for the challenge!
Be ready, for you will face the biggest enemy that I have faced for thousands of years.
value: 做好準備，你將會遭遇我千百年來所面對的敵人。

name: The Lord of Chaos, Apep... I wanted never to see her, not even in my dreams...
value: 混亂之主阿佩普……天哪，我做夢也不想看見她……

name: I'm surprised, you have passed the test. It's time to hand over this scepter to you.
value: 真讓我驚訝，你通過了考驗，或許這柄太陽權杖交給你是命運的選擇。

name: I will face my responsibilities with confidence.
During the next hundred years, you will act as the leader of the Egyptian gods on my behalf. May the sun bless you.
value: 接下來的一百年內，你將代替我行使掌控埃及眾神的職能，願太陽庇佑你。

name: Sorry, I don't think I am ready for that.
Alright, perhaps someday you will be able to bear that responsibility.
value: 好吧，或許有一天，你依舊能接下掌控埃及神權的責任。

name: Collect 55 Horus Shards to summon Horus
value: 集齊55個荷魯斯碎片可以召喚荷魯斯

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_87
value: 降低攻擊力 驅散有益狀態

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_88
value: 陽光普照之地，皆是我應許你的國度。

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_89
value: 黃昏已至，我與命定之人有個約會。

name: Used to upgrade the level of the Memoria Orb in Horus's Dreamland
value: 用於提升荷魯斯的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Horus's Shard Optional Box
value: 荷魯斯女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the box and choose Horus's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇荷魯斯任意品質的碎片

name: Deals 500% P.DMG to one enemy and dispels 1 buff.
value: 驅散一名敵人1個有益狀態，並造成500%的物理傷害

name: Treasure Instinct: Found extra treasure fragments in Treasure Hunting.
value: 寶物獵人：外域尋寶時可獲得額外的寶物碎片。

name: Star Shield: Increases DEF of all line-up angels by 10%.
value: 星辰護盾：所有上陣女神的防禦增加10%。

name: Eva was born from the illusory garden among the stars, and fell to this world in a meteor. She stubbornly believes that at some point in the future, the sun and moon will turn upside down and the stars will fall into chaos, and only one human has the ability to avert this crisis. She knows how to predict the future through the movement of the stars. In her prophecy, a human of destiny from another world will save the universe. Eva has been patiently waiting for her arrival.
value: 伊娃誕生自群星之間的虛幻花園，在一顆流星的包裹下，墜落在了這個世界。她固執地認為，在未來的某刻，日月將會顛倒，群星陷入混亂，而只有人類才有能力扭轉這一危機。她懂得如何通過星星的移動預知未來，她的預言中，有位來自另外一片星空的天命之人將會拯救這個世界，而伊娃則一直在等待此人的到來。

name: The stars guide me to your side. May fate grant you courage and faith.
value: 星辰指引著我來到你身邊，願命運賜予你勇氣與信念。

name: My horns grew another centimeter!
value: 我的角又長長了一公分！

name: Hey, you've been hiding in the distance and secretly staring at me, haven't you? Did you miss me again?
value: 喂，你一直都躲在遠處偷偷地盯著我看吧？是又想我了嗎？

name: My magic can move the stars and change the day and night, but it is impossible to conjure a piece of delicious bread!
value: 魔法的力量能夠移動星星，改變晝夜，可有時候想變出一塊香噴噴的麵包都做不到。

name: Sun Priest: Increases HP of all line-up angels by 300,000.
value: 太陽祭司：所有上陣女神的生命值提升300000。

name: It is said that the Feathered Serpents are descendants of the sun and will retain their divinity forever. Therefore, they have been trained as priests of the sun god for generations. The same is true for Vandis. She lives in an ancient temple that has been forgotten. Although no one has visited it for a long time, she still believes that prayer can make the world a better place. Until one day, when she was praying, a mysterious voice sounded in her ears: a human being with an important mission will appear...
value: 據說羽蛇是太陽的後代，身上永遠保留著神性，因此，羽蛇世世代代都被訓練成為太陽的祭司。凡蒂絲也是如此，她居住在被遺忘的古老廟宇，雖然早已無人參拜，但她依舊相信禱告能讓這個世界風調雨順。直到某天，在她禱告時，冥冥之中的聲音在她耳邊響起：一位帶著重要使命的人類將會出現……

name: I came to hear your prayer. May the gift of the sun and my blessing always be with you.
value: 我因聽見你的祈禱而降臨，願太陽的恩賜與我的祝福常伴於你身邊。

name: You know, even though I'm a high priest, I still have my girlish side.
value: 多看看我，你就會發現，即便是高高在上的祭司，也有少女的一面。

name: Griffon? In the eyes of humans, snakes with wings are strange enough, but there are cats with wings...
value: 獅鷲？在人類看來，長著翅膀的蛇就夠奇怪了，想不到還有長著翅膀的貓……

name: You seem to be very interested in my tail... Do you want to pet it? It feels very good!
value: 你好像對我的尾巴挺感興趣……要摸摸看嗎？手感很不錯的哦！

name: Treasure Instinct: Found extra treasure fragments in Treasure Hunting.
value: 外域尋寶時可獲得額外的寶物碎片。

name: Wings of Courage: Inceases DEF.PEN level of all line-up angels by 10%
value: 所有上陣女神的破防等級提升10%。

name: Like other griffons, Leonie left her parents when she reached adulthood, built her own small house on the cliff, and lived a life of isolation—hunting and cooking alone. One day, a human being arrived, and her brilliance caught Leonie's eyes. The young griffon then chose to leave her home on the cliff and follow in that person's footsteps, hoping to serve her one day.
