value: 蕾傲妮與其他的獅鷲一樣，在剛成年時就離開了父母，在山崖上搭建了屬於自己的小房子，過著離群索居的生活——一個人捕獵，一個人烹飪美食。直到那個人類的到來，她的光輝讓蕾傲妮無法挪開雙眼。很快，蕾傲妮就選擇離開了懸崖上的家，跟隨著那個人的足跡，希望某天能為她效命。

name: Please let me soar by your side until the end of time.
value: 請讓我翱翔在你左右，直到拂曉與黃昏的盡頭。

name: Interested in letting me sleep next to you for a while? I would like that...
value: 有興趣讓我在你身邊睡一會嗎？我挺喜歡這樣……

name: It's the season when our feathers molt. I always used to worry that my wings might fall off as well and never grow back.
value: 又到了脫毛的季節了，每當這個時候，我都會擔心我的翅膀會禿掉。

name: I'm amazed to be surrounded by so many other kinds of Eudemons. Before I left my hometown, I had never imagined such stunning diversity.
value: 幻獸的種類還真是多得讓我驚訝，在離開家鄉前，我可沒見過這麼多彩的世界。

name: Drops in the Easter event. It can be used to redeem items in the event interface.
value: 復活節活動期間戰場掉落，可以在活動介面兌換道具

name: Drops in the Easter event. It can be used to redeem items in the event interface.
value: 復活節活動期間掛機掉落，用於復活節活動孵化彩蛋，獲得鑽石和道具獎勵

name: At the end of the event, rewards will be issued according to the hatching level reached by the player.
value: 活動結束時，按照玩家達到的孵蛋等級發放獎勵

name: Earn diamonds and points by caring for Easter Eggs.
value: 照料復活節彩蛋能獲得鑽石及積分

name: EASTER_END_SUMMON_TIPS
value: 當前孵蛋等級為{0}，是否繼續開啟復活節彩蛋？

name: ACTIVITY_HOLIDAY_EASTER_TIPS
value: （{0}-{1}）戰場掛機會掉落【愛心】道具，用於照料彩蛋。

name: Your Easter Egg rewards have been claimed
value: 復活節彩蛋獎勵已領取

name: You have unused hatching items. Please use them first.
value: 當前還有道具剩餘，請先前往使用

name: Insufficient hatching points.
value: 當前孵蛋積分不足，無法開啟復活彩蛋

name: ACTIVITY_HOLIDAY_EASTER_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 這是你未開啟的復活節彩蛋獎勵，感謝支持！

name: ACTIVITY_HOLIDAY_EASTER_RECYCLE_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 本次復活節活動已結束，活動道具已自動回收成鑽石！

name: Hatch to level up the Easter Egg and and open it in {0}
value: {0}可根據孵化等級開啟復活節彩蛋

name: Deals 200% P.DMG to all enemies, decreasing their DMG Increase by 30%. At the same time, bestows [Judgment] to all allies (Both effects last for 2 rounds).\n[Judgment]: When defeated, the enemy who defeated the bearer becomes the target. Reduces the target's ATK by 15% of Horus's Max ATK until the end of the battle (Ignores Debuff RES; cannot be dispelled). This state can stack, up to 3 layers.
value: 對敵方全體造成200%的物理傷害，並使敵方全體傷害降低30%，持續2回合。然後使己方所有女神獲得【審判】狀態2回合，擁有【審判】狀態的女神被擊殺時使擊殺者攻擊力降低荷魯斯最大攻擊力的15%（無視異常抵抗、無法驅散，最多疊加3層，持續至戰鬥結束）

name: 【Divine Judgment: Deals 220% P.DMG to all enemies, decreasing their DMG Increase by 50% for 2 rounds (cannot be dispelled). At the same time, bestows [UR Judgement] to all allies, lasting for 2 rounds.\n[UR Judgment]: When defeated, the enemy who defeated the bearer becomes the target. Reduces the target's ATK by 20% of Horus's Max ATK until the end of the battle (Ignores Debuff RES; cannot be dispelled). This state can stack, up to 5 layers.】
value: 對敵方全體造成220%的物理傷害，並使敵方全體傷害降低50%（無法驅散），持續2回合。然後使己方所有女神獲得【審判】狀態2回合，擁有【審判】狀態的女神被擊殺時使擊殺者攻擊力降低荷魯斯最大攻擊力的20%（無視異常抵抗、無法驅散，最多疊加5層，持續至戰鬥結束）

name: Deals 600% P.DMG to one enemy, dispels all buffs on the target, and converts that dealt DMG to a shield that lasts for 2 rounds (cannot be dispelled).
value: 驅散一名敵人所有有益狀態，造成600%的物理傷害，並將造成傷害的100%轉化為自身護盾，護盾持續2回合（不可驅散）

name: When the bearer of [Judgment] is defeated, the enemy who defeated her becomes the target. Reduces the target’s ATK by extra 5%.
value: 擁有【審判】狀態的女神被擊殺時額外使擊殺者的攻擊力降低5%

name: All allies receive a extra shield equal to 200% of Horus's ATK that lasts for 2 rounds (cannot be dispelled).
value: 額外使全體友方女神獲得荷魯斯攻擊力200%的護盾，護盾持續2回合（不可驅散）

name: When entering the battle, bestows [Vengeance] to all allies (cannot be dispelled). When [Vengeance] is triggered, increases all allies' ATK and DEF by 40% of Horus's current ATK and DEF for 4 rounds (each angel can only trigger this effect once; cannot be dispelled; cannot stack).\n[Vengeance]: When receiving fatal damage, the bearer continues to act in the state of a soul (doesn't count as killed), remaining 1 HP (cannot be healed afterward). At the same time, she receives a shield equal to 1000% of Horus's Max ATK (cannot be dispelled; the shield cannot exceed twice the Max HP of Horus).
value: 進入戰鬥時，使我方全體女神獲得【復仇】狀態（不可驅散），擁有該狀態的女神死亡時，會進入靈魂狀態，保留1點生命值且無法再恢復生命值，同時獲得荷魯斯1000%最大攻擊力的護盾（無法驅散，護盾最大不超過荷魯斯最大生命值的2倍），然後使全體友方女神提升荷魯斯當前攻擊力40%的攻擊力、荷魯斯當前防禦40%的防禦，持續4回合（無法驅散，不可疊加），該效果每名女神只能觸發一次。（靈魂狀態死亡後才視為被擊殺）

name: When defeated, decreases the target's ATK by 15% of Horus's Max ATK.
value: 被擊殺時使擊殺者攻擊力降低荷魯斯最大攻擊力的15%

name: ATK reduced by 15% of Horus's ATK
value: 攻擊力降低荷魯斯攻擊力的15%

name: When defeated, decreases the target's ATK by 20% of Horus's Max ATK.
value: 被擊殺時使擊殺者攻擊力降低荷魯斯最大攻擊力的20%

name: ATK reduced by 20% of Horus's ATK
value: 攻擊力降低荷魯斯攻擊力的20%

name: When defeated, decreases the target's ATK by 15% of Horus's Max ATK and 5% of the target's current ATK.
value: 被擊殺時使擊殺者攻擊力降低荷魯斯最大攻擊力的15%和自身攻擊力的5%

name: ATK reduced by 15% of Horus's ATK and 5% of self ATK
value: 攻擊力降低荷魯斯攻擊力的15%和自身攻擊力5%

name: When defeated, decreases the target's ATK by 20% of Horus's Max ATK and 5% of the target's current ATK.
value: 被擊殺時使擊殺者攻擊力降低荷魯斯最大攻擊力的20%和自身攻擊力的5%

name: ATK reduced by 20% of Horus's ATK and 5% of self ATK
value: 攻擊力降低荷魯斯攻擊力的20%和自身攻擊力的5%

name: When defeated, enters the soul state.(Neutral Status)
value: 死亡時，會進入靈魂狀態（絕對狀態）

name: Bakery  Limited Avatar Frame (exprie after 7 days)
value: 烘培屋限時頭像框，持續時間7天

name: DRIFTING_DUNGEON_DEFEAT_TIPS
value: 挑戰失敗，是否要向好友求助？

name: Are you Pandora?
value: 請問你是潘朵拉女士嗎？

name: Yeah, who are you? Based on how you're dressed, I'd say you're from the East.
value: 猜對啦！倒是你……從外表看來，是東方人吧？讓我來看看你的真名……

name: Hmm... If my guess is right, you are Sim Cheong, the Korean peasant girl turned empress from Korean folklore. What do you want from me?
value: 嗯……如果我沒猜錯的話，你是大韓的沈青兒？來找我這名災厄的掌控者，所為何事？

name: My people have contracted a disease that accelerates aging. I have searched everywhere for a cure, but nothing works.
value: 我的子民們得了一種加速衰老的病，我到處找醫治的方法，但都沒效果。

name: I heard that you can help people fulfill their wishes, so I… came to ask for your help.
value: 我聽人說，你可以幫人實現願望，所以我……想來找你幫幫忙。

name: I'm not a genie, so how could I possibly grant people's wishes? Besides, my help comes at a price.
value: 我又不是聖誕老人，怎麼可能幫人實現願望？何況，找我幫忙可都是需要代價的。

name: For the sake of my people, I am willing to pay any price!
value: 為了大韓的子民，我願意付出任何代價！

name: I admire your selfless nature and your willingness to sacrifice for the sake of others. You are certainly worthy of my help.
value: 喔！你身上的珍貴之物可真不少……確實值得我幫你解決這個麻煩。

name: However, the dream realm is a dangerous place and what happens here affects your body in the waking realm. Are you strong enough to handle it?
value: 然而夢境領域可不是遊樂場，裡面充滿了各種危險，你的實力能應對嗎？

name: Unfortunately, I… am not very good at fighting.
value: 很遺憾，我……並不太擅長打架。

name: How about a little test then? Don't worry, I will hold back.
value: 看來你需要個小小的測試呢，不過放心吧，我會留一手的。

name: Ouch… Are you sure you… are not very good at fighting?
value: 哎喲……你確定自己……不怎麼會打架？

name: Uh… I may have been a bit too heavy-handed. I'm really sorry. I didn't mean to hurt you.
value: 呃……我可能下手有些不知道輕重，請千萬不要見怪……

name: You know... your greatest strength seems to be your shields, so maybe we should find you a few companions. That way you can focus on supporting them while they do the fighting.
value: 不過你的能力，大多數都傾向于和同伴的配合，或許我們應該去找幾個幫手……

name: And I have two in mind who would be perfect!
value: 嗯，我想到兩個合適的同伴了！

name: Ungnyeo, come out! We need your help.
value: 熊女，快出來！我們需要你的説明。

name: Again?! But this dream world is so dangerous. I really don't want to do this again.
value: 哎？！又要幫忙啊，可我不想再去那些危險的夢境裡了。

name: Last time, we stumbled into a nightmare, and I got beaten up. I don't trust you anymore.
value: 上次闖入其他夢境時，被壞傢伙們揍得夠嗆，我再也不會相信你了。

name: Don't worry. Didn't you notice my companion? It's Sim Cheong! She's very reliable.
value: 安心啦，這次的同伴我想你不會陌生，是個很可靠的人。

name: Sim Cheong...? Hmm that name sounds vaguely familiar, but I can't quite place it.
value: Sim Cheong...? Hmm that name sounds vaguely familiar, but I can't quite place it.

name: Maybe a good bop on the head will awaken your memories, you sluggish, grumpy bear.
value: 看來只有打一架才能讓你的熊腦袋開開竅啦。

name: No more fighting. I yield! How is your shield so strong?
value: 不打了不打了，認輸了！我可沒想到會直接面對如此銅牆鐵壁般的防守。

name: Instead of offense, I channel everything into protecting my companions. ... By the way, Ungnyeo, are you also from Korea?
value: 雖然我並不擅長進攻，但對於保護好同伴這件事，還是很有信心的……

name: Yes! So that's why I recognized your name. We come from the same place! In that case, I'll help you out this time.
value: 嗯……看在沈青兒同為大韓神明，而且實力不俗的前提下，我就幫你們一次吧。

name: Great, I'd love to have you on my team.
value: 謝謝你，一路上還請你多關照。

name: Aren't you Sim Cheong? What brings you to Pandora's realm?
value: 這不是沈青兒嗎？你怎麼會徘徊在潘朵拉的夢境裡？

name: Bari?! I didn’t expect to meet you here.
value: 巴里？！我真沒想到能在這兒遇上你。

name: Hmm... I see what you're up to, Pandora. Are you making a business out of this? Trading your help for favors?
value: 啊，我明白了，這又是你的新生意嗎，潘朵拉？

name: Hehe… You really know me well. Are you interested in helping out?
value: 呵呵……你可真瞭解我，巫女殿下，有興趣幫幫忙嗎？

name: Alright, but only for Sim Cheong's sake.
value: 這次我就勉強答應你了——不過這可是看在沈青兒的份上。

name: Really?! But don't you always demand a test of strength before agreeing to help?
value: 哎？！這就答應了？按照往日，你不是都要測試一下對方的實力才同意嗎？

name: A fight is a given. But I'll help out either way, since she is a dear friend.
value: 架是一定要打的，不過嘛，無論如何我都會幫這個忙的。

name: As for you Pandora... let's just say you owe me one.
value: 你就好好感謝我吧，潘朵拉，哼哼。

name: You may have beaten me, but even together, we won't stand a chance against the powerful gods we'll encounter here. Our party needs more strength.
value: 雖然我輸了，但你們得承認，以目前的團隊實力來看，我們還很難對抗強大的神明。

name: That’s exactly what I’m worried about. The road ahead won't be easy.
value: 這也正是我所擔心的，接下來的路可能不太好走。

name: I believe that as long as we stick together, we can overcome any trouble.
value: 我相信只要團結，就能克服任何麻煩。

name: You are right, my dear. But we should still take steps to prepare.
Fortunately, I have a plan. And it involves a formidable dragon.
value: 幸好，還有個備用方案——我認識一個強悍的大傢伙。

name: You mean… Storm Dragon? Our journey would be much easier with her on our team. That is, if you can actually convince her to help.
value: 你是說……她？如果你真能說服她來幫忙，那我們的旅途將會順利很多。

name: There she is. Let me go talk to her. We used to know each other back when she lived in Asia, before she moved to the Norse realm.
value: 她以前曾在東方呆過很長時間，後來留在了北歐神域，讓我去和她聊聊吧……

name: Bari, long time no see… Who is this young lady?
value: 巴里，幾千年未見了……這位年輕姑娘是？

name: This is Sim Cheong, the rising star of the Eastern gods. Her people are in trouble, and I plan to take her to the Kunlun Dreamland to seek Xiwangmu’s help.
value: 沈青兒，東方眾神中的新星，她的子民有難，而我打算帶她去昆侖夢境，找西王母碰碰運氣。

name: I see. So you want me to join you in escorting her?
value: 我明白了，你們想要我加入你們，一同護送她吧？

name: I can help you, but first… Sim Cheong, I need to test you.
value: 我可以幫你們，但是……沈青兒，我需要測試你。

name: What do you want me to do?
I want to see if you have enough determination to weather my storm.
value: 直面我的風暴，讓我看看你的決心。

name: Nothing you can unleash will break my will.
Despite your feeble frame, your will is surprisingly strong.
value: 雖然你實力有限，但意志出奇地堅韌……你值得擁有拯救子民的榮耀。

name: I will protect you on your journey and clear the way for you.
value: 我會在接下來的旅途中保護你，為你披荊斬棘。

name: It seems that Xiwangmu was right. You are indeed here.
value: 看來西王母猜得沒錯，你們果然在這兒。

name: She is the fire goddess Zhu Rong. I’m not surprised to see her in the Kunlun Dreamland.
value: 火神祝融，在昆侖神域的夢境裡見到她我可一點也不意外。

name: Xiwangmu has an elixir that can cure all diseases, but she does not give it to just anyone.
value: 西王母手上有能夠治癒萬疾的仙藥，但從不輕易給予他人。

name: How selfish! Are you here to stop us?
value: 真糟糕，你不會是來阻止我們的吧？

name: On the contrary, I’m a kind-hearted person. First you must pass my test, to prove that your journey won't be a waste of time.
value: 恰恰相反，我是個熱心腸，如果你們連我這關都過不了，不如趁早回去，能省不少力氣。

name: And if you do beat me, I will lend you my aid.
value: 而如果你們能勝我，我就會在接下來的旅程中幫助你們。

name: I will save my people, no matter what difficulties I must face.
value: 我會拯救我的子民，無論遇到什麼樣的困難。

name: Then let's do this. Your people can't wait forever.
value: 那就上吧，時間可沒多少能浪費了。

name: Enough, enough. I think we can stop right here.
value: 夠了夠了，再打我就要“過熱”了。

name: Xiwangmu asked me to meet you here and help you just in case you ran into trouble on the road. There are thieves roaming about.
value: 西王母托我在這裡接應你們，以防你們被某些盜藥的傢伙盯上。

name: Huh? So you weren’t here to test us?
value: 誒？原來你不是來考驗我們的嗎？

name: I wanted to see what was so special about you, that made Xiwangmu want to help you.
value: 哼，和你們打一場只是餐後活動而已。

name: So what are the thieves after? Do they dare try to steal the medicine in Kunlun realm?
value: 昆侖神域居然還有人敢偷藥？

name: Unfortunately, they've already succeeded not too long ago. But let's not talk about that now.
value: 非常遺憾，不久前還真有人得手了……也罷，不談這些了。

name: First, I need to focus on escorting you to the peak of Kunlun realm.
value: 接下來，就由我護送你們前往昆侖神域的頂峰吧。

name: Chang’e? What are you doing here?
Me? I’m here on Xiwangmu’s orders, to test those who come for the medicine.
value: 我？我當然是受命於西王母，在這裡等著考驗前來問藥之人的。

name: What a hassle… You Eastern Gods do like testing everyone, don't you?
value: 真麻煩……東方眾神的考驗，未免太多了點吧。

name: Why are you looking at me? I was just joking before, I didn’t really intend to stop you.
value: 你們看著我幹什麼？我先前只是開個玩笑，可沒真打算阻攔你們。

name: She may have been joking, but I'm not. Let's see if you're worthy of this special medicine.
Stop, stop! You have passed the test.
value: 停手停手！真是一群暴力的傢伙……你們通過測試了。

name: Then please lead the way to Xiwangmu. We must see her urgently.
value: 那就請您為我們帶路吧。

name: I see them. Do you need my help?
value: 知道了，需要我的幫忙嗎？

name: No, I can deal with them on my own.
value: 不用，這將會是一場公平的較量。

name: Lady Himiko? Princess Kaguya? What are you doing here?
value: 喲，這不是卑彌呼大人和輝夜閣下嗎？你們出現在這裡，難道是……

name: The same reason as you. We need the medicine of Kunlun.
value: 我們在此的理由和你一樣，也是為仙藥而來，但我們之間必須決一勝負。

name: Why are you trying to stop us?
From what I know, the medicine is very difficult to make, and thieves stole the last batch. We were here first, and we need the medicine more than you. The next one is ours!
value: 據我所知，這種珍貴的仙藥需經過幾千年的煉製，世間僅存一份。

name: Wait! We can settle this another way.
value: 等等！就沒有別的辦法嗎？

name: I can't hold out any longer. Kaguya, I need your help!
value: 呼……我失敗了，輝夜，拜託你了……

name: I won’t let down you down!
value: 我一定不會辜負日出之國的人民。

name: Now you'll face me!
value: 接下來，我將成為你們的對手！

name: Princess Kaguya, please don’t push yourself too hard.
value: 輝夜小姐，請不要勉強自己。

name: I must get the elixir, or else the whole heavenly realm will face destruction.
value: 對不起，仙藥我必須要得到，不然整個高天原，都將徹底迎來毀滅。

name: So... Come on!
value: ……不管怎麼樣，我一定要試試，來吧！

name: *Cough cough* Has fate abandoned the gods of Yamato…?
value: 咳咳……命運已經放棄大和眾神了嗎……

name: Isn’t there a way to make everyone happy? I don’t want to see anyone suffer…
value: 就沒有兩全其美的辦法嗎？我不想看到衰亡降臨在任何人身上……

name: I’m willing to pay any price to save more lives, even if it means sacrificing myself.
value: 如果能讓更多的生命得救，讓我付出什麼樣的代價都行，哪怕犧牲自己。

name: Cheong, I don't think that's an option...
value: Cheong, I don't think that's an option...

name: You have a kind heart, Sim Cheong. I am very pleased.
value: 沈青兒，你有這樣的仁慈之心，我非常欣慰。

name: There’s no need for more words. Follow me.
value: 話不用多說了，你們跟我來吧。

name: Sim Cheong, if you want the elixir, you must pass the final test.
value: 沈青兒，如果你想尋求仙藥，那麼接下來必須通過最終的考驗。

name: You just said that you are willing to sacrifice yourself for the elixir. Is that true?
value: 你剛剛說，為了求藥願意犧牲自己，是真的嗎？

name: I know it's hard, but yes. For the sake of all living beings, I am willing to do it.
value: 我明白這很難，但……但為了眾生，我願意這樣。

name: Well then listen closely. To make the elixir, a goddess must pour all of her divinity into it. In doing so, she must face her inner self. Even I have nearly lost myself in this process a few times.
value: 這藥需要以神明的靈魂做為素材才能發揮效果，這意味著測試者需要面對另一個自己。

name: If you surrender to fear, you will either lose your divinity or die. That is why the elixir is so rare and difficult to make. Are you prepared to take this risk?
value: 而在面對自己時一旦因恐懼而放棄，輕則喪失神格，重則一命嗚呼，你可有此覺悟？

name: Alright. Once you pour your divinity into this, a phantom of yourself will be summoned into this Dreamland. You must fight until one of you is completely destroyed…
value: 這夢境會召喚你的幻影，她將與你戰鬥直至一方被徹底消滅……

name: ...If you succeed, the phantom will be used to activate the elixir instead of your soul.
value: ……你如能成功，幻影將替代你的靈魂，作為啟動仙藥的素材。

name: Let's do this. For the sake of my people, I will not have any fear!
Yes. You put your life on the line and you succeeded.
value: 雖然生死一線，但你成功了。

name: This elixir can remedy any disease. Take it and go back to heal your people.
value: 這份仙藥已經能夠消除一切衰亡之災，帶著它回去救治你的子民吧。

name: Wait, does this mean that the people of Yamato…
value: 等等，這是否意味著大和的眾生……

name: I’m sorry, but there is only one elixir…
value: 非常遺憾，仙藥只有一份……

name: I value all lives equally. I... don't want to see others suffer. Is there not another way?
value: 天下生命沒有貴賤之別，我……不願意看到其他人遭受苦難，有什麼辦法嗎？

name: Yamato is suffering due to the curse of Izanami, the goddess of the underworld.
value: 高天原所遭受的衰亡之災，源於黃泉之神伊邪那美的詛咒。

name: If she is willing to dispel the curse, then the elixir is not necessary. But Izanami... She is much more powerful than me or any other gods you have met.
value: 倘若她願意讓詛咒停止，那麼仙藥也並非必須，但你知道面對她的代價嗎？

name: I’m sorry, Kaguya… I can’t sacrifice myself here. My people need me.
value: 抱歉，輝夜……我不能在此犧牲，這個代價或許太過沉重。

name: Don’t blame yourself. This is not your duty.
value: 不用過於自責，我們也需要面對這份命運。

name: We will not forget your good intentions.
value: 大和眾神也會堅定地完成自己的使命，就如你一樣。

name: Sim Cheong, I will help you open the portal to leave the dream. Go and save your people. There’s not much time left…
value: 沈青兒，我將幫你打開離開夢境的傳送門，去拯救你的子民吧，時間不多了……

name: I understand. Even if I have to risk falling into the underworld, I will face her!
value: 我明白，即便是靈魂墜落黃泉，我也會面對她！

name: I will connect to Izanami’s dream, but I can’t guarantee what will happen next.
value: 我將連接伊邪那美的夢境，但之後會發生什麼我就不敢保證了。

name: Kind girl, may the light of Amaterasu bless you. Be careful…
value: 仁慈的少女，願天照大神的光芒賜福於你，一切請小心……

name: Kaguya, I already know why you have come...
value: 輝夜，我已知曉你們到來的意圖……

name: Lady Izanami, whatever the reason for your curse, I beg you to lift it.
value: 伊邪那美閣下，無論是何原因，我懇請您收回對高天原的詛咒。

name: Souls decay, morality fades, and all life returns to the underworld in the end.
value: 我感受到靈魂在腐朽，道義在消逝，生命將終歸黃泉……

name: I’m just making it happen sooner.
value: 我不過是讓這一切早些到來而已。

name: No, everything happens in its own time. Fate is not yours to control.
value: 不，萬事萬物都遵循自然之法，他們命運還沒有結束。

name: Outsider... Who are you to question me?
value: 異邦的少女……你說得不錯，但強存弱死也是自然法則的一環。

name: As ruler of the underworld, I have absolute authority over all lives.
value: 作為黃泉之主，我有義務踐行此理。

name: Then as a guardian of life, I will stop you!
value: 那麼身為生命的守護者，我也將與眾神一同阻止您……

name: Big words for such a weak little girl. You don't stand a chance! But if by some miracle you win, I will lift my curse.
value: 有趣……如果你們在戰鬥中勝過我，我便收回詛咒。

name: And if you fail, I will take your soul. Do you still dare to oppose me?
value: 但如果你們失敗了，我便取走你們所有人的靈魂，如何？

name: I'm not afraid of you. This ends now!
value: 我們準備好了，請開始吧……

name: What a surprise. Defeated by such weakling...
value: 呵呵……真是意外，沒想到我最終會輸給你們……

name: You didn’t use your full strength. I can feel it…
value: 您並沒有使出全力，我可以感覺到……

name: Hmph… Maybe fate is on your side today. I will keep my promise and remove the curse.
value: 哼……或許命運今天站在你們一邊吧，我會遵守約定，消除所有的詛咒。

name: Finally... The suffering will end for the people of Yamato!
As for you, outsider, I will keep my eye on you in the future.
value: 至於你……異邦的少女，我會在未來好好留意你的。

name: A soul as pure as yours will surely be delicious. I look forward to the day we meet again, in the underworld, little girl.
value: 因為我對你純潔的靈魂很感興趣，我期待在黃泉與你相見的那天，呵呵……

name: Used to upgrade the level of the Memoria Orb in Sim Cheong's Dreamland
value: 用於提升沈青兒的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Sim Cheong’s Shard Optional Box
value: 沈青兒女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the box and choose Sim Cheong's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇沈青兒任意品質的碎片

name: Increases DMG, DEF and Crit by 60%, Crit DMG by 40% for 3 rounds
value: 3回合傷害、防禦力、暴擊值增加60%，暴傷增加40%

name: Bakery Limited Avatar Frame (exprie after 7 days)
value: 烘焙屋限時頭像框，持續時間7天

name: When entering battle, bestows all allies a shield equal to 30% of Sim Cheong's current HP that lasts for 2 rounds and 3 layers of [Lotus Barrier] (both effects cannot be dispelled).\n\n[Lotus Barrier]: When receiving a critical hit, each layer of [Lotus Barrier] reduces received DMG by 10%. At the beginning of her turn, she loses one layer of [Lotus Barrier], dispelling one debuff on herself.
value: 進入戰鬥時，使全體友方女神獲得沈青兒當前生命值30%的護盾（無法驅散，持續2回合）和3層【蓮華】（無法驅散）。每層【蓮華】使女神受到暴擊時的傷害額外降低10%，每回合輪到女神行動時失去1層【蓮華】同時驅散自身1個負面狀態

name: Challenge failed. Do you want to ask for help from your friends?
value: 挑戰失敗，是否要向好友求助？

name: When receiving a critical hit, reduces received DMG by 10%(Neutral Status)
value: 受到暴擊時的傷害額外降低10%（絕對狀態）

name: When receiving a critical hit, reduces received DMG by 20%
value: 受到的暴擊時的傷害額外降低20%

name: Oh no! It seems trouble has come knocking at my door.
value: 壞了，好像有什麼麻煩精找上門來了，我得趕緊開溜。

name: I, um... I was speaking about myself. Definitely not you... So why are you here?
value: 沒事，我說自己呢……你來找我有什麼事情嗎？

name: It's a disaster! Someone stole the moon!
value: It's a disaster! Someone stole the moon!

name: Did you say the MOON was stolen? That... is quite bad.
value: 月亮被人偷走了？那……好像挺嚴重的樣子啊，會有什麼危害嗎？

name: Without the moon, the tides won't change and people will suffer.
value: 我的家沒啦！人們也不能賞月了，海水不會漲潮了，依賴月亮生存的動物也會受到影響！

name: Do you have any clue how this happened?
I wouldn't be here if I did. That's why I need your help.
value: 有線索了人家才不會來找你呢。

name: Well, if you want my help traversing the dreamland, you must pass my test.
value: 說得我好像是什麼邪神似的……好了，按照規則，對夢境有所求者，必須通過我的考驗。

name: Perfect. It gives me a chance to try out the new tricks Xiwangmu taught me.
value: 好呀好呀，我最近在王母娘娘那學了幾個新招，正愁找不到人試試手。

name: ...Are you suggesting that I'm nothing more than a punching bag?
Okay okay, stop. Get your bunny off my head! It's making a nest in my hair.
value: 好了好了，停手，讓你的兔子從我頭上離開，弄亂了我的髮型！

name: Let's see. I will use divination to find out what happened.
value: 我需要占卜一下來確認月亮的大致去向。

name: ...I saw a huge black shadow swallowing the moon.
value: ……我看到一隻巨大的黑影將它吞了下去。

name: It's a big black dog from Chinese legends, which swallows shiny things.
value: 它是華夏傳說中巨大的黑狗，可以吞掉一切發光的東西。

name: What does it look like? Just a big dog?
value: 它長什麼樣子？就是一條巨大的狗嗎？

name: I haven't seen it myself. I've only heard about it.
value: 我也沒見過……都只是聽說的。

name: We should ask the knowledgable Yamato gods. Maybe they know more.
value: 大和神族對天狗的紀錄倒是挺多的，我看要不去問問她們。

name: Long time no see, Princess Kaguya.
It's Chang'e. What happened to your eyes?
value: 我是嫦娥啊，你的眼睛怎麼回事？怎麼灰濛濛的？

name: I can't see anything... Not the moon, nor you.
value: 我，什麼也看不到……看不到月光，也看不到你。

name: This must be because of the moon's disappearance.
value: 恐怕是因為月亮消失的原因，讓她暫時性的失明了。

name: I-... ah. Oh no! The moon demon inside me is waking up. Get away from me quickly!
value: 我……啊！月亮消失了，我內心的月魔要蘇醒了！你們……你們快離開這裡！

name: Calm down, there's no such thing as a moon demon. It's just another side of you, like the dark side of the moon.
value: 不用害怕，那種東西不存在的哦，只是你內心另一面而已，就像月亮暗面一樣。

name: No... I can't control it anymore...
value: No... I can't control it anymore...

name: Then release it. We will defeat it to save you.
value: 那就釋放它吧，我們會拯救你。

name: Thank you. I feel better now.
value: 謝謝你們，我感覺好多了。

name: It seems the moon's disappearance really is affecting people.
value: 看來月亮的消失確實對很多人造成了影響。

name: Princess Kaguya, your inner demon isn't gone. Without the moon, it will keep appearing.
value: 輝夜妹妹，你的心魔並沒有完全除去，月亮消失的越久，心魔就會出現的越頻繁。

name: Why don't you join us to get the moon back?
value: 不如跟我們一起去把月亮找回來，這樣你就不用忍受心智被剝奪的痛苦了。

name: Of course I will join you!
value: 我願意加入你們，一起追回月亮！

name: I hate to burst your bubble, but the two of you would be nothing more than a snack for that Dog.
value: 不是我有意諷刺，就你們倆，恐怕還不夠那個“天狗”塞牙縫的。

name: Me? I'm running at the first sign of danger.
value: 我？要是太過危險，我肯定第一個跑。

name: If you want to stand a chance, you need someone stronger.
value: 你得找個更厲害的傢伙當靠山。

name: In that case, I know someone who might help.
value: 這麼說得話，我倒是想到有個人會幫我。

name: Fire Goddess Zhu Rong! She's the Chinese Goddess of War. And most importantly, she owes me a favor.
value: 火神祝融！她可是華夏神族鼎鼎有名的戰神！最主要的是，她還欠我一頓飯！

name: Well if you're confident you can convince her, I will take you to her.
value: 這麼說你是有把握說服她來幫我們咯？那麼走吧，我帶你們去見她。

name: Here we are. I brought you to Zhu Rong. The rest is up to you.
value: 好了，咱們到了，剩下的就得靠你自己爭取了。

name: You were looking for me?
value: 諸位來找在下，所為何事？

name: Please help! The moon has disappeared!
The moon disappeared? What happened?
value: 月亮不見了？這是怎麼回事？

name: It was swallowed by the legendary Heavenly Dog. Please help me get it back.
value: 那只傳說中的天狗把月亮給吞掉了！請你幫幫我，一起去把它追回來。

name: I see, but... I have an appointment for a duel, so I can't come with you.
value: 我明白了，不過我這會和人約了決鬥呢，恐怕不能幫你。

name: A duel? Why?
value: 決鬥？為什麼要決鬥？和誰？

name: Ugh, because I'm bored. I've been itching for a fight.
value: 哎呀就是閑著無聊，想找人打一架。

name: You? Hah!
value: 什麼？就你？別開玩笑了吧。

name: Don't underestimate me and my allies.
value: 人家可是很厲害的，而且人家還有兩個幫手哦。

name: I guess I could do with a warm-up.
value: 好吧好吧，就當正式比試前的熱身。

name: Not bad. You've improved.
value: 誒，不錯嘛，你這幾下子是誰教你的？

name: Xiwangmu has been teaching me.
value: 嘻嘻，不告訴你！好啦，是王母娘娘教我的。

name: Xiwangmu has taught you some interesting moves. When I return, I'll ask her to teach me, too.
value: 娘娘真偏心，等回去了我也要讓她教我。

name: So are you willing to look for the moon with me now?
value: 那你現在願意和我一起追月亮了嗎？

name: Well since gave me a satisfying fight, I wouldn't mind stretching my legs a bit... I'm in.
value: 好吧，反正這一架也讓我稍微有點滿足了，就陪你去逛逛吧。

name: So where to next? Princess Kaguya, what do you know about the Heavenly Dog?
value: 那麼接下來去哪？輝夜姬，你知道關於天狗的事情嗎？

name: Not much. But I can take you to someone who is well-versed in this kind of thing.
value: 我知道的不多，但是我認識一個人是這方面的專家，我可以帶你們去她那看看。

name: What a beautiful shrine. There must be a powerful priestess living here.
value: 好漂亮的神社啊，這裡一定住著一位法力強大的巫女。

name: Sorry, the shrine is closed today. If you're looking for a fortune telling, please come back another day.
value: 抱歉各位，神社今日閉館了，如果想要求籤的話還請改日再來。

name: Amaterasu, we've come for your help.
value: 巫女，我們是來尋求幫助的。

name: Princess Kaguya? I'm sorry, I didn't realize it was you.
value: 輝夜公主？抱歉，我剛剛看走眼了，還以為你們是普通的客人。

name: What do you need my help with?
value: 那麼究竟是什麼事情需要我的説明呢？

name: The moon was swallowed by the Heavenly Dog.
value: 我們遇到一件很麻煩的事：月亮被天狗給吞下去了。

name: You mean the Heavenly Dog from Chinese legends? The one which devours the sun and moon?
value: 天狗？您說的應該是華夏傳說裡的吞噬日月的天狗吧。

name: Although I have only dabbled a bit in divination, let me try find it for you.
value: 我對這個只是略有涉獵，我需要占卜一下。

name: I can see... a black beast... but it's too shadowy to make out...
value: 我看到一頭黑色的野獸……但我看不清它的面貌……

name: Wait, don't touch her! She's been possessed by something...
Hmph. I came to get a look at who would dare to spy on me.
value: 哼哼，我倒要好好看看，是誰妄想用占卜來監視我的尊身！

name: And who do I find, but Pandora. Are you helping lost children find their way again?
value: 這不是潘朵拉嘛，怎麼著，又在幹幫小狗狗找媽媽的活呢。

name: You have me at a disadvantage. You know me, but I don't know you. Why don't you reveal yourself?
value: 看來你認識我，那想必我也認識你咯。不如現身來見我吧，別躲躲藏藏的了。

name: Haha that's too boring! Instead I'm going to destroy you all using this body.
value: 啊哈哈哈，那多沒趣啊，我要用這副軀殼將你們都打趴下了，再考慮這個提議。

name: Stop! She's regained her sanity.
value: 別打了！她已經恢復神智了！

name: Ouch. What happened? And why do I feel like I was beaten up?
value: ……我剛剛怎麼了？身體好痛，好像被人打過……

name: Well... Someone sneaky took over your body and we had no choice but to fight you. No choice at all...
value: 抱歉，剛剛有個鬼鬼祟祟的傢伙附上你的身，我們被迫把它打走了，對，被迫……

name: I saw a huge beast. I don't know how to describe it. But I did see cats surrounding it.
value: 我看到了一隻巨大的野獸，它的樣子很難描述……我看到它身邊有一群貓。

name: Cats? Could it be... Nekomata? But she's too cute to do such a thing.
value: 貓？難道是……貓又？不可能，她那麼可愛，怎麼會做出這種事情呢？何況她沒有那種力量。

name: Let's go ask her ourselves.
value: 不如我們先去找她問問？

name: A-meow-zing! This is so delicious.
value: 嘿喵嘿喵，真好吃，這可比小魚幹好吃啊喵！

name: It's even better than dried fish. It was worth it to exchange all the offerings for this!
value: 我決定，得空了再去整點……唔，最好下個月的供奉都拿來換這個吃！

name: What are you eating? Bad kitty! Give it here.
value: 啊！你在吃什麼？快把它放下！

name: You're stealing meow food! Hiss! I won't let you!
value: 什麼啊喵，又有人和本喵搶吃的喵！看本喵不痛扁你喵！

name: Ow! Stop hitting meow! Here, here, you can have some.
value: 別打了別打了喵！好吃的給你們，都給你們！喵！

name: Wait what's this!? This isn't the moon!
What meow-n? This is octopus balls!
value: 什麼月亮啊喵，這是章魚小丸子！

name: Octopus balls! Food! Meow food!
value: 章魚小丸子！是食物啊喵！

name: How cute! She's protecting her food. I just wanna hug her, she's so cute!
value: 她好像在護食……真可愛！好想抱一抱啊！

name: No hugging! Um... but you can pet meow head. Purr~fect.
value: 你別過來啊喵！本喵不要被抱……唔，唔，只准摸本喵的頭哦……呼嚕呼嚕。

name: Stealing meow food was claw-ful, but I will forgive you since you petted meow head.
value: 雖然貓口奪食可惡，但看你們誠心服侍本喵的情況下就原諒你們了喵。

name: Why were you looking for meow?
value: 所以你們來找本喵到底是為了什麼事情？

name: We're looking for a big black dog that swallowed the moon.
value: 是這樣的，月亮被一隻大狗樣子的怪物給吞下去了！

name: ...I know I have a tail and ears, but you do realize that I'm a cat, right?
value: 本喵不明白，月亮被狗吃了你們倒是去找狗啊，來找本喵這只貓幹什麼喵？

name: Well a divination revealed cats surrounding it.
value: 話是這麼說，但我們在它身邊看到了貓，所以就想來問問你。

name: That's no reason to grab meow food.
value: 那沒必要搶本喵吃的吧……

name: Hmm. I was with Ungnyeo earlier. She looks like a dog and has a big appetite.
value: 話說本喵前不久一直和熊女在一塊，她長得倒是挺像狗的，胃口也那麼大。

name: We gotta follow any and every clue. Lead the way, kitty.
value: 任何線索都不能放過，那就麻煩小貓貓給我們帶帶路吧！

name: Hum~hum~ Such a lovely day today. Little bees~ Come out, come out, wherever you are.
value: 哼~哼~哼！今天又是好天氣呀，小蜜蜂在哪裡啊，在~哪~裡？

name: Huh!? Why are so many people here? Maybe...to steal my honey!?
value: 咦，來了群人，該不會是來搶蜂蜜的吧？

name: No! I won't let them! I'll run away.
value: 嚇！是她們！我得趕緊開溜了！

name: Wah! Why are you chasing me?
value: 嗚嗚嗚……你們為什麼要追我？

name: Why are you running?
value: 那你為什麼一看見我們就跑呀？

name: You all look scary. I thought you wanted to steal my honey. And Pandora always brings trouble.
value: 你們一臉氣勢洶洶，我以為是要搶我的蜂蜜……而且還有潘朵拉，每次見到她都沒好事。

name: She looks more like a bear than a dog. Unless the moon is honey, I don't think she's the one who ate it.
value: 她這副熊樣，我看不像是能偷月亮的傢伙……你們怎麼看？

name: Indeed. She doesn't look like a scary beast. She's actually really fluffy and cute!
value: 呃，確實，她看起來一點都不凶……即便顯出真身的時候，也還是呆萌呆萌的樣子。

name: Steal the moon? Steal what moon?
The moon was swallowed by the Heavenly Dog. But none of us have seen it before, so...
value: 月亮被天狗吞下了，但是我們都沒見過天狗的樣子，所以才錯把你當成了那個壞蛋。

name: I am a bear, not a dog.
value: 我是熊，又不是狗，雖然以前也有人叫我狗熊來著……

name: If anyone could swallow the moon, it would be dragons! Only they have such a big appetite.
value: 如果世界上有能吞下月亮的傢伙，我覺得應該會是龍族！只有她們才有那麼大的胃口。

name: But aren't we looking for a dog? A bear looks a bit like a dog, but a dragon looks nothing like it.
value: 說得好像也對誒，但是天狗不是狗嘛？熊看起來還挺像狗，但龍和狗卻毫無相似點啊。

name: Maybe the Heavenly Dog is not actually a dog. That could just be its name.
value: 天狗也不一定是狗，說不定是一種指代呢？就像大和神族的天狗神。

name: Hmm. That is sound logic. Then let's go find ourselves a dragon!
value: 唔，也有道理，那我們就去找龍吧！

name: We're now in the hunting grounds of Storm Dragon. Will we really be okay breaking in like this?
value: 這裡好像是風暴之龍的捕獵場，我們這樣直接闖進來真的好嗎？

name: Don't worry. Zhu Rong will protect us. Hehe.
value: 別擔心，就算被襲擊了，祝融也會保護我們的，嘻嘻。

name: I will try, but I can't guarantee anything if it gets too dangerous.
value: 可別總是指望我，要是場面太混亂了，我不一定能保證你們所有人的安全。

name: It's okay. Storm Dragon is probably sleeping.
value: 沒關係啦，說不定風暴之龍在睡覺呢！

name: I have a bad feeling about this... Watch out! Above us!
value: 我怎麼說來著？做好戰鬥準備吧，那傢伙朝我們俯衝過來了！

name: You're not my usual prey... What are you doing in my hunting grounds?
value: 你們不是我的獵物……為什麼要跑進我的獵場？

name: Sorry, Storm Dragon. We came here in search of the moon.
value: 抱歉，風暴女士，我們是來找失蹤的月亮的。

name: Yes, the moon was swallowed. And we heard from a little bear that maybe a dragon ate it.
value: 沒錯，月亮被人偷走了，有個朋友說可能是龍族把它吃掉了。

name: A dragon? Eating the moon? Haha even us dragons don't have such an appetite.
value: 龍？吃月亮？哈哈哈哈，我從來不知道誰的胃口有這麼獨特。

name: We have nothing to do with that. Maybe the moon goddess Tsukuyomi knows something.
value: 顯然月亮的消失和龍族沒有任何關係，你不如去月夜見尊那裡看看吧，說不定她知道什麼。

name: The atmosphere here is strange, it's very cold... Like moonlight on a snowy night.
value: 這裡的氣氛很不對勁，我感受到一股寒冷的力量佔據了這裡……就像是雪夜的月光。

name: I don't think she's here to have a nice chat with us.
value: 她好像……可能……看樣子是不會想和我們好好講話了。

name: Watch out! She's possessed!
value: 當心，她入魔了，準備戰鬥！

name: Thank you for bringing me back to my senses.
value: 啊……感謝你們，讓我重獲清醒。

name: Tsukuyomi, what happened to you?
value: 月夜大人，你為什麼會變成這樣？

name: Without the light of the moon, my heart was consumed by darkness.
value: 自從月亮消失後，我的內心就被一股黑暗佔據。

name: Do you know who stole the moon? Was it really the Heavenly Dog?
value: 月夜見尊，你知道是誰偷走了月亮嗎？真的是天狗作祟嗎？

name: Unfortunately I don't know, Chang'e.
value: 抱歉，嫦娥仙子，我並不知道是誰偷走了月亮。

name: But if it's a dog that swallowed the moon... maybe... Anubis?
value: 如果真的有天狗吞月的話， 恐怕只有埃及的阿努比斯神能做到這點了。

name: The Egyptian Goddess of the Underworld? But isn't she the Jackal Goddess?
Sniff sniff~ You don't smell dead. Why have the living come to see me?
value: 嗅~嗅嗅~你們好像不是亡者。既然沒死，來我這裡幹什麼？

name: Chang'e, she doesn't look like the beast I saw.
value: 嫦娥仙子，恕我直言，她長得和我占卜時看到的傢伙也不太一樣。

name: What are you mumbling about over there?
value: 你們在那裡嘀嘀咕咕什麼呢？

name: We're here to find the moon. It was swallowed by the Heavenly Dog.
value: 我們是來尋找月亮的，它被一條巨大的天狗給偷走了。

name: The Heavenly Dog? Are you saying I look like a dog? And swallowed the moon?
value: 天狗？你看我長得像是會偷月亮的狗嗎？

name: How rude!
value: 看來你們還真是無禮呢，哼！

name: I will teach you some manners.
value: 得給你們點小小得教訓。

name: I'm going to make you spit out the moon!
value: 好呀，既然要打架，那麼即便你沒有偷月亮，一會也要你吐一個出來！

name: Well? If you want to fight more, I will let the dogs out!
value: 怎麼樣，還要打嗎？我可要放狗了！

name: Alright, alright. I believe you, you didn't swallow the moon.
value: 好了好了，我相信你不是那個偷月亮的了——你身上確實沒有月亮的氣息。

name: Although I am also a canine, I don't eat strange things.
value: 雖然都為犬類，但我可不愛亂吃東西。

name: Well, if it's about swallowing the moon, I might know something..
value: 說到偷走月亮，我確實知道一點點消息……

name: There is someone who likes to eat things. Apep the Devourer. She even swallowed the sky of Egypt once.
value: 有個叫做阿佩普的傢伙喜歡亂吃東西，連埃及的天空都被她吞過。

name: A little while ago, she swallowed something shiny. I guess it's probably the moon.
value: 最近她好像又從哪吞了一個發光的東西，我猜，大概就是月亮吧。

name: Where can I find her?
value: 我要在哪裡能夠找到她呢？

name: Are you sure you want to face her?
value: 你確定真的要面對她嗎？

name: You have gained much strength during your journey. If she swallows you, you will be reduced to nothing.
value: 一路走來，你的力量已經有不少成長了，如果被她一口吞下，你的一切都將化為烏有。

name: As you wish. I will summon Apep.
value: 那麼如你所願了，我將召喚阿佩普。

name: O all-consuming chaos. In the name of the Guardian of the Dead, I summon you...
value: 吞噬一切的混沌啊，我以死者的庇護者之名召喚你，來到我的面前……

name: Well well, if it isn't Anubis.
value: 哎呀哎呀，原來是阿努比斯啊。

name: It's been a long time. Have you brought me another sacrifice?
value: 好久不見了呢，是又給我送祭品來了嗎？這次是狗還是鱷魚呢？

name: I don't have time for you. They are here to get back what you stole.
value: 不好意思，我可沒功夫打理你，是這幾位，來找你討要她們丟掉的東西了。

name: You! Give us back the moon!
value: 沒錯，就是你這傢伙！快把月亮還給我們！

name: Oh? Are you talking about that big shiny white ball? You'll have to beat me if you want it back.
value: 哦？你說的就是那個發光的大白球嗎？好啊？想要的話，就打敗我吧。

name: You're tougher than I thought, little girl. I'll return this ball to you. It wasn't that tasty anyway.
value: 你比我想像中的更堅韌，小姑娘。這個大白球就還給你好了，反正也沒那麼好吃。

name: Now the moon can return to the sky.
value: 太好了，這下子月亮就可以重回天際了。

name: Everyone's lives can return to normal.
value: 到時候那些以為月亮的消失而迷失的大夥們，又可以過上正常的生活了。

name: Chang'e, the power of the moon is now within you. You've become the new moon goddess.
value: 看起來你昇華了，嫦娥——月亮的力量現在與你融為一體，你將晉升為新的月神。

name: Really? Oh I feel it. I will work hard to light up the night sky for everyone!
value: 真的嗎？好像是哦……以後我將更加努力為了大家照亮黑暗中的天空！

name: Very well, I have opened the way back for you. Follow my jackal.
value: 很好，我已經為你打開了回去的路，跟著我的胡狼，你就不會迷失回去的路。

name: So many depend on the moon. I have to get it back, even if it costs me everything!
value: 月亮是我們所有人的依靠，我必須要找回它，哪怕是付出我的一切！

name: You are right. Someone who can swallow the sky is not something I can deal with. I should go back and report to Xiwangmu.
value: 你說的對，那種能夠吞下天空的傢伙不是我能對付的，我應該回去稟報王母。

name: Used to purchase items in the Miracle Shop
value: 用於神跡商店內商品的購買

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Chang'e's Dreamland
value: 用於提升嫦娥的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Open the box and choose Chang'e's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇嫦娥任意品質的碎片

name: When Chang’e attacks, deal extra True DMG equal to [2% of the target’s Max HP (the value cannot exceed Chang’e’s Max ATK) + 3% of Chang’e’s current ATK] ((The DMG [Moonlight Burst] dealt will not trigger this). When Chang’e defeats an enemy, inflicts [Moonlight Burst] on all enemies. (Enemies defeated by [Moonlight Burst] cannot trigger this effect again.)\n\n[Moonlight Burst]: Deals True DMG to all enemies equal to [the number of [Moonlight] marks * 3% of Chang’e’s current ATK].
value: 嫦娥每次攻擊時，額外附帶敵人最大生命值2%的真實傷害（傷害值不超過嫦娥最大攻擊力）和嫦娥攻擊力3%的真實傷害。 嫦娥擊殺敵人時，會立即對敵方全體造成【月光激發】，【月光激發】為嫦娥3%攻擊力*被擊殺者【月光】層數的真實傷害（【月光激發】不會觸發額外附帶傷害，且當【月光激發】擊殺敵人時不會再次造成【月光激發】）

name: What's this? A hidden tunnel? I sense lots of treasure. It calls to me from beyond the entrance.
value: 哇，沒想到這裡竟然出現了一個秘境，透過入口我感覺到有寶物在召喚我

name: Amazing! This tunnel must connect to a secret realm, maybe a long lost kingdom of the gods.
value: 真是意外呢，看來這個秘境能通往眾神的國度。

name: I am so excited! Let's go and see what we can find there!
value: 好激動好激動，我們趕緊去看看吧

name: I'm exhausted. I didn't expect this place to be so big. But look, I found these!
value: 呼呼，累死我了，沒想到這秘境裡面這麼大。不過運氣不錯，快看看我找到了什麼寶貝！

name: Wow! These seem to be miracle cards once used by the gods to record the past. Let's take them to Gods' Relics and see if we can repair them.
value: 哇，這好像是記錄眾神過往的神跡卡，我們趕緊拿到神之遺跡修復一下吧。

name: We need to collect more pieces to unleash the full power held within these miracle cards.
value: 集齊碎片就可以修復解鎖該神跡卡了啦

name: Incredible! I wasn't expecting these miracle cards to emit so much power once repaired. I can't wait to collect more of them!
value: 太不可思議了，沒想到修復後的神跡卡竟然能散發出這麼巨大的神之力。我已經迫不及待去收集更多的神跡卡了。

name: These pyramid replicas small enough to hold in one hand are made of pure gold. People often wonder if these delicate replicas were concealed inside the mummified remains of pharaohs.
value: 以純金打造的金字塔複製品，它們很小，小到只用一隻手就能拿起。如此精巧的複製品，讓人不禁產生懷疑，它的內部，是否也躺著一位法老王呢？

name: It is said that this stone mirror is made of the sacred stone Nuwa used to mend heaven. The exact positions of the sun, moon, and stars are engraved upon it, indicating that the entire universe is contained within it.
value: 據說是使用女媧補填用的神石磨出來的石鏡。石鏡中精確的刻著日月星辰的方位，仿佛宇宙間的一切，都被收入其中。

name: A dazzling, gorgeous necklace. It is said to be made of luxurious pearls, shimmering gems of the sea renowned for their beauty and rarity. Legend has it that wearing this enchanting talisman will imbue its bearer with an irresistible allure, a radiance so captivating that no man can resist her charms. The necklace was the treasure of Freyja, and she would never go anywhere without it.
value: 耀眼無比，華麗絕倫的項鍊。傳說它可能是由珍珠製成的。可以使穿戴的女性更加美麗，使男人都無法抗拒。這個項鍊是女神弗蕾亞的寶物，平時絕不離身。

name: This elaborate artifact, made from gold and gemstones, is a symbol of protection and well-being. It once belonged to the Egyptian god of kingship. Staring at it may give one the eerie feeling that it is staring back at you.
value: 埃及金字塔守護者象徵物所制的神聖收藏品，埃及王權的象徵。通體為黃金和寶石打造，凝視它時，仿佛也感到了它的回視。

name: This elusive gold cup purportedly has miraculous healing powers and the ability to grant immortality.
value: 據說是基督受刑時，用來盛放他的血液的金杯。為了向世人證明基督非神，於是將他的血液盛起來，而神是不會流血的。

name: This blessed treasure made of wood and covered in gold is said to contain sacred stone tablets. Its craftsmanship is exquisite.
value: 希伯來神話中存放摩西十誡的、最為神聖的寶物。如此精巧的工藝，到底出自和人之手，無從得知。

name: The sword, crafted from the molten lava at the heart of a volcano, was once wielded by the fire giant Surtr, who ravaged his enemies in battle on the Rainbow Bridge. Legend has it that each swing of the sword could ignite parts of the sky, leaving a trail of flames in its wake.
value: 它是由火山之心的熔岩打造出來的寶劍，火焰巨人蘇特爾曾揮舞此劍，在彩虹橋上大殺四方，據說他揮出的每一劍，都能點燃一方的天空。

name: Skidbladnir is a magnificent ship crafted by a skilled Nordic dwarf for Freyr, the god of fertility and sunlight. It is capable of carrying all the Nordic gods at once, yet it can also be folded and stored in a pocket. This divine vessel is a treasured means of transportation for the gods, carrying them into battle during the fateful Twilight of the Gods.
value: 又名“斯吉德普拉特尼”，是北歐神工匠侏儒所制，送給弗雷的一艘飛船，大可裝下所有北歐眾神，小可放至口袋中，諸神黃昏發生時搭載眾神至戰場的寶物。

name: Forged by Emperor Haotian, it was given to King Yu to support the pillar of the East Sea. It was huge and incredibly heavy, called the Divine Needle of the Settled Sea. In order to enable King Yu and other mortals to move it, the Emperor of the Skies applied a wish-fulfilling spell, which, when recited, could freely enlarge or shrink it.
value: 由昊天大帝所鑄，贈予禹王用來支撐東海的基柱，名為定海神針，巨大，且奇重無比。昊天上帝為了使禹王等凡夫俗子能夠移動，故施加”如意“咒法，念此咒，可將其自由放大縮小。

value: 用於尋寶秘境幻獸尋寶，可獲得高額的收益加成

name: An advanced item can clear the cross-shaped blocks around the target.
value: 黃沙秘寶的高級道具，能清理目標上下左右各一個地塊。

name: Mystery Points will be automatically recycled after the event ends.
value: 活動結束後自動回收秘寶積分

value: 黃沙秘寶商店兌換所需道具

value: 您在黃沙秘寶活動中排行第{0}名，獲得以下獎勵！

value: 本次黃沙秘寶活動已結束，活動道具已自動回收成鑽石！

value: 集齊50個花火大會碎片可以合成花火大會

name: Collect 50 Carp Jump to Dragonhood pieces to synthesize the Carp Jumping to Dragon Door Miracle Card
value: 集齊50個鯉躍龍門碎片可以合成鯉躍龍門

name: Collect 50 Nekomata Cafe pieces to synthesize the Nekomata Cafe Miracle Card
value: 集齊50個貓又咖啡屋碎片可以合成貓又咖啡屋

name: Collect 50 Good Harvest pieces to synthesize the Good Harvest Miracle Card
value: 集齊50個大豐收碎片可以合成大豐收

name: Collect 50 Ruyi Bang pieces to synthesize the Ruyi Bang Miracle Card
value: 集齊50個如意金箍棒碎片可以合成如意金箍棒

name: Collect 50 Fighting Tournament pieces to synthesize the Fighting Tournament Miracle Card
value: 集齊50個武鬥大會碎片可以合成武鬥大會

name: Bow down to me, you ants! I am the ruler of this desert!
value: 螻蟻，臣服於你們的沙漠皇帝吧！

name: Why are you gawking at me like that? Is there something on my face?
value: 你為什麼盯著人家，是我臉上有什麼嗎？

name: The world is under the protection of the valiant and holy battle angel Gabriel, who fights against evil with her mighty strength and divine blessing.
value: 英勇無畏的戰鬥天使加百利神聖庇佑著世間，以強大的戰鬥力守護正義，無惡不擊。

name: It feels like a dream, like an illusion, both real and unreal, it transports people to another world.
value: 如夢如幻，亦真亦假，讓人恍若隔世。

name: Hey, do you want a bite of my apple?
Are you brave enough to face me in a beach volleyball match!
value: 敢不敢和我來一場沙灘排球對決！

name: What a lovely night, would you like to dance with me?
value: 這麼美好的夜晚，有沒有興趣與我共舞一曲呢？

name: Oh, are you here to look after these little ones too?
value: 咦，你也是來這裡照顧這些小生命的嗎？

name: Bear girl relaxed in the hot spring, surrounded by steam and green leaves, her face showed happiness, enjoying this calm and cozy time.
value: 熊女在溫泉邊輕鬆地泡著，水汽彌漫，綠葉掩映，她的臉上洋溢著滿足的微笑，盡享這寧靜舒適的時光。

name: In books there are houses of gold, in books there are beauties of jade. Do you agree?
value: 書中自有黃金屋，書中自有顏如玉，你說對嗎？

name: How about we go fishing together? You can catch as big as you wish with your skill.
value: 一起去釣魚嗎？以為的能力，你想釣多大的都可以哦

name: What a nice weather, let’s go surfing together, I don’t need to work on iron today.
value: 這麼好的天氣，一起去衝浪吧，今天就不打鐵了。

name: You are one of the few people in this world who can meet my gaze without flinching! I confess, you have piqued my curiosity.
value: 這世上敢如此直視我的眼睛的人可不多見呢！我承認，我開始對你有點興趣了。

name: Master, would you like to try some desserts I made?
value: 主人，要吃些我做的甜品嗎？

name: This is the best time to hunt when the cherry blossoms are in full bloom, don’t you think?
value: 這種櫻花盛開的季節最適合去狩獵了，你說呢？

name: Welcome, what can I get you…hmm? Are you looking for me?
value: 歡迎光臨，想喝點什..什麼嗎...嗯？你是來找我的？

name: Make a wish! Maybe I can make it come true.
value: 許個願吧！興許我能幫你實現呢。

name: The fireworks tonight are so splendid, just like that year.
value: 今晚的煙花真絢麗呐，就和那一年一樣。

name: I believe that as long as you work hard, everyone can achieve their dreams.
value: 我相信，只要努力，所以人都能鯉躍龍門的

name: Nice to meet you! I am a cat…cat again, nice to know you.
value: 很高興為您服務！我是貓...貓又，請多指教。

name: With such a bountiful harvest, no one will go hungry anymore.
value: 如此的大豐收，就不會有人遭受饑苦了吧

name: Come and fight me, the moves will speak for themselves!
value: 來和我決鬥吧，招式會說明一切！

name: Excess Pieces can be decomposed to shop currency
value: 神跡卡升星的溢出碎片可進行分解

name: ACTIVITY_TREASURE_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 您在黃沙秘寶活動中排行第{0}名，獲得以下獎勵！

name: ACTIVITY_TREASURE_COIN_CONTENT
value: 本次黃沙秘寶活動已結束，活動道具已自動回收成鑽石！

name: Pieces of a full-star Rare Miracle Card can be used as materials
value: 滿星的普通碎片可作為材料

name: Pieces of a full-star Epic Miracle Card can be used as materials
value: 滿星的史詩碎片可作為材料

name: Every treasure hunt gives you an opportunity to win the above rewards.
value: 每次尋寶有概率獲得以上獎勵

name: Runestones were one of the supreme treasures of the god Odin. Runes written on stone slab harbored great magic and represented natural energy. Spells were created when these runes formed words or short sentences.
value: 神王奧丁的至寶之一，刻於石板上的符文。這是一種蘊含著魔力的文字，傳說每個位元組都代表著一種自然能量，當它們組成詞語或者短句時，就能形成一個魔法。

name: This symbol of life is a cross-shaped magical object made of gold and precious stones. The gods once gifted the pharaohs with this powerful symbol.
value: 由黃金和寶石打造，象徵生命和輪回的十字型法器。它是法老王發號施令的工具，也是祭司們與亡靈溝通的聖物。

name: Gemini? This is a surprise.
value: 這不是雙子星嗎？怎麼想起來找我了？

name: Please help us. Help my sister.
value: 請你幫幫我們，幫幫我的妹妹。

name: While I was sleeping, she created chaos among the the Zodiac Signs.
value: 在我沉睡時，她引發了一場星座間的巨大混亂……

name: And then suddenly, her soul vanished from her body! She hasn't spoken a word since!
value: 接著就變成這樣了——一言不發，好像整個靈魂都被抽走了一樣。

name: From the looks of her, she seems to be in a very deep state of sleep.
value: 讓我看看……嗯，她的意識好像陷入了沉睡之中。

name: Yes, but only at a price.
value: 沒問題，不過找我幫忙可以要付出代價的……

name: To save my sister, I will pay any price you ask, Goddess of Secrets and Knowledge!
value: 我願意付出任何代價來救我的妹妹，秘密與求知的女神！

name: Hehe, I haven't heard that title in centuries. I'm in a good mood, so I'll help you.
value: 秘密與求知的女神……呵呵，這美妙的稱呼我可幾百年沒聽到了，心情不錯，就幫幫你好了！

name: However, I must first test your strength to see if you're strong enough to survive the Dreamland. It's one of my rules.
value: 不過按照規則，我需要先測試你的力量是否強大到能抵禦夢境中的危險。

name: You handle yourself well in combat, especially for someone controlling two bodies with one soul.
value: 單從戰鬥力來看，你能做到一個靈魂操縱兩個肉體，也還不賴嘛。

name: That actually pushed me to my limits.
value: 呼……這其實很勉強，已經是我的全部力量了……

name: I see. Maybe Pisces will have some insight. After all, her zodiac sign is also a twin.
value: 我知道了，同為雙生星座，我想雙魚座應該會對你的情況有所瞭解。

name: Pandora...? You must have a lot of free time to be wandering around in other people's dreams.
value: 潘朵拉……？你今天看來挺閑的，平時可沒見你有興趣到其他人的夢境裡轉悠。

name: Don't joke around. I'm actually pressed for time. My acquaintance needs your help.
value: 別開玩笑了，我時間緊得很，有個熟人來找你幫忙。

name: Gemini?! You're not welcome here after the havoc you've sown.
value: 雙子座？！對不起，我這裡不歡迎你！

name: Please, it's not what you think. There's been a misunderstanding.
value: 不，不是這樣的，你誤會了……

name: Either leave now, or I'll kick you out by force.
value: 如果你再不離開，我可就不客氣了！

name: Pandora... why are you helping her? She almost destroyed the entire Zodiac!
value: 潘朵拉……你為什麼也幫助她？她可是差一點毀掉整個黃道的傢伙！

name: I promised to help her. We made a deal. Now, will you let her finish what she was saying?
value: 抱歉了，她這次是我的委託人，能讓她把話說完嗎？

name: ...For your sake, I will listen.
value: 好吧，看在你的份上，我就聽聽她的解釋吧。

name: Pisces, what happened wasn't our intention. My sister lost control and things got out of hand.
value: 雙魚座，之前星座間的騷亂並非我們的本意，黑暗之子好像失控了，才做了過分的事情。

name: And afterwards, her body became like this. As if she'd lost her soul.
value: 而且她在離開黃道後，就變成了這樣，好像丟失了靈魂一樣。

name: My suspicion is that someone is manipulating her. Pisces, you are both twin signs. Do you have any idea what may have happened to her?
value: 我懷疑有人在背後操控她，同為雙生星座，你對她的情況有所瞭解嗎？

name: ...I am not sure. Unlike Gemini, our two souls share one body, and neither one of us has ever lost control.
value: ……不太清楚，我們的兩個靈魂共用一個身體，從來沒有遇到失控的情況。

name: But I do know someone who might have an idea. Capricorn was once the goddess Pan. She once tried to change into a fish, but got stuck as both a goat and a fish.
value: 不過我知道一個人可能對此有研究——摩羯座，她以前是名為“潘”的大神。

name: Capricorn? If she still has Pan's memories and powers, then she might be able to help.
value: 是她？如果她還擁有曾經作為潘神時候的記憶和神力的話，或許可以幫助我們。

name: Sister, it is good to see you.
This is the goddess Pandora, and these two... Well, you know them.
value: 這位是潘朵拉女神，而這兩位……你應該見過。

name: Gemini? Why do I sense a horrible aura around her?
value: 雙子？她身上有股不好的氣息……

name: You really are the most perceptive of all the Zodiac Signs. Can you see what's wrong with her?
value: 不愧是所有星座中最敏銳的一個……你看出什麼問題了嗎？

name: Her soul is stained by something, but it's too hazy to see what is causing this influence.
value: 她的的靈魂似乎沾染上了別的東西，但很朦朧，我看不清楚。

name: If I draw on my power, would that amplify the influence and allow you to see the cause more clearly?
value: 如果我激發自己的力量，是否能放大影響力，讓你看得更清楚些？

name: That would work. And the best way to do that would be through battle.
value: 這是個不錯的方法，一場戰鬥會是個好選擇。

name: The evil energy seems to be coming from the underworld.
value: The evil energy seems to be coming from the underworld.

name: The underworld? Is it Hades then? But she hasn't meddled in the affairs of the gods for a long, long time.
value: 冥界？是哈迪斯那傢伙嗎？但她已經很久很久都沒插手過眾神之間的事了。

name: She doesn't care about that stuff. Regardless, it seems we'll need to pay her a visit.
value: 先不管那麼多了，去問問她就知道了。

name: Where are you going? It's not polite to break into other people's dreams without consent.
value: 各位準備去哪？這樣不經同意闖入別人的夢境，可不是什麼禮貌的事情。

name: Sorry, but we have business we need to attend to.
value: 抱歉，天后大人，我們現在還有正事要做。

name: Business? Like pruning my roses?
value: 正事？幫我修剪玫瑰園這種嗎？

name: Hmph. That's something your servant should do.
value: 別開玩笑了，那是您傭人該做的。

name: Even after all this time, you still think so little of me?
value: 都過去那麼久了，沒想到你對我還有成見呀。

name: I don't like moody goddesses like you.
value: 對您這樣喜怒無常的女神，我可喜歡不起來。

name: In that case, why don't we make a bet?
value: 既然這樣的話，不如我們來打個賭吧。

name: If you defeat me in battle, I will forgive your rudeness and I will even help you attend to your business.
value: 你們要是能在戰鬥中勝過我，就饒恕你們的無禮，而且我承諾幫你們完成“正事”。

name: But if you lose, then please take good care of my roses.
value: 但如果你們輸了，那今天就拜託你們好好照顧照顧我的玫瑰園吧。

name: You'll regret those words! You're on!
It seems that my rose pruning will have to have to wait for another day.
value: 看來今天我的玫瑰園是修不成了。

name: However, I always keep my word. So what is this business of yours?
value: 不過，我一向信守承諾……你們所謂的“正事”是什麼？

name: My lady, my sister seems to be under the control of a power from the underworld. We want to ask Hades.
value: 天后大人，我的妹妹似乎被冥界的力量操控了，我們想去找哈迪斯問問。

name: Hades does not like intrusions from the likes of us. If you want to see her, you will need to find someone who can fight.
value: 冥王可不歡迎任何我們這樣的人闖入，如果要和她較量，必須找個能打的。

name: Might I suggest Athena? She is a good candidate.
value: 雅典娜應該是個不錯的人選，我們去找她吧。

name: Athena. Finally. It took us quite a while to find your dream.
value: 雅典娜，找到你的夢境還真花了我們不少時間。

name: Pandora? And Queen Hera? I am surprised the two of you are together...
value: 潘朵拉？還有天后？你們兩個人湊在一起可真讓我意外……

name: And... Gemini? What's this? It looks like the Dark Twin has lost her divinity.
value: 以及……雙子座？她怎麼了？看起來黑暗之子像是丟失了神格。

name: Goddess of War, can you see what's wrong with my sister?
value: 戰爭女神，你能看出我妹妹身上發生了什麼嗎？

name: Do you wish to wake her up? I don't advise it. There seems to be an unsual energy sealed within her.
value: 你想喚醒她嗎？我建議你不要這麼做，她身上似乎封印著不尋常的能量。

name: But if it continues like this, I am worried that she will hurt others again.
value: 可是，這樣下去的話，我擔心她會再次做出傷害其他人的舉動。

name: If you're just worried about her hurting other people... I have a solution for that.
value: 如果你只是擔心她會傷害到其他人的話……我倒是有個辦法。

name: That battle confirmed my suspicions. She is a huge threat...
value: 如我所想，通過剛才的戰鬥，我更確定她是個巨大的威脅……

name: Athena, this unkind temperament of yours needs to change.
value: 雅典娜，你的不近人情的性子該變變了，有趣的事情可不只有戰爭。

name: I'm being honest and rational. Understand that I believe only logic and reason can maintain the order of this world.
value: 非常遺憾，在我看來只有絕對的理智，才能維護這個世界的秩序。

name: Oh no-one is going to want to marry you at this rate.
Anyway, you guys won this time.
Don't you have some business to settle with Hades? Would you like to come with us?
value: 你不是一直想去和哈迪斯談談生意？要不要跟著我們一起去？

name: ...She mistakenly registered a soul from Athens under the name of Sparta, our enemies!
value: ……她上次把雅典的靈魂都劃到了斯巴達名下，這筆賬是該和她算算了。

name: Hmm... Well, I know someone who can open the way to the underworld for us. Her name is Medusa.
value: 另外，我知道有個傢伙能幫我們打開通往冥界的路——美杜莎。

name: But I heard she doesn't like to talk to others.
value: 但是我聽說她是個不太好說話的人……

name: It doesn't matter. As her old friend, I will make her talk.
value: 沒關係，作為她的“老朋友”，我會有辦法讓她開口的。

name: Medusa, come out! Or I will fill your temple with mirrors!
value: 美杜莎，趕緊出來見我，否則我就把你的神廟裡擺滿鏡子！

name: Athena... It's you again. Your presence always ruins my dreams.
value: 雅典娜……怎麼又是你，真是做夢都不讓人自在。

name: If you do something for me, I promise you can continue your sweet dreams undisturbed.
value: 幫我做件事，我保證你就能繼續安心做你的美夢。

name: ...Are these two enemies? Are we about to fight?
value: ……她倆有仇嗎？為什麼一見面就要打架？

name: It's a long story. Get ready.
Guess it's not my lucky day. So, what do you want from me?
value: 算我倒楣了，說吧，你要我幫你幹嘛？

name: Open the door to Hades' dream for me. I have a score to settle.
value: 替我打開通往哈迪斯夢境的大門，我找那傢伙……有點賬要算。

name: Heh... I thought so. What a bothersome request.
value: 呵……我猜來猜去也就是這事，真是麻煩。

name: Alright, the gate to the underworld is open. Stop bothering me now.
value: 好了，冥界的大門打開了，你們快走吧，別再打攪我了。

name: Go, before I change my mind.
value: 快走吧，趁我沒改變主意之前，唉……

name: Ugh. Phantasos, Hand of Hades, Apostle of Nightmares. The last person I wanted to see.
value: 方塔蘇斯，冥王之手，惡夢的使徒，我可真不想見到你……

name: Well I don't like you much either, Miss Bad Luck.
value: 作為厄運的象徵，我也對你沒什麼好感。

name: But unlike Hades, I can bear with your bad temper.
value: 不過相對于哈迪斯，你這傢伙的糟糕性格我倒還能忍受。

name: It's not good to talk about her behind her back. After all, the entire underworld is her eyes and ears.
value: 這麼在背後議論她可不好，畢竟，整個冥界都是她的耳目。

name: By the way... Light Twin, your sister seems to exude underworld energy.
value: 另外……光明之子，你妹妹的身上似乎散發著冥界的味道呢。

name: Does it look like she's getting worse?
value: 看來事情變得糟糕了，不是嗎？

name: It's hard to say. Although she has the underworld energy, the source isn't necessarily Lord Hades.
value: 難說，雖然她身上確實有冥界的能量，但源頭卻不一定來自哈迪斯大人。

name: I'm really interested in the energy in her... How about leaving her here and letting me study it?
value: 我確實對她身上的能量感興趣……不如把她留在這裡，讓我好好研究研究如何？

name: I'm dying to find a way to surpasss Lady Hades in power.
value: 如果我能研究出超越哈迪斯大人力量的方式，也是個不錯的交易呢。

name: Hah! Even after so much time, your ambitions are still as big as ever. Come and take her, if you can!
value: 時間都過去這麼久了，你的野心還是那麼大。來吧，有本事就來搶！

name: Open your eyes wide - see my nightmare!
value: 把眼睛睜大點，見識見識我的惡夢吧！

name: Such a pity... Your nightmares don't affect us.
value: 非常遺憾，你的惡夢影響不到我們。

name: Darling, this is my Dreamland. Your powers are limited here.
value: 親愛的，這可是在我的夢境中，你的力量再強也不過如此。

name: ...I'll let you go this time. But I won't hold back when we meet next time!
value: ……這次就先放過你們，下次再見面的時候，我可不會留手了！

name: Phew! We made it out of there safely. She's a dangerous foe. And who knows what other dangers lie ahead.
value: 總算送走了個危險的傢伙，前方還不知道會有什麼樣的麻煩在等著我們。

name: I hope my sister can pull through this safely.
value: 希望我妹妹能平安度過這次危機。

name: The dream is getting more and more blurry. Pandora, are you sure everything is still under your control?
value: 夢境越來越模糊了，潘朵拉，你確定一切還在你的掌控之中？

name: This is a bit strange... And I don't sense Hades' power.
value: 這有些奇怪……我沒有感覺到哈迪斯的力量。

name: How rare! A visitor.
value: 真是稀客，不過我的結界可不是想來就來，想走就走的呢。

name: Izanami? What is a Yamato goddess doing in the dream of the Greek goddess Hades?
value: 伊邪那美？大和神明在希臘冥王的夢境裡幹什麼？

name: As master of the underworld, wherever death is, I am too.
value: 作為黃泉的掌控者，只要有死亡的地方，我便無處不在。

name: Since you are lucky enough to visit my Dreamland, how about staying for a chat...
value: 既然有幸光臨我的夢境，不如留下來陪我聊聊天如何……

name: Sorry, we are in a rush.
So rude... Next time, politely accept my invitation to chat and we won't have to fight.
value: 哎呀，真是一群不解風情的傢伙呢。

name: Let's take our leave first. We have someone more important to meet.
value: 容我先告辭了，一會還有更重要的客人要見呐……呵呵。

name: Yes, let's keep going. It seems that the temple of Hades is up ahead.
value: 繼續前進吧，前面好像就是哈迪斯的神殿了。

name: Pandora? You finally came back to see me.
value: 潘朵拉？你終於肯回來見我了。

name: No, this isn't about coming to see you. I'm here to help Gemini as part of an agreement.
value: 別誤會，我可不是來見你的，我是來幫我的委託人找你問話的。

name: Either way, you'll still have to ask me for help.
value: 有什麼不一樣嗎？不管如何，你終究還是得求我幫忙。

name: Enough chitchat. What is with the underworld energy radiating from Gemini? I bet that you're behind it... again.
value: 閒話少說，雙子座身上的冥界能量是怎麼回事？我打賭這事情又是你搞的鬼。

name: What do you mean again? What have I ever done to you? ... I've never... Wait... What is...?
value: 什麼叫又？我難道幹過那麼多壞事嗎？

name: ... How interesting. There is a new power growing inside this little one's body.
value: 不過挺有趣的，這個小傢伙的身體裡正在孕育新的力量。

name: And once her metamorphosis is complete, she will become a new ruler of the underworld alongside me, Izanami and Anubis.
value: 而當她蘇醒時，將會變成除了我，海拉，伊邪那美，阿努比斯之外的一位新冥界管理者。

name: What are you talking about? She'll never...
value: 你……你在說什麼？這不可能……

name: You don't believe me? Let me use the true potential of the power within the body of the Dark Twin and show you.
value: 不相信嗎？我來引導黑暗之子身體裡真正的潛能，讓你開開眼界吧！

name: This power... it's amazing, but it's also terrifying. ... This is the first time I have felt like this...
value: 這力量……無比強大，但也讓人畏懼，我還是頭一次有這種感覺……

name: When this new power in the Dark Twinness awakens, you will gain infinite power.
value: 當黑暗之子體內的新力量蘇醒後，你你將獲得無窮的力量。

name: Do you not wish to have great power to protect each other?
value: 擁有強大的力量，保護另一個自己不是你追求的嗎？ 現在做出選擇吧。

name: I... just want things to go back to the way they were. I want a peaceful life with my sister!
value: 我……只想回到原本的生活，和妹妹一起的平靜生活！

name: I respect your choice, but you'll regret it once I interrupt this process to wake her up...
value: 呵呵，我尊重你的選擇，但在我喚醒黑暗之子後，你是不是會後悔，就是另一回事了。

name: Dark Twin, Twin Stars of the Zodiac. Heed my call, awaken from your slumber...
value: 黑暗之子，黃道之上的雙子之星，聽從我的呼喚，醒來吧……

name: Sister! Why are you messing with my plans?! Everything I'm doing is to create a world where you can be happy!
value: 姐姐，你為什麼要打亂我的計畫？我所做的一切，都是為了創造一個讓你獲得幸福的世界。

name: Have you forgotten how weak you are? Unlike me, you were born a mortal. I can change all of that!
value: 你難道忘了我們曾經的弱小？忘了那些利用我們的所謂的“女神”？

name: None of that matters! I'm happy as long as you are by my side.
value: 你錯了，我已經很幸福了，因為你在我身邊。

name: If you destroy your soul... then what's the point?? Even if I had the whole world, I'd have nothing without you!
value: 如果有一天你的靈魂消失了，那麼即便是讓我擁有整個世界，又有什麼用呢？

name: You have always been so weak. I will have to show you the meaning of power!
value: 你總是這麼軟弱……好吧，那就讓我在戰鬥中讓你明白力量的意義！

name: Why can you just accept my plans?
value: 為什麼你不能接受我的做法？

name: If I have to trade my sister's life for that, then I don't want it at all!
value: 假如我的強大，要用我妹妹的生命來交換，那我寧願不要！

name: I... understand. It seems that even if I have the power of Hades, I still cannot defeat you. What is truly powerful is your love for me.
value: 我明白了……即時擁有哈迪斯的力量，還是無法戰勝你，真正強大的還是你的信念……

name: Oops I hate to interrupt such a touching scene, but...
value: 哎呀呀……真是令人感動的場景，然而我們沒時間繼續欣賞了。

name: Since you are unwilling to sacrifice your sister, I have no choice but to take back the energy in her body.
value: 既然你不願意犧牲妹妹，那麼我只好收回黑暗之子身體裡的能量了。

name: However... After the trials you've faced in the Dreamland, perhaps this newfound understanding can make you both much stronger.
value: 經過夢境試煉後，你們的默契大概也能賦予彼此強大的戰鬥力吧，呵呵……

name: As much as I hate to say it, I owe you my thanks, Hades.
value: 雖然我很不想這麼說，但我依舊需要謝謝你，哈迪斯。

name: Alright darling, you got what you wanted. It's time to talk about what you owe me.
value: 好了親愛的，你想要的都得到了，是時候談談我的報酬了，哼哼……

name: You're right. Power is the only way to protect her...
value: 你說得對，力量是保護她的唯一方式……

name: A wise choice. The underworld is looking forward to a new ruler. The advent of a new world is just around the corner...
value: 明智的選擇，冥界期待著新的管理者，新世界的降臨指日可待……

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_93
value: 無論星空或是深海，我始終與你同在

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Gemini's Dreamland
value: 用於提升雙子座的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Gemini’s Shard Optional Box
value: 雙子座女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the box and choose Gemini's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇雙子座任意品質的碎片

name:
When Gemini attacks a shielded target, additionally deals True DMG equal to 25% of her ATK that ignores shields. 50% of the DMG dealt will be converted to a shield for her, lasting for 2 rounds.
If Gemini is in the main lineup when the battle begins, gains [Bright Light] for 2 rounds. Otherwise when Gemini enters combat, she gains [Dark Shadow] for 2 rounds. (Both effects cannot be dispelled) 

[Bright Light]: Increases Gemini's DMG Increase by 40% and CRIT by 30%.
[Dark Shadow]: IncreasesGemini's Debuff RES by 50% and Damage Reduction by 20%.
value: 雙子座攻擊時如果敵人擁有護盾，則額外附帶雙子座10%攻擊力的無視護盾的真實傷害，雙子座造成傷害的50%轉化為自身護盾，護盾持續1回合。 如果雙子座位於主陣容，進入戰鬥時獲得【耀光】狀態（無法驅散），暴擊值、暴擊傷害新增30%，持續2回合。 如果雙子座位於替補，進入戰鬥時獲得【暗影】狀態（無法驅散），提升50%异常抵抗，30%傷害减免，持續2回合。 （沒有替補的戰鬥中，雙子座只能獲得【耀光】狀態）

name: Increases Gemini’s Debuff RES by 50% and Damage Reduction by 30%(Neutral Status)
value: 提升50%異常抵抗，30%傷害減免（絕對狀態）

name: Attacks the shielded enemy again, but the DMG dealt will not ignore the target’s shield and M.RES.
value: 對擁有護盾的敵人額外進行一次相同的攻擊，但本次攻擊不會無視護盾和法術抗性

name: Collect 10 Runestone pieces to synthesize the Runestone Miracle Card
value: 集齊10個盧恩符石碎片可以合成盧恩符石

name: Collect 10 Key of Life pieces to synthesize the Key of Life
value: 集齊10個生命鑰匙碎片可以合成生命鑰匙

name: Collect 30 Original Fire pieces to synthesize the Original Fire Miracle Card
value: 集齊30個原初之火碎片可以合成原初之火

name: Collect 30 Time Hourglass pieces to synthesize the Time Hourglass Miracle Card
value: 集齊30個時間沙漏碎片可以合成時間沙漏

name: Collect 10 The Lost Scrolls pieces to synthesize the Lost Scrolls Miracle Card
value: 集齊10個失落古卷碎片可以合成失落古卷

name: Collect 10 Inari Mask pieces to synthesize the Inari Mask Miracle Card
value: 集齊10個稻荷面具碎片可以合成稻荷面具

name: Also known as the Dead Sea Scrolls, these are long-lost copies of mostly Hebrew text. They were preserved on parchment made from sheepskin since the people in that region had not yet discovered paper.
value: 又稱“死海文書”，是記載聖經中失落傳說的神話古卷。在發明紙張之前，人們喜歡在鞣制後的羊皮上書寫文字，那些上古的寓言，禁忌的咒語，統統以這種方式保存了下來。

name: These masks are enshrined in most Inari shrines in Japan. They are typically considered ritual treasures worn by gods for communication with ghosts and other deities.
value: 供奉於大多數日本稻荷神社中的面具，一般是通靈儀式上的寶物，神主們戴上它，與鬼神進行溝通。

name: Prometheus gifted humanity with the earliest kindling, and the resulting fire symbolized civilization and wisdom. The flame burns eternally, even without fuel.
value: 普羅米修士帶給人類的最早的火種，智慧與文明的象徵。即使沒有任何燃料，它也永恆不滅。

name: In ancient Egypt, this object was prized for their ability to accurately measure time. During temple worship, they helped priests mark the day's passing.
value: 供奉於埃及神廟的貢品，是古代埃及眾神少有的能夠精准計時的工具，當一測被沙子填滿，而另一側空空如也時，則意味著需要進行晝夜更替了。

name: Increases CRIT and CRIT DMG by 30%(Neutral Status)
value: 暴擊值、暴擊傷害增加30%（絕對狀態）

name: Reached today's dispatch limit
value: 今日派遣次數達到上限

name: Points will be saved after the event ends
Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Freyja's Dreamland
value: 用於提升芙蕾雅的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Freyja’s Shard Optional Box
value: 芙蕾雅女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the box and choose Freyja's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇芙蕾雅任意品質的碎片

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_94
value: 星空之下，我期待著彼此命運交錯的軌跡。

name: Pandora,stop hiding! I know this is your Dreamland.
value: 潘朵拉，你在哪？我知道這夢境是你造出來的，別躲了！

name: My, my, Freyja of Asgard? What a surprise.
value: 這不是阿斯加德的芙蕾雅女神嘛，您大駕光臨還真讓我意外……

name: I need a favor.
value: 別貧嘴了，我需要你幫我個忙。

name: Straight to business? I like that. So, what do you need?
value: 開門見山？我喜歡。說說看吧，你遇到什麼麻煩了？

name: Odin is missing again. I'm sure she's off somewhere having a good time again...
value: 奧丁失蹤了，至今下落不明，我敢打賭她一定是又溜到某個角落逍遙快活去了。

name: But Asgard cannot remain without a ruler for long. So I need you to help me find her.
value: 阿斯加德不能一直處在沒有統治者的境況下，我希望你幫我把她找出來。

name: Sure. But, as per my rules, you must first pass my test of strength.
value: 明白，但按照夢境的規矩，為了不讓你迷失在此，必須要測試測試你的實力。

name: So many rules... Fine, let's do it.
value: 你的規矩可真多……我準備好了，來吧。

name: There is no doubt about your strength.
Good. Then let's come up with a plan for retrieving Odin.
value: 好了，咱們來商量商量對策吧。

name: Odin is the most powerful of the Norse Gods, right? If we want to make her return, we will need more than just the two of us.
value: 據我所知，奧丁是北歐眾神中最強大的吧？想把她弄回來，光我們兩個的力量恐怕不行。

name: You just worry about finding Odin for me. I will take care of finding strong allies.
value: 沒錯，但你不用擔心，只管告訴我奧丁的去向吧，幫手的事我來搞定。

name: Heimdall, Guardian of Asgard and the Bifrost, I have business with you.
value: 海姆達爾，阿斯加德的守護者，我有要事找你。

name: Freyja, what brings you to me?
value: 芙蕾雅，什麼風把你給吹來了。

name: Where did Odin go? You know all who pass through the Bifrost, so you surely know her whereabouts, right?
value: 奧丁去什麼地方了，你號稱無所不曉，應該不會不知道她的去向吧？

name: I'm sorry, I promised Odin that I would not reveal her whereabouts.
value: 抱歉，這件事我曾向奧丁保證，絕不洩露她的去向。

name: You must understand that Odin's absence puts Asgard in great danger.
value: 我要怎麼樣才能讓你明白，奧丁的離開，讓阿斯加德現在處於極大的危險之中。

name: I cannot break my oath.
value: 我明白您的意思，但這關乎我的誓言。

name: Is your honor more important than the safety of Asgard?
value: 誓言比阿斯加德的安危還重要嗎？

name: ...Perhaps there is a way I can help. But you will need to defeat me in battle.
value: 或許我有個辦法可以幫助你，不過你得先和我打一架。

name: I will use any method necessary to ensure Odin's return to Asgard.
value: 好，只要能把奧丁找回來，我無所謂用什麼方法。

name: You fought well. It seems your strength is greater in the Dreamland.
value: 打得不錯，看來在夢境中，你的力量更強。

name: That was too easy. You didn't fight with your full strength, did you?
value: 就……這麼簡單？你你並沒有全力應戰吧？

name: ...I am now your prisoner, and as such, you can order me to advise you when you are going in the wrong direction.
value: 我確實不能違背誓言告訴你奧丁的行蹤，但作為你的俘虜，你有權要求我避開錯誤的路線。

name: I see. So as long as you don't directly lead me to the correct path, you will not be breaking your oath? Let's go!
value: 你是說，只要不直接指出具體的路就行了？我就知道靠得住你，我們走吧。

name: Thor? Did Odin send you to block my way as well?
value: 索爾？你該不會也是奧丁派來攔路的吧？

name: Odin? I am also looking for her. She agreed to a duel with me and Valkyrie, but she never showed up.
value: 奧丁？我也在找她，她同意了我和女武神們的決鬥賽，可我等了半天都沒見著她人。

name: That is so like her. Join me - I will find her and make her return to Asgard.
value: 呵……她一向如此，我們去找她回來吧。

name: I will join you, but... First, I want a warm up battle. After all, I don't want to lose my duel later.
value: 我是沒問題，不過……在此之前，我想好好熱個身——畢竟我可不希望在決鬥賽上輸掉！

name: I was just thinking it's easy to talk to you, but I guess we still have to fight. Alright, I accept your challenge.
value: 我就說你怎麼會這麼好說話，到頭來還是要動手打架……行吧，我接受。

name: It is an honor, Lady Freyja.
value: 那是我的榮幸，芙蕾雅女神。

name: Do you still want to continue, Thor? You have already lost.
value: 還打嗎，索爾？你已經輸了。

name: Hmph! I concede... this time. I've warmed up now, so let's go find Odin!
value: 哼……這次算你贏了，不過熱身準備也結束了，我們去找奧丁吧！

name: This is Valkryie's dream. We can ask her to help search for Odin.
value: 前面就是女武神的夢境了，尋找奧丁的事情，我們可以讓她一起來幫忙。

name: Be careful. I heard she recently lost a duel, so she's in a bad mood.
value: 你最好小心些，我聽說她最近在和其他人的比試中輸了，現在正在氣頭上呢。

name: Gods! Are you a ghost? Make some sound when you walk!
value: 天哪……你是幽靈嗎？走路一點聲音都沒有……

name: You think I'd lose? Fight me and see.
value: 你覺得我輸了對嗎？那就和我較量較量如何！

name: Are all Norse gods so... reckless and carefree?
value: 你們北歐眾神都是這麼……隨性的嗎？

name: ...Don't get the wrong idea about us. It's just hotheads like them that like to talk with their fists.
value: ……別誤會，只有她們這群拳頭說話的傢伙才這樣。

name: It was a tie! Don't you dare think you won.
value: 平手而已，你怎麼好意思覺得是你贏了？

name: Alright, alright. If you two want to fight again, let's get Odin back quickly so you can have your duel.
value: 行了，你們想再較量的話，不如儘快把奧丁找回來，讓決鬥大賽儘快開始。

name: Why would we be here otherwise?
value: 不然你覺得為什麼我們會在這兒？

name: That looks like Sif up ahead. What is she doing here?
value: 前面的好像是希芙，她在這兒幹嘛？

name: She seems to be searching for something.
value: 看樣子她是在找什麼東西。

name: My hair... my golden hair. It's gone!
value: 我的頭髮……我的黃金頭髮，不見了？

name: Did you steal my golden hair?
value: 是你偷走了我的金髮嗎？

name: Isn't your hair on your head?
value: 你在瞎說什麼？你的頭髮不是在腦袋上嗎？

name: You're as tough as ever. That was a difficut fight.
value: ……你這傢伙，腦袋還挺硬，把你打趴下還真耗了我不少力氣！

name: Ow... Why does my body hurt?
Huh? Did you forget you just attacked us?
value: 啊？不是你怒氣衝衝地朝我們沖過來了嗎？

name: ...A few moments ago I met Loki, but I can't remember what happened next. She must have done something to me.
value: 我剛才還在夢境裡遇到洛基，幾秒後我就失去意識了，一定是她搗的鬼……

name: Her again! Next time I see her, I'm going to grab her by the horns and saw them off!
value: 又是這傢伙！如果讓我抓到她，一定要把她頭上那對角鋸下來！

name: I don't think you will have to wait long. Odin leaving is the perfect opportunity for her to stir up trouble. She wouldn't be able to resist.
value: 不用下次了，很快她就會主動現身了，這次奧丁出走，肯定少不了她在旁邊煽風點火。

name: Loki, I know you're there! Come out!
value: 洛基，快出來！我知道你躲在這裡！

name: I was going to surprise you guys. I didn't expect you to find me first.
value: 我還準備給你們來個驚喜，沒想到你們這麼快就能發現我。

name: You're always up to no good. Be honest, where is Odin?
value: 你向來學不乖，老實交代，奧丁在哪兒？

name: Oh no... Odin is missing... Such a pity... But I have no idea where she is.
value: 哎呀……原來奧丁不見了，這可真讓人遺憾……不過我可不清楚她的下落。

name: Your words don't match your expression. I guess we will have to beat the truth out of you!
value: 你滿臉不懷好意地說出這種話，實在讓人信不過，或許只有拳頭能讓你開口了！

name: Hmph. It seems that your power is greater than I thought in this Dreamland.
value: 哼，看來幾位在夢境中的力量，比我想像中大呢……

name: It's time for you to confess, sweetie.
value: 坦白的時間到了，親愛的。

name: Forget about that. Since we're old friends, I will help out just this once.
value: 算了算了，看在舊日的交情上，我就幫你們一回好了。

name: I don't know where Odin is now, but she was with the Nordic dragons earlier.
value: 奧丁現在在哪兒我不清楚，但她之前和北歐那幾頭龍混在一塊。

name: The dragons? I have a bad feeling about this.
value: 真是糟糕……我有不好的預感。

name: Goddesses! I challenge you! I will defeat you one by one to prove that I am qualified to inherit Odin's divine right.
value: 女神們，挑戰的時刻到了，我將逐個擊敗你們，證明我有繼承奧丁神權的資格！

name: How impudent! If we weren't in a dream right now, your heads would roll for this.
value: 好吧，如果不是在夢裡，我保證你現在已經被送上斷頭臺了。

name: Unfortunately not. Since Odin has promised that the strongest will inherit her position as Supreme Ruler of Asgard.
value: 遺憾的是，奧丁確實允諾強者可以繼承阿斯加德的最高神權。

name: Is that so? Well then, do you two plan to come at us together? Or...?
value: 說得好！所以你們倆打算一起上？還是……

name: Hah! I alone am enough to deal with you all. Bring it on!
value: 沒必要，我一個人對付你們已經足夠了！放馬過來吧！我並不覺得人多就能贏！

name: Impossible! How could you have such strength in my dream?
value: ……在我的夢境中居然還能發揮出這麼強大的力量，這不可能！

name: If you've lost, sister, step aside. Let me show them the difference in strength.
value: 輸了就退下吧，姐妹，讓我來告訴她們實力的差距……

name: Does the cold temperature here remind you of home?
value: 希望這裡的溫度會讓你們產生回家了的感覺。

name: Since you already know that we aren't afraid of the cold, do you still think you can beat us with a little snow?
value: 既然你明白我們不懼寒冷，還想用冰雪來擊敗我們嗎？

name: My power is no ordinary snowstorm...
value: 我的力量可不只是普通的風雪……

name: I told you so. We Asgardian Gods have lived in the Nordic ice for thousands of years.
value: 我早就說過了，阿斯加德眾神千年來都與北歐的冰雪為伴，不會懼怕任何寒冷。

name: I acknowledge your strength. But unfortunately, I don't think Odin will go back to Asgard with you...
value: 我承認你們的實力，但遺憾的是，我不覺得奧丁會跟你們回阿斯加德……

name: Because I am tired of ruling, my dear.
value: 因為我已經厭倦當個 統治者了，親愛的。

name: Odin! So you really were hiding in Pandora's Dreamland. Do you have any idea what is happening to Asgard?
value: 奧丁，原來你還真躲在潘朵拉的夢境裡，你知道阿斯加德都遭遇了些什麼嗎？

name: Nope, no idea. But since you are all in one piece, I believe you have everything under control.
value: 不知道，但既然眾神都完好無損，我相信你已經處理妥當了一切。

name: You really are shirking your duties... Asgard is weakened without a leader, what if those warmongerers from Greece come looking for a fight?
value: 你可真能推脫，現在眾神無首，萬一希臘的那群好戰的傢伙打過來……

name: Ah I just want to relax. Besides, I have already announced how my successor will be chosen, haven't I?
value: 啊……我只是想清閒一段日子而已，何況我已經宣佈選出神權繼承者的方法了，不是嗎？

name: Sorry, but we don't agree with your rash decision.
value: 抱歉，眾神可沒同意你這個草率到家的決定。

name: Asgard cannot be without your wisdom. So if you insist on staying in the Dreamland...
value: 阿斯加德不可以沒有你的智慧，如果你一定要留在夢境裡的話……

name: We will have to do this the hard way.
value: 我們就只能用一些不太溫柔的手段把你請回去了。

name: Hehe... I like it hard.
value: 呵呵……想來硬的也不是不行，在希臘那群傢伙的習慣裡，還保留著弑神登位的傳統呢。

name: ...You're serious about leaving. Then we will give you a hard time, my lady.
value: 你看上去不像是在開玩笑，那麼我們只好讓你吃點苦頭了，大人。

name: Not bad, Freyja. Your strength has grown much faster in the Dreamland than I could have imagined.
value: 不錯，芙蕾雅，你的力量在夢境裡成長的速度比我想像中快得多。

name: You have displayed such strong determination. Perhaps Asgard will have a brighter future in your hands.
value: 你能讓我看到如此強大的決心，或許阿斯加德在你手上會有更光明的未來。

name: Since ancient times, the Norse gods have always respected power and glory. And your strength has now surpassed mine.
value: 自古以來，北歐眾神一直尊崇武力與榮耀，如今你的力量已經超過了我。

name: Maybe it is time for you to become the new leader of Asgard.
value: 或許輪到你晉升成為新的阿斯加德守護者了。

name: I am not the best candidate though...
value: 然而我並非最好的人選……

name: Asgard does not need a single ruler to make decisions for all. But rather someone to lead the collective voices and wisdom of the gods.
value: 阿斯加德不需要一個王，也從來不是某個人說了算，而是需要集體的智慧。

name: I have long wanted to change the ruling system. The fate of all cannot be determined by one person's will.
value: 我很早就想做出改變了，不能由一個人的意志來決定每個人的命運。

name: Although I am strong, my stubborness and prejudice is not good for Asgard. But you can bring new hope to the gods.
value: 雖然我足夠強大，但我的固執和偏見並非是好事，你卻能給眾神帶來新的希望。

name: If you really think I would be suitable to lead Asgard, then I will undergo the Trial of the Guardian.
value: 呵呵，如果你執意這麼認為，那麼至少在你改變想法前，我會繼續執政阿斯加德。

name: I am certain you won't let me down.
value: 很好，我知道你不會讓我失望。

name: When the trial begins, you will see a vision of Ragnarok and will have to face the end of Asgard.
value: 當試煉開始時，我會模擬諸神黃昏的幻象，你將面對我們的終末。

name: If you can defeat my worst enemy, Loki, then there will be no doubt that you are worthy to lead the Norse Gods.
value: 如果你們能通過我最大的敵人，洛基的考驗，那麼我就承認你有資格領導眾神。

name: Be careful. Although it is an illusion, she carries my divine power and is as dangerous as if this were the real Ragnarok.
value: 一定要小心！雖然是幻象，但她承載了我的神力，其危險程度不亞於真實的末日！

name: As fate would have it, we made it through Ragnarok.
value: 看來命運如此，我們度過了諸神黃昏……

name: Well done. Asgard will usher in a new era, and all will have a say in its future.
value: 你做的很好，阿斯加德將迎來新的紀元，所有的人都將成為它的主人。

name: I will accept this duty, along with this new power.
value: 我會記住這份職責的，連同這份強大的力量。

name: No, age-old traditions should not be changed.
Well if you insist, then I will continue to rule Asgard. At least, until you change your mind...
value: 如果你真的這麼認為，那麼我接受守護者試煉。

name: When Freyja releases a skill or normal attack, there is a 70% chance that it will be released again (can be triggered up to once per round). When Freyja is in action, inflicts [Sunder Armor] to 2 enemies with the lowest DEF for 1 round (ignores Debuff RES). \n\n[Sunder Armor]: Reduces the bearer’s DEF by 80% of Freyja’s DEF and FOR by 20% of Freyja’s FOR.
value: 芙蕾雅釋放技能或普通攻擊時，有70%概率再次釋放，每回合最多觸發一次。 芙蕾雅每回合行動時，使防禦力最低的2名敵方女神獲得【破甲】狀態（無視异常抵抗），持續1回合。 【破甲】狀態的女神防禦力降低芙蕾雅防禦力的80%，韌性降低芙蕾雅韌性的20%

name: Reduces the bearer’s DEF by 80% of Freyja’s DEF
value: 1回合防禦力降低芙蕾雅防禦力的80%

name: Reduces the bearer’s FOR by 20% of Freyja’s FOR
value: 1回合韌性降低芙蕾雅韌性的20%

value:

<color=#fe8cc0>2021</color>年<color=#fe8cc0>2</color>月<color=#fe8cc0>11</color>號，<color=#fe8cc0>100W</color>天使降臨于世間
<color=#fe8cc0>2023</color>年<color=#fe8cc0>3</color>月<color=#fe8cc0>17</color>號，一共有<color=#fe8cc0>1000W</color>天使開始了屬於他們的冒險

name: Successfully dispatch an angel to increase output by {0}
value: 成功派遣一名女神產量提升{0}

name: Open after the Main Story reaches {0}
Wow, look at the stars on the dome. They’re sparkling with the power of destiny. I wonder why they’re all here.
value: 快看，穹頂的群星在閃耀，命運的力量也同時出現，為何群星會彙聚到此？

name: They seem to have fused with the power of sky and destiny. It’s like they gave us angels some new abilities.
value: 星空和命運的力量凝聚在了一起，好像賦予了天使們全新的力量。

name: Now, we are all empowered by the stars. Gathering those Stars Sand to activate an exclusive power for you angel.
value: 作為命星的主體，每位天使都覺醒了全新的力量，需要使用星之沙來啟動新的能力。

name: The starlight is dazzling! When we angel join forces, we boost each other’s powers and unleash amazing star combo skills.
value: 群星閃耀的力量更加耀眼，當多個女神聚集在一起時，會互相激發各自的力量，獲得更加強大群星技能。

name: Tap to display Destiny Star Attributes
Tap to activate the power of Destiny Star
Tap to switch to the Collective Star
The Main Star is the angel herself
Collective Stars are the stars surrounding the Main Star
value: 伴星為其他女神的主星

name: Achieve certain conditions to activate special combo skills
value: 達成一定的條件即可啟動群星技能

name: Bari, do you see that? There’s a weird portal over there. Should we check it out?
value: 巴里，你發現了嗎？這裡出現了一個奇怪的入口，我們去看看怎麼樣？

name: Be careful. It looks like another time rift. I have a bad feeling about this. Something terrible might happen.
value: 小心一點，這個好像是一個時間裂縫，我感覺不太對勁，好像有什麼不好的事情要發生了。

name: Don’t worry. I’m here with you. Nothing can hurt us. But I don’t see anything wrong outside the rift. Maybe we should go in and see for ourselves?
value: 放心，有我在這什麼都不用怕，但是在這個裂縫外面好像看不出什麼問題，要不我們進去看看吧？

name: Hey, slow down! Why are you always so impulsive?
value: 哎，等等我，你怎麼還是這麼冒冒失失的！

name: Bari, fire! There’s fire everywhere! The world is on fire!
value: 巴里，火，到處都是火，整個世界都被燃燒起來了。

name: Watch out! I felt some mysterious source weaken the goddess of time's power when we crossed the rift.
value: 小心，穿過裂縫的時候我感覺到了時間女神的力量在被削弱了。

name: This is our world. And that place… It’s where we first met, right?
value: 這裡就是我們的世界，而且這個地方也很熟悉……好像是我們第一次相遇的地方？

name: Let’s be cautious and figure out what’s going on.
value: 我們小心一點，查探一下到底發生了什麼。

name: Oh no, Bari! I recognize that thing! We beat it in our first fight!
value: 啊，巴里，我記得它，第一次戰鬥的時候打敗的就是它。

name: And look over there! Those old enemies are back!
value: 看，還有那邊，那些曾經戰鬥過的怪物又再次出現了。

name: Something’s wrong with the order of time. It brought back those monsters we killed and made them stronger.
value: 看來時間女神的力量出現了錯亂，導致那些被消滅的怪物再次出現，並且變得更加危險了。

name: But I’m not scared. If we can beat them once, we can beat them again and again.
value: 完全不在怕的，能消滅它第一次，就能消滅它一萬次。

name: Alright then. Let’s grab our weapons and keep fighting!
value: 好，既然如此那就拿起武器繼續戰鬥吧！

name: Tap to return to the battlefield
Tap to enter the Line-up interface
Tap to create your first team
Tap to create your second team
Increases DMG dealt to Warriors
value: 對戰士造成的傷害增加

name: Increases DMG dealt to Archers
value: 對射手造成的傷害增加

name: Increase DMG to mage
value: 對法師造成的傷害增加

name: Reduces DMG taken by Warriors
value: 受到戰士造成的傷害減少

name: Reduces DMG taken by Archers
value: 受到射手造成的傷害減少

name: Reduces DMG taken by Mages
value: 受到法師造成的傷害減少

name: Nightmare dungeons do not allow quick combat
value: 噩夢副本不支持快速戰鬥

name: Resonate an angel with other angels to use her Gears, Gems, Artifacts, and Attires
value: 將一名女神與其他女神共鳴，即可使用她的裝備、寶石、神器、內飾

name: Activation materials for the limited angel's Destiny Star
