value: 限定女神的命星的啟動材料

name: Can be used to upgrade Angel’s Destiny Star
Collect 50 pieces to synthesize a Destiny Star Optional Chest
value: 集齊50個碎片可以合成一個命星自選箱

name: Select and obtain one Destiny Star of an Angel
value: 可以選擇獲得一個任意女神的命星

name: Activate when ({0}/{1}) angels' main stars reach {2}
value: 擁有({0}/{1})個女神主星等級達到Lv.{2}啟動

name: Open the treasure chest and choose one shard of any Classic Angel (including Loki and all previous SSR+ Angels or Superior Summon Scroll)
value: 打開寶箱選擇任意經典女神的一個碎片（洛基及之前的所有稀有SSR+女神、稀有女神召喚券）

name: The level of one angel’s Collective Star depends on the {0} angels with the highest level Main Star (excluding herself)
value: 群星取決於除自己外{0}個命星等級最高女神

name: Yo, who's this here? Another lost and confused goddess looking for a guiding light?
value: 喲，這是誰呀，難道是陷入迷茫的女神，正在尋找指路明燈？

name: Pandora, the Greek Daughter of Misfortune? What wind brought you here?
value: 希臘的災厄之女潘朵拉？什麼風把你吹到這來的？

name: Rather than me coming to you, it is you who have strayed into my Dreamland.
value: 有趣，與其說是我來到你身邊，不如說是你誤入了我的夢境。

name: Let me see which one we have today... Frigga of Asgard, Nordic Goddess of Flowers and Love?
value: 讓我來看看你的真名吧……阿斯加德的弗麗嘉，北歐的鮮花與愛之女神麼？

name: I heard you are a troublesome one to deal with. How many people have been intoxicated by you? How many people have suffered heartbreak because of you?
value: 聽說你可不是一個好應付的傢伙呢，曾經有多少人因你而陶醉，又有多少人因你而心碎呢？

name: That is all in the past. I am not the same now as I used to be.
value: 那可都是些陳年往事了，現在的我可和過去不一樣。

name: Oh yeah... Now I should be calling you Queen of Asgard... But why do you look so troubled, Your Majesty?
value: 哦……現在得稱呼你“天后”大人了。不過你神情躊躇，是遇到什麼麻煩了嗎？

name: I may be Queen of Asgard in name, but do the other gods even recognize my authority? My reputation in the North used to be quite bad...
value: 我雖貴為北歐天后，可眾神真的認同我的身份嗎？我以前在北歐的名聲可不怎麼樣……

name: I want to improve my relationship with the Asgardian goddesses, but I don't know how.
value: 我想改善自己和阿斯加德女神們的關係，但不知道該如何去做。

name: Improve your reputation? Well it's your lucky day! I've become rather good at granting wishes, heh.
value: 改善自己的名聲嗎？那你至少算找對人了……

name: I suggest you go to Freyja. If you can reconcile with her, then the others will probably trust your determination and resolve.
value: 我建議你去找芙蕾雅，如果能與她和解，那麼眾神大概會相信你的決心。

name: Really? But I've heard a lot of people say that your help comes at a price...
value: 真的嗎？但我聽很多人說過，請潘朵拉幫忙的代價可不小……

name: Hehe... We can talk about the price later. Let me see your ability first.
value: 呵呵……代價等事成之後再談也不遲，讓我先看看你的能力。

name: After all, only those with a strong will and combat ability can traverse my Dreamland without fear of getting lost...
value: 畢竟只有具備強大意志力和戰鬥力的人，才不至於在我的夢境中迷失……

name: The outcome is clear. I am confident in my combat abilities, aren't you?
value: 勝負已分，至少在戰鬥這方面我還是很有信心的。

name: ...I am starting to understand why you're in conflict with the other Norse goddesses... You really are quite dangerous.
value: 我大概知道你為什麼會和其他的北歐女神鬧出矛盾了……你還真是個危險的傢伙。

name: Well, I have a good estimate of your strength now. But Freyja will not be so easily persuaded.
value: 我大概知道你的力量了，只不過如你所說，芙蕾雅肯定不會輕易被你說服。

name: You will need some more companions to back you up. Is there anyone you suggest?
value: 我們得需要幾個同伴……你有什麼推薦人選嗎？

name: Well since you asked, I think Loki would be a good choice. She always comes up with the most interesting and unique ideas.
value: 如果要我選的話，我看洛基非常適合，她平時總能想出奇怪的點子，我帶你去找她。

name: Oh my gods... You really know how to pick them...
I know you are here! If you don't come out within 10 seconds, I will smash this place to pieces!
value: 我知道你在這裡！十秒內你要是再不出來，我就把你的夢敲成碎片！

name: I believe she is hiding. Where does she usually like to hide?
value: 我相信她一定是藏起來了，你仔細想想，她一般會藏在什麼地方？

name: She likes to shapeshift into random things... Ah! The fire was still burning in her hearth!
value: 她會變成一些奇怪的東西……啊！我想起來了，她壁爐裡的火還燃著呢！

name: Sure enough, you changed into fire.
It's pointless to find me! I won't listen to you! I won't do what you want!
value: 你找到我也沒有用！你說什麼我都不聽！你說什麼我也不答應！

name: She is running away! Quickly! Catch her!
value: She is running away! Quickly! Catch her!

name: Lady Frigga, please let me go! I promise I will never appear in front of you again!
value: 弗麗嘉大人，求您放過我吧，我保證再也不出現在您面前了！

name: ...What terrible things have you done to the Goddess of Deception? She's shaking like a mouse in front of a cat.
value: ……你以前到底對詭詐之神做過什麼可怕的事，她見你像老鼠見了貓一樣……

name: Enough please. What do you want from me? Let me go and I will do anything!
value: 夠了夠了，你們究竟想要我幹嘛？只要肯放我走，我什麼都答應你們！

name: I want to reconcile with Freyja.
value: I want to reconcile with Freyja.

name: Can't you ask me to do something easier? I don't think it's possible for you to reconcile. After all, everyone knows what your personality is like...
value: 我覺得你不會成功的，畢竟誰都知道你的性格實在是……

name: That's why we came to find you. Lady Frigga has high expectations for you.
value: 所以我們才找到了你啊，弗麗嘉大人可是對你抱有期待呢。

name: Ugh, I'll give it a try. But I'm not happy about it...
value: 好吧，我試試看，但對我來說，這真不是什麼值得高興的事情……

name: This is the door to Thor's palace. If you want to reach Asgard in this Dreamland, you must pass through here.
value: 前面就是索爾的宮殿了，想通往夢境中的阿斯加德，必須經過這裡。

name: The door is locked... Loki, you will have a way, won't you?
value: 大門關得可真夠緊……不過洛基，你會有辦法的，對吧？

name: Thor! You drunkard! Fool! Hammer-head! Come out quickly! Otherwise I will steal Mjölnir!
value: 索爾你這個酒鬼、蠢貨、錘子腦袋！快出來！否則你的白日夢就到此為止了！

name: Loki! You troublesome pest... Haven't you had enough of the pain of being beaten up from last time?
value: 洛基，又是你這個麻煩傢伙……上次挨揍的苦頭你還沒吃夠麼？

name: Wait a second... Frigga? What are you doing here? Why are you with Loki?
value: 等等……！弗麗嘉？你在這裡做什麼？為什麼你會和洛基在一起？

name: Don't worry about that, my angel. I want to reconcile with Freyja. Loki's just here to help.
value: 別在意，親愛的，我只是想與芙蕾雅和解，讓洛基來找你幫忙而已。

name: So her help is calling me names in front of my own palace?
value: 所以她就是這麼請我幫忙的？在我的門前破口大駡？

name: Well... You see... That's because it's the only way to wake you from your drunken nap.
value: 這個……只有這種辦法，才能讓你從酩酊大醉中清醒過來。

name: Since it's you asking, Frigga, I have no reason to decline. But...
value: 好吧，既然是弗麗嘉出面，我當然沒理由不答應，不過我有個條件……

name: Heh. You want a fight, right? Go ahead.
value: 是和我比試比試嗎？沒問題……

name: Okay okay. Let's call it here. I admit defeat. I have to say though, your fighting style is... much gentler than before.
value: 到此為止吧，我認輸，說實話，你的錘子比以前溫柔多了。

name: I am a queen now, after all. I can't be as rough as I used to be.
value: 畢竟我也是天后了，不能再那麼粗暴下去了呢。

name: Anyway, I agreed to accompany you to Lady Freyja's dream, but we may run into some trouble on the way.
value: 事已至此，我同意和你們一起去芙蕾雅大人的夢境，但路上可能會遇到一些麻煩。

name: Yes, because we will have to pass through Valkyrie's dream. She isn't as easy-going as I am.
value: 因為要經過女武神們的夢境，她們可不像我這麼好說話……

name: Frigga, I did not invite you into the barracks of the Valkyries. If you take one more step, I will make you regret it.
value: 弗麗嘉，我可沒邀請你來我的軍營，如果你再往前一步，我就要發起衝鋒了。

name: Leader of the Valkyries, you should remember Frigga's status. She is Queen. Show some respect.
value: 首席女武神，以弗麗嘉現在的身份而言，你至少要保持禮儀。

name: And where was the respect when she treated us like shit?
value: 她以前目中無人的時候，可沒有提到過什麼禮儀。

name: I apologize for my past actions. That is exactly why I want to see Freyja.
value: 我為過去的所作所為向你道歉，也正因為如此，我需要去與芙蕾雅和解。

name: Let's settle this with a fight. If you win, I will let you pass. If I win, you shall not pass!
value: 好吧，如果你們能在戰鬥中勝過我，我就放你們過去。

name: I accept your challenge! But if I win, you will also come with me.
value: 我接受這個挑戰，除此之外，我希望你能與我一同前去和芙蕾雅談談。

name: You will have to beat me first!
Phew... Thor, I'm beginning to understand why you're helping her.
value: 呼……索爾，我開始明白你為什麼會幫她了。

name: To put it simply, she is the most important existence to the Norse Gods, other than Lady Odin.
value: 很簡單，她是除奧丁大人外北歐最重要的存在。

name: Before she was queen, she wasn't exactly a fair and honorable person...
value: 她在成為天后之前，並不是一個光明正大、值得尊敬的人。

name: But during this battle, I glimpsed her sense of honor.
value: 但這場戰鬥中她的技巧，已經讓我見識到了她的榮耀感。

name: We are warriors. We are duty-bound to obey our liege's orders. Even if she commanded my sacrifice, I would not complain.
value: 我們是戰士，戰士的天職就是服從領主的命令，即便她要求我犧牲，那我也無可推辭。

name: I will not betray your trust in me, Valkyrie.
value: 如今的我一定不會辜負你的信任，瓦爾基裡。

name: I didn't think you'd be able to find me even in a dream. So who's the unlucky one you're going to mess with this time?
value: 沒想到我躲到夢境裡你還能找得到，唉……所以你這次又要去折騰哪個倒楣傢伙？

name: I need to see Freyja. I want to reconcile with her and patch up my relationship with the other Asgardian gods.
value: 芙蕾雅，我需要與她和解，然後修復自己與阿斯加德眾神的關係。

name: That's not going to be easy. After all, you were rivals in the fight for the throne...
value: 這代價恐怕不小，畢竟當年你和她可是為了爭奪天后的地位而對立的……

name: That's why I came to you for help. Regardless of other people's opinion, I know you will have my back.
value: 所以我才來找你幫忙，無論其他人立場如何，作為大地女神，你始終會會支持我。

name: Unless you are strong enough to defeat Heimdall, the Guardian of the Bifrost, you will not be able to cross that rainbow bridge into Asgard.
value: 除非你的力量強到能夠擊敗最強守護者海姆達爾，否則你依舊過不了彩虹橋。

name: Wanna see for yourself if I am?
Of course. I wouldn't want to go all the way there for nothing.
value: 那當然，我可不希望白跑一趟。

name: This is not like your old powers, Frigga.
value: 這可真不像你以前的力量，弗麗嘉。

name: With your help, I believe that we can handle Heimdall.
value: 有你的幫忙後，我相信是能越過海姆達爾這道難關的。

name: Ugh I do hope that mudsclehead understands your intentions.
value: 唉……希望那個死腦筋能理解你的用意。

name: Stop. Beyond this point is Lady Freyja's palace. I can let you go no further, not even if you are the Queen.
value: 前方是芙蕾雅大人的宮殿，我不能讓您隨意通過，抱歉……即便您是天后。

name: I wish to give her my greetings and an invitation to reconcile.
value: 我是過去向她問好的，並且向她傳遞我的和解邀請。

name: Is that so? I heard that you are holding a banquet, with the intention of repairing bad relationships
value: 是這樣嗎？我聽說你在舉辦酒宴，試圖和曾經交惡的女神改善關係。

name: I see. But I must still abide by my duty to keep Lady Freyja safe.
value: 好吧，但出於對芙蕾雅大人的職責，我必須要保衛她的安全。

name: If you can defeat me at half my power, I will consider it your victory and let you pass.
value: 假如你們能勝我半籌，我就當你們擊敗了我，放你們通過。

name: Thank you for understanding, Heimdall.
value: 謝謝你的通情達理，海姆達爾。

name: You have won. I will not hinder your passage any further, but please be careful.
value: 你們贏了，我不會繼續阻攔你們，但請你們一定要謹慎行事。

name: Rest assured, my intention is not to cause issues. But to resolve them.
value: 請放心，不管如何我不是來惹麻煩，而是來解決問題的。

name: With all due respect... what is Loki doing here?
value: 恕我直言……為什麼洛基這個傢伙會在這個隊伍裡呢？

name: Well... she is a valuable asset to me. This time.
value: 這個嘛……她是我重要的夥伴——至少這次是。

name: Got something to say about me, sweetheart? Heh.
value: 嗯，你對我有什麼意見嗎？親愛的？

name: Well, well. What a powerful group of people. Such a team - are you guys looking for a fight?
value: 好久沒有看到如此強大的組合了，你們這陣勢……是要去打架？

name: ...We're just visiting Freyja.
value: ……我們只是去拜訪芙蕾雅而已。

name: Hmph... Did you bring me a gift? Even though this is the Dreamland, this territory still belongs to us Dragons.
value: 哼哼……你們有給我帶禮物來嗎？即使這裡是夢境，但也屬於龍神的地盤。

name: Um... I can give you Loki? Look at her, she'd make a very pretty decoration.
value: 要不然……我把洛基送您？實話說，她的裝飾性還挺強的。

name: Not interested. If you want to pass through my territory, I expect a proper gift.
value: 我對這個傢伙沒興趣，不管如何，想通過龍族的領地，禮物是必要的。

name: Lady Ember, do you mean... you want to challenge Asgard's Queen?
value: 火龍之主，你這話的意思……是想挑戰阿斯加德最高的權威之一嗎？

name: Little Thor, I watched you grow up. You may not know this, but even Odin must abide by the rules of the Dragon Clan.
value: 索爾，我可是看著你長大的，也許你不知道，龍族的規矩可是奧丁也必須遵守的。

name: Clearly. Fine, let me see if your fighting skills have improved in the past thousand years! Or if I need to get out the diapers for you. Haha!
value: 喔……這樣嗎？好，就讓我看看這幾千年來，你打架的本事成長了多少！

name: What a good fight! I will consider that your gift.
value: 打得不錯，你們既然在戰鬥中能勝過我，禮物的事情就免了吧，哈哈。

name: Don't be silly. I will have two statues built in your honor. One to stand in the Asgardens, and one for your territory.
value: 別這麼說，我依舊會為你打造兩座雕像，一座立在阿斯加德的花園中，一座送給你。

name: You don't have to do so much for me, my Queen. I wish you luck in your chat with Freyja.
value: 天后，你客氣了，祝你和芙蕾雅聊得愉快。

name: Freyja asked me to persuade you to go back. So I've got to at least look like I tried to.
value: 芙蕾雅讓我過來勸你回去，我總得要裝裝樣子吧。

name: I don't really feel like fighting you, but...
value: 雖然現在的我不大想向你揮動錘子，不過……

name: Do it, otherwise you can't see Freyja today.
value: 動手吧，要是不通過我這關，今天你可見不到芙蕾雅了。

name: You are much stronger than before.
value: 你的本事比以前強多了呐……

name: I almost lost control of myself, I'm sorry. I hope I didn't hurt you.
value: 不好意思，差點失控，我希望沒有傷著你。

name: I am proud to see how much you've grown. No one would have believed you'd take the initiative to reconcile with Freyja.
value: 看到你如今的成長我挺高興，你以前糟糕的性格，可從不會主動和其他北歐女神和好。

name: Even immortal gods can change. At least, I have.
value: 神也是會改變的，至少我是這樣。

name: Remember to tell Freyja you kicked my butt, hehe. Otherwise I'll get in trouble.
value: 呵呵……記得告訴芙蕾雅，你把我打了個落花流水，不然她可不甘心。

name: After everything, you still came. My sister, Frigga.
value: 你還是來了，我的妹妹，弗麗嘉。

name: I have come to reconcile with you, sister. I did many cruel things to you, for the sake of being Queen.
value: 我是來與你和解的，姐姐，當年為了天后的權位，我做過不少讓你傷心的殘酷之事。

name: It is not me you need to reconcile with. It is yourself.
value: 我不會因此而對你產生偏見，你需要和解的是你自己。

name: In the fight for the throne, I did not face you like a true Asgardian warrior...
value: 以前在天后這個位置的爭奪中，我沒有像個北歐勇士一樣和你在戰鬥中分出勝負……

name: Instead, I used subterfuge and trickery to win.
value: 而是使用了權術、詭計和不公平的手段。

name: That is true, but I have forgiven you. Allowing such feelings to fester in your heart will only cause you pain. But if you really can't let go...
value: 的確如此，但我已經原諒你了，繼續糾結只會讓你的內心繼續沉淪，如果你實在難以釋懷……

name: Then perhaps a duel may help to appease the guilt in your heart. Come sister, let us face each other as true Asgardian warriors.
value: ……那麼一場遲到的對決，或許能夠平撫你內心的愧疚。

name: You are right. Let's do it.
value: 你說的沒錯，讓我們開始吧。

name: See, even in a fair fight, you have the power to defeat me now. That is why I have no objections to you being Queen.
value: 看吧，即使是公平的戰鬥，你如今還是能勝過我，這也是我不反對你作為天后的原因。

name: I see that you still cannot forgive yourself and will be tormented by your own guilt.
value: 我看得出來，你還是不肯放下自責，依舊會受到不安之心的折磨。

name: Tell me, are you willing to let go of your former self and accept my forgiveness?
value: 告訴我，你真的能拋棄曾經的自己，接受我的原諒了嗎？

name: I understand, sister. I will chase away the shadows in my heart.
value: 我明白了，我會消除自己內心的陰影。

name: Then face your past self, and take back your willpower!
value: 那就面對她，然後從她手中奪回你的意志！

name: I need time to figure this all out...
value: 我還沒有想清楚這一切……

name: Then I will watch over you until the day when you are ready to face your past.
value: 那麼我會一直守護你，直到你能真正面對自己過去的那一天。

name: Hehe, you returned to me, my other half.
value: 呵呵，你又回來了，我的另一半。

name: We haven't tasted blood in so long... You must miss it, right? Is our blood-soaked rose garden still alive?
value: 這麼長時間沒有品嘗鮮血的滋味了，一定很懷念那種味道吧？我們的玫瑰園還在嗎？

name: I no longer grow roses. That land has now become a paradise for the gods of Asgard.
value: 我已經不再培育玫瑰了，那塊土地，如今已經成為了阿斯加德眾神的樂園。

name: Tsk. I don't understand you. You stopped at nothing to become Queen, but now you are willing to throw it away so easily.
value: 我真難以理解，陰謀與詭計曾讓你得到天后的權力，但如今你卻這麼輕易地拋棄了。

name: I will no longer rely on those methods. Even if I gain power through such disgraceful deeds, power alone will not convince the gods.
value: 如今的我已經不需要依靠那些手段了，令人不齒的行為即使得到權力，也無法讓眾神信服。

name: I must regain my honor and dignity in the eyes of the gods. Even if it costs me the throne!
value: 我哪怕失去自己的地位，也要換回自己在眾神眼中真正的榮耀和尊嚴！

name: Can you really do it? Go ahead and try...
value: 你真的做得到嗎？儘管來試試吧……

name: I didn't think that you would actually defeat me...
value: 呵呵……我沒想到自己真的會有被你擊敗的這一天……

name: I will say goodbye to you, to my old self.
value: 是的，我將與你道別，與過去的自己道別。

name: You have grown a lot... But I am your shadow, I will not disappear so easily...
value: 你成長了不少呢……但作為你曾經的陰影，我不會這麼容易就消散的……

name: As long as you still have regrets, guilt, and cowardice in your heart... As long as you still can't let go of the past... Sooner or later, I will return.
value: 只要你內心還有不舍、愧疚和膽怯，只要你還放不下過去的不安，我就遲早會回來找你……

name: I will remember my past mistakes, but I will no longer let them hold me back.
value: 我會記住自己曾經的過錯，但我絕不會因此而躊躇不前。

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Frigga's Dreamland
value: 用於提升弗麗嘉的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Frigga’s Shard Optional Box
value: 弗麗嘉女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the box and choose Frigga's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇弗麗嘉任意品質的碎片

name: I plucked all the flowers from the rose garden to make a path for you… I hope you will love everything here…
value: 為了迎接你，我可是摘下了整個玫瑰園的花來給你鋪路呢……我期待著你會喜歡上這一切……

name: In Norse mythology, Frigga is considered the queen of the gods and the protector of family and marriage. Although, she prefers to be thought of as a loving mother than a queen.\nFrigga often transforms into an old woman, doing good deeds for Odin on Midgard, or into a love messenger, saving those lovers who are in love but forced to separate.
value: 她是北歐神話中的天后，是家庭和婚姻的守護神。\n雖然貴為天后，但弗麗嘉更渴望以慈母的形象示人，她常化身老嫗，替奧丁在凡間行善，亦或者是化身愛情使者，拯救那些相愛但被迫分離的情侶。

name: A red rose among the thorns, its petals as bright and dripping as blood, just a glance at it, and it seems like it will suck away your soul…
value: 一株荊棘中的紅玫瑰，花瓣如鮮血般鮮豔欲滴，光是看上它一眼，就仿佛會被抽走靈魂……

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_97
value: 在那朦朧的夢境中，與你邂逅。

name: Used to buy goods in the Funland Shop
value: 用於遊樂園商店商品購買

name: Funland Parade event item, upon usage, allows you to randomly advance 1 to 6 spaces
value: 遊樂園巡遊活動道具，使用後隨機前進1~6格

name: Funland Parade event item, upon usage, allows you to freely move forward anywhere between 1 to 6 spaces
value: 遊樂園巡遊活動道具，使用後任意前進1~6格

name: Total number of dice rolled {0} times
ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_95
value: 多種負面狀態 治療友軍

name: Deals 200% M.DMG to all enemies and has a 50% chance of inflicting [Poison], [Ignite], [Sunder Armor], [Pierce], and [Bleeding] for 2 rounds.
value: 對敵方全體造成200%的法術傷害，並有50%概率使全體敵方獲得【中毒】【燃燒】【破甲】【擊破】【流血】（持續2回合）

name: Deals M.DMG equal to [50% * Number of Debuffs on the target] to each enemy and heals all allies of 100% of her ATK.
value: 對敵人全體造成負面狀態數量*50%的法術傷害，並治療我方全體弗麗嘉100%攻擊力的生命值

name: Deals 220% M.DMG to all enemies and has a 60% chance of inflicting [Poison], [Ignite], [Sunder Armor], [Pierce], and [Bleeding] for 2 rounds; and [Stun] and [Freeze] for 1 round.
value: 對敵方全體造成220%的法術傷害，並有60%概率使全體敵方獲得【中毒】【燃燒】【破甲】【擊破】【流血】（持續2回合），【眩暈】【冰凍】（持續1回合）

name: Deals M.DMG equal to [70% * Number of Debuffs on the target] to each enemy. If the number of debuffs on that angel is 4 or more, additionally deals 30% True DMG equal to 30% Frigga's ATK for each debuff the target has. Then, heals all allies of 120% of her ATK.
value: 對敵人全體造成負面狀態數量*70%的法術傷害，如果負面狀態數量大於3，則每個負面狀態附帶弗麗嘉攻擊力30%的真實傷害。然後治療我方全體弗麗嘉120%攻擊力的生命值

name: Doubles the healing amount. 100% of the overflow healing is converted to shield, lasting 2 rounds
value: 治療量翻倍，溢出治療量的100%轉化為護盾，護盾持續2回合

name:
When entering battle, there is a 50% chance to inflict [Isolated] on the enemy with the highest ATK. When Frigga is in action, inflicts 1 layer of [Malediction] on all enemies, lasting until the end of the battle.

[Isolated]: Cannot receive any buffs for 2 rounds (cannot be dispelled and ignores Debuff RES).
[Malediction]: Increases DMG taken by 1% for each layer (stackable, ignores Debuff RES).
value: 進入戰鬥時，有50%概率使敵方攻擊力最高的女神進入【孤立】狀態（無視異常抵抗，無法驅散），戰鬥開始後不會受到任何增益狀態，持續2回合。每回合行動時，使全體敵方獲得1層【脆弱】狀態（無視異常抵抗，可疊加，持續至戰鬥結束），每層使敵方受到傷害增加1%。

name: Increases Skill DMG by 15%, Normal DMG by 30%
value: 技能傷害提升15%，普攻傷害提升30%

name: Killing an enemy increases DMG by 10% until the end(up to 2 layers)
value: 擊殺敵人後使自身傷害提升10%，可疊加至2層，持續至戰鬥結束

name: When taking action, increase self ATK and Leech by 10%, stacking up to 3 layers and lasting until the end of the battle.
value: 行動時使自身攻擊力、吸血提升10%，可疊加至3層，持續至戰鬥結束

name: When taking action, restore 10% of self Max HP, and deal True DMG equal to the amount of overflowing healing to a random enemy.
value: 行動時，回復自身10%最大生命值，溢出回復量對隨機敵人造成等額真實傷害

name: When in action,increase ATK and leech by 10% until the end(up to 3 layers)
value: 行動時使自身防禦、傷害反彈提升10%，可疊加至3層，持續至戰鬥結束

name: Receive 10% less DMG from skills and increase 10% Debuff RES
value: 受到技能傷害降低10%，異常抵抗提升10%

name: Increases Healing Received and Shield Received by 20%
value: 受到的治療效果提高20%，受到的護盾效果提高20%

name: Increases Healing Effect by 30% and Debuff RES by 10%
value: 治療效果提升30%，異常抵抗提升10%

name: When taking damgae, restore 10% of the lost HP value.
value: 受到傷害時，自身恢復10%已損失生命值

name: When taking action, restores 10% of the HP of the ally with the lowest HP.
value: 每回合行動時，恢復生命值最低的友方女神50%的生命值

name: Ignores 10% of the enemy's Debuff RES and reduces Skill DMG taken by 10%
value: 受到技能傷害降低10%，無視異常抵抗10%

name: When taking damage, increases self Effect ACC by 3% until the end of the battle (can be stacked up to 10 layers).
value: 受到傷害時，使自身效果命中提高3%，可疊加10層，持續至戰鬥結束

name: When taking action, increases Max HP by 10%, stacking up to 3 layers and lasting until the end of the battle
value: 每回合行動時，提升自身生命上限10%，可疊加至3層，持續至戰鬥結束

name: The debuffs on herself have a 30% chance to fail at being dispelled
value: 負面狀態被驅散時有30%概率失敗

name: Collect 55 Frigga Shards to summon Frigga
value: 集齊55個弗麗嘉碎片可以召喚弗麗嘉

name: ACTIVITY_HOLIDAY_WEEK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 這是今天的海洋紀念卡獎勵，謝謝支持

name: Finish the current parade and go back to the beginning
value: 完成本輪巡遊回到起點

name: Multiply the next reward effect by 2
value: 下一次獎勵格子獎勵效果翻倍

name: Upgrade one random building that can still be upgraded
value: 隨機升級一個未滿級建築

name: Multiply the next dice roll by 2
Set the next dice roll to 1
value: 下一次隨機骰子結果為1

name: Probability of winning the Grand Prize: {0}
Probability of winning the Second Prize: {0}
Probability of winning the Third Prize: {0}
Drops during the 3rd Anniversary event. Can be opened in the Cake Giftbox
value: 三周年活動期間掛機掉落，可在蛋糕禮盒中開啟

name: Open the treasure chest and choose one shard of any Classic Angel (including Loki and all previous SSR+ Angels or Superior Summon Scroll)
value: 打開寶箱選擇任意經典女神的一個碎片（洛基及之前的所有稀有SSR+女神、稀有女神召喚券）

name: Cake Giftbox will be dropped in the Dungeon Battle during the event period
value: 活動期間副本戰鬥掉落蛋糕禮盒

name: Rolled {0} times in total Miracle Card
CARNIVAL_RECYCLE_GOODS_TITLE
value: 遊樂園限定道具和積分回收

name: CARNIVAL_RECYCLE_GOODS_CONTENT
value: 本次遊樂園活動已結束，活動道具和積分已自動回收成鑽石

name: CARNIVAL_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_TITLE
value: 遊樂園活動排行榜獎勵

name: CARNIVAL_RANK_REWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 恭喜您在遊樂園活動排行榜活動中獲得第{0}名，以下為您的獎勵:

name: CARNIVAL_SEND_NOT_RECEIVE_REWARD_CONTENT
value: 這是您在遊樂園活動中未領取的獎勵

name: Location requires higher building levels to unlock
value: 建築等級不足，該位置未開放

name: Unlock after awakening one UR Angel
A powerful metal formed from the blood of ancient dragons, one day it will bring about the destruction of the gods...
value: 巨龍流出的血液凝結而成的強大金屬，有一天終將會為諸神帶來毀滅……

name: When taking damgae, restore 10% of the lost HP value.
value: 受到傷害時，自身恢復10%已損失生命值

name: Your chosen goddess' Star Mark has already reached the max level. Do you confirm?
value: 你選擇的女神星標等級已經達到最大等級，是否確認選擇

name: When finishing one lap of the parade, get
This Angel has not yet unlocked the Destiny Star system
value: 該女神暫未解鎖命星系統

name: This Angel has not been obtained yet
Unlock this battlepass to get the following rewards
value: 解鎖當前禮包總計可以獲得以下獎勵

name: Funland Vouchers will be automatically recycled after the event
value: 活動結束後自動回收遊樂園彩券

name: Increases DMG taken by 1% for each layer
When the shadows of midnight descend on the carnival of pumpkins and candy
value: 當午夜的魅影，降臨南瓜與糖果的狂歡節

name: When Athena enters the battle, she enters the [God of War], purifying herself of all debuffs, including those that can't be dispelled, and becomes immune to all debuffs for one round.\n\nAfter Athena takes action, if the HP of the enemy in her opposite position is less than 1.5 times of Athena's current Max ATK, she will directly execute that enemy, ignoring all effects.
value: 進入戰鬥時，雅典娜進入【戰神】狀態，淨化自身所有不良狀態（包含不可驅散類型），並且免疫任何異常狀態，持續1回合。雅典娜行動後，如果對位敵方女神當前血量低於雅典娜當前最大攻擊力的1.5倍，則直接斬殺該敵人，無視一切效果。

name: Gain immunity to debuffs for 2 rounds
ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_98
value: 吹往戰場的疾風，是我賜予你的守護。

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Athena's Dreamland
value: 用於提升雅典娜的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Athena’s Shard Optional Box
value: 雅典娜女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the box and choose Athena's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇雅典娜任意品質的碎片

name: 3rd Anniversary Coin will be automatically recycled after the event ends
value: 活動結束後自動回收三周年紀念幣

name: Oh my, look who we have here.
The famous Goddess of Wisdom and War! The mighty Athena!
value: 大名鼎鼎的戰爭之主，智慧與庇護的使者，雅典娜女神！

name: Stop with such flattery. I am in trouble and need your help.
value: 奉承的話就不用多說了，我遇到了麻煩，需要你幫忙。

name: Wait... Your divine power... It's gone! What has happened?
value: 等等……你的神力……好像消失了？究竟發生了什麼？

name: Poseidon started a war! She caused an earthquake that sank Athens into the sea. She's trying to turn it into the new Atlantis!
value: 波塞冬挑起了戰爭，她發動大地震讓雅典城沉入了海中，想將它變為新的亞特蘭蒂斯。

name: So you gave all of your divinity to save the city? How compassionate of you.
value: 於是你付出了全部的神格來拯救雅典城？你還真是慈悲為懷啊。

name: Cut the sarcastic comments. Just give me your magic box so I can use it to fight Poseidon.
value: 少說風涼話了，如果你真想幫忙，就把你的魔盒給我，我要用它來與波塞冬抗衡！

name: Unfortunately my magic box doesn't work that way. But I do have a way to help you regain your powers.
value: 很遺憾，那破玩意恐怕派不上什麼用場。但是別擔心，我有辦法幫你重獲神力。

name: Great! What do I have to do?
value: 很好，那接下來我們要怎麼做？

name: First of all, you have to pass my trial... But since you're mortal now, can you do it?
value: 按照我的規矩，你得先通過進入夢境的試煉……然而你現在是凡人之身，能行嗎？

name: Heh... You better not underestimate the power of mortals!
value: 呵……你最好別小瞧了凡人的力量！

name: You lost, Pandora. Victory belongs to me, the Goddess of War!
value: 你輸了，潘多拉，這場決鬥是戰爭之主的勝利！

name: It seems that even without your divinity, you are not one to be underestimated in battle.
value: 看來即使失去神格的力量，你在戰鬥中也不見得會落下風。

name: Yes, now tell me your plan.
value: 現在你可以告訴我你的計畫了。

name: Well, it's a bit difficult to explain. Before that, let's go meet some old friends of yours.
value: 當然，只不過有點複雜。讓我們去見見你的幾個老朋友再說吧……

name: Pandora, I don't remember inviting you here.
value: 潘多拉，我可不記得邀請過你。

name: It doesn't matter if you don't want to see me. But, this goddess here wants to see you.
value: 你不想見我無所謂，但這位女神大人想要見你可是件大事。

name: Athena? I have nothing to say to goddesses like you. Wait... you don't have a divine aura?
value: 雅典娜？我和你們這樣的女神沒什麼好說的……等等，你身上沒有神格的氣息？

name: Oh let me guess! You're mortal? Hehe I didn't expect to enjoy to have a treat like you today.
value: 讓我猜猜，你變成凡人了？想不到你也有今天。

name: I think you'll find she's no mere treat. Instead, you'll taste defeat today.
value: 你口中的“今天”很快就要結束了，伴隨著你被擊敗。

name: And how do you propose to do that? Do you think you're still the high and mighty Goddess of War? You're a mortal now!
value: 等一下，你們想幹嘛？你以為你還是那個高高在上的戰爭女神嗎？你只不過是一介凡人！

name: Yes, I'm mortal. But don't you know? Even mortals can defeat gods.
value: 沒錯，但凡人戰勝神明的故事，你聽得還不夠多嗎？

name: I didn't expect you to defeat me so easily without your divinity.
value: 沒想到你即使失去幾乎所有神力，還是能如此輕易地擊敗我。

name: Hmm it's strange but I think I feel the beginnings of my power returning.
value: 奇怪，在與你的戰鬥中，我似乎感受到力量開始回歸的跡象了。

name: Hehe. Then my plan is working. Every opponent you defeat in this dreamland will help you regain a part of your divinity.
value: 看來我的夢境開始起作用了呢，你每次擊敗夢境中的對手，都將找回一部分神格。

name: How exciting. So, when I defeat my last opponent...?
value: 這聽起來可真讓人興奮，也就是說，我擊敗最後一個夢境中的對手時……

name: Your divinity will be fully restored.
value: 你的神格就完全恢復了。

name: This method seems right up my alley, I will enjoy it. As for you... Care to join me and witness it?
value: 有意思，我會好好享受這個過程的，至於你……有興趣作為見證者，與我同行麼？

name: Oh yes, I would like to see how a mortal can regain lost divinity.
value: 不錯的點子，我也想看看凡人重新獲得神權的過程。

name: Here's your next opponent. But I guess you're more familiar with her than I am.
value: 我猜，這兒你應該比我熟。

name: Even when I was a goddess, she was rather difficult to deal with.
value: 在我還是神明的時候，她就是個非常難對付的傢伙……

name: Don't forget, mortals have beaten her once before. With aid from none other than yourself.
value: 你忘了，曾經也有凡人擊敗過她，而且還是在你的幫助下，鼓起勇氣吧。

name: Athena? How dare you show your face in my temple? Hold on, your divinity is gone.
value: 雅典娜？你居然還敢出現在我的神廟門口……不對，你身上沒有神格的氣息……

name: I protected the city of Athens against Poseidon's attack, using my divine power.
value: 我用自己的神力保護了雅典城免受波塞冬的侵害。

name: What a selfless act. Or perhaps it's stupidity.
value: 呵呵……這該說無私還是愚蠢呢？

name: And you actually came to meet me, your former enemy, in your mortal state. I admire your courage.
value: 不過你居然在凡人的狀態下來見曾經的敵人，我佩服你的勇氣。

name: You pose no threat to me. I already know all your weaknesses.
value: 擊敗你並不是什麼困難的事，我知道你的所有弱點。

name: Hehe well I'd love to have a statue of a goddess to decorate my temple.
value: 我很樂意在我的神廟裏立一尊真正的“女神石像”！

name: Throw in the towel, Medusa. The Goddess of War doesn't need to rely on luck to win.
value: 認輸吧，戰爭之主可不是靠運氣取得勝利的。

name: Aw, how unlucky for me! What do you want with me?
value: 算我倒楣！你想拿我怎麼樣？

name: Don't worry, my dear. I just used this battle with you to regain part of my lost divinity.
value: 安心，親愛的，我只是借與你的這場戰鬥，取回我失去的一部分神力而已。

name: Heh... The last mortal who defeated me removed my head. Speaking of, where are you going?
value: 呵……上一個戰勝我的凡人可是直接讓我腦袋搬家了，話說回來你們打算去哪？

name: Where else? To regain the rest of my power, of course. And then to settle things with Poseidon.
value: 還能去哪，當然是幫女神取回神力，然後找波塞冬算總帳。

name: If you're going after Poseidon, count me in! She flooded my temple.
value: 如果你是要找波塞冬麻煩，算我一個，她這次幹的太過分了，把我的神廟淹了大半。

name: I never thought that one day we would be on the same side.
value: 我從沒想過，有一天還能和你站在同一條陣線上。

name: Don't get carried away. This is only a temporary truce. Let's go.
value: 別得意忘形了，我們只是暫時合作而已。

name: Pandora, why have you brought me to the underworld? You know mortals cannot easily escape once stepping foot in here.
value: 潘多拉，你帶我來冥界幹什麼？我現在可是凡人，進去後可就很難再出來了。

name: Calm down, we're only going as far as the nightmare controlled by Phantasos. We don't need to cross the river Styx.
value: 放心，我們只是前往方塔蘇斯的噩夢而已，並不需要渡過冥河。

name: I knew I sensed someone's aura approaching. You are neither dead nor asleep, what are you doing here?
value: 我老遠就感受到你們的氣息了，你們既不是亡者，也不是沉睡之人，來我這裏幹什麼？

name: Phantasos, I need a crystal formed from the essence of your dream.
value: 方塔蘇斯，我需要你夢境中的一塊精華結晶。

name: Hmm... If I did give it to you, what are you planning to do with it?
value: 暫且不說我會不會給你，我想先問問，你拿它是要做什麼？

name: We need to synthesize it into a replacement vessel for divinity, and then provide divine power to Athena.
value: 我們需要將它合成一種替代神格的載體，然後為雅典娜提供神力。

name: Oh? The once incomparable Goddess of Wisdom and War has actually lost her divinity?
value: 哦……？曾經不可一世的智慧與戰爭女神，居然會把自己的神格弄丟？

name: But I am not a philanthropist. If you want it, you will have to take it.
value: 不過我可不是慈善家，想要的話，你們就來搶吧。

name: Then in the name of the Goddess of Wisdom and War, prepare yourself!
value: 以智慧與戰爭女神之名，那我就不客氣了。

name: I do not understand. How are you able to shatter my nightmare as a mortal?
value: 我不明白，你是如何以凡人之軀擊破我的夢境的？

name: Strength may be the door to victory, but wisdom is the key. You failed to see that because of your arrogance.
value: 或許力量是制勝的一環，但智慧才是關鍵，你太過傲慢，否認了智慧對於凡人的重要性。

name: Well whatever, the fact is I lost to you. I will give you a dream crystal.
value: 不管如何，我輸給你是事實，就給你一塊夢境結晶好了。

name: In addition, let me go with you to see how your so-called wisdom is reflected on the battlefield.
value: 另外，不如讓我和你一塊前行，看看你所謂的智慧是如何在戰場上體現的。

name: I have no objection, Goddess of Nightmares.
Next, let's go to the Zodiac, to collect the light of the stars and awaken the energy of the dream crystal.
value: 接下來我們去黃道吧，去上面收集星辰之光，喚醒夢境結晶的能量。

name: This is the forbidden area of the Zodiac. Goddesses of Olympus, this place is not for you.
value: 這是黃道禁地，奧林匹斯的女神們，這裏不屬於你們該來的地方。

name: It's okay, we just need a little starlight from the Zodiac.
value: 沒關係，我只需要黃道上的一點星光。

name: I also remember you, Goddess Pan. It was I who used trickery to turn you into what you are now.
value: 我也記得你，潘神，是我用計策把你變成現在這副模樣的。

name: ...I am not angry, nor do I want revenge, but the righteousness in my heart drives me to seek justice from you.
value: 雖然我沒有憤怒，也感受不到復仇的意義，但是我內心的正義驅使著我向你討要公道。

name: I accept your justice. Come, it's an honor to end it with a fight.
value: 我接受你的正義，來吧，以戰鬥來做個了斷也是一種榮耀。

name: Although your justice did not prevail, I admire your unyielding will.
value: 雖然你的正義並沒有獲得勝利，但我欣賞你不屈的意志。

name: Victory doesn't favor me today. Well, you can take anything from the Zodiac as your prize.
value: 勝利女神今天並不青睞我，好吧，你可以拿走黃道的任何東西作為戰利品。

name: Don't worry, all I need is a little bit of starlight.
value: 不用擔心，我只需要一點點星光而已。

name: Athena, are you trying to recover your lost divinity? Perhaps I can help you on your journey?
value: 雅典娜，你是在嘗試尋回丟失的神格嗎？或許我能在接下來的旅程中助你一臂之力？

name: Are you really willing to help me? Even though I have hurt you in the past.
value: 你真的願意幫助我嗎？即使是在我曾經傷害過你的情況下。

name: The truth is, changing from the Goddess Pan to Capricornus was not too difficult to accept.
value: 事實上，從潘神變成摩羯座，並不是什麼太難以接受的事情。

name: Athena? Why have you come to the dreams of the Zodiac?
value: 雅典娜？你為什麼會到黃道眾星的夢境裏來？

name: It's been a while. I need a bit of help.
value: 別來無恙，我遇到了點小麻煩。

name: You... don't seem to have your divinity anymore?
value: 你身上……好像不再擁有神格了？

name: I've heard of your war with Poseidon. So you want to use the portal here to go straight to Poseidon's palace?
value: 我聽說過你和波塞冬的戰爭。所以你是想從這裏的傳送門，直接前往波塞冬的宮殿？

name: You won't be able to stay in the ocean for long with your mortal body. I can give you the power to breathe underwater.
value: 恐怕以你的凡人身軀無法在海洋待太久吧？我可以賦予你讓凡人在海底呼吸的力量。

name: But due to my status as the guardian of the portal, I can't just give you this ability...
value: 但礙於我傳送門守護者身份，我無法直接將這種能力給你，除非你在戰鬥中……

name: I understand. I'll go easy on you.
value: 我明白了，我會對你手下留情的。

name: Stop! I really didn't expect you to still be so powerful after losing your divinity.
value: 快停手！真沒想到你失去了神力還是這樣所向披靡。

name: Of course, I'm just doing the great Goddess of Wisdom and War a small favor.
value: 別在意，我只是幫了偉大的智慧與戰爭女神一個小忙而已。

name: I am the Guardian of the Sea and the Celestial Gate, who are you? What do you want in the underwater world?
value: 我是大海與星空之門的守護者，你們是誰？來海底世界想做什麼？

name: Is this phantom that looks like me... the guardian of the dream passage?
value: 和我一樣的形象……夢境通道的守護者嗎？

name: The dream under the sea does not allow for an existence such as you to enter.
value: 海底的夢境並不允許你這樣的存在。

name: Unfortunately, I also don't want an existence like you to stand in my way!
value: 遺憾的是，我也不希望你這樣的存在出現在阻擋我的道路上！

name: What a powerful display! It's been a long time since I saw such exquisite fighting skills.
value: 真是強大的力量，好久沒有看到如此精湛的戰鬥技巧了。

name: Looks like I've regained most of my divine power. Let's move on, I want to get back to the waking world as soon as possible.
value: 看來我已經恢復了大部分的神格，繼續前進吧，我想盡快回到現實。

name: Poseidon! I am standing in front of your palace right now. Come out and face me! Or do you want me to tear down your throne first?
value: 波塞冬！我現在就站在你的宮殿門口，難道要我把你的王座拆了，你才肯出來面對我嗎？

name: Athena, I admire you for daring to confront me in the dreamland, even without your divinity.
value: 雅典娜，作為一個丟了神格的女神，我挺敬佩你還敢在夢境中找我對峙。

name: Poseidon, I cannot forgive you for flooding Athens. As the Goddess of War, you will face my judgement!
value: 波塞冬，我難以原諒你將雅典淹沒的罪行，我將以戰爭女神的身份向你問罪！

name: I thought you could understand my current situation after losing your divinity, but it seems that I was hoping for too much.
value: 我以為你在丟失神格後，能理解我現在的處境，但看來我想多了。

name: No, I understand that it was painful for you to lose your original divinity when you descended into the mortal world.
value: 不，我明白你在降臨現實世界後，失去原有的神力是一件痛苦的事情。

name: But that's no reason to flood the whole world!
value: 但將全世界化為海洋，並不能成為你為了獲取力量的藉口。

name: Then there is nothing more to be said. We can only fight!
value: 那麼沒有必要多說什麼了，只有戰鬥能解決問題！

name: It's over, Poseidon! Let the seas recede, and I will let this matter go.
value: 一切結束了，波塞冬！讓海水褪去，這件事我可以既往不咎。

name: No, this is the only way I can regain my divine power and strength. I can't just give up like this.
value: 不，這是我唯一能夠找回神格與力量的方式，我不能就這樣放棄。

name: Very well, I will give you a second chance if you dare.
value: 很好，如果你有膽量，我會給你第二次機會的。

name: Athena, I will step in for Poseidon in the next battle.
value: 雅典娜，接下來的戰鬥，就由我來代替波塞冬吧。

name: Poseidon is my sister, and you should treat her with the respect she deserves.
value: 波塞冬是我的姐妹，你應該對她保持應有的尊重。

name: I'd be happy to do so if she hadn't tried to harm my people, but now...
value: 我很抱歉，如果她沒有試圖傷害我的子民，我很樂意這麼做，但現在……

name: Then let me fight you instead of her.
value: 那就由我來代替她和你戰鬥吧。

name: You can't hide it from me. As the Goddess of War, you've been longing for the day when you get to face me in battle, right?
value: 你瞞不了我，作為戰爭女神，你早就渴望著和我對決的這一天了，沒錯吧？

name: Hehe. You seem to be hesitant, Lady Athena. Do you need me to give you some confidence?
value: 呵呵……你好像看上去挺猶豫的，雅典娜大人，需要我再給你點自信？

name: No. I will face this battle in the body of a mortal.
value: 不……我會以凡人的身軀面對這場戰鬥。

name: It is my victory! Even without my original divinity, I still defeated the Ruler of Olympus.
value: 是我的勝利，即使是失去神格，我依然以凡人的身份戰勝了眾神之王。

name: Yes, Athena, you are victorious. Your kindness and wisdom are worthy of your rediscovered power.
value: 沒錯，雅典娜，你勝利了，你的仁慈與智慧，配得上你重新找回的神力。

name: Perhaps we should all reflect on whether we, as gods, have fallen into eternal arrogance.
value: 或許我們都該好好反省一下，作為神，我們是否都陷入了永恆的傲慢之中。

name: Don't talk so grandly, Athena, or did you forget what you did to the people of Troy during the Trojan War?
value: 話別說得這麼冠冕堂皇，雅典娜，特洛伊之戰的時候，你對特洛伊的子民又做了什麼呢？

name: You may be merciful, but isn't it only to your own people? Haven't you vented your anger against the people of other countries?
value: 你或許仁慈，但是否只是對自己的子民呢？對待他邦之民，你難道沒有盡情宣洩怒火嗎？

name: ...I'm sorry, Apollo. I've always tried to be fair in wars, but you had left me with no other choice.
value: ……我很抱歉，阿波羅，對於戰爭我始終都力求公正，但當時是你們讓我別無選擇。

name: Fight me with your current power. If you win, then I will recognize your will!
value: 以你現在的力量與我一戰吧，如果你贏了，那我就認可你的意志！

name: Very well, I admire your courage and willingness to face responsibility.
value: 很好，我很敬佩你的勇氣和敢於面對責任之心。

name: Let us take off our armor and settle our grievances like two mortals!
value: 既然這樣……讓我們脫下盔甲，像兩個人類一樣解決恩怨吧！

name: I have no intention of fighting you, it's pointless!
value: 我無心與你戰鬥，這是沒有意義之舉！

name: Hmph! As I thought, the Goddess of Wisdom is not impulsive.
value: 哼！如我所想的一樣啊，智慧女神確實從不衝動。

name: Then let's decide the outcome on a future battlefield. You lead the Athenian army, and I will lead the Macedonian warriors!
value: 那我們就在將來的戰場上再決勝負吧，你帶著雅典大軍，而我則帶著馬其頓勇士！

name: I accept your challenge, this mortal battle. If I win, I hope you can let go of the grievances of the past.
value: 我接受你的挑戰，這場凡人之身的戰鬥，如果我勝利了，希望你能夠放下過去的恩怨。

name: No problem... if you win. Let's get started!
Heh you really are skilled, Goddess of Wisdom and War. If it were the former you, it would have been my victory. But now...
value: 呵……長本事了啊，智慧與戰爭女神，如果是之前的你，必然會被我擊敗。

name: In fact, I also let you show me your moves. If I went all out, the fight would have been over too soon.
value: 事實上我還讓你你幾招，如果全力以赴，這場戰鬥會更快結束。

name: Hmph! Even if you say that, you did win, so we no longer have any grudges against each other.
value: 哼，就算你贏了吧，我們彼此間不再有恩怨。

name: But I hope that in the future you will be fair and just not only for your own people but also everyone else.
value: 但我希望你將來能踐行自己對於正義的原則，無論是對自己的子民，還是對外邦人。

name: I will never let anyone down again.
value: 我必不會再讓任何人失望。

name: Of the two most charming goddesses of the Nordic region, who would you favor more, Freyja or me?
value: 同為北歐最有魅力的女神，我和芙蕾雅，你會更青睞誰呢？

name: Nordic gods often say love involves blind sacrifices. Is that so?
value: 北歐眾神們總說愛情會讓人付出盲目的犧牲，果真如此嗎？

name: I heard that watering roses with the blood of a loved one bestows them with powerful magic…
value: 聽說，用相愛之人的血來澆灌玫瑰，會賦予它們強大的魔力……

name: I enjoy watching things wilt. The end result reminds me of roses smashed by a hammer. Beauty can be found even in its own destruction.
value: 我喜歡事物凋零時的感覺，就像薔薇被鐵錘敲碎的瞬間，也有一種獨特的美……

name: I’ve heard that Venus has quite some views on love, I’d like to meet her.
value: 我聽說維納斯對愛情之事頗有看法，挺想和她見上一面呢。

name: I love adorable and beautiful things, so much that I want to crush them all…
value: 我喜歡那些可愛美麗的東西，喜歡到想要把它們都捏碎……

name: Hmm... want to take a guess?
I don’t think it necessarily is.
I’ve heard such rumors as well!
It sounds like a myth to me.
Thor would probably feel the same.
I have a bad feeling about this…
Have you ever looked in the mirror?
Er… the same goes for me?
Really? Is that the truth, or are you lying?
value: 是嗎？呵呵……這句話是真話，還是謊話呢……？

name: Hmm, you seem to hesitate. Would you rather become fertilizer in my rose garden.
value: 哼，你好像在猶豫呢，是想成為我玫瑰園中的養料嗎？

name: But isn’t love without sacrifice less genuine?
value: 可如果不能為了愛而犧牲，那還算真摯的愛嗎？

name: So, what would you sacrifice for me?
value: 那麼，你會為了我犧牲什麼呢？

name: So guess what exciting thing I am about to do next…
value: 那麼猜猜看，接下來我要對你做什麼刺激的事情了呢……

name: Interesting! Shall we test it?
value: 有意思！我們來驗證一下怎麼樣……？

name: As a child, she enjoyed playing with me. I taught her a lot about wielding a hammer.
value: 她小時候可喜歡找我玩了，使用戰錘的本事我可沒少教她。

name: Hmph, after witnessing me pulverizing monsters on the battlefield, I believe you would understand.
value: 哼，在戰場上看到我擊碎魔物的身姿後，我相信你會理解這種美感的。

name: As a child, she enjoyed playing with me. I taught her a lot about wielding a hammer.
value: 為什麼呢？我只是想和她分享一下戀愛的經驗啊。

name: I think so too, at least as a goddess of love, she would understand my philosophy of love.
value: 我也這麼覺得，至少作為愛神，她能理解我對愛情的理念。

name: Are you asking if I’ve had the same thought about myself? Indeed, I have…
value: 你是想問我會不會對自己也產生這樣的想法？不瞞你說，的確會有……

name: You guessed it. I indeed want to hold you tight in my arms, relishing in your slow suffocation…
value: 猜對了呢，我確實想把你用力抱在懷裏，享受你慢慢窒息的過程……

name: Angel not owned. Confirm your choice?
value: 暫未擁有該女神，是否確認選擇？

name: Event items of the Sweet Surprise event. Collect and use them to unlock the Cake Chest.
value: 蛋糕大寶箱活動道具，可用來開啟蛋糕寶箱

name: Event items. Collect them to exchange for prizes in the Sweet Surprise.
value: 活動道具，可在蛋糕大寶箱活動中兌換物品獎勵

name: Pandora, come out! I know you are hiding in the Dreamland. I need your power to create a new world order.
value: 潘多拉，快出來！我知道你躲在夢境裏，我需要借用你的能力，幫我創造一個新的世界。

name: Who is yelling so rudely? Huh, Asura?
value: 是誰這麼沒禮貌……呃，是阿修羅麼……

name: You bloodthirsty goddesses who live and thrive on the battlefield, you want to reshape the world?
value: 你們這些從來都不離開戰場的好戰分子，也會有想要創造新世界的一天？

name: This is not a joke. I've been watching the real world, watching you so-called goddesses.
value: 別開玩笑了，我可是一直注視著現實世界，注視著你們這些所謂的“神明”。

name: Interesting. So what have you seen?
value: 有趣，那麼您從中看到了什麼呢？

name: Hmph, a world where gods and humans are supposedly equals, a world tainted by morality.
value: 哼，一個所謂平等，神和人都被道德綁架和腐化的時代而已。

name: It is time to shatter this illusion. I will bring new change. I will create a world where the strong are respected.
value: 是時候打破這個格局了，我會成為新的變革者，創造一個強者為尊，物競天擇的世界。

name: Hehe, I like your idea. But I'm curious, how will you set about doing this?
value: 老實說，你的想法我很喜歡，但是我很好奇你會怎麼踐行這套理念呢？

name: I will topple the current pantheons. Then I will have the goddesses fight for their status and power, under the new rules I set.
value: 我會顛覆當前所有的神系，讓眾神在我所定的新規則下重新爭奪自己的地位和權力。

name: That doesn't sound bad. But before you let me help you, why don't you prove your strength to me?
value: 我倒是不討厭你的想法，但在讓我幫你之前，何不向我證明一下你的實力？

name: I, Asura of Purgatory, always welcome a challenge.
value: 煉獄的修羅一向歡迎她人的挑戰。

name: So, how does it feel to be stepped on?
value: 怎麼樣，被踩在腳下的感覺如何？

name: You are truly unrivaled. But since you are already so powerful, what can I do to help?
value: 你確實無可匹敵。但既然你都已經如此強大，我還有什麼忙可以幫呢？

name: Your ability will allow me to spread my will to every inch of the land, which is much more efficient than defeating each god one by one.
value: 你的能力可以將我的意志散佈到每一寸土地，這可比挨個去戰勝每個神明有效率得多。

name: This really suits your style...
value: 還真符合你的做事風格……

name: This is the Dreamland of the Egyptian goddesses...?
value: 這裏是埃及眾神的夢境……？

name: That's right. The goddesses of Egypt control the balance between life and death. So I want to challenge them for it.
value: 沒錯，埃及的眾神掌控著的生與死的平衡之道，我很想找她們較量一番。

name: Is this Purgatory's Goddess of War, Asura? It's a real surprise to see you here. Why did you and Pandora come to this dreamland?
value: 煉獄戰神阿修羅？看到你出現在這可真是讓我們意外。你和潘多拉來我的夢境所為何事？

name: I'm here for one thing, and one thing only. To challenge you, and claim power over life and death.
value: 我來此只為一件事——向你挑戰，並獲得掌控生死的權力。

name: What do you want the power of life and death for? With your current strength, you should already be able to dominate your enemies.
value: 你要生死之力幹什麼？以你現在的力量，也應該已經能稱霸一方了。

name: This is far from enough... Sun Goddess, I watched the world from Purgatory, and there is chaos everywhere. The strong sacrifice their lives while the weak survive.
value: 這遠遠不夠……太陽神，我從煉獄觀望世間，遍地都是強者獻身，弱者苟活的亂象。

name: It goes against the natural order of things for the strong to sacrifice themselves for the weak.
value: 讓強者為弱者犧牲，這是違背自然秩序的行為。

name: On the contrary, the strong protect the weak, so they have the opportunity to grow strong. This way, humans and goddesses can survive together.
value: 恰恰相反，強者保護弱者，弱者才有成長的機會，人類與眾神才得以延續。

name: It seems that your long reign has blinded your eyes. I am afraid that your kindness will be the downfall of us all.
value: 看來漫長的王權已經遮蔽了你的眼睛，你的仁慈恐怕並不一定能給眾神帶來好結果。

name: All I see is that the givers get nothing, while the lazy ones sit back and enjoy everything that is handed to them.
value: 我只看到那些付出者什麼都沒得到，而怠惰者卻坐享八方佈施的糟糕事情。

name: Well, if you insist on thinking so... Nephthys, give her the power of life.
value: 好吧，如果你執意這樣想……奈芙蒂斯，將生命之力賜予她吧。

name: Um... Are you sure that she won't fall during the battle of the inheritance ritual?
value: 嗯？您確定她能夠保證不在傳承儀式的戰鬥中倒下？

name: Her ideals drive her to face these trials. If she falls in battle, then it is simply fate.
value: 她的理念讓她必須面對這些考驗，如果她在戰鬥中倒下，那也是命運使然。

name: Enough talking, let's get to it.
value: 話說得夠多了，讓我們開始吧。

name: The ritual is over. The power of life is now under my control.
value: 儀式已經結束了，看來生命之力已經為我所掌控。

name: Well, even if we are in a dream, this proves your strength.
value: 事實如此，即使是在夢境，卻也能證明你的強大。

name: Show me the power of death already.
value: 接下來，向我展示死亡之力吧。

name: Death is a good tool, to weed out those who are not strong enough.
value: 死亡是件不錯的工具，足以淘汰掉那些不夠強大的存在。

name: Although we have the power of death, we have never used it as a tool. We only use it in accordance with the rules of nature.
value: 雖然擁有掌控死亡的能力，但我們從不將它作為工具，而只是順應自然的規則來使用它。

name: I don't quite agree with that, Sun Goddess. I will use my own strength to prove the true value of death as a tool.
value: 我並不完全認同你的想法，太陽神，我會以自己的力量來證明死亡真正的價值。

name: Then see if you can master death.
value: 那就看看你能不能駕馭死亡吧。

name: Anubis, come. It is time for the ritual.
value: 阿努比斯，來吧，儀式的時間到了。

name: Understood, I will follow the command of the Sun Goddess.
The ritual is over. Now the power of death is in my hands!
value: 儀式結束，現在世界的本源之力已經掌握在了我的手中。

name: Allow Nephthys and Anubis to follow you. Maybe when you truly understand the power of life and death, you will need their help.
value: 就讓奈芙蒂斯和阿努比斯跟隨你吧，也許當你真正明白生死奧秘之時，會需要她們的幫助。

name: I don't need helpers... But I won't object to them following me. After all, it is instinct to follow the strong.
value: 我並不需要幫手……但她們跟著我也不反對，畢竟追隨強者是一種本能。

name: You will eventually understand the reason for this arrangement.
value: 你之後會理解這一切安排的原因。

name: I heard that the one who controls the power of order and chaos is in your homeland, Pandora?
value: 我聽說掌控秩序與混亂之力的強者就在你的故鄉，潘多拉？

name: The power of order and chaos are in the hands of two goddesses, Athena and Hades. While Zeus, the King of the Greek Pantheon, possesses both.
value: 秩序和混亂之力掌控在雅典娜及哈迪斯兩位女神手中，而神王宙斯則同時擁有兩者。

name: It seems that my target is this King. I will have a good chat with her.
value: 看來我的目標就是這位“神王”了，我會和她好好聊聊的。

name: Who has trespassed into the dreamland of the Greek Pantheon?
value: 是誰闖入了希臘眾神的夢境？

name: Zeus? I thought that a high and mighty ruler, such as yourself, would be sitting comfortably on your throne deep in this dreamland.
value: 宙斯？我原以為你這位高高在上的統治者，只會安穩地坐在夢境深處的王座上。

name: Foreign goddess, may I take what you just said as a challenge?
value: 異邦的神明，我可以把你剛才說的話當作一種挑戰嗎？

name: I have heard of your deeds, foreign goddess. You call yourself Asura, proclaiming the end of this world and the birth of a new one with cruel laws.
value: 我聽說過你的事蹟，外來神。你自稱阿修羅，宣揚末世的言論，以及殘酷的法則。

name: But since you have named yourself a goddess, you did not come from chaos, but from order. Only order can give birth to consciousness.
value: 但你既自稱為神，那就並非來自混沌，即是秩序的產物。只有秩序才能誕生神識。

name: That's right. But don't you think it's perfect for those born of order to break order. Do you not have the courage to do so?
value: 沒錯，誕生於秩序者打破秩序，再合適不過了，你為什麼沒有這份勇氣？

name: I adhere to order, because I have control over myself. And it allows me, and all my people, to live in peace.
value: 我遵從是出於我對自我的控制能力，它讓我，以及所有人都能和平生存。

name: Peace is not equivalent to order, my dear. I will prove it to you.
value: 和平並不意味著秩序，親愛的，讓我證明給你看看吧。

name: Powerful though you are, Goddess of Wisdom, your creed of order will also crumble to dust in my hands.
value: 雖然你很強大，智慧女神，但你對秩序的信條也會在我手裏化為塵埃。

name: Does violence alone explain the meaning of order? It's rather simple, but the outcome of this battle validates your idea of order.
value: 僅靠暴力來闡釋秩序的含義嗎……真是單純，但這場戰鬥的勝負認可了你對秩序的理念。

name: Don't get complacent, foreign goddess. You have only defeated the representative of order. I am looking forward to seeing how you will fare against the power of chaos.
value: 別得意，異邦的神明，你只是擊敗了秩序的代言人，我很期待你將如何應對混亂之力。

name: The raging waves of the underworld will wash away all self-righteous and arrogant ones!
value: 冥界的怒濤會沖散一切自以為是的狂傲之徒……

name: For a moment, I felt that you and I were very similar... But coming face to face with you, I realize our essential difference.
value: 其實我有那麼一刹那感覺你和我很相似，但直到和你面對面，才發現我們本質的不同。

name: You want to build a world where the strong rule. So in your eyes, are plots and schemes the work of the strong?
value: 你想要建立一個強者為王的世界，那麼陰謀在你的眼中算得上強者所為嗎？

name: What a boring question. Plots are worthless in my opinion. Without the fury of the battlefield, one is not worthy to master the power of chaos.
value: 真是無趣的傢伙……陰謀在我看來毫無價值，沒有經過戰場的狂怒，是不配掌控混亂的。

name: Well then, this battle will prove it.
value: 那麼我們讓戰鬥來證明一切吧。

name: The power of the underworld is indeed strong. But it is also so chaotic that it tries to swallow everything. It needs to be guided.
value: 冥土的力量確實強大，但也太過混亂，混亂到企圖吞噬一切……這必須得到引導。

name: I'm glad that you and I agree on this point, at least.
value: 我很欣慰你和我至少在這點上有所共識。

name: Now all that's left is to defeat me. Then you can inherit the power of order and chaos, and redefine the world as you wish.
value: 現在你只需要通過我這一關，就能繼承秩序和混亂的力量，然後去重新定義世界。

name: All it takes is to defeat you? Honestly, you are much more straightforward than I imagined...
value: 只需要擊敗你就行？說實在的，你可比我想像中直白得多……

name: Don't get me wrong, honey. This won't be a piece of cake.
value: 你是不是搞錯了點什麼，親愛的，我可沒打算和你“好好說話”。

name: I know, I already saw the lightning behind you. This is the duel I want!
value: 沒錯，我已經看到你身後綻放的閃電了，這才是我想要的對決！

name: It seems that I am more powerful than you, King of the Greek Pantheon.
value: 看起來我在力量上更勝於你，神王大人。

name: Strength is necessary to control order and chaos, but you also need wisdom to balance it.
value: 力量是掌控秩序與混亂不可或缺的，但你還需擁有智慧，才能在秩序和混亂間取得平衡。

name: Take Athena and Hades with you. When the moment comes that you hold the world in your grasp, you will need them to balance things.
value: 帶上雅典娜和哈迪斯吧，或許在你真正手握整個世界規則的時候，需要她們來為你權衡。

name: Halt! This is the Realm of the Norse Goddesses, and anyone from other Divine Realms is not welcome.
value: 停下，這裏是北歐神域，我們並沒有邀請任何其他神界來訪者。

name: The Guardian of the Rainbow Bridge, Heimdall... She is known for her sense and loyalty.
value: 彩虹橋的守護者海姆達爾嗎……她以理智和忠誠著稱。

name: I'm not here to quarrel with her. I just need to cross the bridge and send a messenger to inform everyone.
value: 我不是來和她鬧情緒的，我只需要過這道橋，以及一個通知所有人的信使。

name: Back off, or I'm going to have to be rude.
value: 退下吧，不然我就要動用粗魯的手段了。

name: Yeah? Hehe... I'd love to see just how rude the Guardian of Asgard can be.
value: 是嗎？呵呵……我倒是想要看看阿斯加德的守門人能有多麼粗魯。

name: Wait... You're not a Greek Goddess. If not for the war, why do you want to break into the Nordic Sanctuary?
value: 等等……你並不是希臘的神明，如果不是發動戰爭，你為何要闖入北歐聖域？

name: Don't be nervous. I just have a little something to discuss with Odin.
value: 別緊張，我只是……找奧丁有些事情商量而已。

name: It's not exactly easy to meet Odin, especially if you have not been invited.
value: 然而想見奧丁可不是件容易事，尤其是在沒有受到邀請的前提下。

name: That's okay, she'll be more than happy to give me the invitation in person when I'm standing in front of her.
value: 沒關係，當我站在她面前時，她會很樂意當面給我邀請函的。

name: No one has ever faced a Norse goddess without batting an eye. You have extraordinary courage and fighting spirit.
value: 還從來沒人能在面對北歐眾神時連眼睛都不眨一下，你有著非凡的勇氣和戰意……

name: Tell me your name and purpose, foreign goddess!
value: 報上你的名字和來意，異邦的神明！

name: I am Asura the Peerless, Purgatory's God of War from Mount Sumeru, and I am here to obtain the wisdom of Odin!
value: 吾乃無雙之阿修羅，須彌之煉獄戰神，來此是為了取得奧丁的智慧！

name: Not a small ambition... but I'm afraid you have to pass me first!
value: 不小的野心……然而恐怕得先過我這一關！

name: Hmph you have good fighting skills. I thought you were just talk.
value: 哼……不錯的戰鬥技巧，我原以為你只是嘴上說說的本事而已。

name: Hehe I'm not the slightest bit interested in bluffing, but you... You are quite interesting to me.
value: 呵呵，我對虛張聲勢這種行為可沒半點興趣，倒是你……挺讓我感興趣的。

name: It's been a long time since I've had to take a fight that seriously.
value: 我很久沒有這麼認真面對一場戰鬥了。

name: Tell me, what do you want Odin's wisdom for?
value: 說說看吧，你要奧丁的智慧做什麼？

name: It's simple. To get stronger, strong enough to change the old rules of the past.
value: 很簡單，變得更強，強到足以改變過去這些陳舊的規則。

name: You're an interesting one. I'll keep an eye on you, to see your next move.
value: 有意思的傢伙……我會留意你之後的舉動的。

name: Asura, I predicted your arrival.
value: 阿修羅，我已經預測到了你的到來。

name: The appearance of a goddess like you is inevitable. With a history as long as ours, such things are bound to happen.
value: 你這樣的女神的出現是必然的，只要我們的歷史夠長，就必定會有這種事情發生。

name: Your words have really surprised me.
Not only did I know the time of your arrival, I also your reason for being here...
value: 我不只知道你到來的時間，也明白你的來意……

name: All things must be born and die. Order and chaos...it is impossible to avoid such things.
value: 萬事萬物必定有出生與死亡，秩序與混亂……凡事都不可能繞過這些。

name: Hmph... I am starting to understand what Zeus and Athena mean by wisdom.
value: 哼……我好像理解宙斯和雅典娜所說的“智慧”是什麼了。

name: Since you have such wisdom, you should already know what the result of our battle with be, right?
value: 既然你擁有這樣的智慧，那麼也應該清楚，接下來我與你的戰鬥，將是什麼結果吧？

name: Have you heard of the Way of Harmony? The mystical teachings of the sages of your country.
value: 你有聽說過調和之道嗎？那是你們國度的聖人所提出的奧義。

name: An outsider like you knows about the Way of Harmony?
Maybe more than you can imagine.
value: 也許比你想像中知道的更多。

name: Too bad I'm not interested. I was never educated by the sages of Mount Sumeru, so why would I listen to you?
value: 可惜我並不感興趣，或者說，我在須彌山時就不曾被它教化，怎麼可能還會聽你的？

name: I don't want to teach you anything - aren't you trying to establish a world where the strong are respected? How about a game?
value: 我並不想教化你什麼——你不是為求建立強者為尊的規則嗎？那就來打一場怎麼樣？

name: How do you feel after our fight? Do you think you beat me? Can you feel the joy of battle?
value: 這場戰鬥之後，你感覺如何？你覺得你戰勝我了嗎？你能感受到戰鬥的喜悅嗎？

name: I did beat you... but I don't feel joy. It's weird, it's more like emptiness.
value: 我戰勝你了……但又沒有，我感覺很奇怪，與其說是喜悅，倒不如說是空虛。

name: You believe that the strong should be respected, but the strong and the weak are inseparable in this world.
value: 你信奉強者為尊的規則，但世上強弱二者本身就是不可分割的。

name: There will always be people who are weak, but many of them will become strong, just like you in this Dreamland.
value: 總有人會落入弱勢，而她們中不少人也會重新變強，如同這夢境中的你一樣。

name: So, what are your thoughts now, about The Strong?
value: 所以，你現在對“強者”有什麼新看法嗎？

name: No one is born strong. Strength is forged from the weak.
value: 沒有天生的強者，強者也是由弱者成長而來。

name: Sensible answer. I think it's time for you to find a breakthrough on your own.
value: 明智的回答，我想是時候讓你自己尋求突破了。

name: You will face the most powerful of the Dragon Clan. Try to experience things from the perspective of the weak.
value: 你將面對北歐最強的龍族，嘗試著以弱者的角度來感受調和之力吧。

name: Who has trespassed into my territory? Foreign goddess, you are seeking a fight, am I right?
value: 看看是誰闖入了我的領地？異邦的神明，你至此只為尋求一戰，我說的沒錯吧？

name: As you said, dragon. If I want to know what it means to be truly strong, I must face you as the weak.
value: 如你所言，巨龍，如果我要獲得真正意義上的強大，就必須以弱者的姿態來面對你。

name: Arrogant goddess... But I see you have courage and wisdom too. Let's enjoy this fight.
value: 狂妄的傢伙……但我看得出你也不乏勇氣和智慧，讓我們好好享受這場戰鬥吧。

name: Well, your victory does not surprise me. After all, you have gone through many trials in this Dreamland.
value: 哼……到底是經過眾神百般試煉的存在，你的勝利並不讓我意外。

name: I can feel new power flowing through my body. It's a completely different experience, to go from weak to strong.
value: 我可以感受到新的力量正不斷流入身體，這是一種截然不同、由弱變強的體驗……

name: I think I understand now what true strength is, as well as the meaning and value those who are weak.
value: 我想我明白強者究竟是如何誕生，以及弱者存在的意義和價值了……

name: You understand things now. This resolve will accompany you as you set foot into a higher realm.
value: 你明白最終的奧義了，這種意志將伴隨你踏上更高的境界。

name: The division between strength and weakness is absolute. There is no so-called growth.
value: 強弱依舊是絕對的，沒有所謂的成長。

name: Well then, continue along your path. Maybe this is the only way for you to become stronger.
value: 好吧，那你繼續踐行你的道路吧，或許這也是你變強的必經之路。

name: Clear all levels in South Africa
Clear all levels in Madagascar
value: 通關馬達加斯加全部關卡

name: Clear all levels in Mozambique
value: 通關莫三比克全部關卡

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Asura's Dreamland
value: 用於提升阿修羅的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Asura's Shard Optional Box
value: 阿修羅女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the box and choose Asura's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇阿修羅任意品質的碎片

name:
When entering the battle, creates a [Shuraba Barrier], reducing CRIT DMG dealt by all enemies for 2 rounds. The higher Asura’s DMG Reduction, the more CRIT DMG is reduced. When Asura is in action, she will snap her fingers and absorb the ATK, P.RES, and M.RES of the enemy with the highest ATK and bestow them to all allies (except herself) for 4 rounds (ignores Debuff RES, cannot be dispelled, stackable up to 4 layers).

[Asura’s Snap] (allies): Increase ATK, P.RES, and M.RES by 5% of Asura's attributes for each layer.
[Asura's Snap] (enemies): Decrease ATK, P.RES, and M.RES by 10% of Asura's attributes for each layer.
value: 進入戰鬥時，立即創造一個弱化的【修羅】結界，使敵方全體造成的暴擊傷害降低，阿修羅的傷害減免越高，降低的暴擊傷害越多，持續2回合。每回合行動時，阿修羅會竊取攻擊力最高的一名敵人的攻擊力、物抗、魔抗給予除阿修羅外的所有己方女神（竊取效果：敵人的攻擊力、物抗、魔抗降低阿修羅當前屬性的10%，我方的攻擊力、物抗、魔抗提升阿修羅當前屬性的5%，無視異常抵抗、不可驅散、最多疊加4層、持續4回合）

name: Reduce CRIT DMG dealt by all enemies for 2 rounds
Decrease ATK, P.RES, and M.RES by 10% of Asura's attributes for each layer.
value: 每層獲得阿修羅10%的屬性減益(攻擊力、物抗、魔抗）

name: Increase ATK, P.RES, and M.RES by 5% of Asura's attributes for each layer.
value: 每層獲得阿修羅5%的屬性增益(攻擊力、物抗、魔抗）

name: This Eudemons is on another treasure hunting
No available Eudemons
value: 當前不存在可上陣幻獸

name: WORLD_BOSS_SHOWTEXT_34
value: 擊破黑暗與絕望的純白羽翼！

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Capricornus's Dreamland
value: 用於提升摩羯座的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Capricornus’s Shard Optional Box
value: 摩羯座女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the box and choose Capricornus's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇摩羯座任意品質的碎片

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_101
value: 如拂曉之星辰，如湖面之月光，皆與你為伴。

name: Capricornus? What a surprise. To what do I owe the pleasure?
value: 魔羯？真讓我意外，你怎麼會跑到我這裏來？

name: I... don't know. I was dreaming - the same dream over and over again.
value: 我不知道，我只是做了場夢——一場重複了無數遍的夢。

name: Yes, I think... I was dreaming about my past. But when I woke up, I couldn't remember anything.
value: 我夢見了……我的過去。但醒來後卻忘記了一切。

name: Your past? Heh... that's a dangerous thing.
value: 你的過去？呵……那可真是件危險的事……

name: What happened back then? I need to make sense of it all.
value: 那個時候究竟發生了什麼？我想弄清這一切。

name: It's better that you don't know. Although, I think the troubles from your past won't let you remain blissfully ignorant.
value: 我勸你還是不要知道的好……雖然我承認你遲早要面對過去的一些麻煩。

name: Well I can help you, if you wish. But only if you pass my trial.
value: 我可以幫你，不過按照規矩，你得先取得我的認可。

name: Do you mean defeating you in battle? I'll give it a try.
value: 你指的是在接下來的戰鬥中戰勝你嗎？讓我試試看吧……

name: You have passed my test... barely. You don't seem to excel at single combat?
value: 雖然通過了我的考驗，但你……好像並不擅長單打獨鬥？

name: ...My skills are mostly used to strengthen and protect my precious friends.
value: ……我的戰鬥技巧大多是用於保護和強化同伴的，她們對於我來說很重要。

name: Hmm... I have a plan then. Take me to meet your friends. You will need powerful allies.
value: 我有個計畫……帶我去見見你的朋友們吧，一支強力的小隊總是能幫上大忙的。

name: That makes sense. Let me think about who I should go to...
value: 你說的沒錯，讓我想想應該去找誰……

name: Pisces, are you there? Here fishie fishie.
Capricornus? It's been a long time! Have you been well? Wait... Pandora? What are you doing in my dream?
value: 摩羯？別來無恙，你好久都沒來看過我了呢！等等……潘多拉？你來我的夢境做什麼？

name: You don't look happy to see me. Your friend here wants to find out about her past, and I'm just here to help fulfil her wish.
value: 別一臉不歡迎我的表情嘛，你的朋友想要尋回自己的過去，而我是她願望的代理人。

name: Her past? Capricornus, are you sure you really want to do this?
value: 尋回過去？摩羯，你確定真的要這樣做嗎？

name: If I say that it's what my heart really desires... Will you help me?
value: 如果這是我的內心真正渴求的東西。你會幫我尋回這段過去嗎？

name: I don't know what the knowledge of your past will do to you now, but you're my friend and I shall abide by your wishes.
value: 我不知道這會對現在的你造成什麼後果，但你是我的朋友，你想要的就是我所堅持的。

name: Although you must defeat me first, to break the shackles by which I am bound to my oath to the Lord God. I swore not to interfere in this matter...
value: 但你必須擊敗我，打破主神誓言的約束，因為這件事情我已經發誓不再插手……

name: Well, if I have to do this...
value: 好吧，如果我必須要這麼做的話。

name: Victory is mine. Please help me get back my lost memories.
value: 勝負已分，請你幫助我尋回曾經的記憶吧。

name: As you wish, I will help you find your memories, even if it is... dangerous.
value: 如你所言，我會幫助你去尋找這份記憶，哪怕它……很危險。

name: If you want to reach your heart's desire, one companion is not enough. We will need more. Who's next?
value: 想實現你的願望，你的同伴還遠遠不夠，我們去找下一位吧。

name: Sigh... Gemini. To be honest, I don't really want to see them...
value: 雙子座嗎……說實話我不太想見她們……

name: Honey, I see you have arrived with Pandora. Let me guess, she's promised to give you your heart's desire.
value: 親愛的，你帶著潘多拉一起來，十有八九是她向你許諾了什麼不得了的事情吧。

name: You guessed it. I want to find out about my past.
value: 你猜對了，我想找回自己的過去。

name: All I can say, is that it wasn't a beautiful past. Why are you trying to remember?
value: 我只能說，那可不是一段美麗的過往，你幹嘛要去回憶？

name: I want to know exactly what the hell happened back then, that's made you all so scared.
value: 我想知道那時候究竟發生了什麼，為什麼你們都這麼害怕。

name: I think it's better for you not to know. You will not like who you used to be.
value: 我覺得你還是不要知道的好，關於你以前的樣子，我相信你不會喜歡的。

name: Hmph. I can see from the look on your face that you're thinking about giving up.
value: 嗯哼，看你的樣子，像是要退縮了？

name: I don't know... With what everyone has said, I'm starting to question whether it's really worth it or not.
value: 我不知道……所有人都這麼說，我似乎真的應該考慮一下究竟值不值得這麼做了。

name: It is up to you to decide your own destiny. But I will respect your choice.
value: 自己的命運當然要由自己掌控啦。不過我會尊重你的意見。

name: ...I still need to know what happened.
value: 我還是想知道究竟發生了什麼。

name: Then show me your resolve.
value: 那麼就讓我來看看你的決心有多大吧。

name: Hmm. You're starting to look more and more like your former self when you fight.
value: 哼，你在戰鬥中的樣子，倒是越來越象曾經的自己了。

name: Since you are so determined to get your memory back, I agree to your request.
value: 既然你有此決心想找回記憶，我同意你的請求。

name: Phantasos is the master of memory, so if we can find her, we will have a better chance of being able to help you find your lost memories.
value: 方塔蘇斯是記憶的掌管者，如果我們能找到她，興許就能幫你找回遺失的記憶了。

name: Let's go find her then.
value: 那就讓我們去見見她吧。

name: Pandora, it's you again. As a fellow ruler of the dream world, I really didn't want to see a wretch like you.
value: 潘多拉，又是你，同為夢境的支配著，我可真不想看見你這個讓人倒楣的傢伙。

name: As for you... Guardians of the Zodiac, what are you doing in the Dreamland?
value: 至於你們……黃道的守衛者，你們來夢境裏做什麼？

name: I want to know about my past, can you help me?
value: 我想看看我的過去，你能幫幫我嗎？

name: Capricornus? Heh... Maybe it would more appropriate call you the goddess Pan.
value: 摩羯？呵……或許我應該稱呼你為“潘神”更合適些。

name: Pan, the Goddess of Fear. The one who even I, the Goddess of Nightmares, feared when you walked through my dreams.
value: 是啊，恐懼之主，曾經遊走於我的夢境之中，讓我這個噩夢製造者也感到難受的傢伙……

name: The mere whisper of your name was enough to terrify any who heard it.
value: 沒想到吧，你過去無論是神力還是意志，都足以讓大部分聽到你名字的人嚇得六神無主。

name: ...I can see the fear in your eyes. What irony!
value: ...I can see the fear in your eyes. What irony!

name: Your words... Are they really true?
You can feel the truth of my words. Even now, you can feel the instinct to cause fear. I can tell.
value: 讓人感到害怕本身就是一種本能，我可是深有體會。

name: Didn't you want to know about your past? If you can defeat me, I will give your memories back to you.
value: 你不是想要找回記憶嗎？如果你戰勝我，我就將記憶還給你。

name: Stop, stop. You really show no mercy on the battlefield...
value: 快停手，你們在戰場上還真是不留情面……

name: Oh darling, showing mercy would only have caused you more suffering.
value: 親愛的，快點辦事可以少吃點苦頭。

name: This dream crystal has your memories stored within. But unfortunately, it is sealed by the power of a certain goddess.
value: 這就是儲存你記憶的夢境水晶，但遺憾的是，上面刻有某個神明的封印。

name: What is this? What's going on?
I don't know. But judging by the seal on this lock, it was mostly likely made by Zeus.
value: 我不知道，但看這把鎖上的封印，應該是宙斯所下。

name: Well, I knew it was going to be like this.
Let's go find her. And just in case, why don't you come with us?
value: 讓我們去找她吧……為防意外，你也跟我們一起去如何？

name: I don't want to get involved in your affairs, you have already retrieved your memories. What you do next has nothing to do with me.
value: 你們的事我可不想參合，你們已經取回記憶，之後的事就和我無關了。

name: Is that so? If we told Zeus that it was you who gave us the memories that were meant to be kept safe...
value: 是嗎？如果我們告訴宙斯，是你把原本應該好好保管的夢境交給我們的話……

name: What do you think Zeus would do to you?
value: 你猜猜宙斯會怎麼收拾你？

name: You...! Sigh. It's never a good thing to be involved with you. I'll help you one last time.
value: 你……！唉……事情和你扯上關係就沒好事，我就再幫你們最後一次吧。

name: Isn't that Icarus? How did she come to serve as a gatekeeper for Mount Olympus, home of the Greek Goddesses?
value: 那不是伊卡璐斯嗎？她怎麼會跑來給奧林匹斯眾神當看門人了？

name: Capricornus? Goddesses of the Zodiac, why have you come to this Dreamland?
value: 摩羯座？黃道的女神們，你們為何來此夢境？

name: I've come to see Zeus, I need her to unseal my memories.
value: 我是來求見宙斯的，我需要她解開我記憶的封印。

name: Unfortunately, I have an appointment with Zeus today. I'm afraid you will have to tcome another day.
value: 真不巧，我今天和宙斯有約，恐怕你們得另尋他日了。

name: However, I also have things that I have to do. If I miss today, it will be difficult to find another chance in the future.
value: 然而我也有不得不去做的事情，如果錯過了今天，之後就很難有機會了。

name: Interesting, it seems that fate wants us to take a gamble. How about a battle to determine the order?
value: 有意思，看來命運想讓我們賭一把了，一場戰鬥來決定先後順序如何？

name: I didn't expect that I would be the one to lose... Well, I have my word. You may see Zeus first.
value: 沒想到我竟然會輸……按照約定，就讓你們先行好了。

name: I was wondering... Would you like to join us and we meet Zeus together?
value: 我在想……如果你加入我們，是不是可以一起見到宙斯？

name: ...It seems you have a kind heart now. You were not like this hundreds of years ago.
value: ……如今的你還是保持著善良之心，幾百年前你可不是這樣。

name: And just like that, I now realize what kind of person I was.
value: 正是如此，我才知道過去自己究竟是怎樣的一個存在。

name: Truth and curiousity are always our biggest problems. Alas, this too is fate.
value: 真實和好奇心始終是最大的麻煩嗎……唉，這也是命運吧。

name: It seems that my prophecy has come true, and the Goddess of Fear has finally embarked on the path of destruction.
value: 看來我的預言成真了，恐懼之神最終還是走上了毀滅的命運之路。

name: I told Zeus that avoiding this problem wouldn't work. Denying your fear will not make it go away.
value: 我總和宙斯說，逃避的問題總有一天還會回來，否認自己的恐懼，恐懼也不會因此而消失。

name: The Sun Goddess, Apollo? Why are you here?
value: 太陽神阿波羅？你為什麼會在這裏？

name: Because I knew you would come.
Are you here to stop me then?
My duty as a goddess compells me to protect Olympus, but the light in my heart makes me yearn for truth.
value: 神職使我不得不履行保護奧林匹斯的誓言，但我的內心的光明卻讓我嚮往真實。

name: Come, let us seek answers in battle.
value: 來吧，讓我們在戰鬥中尋求答案吧。

name: It seems that none of us can stop the arrival of our predetermined destiny. I hope that when you face your past self, you can do so without regret or fear.
value: 看來我們誰都無法阻擋既定的命運到來，我希望你在面對過去的自己時，不要後悔與畏懼。

name: I was arguing with Zeus about you not too long ago, Capricornus.
value: 我不久前還在和宙斯爭論關於你的事情，摩羯。

name: Do you also believe that I shouldn't seek to recover my past memories?
value: 你也認為我不該找回過去的記憶嗎？

name: Firstly, I will say that I do not deny the significance of your existence, but... Zeus is right about one thing. Your existence will bring disaster to the world.
value: 首先聲明，我不否認你存在的意義，但宙斯有一點說得對，你的存在會給世界帶來災難。

name: Fear is a powerful thing. It is capable of destroying a person's mind faster than it would take to destroy their body. It can effortlessly devastate entire armies.
value: 恐懼的力量太過強大，摧毀人心智永遠比毀滅他的肉體要快的多，它能輕易摧毀一支軍隊。

name: If such a power is allowed to spread unchecked, the entire world will eventually be engulfed in chaos.
value: 如果任由這股力量不受控制的蔓延，那麼整個世界終將被混亂籠罩。

name: And you, who were once known as Pan... You are the embodiment of fear and chaos.
value: 而曾經名為“潘神”的你，正是恐懼與混亂的結合

name: Goddess of Wisdom, if there is no fear then both humans and goddesses will lose the will to live and respect for all things.
value: 智慧女神，如果沒有恐懼，人與神都會失去求生的欲望，失去對萬物的敬畏。

name: Capricornus. The truth about your past, or stability amongst the gods. Which one will you choose?
value: 摩羯，一方是自己曾經的真實，一方是眾神的安定，你會作何選擇呢？

name: The power I once had may have been terrifying, but I will never allow it to get out of control again.
value: 我曾經的力量或許很可怕，但我絕不會讓它再次失去控制。

name: Then you have forced my hand.
value: 那麼我將不得不做出最糟的決定了……

name: The divine presence that you once commanded, capable of inducing fear, is gradually awakening... Is this the beginning of another disaster?
value: 你曾經掌控恐懼的神格正在逐漸蘇醒……這將是另一次災難的開端嗎？

name: Just like before when you, driven by your own ambition, rampantly spread fear among the gods, until Zeus completely sealed your memories and divinity.
value: 曾經的你因為自己的野心，肆意在眾神間傳播恐懼，直至宙斯將你的記憶和神格徹底封印。

name: No, I'm not here out of ambition. I just want to know who I am.
value: 不，如今我來這裏不是為了野心，我只想看一眼自己與生俱來的樣子罷了。

name: I hope that history will not repeat itself.
value: 希望一切不會重蹈覆轍。

name: By Zeus' command, you shall not pass.
value: By Zeus' command, you shall not pass.

name: The fear you once unleashed shattered the balance between life and death, almost plunging the order between the world of the living and the realm of the dead into chaos.
value: 你曾經帶來的恐懼，打破了當時的生死平衡，差點將現實與冥界的秩序付之一炬。

name: I understand your concerns, but I have no intention of giving up the right to regain my own memories.
value: 我明白你的顧慮，但我並不打算放棄找回自己記憶的權力。

name: How about we see if you have the ability to actually do it?
value: 那就讓我們看看你是否能做到吧。

name: Just as before... You are still the same nightmare that haunts the dreams of your enemies.
value: 和以前一樣……你依舊是無數與你敵對者的噩夢……

name: However, my power no longer relies on fear. It comes from sacrifice, doesn't it?
value: 然而我的力量已經不再依靠恐懼，而是源自於犧牲，不是嗎？

name: Hah well if you still insist on retrieving your memories and power, then perhaps it is also a kind of fate.
value: 呵呵，你要是還執意想取回你的記憶和力量，或許也是一種命運。

name: I will remember your words, Hades.
value: 我會好好記住你說的話，哈迪斯。

name: The Temple of Zeus is just ahead. It looks like she's already waiting for us over there.
value: 前方就是宙斯的神廟了，看起來她已經在那邊等著我們了。

name: Pandora, are my memories good to go?
value: 潘多拉，我的記憶準備好了嗎？

name: Of course, once Zeus unseals it, the Dream Crystal can be opened.
value: 當然了，一旦宙斯解開封印，就可以將夢境水晶打開。

name: Alright, then let's go in and face her.
value: 好的，那讓我們進去面對她吧。

name: Don't bother, Capricornus. No, I should call you... Pan.
value: 用不著那麼麻煩，摩羯座。不對，我應該叫你……潘。

name: I'm here in the hope that you will unlock the seal of my memory, and let me regain my true self.
value: 我來只是希望你能解開我的記憶封印，讓我找回真正的自己。

name: Could it be that it's as Athena said... Are you just afraid that, like in the past, my ambition will pose a threat to you?
value: 難道如雅典娜所言，你只是害怕我和過去一樣滿懷野心，威脅到了神王的地位嗎？

name: I am not obligated to answer you, unless...
value: 我沒有義務回答你，除非……

name: Unless I prove to you that I can control my gradually increasing power, right?
value: 除非我向你證明自己能夠控制逐漸變強的力量，對吧？

name: Now that we've come to this, I don't think anymore words are necessary.
value: 話已至此，我認為沒有必要多說什麼了。

name: I never imagined I could defeat you...
I could have completely destroyed you when I sealed your power, but I didn't want to do that.
value: 我曾經完全可以在封印你力量的同時，將你徹底毀滅，但我並不想這麼做。

name: I respect all the beings of Olympus, even if they are my enemies, or enemies of Olympus.
value: 我尊敬所有奧林匹斯的存在，哪怕是我的敵人，或是奧林匹斯的敵人。

name: So why do you keep hindering my search for my own memories?
value: 那麼你為何還要一直阻礙我尋求自己過去的記憶？

name: Perhaps it is indeed unfair to deprive you of your memories, since you really want to see who you were...
value: 也許剝奪你的記憶確實不公平，但如果你真的想看一眼過去的自己的話……

name: But you will definitely regret it, and beg me to seal away your memories again.
value: 你一定會後悔這麼做，甚至求我再次將你的記憶封印起來。

name: The power you once possessed came entirely from fear. With such power, losing control is the only possible outcome.
value: 曾經的你所擁有的力量，全部源自於恐懼，對於這種力量，失控是最後的結果。

name: To release your memories again is nothing more than bringing forth tragedy once again.
value: 你再次喚醒記憶，也不過是讓悲劇再次誕生罷了。

name: Unlike in the past, the power you have now comes from devotion and sacrifice, which is just as strong. Isn't this what you want?
value: 和過去不同，你現在的力量源自於犧牲與奉獻，同樣無人能敵，難道這不是你想要的嗎？

name: That's right. That's why I have the confidence to face my horrible past self.
value: 正是如此，我才有信心面對過去那個可怕的自己。

name: ...It seems like I can no longer dissuade you.
I will unlock the seal on your memories and let you face the horror that is your past self. May Fate protect us all.
value: 我會解開你記憶的封印，讓你面對過去那個可怕的自己，希望命運庇護眾神吧……

name: I saw it... My power and my past, all my memories are being restored!
value: 我看到了……我的力量和過去，我所有的記憶都在恢復！

name: What on earth is this?! Is this the old me?
value: 這究竟是什麼？！這是曾經的我嗎？

name: Pull yourself together and face it! You are no longer the same out-of-control person that stands before you. Summon the courage to confront this!
value: 振作起來面對它！如今的你已經不是眼前這個失控的傢伙了，拿出面對考驗時的勇氣！

name: It was only for a little bit but... That feeling was so nostalgic and yet terrifying. But it's over now.
value: 只差一點點……這種感覺既讓我懷念又讓我害怕，但一切終於結束了。

name: Looks like fate is on our side.
value: 看來命運站在了我們這邊。

name: I never thought that my former self could be so crazy and powerful. Just looking at her is enough to make anyone tremble with fear.
value: 我從未想過曾經的自己如此瘋狂而強大，僅僅是注視著它，就足以讓人心生畏懼。

name: But now you have countless companions around you, don't you?
value: 但如今你身邊已有無數的同伴，不是嗎？

name: Should you be controlled once more by the soul within your memory, the world will once again witness the coming of the apocalypse.
value: 如果你再次被記憶中的靈魂所控制，世界將再次迎來終末的降臨。

name: But perhaps this is also fate. Without facing one's own past darkness, one cannot seek a new rebirth.
value: 但或許這也是命運吧，沒有面對自己曾經的黑暗，也無法尋求新的重生。

name: I understand... Pandora, hand that memory crystal to me. I will bury it in a place where no one can find it.
value: 我明白了……潘多拉，把這段記憶交給我吧，我會將它埋葬在一個所有人都找不到的地方。

name: The Goddess of Fear will be forgotten. From now on, the world will only know Capricornus.
value: 恐懼之神必將被遺忘，往後這個世上，只有摩羯座。

name: You're right. I should cherish the present more.
value: 你說的沒錯，或許我更應該珍惜當下……

name: Not allowing you to retrieve your true memories may seem unfair to you, but trust me, this is the best choice.
value: 不讓你取回真正的記憶，或許對你不公平，但相信我，這是最好的選擇。

name: No need to apologize to me. Maybe this is also fate. Let's leave the Dreamland.
value: 沒必要向我道歉，或許這也是命運的安排，我們離開夢境吧。

name: Do you know Minotaur? Do you think who has the stronger strength if I compete with her?
value: 你知道米諾陶洛斯麼？你覺得我和她較量的話，誰的力氣比較大?

name: Collect 50 Sakura Demon pieces to synthesize Sakura Demon Miracle Card
value: 集齊50個落櫻化妖碎片可以合成落櫻化妖

name: Collect 50 Blessed Lance pieces to synthesize Blessed Lance Miracle Card
value: 集齊50個隆基努斯之槍的碎片可以合成隆基努斯之槍

name: Naa~ Do you want to see me dancing?
value: 呐呐~你想看看我的舞蹈麼？

name: This is also known as the Holy Lance. Legend has it that this weapon can bestow the wielder the power of breaking through fate and a control over everything.
value: 以刺死基督而聞名的槍。因為殺死了神子，而獲得了擊穿因果命運的力量，賦予持有者統禦一切的權力。

name: Select and obtain one Destiny Star of an Angel
value: 打開寶箱選擇任意女神的命星

name: Molly doesn’t like that cat. That cheater! He flies in his airship and steals Molly’s customers.
value: 鼠鼠我啊，可是個老實人，不像那只飛在天上的臭貓貓

name: ACTIVITY_TREASURE_EXIT_EXCHANGE
value: 確定要離開麼？\n(此禮包無法再次獲得)

name: When entering the battle, increases self Max HP by 100% but increases DMG received by 30%. Then enters [Capricorn] (cannot be dispelled) for 3 rounds.\n\n[Capricorn]: When receiving damage, heal all allies except herself by 10% of Capricornus’s Max HP and increase their DEF by 50% of Capricornus’s DEF for 1 round. 50% of the excess healing will increase the target’s Max HP (up to 20% of Capricornus’s Max HP) until the end of the battle.
value: 進入戰鬥時，摩羯座以自身受到傷害增加30%為代價，生命上限永久提高100%，並立即進入【摩羯】狀態（無法驅散），持續3回合。【摩羯】狀態：受到傷害時將治療除自己外所有友軍，使其恢復摩羯座最大生命值的10%，溢出治療量的50%永久轉化為生命上限（生命上限加成不超過摩羯座最大生命值20%），並使其防禦力提升摩羯座當前防禦力的50%，持續1回合

name: When receiving damage, heal all allies except herself and increase their DEF. The excess healing will increase the target’s Max HP until the end of the battle.
value: 受到攻擊後治療除自己外所有友軍，溢出治療轉化為生命上限，並提升防禦力

name: Hey-ho~hey-ho~ I love rice cakes, and rice cakes love me!
value: 嘿咻~嘿咻~我愛年糕，年糕愛我！

name: Collect 50 pieces of Pounding Rice Cakes to synthesize the Pounding Rice Cakes Miracle Card
value: 集齊50個搗年糕碎片可以合成搗年糕

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_102
value: 閒暇午後，邀你共度二人時光……

name: Absolutely no! You are God's chosen one, and you must fulfill the task God has given you.
value: 不行！你是神選之人，必須完成神給你的任務。

name: Pandora, my favorite attendant! Come and greet your master.
value: 潘多拉，我最寵愛的侍女，是時候出來見我啦。

name: Ugh Zeus... you again. I assume you haven't been invading my dreams again and again just for a simple chat?
value: 宙斯……又是你，三番五次闖入我的夢境，不會只是來找我閒聊的吧？

name: Of course not. But if you want me to play with you, I'd be happy to oblige.
value: 當然不是，但如果你想讓我陪你開開心的話，我可是有大把的時間。

name: Sigh. You still love the sound of your own voice... saying such ridiculous things. Cut to the chase already.
value: 你還是那麼愛自說自話……別浪費時間了，這次又有什麼麻煩事？

name: Prometheus came to me in my dreams, and she told me that the Titans were waking up.
value: 我夢到普羅米修斯來找我了，她告訴我泰坦們正在蘇醒。

name: They want to use the souls of the Gods as a link, absorb our power to help them reshape their bodies, and then return to this world.
value: 它們想以眾神的靈魂為鏈接，吸取眾神的力量幫它們重塑身軀，回到這個世界。

name: That sounds rather serious. So what are you going to do?
value: 那可不得了，所以你打算怎麼做呢？

name: Until now, only I have been able to keep them sealed away... However, I have discovered that your magic box can also imprison them.
value: 很長時間裏只有我才能控制住它們的封印……不過，我最近發現你的魔盒似乎也可以做到。

name: So you plan to put their souls in my Box to solve this problem once and for all?
value: 你打算把它們的靈魂裝進魔盒之中，徹底解決這個問題？

name: Yes, but I think it will be hard to do on my own... I need you to get me in touch with my old friends from Egypt and Asgard.
value: 以我一個人的力量很難，我想……得讓你幫我聯繫埃及和北歐的那兩位“老朋友”。

name: Well I guess I can help you for old times' sake. But not for free and not until you pass my test.
value: 好吧，看在舊情面上我就幫你吧，但按照夢境的規矩，你得通過我的考驗。

name: How tiresome... Doesn't the Ruler of Olympus merit special privileges with you, my kitten?
value: 考驗？這太麻煩了……奧林匹斯的神王在你這裏就不能有點特權嗎，小貓？

name: Privileges? I know what your idea of privileges is... Heh alright. I'll be gentle with your body... when I beat you up!
