value: 特權嗎？呵……我保證一會揍你的時候輕點，你看怎麼樣？

name: Eh? Why did you fall down so easily? My dear, I thought you would be a little rougher.
value: 哎？你怎麼一碰就倒了……親愛的，我原以為你會更粗暴一些……

name: I really don't want to be toyed with by you... Oh well. But you best be prepared to pay the bill for this request.
value: 真是不甘心被你這傢伙玩弄……算了，這次的委託，希望你準備好了與之對等的報酬。

name: Darling, when this is over, I'll give you half of Olympus.
value: 安心，等這事結束後，把奧林匹斯分給你一半都沒問題。

name: Yeah yeah. That silver tongue of yours may have fooled many others. But did you truly think your words will seduce me?
value: 是啊，你這話已經不知道騙了多少女孩子了，你覺得我還會信嗎？

name: Take a guess. Now connect me to the dream of the Egyptian Goddesses. It's time for me to meet that rigid Sun Goddess.
value: 隨你猜啦，幫我連接埃及眾神的夢境吧，我該去見見埃及那個死板的太陽神了。

name: Guardian of the Pyramids. Horus, the Eye of Truth. Have you been well?
value: 金字塔的守護者，真理之眼荷魯斯，別來無恙啊。

name: Greek Goddess Zeus. What brings you here? Perhaps you came to find the Lady Sun Goddess... to reminisce about the old days, of course.
value: 希臘的神王宙斯？您怎麼有情調來這兒閒逛了，難道是來找太陽神大人敘舊的？

name: It seems that nothing can escape your eye. My real reason for coming here to borrow the power of the Sun Goddess.
value: 看來什麼事情都逃不過你的眼睛，我來此確實是想借用太陽神的力量。

name: My apologies, but Lady Sun Goddess predicted your arrival and sent me to refuse your request.
value: 很抱歉，太陽神大人預言了你們的到來，並讓我拒絕你們的請求。

name: It breaks my heart to hear that. And what if I insist on seeing her?
value: 你這話可真是傷透了我的心，但假如我執意要見她呢？

name: Then I'm afraid you will have to go through me. If you beat me, I will take you to her.
value: 那恐怕您就得先過我這一關了……如果贏過我，我就帶您去見她。

name: Not bad. Although the outcome of the battle was as expected, your divine power has grown a lot since the last time I came here.
value: 不錯，雖然戰鬥的結果在我意料之中，但你的神力比我上次來的時候成長了不少。

name: Don't be so angry. Pouting doesn't suit you. Please lead the way.
value: 別那麼生氣嘛，勞駕你帶個路了。

name: Ra, has it been thousands of years since we last met? I miss the good times of drinking ale with you, dear.
value: 拉，距離上次見面有好幾千年了吧？我很懷念和你同飲麥酒的美妙時光，親愛的。

name: Zeus? For goodness sake! You being here means nothing good will happen.
value: 宙斯？天哪……我打賭你來我這准沒好事。

name: Don't say that. I think you're going crazy... Even in the dream your figure is so graceful.
value: 別這麼說，我想你想得快發瘋了，連做夢都是你曼妙的身姿……

name: Isn't it time to wake up from your daydream? Now tell me, what troubles have you brought?
value: 你的白日夢是不是該醒醒了，說吧，又遇到了什麼麻煩？

name: I love that you get straight to the point like that, avoids wasting time. I'll be honest... It's bad news. The Titans are back.
value: 我喜歡開門見山，這樣咱們都不用浪費時間，老實說……有個壞消息，泰坦回來了。

name: ...They're the ancestors of the Greek Goddesses that you sealed away, right?
value: 就是那些曾被你封印的希臘眾神先祖，對嗎？

name: As you said... But I need your help, because I can't real them alone this time.
value: 如你所言，但我需要你的幫助，因為這次僅憑我一人已經無法重新將它們封印了。

name: Your divine power seems to have weakened... This is not good. Let me test how much power you still have left!
value: 你的神力似乎變弱了……這可不是什麼好事，讓我來測測你現在的力量究竟還剩多少吧！

name: It seems that you only have half the power you used to have. So tthe most important thing right now is to recover the power you lost.
value: 看來你只有過去一半的戰鬥力，眼下最重要的是尋回你失去的那些力量。

name: Heh... After all, I did come to Pandora's Dreamland to ask for help in order to gain more power.
value: 呵……畢竟為了取得更強的力量，我才會來潘多拉的夢境尋求幫助。

name: Well now, how rare for you to be so responsible... I will agree to help you solve this trouble, reluctantly. What's your next step?
value: 好吧，看在你難得這麼有責任心……我就勉強答應幫你解決這個麻煩好了，你打算怎麼做？

name: You'll find out after we visit Odin.
value: 在拜訪完奧丁之後，你會知道的。

name: I feel the power of thunder. Who is controlling this storm?
value: 我感受到了雷霆的力量，是誰在操控這場風暴？

name: Ruler of Olympus, turn back! Asgard is closed to outsiders right now.
value: 希臘的神王，快回去吧，阿斯加德眼下不接待客人。

name: It's the Norse Goddess Thor. What has happened? Asgard doesn't look peaceful, even here in the Dreamland.
value: 是北歐的雷神呐，發生了什麼事，夢境中的阿斯加德看上去也不安寧。

name: Loki started a rebellion. She nearly destroyed Asgard. How do I know you're not on her side?
value: 洛基發動了叛亂，阿斯加德幾乎被她毀了，而我無法判斷你和她是不是一夥的。

name: Take it easy, honey. Where is Odin? How about I get rid of Loki for you and you let me meet Odin?
value: 別緊張，親愛的，奧丁在哪？只要讓我見見她，我就幫你們把洛基收拾掉如何？

name: Sorry, but I can't risk it. If you insist on breaking in, then I will have to make you suffer.
value: 抱歉，我可不敢冒這個險，如果你執意要闖入，那麼我就不得不讓你吃點苦頭了。

name: How interesting. I don't hate tough girls at all, hehe...
value: 有意思，然而我一點也不討厭強硬的傢伙，呵呵……

name: ...As expected of the strongest Goddess in Olympus, your lightning is no joke.
value: ……不愧是奧林匹斯最強的神明，對閃電的掌控如此兇猛。

name: Compared to Odin's strength, you're not bad. I'm really starting to like you.
value: 相對於奧丁的力量，你也不差呢，我開始中意你了。

name: Since you won, perhaps you do have what it takes to help us deal with the troublesome Loki.
value: 既然你贏了，或許你確實有能力幫助我們解決洛基這個麻煩的傢伙。

name: Let's talk after we meet Odin, dear.
value: 見到奧丁後再說吧，親愛的。

name: Ah... isn't this Zeus? I don't remember inviting you to this banquet.
value: 啊……這不是宙斯嗎？然而我似乎沒邀請你參加這場宴會。

name: I'm not interested in your banquet, Goddess of Lies. I just want to catch up with Odin.
value: 我對你的宴會不感興趣，詭詐之神，我只是想找奧丁敘敘舊。

name: Unfortunately, your old friend is not available at the moment, since I have an appointment with her.
value: 遺憾的是，你的老朋友現在恐怕沒空，因為我今天和她有約。

name: Odin! I know you're here! Why don't you come out and meet your old friends?
value: 奧丁！我知道你在這，為什麼不出來見見你的老朋友們呢？

name: Huh...Zeus? And the Sun Goddess of Egypt, Ra. You two have come at a bad time...
value: 哼……宙斯嗎？還有埃及的太陽神，拉，你們二位來的不大是時候……

name: As you can see, I'm about to teach this troublemaker a lesson.
value: 如你所見，我正有些帳要和眼前這個來鬧事傢伙算算。

name: You've lost your touch. Has it been so long since you encountered someone strong enough to arouse... your fighting spirit?
value: 你算賬的手段比以前仁慈了不少嘛……是太久沒有遇到過強大對手而無法激起鬥志了？

name: Dance with me in battle, darling. I will remind you how real power feels.
value: 不如讓我來和你較量較量，讓你回憶起真正的力量怎麼樣？

name: Oh? What an exciting way to greet each other.
value: 喔？你們打招呼的方式可真夠刺激的……

name: Your power is much more than before, isn't it?
value: 你的力量和以前相比變強了不少，不是嗎？

name: It would be more accurate to say that in the Dreamland, I can display my true power..
value: 倒不如說在夢境中，我才算是能發揮原本真正的實力。

name: Hmm... Well let’s talk about it later. After all, you still have “guests” to entertain...
value: 然而有話一會再說如何，畢竟你還有“客人”要招待……

name: Oh dear... Ganging up to bully lil ol' me?
value: 哎呀呀……你們想以多欺少嗎？

name: Save it. Even if I fight alone, I wouldn't lose to you.
value: 少來這套，就算是單打獨鬥，你以為我會輸給你嗎？

name: Hmph. Before you fight me, I suggest you ask Zeus why she came here. After all, she doesn't seem to be here just to catch up.
value: 哼哼，在和我動手前，我建議你最好問問宙斯為何來此，畢竟她可不像是來敘舊的。

name: She's right, Odin. The Titans are awakening, and I can't handle this on my own.
value: 她說的沒錯，奧丁，泰坦蘇醒了，我自己一個人搞不定這件事。

name: Hmm so Loki just happens to stir up trouble at the same time? What a coincidence.
value: 泰坦即將蘇醒，而洛基你恰好今天來找我麻煩……這未免太巧了吧？

name: Haha! You guessed it, Odin! The Twelve Titans send their regards.
value: 猜對啦，奧丁閣下，十二位泰坦拜託我好好招呼你們一行人！

name: Ugh you're stronger than I expected. But defeating me means nothing! I've delayed you enough.
value: 比想像中要強嘛，但打贏我也沒有用，你們在這裏消耗的時間已經夠久了。

name: You sly fox. I'll deal with you after we handle this problem.
value: 狡猾的傢伙，等這樁麻煩事處理完之後，我會回來收拾你的。

name: Hehe... Ruler of Olympus... If you survive the Titans, I look forward to some exciting fun with you. See you soon!
value: 呵呵……希臘的神王，如果你能從泰坦手上活下來的話，我很期待和你玩點刺激的，再見啦！

name: What a slippery bastard. What now, Zeus? Do you want to make a battle plan?
value: 溜得真是快，現在怎麼辦，宙斯，要擬定一個作戰計畫嗎？

name: No, let’s go back to the Dreamland of the Greek Goddesses first. I have a bad feeling...
value: 不，先回奧林匹斯神域的夢境看看，我有種不好的預感……

name: Apollo, has Olympus been attacked by the Titans? ...Wait, you're not Apollo!
value: 阿波羅，希臘眾神有沒有遭到泰坦的進攻？……等等，你不是阿波羅！

name: What a keen intuition. Guess who I am, third-generation King of Olympus, Zeus.
value: 真是敏銳的直覺，猜猜我是誰吧，第三代奧林匹斯神王，宙斯。

name: This magic is... Titan Hyperion? That's impossible...
value: 這魔力是……泰坦許珀裏翁？這不可能……

name: I am honored that you still remember me after all these years.
value: 這麼多年過去了，你還記得我，真是令我感到榮幸。

name: How on Earth did you come back? And where did you get Apollo's soul?
value: 你們究竟是怎麼回來的？另外，你把阿波羅的靈魂弄哪去了？

name: It took a lot of effort to get Loki of the Norse Goddesses to help us escape from the seal. As for Apollo...
value: 讓北歐的洛基幫我們從封印裏逃出來，可花了不少力氣，至於阿波羅……

name: I'm just borrowing her body for a while. She is still alive inside here.
value: 我只是暫時借用一下她的身體，她嘛……還活在這副腦子裏呢。

name: Interesting. I swear that this time I'll let you rot in the seal until the end of time.
value: 有意思，我發誓這次會讓你們在封印裏待到時間的盡頭為止。

name: Are you done? I have tens of thousands of years of anger that I want to vent on you.
value: 話說完了？我可是有著幾萬年的怒火要向你發洩呢。

name: I... What's wrong with me? It's as if someone had taken control of my mind...
value: 我……這是怎麼了？仿佛有人控制了我的思維……

name: A Titan occupied your body. After we defeated her, her soul was scattered in the Dream. You are fine now.
value: 泰坦佔據了你的身軀，經過剛才的戰鬥，她的靈魂被打散在了夢境裏，已經沒事了。

name: Phew... Turns out even I, the most cautious goddess in Olympus, can be careless sometimes...
value: 呼……作為奧林匹斯最謹慎的神明，我也會有大意的時候……

name: This crisis has been partly resolved. I need to deal with the other Titans as soon as possible.
value: 危機已經解決掉一部分了，我需要儘快去面對其他泰坦的歸來。

name: I feel like I'm still not strong enough...
value: 我感覺自己的力量還不夠強……

name: Have you finally figured it out? You alone cannot defeat us in this Dream, Zeus.
value: 你終於發現了嗎？宙斯，在這場夢境中，僅憑你一人的力量是無法戰勝我們的。

name: Hades? No...Crius of the Twelve Titans, the soul in Hades' body is you, right?
value: 哈迪斯？不……十二泰坦之一的克利俄斯，阿波羅身體裏的靈魂是你才對吧？

name: You have a good memory, Zeus. I thought you'd have forgotten my name after sealing us away for so long.
value: 記性不錯嘛，宙斯，封印我們這麼長時間，我以為你早把我的名字忘了。

name: I don't mind throwing you back into the Abyss to seal you again, so prepare yourself.
value: 我不介意把你再次丟回封印的深淵裏，做好準備吧。

name: Do you dare to attack me while I'm in Hades' body?!
value: 這可是哈迪斯的身體，你知道攻擊這副身體的後果嗎？！

name: Do you think I didn't consider that? Did you forget, we're in Pandora's Dreamland right now...
value: 你以為我會沒考慮到這個危險嗎？別忘了，我們現在可是在潘多拉的夢境中……

name: ...I am perfectly capable of ripping your soul to pieces without harming Hades' body.
value: ……我完全有能力在不傷害到哈迪斯肉體的情況下，把你的靈魂大卸八塊。

name: The arrogance... I dare you to try.
value: 口氣不小，那麼你就來試試吧！

name: You may have defeated me today, but I will be back! Remember that, Zeus!
value: 你雖然擊敗了我，但總有一天我還會回來的，給我記住了，宙斯！

name: ...She's finally gone from my head. If you had taken any longer, I would have been completely lost.
value: ……終於醒過來了，你再來遲一會，我恐怕就要完全失去意識了。

name: Hades, how did you end up being controlled by a Titan?
value: 哈迪斯，你怎麼會被泰坦控制？

name: I can only say that the Titans are growing stronger, and to make matters worse... Cronus is back.
value: 只能說泰坦們的力量正在逐漸變強，更糟的是，克洛諾斯回來了……

name: Cronus...King of the Twelve Titans...
value: 克洛諾斯……十二泰坦之王……

name: Go, she is waiting for you in the Temple of Olympus right now.
value: 去吧，此刻的她正在奧林匹斯神殿裏等你。

name: Zeus, to this day, I can still feel your fear of me in your heart...
value: 宙斯，時至今日，我依舊可以感受到你內心中對我的恐懼……

name: Cronus, no need to bluff. I know it's your soul in Athena's body.
value: 克洛諾斯，沒必要虛張聲勢，我知道雅典娜身體裏是你的靈魂。

name: Even though I don't have a body of my own right now, don't forget that I have far more combat experience than yours.
value: 即便我現在還沒有屬於自己的實體，但別忘了，我的戰鬥經驗遠勝於你。

name: You once said something like that, but luck didn't seem to be on your side that time either.
value: 你曾經也說過這樣的話，但運氣好像沒站在你那邊。

name: Hmph... Do you think trickery counts as victory? If you fight me face to face, you have no chance of winning!
value: 哼……你覺得耍計謀也算得上是勝利嗎？如果和我面對面戰鬥，你沒有絲毫贏的可能！

name: It's kind of ironic, you know? The goddess Athena you are currently possessing is an expert in wisdom and strategy.
value: 真是諷刺，你知道嗎？你目前附身的女神雅典娜，可是智慧和策略的專家。

name: Whether it's through strategy or a frontal battle, I will never lose to you. Let's start this battle!
value: 無論是計謀還是正面戰鬥，我都不會輸給你，開始這場戰鬥吧！

name: Huh... I didn't expect your power to be this strong. Never before has a goddess stood against the power of a Titan...
value: 呃……沒想到你的力量已經如此強大，以前從來沒有任何神明能直面泰坦的力量……

name: How is this possible? Even though Cronus was defeated, Athena's soul has not woken up again...
value: 這怎麼可能……即使擊敗了克洛諾斯，雅典娜的靈魂卻沒有再次蘇醒……

name: Don't think my soul is weak enough to dissipate so easily! I won't stop until I get a strong body!
value: 別以為我的靈魂這麼簡單就會消散！在沒有得到強大的肉體之前，我是不會就此甘休的！

name: Hmph. So your ambition is nothing more than that.
value: 哼……原來你的野心不過如此而已。

name: It seems my strength has been exhausted. I guess Athena's body is not as powerful as I thought.
value: 我的力量已經用盡，看來雅典娜的身體並沒有想像中那麼強大。

name: But my soul still controls Athena's body. If you seal me away, Athena's soul will be imprisoned with me!
value: 但我的靈魂依舊能夠操控雅典娜的身體，如果你將我封印，雅典娜的靈魂將和我一併沉睡！

name: (Use a trick to get Cronus' soul out of Athena's body)
value: （用計讓克洛諾斯的靈魂離開雅典娜的身體）

name: Cronus, you just want a strong body, right?
value: 克洛諾斯，你只不過是想要一個強大的肉體而已，對吧？

name: That's right... I have been waiting for a powerful body that I can use to take back the throne for myself!
value: 沒錯……我一直等著一個能為我自己奪回神王之位的強大肉體！

name: You don't have to wait, Cronus, if you're brave and courageous enough...
value: 你沒必要等了，克洛諾斯，如果你足夠有膽識和勇氣……

name: ...Just fight me in this dream.
value: ……就在這夢境中和我決個勝負吧。

name: Don't try to fool me a second time, Zeus. Do you think this duel is fair?
value: 別想再騙我第二次，宙斯，你以為這場決鬥公平嗎？

name: Hehe... In that case, I can use my Box to create a body identical to Lady Zeus'...
value: 呵呵……我可以通過魔盒，塑造出一個與宙斯大人相同的身體……

name: This body is powerful enough to serve as a container for a Titan's soul. Do you know what this means?
value: 這具身體的強大程度，完全足以作為泰坦靈魂的容器，你知道這意味著什麼嗎？

name: So how about it? Same body, same strength. Do you have the guts to face me, second-generation King?
value: 如何？同樣的身體，同樣的力量，你有這個膽量面對我嗎，第二代神王？

name: Don't regret those words, Zeus!
value: 這可是你說的，宙斯，別後悔！

name: Come on, Cronus. Let us end this grudge that has lasted for thousands of years.
value: 來吧，克洛諾斯，結束這場持續萬年的恩怨吧。

name: This body and strength... are beyond my imagination...
value: 這身體和力量……真是超乎我想像的強……

name: I will put an end to your madness this time. I won't hesitate any longer!
value: 我要徹底終結你的瘋狂，這一次，我不會再猶豫了！

name: It's over, Chronos. This battle ends in my victory.
value: 一切都結束了，克諾洛斯，這場戰鬥以我的勝利而告終……

name: I can't believe this... Even with the same power, I still lost to you...Is this also Fate?
value: 真沒想到……即使擁有同樣的力量，我還是會輸給你……這也是命運使然嗎？

name: I don't know either. But over the next few tens of thousands of years, you can find the answer yourself, inside Pandora's Box.
value: 我也不知道，但在接下來的幾萬年中，你會在潘多拉魔盒的封印裏，自己找到答案的。

name: Hmph. Sooner or later, I will regain the authority of the God King... even if it takes another ten thousand years.
value: 哼，我遲早有一天會重新奪回神王的權柄……哪怕再過萬年也是一樣。

name: I'll be waiting for that day.
value: 我會等著那一天到來的。

name: Do you think you can threaten me? Cronus, why do you think I'm fighting you in Pandora's Dreamland?
value: 你以為能威脅到我嗎？克洛諾斯，你以為我為什麼要在潘多拉的夢境中和你對決？

name: You... Could it be that this Dream...
Did you finally figure it out? This entire Dreamland is under my control. Athena's soul will not be harmed.
value: 你終於發現了嗎？整個夢境由我掌控著，雅典娜的靈魂不會受到任何傷害。

name: How unfortunate, Cronus. It looks like you'll have to stay in the seal for a while longer.
value: 真是不巧啊，克洛諾斯，看來你得在封印裏再呆上一陣子了。

name: I hope the scourge in my Box will be good entertainment for you over the next tens of thousands of years, Lady Titan.
value: 希望我魔盒裏的那些災厄之物，在接下來的幾萬年裏不會讓你感到乏味，泰坦大人。

name: No... Zeus... I will not let you go!
value: 不……宙斯……我不會放過你們的！

name: Everything is finally over now. But what should I do if the seal is released again after tens of thousands of years, my dear?
value: 一切總算是結束了，但幾萬年後封印再次解開該怎麼辦，親愛的。

name: You can cross that bridge when you get to it.
value: 那時候的事情當然是那時候再說啦！

name: Used to upgrade the level of the Memoria Orb in Zeus's Dreamland
value: 用於提升宙斯的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Open the box and choose Zeus's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇宙斯任意品質的碎片

name: Own 1 Epic Miracle Card
value: 擁有1張稀有品質神跡卡

name: Own 5 Epic Miracle Cards
value: 擁有5張稀有品質神跡卡

name: Own 20 Epic Miracle Cards
value: 擁有20張稀有品質神跡卡

name: The Destiny Star of any angel reaches Lv. 30
value: 任意1名女神命星達到30級

name: The Destiny Star of 12 angels reaches Lv. 30
value: 任意12名女神命星達到30級

name: The Destiny Star of 6 angels reaches Lv. 30
value: 任意6名女神命星達到30級

name: Trade or purchase items 20 times from Molly
value: 累計完成鼴鼠商人事件20次

name: This angel don’t have the Destiny Star

If Zeus receives fatal damage, then her HP becomes 1 instead (takes priority over Law of Eternity), then becomes available again after 4 turns. When in action, Zeus sacrifices 50% of her current HP and enters [Overload] state for 1 round.\n\n[Overload]: Increase Skill DMG Reduction and Leech by 50%. Gains 1 ATK for every 5 points of health lost.”
value: 戰鬥中宙斯受到致命傷害時不會陣亡，生命值保留1點，此效果觸發後四回合可以再次觸發（優先於不滅之律觸發），每回合行動時，宙斯以犧牲當前50%血量為代價使自身進入【超負荷】狀態，提升自身50%的技能傷害減免、吸血。同時宙斯根據已損失生命值提升自身攻擊力，每損失5點生命值提升1點攻擊力（受特殊屬性加成），持續1回合

name: TTPW_ACHIEVEMENT_AWARD_MAIL_TITLE
value: 眾神爭霸巔峰賽獎勵(第{0}賽季)

name: TTPW_ACHIEVEMENT_AWARD_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 眾神爭霸巔峰賽結束，您的成績是：{0}，為您發放了相應的獎勵。

name: TTPW_PROMOTION_GUESS_MAIL_CONTENT
value: 您成功預測一次眾神爭霸巔峰賽的比賽結果，為您發放獎勵。

name: ...Pisces. I knew something smelled fishy. Why the sudden visit to my Dreamland?
value: ……雙魚嗎？好久不見，怎麼突然有興趣跑到我的夢境領域？

name: I actually came to ask for your help.
value: 我……其實有件事情想請你幫忙。

name: I can't shake this feeling that there's another me somewhere out there.
value: 我有種奇怪的感覺，仿佛在某個地方，存在著另外一個“自己”。

name: I would ask if you're dreaming but...
value: ……你是沒睡醒嗎？怎麼可能發生這種事。

name: Can you use the power of the Dreamland to help me find her? I can hear her voice calling out to me.
value: 你能用夢境的力量，幫我找到她嗎？我聽見了她一直呼喚我的聲音。

name: I guess I can give it a try. But if you want to my help, then you first have to pass my test.
value: 我可以試試看。當然，按照規則，你要尋求夢境的力量，就必須先接受夢境的考驗。

name: I know your rules, Pandora。
value: 我明白你的規矩，潘多拉。

name: I didn't expect you to pass my test so easily...
value: 沒想到你竟然還能如此輕鬆地通過考驗……

name: What do we do next?
value: 那麼接下來我們該怎麼辦？

name: Patience, darling. I will use my Box to try to see what exactly this other self of yours is.
value: 別急，親愛的，讓我用魔盒看看你所說的“另一個自己”……究竟是什麼。

name: Hmm... There is something. It doesn't look like you, but the soul is similar.
value: 嗯……我確實看到了“另一個你”，她雖然和你長得不怎麼像，但卻有著相似的靈魂。

name: Wait... Zeus is there too. If she's involved in this, things are going to get complicated.
value: 等等……宙斯也在？她怎麼會有關系？看來事情比我們想像中要複雜。

name: We'd better find a few reliable companions to join us before we set off. Got any good candidates?
value: 我們最好在出發去她們的夢境前，找幾個可靠的同伴幫忙，你有什麼好人選嗎？

name: Reliable companions... Hmm. My sisters will help me.
value: 可靠的同伴……剩下的幾個星座姐妹？我想她們一定會幫我的。

name: We've been waiting for you, Pisces. The stars heralded your arrival, and also your reason for being here.
value: 我們已經等你很久了，雙魚，群星預示了你的到來，以及來這裏的原因。

name: That doesn't surprise me. After all, the connection between us Zodiac sisters is still strong.
value: 我一點也不意外，畢竟星座彼此之間的聯結從未消失。

name: We observed a powerful burst of energy in the Sea of Stars. It was the same as the divine power which you once possessed.
value: 我們觀測到星海中有強大的能量爆發，而那正是你曾經擁有的、象徵溫柔與沉眠的神力。

name: But it was full of confusion and fear, and desperate to let out the suppressed emotions in her heart.
value: 這力量的擁有者徘徊在彷徨與恐懼中，渴望將壓抑在內心的感情全部宣洩出去。

name: I know, I've been hearing her call in my dreams, but I don't know how to help her.
value: 你說的沒錯，我在夢境中一直聽見她的呼喚，雖然我並不知道她需要什麼幫助。

name: So you came to Pandora's Dreamland, and you wish our aid.
value: 所以你會來潘多拉的夢境，希望請我們一起去解決這個麻煩，對吧？

name: But in this Dreamland, your power is weaker. Even with our help, you may not succeed.
value: 但夢境中的你，力量已經被削弱，即使有我們的幫助，也不一定能安全找到她。

name: I am confident in my own strength. If you have doubts, come at me.
value: 不，我始終認同自己的力量，如果不放心的話，就來試試看吧。

name: It seems that even though you have lost most of your divine power, you are still powerful.
value: 看來即便是失去大半沉眠之力的你，也依舊強大。

name: I always have faith in my own strength.
value: 我始終相信自己的力量。

name: Enough talking, you two. Who's next on the list?
value: 話不多說了，我們接下來去找誰？

name: Capricornus. She always helps me when I'm in trouble. Can you connect to her Dream?
value: 摩羯座，每次遇到麻煩的時候，她總能幫我不小的忙，你能連通她的夢境嗎？

name: Piece of cake. But be careful, her Dream feels a little... angry.
value: 小菜一碟，不過你們小心些，我感受到她的夢境有些……憤怒。

name: Monsters, the Zodiac is not for the likes of you! Leave immediately!
value: 魔物們，黃道不是你們該來的地方！馬上離開這裏！

name: It seems that your sister... is not in a good mood today.
value: 看來你們的朋友……今天心情不大好。

name: Oh no. Capricornus is suffering from hallucinations again. She cannot escape the nightmares of her past self, Pan.
value: 摩羯又陷入幻覺之中了，她好像還沒有從之前潘神的噩夢裏解脫出來。

name: Does she think we are monsters invading the Zodiac again? We need to wake her!
value: 呼……她又把我們當成入侵黃道的魔物了嗎？我們得將她從幻覺中清醒過來！

name: Another fight, really? As the embodiment of the deep sea and eternal sleep, can't you be more gentle with your sisters?
value: 又要打架？天哪……身為深海與長眠之化身，就不能對你的姐妹溫柔點麼？

name: The sea is not always calm, is it?
value: 大海也不是永遠都風平浪靜的不是嗎？

name: ...Pandora? Why are you here?
value: ……潘多拉？你們為什麼會在這裏？

name: Are you sane now? Your mind was trapped in Pan's nightmare again.
value: 感覺清醒了嗎，你的意志又被潘神困在噩夢中了。

name: Maybe you should take a break from the Zodiac for a while. After all, Pan's power has left quite a shadow in your heart.
value: 或許你應該離開黃道一陣子，畢竟潘神的力量曾經在你的心底留下了不小的陰影。

name: I hope I didn't cause any trouble. But what brings you to the Zodiac to find me?
value: 真是太糟了，希望我沒惹出什麼麻煩……你們來黃道找我，是有什麼重要的事嗎？

name: We're searching for a goddess and need your power to help us travel through the Dreamland.
value: 我們在尋找一個奇特的神明，需要你的力量幫助我們穿越夢境。

name: After all, having been the Goddess of Nightmares, you know the dream best out of the Zodiacs.
value: 畢竟對於夢境，你在所有星座姐妹中是最瞭解的。

name: Although I am no stranger to dreams, I do not have the control I once did.
value: 雖然我對於夢境不陌生，但並不能很好地掌控夢境裏的一切……

name: Don't worry, my dear. If you lose control again in the future, it will be our enemies who have run out of luck.
value: 放心吧，親愛的，你之後要是再失控的話，倒楣的應該是我們的敵人了……

name: Why have the Zodiac Signs broken into the Dreamland of the Greek Goddesses?
value: 你們是……黃道的一眾星座化身？為什麼你們會闖到希臘眾神的夢境裏來？

name: That's my line. Icarus, why are you in my domain?
value: 這個問題不是應該由我來問你嗎？伊卡璐斯，你為什麼會在我的領域裏？

name: Pandora, haven't you noticed the massive divine power raging out of control? The edges of the Dreamland have begun to crumble.
value: 潘多拉，你難道沒發現嗎，一陣強大的神力正在瘋狂肆虐，夢境的邊緣已經開始崩潰了。

name: Wait a second... Pisces, your aura is the exact same as that divine power. Could it be that you...
value: 等等，雙魚座你身上的氣息，和那陣爆發的能量一模一樣，該不會……

name: I know what you're thinking... But you've got it wrong!
value: 我知道你在想什麼……你誤會了！

name: I will verify that myself!
value: 不行，我恐怕得親自驗證一下……

name: Stop, I don't want to be your enemy. But as I thought, that out-of-control divine power is no different from your divine power.
value: 停手吧，我並非要與你們為敵，但如我所想，那陣失控的能量和你的神力並無差別。

name: I swear I never thought of going against the Dreamland of the Greek Goddesses.
value: 我發誓，自己絕沒有任何對希臘眾神夢境不利的想法。

name: Then what is the cause?
value: 那麼……究竟會是什麼原因？

name: I believe that after the separation of my original divine power from my soul, it became a new goddess.
value: 據我們目前所知道的，這場麻煩源自於我身上分離出的神格，成為了一個新的存在。

name: We are looking for her. We have the same purpose, so will you help us?
value: 我們正因找她而來，如果我們彼此有著相同目的，那麼你願意幫我嗎？

name: I have never heard of such a thing happening before. But if you really don't have any malicious intentions, then I will help you.
value: 嗯……這種事情我還從沒聽過，如果你們的確沒有惡意，那麼我的幫助也是理所應當的。

name: That damn Zeus. Where has she gone this time?
value: 宙斯那個傢伙，也不知最近跑到哪里去了……

name: If she doesn't apologize to me, I will leave and never come back!
value: 她要是一天不和我道歉，我就永遠不回去……

name: Uh... I think we'd better take a different route...
value: 呃……我覺得，我們最好繞個道……

name: Is that Queen Hera? Doesn't she stay in the Temple of Olympus? Why is she talking to herself in the dream?
value: 天後赫拉？她不是一直都呆在奧林匹斯神殿的嗎，為什麼會在夢境裏對著空氣自言自語？

name: Don't ask... It's like this everytime Hera and Zeus have an argument.
value: 你最好別問這麼多……據我所知，赫拉和宙斯每次吵完架就會躲起來哭。

name: You there! What are you doing sneaking around?!
value: ……你們幾個，在那鬼鬼祟祟幹什麼呢？！

name: Oh great, she saw us. Here comes trouble.
How dare you sneak into my dream and peep on me!
value: 居然敢潛入我的夢境裏偷窺，你們膽子可真夠大的！

name: Ugh forget it. I'm in a bad mood, I'm not interested in fighting anymore with you.
value: 算了，不打了，我心情很差，沒興趣和你們繼續鬧。

name: My lady, an out-of-control goddess is wantonly destroying the entire Dreamland. Perhaps you can join us...
value: 天後大人，某個失控的女神正在大肆毀滅整個夢境，如果您能和我們一起……

name: What does that have to do with me? If that goddess loves destruction, just let her destroy things.
value: 那和我有什麼關係，愛毀滅就毀滅吧。

name: Hmm, but I heard that Lady Zeus is in the Dreamland and has gone to see that goddess.
value: 哎呀呀，可是我聽說宙斯大人正在那個女神所處的夢境裏，您要是放著不管……

name: Is that right? I demand you take me to her. I swear her sweet dreams will soon come to an end.
value: 是嗎？那麼帶我去找她吧，我發誓她的美夢很快就要到頭了。

name: Goddesses, I know why you are here. Please stop and listen to me.
value: 女神們，我知道你們的來意，請停下腳步聽我一言。

name: Gaia, Goddess of the Earth, why are you in Pandora's Dreamland?
value: 大地女神蓋亞，你為什麼會在潘多拉的夢境裏？

name: Pisces of the Zodiac. You and this new goddess will begin to resonate if you go any closer.
value: 雙魚的星座化身……你如果繼續前進的話，你和那位新生女神的神格將會開始共鳴。

name: Once the resonance begins, only one can survive while the other is sacrificed.
value: 共鳴開始後，你們二者之間就必須犧牲一個，才能保證另外一個的生存。

name: Because you share the same origin. So the farther away you are, the weaker your connection will be, but when you get closer to each other...
value: 因為你們本來就是同源的，離得越遠你們的聯繫就會越淡，但如果接近彼此……

name: Then the energy of one will completely devour the other, and that will trigger an unimaginable collapse.
value: 一方的能量就會把另一方完全吞噬，然後引發不可想像的崩潰。

name: Is there any way to stop this from happening?
value: 有什麼辦法能阻止這一切發生嗎？

name: Are you willing to give up the last of your divine power to reshape her body?
value: 除非你願意貢獻出自己最後的神力，為她那副只有神格的身軀重塑形體。

name: Is there any other way? I don't want to lose my sister.
value: 還有其他方法嗎？我希望沒有任何人需要做出犧牲……

name: Well perhaps there is one way. The Essence of the Earth can be shaped into the body of a goddess, just as the oriental goddess Nuwa once did.
value: 確實有一個，那就是大地的精華，它可以為女神塑造身體，東方的神明女媧就曾經做過。

name: But only someone with a strong will can control the Essence. Face me in battle and prove that you are capable of this.
value: 但只有意志強大者能控制這些精華，如果你們能擊敗我，那麼就證明你們具備這樣的資格。

name: I will show you my resolve and determination.
value: 您會在戰鬥中看到我面對這段命運的決心。

name: You have proven yourself worthy to use the Essence of the Earth. But be careful, the closer you get to her, the more dangerous she becomes.
value: 你證明了自己擁有大地精華的資格，但要小心，因為你越靠近她，就會越危險。

name: Thank you, Goddess Gaia. Do you have any ideas for dealing with this resonance, Pandora?
value: 謝謝你，蓋亞女神。對於這種共鳴，潘多拉你有什麼好主意嗎？

name: You can use my Box to create a new dream and separate your connection, but this is only temporary.
value: 可以用我的魔盒創造一個新的夢境，先將你們的聯繫隔開，但這種做法只是暫時的。

name: Please, Pandora, I just need a little time.
value: 拜託了，潘多拉，我只需要一點點時間就好了。

name: Events predetermined by Fate are inevitable.
This barrier was made by Zeus. Stop immediately, or I will have to kick you out!
value: 前面是宙斯所設的結界，立刻停下腳步，否則我就要驅逐你們了！

name: How strange that Apollo and Athena, who usually refuse to talk to each other, are actually standing side by side.
value: 真是稀奇，曾發誓老死不相往來的阿波羅和雅典娜，居然站在了同一陣線。

name: I know why you are guarding Zeus' Dream. We're here to help.
value: 我很清楚你們為何守衛在宙斯的夢境邊緣，倒不如說，我們正為解決此事而來。

name: Do you think that empty words will convince us?
value: 空口無憑，你們如何證明能解決這個麻煩？

name: I have the Essence of the Earth from Goddess Gaia. It will definitely help.
value: 我得到了蓋亞女神的大地精華，這一定能有所幫助。

name: You plan to use the Essence of the Earth to shape a body for the goddess, and stabilize the soul that is out of control...?
value: 通過大地精華來重塑女神的形體，來穩定失控的靈魂嗎……？

name: That could work, Apollo.
value: 這倒也是個辦法，阿波羅。

name: I started this, so it's my responsibility to end it, no?
value: 此事由我而起，我有結束它的責任，不是嗎？

name: Sorry, we can't take that risk. Zeus' orders must be obeyed.
value: 抱歉，宙斯的命令必須遵守，我們不能冒這個險。

name: Looks like the negotiations have failed. Such a pity.
value: 真是遺憾，看來交涉失敗了呢。

name: If Fate is really on your side, then Athena and I will not be enough to stop you.
value: 如果命運真的站在你們那邊，那麼我和雅典娜也不會是你們的阻礙。

name: Let's call there. I admit defeat. But you must still face Athena.
value: 到此為止吧，我認輸了，但是接下來你們將會面對雅典娜。

name: Lady Apollo, you didn't seem to be trying your best.
value: 阿波羅大人，您似乎並沒有盡全力應戰……

name: No need to thank me. I just did what I thought was right.
value: 沒必要感激我，我只是做了我認為正確的事而已。

name: Athena, it's been a long time since we last saw each other.
value: 雅典娜，我們有很長一段時間沒見了。

name: Indeed, we have not spoken a word to each other since the Trojan War.
value: 沒錯，自從特洛伊戰爭後，你我就再沒說過一句話。

name: Others do not recognize your true identity, but as the Goddess of Wisdom, you cannot hide from me.
value: 其他人認不出你的真實身份，然而作為智慧女神，你瞞不了我。

name: I am not hiding. I am no longer Aphrodite, the Goddess of Love. Now I am just Pisces.
value: 我已經不是那時候的愛神阿弗洛狄忒了，如今我只是雙魚座的化身而已。

name: Well let's write off past grievances. Meaningless hatred is irrational.
value: 過去的恩怨，就此一筆勾銷吧，畢竟無意義的仇恨是一種不理智的行為。

name: We each have our burdens to shoulder, you must understand, right?
value: 如今我們有了各自應當背負的使命，想必你也能夠理解吧？

name: I will abide by the agreement. If you beat me, I will let you pass.
value: 我會遵守約定，只要你贏過我，就放你們過去。

name: You have won this battle. I will keep my word and let you pass.
value: 你們贏得了這場戰鬥，而我也將履行戰前的約定。

name: Thank you for your understanding, Goddess of Wisdom.
value: 謝謝你的通情達理，智慧女神。

name: As the former Goddess of Love, you should recognize who the deity deep within the dream is.
value: 作為曾經的愛神，你現在應該明白正在夢境最深處的那個神格是誰了。

name: I've more or less guessed it.
value: 我想……我已經多多少少猜到一些了。

name: Zeus! So this is where you've been hiding!
My dear, I'm not here on vacation. Anyone with a discerning eye can see that the dream is facing a disaster.
value: 親愛的，我可不是來度假的，明眼人都會發現，夢境很快會爆發一場災難。

name: That's right. That is the dream of the Goddess of Love, born from your old divinity after you ascended to the constellation of Pisces.
value: 沒錯，這個夢境的主人就是自你升格為雙魚座的化身後，從你的舊神格中誕生的愛神……

name: Her name is Venus. She is the Roman Goddess of Love. But she is on the verge of collapse due to her incomplete divinity.
value: 其名為維納斯，是羅馬眾神的愛情主宰，但糟糕的是她由於神格不完整，已經瀕臨崩潰。

name: I have Gaia's Essence of Earth here. We can save her with it.
value: 我得到了蓋亞女神的大地精華，這應該能夠拯救她。

name: I'm afraid you're too late. Even with Pandora's Box isolating her dream, the two of you have already resonated.
value: 恐怕你來的有點晚，即使有潘多拉魔盒的隔絕，她和你的共鳴已經產生。

name: You must leave quickly. I will use my divine power to seal off this barrier and completely lock her in my dream.
value: 你們趕緊離開吧，接下來我會用神力封鎖整個結界，徹底將她關在自己的夢境裏。

name: But then she will be trapped here forever, suffering from her own power!
value: 但這樣一來，她就只能永遠地在這裏承受痛苦了不是嗎？！

name: This is beyond our ability to control. I must end her existence.
value: 這麻煩已經不是我們所能控制的了，我必須終結她的存在。

name: No, I have to try. It is my fault that things turned out like this.
value: 不，我一定要試試，事情會變成這樣，完全是我的責任……

name: I must take responsibilty. Even if it means I will be destroyed with her.
value: 我必須彌補這一切，即便是要與她一起毀滅。

name: Don't be stupid! Get out of here quickly, or I will stop you by force!
value: 別傻了，快點離開這裏，否則我只能動手阻止你們了！

name: That's enough, stop. It seems that I cannot deny your will.
value: 夠了，停手吧，看來我無法阻攔你的意志，如果你一定要這麼做的話。

name: I hope that your choice to save her yourself is correct. If you fail, the whole Greek Dreamland will collapse.
value: 希望你自己去拯救她這個選擇是正確的，我必須告訴你，一旦失敗整個夢境就會坍塌。

name: That's right. All the goddesses trapped in the dream will be destroyed. Do you understand the gravity of the situation now?
value: 沒錯，所有被困於夢境的神明都將遭受滅頂之災，你明白事情的嚴重性了吧？

name: If you, like me, choose to seal her away in the dream, then this disaster will be averted and we will all be saved.
value: 如果你像我一樣，選擇直接封印她的夢境，災厄便會立刻結束，我們都能得救。

name: But I respect your strength, and will accept your decision. Make your choice.
value: 但我尊重強者的決定，做出你的選擇吧……

name: ...Seal her away. I cannot put the Greek Goddesses in danger.
value: ……封印她吧，我不能讓希臘眾神陷入險境。

name: Although this is not a perfect choice, it ensures that the destruction of the Greek Pantheon is avoided.
value: 雖然這並非最完美的選擇，但卻可以避免眾神毀滅的命運。

name: Olympus will remember her existence. May her soul rest in peace.
value: 奧林匹斯會記住她曾經的存在，願她的靈魂能夠安息。

name: i will save her.She also has the right to live!
value: 我會救她，哪怕只是神格的造物，也有活下去的權利！

name: You chose the most difficult path. But perhaps this is your persistent will as the Goddess of Love.
value: 你選擇了最艱難的方法，不過這或許就是曾經作為愛神的你執著的意志吧……

name: I will reopen the way to Venus' Dream for you. May Fate bless you.
value: 我會為你重新打開通往維納斯夢境的通道，願眾神賜予你祝福。

name: The former goddess Aphrodite... is that you?
value: 曾經的阿弗洛狄忒女神……是你來了嗎？

name: After so long, have you finally remembered me? You tore me from your soul, abandoned me, ignored me.
value: 這麼久了，你終於想起我了？你將我從你的靈魂中分離，拋棄我，無視我。

name: But what is the use of me saying this now?
value: 然而現在我說這些又有什麼用呢？

name: Corroded by darkness and pain, I can no longer control my power.
value: 受到黑暗和痛苦侵蝕的我，已經無法控制自己的力量了。

name: Venus, I have risked myself to come here and save you.
value: 維納斯，既然我冒著風險來到這裏，就能讓你安然無恙。

name: Are you truly here to save me? Or are you simply afraid that my power will lead to the destruction of the gods?
value: 你真的是為了拯救我嗎？還是單純害怕我的力量會引發眾神的滅亡？

name: I am trying to take responsibility for my actions.
value: 我只是為了完成自己應該負的責任而已。

name: Come on then, let's end this.
value: 那麼來吧，讓我們結束這一切。

name: Venus' soul has been weakened. Now is the time for the Essence of the Earth to absorb her soul.
value: 維納斯的靈魂被削弱了，現在正是讓大地精華接納她的機會。

name: In the name of the Oath of Stars, may the Earth respond to the prayers of the gods...
value: 以星辰誓約為名，願大地回應眾神的祈禱……

name: Was I successful? She isn't responding to me.
value: 我成功了嗎？她好像並沒有回應我……

name: The Essence of the Earth has reshaped her body, and Venus' soul has returned to its original state.
value: 不，大地精華已經重鑄了她的身軀，維納斯的靈魂已經回到了原初的狀態。

name: She will regenerate her own soul as a new goddess, and after thousands of years, then she will wake up.
value: 她將作為新生的神明，重新孕育自己的靈魂，直至千百年後的蘇醒。

name: This will be a long process, right?
value: 這將是一個漫長的過程，對吧？

name: You succeeded in saving her, and both the Greek and the Roman goddesses owe you thanks for that.
value: 你成功拯救了她，無論是希臘，或是羅馬眾神，都應當為此而感謝你。

name: And her divine power that was out of control will return to you, allowing you to ascend to a higher level of divinity.
value: 而她那曾經失控的神力，也將回到你身上，成為你升格為高階神明的契機。

name: I will make good use of this power that has returned to me. And I will wait for the day when she awakens.
value: 我會好好使用這原本屬於我的力量，並等待她蘇醒那一天的到來。

name: Well then. All's well that ends well. Let's leave the Dreamland now. My Box will guard her soul.
value: 呼……總算是沒惹出大事，我們離開夢境吧，魔盒會一直看護她的靈魂。

name: Used to upgrade the Level of the Memoria Orb in Pisces's Dreamland
value: 用於提升雙魚座的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Pisces’s Shard Optional Box
value: 雙魚座女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the box and choose Pisces's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇雙魚座任意品質的碎片

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_103
value: 我乘潮汐而來，與你相擁入夢。

name: (Questions will be updated daily. Paticipate to get rewards.)
value: (活動期間每日刷新，完成答題即可獲得問答福利)

name: Refresh daily during the event period
In the line-up, which numbers represent the front row?
value: 在佈陣當中，哪幾號位為前排

name: In the line-up, which numbers represent the back row?
value: 在佈陣當中，哪幾號位為後排

name: When an angel performs a normal attack, which target does she attack first?
value: 女神進行普通攻擊時，優先攻擊哪個目標

name: How many angels can the player set in the line-up at most?
value: 玩家至多可佈置多少名女神

name: Which of the following is correct about the Class Effect?
value: 以下女神職業克制關係正確的是

name: How does the Class Effect work?
value: 職業克制方對被克制方

name: How many class does the angel have?
value: 當前女神共有幾種職業

name: What affects your team's action order in battle?
value: 戰鬥中，隊伍中女神的出手順序

name: When both sides are in the same position, what factor determines the action order?
value: 雙方站位相同時，決定雙方出手順序的因素是

name: Can the substitute angels trigger the fate of the angels on the field?

value: 恭喜！您成功晉級{0}！您可以前往活動介面查看下一輪比賽的對手。

name: Which of the following major gods does Pandora belong to?

When Pisces begins her first action this battle, she inflicts [Nightmare] on an enemy (ignores Debuff RES; cannot be dispelled) which remains up to but not including 2 actions. Pisces deals 30% Increased Damage to the enemy in Nightmare. When [Nightmare] ends, the enemy receives 30% increased damage for 2 rounds.\n\n[Nightmare]: Unable to act. Immune to damage from anyone except Pisces.
value: 行動時，使一名敵人進入【噩夢】狀態（無視異抗），無法行動但不會受到雙魚座以外的傷害，持續敵人第二次行動前，【噩夢】狀態結束後使敵人受到傷害增加30%，持續2回合，該效果每場戰鬥只能觸發一次。雙魚座造成傷害時，附帶雙魚座最大生命值5%的真實傷害，該傷害不會解除敵方的睡眠狀態，且攻擊【噩夢】狀態的目標時傷害提升30%

name: Unable to act. Immune to damage from anyone except Pisces.
value: 無法行動，免疫雙魚座以外的傷害

value: 本次刷新需要消耗{0}個神跡積分，是否確認刷新？

name: YOU_ARE_IN_BLACK_LIST
value: 您已被對方加入黑名單

name: You have been blacklisted this player
value: 您已將該玩家拉黑，不能加好友

name: Um hi? Do we know each other? My mystic shop is only open to acquaintances.
value: 嗯……我們認識嗎？如果你是來找我幫忙的話，很可惜，我的占卜店只接待熟人……

name: Wow. Have you forgotten me already? That makes me sad. We met when you were helping Pisces.
value: 你這麼說真讓我感到遺憾，我們前不久才見過，就在雙魚座的委託中。

name: Oh! Are you that new goddess? Well in that case... Tell me what you need.
value: 你是那個新生的女神？好吧……說出你的來意。

name: After being reborn, I have been travelling the world in search of some purpose for my existence...
value: 獲得新的靈魂後，我就一直在世界各地旅行，但我始終無法找到自己存在的意義。

name: ...in vain. So I've come to you for help
value: 所以我找到了你，希望你能幫幫我。

name: Are you so sure I can help you?
value: 你就這麼確信我能幫到你嗎？

name: Well Pisces certainly thought so when I asked her.
value: 至少當我問雙魚座時，她是這樣想的。

name: So, it was Pisces who sent you to me. Then for her sake, I will give it my best shot.
value: 這麼說，是雙魚讓你來找我的……好吧，看在她的份上，我就試試看吧。

name: But as is my custom, you must first pass my test... to prove that you won't lose yourself in the Dream again.
value: 當然了，按照我的習慣，你得先通過我的測試，證明你不會在夢境中再次迷失自己。

name: I'm not good at fighting... But if you insist, I'm not afraid to show you what I've got!
value: 我不擅長戰鬥……但如果你堅持的話，我也不會畏懼什麼。

name: Although you have no actual skill in combat, you possess much power after your rebirth... I concede that you have passed.
value: 雖然毫無戰鬥技巧可言，但你重生後的能量太強大了……我承認你通過了。

name: I will use my divination to know whose dreams we should go to for answers.
value: 我將看看占卜的結果……然後才能知道我們應該去誰的夢境尋找答案。

name: Let's see what destiny is revealed for you! Um... a rose?
value: 讓我們看看你的命運為你揭示了什麼，嗯……一朵玫瑰？

name: I have no idea either. My divinations are usually rather straightfoward. Understanding them however...
value: 不知道，我占卜的內容，通常會以很直接的方式顯現，至於如何理解它……

name: Perhaps we should ask for help from Apollo, who also bears the gift of divination.
value: 或許我們該去問問阿波羅，同為預言者，她應該會知道些什麼。

name: Pandora, the Daughter of Disaster? To be honest, I don't really want to welcome you into my Dream.
value: 災厄之女潘多拉？說實話我不是很想歡迎你進入我的夢境……

name: Don't be so mean, my dear. I'm just here to ask you for a favor.
value: 別那麼小氣，親愛的，我來只是請你幫個忙。

name: I'm not sure what I can do to help you.
value: 我不確定自己有什麼能幫得上你。

name: I received a revelation of Fate. It's pretty neat, you'll be interested in it.
value: 我拿到了一段命運的啟示，它非常精妙……你會有興趣看看的。

name: Your words are hard to believe...
value: 你的話很難讓人相信啊……

name: Greek Goddess of Light and Prophecy, this revelation originates from me. Please believe that I am sincerely seeking answers from you.
value: 希臘的光明與預言之神，這段命運的啟示源於我，請相信我是帶著誠意向你尋求解答。

name: You and I have never met, but... I have a feeling of familiarity, that your existence has a wonderful connection with the Greek Goddesses.
value: 我們從沒見過面，但……我卻有一種熟悉的感覺，你的存在和希臘眾神有著奇妙的關聯。

name: Interesting. I will help reveal your destiny, since it is my calling after all. But it won't be easy...
value: 有意思，我會幫助揭示你的命運，畢竟這是我的神職所在，但這並不簡單。

name: I don't care what it costs me.
value: 我不介意會付出什麼代價。

name: The form of divine power is the symbol of every deity. Show me your power, and everything will be clear.
value: 神力的形態是每個神明的象徵，讓我看看你的力量，一切便會明朗。

name: That's not so difficult. What a faux pas, Goddess of Light!
value: 這不是什麼難事，那麼失禮了，光明女神！

name: ...Who are you? Why do you have such pure energy?
value: ……你究竟是誰？為什麼會擁有如此純淨的能量？

name: Oh, it turns out that even the Goddess of Prophecy has something she doesn't know.
value: 哎呀，原來預言之神也有不知道的事情……

name: Judging from the attributes of her divine power, she...is a new goddess born from lost divinity?
value: 從神力的屬性來看，她……是一個由失落神格誕生的新女神？

name: Yes, and this rose heralds her fate. But I can't understand it, maybe you can help me.
value: 沒錯，這支玫瑰花預示著她的命運，但我看不明白，也許你可以幫忙解答。

name: Roses are born in the south, symbolizing love... So perhaps her destiny is on the other side of the Dream.
value: 玫瑰生於南方，象徵著愛，或許她的命運之地在夢境的另一側。

name: Do you mean...the Roman Goddesses, those in the place of exile for the disqualified?
value: 你指的是……羅馬諸神，失格者的流放之所？

name: Oh? You have this expression... as if you heard something that is taboo.
value: 哦？你這表情，仿佛聽到了什麼忌諱的東西。

name: You may not know it... but the Greek Goddesses have a secret in that place.
value: 你也許不知道，希臘眾神有個秘密，就在那個地方。

name: You seem tense... Just what kind of secret is it?
value: 這可真讓人來情緒，什麼樣的秘密？

name: You will know when we get go there...
value: You will know when we get go there...

name: ...I will go with you. After all, Dreams are much more dangerous than you can imagine.
value: ……我會和你們同行，畢竟夢境比你們想像中危險得多。

name: Apollo! I have been looking for you for a long time! In the last archery competition, you actually got cold feet!
value: 阿波羅！我找你很久了！上次的箭術比試你竟然臨陣脫逃！

name: Oh it's Cupid, the little Roman Goddess of Love... Is this Fate or is it Pandora's doing?
value: 羅馬的小愛神丘比特嗎……這該說是命運的相遇，還是潘多拉你搞的鬼？

name: Hehe... I have no idea what you mean.
value: 哎呀呀……這我就不知道了。

name: Apollo is one of the strongest archers in Greece. I won't leave until she agrees to compete with me!
value: 阿波羅是希臘最強的弓箭手之一，除非她願意和我比試一場，否則我是不會離開的！

name: Cupid...? She's given me a sense of déjà vu...
value: 丘比特……她的存在讓我產生了一種似曾相識的感覺……

name: In any case, she'd be a good companion for us. That outfit might prove handy in battle, hehe.
value: 不管如何，她很適合當我們的同伴，那身行頭在遇到戰鬥時，說不定能幫幫忙。

name: You... What are you talking about? What's with that look on your face?
value: 你……你們在說什麼？為什麼都一臉不懷好意的樣子？

name: I'm planning how to kidnap you, of course, my dear.
value: 當然在想著怎麼綁架你啦，親愛的。

name: Stop! I'm throwing in the towel!
Little cutie, are you the Messenger of Love from the Roman Pantheon?
value: 可愛的小傢伙，你是羅馬神系愛情的使者嗎？

name: Um... You look very familiar. Have we met before? I have an inexplicible fondness for you.
value: 嗯……？你看上去好像很面熟呢，我們曾經見過面嗎，我對你總有種莫名的好感。

name: No, we don't know each other... yet. Would you like to travel together? Perhaps we can get to know each other better.
value: 沒有，我們並不相識，但你願你一起旅行嗎？或許在旅途中，我們能有機會更加瞭解彼此。

name: Hmm let me think... Well, it's decided! Besides, this way, I will find another chance to challenge Apollo again.
value: 讓我想想……好吧，就這樣決定了！另外，阿波羅，我會找機會再和你比試的，哼！

name: I have a bad feeling abou this.
Hehe don't worry... You're thinking too much. We have a long way ahead of us, so we'd better go quickly.
value: 你想多啦，我們最好快走，路還遠著呐。

name: It seems that this Dreamland's sea is not very welcoming. The sky is full of lightning.
value: 這片夢境中的海域好像很不歡迎我們……閃電幾乎覆蓋了高空。

name: This is Storm Dragon's domain. And she's never been too fond of people flying over her head.
value: 這裏是風暴之龍的領域，糟糕的是，她一向不大喜歡別人從她頭頂飛過。

name: So we have to use a boat to cross? Any other great ideas, Pandora?
value: 所以我們只能坐船過去？潘多拉，你有什麼好主意嗎？

name: ...If you don't mind getting wet, we could swim?
value: ……如果各位不介意的話，游泳也是個好辦法？

name: What rare guests... Ladies, why are you visiting my ocean?
value: 真是稀客啊……各位女神大人，造訪我的海域所為何事？

name: Your ocean? If I remember correctly, this ocean belongs to Storm Dragon.
value: 你的海域？我沒記錯的話，這片海洋的歸屬權應該歸風暴之龍說了算。

name: Please don't change the subject, Lady Pandora. After all, you know Storm Dragon dislikse outsiders who disturb her.
value: 請不要岔開話題，潘多拉閣下，畢竟你知道龍神一向不喜歡打攪她的外來者。

name: Sorry, we just wanted to cross. We meant no offense.
value: 抱歉，我們只是想借路通過，並無冒犯的意思。

name: Please don't get me wrong, I don't think you have any malicious intentions. But order and rules cannot be broken like this.
value: 請不要誤會，我並不認為你們懷有惡意……但秩序與規則並不能因此而打破。

name: You must prove to me that you have the qualifications to pass through Storm Dragon's domain.
value: 除非能向我證明，你們有通過龍神領域的資格。

name: I can understand that kind of order and rules, ma'am. So let's use our strength to decide!
value: 我能理解這種秩序與規則，女士，那麼就讓我們用實力來見分曉吧。

name: Your power is truly immeasurable.
value: 你的力量確實難以估量……

name: I don't need this kind of power. It means nothing to me. I just want to discover my own destiny.
value: 我並不需要這種力量，這對我來說毫無意義，我只是想尋求自己將來的命運。

name: Well, you can pass... But I'd afraid the Lady Storm Dragon will not be very happy. I'd better see you off personally.
value: 好吧，你們可以通過，但恐怕龍神大人會不怎麼開心，我最好親自送你們離開。

name: Up ahead... What's going on?
value: 前面的海域……似乎出了什麼狀況？

name: ...Icarus. Wherever there's a storm, you'll find her.
value: ……伊卡璐斯，好吧，哪兒有風暴哪兒就會有她的身影。

name: I don't care who you are or why you're here, but please leave. The storm is dangerous.
value: 我不管你們是誰，來此有何目的，但請遠離此處，我擔心風暴給你們帶來危險。

name: It is you who should leave, Icarus. You know very well that this is Storm Dragon's domain.
value: 該離開的是你，伊卡璐斯，你很清楚這裏是龍神的領域。

name: No one should create such a dangerous barrier. I must stop the storm here.
value: 無論是誰都不應製造出如此危險的結界，我必須停止這裏的風暴。

name: Lady Venus, can you help persuade her? If she persists like this, we can't even think about getting through here.
value: 維納斯閣下，你能和我一起勸勸她嗎？她這樣執著下去，我們都別想通過這裏。

name: Icarus, if we can defeat you, it means we have the ability to stop this storm, don't you think so?
value: 伊卡璐斯，如果我們能戰勝你，也就意味著我們有能力停止這場風暴，你不這麼認為嗎？

name: Sounds like fun.
value: 聽起來挺有趣的，我明白你的意思了。

name: Then there is no need to say anything more, let's get started.
value: 那麼就沒有必要多說什麼了，讓我們開始吧。

name: You are much stronger than you look. Your divinity... is a bit different.
value: 你比看起來要強大很多，你的神格……有點不太一樣。

name: I am not the original goddess. My divinity comes from the former Greek Goddess of Love, Aphrodite.
value: 我並不是原初的神明，我的神格源於曾經的希臘愛神阿弗洛狄忒。

name: Can a divinity really give birth to a new existence? I've never heard of such a thing.
value: 一個神格還能誕生出新的存在嗎？這種事情我可聞所未聞。

name: You have proved your own strength. But for the sake of safety, it is necessary for me to go with you.
value: 你證明了自己的實力，但為了安全著想，我或許有必要與你們同行。

name: Thank you for your kindness and mercy, Icarus.
value: 感謝你的好意與仁慈，伊卡璐斯。

name: I was wondering why there's such a huge mass of energy gathered on the surface of the sea. It turns out I have some uninvited guests.
value: 我剛好奇為什麼海面上會聚集了一團如此巨大的能量，原來是你們不請自來了。

name: Sorry, we're just passing through these waters, Lady Storm Dragon.
value: 很抱歉，我們只是路過這片海域，巨龍女士。

name: Phew... Pandora. Even if I hid in the abyss of your dream, it seems that there is nowhere to go.
value: 呼……潘多拉，即使我藏入你的夢境深淵，看來也清淨不到哪兒去。

name: There are always more surprises than expected... How about letting us pass through your domain now?
value: 意外總是比你預想的多嘛……事到如今，不如放我們通過你的領域如何？

name: The storm has always respected those brave enough to challenge it. So if you can beat me...
value: 風暴歷來對敢挑戰勇敢之人抱持尊敬，如果你們能勝過我的話……

name: Can't you be lenient with them?
value: 不能對她們網開一面嗎？

name: This is the rule of the Dragon Clan from ancient times. No one can violate it, not even if Zeus herself was here.
value: 這是龍族從古至今的規矩，任何人也無法違背，哪怕是宙斯來了也一樣。

name: I get it. It's a kind of a test, right?
value: 我明白了，這也算是一個考驗，對嗎？

name: The storm has receded, Dragon. It seems we have won the game.
value: 風暴退去了，巨龍，看來勝負已分呢。

name: What a strange power... Your soul is pure and flawless. It seems that you were born not long ago. Heh, a newborn Roman goddess...
value: 奇特的力量……你的靈魂純淨無瑕……看來你才誕生不久，呵，新生的羅馬神明嗎……

name: You seem to know a great deal about me...
value: You seem to know a great deal about me...

name: I don't know that much, but you want to cross the ocean and head south, don't you?
value: 我知道的不多，但你們是想穿過海洋，前往南方吧？

name: I need to go there to find the truth about my destiny.
value: 我需要去那裏尋求自己命運與預兆的答案。

name: You're rather fun. I hope you find what you're looking for.
value: 你是個有趣的傢伙呢……希望你能如願。

name: There is a vortex in the sea not far ahead. That's the gate of the Underworld in the Dreamland.
value: 前方不遠的海域有個漩渦，那就是夢境中冥界的大門。

name: ...I think I see someone that I don't really want to meet.
value: ……我好像看到了一個不大想見的傢伙。

name: This powerful force is... the Goddess Chaos?!
value: 這陣強大的力量是……混沌女神卡俄斯？！

name: Welcome to the Underworld, Greek Goddess of Light, my mortal enemy, Apollo.
value: 歡迎來到冥界，希臘的光明主宰，我的宿命之敵，阿波羅。

name: I really didn't want to see you, the source of all chaos and darkness.
value: 我可真不想看見你這個一切混沌與黑暗的源頭。

name: And... ah! You are the rumored newborn goddess. Why would you be interested in wandering around the Underworld?
value: 以及……啊！你就是那個傳聞中的新生女神吧……怎麼會有興趣來冥界閒逛？

name: I'm afraid I have no obligation to tell you.
value: ……抱歉，恐怕我沒有義務告訴你。

name: Yeah? Then let me take a guess…
value: 是嗎？那麼讓我猜猜看吧……

name: I heard that the divinity of a Greek goddess would separate under some special circumstances to form an independent entity.
value: 我聽說，希臘女神的神格在一些特殊的情況下會分離，形成一個獨立的個體。

name: However, the newborn individuals could not find their place in Greece, so they went to live in that savage place.
value: 然而新生的個體卻無法在希臘找到自己的容身之處，於是紛紛前往那個野蠻的地方謀生。

name: At least that's what the great Zeus once said, but let's get back to the point... I don't really want to stop you.
value: 至少高高在上的宙斯曾經是這麼說的，不過讓我們回到正題吧，其實我並不想阻止你……

name: But I'm curious to know how exciting it would be to have the sheer power of a newborn goddess like you...
value: 但我很想知道，你這樣的新生女神所擁有的純粹力量，會有多刺激……

name: Yeah? Well, why don't you come and experience the thrill yourself.
value: 是嗎？那麼，我想你可以親自來體驗一下這種刺激……

name: Chaos, in the dream, your power... seems to be not as strong as before.
value: 卡俄斯，在夢境中你的力量……好像沒有以前那麼強大了呐。

name: At least we're having a good time, aren't we? As for you... newborn goddess Venus, dear, we will meet again.
value: 至少我們都挺盡興不是麼？至於你……新生女神維納斯，親愛的，我們會有機會再見面的。

name: She's always been very difficult to deal with. It took the combined power of Zeus, Athena and I to barely drive her away.
value: 別驚訝，她以前可難纏得很，我、宙斯還有雅典娜三人聯手才勉強趕跑她。

name: Pandora? Seeing you here... means that Chaos has left the Dreamland.
value: 潘多拉？在這裏見到你……意味著卡俄斯已經離開夢境了吧。

name: I was just wondering why it was the Goddess of Chaos who came to welcome us at the entrance of the Underworld, instead of you.
value: 我剛還在好奇，為什麼進入冥界會是混沌之神來迎接我們，而不是你。

name: She and I have never been close.
value: 我和她一向不大……合得來。

name: No matter. We are here to seek permission to pass through the Underworld.
value: 這不重要，我們來此是為了尋求通過冥界的許可。

name: Of course, but you know the rules. What are you willing to exchange for the right to pass?
value: 沒問題，不過你知道規矩，你們願意用什麼來交換通行的權力呢？

name: I know the rules of the Greek Underworld, Hades. I've also heard that you seem to like music?
value: 我明白希臘冥界的規則，哈迪斯，我還聽說過……你似乎喜歡音樂？

name: That's true, someone touched my heart with the sound of the piano before. But now I'd like somethind different.
value: 沒錯，之前有人用琴聲打動過我，但現在嘛，我希望看點別的東西。

name: Like...a battle that satisfies you?
value: 例如……一場讓你滿意的戰鬥？

name: Haha, really? Then I want to see what kind of strength you want to use to please me.
value: 呵呵……是嗎？那我要看看，你要用什麼什麼樣的力量取悅我。

name: Interesting! It's been a long time since I played against such a fun opponent. I will allow you to pass through the Underworld.
value: 有趣，很久沒有和如此有意思的對手的打上一場了，我允許你們穿過冥界。

name: Before you leave, I have one more question - are you planning to go to Rome?
value: 在你們離開之前，我還有個問題想問——你們打算去羅馬？

name: Yes, I heard that once there was a lot of newborn goddesses, like me, who went there.
value: 是的，我聽說曾經有很多像我一樣的新生女神都去了那裏。

name: Ah, that was so many years ago. Zeus was cursed in the fight against the Titan King.
value: 啊，那是好多年前的事情了，宙斯為對抗泰坦之王，接受了詛咒，

name: This curse split the divinity of some Greek Goddesses in two, giving birth to mad souls.
value: 這個詛咒會將某些希臘神明的神格一分為二，誕生出一個瘋狂的靈魂。

name: After the war was over, those souls were unable to return. They couldn't find their place in Greece, so...
value: 戰爭結束後，那些靈魂卻再也回不去了，她們與希臘顯得格格不入，因此……

name: Zeus thought it was necessary to find a place for them, and so Rome was built in a day. And they became the goddesses of Rome.
value: 宙斯認為需要為她們找個容身之處，於是就有了羅馬。而她們，也就成了羅馬諸神。

name: Will this also be my fate?
value: 這也將成為我的命運嗎？

name: I see. Thank you for answering me.
value: 我明白了，感謝您解答我的困惑。

name: There's a light at the end of the tunnel. Are we almost at the exit?
value: 前面有光，看起來我們快到出口了。

name: ...I've had enough of the smell of death down here.
value: ……我已經受夠了下麵那些伴隨著死亡的氣息了。

name: It's almost here, I can feel it. I'm eager to find out what the final destination of Fate is.
value: 就快到達了，我能感受得到，我很想看看命運最後的終點通向哪里。

name: Venus, I'm afraid you'll have to get passed me again, to have a chance of getting to your final destination.
value: 維納斯，恐怕你得再過我這一關，才有機會到達那裏了。

name: Zeus! What are you doing here?
To be precise, I am a clone of Zeus left here. My duty is to guard this place and repatriate the gods who try to enter Rome.
value: 準確來說，我是宙斯留在這裏的一個分身，我的職責就是鎮守這裏，遣返前往羅馬的神明。

name: I don't understand. Why you would do this?
value: 我不明白，你為什麼要這樣做。

name: We should not continue to provide Rome with new strength.They are already almost strong enough to rival Olympus.
value: 我們不該繼續為羅馬提供新生的力量了，她們已經足夠強大，幾乎可以抗衡奧林匹斯了。

name: So you're just concerned about your power?
value: 所以你只是在擔心自己的權力而已？

name: I don't deny what you said. But they should recognize their position and realize that they are just a vassal pantheon of Greece.
value: 我並不否認你所說的，但她們應該認清自己的位置，認識到自己只是希臘的附庸神系。

name: Power is everything, Venus. And with true power, comes arrogance.
value: 力量決定一切，維納斯，當你真正擁有力量的時候，傲慢也就隨之而來。

name: Show me your power. The Ruler of the Greek Goddesses only recognizes the will of the strong.
value: 展現給我你的力量吧，希臘神王只認同強者的意志。

name: Your power is beyond my imagination. It seems that I will be unable to stop you.
value: 你的力量超過了我的想像，看來我確實已經無法阻止你前進的腳步了。

name: I just want to find my destiny.
value: 我只是想要尋找我的命運所在，無意炫耀自己的力量。

name: I want to remind you that you still have the mark of Aphrodite on your body, so you will not be recognized by the Roman Goddesses.
value: 我要提醒你，你身上還殘留著阿弗洛狄忒的印記，這樣一來，你就無法得到羅馬神的認可。

name: That's right. If you want to completely remove her mark, you need to erase all ties to Greece.
value: 沒錯，假如你想徹底移除她的印記，就需要抹除和希臘之間的所有聯繫。

name: But doing so will also completely erase your memories, including the time spent with your companions here, in the Dreamland.
value: 但這也將徹底消除你的記憶，包括你在夢境中與同伴的記憶。

name: Accept and become a part of Greece; or face and sever the past. Make your choice.
value: 接受並成為希臘的一員；或者是直面並斬斷過去的一切，做出你的選擇吧。

name: I don't want to forget my companions.
value: 我不想放棄與希臘同伴的聯繫……

name: I am glad that is your choice. The doors of Greece are always open for you.
value: 我很高興你能這麼想，只要你願意，希臘的大門永遠為你打開。

name: I will face my destiny.
value: 我將繼續追隨自己的命運。

name: I am sorry to hear you say that. But since you won, I shall respect your will.
value: 我很遺憾你會這麼說，但你是勝利者，你的意志會得到我的尊重。

name: You will face Aphrodite's remaining power in Pisces. You must defeat her before the Roman gods will approve of you.
value: 你將面對阿弗洛狄忒在雙魚座身上殘留的力量，擊敗她後，羅馬眾神才會認可你。

name: Venus... the other half of my divinity.
value: 維納斯……我神性中的另一半。

name: Pisces... No, it's not you. This is just a manifestation of the mark you left on my heart.
value: 雙魚……不，這不是你，只是你在我心裏留下的印記的顯現。

name: Are you really going to cut everything off to do with me? I care about you, so much so that I even risked my life to save you.
value: 你真要和我斷絕一切嗎？我曾經是那麼關心你，甚至為了救你不惜性命。

name: Come on, give up these absurd ideas and go back with me, back to Greece.
value: 來吧，放棄這些荒唐想法，和我一起回去吧，回到希臘。

name: No, you're not Pisces! If it were her, she would definitely support me, no matter my decision!
value: 不，你不是雙魚，如果是她，一定會支持我的一切！

name: Do you really think so? I am disappointed.
value: 你真的這麼想嗎？我很失望。

name: I'm ready. I'll defeat you and become a true member of the Roman gods.
value: 我已經做好準備了，我會徹底擊敗你，成為羅馬眾神真正的一員。

name: Hehe, if that's the case, then bring it on.
value: 呵呵，既然這樣，那就來吧。

name: You succeeded... Venus, you now have what they call freedom.
value: 你成功了……維納斯，你現在得到了你所謂的自由……

name: This feeling of emptiness... is nostalgic.
value: 這種空虛感……曾讓我感到懷念。

name: It's how I felt when I separated from you.
value: 在拋下你的那一刻，我也曾和你有著同樣的感覺。

name: But now that you've proven your resolve, go to the land of your destiny.
value: 但現在，你已經證明了自己的決心，去前往你的命運之地吧。

name: I will not forget the help you gave me. This, at least, is my promise.
value: 我不會忘記你曾經對我的幫助，至少這是我的承諾。

name: I hope that is true... May Fate watch over your future. Farewell, Roman Goddess of Love, Venus.
value: 希望如此……願命運指引你的未來，再會吧，羅馬的愛神，維納斯。

name: Used to upgrade the level of the Memoria Orb in Venus's Dreamland
value: 用於提升維納斯的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Venus’s Shard Optional Box
value: 維納斯女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the box and choose Venus's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇維納斯任意品質的碎片

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_104
value: 願與你共舞一曲，在這永恆的殿堂之上

name: When Venus enters the battle and when she dies, she bestows [Divine Haven] (cannot be dispelled) on all allies, which absorbs one attack (no more than 10x of Venus’ max HP) and increases ATK by 20%. [Divine Haven] fades away after blocking damage. Venus also ignores 50% Debuff RES when inflicting [Enchant].
value: 維納斯在進入戰鬥或死亡時，使我方全體獲得一層【神佑】（不可驅散），【神佑】可抵擋一次傷害（最大不超過維納斯最大生命值的10倍），並提升20%攻擊力，抵擋傷害後【神佑】消失。維納斯給敵方施加【魅惑】狀態時，無視目標50%的異常抵抗。

name: Choose any basic material from the chest
value: 打開寶箱選擇任一基礎資源材料

name: Choose any advanced material from the chest
value: 打開寶箱選擇任一進階資源材料

name: RESONANCE_SPECIAL_ARMOR_TIPS
value: 擁有12套{0}星神器可開啟{1}星神器共鳴

name: SEVEN_SPECIAL_DEVOUR_EXP_OVERFLOW
value: 當前選擇材料會溢出經驗{0}，是否繼續？

name: All angels that enable sharing automatically use the following artifacts
value: 所有開啟共用的女神自動使用下列神器

name: Artifact sharing is based on the attributes of the lowest-rated artifact
value: 根據星級最低的神器的屬性進行神器共用

name: The Artifact Inventory has been enabled, and you can use the Artifact Resonance feature
value: 神器庫已經開啟，可以使用神器共鳴的功能

name: Click to enter the Artifact Inventory
ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_105
value: 強力輸出 輔助友軍

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_106
value: 我的劍，引領著斯巴達永不熄滅的榮耀！

name: ACTIVITY_SUMMON_DESC_107
value: 無論在戰場上還是酒桌旁，我都會是最後的贏家。

name: Used to upgrade the level of the Memoria Orb in Ares's Dreamland
value: 用於提升阿瑞斯的夢境中記憶寶珠的等級

name: Ares’s Shard Optional Box
value: 阿瑞斯女神碎片自選箱

name: Open the box and choose Ares's Shards of any quality
value: 打開寶箱選擇阿瑞斯任意品質的碎片

name: Ares is the Greek god of war, and ruler of the battlefield. \nSince her power comes from the will to fight, she is particularly fond of waging war, and she can be seen on almost every battlefield. Unlike legends, she is actually more willing to inspire warriors with glory than wealth.
value: 阿瑞斯是希臘的戰神，也是戰場的代言人和主宰者。\n由於戰神的力量由戰意而來，所以她尤其熱愛發動戰爭，幾乎大多數戰場上都能看到她的身影。和傳說中不同，她其實更樂意以榮耀來激勵戰士，而非財富。

name: A pair of heavy, ornate swords made of the dying Sirius meteorite. The body of the sword has a strong gravitational field, and simply piercing the ground can cause a huge earthquake.
value: 一對厚重華麗的大劍，使用垂死的天狼星隕鐵打造。劍身有著強大的重力場，僅僅只是刺入地面，就能引起巨大的地震。

name: Hmm… I know there are countless people who covet you, but you are a rare prize that no one can take away from me.
value: 哼哼……我知道覬覦你的人多得數不清，然而你可是難得的戰利品，任何人都別想從我手中把你奪走。

name: All angels who turn on Echo automatically use the following artifacts
value: 所有開啟共鳴的女神自動使用下列神器

name: Purchase packs to awaken Ares in no time
value: 購買禮包可快速覺醒女神阿瑞斯

name: You have purchased all packages
value: 禮包已經全部購買完畢

name: Operation error. This is an Echo Artifact.
value: 當前為共鳴神器，無法操作

name: The angel is wearing artifacts that all have better star levels than the Echo Artifact
value: 當前穿戴的都是比共鳴神器更好的神器

name: Click to enter the Artifact Inventory
This is the target Echo Artifact. It activates when owning 12 sets Artifacts
value: 當前目標啟動的神器，當擁有12套神器時開啟共鳴

name: This is the next star rating for the current Echo Artifact
value: 這是當前共鳴裝備的下一個星級

name: This is the unlocking condition for the next star rating
value: 這是共鳴裝備的星級的解鎖條件

name: Tap to open the Artifact Inventory to view the artifacts you already own
value: 點擊打開神器庫可以查看自己已經擁有的神器

name: The Artifact Inventory has been enabled, and you can use the Artifact Resonance feature
value: 神器庫已經開啟，可以使用神器共鳴的功能

name: Converting... Unavailable now
value: 正在消化中，無法繼續餵食

name: You are already wearing Echo Artifacts
value: 當前穿戴的都是共鳴裝備

name: Since you have turned on the Echo, the auto-equip is disabled
value: 當前開啟了共鳴，不能使用一鍵穿戴

name: Operation error. This is an Echo Artifact.
value: 當前為共鳴神器，無法操作

name: Increase the cap of pursuit attack by2 times
Collect 55 Ares Shards to summon Ares
value: 集齊55個阿瑞斯碎片可以召喚阿瑞斯

name: A red meteor has fallen at the edge of my dream. Trouble is on its way again…
value: 一顆紅色的流星墜落在我的夢境邊緣？這下又有麻煩了……

name: Odd, there seems to be a silhouette where it landed... Why does it look so familiar?
value: 奇怪，墜落處好像有個人影……為什麼如此眼熟。

name: Well, it seems the ever-watchful God of War, the ruler of Sparta, the protector of Greece, is having a bit of bad luck today.
value: 好吧，看來萬眾矚目的戰神，斯巴達的主宰，希臘的捍衛者阿瑞斯……好像今天運氣不佳。

name: You seem quite pleased with yourself. Do you enjoy seeing others make a fool of themselves?
value: 你這傢伙看得很開心嘛，你很喜歡看人出洋相？

name: Returning to the embrace of the Earth Goddess Gaia in such a manner is rather unexpected.
value: 阿瑞斯，你通過這種方式回到大地之神蓋亞的懷抱，挺讓我意外的。

name: Ares? Are you calling me? Is that my name?
value: 阿瑞斯？你在叫我嗎？這是我的名字嗎？

name: Oh dear... Seems like you've taken quite the hit, forgetting even your own name?
value: 哎呀……看來我得改口了，你這次摔得不輕，連自己的名字都忘了？

name: What's it to you? I don't recall us being close. Ah... my head hurts...
value: 這和你有關系嗎？我和你可沒那麼熟！啊……頭好痛……

name: It should. In my dreams, you're no longer the invincible God of War.
value: 痛就對啦，在我的夢境裏，你早就不是那個刀槍不入的戰神了。

name: You dare to mock me? When my sword descends upon your head, let's see if you can still laugh!
value: 你敢嘲笑我？等我的劍落到你頭上的時候，看你還笑不笑得出來！

name: Hmph! Look at you, if your mouth wasn't so venomous, you wouldn't have taken that beating.
value: 哼哼！你瞧瞧，如果你的嘴巴沒那麼毒，就不用挨這一頓了。

name: I didn't expect that after your fall and the injuries you sustained, you could still exhibit such combat prowess.
value: 沒想到你墜落之後受了這麼重的傷，還能發揮出這種戰鬥力。

name: What the hell have you done? Why did I suddenly fall into this godforsaken place?!
value: 你這傢伙都幹了些什麼？我為什麼會忽然墜落到這個鬼地方？！

name: I did nothing. You fell from the sky and hit your head all on your own! Seriously, you're still as arrogant and conceited as ever.
value: 我什麼都沒幹，是你自己從天上掉下來撞到腦袋的！真是的，你還是那麼傲慢和狂妄！

name: But you must have some wish you want to fulfill, otherwise, you wouldn't appear in my dream.
value: 不過你一定有什麼願望想實現，否則你不會出現在我的夢境裏。

name: A wish... I don't recall ever thinking about such things. Right now, I just want to leave this place as soon as possible.
value: 願望……我可不記得自己有想過這些，眼下我只想盡快離開這裏。

name: If you can't remember, then don't dwell on it. The dream will guide you to find the correct exit.
value: 想不起來就別想啦，夢境會引導你尋找正確出口的。

name: Pandora, you'd better give me an explanation.
value: 潘多拉，你最好給我個解釋。

name: The essence of the God of War is to challenge. Perhaps fighting with the mighty will jog your memory.
value: 戰神的意義在於挑戰，或許與強者之間的戰鬥能讓你回想起什麼。

name: So, am I supposed to fight this guy in front of me? He doesn't look that strong...
value: 所以呢，我是要和眼前這個傢伙打一架？他看上去也不像很強的樣子……

name: Pandora, Ares, I don't recall sending invitations to either of you. Isn't it rude to come uninvited?
value: 潘多拉，阿瑞斯，我好像沒給你們兩個發過邀請函，不請自來未免太不禮貌了？

name: If it wasn't for something important, I wouldn't bother seeking you out, dear.
value: 如果不是大事，我可沒興趣來找你，親愛的。

name: Important? Don't tell me you came here to pick a fight with me... Wait, why has Ares become so weak?
value: 大事？別和我說你們是來找我打架的……等等，阿瑞斯為什麼會變得如此虛弱？

name: She's lost her memory and also the power of the God of War. The dream guided us here.
value: 她失憶了，同時也失去了戰神的力量，夢境指引我們來到了這兒。

name: So in the end, you hope she can recover her memory by fighting with me, right?
value: 所以到頭來你們還是希望讓她通過和我戰鬥，來恢復記憶，對吧？

name: Well... She is one of the most significant gods in Greek mythology. Without her opposing those war mongers from Norse myths, there will be serious trouble.
value: 這個嘛……她是希臘眾神最重要的一位，沒有她對抗北歐的那些戰爭狂，麻煩就大了。

name: I understand the danger behind this... Fine, I'll help.
value: 我明白這背後的險境……好吧，我會幫忙的。

name: If you all think this will help, I have no objections. After all, it's just fighting, doesn't matter who I'm beating up.
value: 如果你們這樣認為有用的話，我倒是沒意見，反正都是打架，揍誰都可以。

name: Sigh, it seems that even after a hard knock on the head, you've yet to learn any manners.
value: 唉，看來即使腦袋被狠狠敲過之後，你也沒學會半點禮節。

name: ...Is this the power I once had? It's truly overwhelming!
value: ……這是我過去的力量嗎？ 實在是太強大了！

name: It seems this method is working; the power is flooding back into you.
value: 看起來這方法奏效了，力量正在湧入你的身體。

name: I'm glad our efforts weren't in vain. But honestly, I really don't like seeing her so smug.
value: 我很高興這份努力沒有白費，但話說回來，我真不愛看她那副洋洋得意的臉。

name: Join us on our journey, Icarus. In the subsequent dreams, you can be of great help to us.
value: 跟我們一起同行吧，伊卡璐斯，在之後的夢境中，你能幫我們不少忙。

name: Alright, after all, it's better to keep an eye on a hothead like Ares...
value: 好吧，畢竟阿瑞斯這暴躁的傢伙，還是有人盯著比較好……

name: My God, whose dream is this? The atmosphere is overly romantic...
value: 天哪，這是誰的夢境，氛圍未免浪漫得過頭了……

name: I'm also curious as to why you'd be led here. The master of this dream seems to like a good fight.
value: 我也很好奇為什麼你會被引導到這兒來，這夢境的主人可是個喜歡打架的傢伙。

name: Pandora? And Ares? Why are you guys in my dream?
value: 潘多拉？還有阿瑞斯？你們為什麼會出現在我的夢裏？

name: Don't tell me she's the so-called strong one? I feel like I could hold her head down with one hand...
value: 別告訴我所謂的強者就是她？我恐怕一只手都能摁住她的頭……

name: Huh?! Did you hit your head, Ares? Just a few months ago, I had you running with your tail between your legs.
value: 哈？！你摔到腦袋了嗎，阿瑞斯？幾個月前我剛把你打得落花流水。

name: You guessed right; she lost her memory after falling into this dream, she can't recall many things.
value: 你猜得真准，她跌落夢境後失去了記憶，很多事情都記不起來了。

name: Really? Hehe, she got what she deserved! I'm just sad that her annoying character wasn't completely forgotten.
value: 是嗎？哼哼，看來她活該！我很遺憾為什麼她欠揍的性格沒有一塊忘乾淨。

name: The priority right now is to help her regain her memory, whether you like her or not.
value: 然而當務之急就是讓她恢復記憶，即使你不喜歡她。

name: Hmm, she's already forgotten how she lost to me last time. I guess it's necessary to remind her!
value: 嗯哼，她已經忘了上次是怎麼輸給我的，有必要讓她重新記起來了！

name: Talking won't get us anywhere, little one!
value: 然而光嘴上說是沒有意義的，小傢伙！

name: Stop, stop! How is this possible? Was I careless? You seem to be much tougher than last time...
value: 停手停手！這怎麼可能，是我大意了嗎，你好像比上次難對付得多……

name: Maybe I was just half-asleep last time, darling.
value: 說不定上次我沒睡醒，親愛的。

name: You're definitely getting back your old vibe; that arrogant demeanor is almost shining through your eyes.
value: 你確實找回了點過去的感覺，那不可一世的氣焰幾乎都快要從眼中迸射而出了。

name: According to the Spartans' combat code, the loser has to fulfill a request made by the winner.
value: 按照斯巴達勇士的戰約，敗者需要接受勝利者提出的一個要求。

name: What?! Is there such an unreasonable rule?
value: 哎？！還有這種無理的規矩嗎？！

name: This is the tradition of Sparta. My request is that you must join me in facing the troubles that lie ahead!
value: 這可是斯巴達的傳統，我的要求就是你必須和我一起面對接下來的麻煩！

name: Erm... I'd like to know if I have the right to refuse...
value: 呃……我想知道自己有沒有拒絕的權力……

name: Of course! You can either choose to follow me obediently to the next dream or get knocked out and be carried by me.
value: 當然有！你可以選擇老老實實跟著我去下一個夢境，或是在被我敲昏扛走。

name: Lately, you seem to be visiting my dreams quite frequently...
value: 最近你來夢境找我的次數好像……有點多？

name: Doesn't that just highlight your importance? I came for her.
value: 這不正說明了你的重要性嗎？我是為了這傢伙而來。

name: The Goddess of War, Ares? Well... She doesn't seem unusual from the outside.
value: 戰神阿瑞斯？嗯……從外表看上去，她好像沒什麼異樣。

name: However, the situation is severe; I've lost most of my memories.
value: 然而事情嚴重得很，我丟失了自己大部分的記憶。

name: Heh... It's a pity that her temper didn't vanish with them.
value: 呵……遺憾的是她這副暴躁脾氣沒有隨著它們一起失去。

name: I've heard some rumors that you were defeated in a battle with a certain goddess... Do you remember anything?
value: 我聽到了一些傳聞，說你在和某個女神的戰鬥中落敗了……你還記得什麼嗎？

name: The moment I opened my eyes, I found myself in Pandora's dream and couldn't recall anything.
value: 我剛一睜開眼就發現自己掉在潘多拉的夢境裏，什麼都想不起來了。

name: ...You must have made a wish to Pandora's Box, and in order to fulfill that wish, the dream took away your memories.
value: ……你一定向潘多拉魔盒許了什麼願望，夢境為了實現這個願望，拿走了你的記憶。

name: To reclaim your memories, you must continuously fight within dreams and regain your divine status.
value: 而如果你要取回記憶，就需要不斷在夢境中通過戰鬥，為自己找回神格。

name: This doesn't seem like something I'd understand, but I've never refused a challenge.
value: 這不大像是我能理解的方法，但我從來不會拒絕有人向我發起挑戰。

name: Stop it, Ares; our power has reached its limit.
value: 停手吧，阿瑞斯，我和你的力量已經接近極限了。

name: I feel a lot of my strength returning, but I also sense anger and fury...
value: 我感到力量又回歸了不少，但我也察覺到了一絲憤怒和狂暴……

name: This power will make you stronger, but it also brings recklessness and chaos, which will eventually harm you.
value: 這份力量雖會讓你變得更強，但也帶來了冒失和混亂，這樣下去遲早會害了你自己。

name: I don't care about those. After all, I've always believed that power is everything.
value: 我並不在意這些，畢竟從始至終我都認為力量才是一切的主宰。

name: Sigh... I truly wish you could learn humility one day, at least towards your former companions.
value: 呼……真希望有一天你能學會謙卑，至少對你曾經的夥伴如此。

name: Apollo is a powerful warrior; battling him could help recover your memory and strength faster.
value: 阿波羅是位強大的戰士，如果和她戰鬥，你的記憶和力量能恢復的更快。

name: Apollo... that name rings a bell in my hazy memory. My sword is humming, craving a challenge.
value: 阿波羅……我模糊的記憶裏有這個名字，我感到自己的劍在鳴動，它渴望挑戰。

name: As soon as you entered my dream, I felt the power within you, Ares.
value: 在你踏入我的夢境時，我就感受到了你身上的力量，阿瑞斯。

name: Usually, your greeting when we met in the past was a hurled sword. I'm surprised you didn't do that today.
value: 過去你和我見面時的問候，往往是一把飛擲而來的劍，但今天你沒這麼做，挺讓我意外。

name: It seems we didn't get along in the past, huh? The radiance of your dream realm makes me uneasy...
value: 看來我們以前的關係不怎麼樣呐，你夢境領域的光芒讓我覺得渾身不舒服……

name: Being the god of prophecy, I can't sense your past memories. It seems you've come to retrieve them.
value: 作為預言之神，我沒有感受到你過去的記憶，看來你是來尋求它的。

name: I will provide guidance as it's only fair... Hopefully, once this is all over, you can learn some manners.
value: 我會給予你指引，因為這是你應該得到的公正……希望在一切結束後，你可以去學學禮儀。

name: Hmph... Bring it on. Let's see if your sunlight blinds or if my blazing fire burns hotter.
value: 哼……那就來吧，讓我看看是你的陽光灼眼，還是我的烈火熾熱。

name: Helping an old enemy regain his strength is an odd sensation.
value: 幫助昔日的敵人恢復力量，這種感覺也挺讓人矛盾的。

name: From our battle, I sensed a powerful sense of order...
value: 從與你的戰鬥中，我感受到一種強大的秩序……

name: That's precisely where my strength comes from, in direct contrast to the chaotic, violent power you used to revere.
value: 這正是我的力量來源，與你過去所崇尚的混亂、狂暴的力量恰恰相反。

name: With the return of your power, the chaotic and violent spirit of your past will inevitably come back, though I'd rather it didn't...
value: 而你隨著力量的恢復，過去那個混亂而暴力的靈魂也遲早會回歸，其實我並不希望這樣……

name: I don't care. If my past self was powerful enough to crush everything, that's fine by me.
value: 我無所謂，如果過去的我足以強大到碾壓一切的話。

name: Unfortunately, chaos and fury don't necessarily mean the strongest.
value: 遺憾的是並非如此，混亂與狂暴並不意味著最強。

name: Hmph, interesting. If it were the me before I lost my memories, I probably would've retorted without hesitation.
value: 哼，有意思，如果是失去記憶前的我，恐怕會毫不猶豫地反駁吧。

name: But now, I'm a tad curious about what you're saying.
value: 但現在我對你所說的話，卻出現了一絲好奇。

name: Good, I'll be by your side, watching to see how fate guides you this time...
value: 很好，我會跟在你身邊，看看命運這次會如何指引你……

name: The Underworld. I must've been here more than once. I remember the aura here, the cold of death.
value: 冥界，我曾經應該不止一次來過這裏，我記得這裏的氣息，充滿死亡的寒冷。

name: That's right. You used to frequent this place. After all, war brings death, so we've always had... collaborations.
value: 沒錯，曾經你可是這的常客呢，畢竟發動戰爭就會帶來死亡，所以我倆一直都有……合作。

name: But I believe that you no longer have the qualifications to command wars now. Such a pity.
value: 不過我相信，此時的你已經沒有掌控戰爭的資格了，真可惜。

name: You better treat me with respect, or I can't guarantee I won't accidentally reduce this place to ashes.
value: 你最好給我保持足夠的尊敬，否則我不敢保證不會“不小心”失手把這兒燒成灰。

name: Heh... When you were the god of war, I believed you could. But with your current strength... I'm not so sure.
value: 呵呵……你還是戰神時，我相信你做得到，而憑你現在的力量……可不好說。

name: Hmph, I'm here because I heard you could help me retrieve my memories and strength, to reclaim past glories.
value: 哼，我來此只是聽說你能夠幫助我重拾記憶和力量，找回過去的榮耀而已。

name: Your tone remains as commanding as ever... Fine, considering our past, let's make a deal.
value: 你的口氣還是那麼不容拒絕……好吧，看在曾經的份上，我就和你做個交易。

name: Simple. I want you to wage war on the Norse, guiding the souls of the Norse warriors to the Greek Underworld.
value: 很簡單，我要你發動對北歐的戰爭，將北歐戰士英魂引至希臘的冥界。

name: Why does this deal sound familiar?
value: 這交易為什麼讓我感到有點熟悉？

name: Exactly. Because it's something we agreed upon before you lost your memories.
value: 沒錯，因為這就是在你失去記憶前我們約定過的事情。

name: I can accept this deal, but how it's executed will be up to me.
value: 我可以答應這樁交易，但具體怎麼做，要由我決定。

name: Of course, it's your call, as long as... you prove you're still as strong as you once were.
value: 當然由你說了算，前提是……你能證明自己依舊和以前那麼強。

name: Uh... I can feel my memories slowly returning with each battle...
value: 呃……我能感覺到每次隨著戰鬥的結束，自己的記憶正在慢慢找回……

name: You've already gotten what you wanted from me—a shard of the god of war's divine essence.
value: 你已經從我這得到你想要的東西了——戰神最重要的神格碎片。

name: So the question is, Ares, do you remember why you fell from the heavens?
value: 那麼問題來了，阿瑞斯，你想起來自己為什麼會從天界墜落嗎？

name: Athena... Why does her image come to mind...?
value: 雅典娜……為什麼我的腦海中會浮現她的身影……？

name: Heh... Maybe you should return to Olympus. Although your relationship with Athena is complex, perhaps she isn't responsible for this.
value: 呵呵……你應該回奧林匹斯看看，雅典娜與你關係雖然微妙，但她或許並不該為這事負責。

name: Impossible... Didn't you fall into the depths of the dream abyss, becoming mortal?
value: 這不可能……你不是已經墜落至夢境深淵，成為凡人了嗎？

name: It seems you know something, dear. Maybe it's not too late to tell me.
value: 你好像知道些什麼嘛，親愛的？或許現在告訴我還不遲。

name: Put away your arrogance. I'm under no obligation to answer your questions.
value: 收起你的傲慢自大，我可沒義務回答你的問題。

name: However, it seems you've gained new powers in the dream realm... I'm quite interested in your power...
value: 不過，你在夢境中好像獲得了全新的力量呢……我對你的力量很有興趣……

name: Would you like to experience it firsthand?
An interesting proposition. If you can defeat me, I'll tell you everything that happened before...
value: 不錯的提議呢，如果你能戰勝我，我就告訴你之前發生的一切……

name: This ends now, Goddess of Chaos. Your power cannot prevent my victory!
value: 到此為止了，混沌女神，你的力量無法阻止我的勝利！

name: Your fighting style has... refined quite a bit from before. The old you would never have faced an enemy's attack so calmly...
value: 你的戰鬥比以前……精巧了不少，曾經的你可絕不會如此冷靜地面對敵人的進攻……

name: Enough talk! Tell me everything you know.
value: 廢話少說！快告訴我你知道的一切。

name: I'll give you a clue. Not long ago, through the Eye of Chaos, I saw you with Zeus and Athena in the realm of Olympus.
value: 我就告訴你一個線索吧，前不久我通過混沌之眼，看到你和宙斯、雅典娜在奧林匹斯神域。

name: ...It seemed like you had a dispute over something, but what it was, I have no idea.
value: ……你們似乎為了某件事情發生了爭吵，但具體是什麼事，我可就一無所知了。

name: It seems I wasn't wrong in my assumptions. I'd better go to Zeus for answers.
value: 看來我沒猜錯，我最好去找宙斯問個明白。

name: Ares, I'm glad to see you return unscathed. I was quite worried when you fell into the abyss of the dreamscape.
value: 阿瑞斯，很高興看到你能毫髮無損地回來，你掉進夢境深淵時可讓我擔心了好一陣子。

name: Tell me everything you know, Zeus! Was I attacked by Athena?
value: 把你所知道的一切都告訴我，宙斯！我是不是被雅典娜襲擊了？

name: What are you talking about? How could such a thing happen?
value: 你在說什麼呢？怎麼可能會發生這種事。

name: Then I guess I'll have to go directly to Athena and get some clarity.
value: 那我恐怕只能直接去找雅典娜問個明白了。

name: With that anger on your face, it doesn't seem like you're just going for a conversation. If you cause trouble, it won't be good for the gods.
value: 你滿臉怒氣可不像是去問話的，如果你惹出了麻煩，對眾神來說可不是好事。

name: Don't stand in my way. I must know the reason for everything that happened!
value: 別擋著我，我必須要知道一切事情發生的原因！

name: Enough, Ares. If you're set on seeking answers from the goddess of wisdom, I know I can't stop you.
value: 到此為止吧，阿瑞斯，如果你一定要去想智慧女神尋求答案的話，我知道攔不住你。

name: But I hope you won't resort to violence as you used to.
value: 但我希望你能別像之前那樣用暴力解決一切問題。

name: Alright... At least, compared to before, there's a hint of order and reason in your eyes now. I hope I'm not mistaken.
value: 好吧……至少相比以前，你的眼神中多了一絲秩序與理智，希望我沒看錯。

name: Come out, Athena! If you continue to hide, I'll tear down your temple!
value: 雅典娜，快出來！如果你要還繼續躲著的話，我就把你的神廟拆了！

name: I hope you remember Zeus's warning. At least... don't forget it so quickly...
value: 阿瑞斯，我希望你別忘了宙斯叮囑你的話，至少……別忘得那麼快……

name: I can't recall offending you again. I hope you'll explain.
value: 我不記得什麼時候又得罪你了，阿瑞斯，希望你解釋清楚。

name: What did you do to strip me of my power and memory and then throw me off Olympus?
value: 你到底用了什麼方法將我力量和記憶抽走，然後將我扔下奧林匹斯的？

name: What are you talking about? How could I do such a thing!
value: 你在胡說什麼？我怎麼可能做出這樣的事情！

name: It seems only swords can clarify this for me!
value: 看來只有刀劍能向你問明白了！

name: Oh my, I should have seen this coming...
value: 天哪，我早該猜到會這樣……

name: You lost. Tell me everything you know!
value: 雅典娜，你輸了，告訴我你知道的一切！

name: You've actually started to use tactics. How surprising.
value: 你……居然也開始懂得使用戰術了，真讓人意外。

name: Brute force doesn't solve everything... Be honest with me, what happened with my fall into the dreamscape abyss?
value: 蠻力可解決不了一切……向我坦白吧，我墜落至夢境深淵究竟是怎麼回事？

name: I have absolutely no idea what... wait, now I remember! Thor from the North once visited Greece not long ago.
value: 我根本就不知道這究竟是……等等，我想起來了！不久前北歐的索爾曾經造訪過希臘。

name: Thor, the god of thunder? What did she want?
She was searching for the one who stole the souls of the Norse warriors.
value: 她正在尋找偷走北歐戰士靈魂的傢伙。

name: The souls of Norse warriors? Damn... could it be the deal I made with Hades?
value: 北歐戰士的靈魂？見鬼……該不會是哈迪斯和我的那個約定？

name: Are you hiding something from me? Or did you strike some deal with him?
value: 哈迪斯？你是不是有什麼事情瞞著我？還是說你又和哈迪斯做了什麼交易？

name: I only know I made a deal with him, but I've forgotten the specifics!
value: 我只知道自己和他做過一個交易，但我忘了具體的內容！

name: I might have a solution. In the dreamscape, I can summon Thor's soul. Perhaps that could clarify everything.
value: 我倒是有個辦法，在潘多拉的夢境中，我可以召喚索爾的靈魂，也許能弄明白一切。

name: Forget it. I've got nothing to discuss with her.
value: 算了吧，我和這個傢伙沒什麼好談的。

name: Sigh... Maybe that's not a bad thing. Every encounter with the Norse gods usually doesn't end well.
value: 呼……這或許也不是壞事，至少每次和北歐的神明打交道都沒有什麼好結果。

name: I guess this is the only way to figure everything out.
value: 我想這是弄明白一切的唯一方法。

name: It's me, the Greek god of war, Ares! Thor, did you cast me into the dreamscape abyss?
value: 是我，希臘戰神阿瑞斯！索爾，是你將我擊落夢境深淵的嗎？

name: It's you?! I didn't expect you to crawl out of that abyss.
value: 是你？！沒想到你還能從深淵裏爬回來。

name: So it was you! Thanks to you, I've suffered quite a bit.
value: 果然是你這傢伙幹的！拜你所賜，我可是吃了不少苦頭。

name: You and Hades conspired to steal the souls of the Norse warriors. I was just executing justice!
value: 呵……你和哈迪斯一起密謀偷走北歐戰士的靈魂，我只是行使我的正義而已！

name: I remember now... Zeus and Athena once discussed with me the territorial divisions with the Norse realm.
value: 我想起來了……宙斯和雅典娜曾與我商量與北歐的領域劃分問題……

name: Exactly. The Norse gods agreed that the strongest would harbor more souls. You were chosen to represent the Greek warriors and battle against me.
value: 沒錯，北歐眾神同意強者收留更多的靈魂，你被選為希臘戰士的代表與我對決。

name: But in the end, due to Hades' interference on the battlefield, we couldn't determine a victor.
value: 但最終因為哈迪斯在戰場上阻撓了我們的戰鬥，並沒有決出最後的勝利者。

name: We had no choice but to consider the Greek gods as oath-breakers. Eventually, in the chaos of battle, you were cast down from the divine realm.
value: 我們不得不認為希臘眾神食言，最終雙方在亂戰中，你從神域被擊落了。
